1111.title: Picking a boy

choices: Before Naruto digs in, one of Naruto's friends enters the stand.
Naruto digs in with gusto.
11111.content: Team 7 had just returned from a particularly tough mission, and Naruto had just gotten back to his apartment clad in his classic orange and blue jumpsuit. It was getting hot out, so he took off his jacket and his undershirt, then he put on a blue t-shirt with the symbol of Konoha in orange on it. He stayed in his orange pants, then, predictably, he set off for Ichiraku's, as he always did after a mission. The last few missions paid out quite a bit, so Naruto had plenty of money to spare. When he arrived at Ichiraku's he was greeted with a "Hey! How's my favorite customer.", to which he responded cheerily "I'm great, and hungry! Give me a miso pork ramen with extra pork, old man." Teuchi then retreated to the kitchen, preparing Naruto's order. He knew that Naruto was a big eater, so while he was there, he got out more ingredients, and then he brought out a few large kettles in anticipation of Naruto's binge. Then he began cooking a few pots of ramen for Naruto. Soon, he was finished, and he got a bowl, taking a serving of miso pork for Naruto. He added all of the trimmings, including the extra pork, then he gave it to his daughter, Ayame, who brought it to Naruto. Naruto eagerly blurted out "Thanks", and he got a pair of chopsticks, splitting them, and preparing to dig in.
11111.title: Naruto

choices: Follow the boys from the start of their contest through to the end of it
Follow them from the start of their contest through to the middle
111111.content:
"Hey, do ya mind if we sit here?"

Naruto blinked, his chopsticks inches from his bowl. He turned around, eyes widening a bit at the sight before him. There, right in front of him, stood Kiba, arms folded and lips quirked in a good-natured smirk. The other boy, having had the day off, was clad in rather casual clothes appropriate for the weather; specifically, a pair of light-blue pants and a dark green, v-necked t-shirt with red lining the neck and a picture of a cartoony dog face on the chest. From atop his head, Akamaru stirred and barked a greeting at Naruto.

"Oh, hey, Kiba. What's up?" Naruto asked, turning around and fixing the dog-nin with a smirk of his own.

The brown-haired boy shrugged. "Eh, Hinata's trainin' with Neji and Shino's collectin' bugs, so me and Akamaaru figured we'd get a bite to eat." He indicated the seat next to Naruto. "Which brings me back to my question: you mind if we sit here?"

Naruto blinked again. "H-huh? Nah, I guess not."

Kiba smirked. "Thanks, Naruto; you're a pal." Striding over to the seat, he plopped down and raised an arm. "Oi! Can I get an extra-large ramen with beef?" His eyes flicked towards the top of his head. "And, uh, maybe get a small one for Akamaru, too." The dog yipped in thanks, tail wagging.

Teuchi blinked in confusion-only an Inuzuka would order for a dog-but he nonetheless turned around and began preparing Kiba's order.

Kiba grinned and licked his lips as the smell of noodles, broth, and beef wafted into his sensitive nostrils, and he couldn't help drooling just a tiny bit.

"Oh yeah," he muttered, not caring if Naruto, now slurping up his own noodles, heard him. "This is gonna be so good...and this is only the first one!"

At this, Naruto gulped down his current mouthful and looked over at his friend in confusion. "Eh? First one?"

Kiba grinned. "Yeah! I've got a ton of money saved up from missions, and I figured, since this is my day off, why not go wild?"

Naruto stared at him, the stirrings of an idea beginning to stir. "And...how many bowls were you planning on getting?"
Kiba laughed, patting his currently flat stomach. "As many as I can cram in my gut." Akamaru rolled his eyes, but nonetheless kept quiet.

Naruto smirked. "That right?" He patted his pocket. "Well, I've saved up a ton of money, too, and I was planning on getting at least a few bowls." His smirk turned competitive. "You up for an eating contest?"
{/i}
Kiba blinked, surprised. "Eating contest?"

Naruto grinned, patting his own flat stomach. "Yep! I figure, we eat as many bowls as we can, and whoever loses has to pay!"

Kiba sneered. "What, you think I'm paying for your stupid ass?"

Naruto bristled slightly at the insult, but his expression quickly turned cocky. "What's the matter, Kiba? Afraid I'll kick your ass like I did during the Chunin Exams?"

Kiba narrowed his eyes, baring his teeth. Oh, it was ON.

"Oi! Old man!" Kiba raised his arm. "After you finish mine, keep on making 'em for both of us, and don't stop till we can't eat any more!" Teuchi, blanching a bit at this, nonetheless went about his work, setting Kiba's first bowl in front of him, as well as a smaller one for Akamaru. Then, he went right back to work, preparing more bowls for the two boys.

Kiba glared at Naruto, split his chopsticks, and began digging into his bowl. Naruto, who only smirked, dug into what was left of his, even as Teuchi set another bowl down by him.

Akamaru cringed, even as he hopped down from Kiba's head and began working on his own bowl. This wasn't gonna end well, he knew it...

Where do you wanna go from here?
111111.title: Before Naruto digs in, one of Naruto's frie...

choices: Naruto and Kiba realize their predicament, and adjust themselves accordingly.
Naruto and Kiba are oblivious, and continue to stuff their faces.
1111112.content:
Teuchi saw where this was going. His most valued customer was very competitive, and he could down a surprising amount of ramen if he could. He had also served Kiba more than once, and he saw Kiba eat more than his fair share of ramen before.

He was glad that he cooked the large pots of ramen in anticipation of Naruto's binge, as this would make his job much easier. He also got out the bowls for extra large ramen so that he would not have to do so many dishes when this was all said and done.

Ayame decided to help by taking count of each of the boys' consumed bowls. She also took the finished bowls out of the way to be washed, adding to the count when she did so. This was part of a system that the father-daughter duo decided to employ. When one of the boys would finish, they would say their flavor for Teuchi, and Teuchi would take from the pot that he made.

Either way, Naruto finished his bowl, and, as he liked to have fair fights, he waited for Kiba to finish his, which did not take long. Ayame took the empty bowls, while Naruto shouted, "Another miso pork please!" Kiba followed suit, simply adding, "Me, too!"

Naruto got a bit miffed by this, and he yelled at Kiba, saying, "Make your own order!" Kiba retorted with, "It doesn't matter! You're paying for it anyway!" Naruto was about to start arguing with Kiba some more, but the boys already had their ramen in the extra large bowls sitting right in front of them.

Neither of them wasted time bickering as they dug in, slurping violently in an effort to get ahead of their adversary. Both of them had a large amount of confidence, as they both have eaten a lot in the past, and they both loved Ichiraku ramen, though Naruto loved it even more than Kiba, opting to go there much more often.

At this point, Akamaru had finished his bowl, as he was eating more casually, and he was satisfied with one bowl, so he climbed onto the seat next to Kiba, and observed the competition. Ayame saw this, and while she still had time, she placed a pillow on the counter, and prompted Akamaru to climb up. Akamaru was well-trusted at Ichiraku's and he was as welcome as the other two. Ayame gave Akamaru a pat on the head, then watched as Naruto and Kiba got closer to finishing their first bowls.

Seconds later, the two had finished slurping their broth almost simultaneously, and Ayame took the bowls, bringing the count for each of them up to two. Both boys were considerably hungry before coming to Ichiraku's, so they were still a bit hungry when they finished these two bowls.

Naruto was still in the mood for pork, so "Keep the pork comin'!" was his instant response to finishing. Kiba, on the other hand, stopped caring about flavor, so he just said "Surprise me, old man!" Kiba then petted his beloved pet and friend while he waited.

In a short time, the two had their bowls, and they started slurping down their ramen with even more gusto. Akamaru was relaxing on the pillow in the afternoon sun, and he watched as the two finished their noodles in less than about a minute, and they greedily slurped down the broth in seconds. Luckily the ramen was not too hot, so this was not too difficult for them.

Teuchi knew what the two would order, so as soon as they finished, he handed them the next two bowls. Yet another pork for Naruto, and a chicken for Kiba. Ayame took the empty bowls, making the count for both of them 3, and this process continued.

Akamaru was interested, so he continued to observe the contest, watching as the fourth bowl filled the boys' stomachs enough to make it slightly noticeable had they not been wearing shirts. Soon they finished their next bowls, and they were finally not hungry anymore, but they certainly were not full, especially since they were eating so fast that the fullness would not hit them for a while.

Soon, Naruto had three more bowls of pork ramen. It was quite a streak for him. Kiba, on the other hand, had two bowls of shrimp, and another bowl of beef ramen. At this point, their stomachs were distended enough to become quite noticable, even under Naruto's blue t-shirt and Kiba's doggy shirt. Noticing this, Akamaru thought to himself, "I haven't seen Kiba eat this much in a while."

Soon, the count climbed to ten, with Naruto still eating pork ramen, and Kiba having virtually every flavor. At this point, their shirts had begun rising up, and a sliver of flesh slowly began to reveal itself to the world. Their engorged bellies were beginning to work their way further under the counter and they were starting to cause strain their pants buttons. Akamaru had begun to worry at this point, but he knew that there was no stopping them.

Three more bowls later, Naruto continued to eat pork ramen, and he polished off a large pot singlehandedly. In fact, he had established a small lead. Kiba, meanwhile, was now eating exclusively beef ramen, as Teuchi knew that it was Kiba's favorite.

Either way, their bellies were big enough to lift their shirts to reveal an inch of engorged belly flesh, and their waistbands began to cut into their growing stomachs that yearned for more room. They were also sitting right up to the counter-top, so their bellies were getting awfully close to the cabinets underneath.
1111112.title: Let the games begin.

choices: Follow them through from this point to the end; Naruto Wins
Follow them through from this point to the end; Kiba Wins
11111121.content:
In the middle of his current bowl, Naruto stopped, the chopsticks halfway to his mouth.

"Huh, my waist is feelin' sorta tight..." he thought to himself, looking down at his engorged belly. At this point, he also noticed his stomach was getting close to the table. He winced. "Eesh, better scoot back a bit..." This in mind, he backed up on his stool a bit, creating some distance between his growing gut and the table.

Kiba, meanwhile, seemed to have realized the same thing. Scooting back, he reached under his stomach and felt the front of his pants, blushing a bit. "Oh wow, these are really tight, aren't they?" he murmured to himself, reaching for his button. Better he do something about it now than let his sister try to mend a popped button...

Naruto, having the same idea, reached for his button as well. Though his belly did get in the way a bit, he finally got a good enough grip on both the fabric and the button to hold them firm. Coincidentally, at the same time, Kiba got a firm grip on his button as well. In an eerily synchronized move, both boys unbuttoned their pants, sighing in relief at the release of pressure. As a result, their stomachs bulged out a tiny bit, their shirts rising up a little higher and exposing a little more skin, with the first few teeth of their respective flies coming open.

Naruto sighed again, smiling blissfully. "Oh man, that feels so much better..."

Kiba, for once not seeing fit to argue, merely rubbed his stomach and grinned. However, when he saw Teuchi and Ayame staring at him and Naruto, he scowled. "Hey, we ain't done yet! Keep the ramen coming!" Starting, the father-daughter pair went about preparing more ramen, even as Kiba and Naruto attacked their current bowls.

Meanwhile, Akamaru stared at the two boys, finding himself fascinated despite himself. This was the first time he'd ever seen Kiba eat this much, and though he didn't want to admit it, he found himself eager to find what they'd both look like by the time they were done. He settled back into his pillow wagging his tail. This was going to be interesting...

Where do you want to go from here?
11111121.title: Naruto and Kiba realize their predicament, and ...

choices: Kiba wants a rematch with Naruto with a different food.
Naruto goes to an official ramen-eating contest in a nearby village.
111111211.content:
The boys were back in the fray, and they continued to devour more and more bowls of ramen. Akamaru watched, amazed, as the two were still able to eat with such gusto. The violent slurping sounds were almost memorizing, and Akamaru was amazed that Teuchi and Ayame could catch up.

With each passing bowl, the flies of the boys were forced down slightly farther, and their shirts had risen slightly higher.. In only about five minutes, the two had reached 17 bowls, and their flies had reached the bottom, though their bellies were obscuring their exposed undergarments for the moment. Either way, their shirts had also risen to the point where their belly buttons were slightly exposed. "Huh, Naruto's an innie, too," thought Kiba as he gulped down yet another bowl of broth, setting the empty bowl on the counter.

Naruto was determined to stay on his pork ramen, getting closer to finishing another pot, and Teuchi kept giving Kiba beef ramen so that he would finish the pot of beef ramen off. Either way, the two did not care what flavors they ate, as they were so determined to beat each other.

In a few more minutes, Kiba had reached 20 bowls, but Naruto was already working on his 22nd, not to mention his third pot of pork ramen. Kiba polished off the pot of beef ramen, so Teuchi was giving him chicken ramen now. Either way, Naruto's stomach was large enough to lift his shirt several inches above his belly button, and Kiba's had also risen, though not as much.

The two were so full of ramen that any movement caused they boys' bellies to wobble. They, especially Kiba, were staring to feel quite full, and their bellies were stretched considerably, but they were both too determined to beat each other to notice.

Akamaru watched in awe as the number climbed up to an astonishing 24 for both of them. Kiba was able to speed up, and finally caught up. Either way, with each passing bowl, their stomachs pushed back under the counter, inching out ever so slightly as another bowl was finished.

With this bowl, though, their stomachs were so stretched out that both Kiba and Naruto's belly buttons were quivering due to the pressure. They finally inverted, providing a little more room, and though the two were initially fascinated, they glared at each other for a moment before digging in.

Akamaru was worried for Kiba, as he began picking up speed. Now he was at 28, even though Naruto was only at 27. His outrageous stomach was so large that it wedged itself under the counter again, even though he scooted back.

Unfortunately for Kiba, he was going too fast, and his fullness hit him like a brick. He slowed down suddenly, reluctantly drinking the broth of his 29th bowl down. He laid back, hoping that Naruto had given up as well.

Luckily for Naruto, this was his chance, so he continued to eat with gusto, ignoring the pain as much as possible, and soon, he was on his thirtieth bowl. He ate it like he normally would, and soon enough, he had finished that thirtieth bowl. Kiba saw this, and he initially griped, but, he lost fairly, so he grudgingly got out his wallet.

"Not yet!" Naruto exclaimed, then, in a gutsy move, Naruto demanded, "Hey! Old man! Give me the rest of that pot of pork ramen!" Kiba looked with both awe and disgust as Teuchi brought out a large pot of pork ramen. Though there was only about three bowls left, Naruto grabbed the pot, then put his mouth up to it, drinking down the rest of the ramen, noodles and all. He had to chew occasionally, but he slurped down the entire rest of the pot, leaving Kiba with even more to pay.

"Hey! You didn't have to show off like that!" Kiba griped again, but he still got out his money and paid the tab. He wasn't kidding when he said that he had a lot of money, though, as the massive tab hadn't even taken out a quarter of his earnings. "Guess it's time to go." Kiba pointed out, "But don't think that you'll win next time!"

He then scooted back, and his gargantuan stomach flopped out from under the counter. He leaned back, and at that point, Naruto caught a glimpse of Kiba's blue boxers with doggie bones on it. Naruto couldn't help but laugh hysterically. "Look at Kiba's puppy underwear!" he teased, before he tried to scoot out. He had eaten so much, however, that his stomach was wedged under the counter quite a bit.

It took a lot of force, but Naruto's belly was finally released with a plop. At that time, however, Naruto lost his balance, falling backwards. His pants caught onto the counter, and they fell to his ankles, revealing a pair of tight-fitting white briefs, dotted with a design of a bowl of ramen.

This time Kiba got the last laugh, in hysterics before managing to comment, "You're one to talk, Naruto! At least I don't wear whitie-tighties with ramen on them!" Kiba still lost and paid, but this was well worth it for him. Even Akamaru couldn't help but laugh.

Either way, Naruto's face flashed a bright red, but, not one to stay embarrassed, he shrugged it off, saying "At least I got a good meal for free!" as he gestured by heartily patting his belly. "I hate to admit it, but that was impressive" was Kiba's response.

After that, Naruto managed to stand up, but had to use the stool for support until he was able to balance himself. At that point, he pulled his pants up, trying to zip them up in futility. Kiba got up as well, and nearly fell over, but he managed to do so.

Teuchi just watched in confusion as Naruto and Kiba were being very friendly again, high fiving, and doing other 12-year-old boy gestures. Soon, Naruto exclaimed, "See you later Kiba!" before he slowly waddled away, his overfilled beach ball-sized belly wobbling with every step.

Kiba's belly was not quite as big, but it was still difficult for him to walk as well. Either way, Akamaru opted to hop onto Kiba's head, and he fell asleep, enjoying the rocking motion of Kiba's waddling.

Soon each adolescent shinobi was back in their respective homes, and Kiba was luckily home alone. Either way, both Naruto and Kiba collapsed on their respective beds, falling into an afternoon slumber almost instantly. As they breathed, their bellies rose and sank hypnotically.

In Kiba's room, Akamaru opted to jump on top of Kiba's belly, where he curled up and fell asleep.
111111211.title: Follow them through from this point to the end;...

choices: All three keep pace with one another for a good stretch of time
Akamaru, after several servings, starts to lag behind
1111112111.content:
Naruto shifted in his seat, looking at Kiba. "So, what're the rules again?" He was wearing his usual: orange pants and orange jacket with a black t-shirt underneath.

Kiba-himself wearing white pants and a black hoodie (with no undershirt of any kind) with a yellow stripe down the middle-folded his arms, quirking an eyebrow in annoyance. "I already told ya, dummy, it's the same as last time: we eat as much as we can, and whoever's eaten the most plates by the end wins." Akamaru, resting in his lowered hood, barked to emphasis this point.

Naruto scowled. "Dummy? Hey, I'm not the idiot who challenged someone else on their home turf."

Kiba growled at the reminder, but Akamaru simply wagged his tail, remembering what a comfy pillow Kiba's engorged belly had made.

It had been a few weeks since Naruto and Kiba's first eat-off at Ichiraku's. Though Kiba had taken his 'defeat' in good spirits, he was more determined than ever to beat the blonde. And, as he'd laid awake in bed, his belly churning as it digested the massive quantities of ramen it had taken (it had only taken the boys a day or two to digest everything, leaving them as slim as ever), he'd figured he'd do what Naruto did and hold an eating challenge that would work in his advantage: specifically, a burger place he liked to go to every now and then. Kiba loved meat, and he figured that he had the homefield advantage in this case.

Kiba was about to retort to Naruto's remark, but was interrupted by a waiter, who set down their first plates: specifically, a large cheeseburger each with two patties and all the fixings. Naruto smirked, confident that this would go the same way as last time...until he saw the waiter set down a plate for Akamaru. "Huh? Kiba, what's..."

The dog-nin laughed. "Well, Akamaru got pretty interested in our eating contest last time, so he figured he'd try it for himself."

Akamaru yipped, wagging his tail. Hey, I might end up looking like a fluffy soccer ball by the time I'm done, but at least I'll have fun doing it.

Naruto gaped, but shook his head. "Yeah, well, even if you have your dog helping you, don't think this time's gonna be any different! You're still goin' down!" With that, Naruto seized his burger, lifted it to his mouth, and started tearing into it. Kiba, smirking did the same with his own burger, Akamaru jumping onto his not long after.

Where do you want to go from here?
1111112111.title: Kiba wants a rematch with Naruto with a differe...

choices: The waiter, catching on to the competition, returns with a table-sized burger.
One of their other genin friends notices Kiba and Naruto.
11111121112.content:
Akamaru was enjoying himself too much to observe the boys, though after a few small burgers, Akamaru had reached his limit, his stomach distending very noticeably. This was harder than he though. Of course, being as small as he is, it was no wonder that Akamaru was already stuffed. Either way, he lied down under the table, nearly falling asleep with the fast, sloppy munching of the two being heard above.

Meanwhile, at the top, Naruto and Kiba had reached their third large burger, which was almost the size of their heads. Kiba was a regular here, so all the servers knew that he loved his burgers very rare. They were so rare, in fact, that a bit of blood trickled down Kiba's chin as he ate, in addition to the restaurant's secret sauce.

Naruto was a bit grossed out by Kiba's extremely rare burger, but he still focused on pigging out more than Kiba could, determined to show Kiba that he was still the best at eating. He was not used to eating burgers fast like Kiba, so he was considerably sloppier, spilling quite a bit of the burger contents on his chest. He did not care, though, as he was in the zone.

Either way, both boys' stomach quickly last their flatness, becoming slightly distended under their respective jackets, though not nearly enough to be noticeable. The waiter walked by to check on the two, who were finished with their next burgers.

"Another one?" questioned the waiter who was surprised by the sheer volume that the boys were eating. "Kiba hasn't eaten that much in a while!" thought the waiter. Little did he know that the two had neglected to eat breakfast to try to gain an advantage. He looked down at Akamaru, who was asleep under the booth with quite the stomach on him.

As soon as the waiter asked the question a second time, Kiba, who had been spacing out for a second, responded quickly with "Of course, we're hungry here! Oh, and bring another for Akamaru, in case he gets hungry again!" He was a bit embarrassed that he, a famous shinobi in the making, had neglected to be more observant. The waiter merely shrugged it off and walked back to the kitchen.

Naruto, on the other hand, was mindlessly rubbing his belly with a goofy smile on his face. "Man, Kiba, I never knew this place was so good!" Naruto said, with Kiba's response being, "What, are you done already! I already ordered for you, so I guess I'll have to eat it myself."

Seeing this as a challenge, Naruto yelled back, "You wish! I'm not even close to full!" Kiba responded with, "We'll have to see about that!" The boys continued their banter, waking up Akamaru. "Of course this is how they wait for their food" Akamaru thought "I hope they brought me another burger. I still have some room"
11111121112.title: Akamaru, after several servings, starts to lag ...

choices: They take a break; the burger is a quarter of the way eaten
They take a break; the burger is halfway eaten
111111211121.content:
Kiba and Naruto were so engrossed in their banter, they did not notice the waiter's approach, nor the fact that he was struggling with something. However, Akamaru, lying on the floor, happened to glance up...and his eyes went wide. Oh, you gotta be kidding me...

Naruto, oblivious to Akamaru's shock, merely raised a fist, ready to deliver a particularly obnoxious retort to Kiba's own banter, when, without warning, something huge dropped onto their booth's table with a loud THUNK that shook it, startling the blonde. "Wh-what the hell!" Not looking at the table, he glared up at the nearby waiter. Kiba, also startled by the distraction, looked at the table instead.

The blonde raised his fist at the waiter. "Hey, buddy, what do ya think you're doing? Unless you're bringing us the next course, how about showing some respect and...what the hell are you pointing at?" In spite of his confusion, he nonetheless followed the waiter's pointing finger to the table...and his expression swiftly flowed into one that mirrored Kiba's.

There, sitting in front of them, was quite possibly the single biggest, most gargantuan burger either of them had ever seen: it easily encompassed most of the table, and it lacked any and all fixings, with the exception of several huge slices of cheese piled on the table-sized patty. It dripped with massive quantities of different sauces: ketchup, mustard, the restaurant's secret sauce, and ridiculous amounts of juice. All of this was contained within two gigantic buns, easily reaching an inch or two away from the table.

Lost for words, Naruto and Kiba simply gaped at the waiter, who coughed. "Well, erm, it looked like you two were competing, so I figured I'd give you both the single biggest thing this place had. That way, you could have your contest, and we wouldn't run out of supplies." He laughed nervously, while the boys simply returned their gaze to the burger on the table. "I'll, uh, let you get on with your competition." With that, the waiter hastily exited.

Neither Kiba or Naruto moved for a few minutes. The only movement Kiba made was to pick Akamaru up off the floor, stuffed belly and all, and place him on the table so he could get a better look at the massive sandwich. Then, the two boys exchanged a look, grinned, and attacked the burger with gusto. Even Akamaru, stuffed as he was, couldn't resist digging in as well.

Kiba and Naruto tackled the burger, grabbing large handfuls of meat, bun, and cheese (the meat was extremely tender, and the cheese and bun fresh-made, so this was a fairly easy task) and shoveling them into their mouths, heedless of the juices that dripped down their faces. Akamaru, in the meantime, simply grabbed whatever was within reach, whether it was meat, cheese, bun, or any combination thereof. As his belly was already stuffed, every bite, every mouthful caused his stomach to bulge just a little more.

It wasn't just Akamaru, either; as the minutes ticked by and more and more and more of the burger vanished down the boys' throats, Naruto and Kiba's stomachs were becoming visibly affected. Naruto's stomach slowly became a round shape clearly visible beneath his orange jacket, while the front of Kiba's black hoodie slowly pushed out. And, as the three continued attacking the monstrous sandwich, their bellies only continue to grow.

Naruto's stomach went past simply being a round shape and pushed outwards, stretching his jacket in the process. Eventually, a few of the teeth of his orange jacket were pried apart by the slowly-growing mass, exposing a bit of the black shirt underneath. As his stomach continued to push out, more and more teeth were slowly pried apart.

As Kiba shoveled more and more into his mouth, his stomach swelled, pushing his black hoodie out further and further until, finally, it couldn't stretch anymore. Now, instead of pushing out as he gorged himself, the hoodie slowly began rising up, exposing a thin strip of skin that continued to grow as his stomach did, slowly pushing his hoodie up further.

Akamaru's stomach, meanwhile, grew and grew with every bite, until, finally, he could feel it begin to touch the table's surface, and his back legs begin to be forced apart. He whimpered slightly at the discomfort, but the taste of the burger pulled him back in.

And so, the three of them continued to tackle the burger, their stomachs slowly but constantly swelling as more and more of their burger entered their gullets.

Where do you want to go from here?
111111211121.title: The waiter, catching on to the competition, ret...

choices: Near the end of the burger, one of them is victorious.
The two manage to finish the burger, and they want more.
1111112111212.content:
As the early afternoon sun shone in, giving a pleasant amount of light, Kiba and Naruto laid back in the booth, well satiated. They were both rubbing their bellies with satisfied grins on their faces. The burger was quite destroyed, with Naruto Kiba and Akamaru having made two gigantic holes in its sides. The holes were so big that they nearly touching, leaving two halves of a burger with a small bridge connecting them in the middle. Due to the contribution of Akamaru, Kiba's hole was a just a little bit larger than Naruto's.

"Man, that burger was soooo good!" Naruto said, patting his stuffed belly for emphasis. After Naruto's belly had forced the bottom of his jacket open, Naruto removed the offending article of clothing, which had received quite a spattering of stains, leaving him in his black undershirt, which had ridden well above his navel. After struggling awkwardly for a while, he removed the button of his pants, causing his bloated belly to bulge out even farther, forcing his fly down, leaving him in his current state.

"You said it! That's why I go to this place a lot!" Kiba responded simply, patting his belly as well. His overfilled stomach had pushed his hoodie up so far that it currently rested on the top of his belly. When the two took a break, he had followed suit in unbuttoning his pants, causing his own belly to surge out to where it currently resided.

Though the booths were large, leaving plenty of space in the seats, both Naruto and Kiba were dangerously close to touching the table. In fact, their leaning back was the only thing keeping them from touching the table with their bellies.

Akamaru merely yipped in agreement, causing him to bounce on his belly. Taking after his master and best friend, Akamaru had eaten so much burger that his stomach had literally lifted him off of the ground a bit. In taking his break, Kiba was rubbing that massive belly, and his little buddy was close to falling asleep.

Either way, the three enjoyed their relaxation, nearly forgetting that they were in competition, but, when Naruto began showing off the size of his stomach, he prompted another round of banter, followed by the simultaneous digging in of Kiba and Naruto. Akamaru was extremely full, so he decided to sit out this round, watching as the two began to stuff themselves sillier.

They were back in the fray, sauces and meat juices hitting their faces and chests as they ate. They didn't care, as the burger was so delicious and surprisingly still hot. Because both boys had sat up in the process, their bellies were pressed against the counter, advancing farther out in all directions with each passing bite.
1111112111212.title: They take a break; the burger is halfway eaten

choices: Naruto plows through several bowls, only stopping when he blows out his button
Naruto plows through several bowls, not stopping even as his button breaks
1111112112.content:
Naruto sat at his seat eagerly, rubbing his hands together. "Oh boy, I can't wait...." he muttered to himself, practically bouncing in his seat. "I'm gonna win this thing no problem!"

A few weeks after his eating contest with Kiba, and well after his gut had faded and returned to its normal, slim self, Naruto had learned, via Tsunade, that a ramen-eating contest was being held in a nearby village, with a sizable cash prize available for the winner. Naruto, never one to pass up a challenge (and besides, he could always use more cash) had eagerly asked Tsunade to sign him up.

As this was more of a fun trip than a mission, Naruto had opted to dress casually for the occasion: specifically, he wore a pair of black trousers and a short-sleeved, white T-shirt that had Konoha's emblem emblazoned on both the front and the sleeves. He'd had clothes just like them when he'd been little, and he had always liked them, so it had been a simple choice for him.

Naruto grinned. Hope these duds are up to the task, 'cause my gut's gonna get awful big...

Something suddenly drew his attention, and he sat up in his seat as the contest's referee called the attention of every contestant. Coughing, he began relaying the rules, which, basically, stated that there was to be no interfering with other contestants' meals, that there was no time limit, and above all, that if any of them were to lose their lunch (ick,) they would be automatically disqualified.

Naruto grimaced at this, but nonetheless grinned as an extra-large ramen bowl was set before. Grabbing his chopsticks and splitting them apart, he held them above his bowl as the officiant held his hand up in the air.

"Ready...set...GO!"

With that, Naruto and every other contestant set to their bowls with a will.

What happens from here?
1111112112.title: Naruto goes to an official ramen-eating contest...

choices: Naruto wins, then stops.
Naruto wins, but is not finished in the least.
11111121122.content:
Naruto's will was particularly strong, as even though the bowl was larger than his head, he slurped down the noodles in less than three minutes, a testament to Naruto's love for ramen. The ramen was also very good, and that helped Naruto considerably.

Either way, he practically chugged the broth, taking monstrous gulps of the savory, luscious liquid. It was easy to tell that the bowl was huge, though, as just one had formed a mound of flesh where his flat stomach used to be. It was large enough to form a light outline on his shirt.

The volunteer was very surprised, but he increased the number on the counter nonetheless, grabbing another bowl for Naruto, who dug in without missing a beat.

Naruto tore into the bowl with just as much vigor, slurping down even more noodles, with each chopstick of noodles making his swollen belly create a bit more stress on his shirt. By the time he had finished this bowl, the shirt gave up, so it rose up, revealing a small strip of Naruto's overfilled stomach.

The volunteer was more prepared this time, as he already had Naruto's next bowl waiting. Naruto continued on that bowl without even slowing down. He was definitely in the zone.

Other contestants who had given up who were four times Naruto's size watched in awe as such a little twelve year old ate almost grotesquely fast. They were very impressed and they began to crowd around him, cheering.

Naruto was downing the broth by that time, and this next bowl of ramen lifted his shirt up to where his navel was. By this point, his stomach was now causing stress to his pants, particularly the button that was holding them together.

The cheering only made encouraged Naruto more as he dug in with more gusto, his stomach pushing out farther and farther, looking for anywhere to expand out to. He finished the next gigantic bowl in no time, and his shirt had ridden up to the top of his overfilled belly, where it currently rested.

At this point, his pants button was constricting his belly and causing a considerable amount of pain, but he brushed it off as he grabbed the next bowl.

He ate this one just as quickly, and soon, his quivering pants button could take no more, so it gave out, ricocheting on a chair in front of him and landing just shy of another contestant.

Though it felt considerably better, Naruto was completely unaffected by this, and the surge forward in his belly that it had created. If anything, it only caused him to go faster as the ever-growing crowd cheered even more.

Naruto's belly had surged all the way to the table, where it began to be split in half by the encroaching table. Either way, he moved onto his sixth gigantic bowl, and at that point, there was only one other contestant left, and he was behind Naruto by an entire bowl.
11111121122.title: Naruto plows through several bowls, not stoppin...

choices: At the hotel: while grabbing lunch, they challenge each other again
At the hotel: after soaking in the hot spring, they order room service
111111211221.content:
"Aaaaand....time!"

The announcer's declaration rang out just as Naruto downed the broth from his tenth bowl, and he slammed it down, sighing. "Oh man, that was good..." Grinning in satisfaction, he looked down at his stomach. Predictably, it had swollen even more; it pressed very uncomfortably against the table, the top half of his belly resting on the flat surface, his inverted navel wobbling in the middle for all to see. Even the bottom seams of the sides of his ill-fitting shirt had busted, creating more strain on the ones above them. His fly, having long come wide open, caused him to shiver as a draft played across the area, and he was, quietly, very grateful that no one could see his undergarments-currently, a pair of orange boxers with frogs on them. Grunting a bit, he scooted back, relaxing the pressure on his stomach. Sighing happily, he closed his eyes and let one arm hang to his side, the other one caressing the swollen mass.

Abruptly, this arm was seized and lifted into the air. Alarmed, Naruto's eyes flew open and he looked in the direction of the disturbance, only to see the announcer holding his arm in the air. "It's no contest! Uzumaki Naruto wins by three bowls!"

At this, Naruto beamed. He'd won!

The announcer continued. "He will receive a sizable cash prize, and a weekend at the village's premiere hotel!"

Naruto burped, still grinning goofily. A lotta cash AND a weekend at a nice hotel, which probably had an awesome buffet to boot! Awesome!

"...and he will be sharing it with the winner of our nearby steak-eating competition, Inuzuka Kiba!"

Naruto's eyes widened. What?!

Almost as if on cue, two attendants entered the scene carrying a very stuffed and satisfied Kiba, his arms draped around their necks for support. His long-sleeved, tan shirt had ridden up, and his clothes and belly were in much the same state as Naruto's. Behind them, Akamaru trotted along dutifully, rolling his eyes.

Burping, Kiba looked up at Naruto, smirking. "Hey, Naruto; you won your contest too?"

The shock passing, Naruto grinned, smacking his engorged belly and causing it to shake. "Heh, you bet!"

As they continued bantering, Akamaru whimpered, sitting down. I have a really bad feeling about this...


Where do you wanna go from here?
111111211221.title: Naruto wins, then stops.

choices: Kiba and Naruto become more competitive in their eating.
The two continue to stuff themselves for enjoyment.
1111112112212.content:
"Man, that was nice!" Naruto exclaimed, pleased with the calming hot springs and the hotel in general. He was walking with Kiba towards his room with a soft, white hotel robe on, folding his arms behind his head. Since the contest yesterday, his stomach went back down to its normal state, the ramen having digested. There was a small bit of pudge on Naruto's midsection at the time, but by now, Naruto's high metabolism reduced it back down to being completely flat.

"You said it! It feels awesome to relax every once in a while!" The dog-nin replied, clad in a matching robe with his hands in the pokets of the robe. Akamaru even barked in agreement. "I'm surprised that they haven't stuffed themselves yet!" Akamaru thought. "Of course, it's only Friday night, so it's bound to happen. Kiba's stomach was back to normal as well, as his morning run with Akamaru had helped him work off the small amount of fat that accumulated on his belly.

Either way, the two relaxing young shinobi made their way to their room on the top floor. It was a lavish suite with all of the best accommodations. There were two soft, white king-sized beds, a large bathroom with marble floors and counters, and even a small porch-like area outside with a view of the surrounding area. They could even see Konoha from here.

The two entered the room, amazed at the cleanliness and the fanciness. Kiba practically melted as he sat on the bed, being consumed by comfort. It wasn't long, however, before Naruto's stomach growled loudly while he sat on the bed.

"Look's like someone's hungry!" Kiba said before his stomach protested in hunger. Taking the cue, Naruto asked, "Wanna order room service?" "You don't have to ask me twice!" Kiba responded eagerly, his stomach growling loudly to confirm it.

As Naruto made his way to the hotel phone, Akamaru thought "Oh, no. Here it comes." He watched as Naruto began ordering, "I'll take three of your biggest bowls of ramen. One beef, one chicken, and one barbecue pork. I'll also take..." Naruto continued ordering a massive order, which included nearly everything on the menu, focusing on ramen, of course.

"I'm glad the contests are paying for everything" Akamaru barked at Kiba, who nodded in agreement. Naruto then finished, then handed the phone to Kiba. "Wait, that's just Naruto's order!" Akamaru thought as Kiba took the phone eagerly, beginning his order. "Five of your biggest steaks, extra rare, with extra sauce, and..." Kiba's order what just as large as Naruto's. He even ordered a steak for Akamaru!

Now that they were done, the two laid back in their beds, turning on the massive TV to entertain themselves while they waited for their food. They chatted casually, and Akamaru was surprised that they hadn't bickered more.

After a while, there was a knock on the door, and Kiba leaped up off of his bed, eager to begin his feast. As soon as he did so, a virtual army of hotel chefs walked in, bringing with them eight carts that were overflowing with various food items.

The chefs arranged four of the carts around Naruto's bed, with the other four surrounding Kiba's bed. There was even a chef holding a dish with a cover. He went over to where Akamaru was laying, presenting him with his own small steak.

The two spent nearly a minute just staring at the food, wide-eyed. It was all they could do to keep from drooling. Either way, as if on cue, Naruto and Kiba dug in simultaneously, with Naruto choosing a massive bowl of ramen that was the size of a large mixing bowl. "Wow! When they say biggest, they really mean biggest!" Naruto exclaimed halfway in between mouthfuls of noodle.

"I know! My steaks are immense!" Kiba nearly screamed as he dug through the monstrosity, which itself took up a whole platter. He didn't even bother with utensils as he grabbed the edge and tore into it with the help of his Inuzuka canine teeth.

Akamaru couldn't help but stare as the boys ate as if they hadn't in years, amazed by the sheer portions that were brought to them. He was amazed as Kiba and Naruto worked their way to the end of their respective dishes

Their bellies, which were now able to accommodate even more due to recent stuffing, had already begun protruding out slightly, becoming just a bit visible under their hotel robes, which were surprisingly clean for the most part.
1111112112212.title: At the hotel: after soaking in the hot spring, ...

choices: Kiba and Naruto continue eating until they rip their robe sashes
Right before ripping their sashes, they hear a knocking at  the door
11111121122122.content:
Finally, Kiba and Naruto had finished off their massive first portions, and Akamaru stared at the effects those first portions alone had had on their stomachs. Their bellies now protruded a bit more than before, pressing rather visibly against their hotel robes.

"Damn, that was good," Naruto murmured, patting his belly. "That might have even been better than Ichiraku's!"

Kiba licked the juice off his lips. "Yeah; my steak was really tender!" He looked at the massive amounts of food still left. "Man, what should I have next?"

Naruto, meanwhile, was looking at his huge order, trying to decide what to have next. Eventually, he settled on another huge bowl of ramen, while Kiba targeted another massive steak. Setting their meals before them, Kiba and Naruto grinned at one another.

"So, Kiba," Naruto began, splitting his chopsticks. "How big ya think our guts are gonna be after we're done all this?"

Kiba grinned, picking up his steak. "Dunno," he replied, licking his lips, "but I know one thing: it's gonna be awesome gettin' 'em."

Naruto laughed, patting his midsection. "Don't I know it!" He smirked mischievously. "I'm gonna see if I can break my sash!" He tugged on the sash holding his robe together.

Kiba's face lit up. "That'd feel awesome! I broke my button during that steak competition, and it felt great!" He rested his hands on his stomach. "Imagine how awesome ripping this thing would feel!" Suddenly hearing Akamaru whimper, he turned to his buddy, who was looking at them both, whimpering and tilting his head. "Relax, buddy! We're wearin' undies under these!"

Naruto, excited at the prospect of ripping his sash, dove into his ramen, slurping it up and causing his stomach to slowly grow as the noodles entered it. Kiba, likewise, began tearing at his steak, his belly bulging bit by bit as each piece of meat fell into his gut.

Where do you wanna go from here?
11111121122122.title: The two continue to stuff themselves for enjoym...

choices: They eat only a little more, then relax for a while.
The continue to eat with no sign of stopping.
111111211221221.content:
The two continued tearing into their main courses. As they did, their stomachs continued to fill out the extra space their robes. Soon, their stomachs were stretching the fabric, in addition to causing quite a bit of strain on their sashes, which were currently creating dents in their stuffed bellies.

At that point, Kiba finished his second steak, and Naruto had finished his second bowl of ramen. From there, Kiba moved on to a large platter that contained a massive pile of various sausages. After all, Kiba ordered mostly meat, in fact, it was hard to find anything but meat on his carts.

Naruto's cart, on the other hand, was slightly more balanced, but, he was determined to finish all of the ramen, so he took a third bowl of ramen and began slurping vigorously, as he was also determined to break the sash.

Akamaru watched, amazed at the focus of the two. They were completely oblivious to the juices running down their faces, with Kiba having sausage grease all over his face, and Naruto having broth dribbling down his chin.

With each bite, Akamaru could practically hear the sashes stretch more. Soon, Naruto was guzzling the broth of his ramen, biding through the pain of the sash on his stomach. This sudden surge of liquid was enough to cause his sash to violently tear with a very loud sound that even caught Kiba's attention.

Being freed from its prison, Naruto's abdomen surged forward powerfully. It surged forward with so much force, in fact, that it pushed out past Naruto's knees, then receded back, and it continued to wobble in that manner until it stopped, resting on Naruto's thighs and covering his undies, which were the same ones he wore when he first competed with Kiba at Ichiraku's.

As Naruto discarded the loose robe, throwing it towards the closet, he rubbed his massive, stuffed belly, saying, "Man, that felt good! Now I can fit even more in here!" He then slapped his belly proudly, adding, "Kiba, you should try it!", which caused Kiba to stop staring at Naruto, declaring, "You don't need to tell me twice!"

True to his word, Kiba began eating the sausages faster than ever, barely chewing before he sent them to their stretchy prison. Soon enough, with another violent tear, Kiba's belly was freed as well, and it surged outwards and wobbled just like Naruto's did.

Naruto was the one staring this time, as Kiba removed his robe, reveling that he was wearing a pair of special boxers. His sister had sown them for him for his birthday, and they were covered with a pattern of Akamaru's face, a testament to his love for the dog.

"Oh wow! He's wearing those!" Akamaru though, slightly flattered, but also still a bit creeped out by it. Either way, if he could, he would have face palmed. This was due to the fact that Kiba blurted out at Naruto, "What are you staring at? Let's eat!", causing both of them to dig right back into their food.
111111211221221.title: Kiba and Naruto continue eating until they rip ...

choices: They wake up, and go out to get something to eat
They wake up and continue to work on their room service
1111112112212211.content:
Fortunately for Akamaru, Naruto and Kiba got only a little way into their next dishes before they both groaned, lurched over to the carts, and placed what was left of their current dishes on them. Staggering back to their beds, they let themselves fall into an upright sitting position, the beds creaking slightly under the weight of their stuffed bellies.

""Oh man," Naruto belched, rubbing his stomach with both hands. "That was so good..."

Kiba, rubbing his belly with one hand (the other one resting on the bed) sighed happily. "You said it; I haven't had susages that good in a long time." As soon as the last word left his mouth, he let loose with a titanic burp of his own rattling the empty dishes in the process. Blushing, he covered his mouth. "Heh... excuse me." Sighing again, he let himself flop back onto his bed, causing it to creak a bit more and his belly to stick up in the air. "Ah, yeah, this vacation's gonna be fun." Smiling, he folded his arms behind his head.

Yawning, Naruto flopped back as well, instead resting his hands on his gut. "You said it; it's nice to let loose every now and then." He burped suddenly, and he smiled and stuck his tongue out to the side. "I dunno about you, but I could go for a nap right about now." As if to punctuate this, he yawned loudly, smacking his lips.

Settling into the comfort of his bed, Kiba shut his eyes. "Yeah; nothin' like a food coma nap after a big meal."

Akamaru, seeing where this was going, hopped up onto the bed, then onto Kiba's stomach, where he curled up and shut his own eyes.

Kiba smiled warmly at the sight. "G'night, little buddy," he murmured, in spite of the fact that it was only the afternoon. Yawning, he settled in further.

Naruto, letting out another yawn of his own, took his arms off his stomach and let them dangle at the sides of his bed. Closing his eyes, he allowed himself to melt into the comfort of his bed.

Later...


Naruto
1111112112212211.title: They eat only a little more, then relax for a w...

choices: "Sure! I'm hungry for big portions!"
"Nah, lets look for another place. I'm not in the mood for ramen or steak."
11111121122122111.content:
Naruto began to stir in his bed, and soon enough, he was sitting up, rubbing the sleep out of his eyes, and realizing that his stomach had downsized considerably during their nap. It still protruded outwards, as Naruto wasn't finished digesting, and it was still fairly noticeable, but it wasn't stretched out anymore, and it growled very loudly, reminding Naruto of his hunger.

This growl woke up Akamaru with a fright, and he tensed up, ending up digging his claws into Kiba's belly. "Ow! That hurt boy!" Kiba exclaimed after being woken up with a start. "Sorry, I just got startled." Akamaru barked in response.

"What could possible scare ya, buddy?" Kiba inquired as his stomach, which matched Naruto's in size and texture, gave a growl that was just as loud, causing him to jump a bit. "Oh, I see what scared ya." He said. Naruto just watched, as these conversations between Kiba and Akamaru always puzzled Naruto.

Either way, he noticed that the carts of food were no longer there, complaining, "Hey, where'd the food go?" "Room service must've taken 'em" Kiba responded as he searched his luggage for an outfit to wear.

Naruto did much the same, asking, "Wanna find a restaurant to eat at?" "You just read my mind!" Kiba eagerly responded as he slid on the second leg of a pair of black pants. Soon the two were fully dressed, and ready to go.

Naruto was clad in a pair of blue pants with a plain orange t-shirt with blue sleeves. He had barely managed to fasten the button, and his stomach barely lifted his t-shirt.

Kiba, on the other hand, was wearing black pants and a green t-shirt with a giant blue paw print on the chest. He had an easier time with the button, as the pants were larger than the ones that he normally wore. His belly still lifted up his t-shirt just a bit, though.

As the two began slipping on their ninja sandals, Kiba asked, "Where do ya wanna go? We could go to the steakhouse that cooked for my competition. Their food was great! We could also go to the ramen place that made the food for your competition. I'm sure that was good too."

To this, Naruto answered...
11111121122122111.title: They wake up, and go out to get something to eat

choices: "Nah, we're going to bust out of 'em anyway!"
"Good point. I'll put some on."
11111121122122112.content:
Kiba was the first to wake up, and he rubbed the sleep out of his eyes before sitting up, though he forgot that Akamaru had settled on his belly, so Akamaru was sent tumbling to the bed, much to his surprise. "Oh, sorry buddy." Kiba groggily mumbled to the surprised dog, who barked in response, "It's alright. It's not the first time that it's happened."

After that nap of a few hours, Kiba's gargantuan belly had gone down considerably, but it was still quite noticeable. Either way, the skin of his belly was no longer taut, and, though it was still the size of a basketball, it still growled, and Kiba grabbed it and wobbled it, saying, "Look's like you're hungry already!"

Akamaru just stared at him, confused, as Kiba got out of the bed, and, still in his boxers, he looked on the carts of food to find that they had heating. He started to heat the food on both his and Naruto's carts, talking to his belly all the while.

At this point, Naruto began stirring, and, as he was sleeping on his side, his first view of the morning was of Kiba's boxer-clad butt. That was because Kiba was bending over to heat a cart of Naruto's food that was right next to his bed.

"Hey, get your ass outta my face, and put some clothes on!" Naruto yelled, obviously not happy about waking up with his face so close to Kiba's behind. Kiba turned around, responding with "I just woke up! Of course I won't have clothes on! I didn't know you would wake up, and all I was trying to do was heat your food for you!" "Here they go again."

Akamaru thought to himself, bracing himself for more bickering, or even a fight.

At that point, a growl was heard coming from Naruto's stomach, which was in much of the same state as Kiba's. Naruto then rubbed the back of his head, saying, "I guess you're right." Naruto was about to bring up the Chunin exams, but Kiba was still miffed about it, and Naruto didn't want to bicker more this early in the morning.

Soon enough, the two were watching a show on TV, still in their boxers, but they didn't really care, as they were too excited for the food to heat up. Akamaru was glad that they weren't back to stuffing already.

Akamaru's fears would be realized, as a pleasant ding was heard, signaling the end of the heating of the food. "Alright! Let's eat already!" Kiba exclaimed as he shot up and began taking off covers to the dishes, scanning to see what he should eat first.

"Hey Kiba, shouldn't we be wearing pants?" Naruto asked, surprisingly being the voice of reason. Kiba responded with...
11111121122122112.title: They wake up and continue to work on their room...

choices: It was someone from Konoha that they knew.
It was the army of chefs, who hadn't completed the order yet.
111111211221222.content:
Naruto and Kiba continued to plow through their respective dishes, loving the amazing flavors that the chefs had been able to produce.

Akamaru, who was laying on the bed next to the gorging Kiba, was watching in awe as Kiba took grotesquely large bites out of the steak, his mouth unable to close all the way because it was so filled with meat. Kiba was able to work his way through, however, and as his second steak became smaller and smaller, his stomach became larger and larger.

He then turned to Naruto, who was shoveling noodles into his mouth, fitting as much as he could in before chewing vigorously, causing his stomach to push out just a little more.

Their stomachs continued to fill out the loose hotel robes, and, by the time Naruto was slurping the pool of broth, the fabric of the robes was beginning to stretch, and the sashes of the young shinobi created a noticable crease in their stomachs.

Now, the two were finished with their seconds, looking for more to eat. They were both focused on finishing their main dishes, so Kiba took another platter of steak while Naruto hefted another enormous bowl of ramen.

They repeated their eating processes, and they were closing in on finishing half of their third dishes. At that point, their stomachs were quite large. In fact, they were so large that they surrounded the sash completely, the top half of their stomachs touching the bottom half in front of the sash, which itself was tearing slightly.

At that point, the feasting was stopped by a knock at the door. "Oh, no. What now?" Akamaru thought as Naruto, who was the closest to the door, slid to the edge of the bed, dropping to his feet, which caused his belly to wobble considerably.

Naruto awkwardly lumbered to the door, his stomach throwing off his balance considerably. Either way, he opened the door, surprised to see who was waiting there.
111111211221222.title: Right before ripping their sashes, they hear a ...

choices: Naruto and Kiba finish their main courses and pass out
While eating, Naruto and Kiba have a strange reaction to the food...
1111112112212221.content:
Naruto's eyes widened. "Shikamaru? What're you doing here?" Kiba, working on the other half of his third steak, looked towards the door, eyes widened in confusion.

The young Nara, standing at the door, stared at Naruto's stomach, facepalmed, and muttered "How troublesome..." under his breath. Shaking his head, Shikamaru looked back up at Naruto and rubbed the back of his head and replied, "The Hokage sent me here to keep an eye on you two while you stay here."

Kiba staggered to his feet, his belly wobbling. "Huh? How come?"

Rolling his eyes, Shikamaru pointed at Naruto and Kiba's stomachs. "Given your troublesome habit of stuffing yourselves, you might not be able to defend yourselves properly if you were ambushed or attacked."

Naruto blinked. "And they sent you?"

Shikamaru shrugged. "Everyone else is on missions: I was the only one available." Kiba snickered at this, while Akamaru wagged his tail. Shikamaru elected to ignore this.

Naruto, on the other hand, grinned. "Well, so long as you're here, you wanna come in? The beds are really comfy, and there's lots of food, too!"

You don't say,, Shikamaru thought, sparing a glance at Naruto's engorged belly. Out loud, he said, "Well, I just ate, so I'll pass on the food. Still," He sighed, rubbing the back of his head, "I guess I could use a rest."

Naruto smiled. "Awesome!" He staggered out of the way of the doorway, allowing Shikamaru to walk in. Avoiding the carts of food, he plopped down on one of the beds, sitting down but slouching lazily.

Seeing that Shikamaru was comfortable for the time being, Naruto licked his lips. "Alright, now that that's outta the way..." He lurched over to where he had left his third ramen bowl and grabbed it and his chopsticks. "Time to pick up where we left off!"

Kiba, taking this cue, picked up what was left of his third steak and started ripping into it. Shikamaru, seeing this, facepalmed again. "Troublesome...do I really have to watch this?" He winced as he heard their already taxed sashes creak.

Akamaru, in spite of knowing Shikamaru couldn't understand him, hopped up onto the bed next to him and looked up at him. Trust me, I know how ya feel.

Where do you want to go from here?
1111112112212221.title: It was someone from Konoha that they knew.

choices: Shikamaru woke up to find the two stuffing themselves again.
Shikamaru woke up first, with everyone else still asleep.
11111121122122211.content:
Soon enough, both Shikamaru and Akamaru watched, astounded, as the two, whose bellies were trying desperately to escape their sashed confines, were snarfing down food like pigs. They couldn't help but be slightly fascinated at the same time.

Kiba was close to finishing his steak now, as he only had a piece slightly larger than his fully extended hand left. He proceeded to stuff the entire piece in his mouth, and though his cheeks were full, there was still a bit sticking out of his mouth.

Without hesitation, he used his Inuzuka canine teeth to tear through the large amount of flesh easily, and soon, he swallowed the entire bite, which was now broken up into much smaller pieces. The bite was large enough to cause a lump to be created in Kiba's throat as it wet down.

Suddenly, as soon as Kiba's stomach allowed the steak inside, more straining was heard in Kiba's sash before it finally gave way in a loud snap. This was because the sashes were elastic, and the elastic sash that originally tried to hold Kiba's belly had hit the opposite wall before falling to the ground.

Kiba's stomach now had the opportunity to surge forward, and it did, amazing Shikamaru and Akamaru as it forced open the robe, causing it to frame Kiba's sides. It also surged forward quite a few inches, and now it was extended out nearly a foot.

If the robe and his belly were not in the way, the others would catch a glimpse of his plain grey briefs, but his belly was obstructing them.

Naruto, who had stopped to watch the show was now even more excited to try that himself. He proceeded to pick up his ramen bowl, which only had a few noodles left in it. He then put it to his mouth, and tipped it forward, sending everything, broth and noodles, into his demanding maw.

In the middle of his broth-guzzling, Naruto felt his sash pop out with a loud snapping, spinning around and hitting the wall in between Kiba and Shikamaru, giving both quite the start.

As his stomach surged forward to where Kiba's was, Naruto continued to consume the broth until he was finally left with an empty bowl, and he rubbed his gigantic belly satisfied, his face melting into a careless grin.

Under his belly, Shikamaru could catch a glimpse of his orange and red striped boxers, but Naruto didn't care if anyone saw, as he was enjoying himself way too much.

Now, the two pre-teens were no longer being held back by the sashes, so they had much more room to fit food. Without words, both of them mercilessly dove into their last dishes of their main courses. Shikamaru just said, "How troublesome" as Kiba picked up his steak, and Naruto picked up his chopsticks.

Shikamaru, bored of watching the two gorge themselves, began reading a book about shogi that he picked up on the way to the hotel. Akamaru, who was laying by Shikamaru to avoid the splash zone, and he continued to watch, mesmerized by the determination of the two.

As they tore through their last respective dishes, their stomachs continued to advance forward, but, because they were so large already, it wasn't by quite as much. They still got ever so slightly larger with every bite, though, and by the time that the two had finished their main dishes, each of their stomachs had protruded out over a foot, and they both rubbed their bellies satisfied.

Soon, they were both laying back in their beds, and, with massive bellies sticking into the air, Naruto and Kiba had both entered a food coma, with Naruto snoring loudly.

Shikamaru noticed this, and he looked at the situation, thinking, "You two are ridiculous" before starting to nod off himself. By this time, Akamaru had already laid down on Kiba's chest, and was sleeping as well.
11111121122122211.title: Naruto and Kiba finish their main courses and p...

choices: Stay at the hotel, as whoever caused this could be waiting for them.
Go back to Konoha as soon as possible to tell the Hokage.
11111121122122212.content:
Shikamaru was laying on the bed, gently petting Akamaru, and both of them were amazed as Naruto and Kiba continued their binge as if nothing had happened. It wasn't long before a loud ripping sound was heard.

Naruto's overly taxed sash had finally given away, and with a slight plopping sound, Naruto's stomach released itself, becoming round again as it pushed outward, forcing the sides of the robe open.

Finally, it reached it's full size, sticking out nearly all the way to Naruto's knees as it did so. At this Naruto laid back, sighing contentedly while rubbing his stomach with a satisfied grin. With the loose robe in his way, he slipped it off, fully revealing his new orange boxers with blue swirls, but he didn't really care.

As he did so, he heard a matching ripping sound on Kiba's bed, and Kiba's sash gave out as well, his stomach advancing out in much the same manner, reaching the same size as Naruto's. He also laid back, slipping off the robe and revealing a pair of red briefs with dog bone patterns that he used to wear.

Akamaru was completely blown away, as Naruto and Kiba weren't bickering or making fun of each other's underwear. They just laid down, rubbing their bellies contently.

"Man that felt good!" Kiba exclaimed. "You said it!" Naruto responded gleefully. "You guys are ridiculous. How troublesome..." Shikamaru said.

"Don't knock it 'till ya try it!" Kiba responded. "It does feel really good!" Naruto egged on.

Shikamaru still refused, and this cycle continued until Kiba and Naruto gave up and Shikamaru turned the tv on.

As they watched their favorite shinobi shows, the three relaxing boys failed to realize what was happening. An hour later, Shikamaru stretched, then glanced over at Kiba, who was laying next to him on the bed.

Shikamaru just stared in shocked silence, causing Kiba to blurt out, "What are you staring at?!" He then looked at his hand, and it was much smaller than he remembered. Kiba then began freaking out, realizing that everything was smaller, and that he was the same size that he was when he was seven.

The worst part was that his belly was still the same size as before, and now it covered his legs entirely, his feet sicking out from the end of the overstuffed orb of flesh.

Kiba's freaking out had woken up a napping Naruto, who soon discovered that he had suffered from the same fate. Naruto, whose belly was also covered his legs completely, freaked out much in the same manner.

As Akamaru went over to Kiba to comfort him, Shikamaru, who remained unchanged, began thinking of a plan. "This looks like sabotage. Why would someone want Naruto and Kiba to be smaller as well."

Upon closer inspection of the two, Kiba noticed that the two had not just grown smaller, but also younger. Shikamaru decided that the best course of action now would be to...
11111121122122212.title: While eating, Naruto and Kiba have a strange re...

choices: They were still napping
They are awake, and hungry
111111211221222121.content:
Shikamaru waited a few minutes until the boys had calmed down a bit, then cleared his throat, getting their attention.
"Alright, I know this is unexpected, but never mind that. For now, it's probably best if we stay here."

"S-stay?!" Kiba blurted, eyes widening. "Look at us, Shikamaru! If the bozo who did this to us is still here, who knows what could happen to us?!" His bottom lip began trembling. Akamaru, noticing this, whimpered and looked up at his partner.

Shikamaru sighed. "Look, I know you're scared, but..."

"Scared?!" Naruto exclaimed, clenching his fists. "I-I'm not scared!" In spite of his words, he was trembling visibly, and his eyes were beginning to get wet.

Shikamaru frowned. Huh, looks like their minds got affected, too. He rubbed the back of his neck. This is gonna be even more troublesome than I thought.

"Tell you what," Shikamaru said out loud, "Why don't you two take a nap, let your meals digest?" He turned towards the door. "I'll run out and buy some new clothes for the both of you."

"You're leaving us alone?!" Kiba practically yelled in disbelief. His own eyes were starting to get a bit wet.

Shikamaru groaned, running his hand down his face. "Actually, I was thinking of having Akamaru watch over you while I'm gone." He turned and looked down at the tiny dog. "You know the Man-Beast Clone Technique, right?" Akamaru barked and nodded his headed, tail wagging. "Alright; transform and keep an eye on them; make sure no one comes in or out of the room. And above all else..." He swept his eyes over the remaining food. "...Don't let them eat anything else."

Giving another bark, Akamaru concentrated and, in a puff of smoke, transformed into an exact copy of a 12-year-old Kiba, minus the belly and wearing the clothes Kiba had been when they'd first checked into the hotel (specifically, a long-sleeved tan shirt with dark patches on the elbows and gray pants). Smirking, the transformed Akamaru strolled over to Kiba and grabbing him, hefted him onto his bed, doing the same with Naruto right afterwards. Then, bending down, he picked up their discarded robes so they could cover themselves while they slept.

Kiba, sniffing, smiled. "Th-thanks, boy." Draping his robe over his smaller (with the exception of his belly) body, he then drew his blankets over himself.

Naruto did the same with his robe and blankets, lying on his side so he could rest comfortably without his belly getting in the way. Sighing, he settled in, closing his eyes.

Seeing this, Akamaru nodded, then turned to Shikamaru and gave him a thumbs-up. The Nara couldn't help giving a tiny smile in return. "Take care of them." Then, turning, he strolled out the door.

When he returned a couple hours later, bags of kid-sized clothes in his hands, he saw that, thankfully, Naruto and Kiba's meals had already digested a good part of the way. Their bellies were still rather prominent, but they no longer covered the legs. In addition...
111111211221222121.title: Stay at the hotel, as whoever caused this could...

choices: "Hey, Shikamaru; what's in the bags?"
"Did you find out what coulda happened?"
1111112112212221211.content:
The two regressed ninja were still lying in bed, sound asleep. Kiba was lying on his back and snoring gently, his still somewhat-protruding belly rising and falling as he breathed. Akamaru, still transformed but curled around him like a dog, smiled fondly at him. Naruto, on the other hand, was lying on his side and facing Shikamaru, his thumb in his mouth and his expression serene. Seeing this, Shikamaru couldn't help but smile.

Well, they seem to be peaceful for now, Shikamaru thought, setting the bags of clothes down by each of their beds. It almost seems a shame to wake them up now.

After a bit of thought, Shikamaru decided he'd let the two continue to sleep as their meals digested further. Besides, he doubted any of the clothes he got would fit on either of them while their bellies were still like this.

Sighing, Shikamaru plopped down gently on Naruto's bed, careful not to wake the boy. "Guess there's not much else to do now but relax," he murmured to himself, reaching for the remote and turning the TV on. Switching to a program about puzzles, he muted the volume so as not to disturb either of the two sleepers. Grunting in satisfaction, Shikamaru settled in to watch.

A few hours later, before Shikamaru began to drift off himself, he noted that Naruto and Kiba's bellies had almost completely gone down, save for a bit of roundness around their stomachs. What was more, they were mumbling and groaning, beginning to stir. Sighing again, he got up, walked over to the bags of clothes, and waited for the boys to fully awaken. Akamaru, seeing that his guard duty was almost up, transformed back into his natural form and remained by Kiba's side, snuggling into the boy's side even as he groaned and sat up, yawning and blinking his eyes open. Naruto wasn't far behind him, rolling onto his back and, with a deep yawn, blinking his own eyes open.

Shikamaru smirked. "You two have a nice sleep?"

Starting at Shikamaru's voice, the still-drowsy boys looked over towards him, and the bags by him. Kiba, yawning, asked...
1111112112212221211.title: They were still napping

choices: A ramen shop
An ice cream shop
11111121122122212111.content:
Shikamaru glanced at the bags. "Oh, these?" He turned back to the boys. "Well, I figured you didn't want to run around naked while you were like this," he grimaced as Naruto giggled, but continued. "so I ran out and got you both some clothes." He picked the bags up and deposited them on each of the boys' beds. "I got you a few different outfits, so take your pick."

Naruto's eyes lit up. "Thanks, Shikamaru!" Grinning, he pulled the bag towards him and started rummaging through its contents. Kiba, also grinning, roooted through his own bag, with Akamaru assisting him in the search.

Rolling his eyes, Shikamaru turned around; not like he needed to see them get dressed...

A few minutes later, Naruto and Kiba had chosen their outfits, and were sitting on their beds, beaming at their clothes with pride. Kiba was wearing a short-sleeved, brown T-shirt with paw prints running across the top, with a pair of tan pants covering his lower body. Naruto, on the other hand, was inspecting his new orange shirt and green cargo pants happily.

"Hey, these are pretty cool!" Kiba exclaimed happily, tugging on the fabric of his shirt. "Thanks, Shikamaru!"

"Yeah, thanks!" Naruto added, looking at his cargo-pants-covered legs and gleefully kicking them in the air.

Shikamaru nodded, but was startled when a loud growling sounded from each of the boys. At this, Naruto and Kiba blushed and held their midsections.

"Oops...guess we're kinda hungry again, huh?" Kiba laughed, scratching his head with a finger.

Naruto, removing his arms from his stomach, looked towards the carts. "Well, there's still a ton of food left..."

"Considering what that food did to you in the first place," Shikamaru cut in, striding towards the boys, "I don't think that's such a good idea."

Kiba and Naruto's faces fell. "Awww..." Naruto whined, pouting and folding his arms. "But we're hungry!"

"Yeah!" Kiba added, rubbing his mostly-flat stomach through his shirt. "C'mon, Shikamaru!"

Shikamaru sighed and pinched the bridge of his nose. "Alright, alright, I'll take you out to get something. But wait for..." He yelped as the boys practically shrieked in joy, leaping off their beds into their sandals and rushing towards the door and past him. Akamaru followed them, barking excitedly.

Watching them run out into the hall, Shikamaru groaned. "Like I said...troublesome," he murmured, following them.

Eventually, he followed the boys away from the hotel and to...
11111121122122212111.title: "Hey, Shikamaru; what's in the bags?"

choices: "You guys can have it as long as you share one."
"What the heck. You guys can have one each."
111111211221222121112.content:
As the group walked through the village, Shikamaru with his arms crossed behind his head, and Kiba and Naruto, who were running around him with Akamaru.

They continued through the village, which had a massive variety of places to eat from, and Naruto, who had tripped attempting to catch Kiba, had caught his eye on an ice cream shop.

"Ice cream sounds so good right now!" He blurted out childishly, with Kiba adding a "Yeah! Now I want ice cream too!" Soon they were staring at Shikamaru with their best puppy eyes. At least there were some advantages to being younger.

"Those two are hyperactive enough, and ice cream will probably only make it worse." Shikamaru thought as he looked at the two youngsters. "But man, they're adorable, and they were on vacation anyway. How troublesome."

He couldn't help but smile, and submitted, merely saying, "Sure. I could go for ice cream." As the two raced each other to the shop, Shikamaru looked at Akamaru, who looked back as if to say, "I know how you feel."

Soon enough, an item on the menu caught the attention of the two now younger shinobi. It was the Supreme Ice Cream Platter, which included four flavors of ice cream of the customers choice, with ten scoops each, and every single topping and syrup that the shop offered.

Not surprisingly, the two were begging Shikamaru for each of them to have one. "Here we go again" Akamaru thought, as Shikamaru decided that maybe if the two ate too much, they would stop bothering him so much about food. Little did he know that he wouldn't be able to break Kiba and Naruto.

Either way, he decided to allow them to try it, saying...
111111211221222121112.title: An ice cream shop

choices: Follow them until one of them gets a stomachache
Follow them until one of them gets brain freeze
1111112112212221211122.content:
As soon as the words left his mouth, Shikamaru grimaced; what had he just done?

Naruto and Kiba, on the other hand, were ecstatic. "Thanks, Shikamaru!" Naruto exclaimed, reaching out from his seaet and hugging Shikamaru, much to the latter's surprise. "You're the best!" Giggling, he turned back around in his chair and raised his arm, catching the attendant's attention. "Hey! Can I get a Supreme Ice Cream Platter with chocolate, strawberry, vanilla, and mint?" The man gaped at him, but nonetheless nodded and went about preparing the order.

Not to be outdone, Kiba raised his arm as well. "Ooh! Can I get one too, 'cept with chocolate chip, peanut butter, caramel, and cherry?" The man turned around, eyes widened.

Shikamaru shook his head. "Don't bother; once they've got their minds set on something, it's impossible to dissuade them." The man stared at him in disbelief, but nonetheless nodded and continued preparing the boys' dishes. All the while, Naruto and Kiba watched and giggled, rubbing their hands together excitedly.

Finally, the man set their dishes before them, and their eyes lit up with glee. In front of them were two massive dishes of ice cream, ten massive scoops of their chosen flavors piled on top of one another, with hot fudge, chocolate syrup, strawberry topping, and every other conceivable ice cream sauce known to ninja-kind.
