On top of this, a variety of sprinkles, chocolate chips, and nuts were sprinkled, all topped off with a cherry each. Shikamaru, looking a bit queasy, ordered a simple vanilla cone for himself, and a small dish of vanilla for Akamaru.

As soon as they were done gaping, Naruto and Kiba grinned, clasped their hands together and yelled "Itadakimasu!", grabbed their spoons, and began digging in.

Gaping, Akamaru and Shikamaru threw each other a glance.

"You have to put up with this often?" Shikamaru asked the dog. Akamaru, knowing Shikamaru wouldn't be able to understand him, simply nodded.

Where do you want to go from here?
1111112112212221211122.title: "What the heck. You guys can have one each....

choices: The two continue to fight through the brain freeze.
The two stop, asking Shikamaru for a way to stop the brain freeze.
11111121122122212111222.content:
Naruto and Kiba, to the surprise of the shop owner, dug into the ice cream mercilessly, shoveling the frozen treat into their faces as if they had never eaten before. In the process, they had managed to plaster their own faces with ice cream.

Shikamaru just watched as the two were digging in, and soon, their bellies were no longer flat, and they began to touch their shirts. At that point, Naruto recoiled in pain, clutching his head. "How troublesome" Shikamaru said, as Naruto began complaining, causing Kiba to laugh, but soon he was feeling the same sensation.

"See what happens?" Shikamaru asked, making a point, only causing Naruto and Kiba to respond with, "This is nothing! We were just taking a quick break."

They then began to stuff themselves again, however, they encountered the same issue moments later, much to Shikamaru's annoyance. At this point, their stomachs were now pressing against their shirts, beginning to stretch them.

Akamaru had finished his ice cream now, and he began to watch the two as well, watching in awe as the pile of frozen dairy slowly began to shrink, with the toppings already gone.
11111121122122212111222.title: Follow them until one of them gets brain freeze

choices: Shikamaru gets back, only to see both boys stuffed and finished their dishes
Shikamaru returns, and the boys are still powering through brain freeze
111111211221222121112222.content:
As the ice cream continued to shrink and their stomachs pushed their shirts out further, Naruto and Kiba continually clutched their heads, wincing and complaining about brain freeze. Invariably, though, they would always collect themselves, take a deep breath, and continue digging into the ice cream. Eventually, their shirts started rising up, exposing a little bit of flesh.

Shikamaru watched this, groaning and facepalming. "Oh great...they're really getting into it..." Almost as soon as he thought this, both boys yelped and gripped their heads again as the brain freeze hit. They picked themselves up again soon enough, but Shikamaru noticed it took them a little longer to recover.

Shaking their heads, both boys dove right back into their frozen treats. As before, their stomachs slowly grew as the sundaes shrank, even though there was still a decent amount left. Higher and higher their shirts rose, and more and more their stomachs started poking out from under their shirts. Eventually, a decent amount was exposed; any higher for either of them, and their navels would be seeing the light of day. It was funny, though, Shikamaru thought to himself; they were going this long without a brain freeze...

Almost on cue, both boys dropped their spoons and clutched their heads with both hands.

"Ah!" Kiba winced, squeezing his eyes shut. "It hurts! It hurts!" Akamaru, in spite of knowing this would happen, felt a pang of sympathy for his friend and trotted up to his seat, whimpering.

Naruto whimpered, and turned around in his seat to face Shikamaru. Opening an eye, he regarded the Nara. "Shikamaru, our heads really hurt! Can't you do something?"

Shikamaru groaned. "Maybe if you didn't eat your ice cream so fast, you wouldn't be having this problem..."

"But it's so yummy!" Naruto protested, wincing as another spike of pain shot through his head.

Kiba yelped as his brain freeze hit him again. "C'mon, Shikamaru, help us out! It really really hurts!"

Shikamaru stared at the two, sweating a bit as they both fixed him with their most watery, imploring eyes. Finally, he sighed. "Fine. Wait right here; I'll pick up some pain medication for you." With that, he walked off, grumbling to himself.

Watching him go, Kiba and Naruto sighed in relief and turned back to their dishes.

That turned out to be a mistake, as the sight of the remaining ice cream made them both lick their lips and look uncertainly at each other.

"Shikamaru said he'd be right back..." Kiba started, looking longingly at what was left of his dish.

Naruto nodded, his eyes never leaving his own dish. "B-but it looks so yummy..."

After a few seconds of staring at their dishes in this manner, they looked at each other, gulped, and dove right back in.
111111211221222121112222.title: The two stop, asking Shikamaru for a way to sto...

choices: "Can we have another one?"
"Can we go back to the hotel? We're tired."
1111112112212221211122221.content:
Shikamaru couldn't believe that he had gone out of his way to pick up medication for the two young'uns. He had fully realized the power in a sad child's eyes. Kiba and Naruto could essentially get him to do anything that they wanted. "How troublesome" he mumbled out loud at the mere though.

Either way, when he arrived back at the ice cream store, Akamaru vigilantly watching over the two, he had discovered that their ice cream dishes were empty. In addition, the two younger shinobi were sitting back, rubbing their even larger stomachs, which had caused their shirts to rise to the point where they merely rested on top of their stomachs.

Shikamaru was shocked to see the two talking to each other like great friends. He was extremely surprised that they were not bickering with each other. In fact, they began to compare their bellies, pressing them up against each other to see whose was the biggest.

Shikamaru face-palmed, both at the sudden lack of need for the medicine and the antics of the two knuckleheads. Either way he asked "Do you even need the medicine?" Both replied, "Nope!" then proceeded to laugh. Shikamaru was very peeved, but he brushed it off.

Soon enough, Naruto had rested his head on the next stool over, laying down on his back on both stools as he rubbed his belly, grinning. Kiba surprisingly didn't do the same. Instead, he was tugging on Shikamaru's sleeve asking...
1111112112212221211122221.title: Shikamaru gets back, only to see both boys stuf...

choices: They reach the hotel without incident
Halfway there, the boys want to stop to rest
11111121122122212111222212.content:
As Kiba asked this, he yawned widely, his eyes squeezing shut. Naruto, lying on the seats, also yawned, covering his mouth with one hand while rubbing his belly with the other one.

Seeing this, Shikamaru couldn't help but smile, but he quickly wiped it off his face; he didn't want to give those two any more hold over him than they already had. "Alright; I'm a little tired, anyway."

Smiling, Kiba leapt down from his seat, but his stuffed belly caused him to stumble and nearly fall over. Propelling his arms about, he managed to lean back against his seat, letting out a sigh and patting his stomach. "Phew...guess we ate a little more than we thought, huh?" He patted it a few more times, giggling slightly.

With a grunt, Naruto sat back upright, stretched, and hopped down as well. Like Kiba, he stumbled, but seemed to have built up too much forward momentum. Yelping, he started falling forward, but Akamaru, thinking fast, hopped onto Naruto's recently vacated seat, leaned forward, and grabbed the back of Naruto's shirt in his mouth, keeping the boy from falling any further. Breathing a sigh of relief, Naruto turned his ice-cream stained face towards the dog and grinned widely. "Thanks, Akamaru!" Akamaru wagged his tail, acknowledging Naruto's gratitude.

Sighing, Shikamaru turned around. "Well, if you've got yourselves all situated, we should probably head back."

Hearing this, Kiba gently pushed himself up off his chair, stumbling again, but managing to use his arms to maintain some semblance of balance to waddle after the older ninja. His belly shook and wobbled a bit as he walked, and to his embarrassment, he couldn't help but giggle.

Naruto took a little longer to regain his balance, but soon enough, he was waddling right after Kiba,giggling even harder than he was at the movement of his belly. Akamaru, meanwhile, followed behind, staying close in case either of them stumbled and fell.

The little dog sighed to himself at the sight of their swollen bellies. Well, the ninken thought to himself, at least they bothered to unbutton their pants this time...
11111121122122212111222212.title: "Can we go back to the hotel? We're tir...

choices: Naruto and Kiba wake up first, waking up Shikamaru because they're hungry.
Shikamaru wakes up first, and is hoping to get back to the village.
111111211221222121112222121.content:
The two continued to stumble around next to Shikamaru as they struggled to maintain their balance. Luckily, Akamaru was able to help them whenever they did have particular trouble. Shikamaru looked at the clouds, trying to ignore them, but their antics were adorable, and quite humorous as well, so Shikamaru had trouble maintaining his cool.

They finally got to the hotel, all four of them ignoring the strange look from the hotel attendant. Either way, they got to their room, and the sun began to set. Soon enough, the two younger shinobi found two sets of pajamas in a bag that Shikamaru had bought them earlier.

Soon enough, the two felt the urge to wear the pajamas, and after about ten minutes, Kiba was in a set of blue pajamas with dog bones on them, his bloated belly sticking out of them comically. Luckily, the waistband was elastic so it was able to stretch more to accommodate for the bottom of Kiba's belly.

Naruto was clad in a pair of similar pajamas, his being orange with shuriken patterns instead. His belly also stuck out considerably, and he was still rubbing it contentedly, as he had been doing since he finished his meal.

Shikamaru was surprised, shocked, in fact, to see the two act like best friends on this vacation, despite this rivalry that they had when they were older. Naruto had always wanted a friend the first time he was that age, and luckily, this time he had one.

Shikamaru was even more surprised by the fact that the two were willing to share the first bed so that Shikamaru could have the other. Soon enough, they were on either side of the bed, with Akamaru in between them. Naruto even began to suck his thumb as he fell asleep.

Shikamaru smiled warmly, almost as a parent would. Seeing these two at a young age and having to care for them was really softening Shikamaru up. He was still Shikamaru, though, and soon enough, he was reading a book about shogi strategies.

He didn't really have any separate clothes for the night. Instead, he merely took off his flak jacket and his shirt, leaving himself in his fishnet underneath. Soon enough, though, he also dozed off for the night.
111111211221222121112222121.title: They reach the hotel without incident

choices: "No way! We're having too much fun!"
"OK, fine, but I wanna get something to eat first!"
1111112112212221211122221212.content:
The sun's ray's filtered in through the room's windows, hitting Shikamaru full in the face. Wincing and grumbling, Shikamaru sat up. Scratching the back of his head and yawning, he blinked open his eyes and looked about the room, taking in his surroundings. It was early morning, if the intensity of the sun's rays were any indication.

"Great," Shikamaru sighed, reluctantly swinging his legs over the side of the bed and standing up, pressing his hands on his back and pushing it forward to pop it back into place, "I was hoping to sleep for a little bit longer..." Sighing, he turned his head, focusing on the room's other bed-or more specifically, it's current occupants. Upon catching sight of them, the corners of his mouth quirked upwards the slightest bit, and he couldn't help but feel his mood being lifted, if only a little bit.

Naruto and Kiba, still stuck as young children, were currently sprawled out hapzardly on the bed, snoring gently. Their massive meals from yesterday had, thankfully, digested completely, leaving them once again flat-bellied. Naruto was sprawled out completely on his back, arms and legs stretched out to their maximum length. A tiny bit of drool had traced a line down the corner of his mouth, which he was, apparently, oblivious to.

Kiba, situated on the opposite side of the bed but a little lower down, looked equally peaceful. His right hand was situated near his mouth, his thumb inserted neatly into it. His left hand, meanwhile, was extended far above his head, stretching his pajama shirt in such a way that it rode up, exposing his stomach. Akamaru, apparently not wanting Kiba to get cold, had curled up on the bare flesh, and was also snoozing peacefully.

Shikamaru couldn't help but smile a little wider at this; as annoying as they may have been, they really were really cute like this. This thought, however, was accompanied with a new concern.

Both younger shinobi were obviously far more vulnerable like this; not only were they more subject to the physical needs of any kid, including sleep, but their minds could be a problem as well; though both would object, they would be more likely to lose their cool in a dangerous situation, one that an enemy would be all too happy to take advantage of. Given the situation, it would be best to return to Konoha now, both to better protect them and to see if Tsunade could work out a cure for them.

Shikamaru groaned, facepalming. "They're not gonna be happy about this..." he muttered. Making his way over to the two, he gently shook them awake.

Naruto snorted. "Huh-wha?!" Bolting upright, his panic subsided when he saw Shikamaru standing over them. "Shikamaru? What's goin' on?"

Kiba soon followed suit; opening his eyes, he gently pushed himself up on his hands to look at Shikamaru. "Huh? What is it?" Akamaru, disturbed by the shift in position, yawned and blinked his own eyes open, looking blearily at Kiba.

Shikamaru sighed. Here comes the troublesome part... "Look...I know you two just started your vacation, but we need to get back to the village; you're too vulnerable like this, and we need to get the Hokage to take a look at you to try to find a cure."

Naruto and Kiba looked at each other, processing this information. Then, finally, Naruto took a breath, looked at Shikamaru, and said...
1111112112212221211122221212.title: Shikamaru wakes up first, and is hoping to get ...

choices: Shikamaru spots a buffet, and they eat there.
Shikamaru finds a street fair full of cheap food for breakfast.
11111121122122212111222212122.content:
Naruto wanted to stay at the hotel and enjoy his vacation, however Shikamaru was a chunin, and he was one of the smartest people in the village. He out of all people probably knows what's best. Kiba began to object, loudly yelling, "Hey! We were supposed to have a vacation!", but he was in the minority in this case.

Soon enough, he gave up, and all three began to pack. Soon enough, they were dressed and ready to go. Shikamaru wore his normal attire, while Naruto wore a pair of orange shorts with a blue t-shirt. Kiba wore cargo shorts with a red t-shirt with various dog bone and paw print patterns on it.

They set off, walking through a village to look for a place to eat. Kiba and Naruto, being kids, soon began to circle Shikamaru, playing tag while Shikamaru found a place to eat. Akamaru even joined in on the fun.

Shikamaru sighed, mumbling "How troublesome" as he continued to look for a place to eat. Searching though the villages many restaurants.
11111121122122212111222212122.title: "OK, fine, but I wanna get something to eat...

choices: They finish their plates and go back for more
Partway through, they both get stomachaches
111111211221222121112222121221.content:
Finally, Shikamaru spotted what appeared to be a buffet, if the bright, colorful sign and the various delectable smells wafting out of it were any indication. He sighed. Oh great... he thought to himself, looking at the two children happily chasing one another around him. If those two get into it, who knows if there's going to be any stopping them... Abruptly, his own stomach growled, and he groaned. On the other hand, this place is right near by, and I wanna get out of here as soon as possible. Steeling himself, he turned to the children, getting their attention with a raised arm and quick "Oi!" Startled by the sudden noise, Kiba crashed into Naruto, sending the two tumbling the ground in a tangling of limbs and laughter.

Shikamaru rolled his eyes, but nonetheless indicated the restaurant behind him. "How does a buffet sound to the two of you?" Too late, he realized it was a stupid question, as Naruto and Kiba's eyes gleamed and they eagerly nodded their heads. Akamaru, in the meantime, simply whined and sank to his hindquarters.

Shaking his head, Shikamaru turned and indicated for the two children to follow him, which they did all too eagerly. Soon enough, they were inside, with Shikamaru ordering a table for three.

A few minutes later, Shikamaru was sitting at the table, picking at his own plate of food and groaning as he watched the two boys, plus Akamaru, pile food item after food item on their plates, not stopping even when the stacks of food started wobbling unsteadily. He groaned, facepalming. This, he thought to himself, is going to be troublesome.

Eventually, the two returned to the table, staggering under the sheer weight of their plates. Shikamaru gaped at the sheer quantity of food heaped upon each: donuts, egg, bacon, sausages (especially in Kiba's case), fruit, a bit of ice cream...

Nonetheless, the two boys were grinning as they plopped their massive dishes onto the table, causing it to creak and groan under the weight; luckily, it held.

Licking their lips, both children clasped their hands together, chirped "Itadakimasu!" as one, then began digging in. Both Akamaru and Shikamaru watched in horror: there was no way this would end well...
111111211221222121112222121221.title: Shikamaru spots a buffet, and they eat there.

choices: The buffet owner walks by, impressed by the abilities of the two.
They figure out a way to get back to Konoha despite their stuffed bellies.
1111112112212221211122221212211.content:
Shikamaru enjoyed his food. He had to admit that it was a stroke of luck picking a buffet with such delicious food. He wasn't really concentrating on his own eating, however, as he was far two worried about Naruto and Kiba, who were currently stuffing their faces gleefully in yet another display of careless gluttony.

He was particularly surprised that the two weren't more worried about their sudden lack of age. In fact, they seemed to be happier, and they got along a little better.

Akamaru merely laid down under the table, resigned, as he could do nothing to stop the two young boys. In fact, he had a front row seat to the stuffing, and he was curious to see how far they would go this time.

Either way, as Naruto dug into his scrambled eggs, he talked to Kiba about nearly everything; memories about past missions, gossip about their classmates, and even little things and accompanying giggles were exchanged between the two as they stuffed their maws unconsciously.

Kiba also started with his eggs, which were sunny side up, as he enjoyed the runny yolks. Soon, Naruto was chewing through pieces of pineapple and Kiba was stuffing sugary doughnuts in his face.

Akamaru watched as Naruto finished all of his fruit and Kiba finished all of his doughnuts, and the stomachs of the two became distended, creating a barely-noticeable imprint on both of their shirts.

Kiba moved on to the massive amount of sausages that he picked, tearing into each juicy breakfast sausage gleefully while Naruto began to chew on slice after slice of crispy bacon, a childish, yet warming smile on his whiskered face.

As they tore through their various foods, their stomachs began to strain their shirts again, and soon their shirts were lifting up again and their pants began to strain.

As he finished his bacon, Naruto felt the strain, and soon he was struggling with the button on his shorts. Kiba had noticed this, and through bites of sausage, he asked "What are you doin'", only receiving a few grunts in reply.

As Kiba watched on, head cocked to the side in curiosity, Naruto finished, sighing in relief, sitting back to rub his belly a little, saying "Man, that feels better. You should try unbottoning your shorts, Kiba!" before digging into his doughnuts without a care in the world.

Taking the cue, Kiba managed to unbutton his shorts, struggling to work around his stuffed belly.

Soon enough, more food and conversation were had, and as the two ate, their shirts rose higher, and their flies were forced farther and farther downward. When Kiba finally finished his sausages and moved on to his bacon, Naruto went to eat his own sausages.

At this point, their flies were forced all the way downwards, and their navels were beginning to see the light of day due to the rising of their shirts.

Soon, all that was left was the ice cream, and both boys, proudly displaying their distended stomachs, dug into their ice cream mercilessly. Shikamaru and Akamaru were just glad that the buffet was nearly empty, so they didn't attract much attention from anyone other than the employees, who stared at the two confusedly before shrugging it off and getting back to work.

Now, Shikamaru let out a sigh of relief as the two finally finished their gargantuan plates, each of them leaning back and rubbing their bellies. Akamaru had since fallen asleep waiting for the two to finish.

"Man, that was sooo good!" Naruto exclaimed cheerfully. "Yeah, those sausages were magical!" Kiba replied. "I'm glad this is all-you-can-eat!" Naruto added, "Cuz I'm gonna get more!". "You don't need to tell me twice!" was Kiba's response.

To Shikamau's dismay, the two eagerly waddled to back to the buffet lines, their bellies wobbling all the way.

Soon enough, the two had finally finished. In their wake, the employees needed to refill the sausage tray twice for Kiba, and they also needed to replace the doughnut tray and refill the ice cream dispenser.

The two de-aged shinobi laid back, literally stuffed silly as they each rubbed their comically overstuffed bellies. Their navels had since inverted, as their bellies each stuck more than a foot outwards, a ridiculous amount for someone their size.

They were oblivious, as they were finally sated and ready to go, idly talking to each other. "At least the food costs the same." Shikamaru thought as he stared at the two in awe. He couldn't help but smile at the sight of their faces, though. "Man, I've gotten soft. How troublesome." He thought as he did so.

Then another thought came to his mind, and he asked, "How are you guys going to walk home?" causing the two to fall silent as they thought of a plan to get home in their current stuffed states.
1111112112212221211122221212211.title: They finish their plates and go back for more

choices: The contest arrives; the boys are still stuck as young children
The contest arrives; the boys have been restored to their proper ages
11111121122122212111222212122111.content:
Unfortunately for Shikamaru, it was at that moment that the buffet's owner-an aging, grey-haired man- happened to pass by their table, stopping short when he saw the two utterly stuffed children lounging back in their chairs. He chuckled at the sight. "My, my; it looks like you boys certainly enjoyed our food."

Looking up at the man, Naruto grinned. "Yep, sure did!" He licked his lips, but failed to get at the smudges and crumbs still dotting his face. "Everything was really really good!"

A small smile crossed the man's face. "Would you come back here again?"

Burping, Kiba giggled, blushing a bit. "Oh yeah, definitely! The sausages were especially amazing!" To emphasize, he wiped a bit of sausage grease off his cheek and licked it. Shikamaru couldn't help but smile at the sight. Even Akamaru looked up and wagged his tail.

The owner laughed. "Is that so?" He knelt down to the level of the two boys and mock-whispered, "Well, then, I have a proposition for the two of you."

Both boys tilted their heads curiously at this, but Shikamaru's eyes widened. "A...proposition?"

The man nodded. "Yes; you see, there's an eating competition coming up in a few weeks, and we've been looking for someone to sponsor us." He laughed at the suddenly excited expression on the children's faces. "Yes, you heard me right. I think you two have what it takes to win."

De-aged or no, Kiba was still Kiba. "What's in it for us?" he blurted, a bit rudely.

The owner, unfazed, indicated the buffet around him. "Why, a month of all of our food you can eat, of course!" His eyes flitted down to the dog by Kiba's side. "Oh, and if he competes, he gets the prize too." Kiba grinned, while Akamaru's eyes simply widened.

Naruto's face shone. "Ooh! Sign us up! Sign us up!"

"Wait a minute." Shikamaru stood up, fixing the two with a stern look. "We can't waste our time here; we need to get back to the village and..."

The man, noticing Shikamaru's forehead protector (currently tied around his arm), blinked. "Wait...you're from Konoha?"

Unsure of where the man was going with this, Shikamaru nodded. "What of it?"

The man laughed heartily. "Dear boy, the contest is being held right in that very village!"

Shikamaru's jaw dropped open in a rather uncharacteristic display of shock. Kiba and Naruto, on the other hand, cheered, raising their arms in the air and further exposing their bloated bellies.

Akamaru, unable to help himself, wagged his tail. Well, this is gonna be interesting....
11111121122122212111222212122111.title: The buffet owner walks by, impressed by the abi...

choices: Naruto takes the first round, as it is a food that he likes more than Kiba.
Kiba or Akamaru takes the first round, which is a food that they enjoy.
111111211221222121112222121221112.content:
With this news in mind, Kiba and Naruto hurriedly stumbled home, a difficult task with such full bellies. In fact, despite Akamaru's efforts, the two tripped every five minutes. Seeing this, Shikamaru complained, saying "How troublesome" before creating a clone of himself.

One clone picked up Naruto and the other Picked up Kiba. Soon, both younger shinobi were sitting on Shikamaru's shoulders, with their bellies resting on top of his head.

Both Shikamaru and his clone then jumped into the trees, hopping across quickly to get to the leaf as soon as possible.

"This is awesome!" Naruto hollered, giggling with delight and excitement. Kiba merely yelled, "Yeah!" at the top of his lungs in response.

***An hour later***

Shikamaru was standing before Tsunade in the Hokage's office, summarizing what just happened with a bored expression on his face. Tsunade was surprised to see two seven-year-old versions of Naruto and Kiba sporting stuffed bellies when they got back.

She was even more surprised to see them talking to each other and giggling. They even ran up and hugged Tsunade when they saw her despite their bellies, with Naruto yelling "Tsunade Baa-chan!"

Either way, Tsunade said that she needed to take Naruto and Kiba's physicals too see what has happened. Soon, she was done, and she got her results surprisingly quickly. Soon, the four of them sat in front of Tsunade's desk, waiting for an explanation.

"It turns out that you two ingested a special tree bark extract. This tree bark is known for it's anti-aging properties, and it can even be used in food as a tenderizer. It is highly expensive, so it is rarely used in anywhere but the most expensive restaurants. On normal humans, there are virtually no effects in ingesting this extract, however in shinobi, the extract's effects are enhanced by chakra flow, and the aging process was reversed and sped up until the extract was used up. That left you two around seven. Typically restaurants are supposed to have warnings on their menus to prevent this from happening. You two were unlucky enough to run into a restaurant that lacks that warning."

"So what's the cure, baa-chan!" Naruto loudly blurted, interrupting her. Soon enough, he was sent flying back to the wall with a flick of Tsunade's fingers.

"I was saying," she asserted, "that there is a cure, but it will take a while. We have to attach you to a special machine that delivers all of the nourishment that you will need to get back to your normal ages. You will then be placed in a medically-induced-coma"

"Coma?!" Kiba interrupted this time, receiving a similar flick from Tsunade, sending him to the wall right next to Naruto.

"Don't worry!" She assured. "It will probably take less than 24 hours. The coma is necessary so that your metabolic processes are slowed down and your bodies don't go into shock. Then, I will send a signal through your chakra to age much faster. As long as the procedure goes smoothly, you two will wake up being twelve again."

Soon enough, the two were ready and in the hospital, and, as commanded by Tsunade, they removed all of their clothing and got into hospital gowns that would fit them when they become twelve again. They laid down in two neighboring hospital beds, and were taken into a special room where they could become older again without interruption.

Akamaru opted to be with Kiba, and Tsunade allowed it, as long as he didn't mess with the equipment. Either way, once the process begun, Akamaru watched as the past five years with Kiba went by in a matter of hours. Soon, the two were twelve again, and they were back to their old selves.

***Four weeks later***

Over the past four weeks, Naruto and Kiba trained together for the upcoming eating contest. When they were strapped for time, they would merely use water, guzzling as much as possible to stretch their stomachs out.

When they could, they would have eating competitions as various restaurants around Konoha, stuffing themselves as much as possible one hoping to eat more than the other.

They would even opt to go on missions together, and they worked very well together now. "I never thought that they would even be this close." Tsunade thought as Naruto insisted on joining Kiba and Akamaru on a mission to take out an elusive criminal.

Today was the day of the contest, though, and the two were together on a tag team, with Akamaru getting a front row seat, ready to compete if he chose to do so. Both of them wore their normal pants and their shinobi sandals, and with that, they wore white t-shirts with the buffet's logo. They also proudly wore their leaf headbands.

It was actually a holiday in Konoha, so everyone had a day off, and many chose to watch the competition. All of the rookies and their senseis, the members from team Guy, and even Sasuke were all there to support Kiba and Naruto.

Soon they were read the rules by one of the judges. Basically there were tag teams of two, and there was an optional third member, but animals weren't allowed, so if Akamaru were to compete, he would need to transform into a Kiba clone.

Either way, there were multiple rounds, with teams choosing one member for each round, in which they would eat a certain amount of a certain food in a certain amount of time. One free team member was then allowed to do anything in their power to aid the competing member. It could be anything from a simple pep talk to something as drastic as feeding the competing member to maintain speed, or rubbing their belly to ease pain.

After the round is finished, the contestants who couldn't make it in time were disqualified, and with the next round, the team could choose to leave in their current contestant or switch out to a new one.

Armed with this knowledge and the potential additional help of Akamaru, the two were ready for anything.
111111211221222121112222121221112.title: The contest arrives; the boys have been restore...

choices: "Ramen!"
"Bacon and Eggs!"
1111112112212221211122221212211122.content:
When the first dish was brought out, Kiba's eyes lit up. It was, specifically, a massive mound of the sausages he had so enjoyed when they had first gone to the buffet. Even Akamaru's eyes bugged out at the sheer size of the plate.

Naruto, seeing Kiba's eager expression, blinked. "You, uh, wanna take this one, Kiba?"

Smirking, Kiba playfully punched Naruto in the shoulder. "What do you think, dummy?"

Wincing, Naruto rubbed the point of impact. "Alright, alright, I got it." He smiled. "Go ahead."

Kiba grinned. "Thanks, Naruto; you're a pal." Hearing a whimper, he looked down at Akamaru, who was staring at the sausages longingly. "Don't worry, boy; you can take the next round." He smirked. "Plus, when we win, you can have as many of the sausages as you want." The dog seemed to perk up considerably at this, wagging his tail happily. Smiling at his dog, Kiba turned back to the plate, rubbing his hands together eagerly.

The announcer raised his hand. "Ready...Set...GO!"

The contestants fell to it with a will. Kiba, not wasting any time, grabbed as many sausages as he could in both hands and shoving them in his mouth. Grunting, he chewed the mass, working it down to a reasonable size before gulping the whole thing, heedless of the smears of grease that got around his mouth and on his shirt; there would be time for that later. Licking his lips and grinning, he nonetheless dove right back in, getting an even bigger handful and cramming them in his mouth. It took a little longer to chew, but he managed it, finally swallowing it...

Only for his eyes to bug out and him to start pounding his chest.

Naruto sweatdropped. "Uh, take a little too much of a big mouthful there, Kiba?"

Still coughing and pounding his chest, Kiba shot a glare at Naruto that clearly said "quit standing around and help me, you idiot!".

Rubbing the back of his head, Naruto laughed nervously. "Alright, alright." Walking over to Kiba, he thumped the other boy on the chest. Almost immediately afterwards, Kiba gasped, clutching his chest and panting. Worried, Akamaru, looked up at his friend, tilting his head and whining.

Kiba managed to smirk. "Don't worry about it, boy; I'm fine." He only continued panting for a few more seconds before continuing to attack the plate. This time, he took a different approach, grabbing two big handfuls in each hand; he would shove one in, chew and swallow, grab another handful with his unoccupied hand while shoving the second handful in...rinse and repeat. Slowly, the stack of sausages began shrinking; within a matter of minutes, it was almost gone.

"Five seconds left!" The announcer's voice called.

Undeterred, Kiba grabbed the still-considerable mound of remaining sausages and lifted them to his mouth.

"Five.."

Kiba crammed the entire thing in his mouth.

"Four..."

Kiba began chewing like a madman.

"Three..."

Kiba slowly got it down to a more manageable size, at least to the point he could chew quicker.

"Two..."

Naruto and Akamaru leaned forward as Kiba continued chewing, finally gulping the entire thing down with a pained look on his face.

"One..."

Reaching out, Kiba grabbed the plate and licked whatever grease was left.

"Zero!"

Slamming the plate down, Kiba burped and patted his stomach, a satisfied look on his face.

"Damn, Kiba," Naruto said, fixing the dog-nin with an approving look, "that was really close!"

Kiba nodded, smirking cockily. "Yep, but I pulled through." He continued rubbing his stomach, which, owing to the sheer size of the plate, had already started to make a noticeable impression on his shirt.

"Next round!"

Startled, Kiba looked up. "Next round already?" He grinned. "Eh, whatever; we can take it on."

Not hearing Kiba, the announcer continued. "The next round will be..."
1111112112212221211122221212211122.title: Kiba or Akamaru takes the first round, which is...

choices: "Barbecue!"
"Dango!"
11111121122122212111222212122111221.content:
"I don't even have to think about this one!" Kiba exclaimed as he heard the announcement of the next round. "Go right ahead, Naruto!" He told an excited Naruto, who eagerly took Kiba's place, waiting for the next round to come his way.

"I thought you were going to let me have the next round!" Akamaru complained, a bit disappointed. "Ramen is kinda Naruto's thing." Kiba explained. At that Akamaru dropped his head, worried that he wouln't be able to compete as well. "Don't be sad" Kiba assured. "There's bound to be a round that's perfect for you!"

Soon enough, Kiba was sitting next to Naruto, who was waiting for the ramen to arrive. They were both surprised to see a large stock pot filled to the brim with ramen, topped with all of the extras.

There was a serving bowl next to it, and a ladle for serving. This was done so that the competition didn't have to use so many bowl.

Naruto, being Naruto, decided to ignore the serving bowl, instead diving right into the pot with his chopsticks. As soon as he took a bite, he practically screamed, "Yes! This is Ichiraku's!" and he dove in insanely fast, shoveling a constant stream of noodles from the pot to his mouth.

Seeing Naruto get ahead of the others so quickly, Kiba leaned back, confident that Naruto wouldn't even need him there. "I'm glad I let Naruto do this!" Kiba thought as he saw the awestruck faces of nearly everyone in the audiences.

Soon enough, his stomach, despite being somewhat stuffed, growled. "Don't worry, you'll get back in the spotlight soon" Kiba said to the complaining appendage, receiving a few strange looks.

Either way, by the time he looked back over at Naruto, he saw that Naruto had finished all of the noodles already, leaving his stomach at around the same size as Kiba's. He was currently struggling to lift the stockpot up so that he could drink the gallon or so of broth.

Seeing this, before Naruto could even ask, he helped Naruto lift up the stock pot, and he tipped it into Naruto's mouth, holding it steady for him, receiving a thumbs up and a series of garbled grunts from Naruto.

"What an astounding display of teamwork!" the announcer cried, gesturing to the two, amazed at the sight before him. Soon enough, most of the audience was cheering wildly at the spectacle before them.

For about five minutes, Kiba continued to hold the stock pot up for Naruto, who was greedily taking the entirety of the liquid in, rubbing his quickly expanding belly.

Soon enough, Naruto's rapidly swelling belly started lifting up his t-shirt until it was about halfway to his navel. "It looks like the rounds get bigger and bigger!" Kiba thought as he took the stock pot away, as Naruto had finally finished.

As soon as he was finished, Naruto stood up, lifting both of his fists into the air, displaying his belly proudly.

After a while, Naruto and Kiba were high-fiving and talking about what just happened.

Before they knew it, the next round was being announced.

The announcer yelled, "The next round is....."
11111121122122212111222212122111221.title: "Ramen!"

choices: "Donuts!"
"Cola!"
111111211221222121112222121221112212.content:
Akamaru's ears perked up at this. Dango? Come to think of it, he was sort of in the mood for something sweet. Kiba, seeing his tail wag, laughed. Bending down and ruffling his buddy's fur, Kiba grinned. "Alright, boy; you can take this round." Akamaru nodding, concentrated, and, in a puff of smoke, transformed into an exact copy of Kiba. The crowd, noticing this, raised their eyebrows; even though many of them already knew about Kiba's jutsu, seeing the dog transform was a bit... odd, to say the very least.

Unperturbed, Kiba clapped a hand on Akamaru's shoulder. "Alright, buddy, it's real simple: ya pick the stick up," he mimed doing so, "and pull as many dumplings off at a time as ya can." He mimed taking a huge bite and pulling away. "Can ya do that, Akamaru?" Eyes gleaming, the transformed dog nodded and took a seat.

In spite of their confidence, all three of their eyes bugged out when the tray of dango was brought before them. It was stacked at least a foot high with sticks of dango; the dumplings themselves were massive, easily dwarfing the biggest sticks the local dango shop usually had.

Akamaru stared at the sticks before him and actually gulped; no matter what form he was in, he was still a tiny dog...

He started as a hand was laid on his shoulder. Looking, he saw Kiba, smiling at him warmly. "Don't worry, boy; I know you can do this." At the praise, Akamaru beamed. Kiba believed in him; there was no way he could let him down!

"And...start!"

At this, Akamaru attacked the dango with ferocious abandon; grabbing a stick in each hand, he pulled off as many dumplings in his teeth as he could, chewing until it was a more manageable size, then cramming the rest in. Once that had been done, he tossed the empty sticks to the side, chewed the new dumplings until he had some space in his mouth, the grabbed two new sticks of dango and repeated the process.

"Woohoo!" Kiba pumped a fist in the air as the pile began to shrink. "Go, Akamaru!"

"You can do it, Akamaru!" Naruto called, throwing his support in as well. Grinning back at the two, Akamaru continued attacking the plate.

Gradually, the plate of dango began to shrink. As it did, Akamaru's transformed stomach began showing signs of being affected, first making a noticeable imprint against his shirt, and, as the pile shrank even more, pressing out a bit. Akamaru winced, obviously noticing this, but he pressed on, determined not to let Kiba down.

The plate of dango continued shrinking, and Akamaru's stomach continued growing, pressing harder against the shirt. Again, Akamaru winced, this time feeling a sharp bolt of pain through his gut. Gulping, he stared at the dango left on his plate; there was less than half left, but it was still a considerable amount.

"C'mon, buddy!" Kiba called, smacking him on the back. "You're so close! Don't give up now!"

Turning to his partner, Akamaru's eyes widened, and he smiled. It didn't matter how much was left; he was gonna help them win this thing!

With that, he dove back in, this time with a renewed fervor. He ripped the dango off the sticks wildly, chewing only as much as he needed to to gulp it down. It was a bit rough going down, but Akamaru kept at it. In the meantime, his belly continued to slowly grow...

"And...time!"

The announcer made this declaration just as Akamaru gulped down the last dumpling. Sighing, he leaned back in his chair, patting his stomach. It now had a rather round appearance under his shirt, and was even starting to push it up a little bit. Oh man, what am I gonna look like once I change back?

Any reservations he had, however, abated immediately as Naruto and Kiba strolled up to him, grabbing his arms and lifting him out of his seat. "Atta boy, Akamaru!" Kiba exclaimed, ruffling the top of his head. "I knew you could do it!"

"I gotta admit," Naruto added, patting Akamaru's stomach heartily and causing the transformed dog to blush slightly, "that was pretty impressive." Akamaru smiled and burped, rather pleased with himself. Closing his eyes, he concentrated again, and in a puff of smoke, he returned to his natural form. Giving a little sigh, he flopped over onto his back, looking downwards and examining his own belly.

Luckily, it was not yet big enough to cause him trouble walking, and he would be able to participate in another round (though he would need a break first,) but it was rather rounded and stuck up into the air a little bit.

Chuckling at the sight, Kiba bent down and rubbed his slightly stuffed tummy, causing Akamaru's tail to wag and his tongue to loll out the side of his mouth. "Rest up, buddy; you've earned it." He stood back up, sharing a smirk with Naruto; what were they gonna do next?

As though on cue, the announcer spoke up. "The next round is..."
111111211221222121112222121221112212.title: "Dango!"

choices: "Ribs!"
"Steak!"
1111112112212221211122221212211122121.content:
Naruto licked his lips. "Ooh, lemme take this one, Kiba; watching Akamaru kinda got me in the mood for something sweet, too..."

Kiba rolled his eyes. "Alright, whatever; just don't screw this up, OK?"

Naruto glared at Kiba, but the clattering of a plate on his table stopped any argument short. He looked at the plate...and gaped.

Reaching at least three feet into the air, the plate was loaded with all kinds of doughnuts, packed tightly together and arranged in such a way that dozens upon dozens of donuts were heaped upon one another.
Naruto took a whiff, and it was all he could do not to salivate; these were fresh-baked!

"Ooh, this looks yummy..." Naruto murmured to himself, rubbing his hands together. At this, Kiba and Akamaru merely exchanged a look.

"Ready, set...GO!"

At the announcer's declaration, Naruto attacked his plate, tossing donuts into his maw and chewing and swallowing as fast as he could. He moaned slightly at the delicious flavors and the warm, fresh-baked scent and taste, but he continued cramming donuts into his maw, determined not to let up.

A few minutes passed, and he was about a quarter through the massive plate. Already, though, it was starting to have an effect on his already somewhat-stuffed tummy: it had grown bigger and rounder, and had pushed his shirt up further, to the point where every part of his belly from his navel down was exposed (the small pit itself had not made an appearance yet, though his shirt was just barely managing to conceal it.) Still, Naruto never slowed down, continuing to shovel the donuts into his mouth.

Kiba glanced up at the crowd, wincing. "C'mon, Naruto, hurry it up! Half the time's almost up!"

Mouth full of powdered doughnut, Naruto looked up and scowled at Kiba. "What's it look like I'm doing, dog-breath?" he retorted, spraying powdered sugar everywhere and causing Kiba to yelp in surprise and disgust.

"Oh, for the love of...Akamaru, I need ya to transform," Kiba instructed his resting buddy. "We're gonna hafta take drastic measures." Getting Kiba's meaning and wagging his tail, Akamaru once more transformed into a copy of Kiba, his stomach still showing the effects of the dango.

Naruto blinked, not sure if he liked where this is going. "What are you guMMMPH!" He yelped as Kiba grabbed two donuts and shoved them in his mouth. Akamaru stood by, another couple donuts in hand.

"Shut up and eat," Kiba murmured, smirking at Naruto.

Grumbling, but not seeing any other option, Naruto began chewing rapidly, grunting but not letting up as Akamaru shoved his donuts in.

Eventually, they advanced into a system: Naruto would chew the donuts until he had some room in his mouth, at which point Kiba and Akamaru would cram as many as they could into his mouth at a time. Slowly, the plate began shrinking.

Because of the sheer volume of donuts being ingested, Naruto's stomach grew fairly quickly; his shirt slowly slid up, exposing first half of his navel, then the whole thing, then the skin above that...

By this point, there was only less than a quarter of the donuts left, and Naruto's stomach stuck out a good ways in front of him. In addition, his waistline was feeling quite tight, but he didn't move to unbutton it, for fear it would cause them to lose their groove.

"One minute left!" the announcer called suddenly. The eyes of Kiba, Naruto, and Akamaru widened, and they picked up their pace. Slowly, the remainder of the donuts continued to shrink, Naruto's stomach continued to swell, and his waistline continued to grow tighter...

"Aaaand... time!"

This declaration rang out just as Naruto swallowed the last doughnut. Letting out a satisfied burp, he patted his belly and looked down at it to further examine the state it was in. His stomach was now taking on a distinctly spherical appearance, sticking out a few inches in front of him and displaying not only his navel, but a few inches of skin above it. His pants were incredibly tight, and they strained visibly as they attempted to hold the swollen mass back.

"Phew, that was a close one," Naruto murmured, rubbing his belly with one hand. He looked up at Kiba and Akamaru and smirked. "That was a pretty good idea, guys."

Kiba smirked in return, while Akamaru beamed and returned to his natural dog self. "Eh, what can I say? I'm a ninja; thinking fast is part of the job description." Naruto rolled his eyes, but continued rubbing. Unknown to any of them, the waistline of his orange pants was beginning to quiver, and the fabric around the button began looking quite strained. It quivered, quivered, quivered...then, as Naruto let out another satisfied belch...

POP!

Naruto's eyes widened as his pants button finally gave up the ghost, sailing off his pants and arcing up...

"OW!"

....to hit Kiba on the forehead. Akamaru looked up at his friend, concerned for his safety, while Naruto seemed unsure as to whether he should be embarrassed or amused. "H-heh...y-you OK, Kiba?" Naruto snorted as Kiba winced and massaged the point of impact.

"Yeah, I'm fine, no thanks to you!" Kiba retorted, glaring at his friend. "Next time, undo your damn pants!"

Naruto opened his mouth to protest that they hadn't even given him time when the announcer spoke up again. "Next up is..."
1111112112212221211122221212211122121.title: "Donuts!"

choices: "That was the final round! Time to announce the winners!"
"Time for the final round, where all of the competitors will eat!"
11111121122122212111222212122111221211.content:
"Looks like you're up." Naruto said before belching, as he knew that any kind of meat would be Kiba's strong suit.

Kiba was about to ask Akamaru if he wanted to try, but Akamaru was too busy rubbing his belly in discomfort. "Looks like you're not up to it, buddy." Kiba said, sympathizing for his best friend.

"I thought you would be able to handle this, dog breath!" Naruto blurted out, before Kiba yelled back, "I was just making sure he's OK!" Then he calmed down a bit before adding, "Besides, I know a good Inuzuka trick for eating ribs fast!" smiling to show off his pronounced canine teeth.

As Kiba said this, a platter of ribs was brought out. This platter would easily be able to house a large turkey. Instead, there was a monstrous pile of ribs covering the platter. The volunteer who held it had to be careful not to cause it to fall. He placed it on the table with a loud thump to indicate it's heaviness.

The ribs, which were both pork and beef ribs, had a strong, delicious scent, which wafted towards Kiba, causing his stomach to growl loudly despite his mildly stuffed stomach, causing him to say, "At least I brought my appetite!"

Naruto merely replied, "Good! What can I do to help?"

Kiba said, "I'll show you the trick. Just follow me when you get it."

Naruto nodded before the whistle went off, indicating that they begin.

Immediately, Kiba grabbed a rib, placing the end of the rib in his mouth, all the way to the joint. Then he bit down just before the joint, and pulled the rib out, using his canines to both pull the meat off and shred it so that all he had to do was swallow.

"That was amazing!" Naruto exclaimed, awestruck, as Kiba grabbed another rib, saying "Man, these are awesome!"

Naruto just watched as Kiba continued to strip the ribs of their meat.

"What are you waiting for!" Kiba yelled through bites of rib, spraying bits of meat everywhere, causing Naruto to refocus.

"Oh right!" Naruto said as he grabbed a rib, then he held it in the right position for, who bit on. As soon as Kiba did so, Naruto pulled the rib out, finding it completely clean.

"That's so cool!" Naruto thought. He got excited, so he continued the process as fast as he could. He didn't leave much time for Kiba to swallow though, and soon, Kiba's cheeks were full to bursting with meat.

Kiba angrily shook his fists at Naruto before being swallowing with difficulty. Then he screamed "Slow down!", which only caused Naruto to giggle slightly, adding, "Maybe you can do three at once!"

Kiba was initially mad, but then the light bulb went off in his head. "Maybe that's not a bad idea. Just let me swallow this time!" He yelled. Naruto nodded in understanding before loading Kiba up with three ribs this time.

This time, they were able to get a good rhythm going, and though they lost a lot of time, they were catching up once again.

As Kiba continued to consume the nearly endless pile, his stomach advanced out farther and farther, lifting his shirt slowly but steadily.

His shirt crept up past his navel, and his pants button began quivering as well.

Halfway through the pile, Kiba's button was about to give out, and his shirt was nearly to the top of his bloated belly.

A few ribs later, Kiba's button violently popped off, and an "Ow! What was that!" Was heard in the audience. This went unnoticed, however, as Kiba and Naruto were in the zone.

Akamaru, in his man-beast form, had even tagged in by this time, and like a pit crew in a car race, they worked very efficiently. Naruto placed a new set of ribs in, then Akamaru pulled them out and threw them away, only to be replaced by new ones from Naruto.

Kiba's stomach continued to advance outwards, no longer being quite as restricted. The bottom seam of his shirt was beginning to strain, however, so he took a second to throw it off quickly before continuing.

His pants weren't so lucky, however, as the zipper was continuing to be forced down, and the seams around his zipper were struggling. He paid it no mind, though, as he continued to accept more and more ribs.

His stomach continued to advance forward, and about two-thirds of the way through the round, Kiba's stomach reached the table, where it was bisected, with half going on top, and half reaching out below.

Kiba winced in pain at all of this strain, and Akamaru quickly came to the rescue, leaving Naruto to fill Kiba with ribs while he rubbed Kiba's belly to provide relief.

Near the end of the round, a loud rip was heard, and the top of Kiba's inseam ripped to accommodate for his gigantic midsection. "Oh man, my mom's gonna kill me!" he thought, but soon he regained focus, more determined than ever to reach the finish.

Surprisingly, time wasn't as much of an issue because they had gained so much speed, but there was still plenty of opportunity to fail, so the three of them didn't relax.

Finally, after they took up nearly all of the 45 minute time limit, the team of Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru finished, pumping their fists in the air victoriously before the ending whistle was heard.

The crowd was going wild, and they went even wilder as the announcer exclaimed...
11111121122122212111222212122111221211.title: "Ribs!"

choices: The boys de-age, get dressed, and head out
Someone walks in on them in the process of de-aging
111111211221222121112222121221112212111.content:
"The winners are...Uzumaki Naruto and Inuzuka Kiba!"

At this, the crowd went wild; they had been watching in awe as the two boys powered through their dishes with speed and and efficiency, and many of them had been rooting for the two. That was nothing, though, compared to the contestants' reactions.

"Woo!" Kiba whooped, high-fiving the still-transformed Akamaru. "We won!"

Naruto, meanwhile, was hopping up and down ecstatically, his stuffed belly shaking and wobbling about for everyone to see. In addition, it gave the rather annoyed Kiba several glimpses of his green, orange squiggle-patterned boxers. He opened his mouth to protest, but was interrupted when an attendant, who had somehow snuck up on them, thrust a pair of tickets in their faces. "Congratulations, you two! For your prize, you win one month of free, all-you-can eat food from our buffet line!"

Kiba and Naruto took the proffered tickets, beaming widely. Akamaru, in the meantime, simply whined. Oh geez... who knows how this is gonna end?

---
"Alright, Naruto, what's this about?" Kiba demanded as he stood in the middle of Naruto's apartment, arms folded and Akamaru resting comfortably on his head. It was later that night, and the boys' massive morning meals had digested, leaving little more than round shapes that barely pressed against Kiba's grey jacket and Naruto's orange jacket."And why did you have me bring these?" He indicated a bundle held in his arm that consisted of clothes he had loved as a child: a dark green, v-necked shirt with red lining around the neck and a goofy dog face on the front along with dark blue/gray pants and a pair of small sandals.

A bit earlier, Naruto had asked Kiba to come by his apartment before they partook of their prize (the buffet had brought a ton of food, so they were staying in the village for a few days, and they had every intention of taking full advantage of it), which had confused the dog-nin a bit; they had two separate tickets, so it wasn't like they needed to go together. Still, he didn't have much else to do that night, so he'd agreed to come.

Naruto grinned, patting the pile of clothes that were lying beside him on his bed: Akamaru looked closer and realized, to his horror, that they were clothes Naruto had loved to wear during his early Academy days: specifically, a pair of green cargo pants, a blue t-shirt, and a sleeveless, zip-up orange hoodie. Please don't tell me he's thinking what I think he's thinking...

Naruto spent a few more seconds grinning before replying:

"Oh, that's easy: we're gonna turn ourselves into little kids again before we go out to eat!"

"...what," Kiba muttered flatly, Akamaru whining in resignation.

"Yep!" Naruto replied cheerfully, striding over to the kitchen and grabbing a pair of recently-heated instant ramen cups. "I mean, Granny found a way to change us back, so I figured, why not cut loose and have fun like we did on vacation?" Naruto grinned, handing one to Kiba. "Remember that extract that did it to us in the first place? Well, it turns out, the guys who hosted the competition had a ton of it, but didn't use any in today's contest 'cause there were ninjas competing." He smirked viciously. "So, I used some of my ninja skills, swiped abunch, and tested it on my Shadow Clones 'till I made sure I knew the right amount to add to these ramen cups to make us like we were on vacation!" Striding over to the kitchen table, he grabbed a pair of chopsticks, brought them to the cup, and began slurping them up.

Kiba stared for a few seconds before sighing. "Oh, what the hell." Walking over to the table, he sat down, got his own pair of chopsticks, and began slurping up his own noodles. Akamaru, still perched on Kiba's head, whined and covered his eyes with his ears. This is gonna suck, I know it will...
111111211221222121112222121221112212111.title: "That was the final round! Time to announce...

choices: There is almost no one else there.
The place is packed, and the crowd recognizes them from the competition.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
The two were soon back to being around seven again. They were soon clad in the new clothes, looking nearly identical to the way that they did back in the academy days.

"Man, you were right!" Kiba admitted. "It's great to be young again!" He then fist-bumped Naruto, who was grinning wildly, yelling, "Told ya so!"

"Why do I have to be the one to watch them?" Akamaru thought to himself as he watched the two younger ones prepared to race to the buffet.

They were off soon afterwards, with Akamaru running behind them. On the way they received many strange looks, and some of their friends, particularly Shikamaru, even face-palmed at the sight of them.

Soon enough, they reached the buffet, hungry and ready to stuff themselves despite doing so only hours ago.

Akamaru arrived slightly later and prepared for the worst.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Young again

choices: The boys finish their first plates and immediately go back for more
The boys finish their first plates and rest for a few moments
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Naruto and Kiba bolted through the doors of the restaurant, grinning widely as they looked about. The building the buffet was using as its temporary location was huge, even bigger than the one they'd gone to on vacation. As such, there were even more sections and choices than before: chicken, beef, noodles, cakes, pies, donuts, ice cream... it was a testament to the quality of the place that, in spite of its sheer size, it was packed with villagers, both civilians and ninja, of all ages.

Kiba, a dopey grin on his face, took a deep whiff. "Oh man," he moaned, bending down to let Akamaru jump into his arms and onto his head, "That smells awesome!" He licked his lips. "What should we get first?"

Naruto grinned at his friend. "Hey, it's a buffet: we don't have to choose!" He looked around: a great many of the tables and booths were already filled. "First, we gotta find a place to sit, though..." He laughed nervously, rubbing the back of his head.

Rolling his eyes, Kiba nonetheless nodded. "Yeah; let's just hope we can find a seat..."

It was at that moment that someone in the crowd noticed the two. Eyes widening, he motioned to the two, getting the attention of those around him. As soon as they looked at the two kids, their eyes widened, and they began chattering:

"Hey, aren't those the kids who won today's contest?"

"I dunno, they look a lot younger; maybe little brothers or something?"

"Nah, that's them; I know it is."

"Come to think of it, a bunch of that bark extract's gone missing..." Naruto flinched at that, laughing nervously.

Pretty soon, news of the two's presence in the buffet had spread, and soon, nearly everyone's attention was on them as they chattered on, many admiringly.

"Heh heh," Naruto grinned, folding his arms behind his head. "Do ya see that, Kiba? We're famous!"

Kiba returned his grin, but winced as his stomach growled. "Yeah, that's pretty great, but let's go find a seat; I'm starving!" He rubbed his belly. "My tummy needs food!" As soon as the words left his mouth, he blushed. "I can't believe I just said that..."

Giggling, Naruto headed off, Kiba and Akamaru following behind, and soon, they were searching for a seat. By some stroke of luck, they found an unoccupied booth, which they happily slid into. Akamaru wasn't so happy. A booth? You've gotta be kidding me...

Unaware of Akamaru's grousing, the boys settled in, ordered their drinks, then headed to the buffet to load up. They walked together part of the way, but soon split to better fill their plates with the items they wanted. Kiba filled his plate with all manner of meat: fried chicken, burgers, bacon, steak, ribs sausages...and of course, a few donuts, slices of cake, and other assorted sweets.

Naruto, on the other hand, opted for a heaping helping of noodles, along with some slices of pizza, ribs (they HAD smelled good), french fries, some fruit, and some meat of his own, including burgers and barbecued meat. Predictably, he'd also loaded his plate up with sweets: danishes, ice cream, and pie, to name just a few.

As he loaded his plate up, Naruto fidgeted a bit as the restaurant's patrons looked at him and chattered excitedly. It was a bit weird, being watched as he got his food; still, stares of excitement were way better than stares of distrust, hatred... Wait a minute, where did that come from? Resolving to think about it later, he finished heaping food upon his plate and staggered back to his booth, struggling under the weight of the platter.

Coincidentally, he reached the booth at about the same time Kiba did; his plate was just as loaded up as Naruto's. Akamaru, oddly enough, was beside him, having transformed into a copy of Kiba's younger self (he'd opted against transforming into an image of Kiba at his proper age, on the grounds that it would look creepy) and carrying a plate loaded up with nothing but sausages. At Naruto's questioning look, Kiba shrugged. "Hey, I promised him he could eat as many sausages as he wanted once we won." Beaming, Akamaru set his plate of sausages besides the place where Kiba would seat, transformed back into his natural canine form, and began going to town on the sausages.

Shrugging, Naruto slid into is seat and grabbed a pair of chopsticks, targeting his noodles. "Eh, whatever makes ya happy..."

Smirking, Kiba did the same, picking up a piece of fried chicken and biting into it. He moaned happily as the juice dribbled down his chin. "Oh man...this is amazing!"

Naruto slurped up some of his noodles, and his face brightened. "Oh man, so are these! I mean, they still don't beat Ichiraku's, but still..." He reached out with his chopsticks again, this time getting a more substantial helping of noodles.

As Naruto continued eating the noodles and Kiba continued eating his chicken, a crowd slowly gathered around them, having noticed the sheer amount of food their plates held, and all of them were wondering: even when they were like this, did they still have massive appetites?
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Little Champions' Feast

choices: He gives them each a large platter meant for carrying other plates.
He lets them sit at the buffet line and eat directly from it.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Soon, the crowd would get their answer. As Naruto ate, he caught occasional glances over at Kiba, and he even flashed a goofy grin whenever he saw Kiba looking back. He was fascinated by the growth of Kiba's belly.

He watched as Kiba downed a few ribs with his tricks, causing the imprint in his shirt to become even more apparent. "Wow, that's so cool!" Naruto thought. "I can see Kiba's belly get bigger with every bite! I wonder how mine's doing."

Kiba was doing much of the same thing, catching a glimpse of Naruto eating every once in a while. He watched Naruto's belly, which now forced his shirt to start riding up as he stuffed his face with assorted pastries. "Man, Naruto can pack it away!" Kiba thought. "Is that what I look like when I eat a lot?"

Kiba also looked at Akamaru, who was in complete bliss, ignoring everything else much like Kiba and Naruto typically did. He was actually eating faster than Kiba and Naruto, and his stomach was large enough to begin forcing his legs apart.

"Looks like Akamaru's having fun!" Kiba thought as he smiled warmly. "He's not going to be able to move if he eats much more!" That thought caused Kiba to chuckle slightly.

This caught Naruto's attention. "Hey, what's so funny?" Naruto questioned. He then glanced at Akamaru, seeing the dog enjoy himself as he stuffed his face in bliss. Naruto then began giggling a bit before Kiba gave him a dirty look.

The crowd was amazed at how casually the two boys stuffed themselves with plates that none of them could handle. They were even more surprised to see that Kiba and Naruto were finished soon afterwards.

Their stomachs were now distended considerably, forcing their shirts to ride just barely above their navels. Naruto then burped loudly before giggling. "Hehe, I can see your belly button Kiba!"

Kiba burped loudly as well, saying, "Yours is sticking out too!" with a pouting face. Soon enough, however, he broke into laughter, but this was short lived, as a growl was heard in their stomachs.

The two then proceeded to the buffet line, causing the crowd to cheer. Most of the patrons were no longer eating, as they were too fascinated by the two youngsters. One guy even ran up to Naruto, asking "Hey, can I get your guys' autographs!!!"

Naruto didn't know how to respond, and he was even a bit frightened, as the man was particularly loud. Another man broke this up by yelling, "We're not here for autographs! We want to see you guys eat!!!"

The crowd had caused quite a bit of commotion, and the owner had to walk out to see what the commotion was. He wasn't surprised to see Naruto and Kiba there, and he even warmly greeted them, bellowing, "My favorite patrons! How are you enjoying the free buffet!"

Kiba was about to respond, but his stomach growled loudly. That was the only answer that they owner needed, so he said, "I guess you're still hungry, and I hear that people want to see you guys eat!"

He looked at their table, with Akamaru laying on his back, stuffed to the brim. "I don't want to have to see you guys take so many plates." Because of this, he decided to help them.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: The boys finish their first plates and immediat...

choices: Soon, Naruto's button pops off
Soon, Kiba's button pops off
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
"Wait right here," the restaurant owner instructed the two boys. He bustled his way through the crowd and out of sight.

Kiba raised an eyebrow. "Huh, whaddaya think he has in mind, Naruto?" There was no reply from the blonde boy. "Naruto?" Kiba repeated, looking to where Naruto was standing.

The blonde boy, orange hoodie riding up over his navel, currently had his finger wiggling about in the small pit, giggling up a storm. Kiba rolled his eyes. "Never mind..."

"Huh?" Blinking, Naruto looked up, his finger still in his belly button. "You say something, Kiba?"

Fists on his hips, Kiba turned towards Naruto to retort, only to be interrupted when the restaurant owner returned, bearing a massive platter on each hand. Smiling, he handed one to each boy.

"Huh?" Naruto tilted his head, inspecting his platter; it was incredibly wide across, almost the size of half their booth table. In it, several large circular objects sat. "What's this for, old man?"

Instead of answering, the man gestured with his head towards Kiba, who was fiddling with the circular objects, a look of curiosity on his face. Suddenly, he hit some sort of switch, and he nearly fell off his feet when the objects sprung upwards, resting on struts in front of him.

Naruto squinted. "Wait a minute...those look like plates..." His eyes widened, and he grinned as the implications dawned on him. Kiba wasn't far behind, if his toothy smile was anything to go by.

The owner nodded. "Those are our special Massive Course plates; they're usually meant for families..." he winked at the two. "...but I'm sure you two can use 'em just fine, right?"

The two kids blinked, looked at one another, grinned, and darted back towards the buffet, moving at a surprisingly quick pace considering their somewhat stuffed bellies, and they were already loading up the multiple plate-like extensions with various goodies: fried chicken, ramen, ice cream, cake, gelatin, barbecued meat...pretty much everything the buffet had to offer.

After a few surprisingly long minutes, the two boys staggered back to their booth, their platters and the multiple plates stacked high with all manner of food. The crowd followed them, both awestruck at the sheer amount of food they'd gotten and curious to see whether they'd be able to eat it all.

Akamaru, hearing the commotion, opened his eyes and looked as best as he could out of the booth. He whined as he saw Naruto and Kiba, navels already exposed, staggering back towards the table. Oh, great... Suddenly, his eyes widened and he let out a small canine burp, stuffed belly shaking. He whimpered; hopefully, Kiba would give him a tummy rub...

Luckily, even as Kiba plopped his massive platter onto the table and scooted into his seat, he looked at his buddy's stuffed tummy, smiled warmly, and scratched the furry sphere energetically. Akamaru, tail wagging wildly, kicked one of his legs as hard as he could, given the obstructing belly. Meanwhile, Naruto did the same, depositing his massive platter on the table and sliding in. Looking at the plates and rubbing his hands gleefully, he dug in, grabbing a chicken leg in each hand and ripping off chunks of meats, giggling at the moistness of it.

Kiba, noticing this, winced apologetically at Akamaru. "Sorry, Akamaru," he muttered, lifting his hand away from the dog's tummy, much to the latter's disappointment. "I'll give ya all the belly rubs ya want after this, I promise!" Turning his attention to his own selection, he selected a couple pieces of cake, grabbing a fork in each hand and shoving hunks of it in his mouth at a time. Eventually, he moved on to a couple of rather sizable steaks, with Naruto turning his attention towards a large dish of vanilla ice cream with copious amounts of chocolate sauce.

The crowd watched as the two boys went at it, cheering loudly for the two as they stuffed their faces. As before, their bellies slowly but surely grew, forcing Kiba's shirt and Naruto's hoodie up a little higher with every few bites. They winced momentarily as they felt a tightness in their waistlines, but shrugged it off; the crowd was expecting a show, and they were gonna give 'em one!

Kiba, through a mouthful of gelatin, giggled slightly, blushing a bit. Heh...my tummy feels funny when it's growing! He blushed harder; that was the second time he had thought or said "tummy" that evening. Still, considering what the extract did to them, he guessed it was to be expected. Shrugging, he swallowed the gelatin and tackled a dish of pudding with whipped cream instead.

Naruto, cramming brownie after brownie into his hungry maw, beamed as he felt his stomach grow heavier. Hee hee, this is even more fun than I thought it'd be! Swallowing and licking his lips to get rid of any crumbs, he grabbed a glass of milk and downed it.

A few minutes passed, and Naruto and Kiba had made good progress, though they weren't even halfway through yet. Their hoodie and shirt, respectively, had hiked up even further, and their stomachs had grown heavier in their laps, while at the same time inching dangerously close to the table. In addition, their waistlines were feeling even tighter than before; in spite of this, Naruto and Kiba never even slowed down, much to the delight of the cheering crowd; they might actually pull this off!

Spurred by the cheers of the crowd, Naruto and Kiba pressed on, determined not to stop until every last speck of food on the platters were gone. As a result, their stomachs grew bigger and closer to the table, their shirt and hoodie continued to slowly rise up, and the pressure in their waistlines started to really be felt.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Back in the Game!

choices: The two plow through this platter and go for another.
The two slow down throughout the platter, and only take plates afterwards.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Kiba was cramming sausages into his maw, blissfully unaware of the violent quivering in his pants button as he swallowed, causing his pants button to pop off violently, hitting Naruto in the nose as he was about to take a bite out of a cinnamon roll. His stomach was then released, surging out and getting a couple of inches closer to the table. In addition, his shirt made its way to the top of his belly, and it popped off with the sudden force, resting on top of his stuffed belly. His zipper was also forced down a little bit, giving Kiba quite a bit of relief.

"Hey!" Naruto yelled before a cunning smile appeared on his face. "Maybe I can get Kiba back!" He thought. "Besides, it would feel awesome to break off this stupid button!" Seeing the look on Naruto's face, Kiba knew that something was coming.

He was right to be worried, as the crowd began chanting, only encouraging Naruto, who was currently chugging a large glass of milk in an attempt to break his pants button. Soon enough, a loud popping sound was heard, and the button was sent flying. It hit Kiba square in the belly while he was eating more sausage, causing him to yell, "Ow! My tummy!" He then flushed a bright red, as he realized what he just said.

While this was happening, Naruto's stomach, finally released from its prison, flopped out and continued to inflate ever so slowly with the milk that Naruto was drinking. The bottom seam of his hoodie ripped at the sudden force. From there it rode up off of his stomach, and rested on top just like Kiba's shirt. His stomach also forced the zipper of his fly down more than halfway, giving his stomach breathing room. Naruto finished the glass, burping, when he laughed at Kiba, saying, "Admit it, I got you back!"

Kiba couldn't help but begin laughing himself, and even the crowd started laughing after a tense silence. The two then remembered that they were busy stuffing themselves, and they got right back to it, causing the crowd to cheer.

Nearly everything imaginable was stuffed into the faces of the two boys. "Man this food is good! I wanna see how big my belly can get!" Naruto thought as he shoveled cake into his maw. "I'm gonna catch up to Akamaru soon!" Kiba thought before he glanced at Naruto. "Man! Look at Naruto! He's really goin' at it!" He thought, surprised to see Naruto with such a huge stomach, though he was not far behind.

Their respective stomachs crept closer and closer to the table, and now their stomachs were putting pressure on various seams of their pants after forcing their flies all the way down. They felt air on their underwear, but no one could see their underwear as it was under both their bellies and the table.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Soon, Kiba's button pops off

choices: Realizing how strained their pants are, they have a seam-busting contest
They have a contest to see who can eat the most before moving their stomach
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Naruto and Kiba, massive grins on their faces, continued shoving everything they could into their hungry maws. Noodles, baked goods, ice cream, cake, chicken, beef, pork...all of this and more vanished down their gullets and into their waiting bellies.

Predictably, this caused their midsections to expand even more, further increasing pressure on the seams of their pants and moving ever closer to the table. Akamaru, still lying on his back, perked his ears up as he heard a very distinct creaking; it was the sound of straining fabric, and it was coming from both boys' pants. For what had to be the millionth time that day alone, he whimpered; yeah, no way this was gonna end well...

Naruto and Kiba, for their part, were not oblivious to this either; they paused momentarily upon noticing the tightness in their seams, blushing slightly. However, they sprang back into action almost immediately afterwards, determined grins on their faces; it had felt awesome when they'd busted their buttons and the bottom seams of their hoodie and shirt, respectively, so they could only imagine how great it would feel once they'd busted a few pants seams.

Gradually, the food on the platters vanished, the boys' stomachs swelling in direct proportion to this occurence. Tighter and tighter their seams got, and closer and closer their bellies inched to the table, until, finally, with less than a quarter left for each of them, they made contact.

Naruto, feeling the cool table against his belly, looked down to see his gut touching it. He giggled at the sight. "Hey, Kiba, lookit this!" He prodded his stomach with a finger. "My tummy's touching the table!"

A goofy smile on his face, Kiba gulped down the last of a glass of soda and indicated his own stomach. "Heh, so's mine!"

They both spent a few seconds giggling, feeling their stomachs and poking them, before they remembered they had an audience.
