Determined not to disappoint them, the boys fell to it with a renewed fervor, tackling what relatively little remained of their platters. With each bite, their stomachs pressed a little harder against the table, and their taxed pants seams became even more strained.

Finally, as each boy reached the end of their platters with only one item left (a brownie for Naruto, a rather large roll for Kiba) and tossed those items in their mouths, chewing and swallowing, a tiny rip was heard, and both boys simultaneously sighed in relief as a tiny bit of their inseams ripped. The other seams that were being strained remained intact, but they became further taxed.

"Phew!" Kiba breathed, lying back and rubbing his stomach. "That was really good!" His distended midsection now pressed rather noticeably against the table, sitting in his lap. His shirt was resting on top of the large sphere, scrunching up the doggie face on it a bit.

Naruto burped and giggled, patting his belly happily. "Yeah! That really hit the spot!" His own bloated tummy pushed just as noticeably against the table as Kiba's, and, just as Kiba's shirt was, the bottom of his hoodie rested squarely on top of it. They both shivered as a draft played against their exposed but still out of sight underwear, amplified slightly by the small rip in their inseams.

The crowd stared at the two young boys, amazed at the size their bellies were, especially considering their own small size. Still, many of them couldn't help but feel a bit disappointed; they looked really full now, and didn't look up to eating any more...

...which is why a shocked, excited murmur spread through the crowd as the boys gripped the table, grunted, and shimmied out of their booth, their stomachs making a light plop as they extricated themselves. Waving their arms about to balance themselves, they picked up their depleted platters and waddled back to the buffet, their stomachs shaking and wobbling as they did so.

Soon, they had fully restocked their platters, somehow managing to pack even more in than before, and lurched back to their seats. Once or twice they stumbled, almost dropping their heaping platters, but a member of the crowd would grab hold of their shoulders and steady them. Happily thanking them, the boys continued their lurch back to their seats until, finally, they'd arrived. Plopping the massive platters on the table, they squeezed back into their booths, grunting as their stomachs were wedged against the table. Regardless, they managed to get themselves back in their original positions. Gazing at the platters and rubbing their stomachs eagerly, both children licked their lips, gave each other an eager smile, and began digging in.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Stuffed, but not quite silly

choices: The table gives in, freeing the boys' titanic tummies.
One of them submits, as the pain became too much.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
As Kiba ate, he felt the table begin to cut into his stomach. To alleviate the pressure, he decided to turn to the side, facing Akamaru, who was nearly asleep in his stuffed state. Kiba gently scratched the dog's belly before he got an idea, his eyes lighting up.

Naruto took notice of this all, and he dropped his chicken leg, saying, "What'r you doin', Kiba?" Kiba then looked back at Naruto with a grin.

"Hey Naruto, I have an idea!" Kiba started. "What is it?" was Naruto's excited response. "Your tummy is probably starting to bug ya right about now, right?" Kiba asked. Naruto nodded, saying, "Oh, you want me to move it like you, right." As he moved his belly, adding, "But how are we supposed to eat like this?"

Kiba then face-palmed, saying, "No, that's not it, you idiot!" Naruto was a bit angered by this, but Kiba continued, "We can have a contest. Ya know, eat with our bellies forward. That way, they will keep hurtin' because of the table. Whoever can eat the most before they move their bellies wins!" Naruto nodded excitedly, and began wedging his belly back into the table, with Kiba doing the same thing.

The store owner, without much to do, as all of the customers were focused on the two, even decided to be the judge. He saw that Naruto ate a little more than Kiba, so he told Kiba to eat first, then when the two had the same amount, Naruto began eating.

This was the perfect competition for the two, as they were both very determined, and they both had high stamina and a tolerance for pain. It was amazing how similar the two were, which is why they got along with each other so well, and also why they butted heads so often.

The two got at it, each trying to outdo the other and clean more of their platters. They ignored all of the various sounds and sensations as their stomachs stretched out to accommodate for the food that went down their maw, though much of it remained on their faces and torso garments.

First, their inseams continued to rip, freeing more of their bellies. In addition, their navels popped out due to the pressure, though neither of them bothered to pay it mind, too focused on their own eating and ignoring the great discomfort. Their stuffed bellies grew slightly more forward, covering more of the top and bottom of the table as the divide in their bellies became larger. More noticeably, though, their bellies found room to their sides, opting to spread out sideways as they eat.

Finally, the table began to creak ominously, and the crowd, which was originally cheering, fell into silence in anticipation of whatever was about to happen.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: They have a contest to see who can eat the most...

choices: They finish their platters, then leave the restaurant
Partway through, they get sleepy from all the food and nod off
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Naruto and Kiba's distended bellies continued to swell, bulging out towards the top and to the sides of the table. Said piece of furniture continued to cut into their bellies, but they pressed on, determined not to lose to the other, even if their grins indicated that this was more of a friendly competition than anything.

All the while, more of their pants seams continued to pop, and the table creaked again, even louder than before. Kiba, hearing this, winced. Hoo boy...if we go any further... He looked to his side, where Akamaru, stuffed tummy sticking in the air, had finally dozed off. Sorry, boy, the little Inuzuka thought apologetically, gently grabbing the little dog and placing him within the neck of his shirt; with the dog's belly, he never would have been able to hold onto Kiba's head like he usually did. That taken care of, he resumed stuffing his face, his stomach continuing to press against the table.

Completely oblivious to what Kiba had just done, Naruto continued cramming food into his mouth, wincing as the table continued to cut into the ever-growing sphere that was his abdomen. His navel, peeking out above the table, wobbled as the appendage it was attached to continued to expand.

As the boy's midsections grew bigger and bigger, the table creaked more and more, beginning to become a fairly constant noise. The store owner noticed this and winced, but he brushed it off; with all the publicity these two were generating, he'd be able to cover any damages easily.

Sure enough, as the boys' stomachs continued to bulge, the table emitted a loud, sharp, splintering noise. Kiba and Naruto, in spite of their stuffed states, heard this, grabbed their platters, and hoisted them above their heads. They did this not a moment too soon, as the table caved inwards, splitting down the middle and collapsing to the floor. Kiba and Naruto's bellies, subsequently, surged forward, and the two boys let out audible sighs of relief as all the built-up pressure suddenly abated and their guts were freed.

The crowd gaped at the sight; whatever it was they had been expecting, that definitely hadn't been it. Without the table in the way, the kids' guts had flopped out, exposing just how big they had gotten. They stuck out at least a foot in front of the two, resting in their laps. Their upper torso garments, as before, rested squarely on top of the large spheres, luckily sparing them from any further damage; they were, however, dotted with food stains. Their pants, however, weren't quite so lucky; their inseams had torn extensively, and though their stomachs were resting in their laps, bits of their undergarments nonetheless peeked out from the sides. Naruto's was some sort of orange cloth, with currently-indistinct patterns on them. Kiba's, on the other hand, appeared to consist of brown cloth, with equally-unclear patterns on them.

Noticing the crowd's expressions, Naruto, still holding his platter, turned his head and blushed. "Uh, sorry. We didn't mean to..."

He was taken aback when the crowd erupted in cheers.

"That was amazing!"

"That table never stood a chance!"

"You guys rock!"

Hearing the praise, Naruto and Kiba, slightly embarrassed as they were, couldn't help but beam, their blushes lighting up their smiles. "Heheh, thanks!" Kiba exclaimed, resting part of his platter on his massive tummy. Akamaru stirred, but remained asleep.

Naruto giggled. "Thanks, but we're not done yet!" He exchanged a grin with Kiba. "Whaddaya say, dog-breath? You wanna give these guys one more show?" He indicated his platter, which he was resting partially on his belly.

Kiba licked his lips, looking down at his own platter. "Ready whenever you are, dummy."

Naruto only smirked at the insult. Shifting themselves and slouching down in their seats a bit so they could rest the platters entirely on their stomachs, they resumed gorging themselves, in spite of the massively-stuffed state of their guts. The crowd continued to cheer, eager to see how they'd prevail against this last platter.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Crash goes the table

choices: Tsunade finds out about what Naruto did with the de-aging.
The two sleep in before spending the day as their younger selves.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
The two continued to plow through their platters, and their stomachs continued to push out forward. The crowd was ecstatic that the two were still going, and that only drove them further.

Their stomachs were getting closer and closet to each other now, but they took no notice as Naruto stuffed a few doughnuts in his face and Kiba grabbed a large glass of soda, putting it to his mouth, then letting the liquid cascade down.

Their stomachs, now very taut, made the final push, and as Naruto finished the last of his extensive pile of pastries and Kiba finished his final rack of ribs. They finally finished, and they raised up their arms gloriously, not even caring that their stomachs were now touching each other.

The crowd went absolutely wild, and there were murmurs of coming to the buffet again just to watch the two eat. As the crowd began dispersing, the two began to scoot out of their booths.

They both attempted to stand up, but as soon as they did, their destroyed pants fell to their ankles, reminding them of how much damage they had done. Either way, they had now sense of their new center of balance, so they both fell on their rumps, rubbing them before moving to the massive appendages.

They were so busy rubbing their bodacious bellies, attempting to alleviate the pain of stretching, that they were unaware of the few people that were left there that stared at their underwear.

Naruto's underwear was a pair of orange briefs with a pattern of dancing ramen bowl. Kiba finally noticed this after a while, and he chuckled a bit before belching loudly. Naruto paid it no mind, but then he noticed what Kiba was laughing at, and he caught a glimpse of Kiba's undies, which were also briefs. The brown garment contained a pattern of dancing dog bones. Naruto then had his laugh, and the two fell into a fit of laughter.

While the owner began cleaning up the destroyed table, Naruto and Kiba used each other for support, trying to stand and find their respective centers of balance. Their pants had no way to stay on them, so Naruto used Kiba for support while he picked up his pants. Kiba did the same thing.

Soon, they were both leaning on each other, lumbering in the direction of Naruto's apartment with pants draped over their shoulders. Akamaru was already asleep in Kiba's jacket, lulled by the slow, yet hypnotic motion.

They had no shame as they walked throughout the village without pants. Luckily, it was later than they thought, and there weren't many people to give them weird stares. They even passed by Shikamaru, who took one look at the three and face-palmed, sighing and mumbling as he walked along. This only caused the two to giggle as they continued staggering to Naruto's apartment.

Soon enough, they arrived back to Naruto's apartment, which was surprisingly clean, at least for his standards. Either way, Kiba asked, "Do ya mind if I stay the night here? I don't think I can make it home."

Naruto was excited to have someone stay with him as it was such a rare occasion. He immediately said, "Sure! Make yourself at home!" He even let Kiba and Akamaru have his bed while he slept on a mat on the floor next to them.

Naruto was extremely happy, thinking, "I have friends now!" Before he fell asleep with a smile on his face. Kiba had left his jacket on for Akamaru, and he fell asleep hugging the young dog like he used to when he was younger.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: They finish their platters, then leave the rest...

choices: While running about outside the village, the boys find a hidden store of food
Before leaving the village, they buy a ton of snacks and bring them along
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
The late morning sun streamed in through Naruto's window striking Kiba's face and causing him to stir. Closing his mouth, which had been open as he slept on his back, he winced. "Ugh...bright..." Shielding his eyes, he groaned and sat up. Akamaru, still sleeping in Kiba's v-necked shirt, stirred, yawning widely.

Smiling at the noise, Kiba blinked open his eyes and looked down at Akamaru. "Hey, buddy; you have a nice sleep?" Wagging his tail, Akamaru barked an affirmative. Kiba, smiling warmly at this, rubbed his stomach through his shirt.

Since last night's gigantic meal, his stomach seemed to have digested everything. It felt a little soft, but it was nothing a few walks couldn't burn off. As such, it had retreated beneath the article of clothing, and it was completely concealed, save for the hints of flesh that picked out of the busted side-seams. Kiba winced; he'd have to find another shirt until he could get that one fixed...

A sudden draft played across his legs, and Kiba, blushing, remembered that he and Naruto had shucked their pants last night, the ruined garments lying in a pile on the floor. Speaking of which...

He looked down at the floor, and saw Naruto, wearing his slightly ripped hoodie and his ramen boxers, lying on his back with his arms splayed out to the sides. His stomach, though it had digested as well, was still exposed, as his hoodie still rode above it; apparently, the make of the hoodie had caused it to say scrunched up, even as the sphere that forced it up in the first place had vanished.

Kiba shook his head, smirking and chuckling, before taking a look at the bedside clock. "10:00 AM?" He muttered in surprise, tilting his head. Not that it was that late, but he usually got up earlier than that. He was willing to bet Naruto did, too.

A devious thought suddenly occurred to him, and he grinned viciously. "Say, Akamaru..." he began, looking down at the dog in his shirt. "Ya wanna give the idiot a little bit of a wake-up call?"

Immediately knowing where Kiba was going with this (he'd done it to him a few times in the past), Akamaru barked, leapt out of Kiba's shirt and onto the floor, and trotted up to Naruto's bare tummy. Wagging his tail, Akamaru leaned forward and put his wet nose on the exposed skin.

The effect was almost instantaneous. "GAH! Cold, cold cold!" Eyes flying open, Naruto sat bolt upright, his hoodie falling down to cover the rest of his upper torso. Holding his midsection and panting from the shock, he looked down to see Akamaru, smugly wagging his tail. "Akamaru, what was that for?!" Realizing, Naruto looked up to see Kiba sitting on the bed, his expression just as smug as his dog's. "Kiba..."

Kiba laughed. "What's the matter, Naruto? Ya didn't like the wet nose treatment?"

"M-my tummy's sensitive!" Naruto blurted out, blushing as soon as he realized what he'd just said.

Kiba laughed again, hopping off the bed and landing on his feet. He strolled over to Naruto, reaching out a hand. "Ah, c'mon, Naruto, it was just a bit of fun; no need to be such a wuss about it."

Scowling, Naruto nonetheless took the proffered hand and stood up. "Yeah, fun for you, maybe..." He suddenly noticed the sun and shielded his eyes. "Wow, the sun's bright...what time of day is it?"


Kiba smiled. "10 in the morning."

"What?!" Naruto exclaimed. "Oh man! I was gonna get up at 8 and train! I just lost some of my day!" He clutched his head. "Oh man, oh man, I'm gonna fall behind and I'm never gonna become strong enough to become Hokage and..."

Kiba facepalmed. "Uh, Naruto...one day of not training ain't gonna kill ya." He smirked, gesturing at his and Naruto's de-aged bodies. "Besides, don't ya wanna enjoy this for now?"

Naruto paused in his panicking and looked at Kiba. "H-huh? Whaddaya ya me---" He looked down at himself, and promptly remembered that he and Kiba and de-aged themselves last night. "Oh yeah, I forgot. Heh heh..." he grinned sheepishly and rubbed the back of his head, prompting another facepalm from Kiba. "Geez, you're such an idiot sometimes..." he mumbled under his breath.

Naruto heard this and scowled, but continued speaking. "Anyway, Kiba...what didja have in mind?"


Kiba shrugged. "Eh, I figured I'd run around with Akamaru, maybe work off what's left from last night." He looked up at Naruto and smiled. "You wanna come? We're going to the forest outside the village if you're interested."

Naruto's face lit up. Someone was actually asking him to spend time with them! The first time he was a kid, no one had ever asked him to do anything....


"Naruto? Are you crying?"

"H-huh?" Kiba's incredulous voice snapped Naruto out of his thoughts, and he blinked, realizing that, yes, his eyes had started to well up a bit. "N-nah, I just had something in my eyes..."

Kiba smirked. "Whatever," he replied, good-naturedly. "So, anyway, you wanna come?"

Naruto nodded. "Sure!" He looked down at his slightly-ripped hoodie and his ruined pants on the floor. "Lemme just, uh, change into some new clothes." He began searching about his room for something to wear.

At hearing this, Kiba brightened. "Oh yeah, I almost forgot." He turned to Akamaru. "Hey Akamaru; ya mind just running back to our place and gettin' me some clothes?"

Akamaru barked, nodded, and transformed into a copy of Kiba as he was now, wearing pants of course. He tilted his head at Kiba and barked a question. Kiba shrugged. "Eh, whatever you can find." Nodding, the dog opened the window and bounded out; soon, he was leaping across the buildings on all fours.

Within a matter of minutes, he'd returned, holding a set of clothes in his arms. Kiba beamed. "Thanks boy!" Giving another affirmative bark, Akamaru handed his partner his clothes and transformed back into his natural shape. Giving the dog a ruffle on the head, Kiba began slipping into his clothes.

Soon, both he and Naruto were clad in different sets of clothes that they had liked to wear as kids. Naruto was wearing a short-sleeved, black t-shirt with Konoha's symbol on the front. For his pants, he wore a pair of gray shorts that had a blue stripe going down the legs of both. Unlike his usual pants, these had no button or zipper, but were simply a pair of simple cloth shorts with a thick waistband.

Kiba, on the other hand, was clad in a kid-sized net shirt, over which he wore a dark blue hooded sweatshirt that almost looked a bit purple (Naruto pointed this out with a giggle, much to Kiba's annoyance.) He wore a pair of long tan pants, and unlike Naruto's, had a conventional zipper and button.

After taking a look in the mirror and ensuring that they looked fine, Kiba grinned at Naruto, bending down a bit to let Akamaru hop on his head. "So, ya ready to go, Naruto?"

Holding up his fists and beaming, Naruto nodded. "Sure am!"

Striding up to the open window, Kiba began climbing up on it. "Well, what're we waitin' for? Let's go!" With that, he was off, darting across the rooftops.

Laughing, Naruto climbed up to the window and jumped out, following the little dog-nin. "Hey, wait up, Kiba!"
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: A day of fun

choices: Cooking nin then appear, insisting upon feeding the boys.
Kiba decides to teach Naruto how to cook.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Soon enough, after about an hour, Naruto, Akamaru, and Kiba found themselves in a forest outside of the village.

Over the past hour, the three had jumped from building to building before leaving the village. There, Kiba let his nose lead him, going from smell to smell. Naruto watched, intrigued, as Kiba stopped on occasion, sniffed the air with Akamaru, then ran in a different direction, jumping from tree to tree, causing Naruto to rush to follow him.

Either way, the hour of running had tuckered the three out, so they currently walked on the forest floor, panting. Akamaru had even crawled up onto Kiba's smaller head, though he could barely stay there given its small size.

"Where are we goin' " Naruto asked, his head cocked to the side a little. "Do ya even know where Konoha is?"

"I'm goin' wherever my nose tells me!" Kiba responded simply, then he sniffed the air, grinned, then pointed to his left, saying "It's over that way, slightly below us."

"Shuddup dog breath! I knew that!" Naruto yelled back defensively. "Whatever." Kiba responded sarcastically.

The two began to bicker, but that was interrupted by a loud growling that came from Naruto's stomach. Kiba was about to make a remark, but then his stomach growled even more loudly. He then scratched his head, saying, "I think it's time for lunch."

Soon enough, with Kiba's nose leading them, the two began walking to the village, talking about the buffet and how awesome their situation was.

This was all interrupted by Naruto screaming as a snare trap took him higher and higher by his foot. "Help me Kiba!" Naruto said frantically, beet red as he fell for the obvious trap.

"Man, I thought you saw that one!" Kiba exclaimed, gigging at the sight of Naruto flailing, his shirt falling off of his abdomen, revealing his stomach, which was flat once again, just like Kiba's and Akamaru's thanks to the workout. Akamaru also laughed to himself, woken up by Naruto's outbursts.

Kiba was about to help Naruto, but then he smelled food nearby, and went to investigate. Ignoring all of Naruto's yells, Kiba found the source of the smell, which was a crack that opened up under the grass.

Kiba tried to pry open the crack, which felt metal on the inside, but it shut closed, almost pinching his fingers, and Naruto was released, falling on his rump, saying "Thanks for the help, Kiba" with the utmost sarcasm.

Kiba then said, "Wait, I think the trap is a switch, but you didn't open it enough." Kiba went to the rope to pull it down, but chakra enveloped the rope, and his hand burned a bit as he tried to touch the rope. "Ow! That hurt. That's not gonna work!"

Naruto then said, "Oh.", disappointed before the light bulb went off in Naruto's head, and he said, "Wait, I have an idea!"

With that, he made a few hand signs, then said, "Shadow clone jutsu!", creating about a dozen Naruto clones, all identical to the seven-year-old Naruto. They soon formed a chain on the ground, reminiscent of the ones he formed to same others from falling off of cliffs.

The top shadow clone then grabbed the loop of rope, which tightened around his hand, lifting him and the rest of the chain. The real Naruto was planted firmly on the ground, so he pulled on the chain, pulling the snare trap down. As this happened, the crack on the ground opened wider and wider, revealing itself as a thick, steel door that slid farther and farther open.

Soon enough, the final clone was on the ground, keeping the snare trap down to allow the boys to slip into whatever was hidden behind the steel door. The three landed in a room the size of an elevator interior, and were quite cramped until the door above them closed, and a door to their right opened, revealing a warehouse size room.

The room was filled with wooden crates of food. The crates had large labels that revealed their contents, and each one was surrounded by a lime-green aura. There was also a sticker on each crate that read, "Sealed for freshness".

Surprisingly, the room was well lit, and the three could see sunlight as they looked up. They wondered what kind of a jutsu could hide the warehouse like this.

Farther in the room, as the three walked between rows of crates, they found a door. In this door was what appeared to be a small house. There was a kitchen with a table for dining, and there was an adjacent bathroom and a bedroom on the other side. The bedroom wasn't very furnished, only housing a bunk bed and a dresser for storage.

The three went back out to the main storage room to see a few other doors that led to more "houses".

Naruto then broke their wondrous silence, saying, "I wonder what this is all about." Kiba responded with, "Probably an outpost for shinobi during a war, but who needs this much food?"

"I dunno." Naruto replied, saying, "I remember going on a mission to save Ayame from a few cooking nin. Maybe it has to do with that."

Akamaru then barked, saying, "Nobody's here. How do we find out?" Kiba replied, "I dunno buddy." Of course to Naruto, this was strange, as all he heard was barking from Akamaru, and Kiba talking back. He stared at them with his head cocked to the side.

"What are ya lookin' at?" Kiba asked, forgetting that Naruto couldn't understand Akamaru. Naruto just continued to stare blankly. Kiba was about to snap him out of it, but Naruto's stomach growled again, snapping him out of it as he said, "Whatever it is, I'm sure no one will mind if we eat something." as he rubbed the back of his head.

"Lets look for something to eat, then!" Kiba exclaimed as he began to explore the room more, scanning the labels to find something good. "These are all ingredients!" Naruto complained, "I can't cook! What should we do?"
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Food wonderland

choices: The boys finish the stack of burgers, and Naruto makes something else
Partway through the stack of burgers, Kiba decides to make  a quick side dish
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Kiba rolled his eyes. "I didn't think so; don't you ever eat anything other than instant ramen when you're home?"

Naruto's face turned slightly pink. "Um, well, I eat toast, and milk, and stuff..."

Kiba shook his head. "Figures." He smirked. "Lucky for you, I actually know how to cook."

The blonde's head tilted. "Huh? You do?"

Kiba nodded. "Yep: Hinata gave me n' Shino cooking lessons, just in case we ever needed to make somethin' for ourselves." He grinned. "She's an awesome cook, believe it or not, but I'm not as good as her." He continued walking about, sniffing and examining the boxes. "Still, I should be able to whip up something..." His face lit up as a lightbulb went off in his head. "Actually, I can teach ya a few things, too; it'll make it easier on both of us."

"Eh?" Naruto's eyes widened. "You're gonna teach me to cook?"

The dog-nin shrugged. "Eh, why not? Not like there's anyone else here." He motioned for Naruto to follow him as he inspected the boxes. "C'mon, I'll try to find something easy for ya."

Blinking in confusion, Naruto nonetheless did as he was asked, following Kiba around and looking at the various labels on the boxes: noodles, spices, sugar, chicken...

Kiba's face lit up as they came to a box that read 'ground beef.' "Ah, this should do just fine." Prying open the massive crate, he reached in and grabbed several packs of uncooked ground beef, sealed with something that looked like plastic but was probably a lot more durable; nothing was even leaking out. He turned to the other boy. "Hey, Naruto, grab a few spices will ya?"

Looking slightly disgruntled at being ordered around, Naruto nonetheless obeyed, striding over to a crate of assorted spices and cracking it open. "Alright, but what're we makin'?"

Kiba grinned widely. "Only the best burgers you ever tasted!"

---

About an hour later, Naruto lifted the skillet and deposited the patty onto a plate, looking at it with satisfaction. It wasn't perfectly formed-in fact, it was uneven and lumpy-but the meat itself was cooked a golden brown, inside and out, and the aroma of the spices that had been added to it made his mouth water.

Per Kiba's instructions, Naruto had taken a rather large hunk of raw ground beef, shaped it a bit, tossed it in a skillet over a hot stove, and flipped it about, adding spices as Kiba told him to, until, finally, it was cooked to satisfaction. After making sure Naruto had it, Kiba had gone back into the warehouse to grab some buns and condiments. That left Naruto alone to make more of the burgers, and it hadn't taken long for him to come up with an idea. Making a series of hand signs, he materialized several Shadow Clones, and ordered them into a line across the stove, each one making their own burgers.

Soon, Naruto decided they had enough to start, and dismissed the clones once they'd finished piling the burgers onto a plate. Licking his lips, Naruto grabbed the plate with both hands, struggling a bit under its weight, and lugged it over to the table, dropping it on the table. Nodding, he went to get two smaller plates for Kiba and himself.

As he rooted around in the cabinets, Kiba walked in, bearing an armful of burger buns. Akamaru, transformed beside him, carried an armful of condiments. Kiba's eyes widened as he saw the burgers. "Oh wow, Naruto; hate to say it, but I'm really impressed!" He sniffed the air, a goofy grin forming on his face. "And I dunno what you did, but those smell AWESOME!" He deposited the buns on the table, Akamaru doing the same with the condiments. Taking a whiff of his own, Akamaru grinned, transforming himself back into a dog.

Naruto grinned, finding a couple of plates. "Heh heh, thanks!" Hopping off the chair he was using for height, he brought the plates to the table and set them down. "Hope they taste good!"

Licking his lips, Kiba grabbed a particularly large patty, slapped it between two buns, and squirted a copious amount of ketchup on it. "Well, if they don't, at least the ketchup'll make it taste a little better."

Naruto scowled, making a burger for himself and slathering it with ketchup and mustard. "Well, in that case, you can be the first to try it, dog-breath."

Kiba glared back. "Fine, I will." Taking a seat, he dragged his plate in front of him, lifted the burger to his mouth and took a bite, juice running down his chin.

Almost as soon as he did so, his eyes widened. "Well? How is it?" Naruto asked, trying his best not to sound too hopeful.

Kiba chewed for a few seconds before swallowing. "Naruto...this...this tastes awesome!" He grinned at the other boy, and Naruto couldn't help but feel a surge of warmth at the praise. He took another. "Ya did real good, Uzumaki!"

"Heh heh, thanks!" Naruto laughed, rubbing the back of his head and sitting down. Grabbing his own burger, he lifted it to his mouth and took his first bite.

Immediately, a storm of flavors exploded in his mouth. Juicy beef, savory spices, soft bun... his own eyes widened. "Oh, wow!" Naruto exclaimed, spraying a few bits of burger about, much to Kiba's disgust. "This IS really good!"

Kiba grimaced. "Yeah, yeah, say it, don't spray it." He was unable to keep his annoyed expression up for much longer, however, and he broke out in another goofy smile. Opening wide, he took another big bite of his burger.

Giggling, Naruto did the same, enjoying the flavors he'd created.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Uzumaki Burgers

choices: They find all of the ingredients to make cinnamon rolls.
They find a recipe book that was left in the warehouse.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
The two were surprised that they had finished all of the burgers so quickly. Kiba got a little carried away, and ate a majority of the burgers, leaving less for Naruto, who still had his fill. Akamaru even had a couple, and his slightly distended belly showed for it.

Both younger boys had stomachs that were filled enough to make considerable imprints on their upper garments. Since he ate the most, Kiba's belly was the biggest, lifting his hoodie ever so slightly, showing a thin sliver of net-covered flesh.

Kiba leaned back, put his hands behind his head and said, "Man, Naruto! I never thought that you would be such a good cook! You finally found your hidden talent."

Naruto replied excitedly, "Yeah, and the shadow clones help me cook as much as we want! I wonder if I can cook anything other than burgers? I wanna try making something else!"

Kiba was glad to hear that Naruto was willing to make more food, and he said, "There's still room in my belly! I can't wait! Let's look for ingredients!"

With that, the two boys set off, though with a bit more difficulty due to their bellies, and they searched for ingredients to make something else that Kiba learned to make from Hinata.

They continued to search through the virtual library of ingredients thinking of all of the possibilities.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Testing Naruto's new talent

choices: The boys finish the rolls, and Kiba takes a turn cooking
Partway through, Naruto decides to get some milk to go along with it
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Soon, Kiba and Naruto had gathered together all the necessary ingredients for cinnamon rolls, Hinata's favorite treat. Staggering under the sheer weight of all the items they held, the two nonetheless made it back to the kitchen and deposited everything on the table in a heap. Stepping back, they panted for a few seconds, attempting to regain their bearings.

"O...OK, Kiba," Naruto panted, walking over to the ingredients, "how do I make these things?" Making a series of hand signs, he materialized several Shadow Clones.

Wiping some sweat off his forehead, Kiba nonetheless grinned. "Alright, Naruto, here's what ya do..."

As Kiba gave the instructions, Naruto and the clones obeyed to the letter, mixing ingredients, making the dough, rolling it, and adding the cinnamon as needed, with a few more working on the frosting. Eventually, they'd finished the first batch. Rubbing their hands together eagerly, Naruto and his clones placed their trays inside the oven, and immediately began working on the next batch of both rolls and frosting. When the oven beeped, Naruto simply materialized more Shadow Clones and had them take it out and apply the frosting. Kiba, standing in the background, took a deep whiff, a goofy smile appearing on his face and a bit of drool appearing at the corner of his mouth.

Drooling a bit himself, Naruto nonetheless went about his work, making more and more of the treats and piling them on the table as they were completed. Within about a half an hour, dozens upon dozens of cinnamon rolls were piled upon the table, each looking amazing and smelling absolutely delectable.

Kiba and Naruto stared at the sight, mouths widened and drooling slightly. The dog-nin licked his lips. "Oh man, Naruto...these smell as amazing as Hinata's!" His slightly-stuffed tummy growled, and he rubbed it absentmindedly, not taking his eyes off the mounds of treats on the table. "I bet they're gonna taste awesome, too!" Without another word, he lunged towards the table, grabbing a couple of cinnamon rolls and cramming them into his mouth, his eyes lighting up as he chewed. Unable to help himself, Akamaru jumped off his head and began going to town on them as well.

Naruto, briefly taken aback, rushed towards the table as well. "No way, dog-breath! There's no way you're hoggin' everything this time!" As the last word left his mouth, he too began cramming cinnamon rolls into his waiting maw, his expression mirroring Kiba's as he tasted them. For several, blissful minutes, the boys and the dog gorged themselves, lost in the sweet flavors of the confection.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Savory Cinnamon Snacks

choices: "Wanna see who can drink the most milk?"
"Do you know any other recipes that go good with milk?"
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
After going through nearly a third of the pile, Akamaru was already done, as he began dozing off, laying on his back with his belly spreading his legs apart.

Naruto and Kiba were still working on the pile of cinnamon rolls, gleefully stuffing them down their maws. This time, they ate about the same amount, but due to the earlier burgers, Kiba's belly was slightly bigger.

Currently, their bellies had lifted their upper garments about halfway to their navels. Naruto's belly was entirely exposed under his black t-shirt, but Kiba's belly was still covered with his net shirt, as the bottom seam of his shirt was elastic, and it refused to be lifted by the growing protrusion even as his hoodie was long gone.

Suddenly, Naruto stood up, stumbling a bit as he did so. Kiba noticed this, left his food trance, and said, "What's up, Naruto?"

Naruto just smiled goofily, replying, "I'm thirsty, so I'm gonna fetch something to drink!"

Kiba then said, "Good! I'm thirsty, too."

"Wanna come with?" Naruto inquired.

"Nah, I don't wanna leave these cinnamon rolls!" Kiba answered, an evil grin forming on his face.

"Man, Kiba. I never knew you were such a pig!" Naruto teased.

Kiba's face then turned red, and he responded defensively, "You're one to talk! Besides, it's your fault for makin' the cinnamon rolls so good!"

Naruto grinned smugly at that, and he ran off excitedly, searching for a drink.

Kiba took this opportunity to stuff his face, his stomach lifting his hoodie up ever so slightly more with each bite. Either way he remained oblivious as Naruto arrived.

Actually, Naruto wasn't alone, as he, and about a half dozen more clones were hefting a large crate that had a seal that said, "Refrigerated"

Naruto and his clones then took the crate next to the table, within both boys' reach, and they dropped it, surprising Kiba, who flushed with embarrassment upon being discovered eating more cinnamon rolls.

Naruto was quite annoyed, but he opened the crate, grabbing a large jug of ice-cold milk and placing it on his side of the table. "I brought milk!" He exclaimed before taking a few large gulps straight out of the jug. He then proceeded to devour more cinnamon rolls, as he didn't want to miss out anymore.

Kiba shrugged, and grabbed a jug himself, taking a few swigs before he tore back into his side of the massive pile.

In less than twenty minutes, Kiba and Naruto had finally finished the pile. Naruto's stomach had lifted his shirt just above his navel, and the waistband of his shorts began to stretch. He was nearly able to catch up to Kiba, but Kiba still ate quite a bit more.

Kiba's belly was quite a bit larger, as it had lifted his hoodie a couple of inches above his navel. The bottom of his net shirt still stayed below his belly, and the area in front of his belly began to stretch, creating squares of flesh that stuck out in between the strings of fabric. His pants weren't doing so well, as there was considerable pressure on his pants button.

They had finished the cinnamon rolls, but they had only drank about one and a half jugs of milk each, and there was plenty still left in the crate.

Naruto was rubbing his belly unconsciously before he got an idea of how to deal with the milk. He asked Kiba...
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Fetching milk

choices: The boys continue drinking, and Kiba's net shirt continues to rip
Naruto, inspired by Kiba, decides to try snapping his waistband
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
A gleam lit up in Kiba's eyes at this, and he rubbed his own stomach thoughtfully. "Huh, lemme think; all those cinnamon rolls DID make me kinda thirsty..." He met Naruto's eyes with an eager grin. "Sure, why not?" Akamaru, though he had almost completely dozed off at this point, whined a bit at this exclamation.

Naruto returned the grin. "I was hoping you'd say that!" Without further preamble, Naruto seized the jug that he had already drained halfway and lifted it to his lips, chugging it down and not giving any notice to the milk that missed his mouth entirely and instead streamed down the side of his face.

"H-hey!" Kiba protested, grabbing his own half-filled jug. "No fair! I wasn't ready!" Scowling, he lifted the jug to his lips and began glugging it. Naruto, seeing this, scowled in return and picked up the pace, chugging the rest of the jug as fast as he could.

Within a matter of minutes, they had completely emptied their respective jugs. Without missing a beat, Naruto created a couple of Shadow Clones and had them push the crate forward, so it was within easy reach for both of them. With this taken care of, they reached over, grabbed a new jug each, and began going to town on it. The thick, savory liquid flowed down their throats and into their bellies, which, owing to their already-stuffed states, slowly inflated, almost like water being poured into a balloon. And, as the boys finished their second jugs and went on to tackle their third, fourth, and fifth jugs, their bellies continued to expand.

Naruto's stomach grew and grew, slowly stretching his waistband further as it pushed forward and grew heavier and heavier in his lap. In addition, his t-shirt slowly slid further up, slowly exposing more skin above his belly button.

Kiba's hoodie, likewise, hiked up higher and higher, moving even further above his belly button. His net shirt, though it still covered his belly, was starting to show strain; the engorged flesh of his belly was pressing hard against the netting, bulging out between the empty spaces of the garment even harder than before. In addition, more strain was being put upon his pants button, and Kiba winced as a bit of pain shot through his waistline. However, he pressed on, determined not to fall behind.

The boys continued going through the crate, and their bellies continued to grow, forcing their upper torso garments up higher and growing heavier in their laps; their legs were even beginning to become forced apart. Naruto's waistband continued to stretch, and his shirt continued to ride up. Kiba's hoodie continued to rise up, and his belly pressed even harder against his net shirt; in fact, some of the strands of netting were beginning to fray. In the meantime, his pants button had begun to get unbearably tight, and was now starting to quiver under the pressure. Feeling this, and knowing how it was likely going to end, Kiba nonetheless narrowed his eyes, tilted his current pitcher up (which still had half of its contents left), and began chugging like he'd never chugged before. The pressure in his waistline and in the area of the net shirt that surrounded his belly increased exponentially, but Kiba shrugged it off. More and more he chugged, until, finally, there was only a large mouthful left. Grinning wildly, Kiba tilted the pitcher back and gulped down the last of the milk...and set off a small chain reaction.

First, his pants button, no longer able to take the strain, popped off, shooting off and beaning Naruto in the nose just as he finished his own jug. He spluttered, but managed to keep the majority of the milk in his mouth. With this bit of extra room, his tummy surged forward a bit, just enough to strain his net shirt enough...

RRRRIP!

...to split a part of it open; specifically, the area around his navel. As a result, while the rest of his engorged belly was still covered by the net shirt, his bare belly button and a decent amount of skin around it now exposed itself to the world--or at least to Naruto.

Blushing a bit, Kiba nonetheless grit his teeth and seized another jug, beginning to down it just as ferociously. Naruto, wincing and rubbing his sore nose, still grabbed another jug; he'd kick Kiba's ass for that button thing later...
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: "Wanna see who can drink the most milk?"

choices: They drink a few more jugs before passing out.
They are able to finish all of the milk.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Naruto smirked a smirk that scared Kiba a bit, and right after he finished his jug he grabbed a jug in each hand.

"Is he really gonna?" Kiba thought as Naruto opened both jugs, then he crammed both of them in his mouth, downing milk twice as fast as he had been.

Kiba was about to do the same, but he remembered that he had hogged the burgers and cinnamon rolls, so he decided to let Naruto go to town on the milk. He shrugged and returned to his jug, watching Naruto the entire time.

Naruto paid no mind, as he was too busy concentrating on breaking his waistband. Kiba watched in awe as Naruto's stomach pushed out visibly, lifting his shirt all the way off and putting considerable strain on his waistband.

Kiba was still drinking milk himself while he did this, so the ring of intact threads around his belly began to strain. They gave away soon, but Kiba soon found out that the snapping of his net shirt was nothing.

Naruto's stomach had already surpassed Kiba's by now, and now it was being bisected by his elastic waistband, which made slight tearing sounds as it began to break down thread by thread.

Finally, the waistband would have no more, and it snapped violently, causing a loud crack that even woke Akamaru up. Kiba was startled even though he was expecting it, and Naruto placed his nearly empty jugs down, smiling at Kiba smugly.

The snapping of Naruto's waistband caused a chain reaction. First, his stomach flopped outwards violently, wobbling profusely as it did so. A large tear down the front of Naruto's shorts was created in it's wake, and it surged outwards like a tsunami, smacking against the table, causing Naruto to wince slightly after his smug smile.

Soon enough, the two were back at it, grabbing more jugs and downing them, though Naruto went back drinking one at a time. Even through all of this, the crate was still slightly over half full.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Naruto, inspired by Kiba, decides to try snappi...

choices: They wake up later and decide to see if the warehouse has premade food
They wake up and decide to make something with the remaining milk
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
At this point, Naruto and Kiba began to slow down; the combination of burgers, cinnamon rolls, and milk had begun to take their toll on the two youngsters. As a result, instead of glugging the milk down enthusiastically, they sluggishly gulped it down, wincing a bit as it surged into their already-overfilled bellies. Naruto's stomach pressed a bit harder against the table as he drank more milk, and Kiba's belly slowly got closer to the table as he drank. In addition, the little dog-nin's zipper slowly slid downwards as he drank his milk, gradually opening his fly in the process.

Finally, after they'd finished a little over half the crate, Naruto and Kiba let their arms drop to their sides, the empty pitchers falling out of their hands. "Ooh...so much milk..." Naruto groaned, letting his head tilt back.

Kiba, groaning, nodded. "Maybe...maybe drinking so much wasn't such a good idea..." His sentence was suddenly interrupted by a rather queasy-sounding burp. Groaning again, he let his own head tilt back.

Moaning, Naruto replied, "It...seemed like a good idea at the time..." Suddenly, he yawned widely. "Mmm...I'm feelin' kinda sleepy..."

Letting out another burp, Kiba ran his tongue along his lips. "Yeah...me too." To punctuate this, he let out a loud yawn of his own. "I'm just gonna...rest my eyes for a second." He let his eyes fall shut; within a matter of seconds, he was snoring.

Burping, Naruto sighed. "Sounds like...sounds like a plan, Kiba." He shut his eyes, and soon, he was snoring just as his friend was, a tiny bit of drool collecting at the corner of his mouth.

Groaning himself, Akamaru struggled to his feet, fighting off his own sleepiness to take a better look at the two sleeping boys. Kiba's hoodie now rode completely over his belly, and nearly all of the net shirt that had covered his belly had busted, letting his swollen, bare tummy hang out for everyone to see; at this point, only the elastic bottom and the netting covering the chest remained intact. In addition, his pants button was missing and his fly was partially undone, giving a glimpse of white through the opening.

Naruto's shirt, like Kiba's hoodie, rode completely over his engorged tummy, exposing the appendage in its entirety (miraculously, both his and Kiba's navels were still in their natural shape of pits). His shorts had a rather sizable tear down the middle, giving a rather distinct glimpse of green. His stomach pressed against the table, but not so much that it was squished.

Akamaru rolled his eyes, but seeing them like this--small, sleepy, and full--gave him a funny sensation in his chest, and not an unpleasant one. Deciding to sleep on it, Akamaru dropped to the table and rolled onto his back, stuffed tummy wobbling. In a matter of minutes, he, too, was blissfully slumbering away.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Naptime

choices: As they were hoping, the room was full of crates of premade food.
The room was a gigantic kitchen with very modern cooking equipment.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
After a nice, long nap, the two woke up, and their bellies were almost gone, though their clothes were still ravaged, Kiba's net shirt torn apart, his pants button missing, Naruto's waistband completely snapped.

"That was a good nap. Man, I'm starved!" Naruto exclaimed as he rubbed the sleep out of his eyes.

"You said it!" Kiba replied before saying, "Hey, do you wanna make something? You are the good chef here!"

Naruto smiled at the compliment and said, "Nah, I wanna take it easy. Let's see if they have premade food."

Kiba nodded in agreement, and he woke up Akamaru, telling him to come with them. Akamaru was tired though, and grumbled, "I need my sleep!" Kiba rolled his eyes, and he decided to pick up Akamaru, and lay him down in the front of his hoodie like he used to.

Akamaru settled back in, falling asleep quickly as the two boys set off.

Kiba's hoddie had fallen back down to its normal position, covering his torn net shirt and the small bulge that barely made itself visible. He had zipped up his pants, and luckily, that was enough to suffice.

Naruto had more difficulty, on the other hand. They were going fairly slowly because Naruto was holding up his shorts the entire time, as his waistband had snapped, and that left a giant tear on the front. He was able to cover his underwear, though, so Kiba couldn't get in a few laughs.

Either way, on one side of the giant room they found a huge pair of double doors.

"How could we have missed that!" Kiba blurted out, waking up Akamaru, as he set his eyes on the massive door.

Naruto just ignored him, as he was currently struggling to open one of the doors. Seeing this, Kiba decided to help, and the two youngsters pushed on the heavy door with all of their might.

Finally, the door had given up, and it slowly fell backwards. Unfortunately, this sent the two tumbling onto the ground, as they were using the door for balance. The two tumbled over each other, and wound up on the floor, with Akamaru jumping out of Kiba's hoodie just in time.

Either way, since Naruto's shorts were torn so much, and he wasn't hanging on to them, they slid down to his ankles, resting on his sandals, revealing his undergarment, which was a pair of small, green boxer briefs, which were speckled with various ramen fixins, including the fishcake that shared his name.

Kiba began laughing hysterically at that, standing up in the process. When he stood up though, his pants fell slightly, and the zipper, weakened from all of the strain, fell downwards, loosening his pants enough to allow them to fall.

This time Naruto got the laugh, as Kiba's underwear was a pair of white briefs with various anthropomorphic cartoon dogs plastered all over it. Naruto was laughing hysterically as Kiba blushed, but soon enough, Naruto pulled up his pants, and went up to Kiba, punching him in the arm.

Kiba was comforted by that, and he pulled up his own pants, smirking. The two finally saw just what the room contained as they turned around.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: They wake up later and decide to see if the war...

choices: They finish their first crates, and immediately tackle more crates
They finish their first crates, but have difficulty getting out
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
The boys eyes widened as, true to their hopes, the room was filled practically to the brim with crates. As their eyes moved over the crates, scanning their labels, grins formed on their faces, which only continued to widen as they found each successive label: Candy, ice cream, potato chips, soda, cupcakes... In spite of the fact they were still digesting what was left of their massive meal earlier, their stomachs growled. Naruto, licking his lips, held onto his shorts with one hand, rubbing his stomach with the other. "Oh man...I don't know where to start!"

Kiba, hiking his pants up a bit for safety, continued scanning the crates. "Yeah, me neither; it all sounds good..." his mouth abruptly shut as his eyes fell upon a crate labeled "jerky". Notably, Akamaru's eyes bugged out as well. "On second thought, I know exactly where to start." He rushed towards the crate. "Dibs on the jerky!" Akamaru, barking happily, followed him.

Rolling his eyes, Naruto continued scanning the room, eventually selecting a crate labeled "fudge". Hands holding up his ruined shorts, he made his way over to the crate.

Once Kiba had reached the crate of jerky, he grabbed the edge and, with a mighty grunt, dislodged the top...and immediately began drooling at the sights and scents that met him.

The crate was filled to the absolute brim with jerky, which looked tough and chewy-just the way he liked it. In addition, judging from the fresh smell, it was almost as though they'd just been made. "But that's impossible," Kiba thought, scratching his head. "Unless..." He took a closer look at the outside of the crate; sure enough, the same green glow that had surrounded the ingredient crates permeated this one as well; evidently, it was meant to preserve freshness.

Kiba reached in to grab a couple handfuls, but upon seeing just how big the crate was up close, he got an even better idea. Grin lighting up his face, he took a few steps back. Akamaru raised an eyebrow. Uh, Kiba? What're you.... The dog swiftly got his answer as Kiba ran towards the crate, grabbing onto the rim as he got close and hauling himself in, plunging into the jerky.

Akamaru's eyes widened. Did he just...

Abruptly, Kiba's head abruptly shot up, poking out of the crate. "Well, c'mon, Akamaru, what're you waitin' for?" Grunting, he shifted and moved until Akamaru could see his shoulders and chest. Grinning, the boy leaned forward, stretching out his arms for Akamaru; just how big WAS the crate? Regardless, the dog was never one to turn down free jerky, so it was with an eager leap that he bounded into Kiba's outstretched arms. Laughing, Kiba brought his arms in, burrowing back into the jerky. Akamaru, jumping out of his arms and hopping on top of the jerky, gaped; the contents of the crate were covering everything but Kiba's head!

Laughing at Akamaru's expression, Kiba dove into the jerky, coming back up with a large mouthful. "C'mon, Akamaru!" he urged through a mouthful of jerky. "What're ya waitin' for? There's plenty!" Freeing one of his arms from within the small sea of jerky, he retrieved a huge handful and crammed it in his mouth. Wagging his tail, Akamaru burrowed down into the jerky, popping his head up a few seconds later with his own mouthful.

Naruto, who had at this point simply been eating the fudge (which was delicious, by the way) directly out of the crate, noticed what Kiba and Akamaru were doing. "Huh, that's not a bad idea," he thought, swallowing his current mouthful. "Maybe I'll give it a go..." Getting close to the rim of the open crate, he clambered clumsily over the top and landed with a thud in a veritable sea of fudge. Wincing, he nonetheless beamed at the sight, and submerged himself, burrowing into the fudge and taking huge mouthfuls.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Cratey, Snacky Goodness

choices: The two go right to the next food.
The two decided to get a "quick" drink first.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Naruto was having an easy time with the fudge, as it was nice and soft and it practically melted in his mouth. Naruto chose to make a sort of pit for himself, then he sat in the pit, grabbing handfuls of fudge that were piled around him.

As he ate, his stomach pushed out steadily. Like always, his shirt could only handle so much of his belly, and it began rising. Soon enough, he was sitting in the bottom of the box, rubbing his overfilled belly, which had since lifted up his t-shirt all of the way. It now rested heavily on his lap, extending about halfway to his knees.

When Kiba ate, he chose a different method, digging under the beef jerky, grabbing anything in his way with his mouth. With his Inuzuka teeth, jerky wasn't nearly as difficult to chew for him, as he tore through it easily. Either way, he laid on his back at the bottom of the pile of jerky, shoving the pieces that remained on top of him into his face.

Akamaru took a different approach, resting at the top as he ate any jerky within reach of his mouth.

Either way, both of their bellies expanded quickly as they gorged themselves with the cured meat. Kiba's hoddie rose, and his stomach pushed outwards quickly, finding space in the hole in the front of his net shirt. He prepared ahead of time, unzipping his zipper all the way.

Akamaru's furry belly made its way towards the floor from his standing position. Soon enough, it reached the floor and began spreading his legs apart. Finally, just as his legs lost contact with the ground, he gave up, allowing Kiba to finish the rest.

Finally, Kiba was done with his stuffing fiasco, leaving his stomach in a similar state to Naruto, though on a slightly smaller scale.

Now finished with their first crates, the two clambered out of them, looking for the next ones to dive into. They were both thirsty, and they thought about finding something to drink before and while continuing the stuffing.

Naruto saw a crate that read "cookies", looking in to find all sorts of cookies stacked in the box. He also saw a crate that read "juice" that contained all sorts of fruit juices. He thought, "I'm thirsty, and I could use some juice, but cookies are delicious..."

Kiba saw a create that read "meat snacks". He peeked inside to see segments of meat sticks filling the crate. "That's just down my alley!" He thought. He also saw a crate that read soda, seeing a variety of different sodas on the inside, "I am parched, though..." He thought as he considered his decision."

The two were indeed quite similar, as they were about to make similar decisions.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: They finish their first crates, and immediately...

choices: Their thirst is eventually sated, and they continue gorging themselves
They finish all their drinks and take a break, playing with their bellies
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
It didn't take long for the two to decide: they were both incredibly thirsty, and they really needed a drink. To this end, they both began lurching towards their respective crate, bellies wobbling as they did so, Naruto still holding up his shorts. Akamaru, absolutely stuffed to the brim from the jerky, simply flopped onto his back and closed his eyes, eager to resume his nap.

In the meantime, the boys reached their crates. Licking their lips, they reached out and pried the tops of the crates open, revealing their contents. Naruto, within his crate, saw a variety, massive bottles of all different sorts of juice: apple, cranberry, grape, pineapple...his eyes lit up, and he tried to decide what to drink first.

Kiba, likewise, saw a variety of bottles as large as Naruto's, except with different sorts of sodas: regular, orange, root bear, grape, lime, ginger ale...he bit his lip, indecision warring inside him.

Finally, both boys came to a decision: Naruto seized a bottle of apple juice, Kiba a bottle of root bear. Twisting the caps off, they lifted the bottles to their lips and started chugging. Almost instantly, their bellies began expanding, pushing out further as the sweet liquid flooded down their gullets. As their midsections grew, their knees buckled a bit, but they managed to remain standing. Soon, their first drinks were finished, and they tossed the empty bottles aside. They reached inside for another bottle, but they stumbled forward, only steadying themselves by grabbing onto the rims of the crates.

Naruto and Kiba quickly realized the problem: if they kept drinking at this rate, it would become harder and harder to reach into the crate to get more drinks. Almost as soon as this thought entered their heads, an idea occurred to them. Smirking mischievously, they reached in with both hands, pulling out bottle after bottle and setting them on the floor around them. Eventually, they had it set up so that the remaining contents of each drink crate surrounded them. Nodding happily at their work, they each bent down and retrieved another bottle. As before, their stomachs swelled, and their knees continued to buckle. Finally, they gave way, and they each plopped flat on their rears. Unperturbed, they continued chugging, their bellies crawling more and more towards their knees. Once they'd finished their second bottles, they immediately reached out and grabbed another, and immediately recommenced chugging.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: The two decided to get a "quick" drink ...

choices: The two finish off the next box, and look for more.
The two are done whilst eating from their second boxes.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
After their fourth bottles, the two were temporarily satisfied with the drinks, and they proceeded to their next food boxes, seamlessly opening the boxes and flopping inside, with Naruto holding his destroyed shorts the entire time.

Soon enough, Naruto's hands found a pile of classic chocolate chip cookies, stuffing them into his face gleefully. As he proceeded through the cookies, his stomachs continued its slow advance forward, getting closer and closer to his knees. As he did this, his stomach filled the space that it used to, and his shorts were beginning to strain yet again.

Kiba, on the other hand, laid down on his back, contentedly stuffing handfuls of the meat segments into his hungry maw. At this point more segments of his net shirt were being strained by his growing belly.

Naruto's shorts promptly ripped afterwards, making the rip in his shorts larger and creating new ones that branched off of it. At about the same time, Kiba's net shirt ripped farther, the hole in it becoming even larger to accommodate for his stuffed stomach.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Their thirst is eventually sated, and they cont...

choices: The boys soon get stomachaches, and try to find their way back
The boys finish their crates, but can't get out of them
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Finally, both boys had finished off their crates, and were contentedly popping their fingers in and out of their mouths, attempting to get any crumbs they may have potentially missed. In the meantime, they tenderly massaged their engorged midsections with their other hands.

Naruto's t-shirt, in spite of resting on top of his belly, had begun straining at the bottom seams. More noticeably, though, the rips in his shorts that had begun branching off from the main rip (which had grown even further in size) had increased in both length and width, reaching towards the legs. The stomach itself easily filled the space between his midsection and knees, and his legs were starting to get forced apart.

Kiba's belly, on the other hand, had ripped his net shirt open even further, allowing his stomach to flop even further out and start to force his own legs apart, much like Naruto's was. At this point, nearly all of the front of his net shirt was split open, fully exposing his bare tummy; the only parts still intact were the threads covering his chest and the very bottom; however, even that elastic part of the net shirt was starting to get stretched to its limit. His pants, in spite of the fact that they were fully unzipped, were beginning to strain at the part where the zipper rested.

After lying down for a few minutes and resting, they finally decided that they were still hungry. Reaching their arms up and grabbing onto the edges of their crates, they hoisted themselves upright, and, with great difficulty, hoisted themselves out of their respective crates. They cried out as their overstuffed bellies caused them to stumble forward, but Kiba managed to reach out and hold onto his belly before it could cause him to topple over. Naruto, getting an idea, spread his legs as far apart as he could to keep his ruined shorts up and used his arms to support his belly as Kiba was. Balancing themselves as such, they looked about the room, eager to find something else to eat. It didn't take them long; Kiba sighted a crate of apples, while Naruto's eyes fell upon a crate of assorted candy. Licking their lips, they slowly set off towards the crates, Kiba lurching, Naruto waddling. Once they'd reached their chosen containers, they pried the tops off and clumsily struggled over the edge, their bellies making it very difficult to do so. Eventually, though, they fell with a plop into their selected foodstuffs.

Wincing and rubbing the back of his head, Naruto noticed, to his delight, that all the candies were unwrapped. Stretching his arms and legs out as far as they would go, he grabbed handfuls of all kinds of candy and shoved them in his mouth, chewing gleefully. As the candy entered his stomach, the bottom seams of his shirt continued to strain more, and the new rips in his shorts creaked and slowly expanded themselves.

Kiba, taking a similar tactic, grabbed an apple in each hand, taking huge bites out of each and discarding the cores, only to pick up two more and repeat the tactic. As he went through the apples, the elastic band of his net shirt continued to stretch, creaking audibly; it had never been made for this sort of thing.

Finally, once he'd racked up a dozen apples, it could take no more; with an almighty CRACK, his net shirt's elastic band finally snapped in two down the middle, the broken band of elastic lying beneath Kiba and sticking out to the sides. As it did this, his belly flopped even further outward, putting further strain on his undone pants. As a result, his zipper was forced down past the end of his fly, ripping his pants a bit. Kiba winced, but continued eating, determined not to let this small setback keep him from enjoying his crate of apples.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Apples and....Candy?

choices: The place where they just slept.
The exit to the forest.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
"Oh man." Kiba moaned, green in the face. He had eaten another two dozen apples, but that was about it for him. "Maybe I ate a little too much." He complained, stating the obvious. The rip on his pants had advanced about an inch farther from the growing girth that was his overfilled stomach.

Naruto was in much the same state, though he hadn't eaten quite as much, as all the overdose of sugar from the cookies and candy was taking its toll. He laid on his back, his shirt's bottom seam had given out in the process, and the rips on his shorts were ever so slightly larger.

The two didn't want to move, but they knew they had to, and after struggling to make it out of their respective boxes, the two gingerly made it back to the door that led to the room with raw ingredients. They merely exchanged looks, having a mutual understanding of their conundrum.

Luckily, Akamaru had waken up a bit earlier, and he had been watching for the past ten minutes. Not wanting to strain Kiba any farther, he remained on the floor at Kiba's side.

Using each other for support, the two stumbled along, trying to remember where the room that they slept in was. They made their way through the rows of crates, and if they disagreed on which direction to go, one of them would surprisingly submit, too tired and nauseous to argue otherwise.

Naruto broke the silence by jokingly saying, "Looks like you ate well, Kiba." The three chuckled a bit, and the group soon arrived at...
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: The boys soon get stomachaches, and try to find...

choices: After everything's digested, they wake up, change, and head into the village
While they sleep, someone from the village finds them
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Eventually, the two reached the kitchen where they had first eaten, but they had eyes only for the bedroom that was attached to it. "Dunno about you," Kiba moaned, burping queasily, "but I could REALLY go for a nap about now." Naruto, too nauseous to make a coherent reply, merely nodded. Akamaru, stowed away safely in Kiba's hoodie, was already dozing, sleeping off the effects of his massive meal.

Stumbling and groaning all the way and leaning on one another, they slowly made their way to the bed. Groaning, Kiba reached up, grabbing the edge of the bed and struggling to get on top. Finally, he managed to clamber up, and promptly rolled onto his back, engorged belly sticking up into the air.

Naruto stared at him, feeling conflicted; on the one hand, he wasn't sure how he felt about sharing a bed with Kiba, even if it wasn't for anything weird; after all, there were other beds in this place. A bolt of pain through his belly, though, reminded him that he was sick, tired, and he really wanted to sleep. Therefore, he reached up and clambered on top as well, opting to lay on his side away from Kiba. His belly stuck out in front of him, and he tenderly massaged it, trying to alleviate some of the pain.

"Hey, Naruto?" Kiba spoke up suddenly, his eyes closed.

Yawning, Naruto replied, "Yeah, Kiba?"

The little dog nin followed this with a yawn of his own. "This has been really fun, but what're we gonna do about clothes, even after our guts go down?"

Burping, Naruto blinked. "Whaddaya mean?"

Kiba yawned again. "Well, let's see; my net shirt's ripped, my pants are busted, your shorts are so ripped you hafta hold them up to keep them from falling down....Even after everything digests, what're we gonna wear?"

Naruto thought about this for a moment; that actually was a good question...

An idea occured to him, and he grinned. Making the necessary hand signs as he laid down, he created a non-stuffed Shadow clone, but this one was wearing a white t-shirt with a stylized flame symbol on the front and blue-black trousers. Rolling it's eyes, the clone went out of side and tossed its shirt and trousers off, leaving only its sandals and boxers. Grinning and thanking the clone, Naruto allowed it to dissipate; however, the clothes it had discarded remained.

Kiba, hearing the commotion, blinked open his eyes and looked over. "Huh, not bad, Naruto," he admitted, unable to suppress a smile. "Could you, uh, maybe do one for me?"

"Sure!" Naruto replied brightly, summoning another non-stuffed clone that was wearing the same garments as the one previously. Nodding, the clone held up its hands, ready to make the signs for the Transformation jutsu. The original turned towards Kiba. "So, what clothes would ya like?"

Kiba thought about it for a moment, then told Naruto, who told his clone. Nodding again, the clone transformed itself into an exact, non-stuffed copy of Kiba, albeit one wearing a tan, long-sleeved shirt with dark patches on the elbows and dark blue shorts that buttoned, unlike Naruto's current pair. Walking out of sight, the transformed clone repeated the process its predecessor did, shucking its garments and leaving only its undergarments and sandals. Naruto dismissed this one as well. "That should take care of that," Naruto nodded happily, before he yawned. "We can put 'em on when we wake up. G'night, Kiba." He closed his eyes.

Kiba rolled his eyes. "It's afternoon, dummy..." he began, before he heard Naruto already snoring. He smirked. "Ah, what the heck; g'night Naruto." Laughing, he closed his eyes, and soon he too was sleeping.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: A well-earned rest

choices: They are hungry yet again, and think about where to eat
They run into Shikamaru, who tells them that Tsunade is looking for them.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Soon enough, Naruto opened his eyes slowly, revealing that it was night, as a lamp on a nearby table was on. Naruto sat up, and he looked around to see that Kiba, whose belly was practically non-existent save a thin layer of fat, was currently changing. Kiba took no notice of him, as he slipped on his new shorts.

Naruto then rubbed the sleep out of eyes, inspecting his own belly to find a bit of pudge from eating all of the cookies and a lot of candy last night, not to mention the burgers, cinnamon rolls and milk. If it wasn't for his metabolism thanks in part to the nine tails, Naruto's stomach would have been much larger.

Either way, as Kiba put his sandals on, Naruto began changing himself. "Looks like someone finally woke up!" Kiba remarked. Naruto just replied, "Your hair says that you just woke up too." Kiba, a bit embarrassed, started fumbling with his hair, trying to fix his bedhead.

"We should probably get back to the village." Naruto pointed out. Kiba replied, "Yeah. People might be worryin' about us." With that, both boys shot off, starting a race without words as they tried to beat each other to the door on the opposite end of the large room.

Akamaru tried keeping up with them, that strange warm feeling coming back up in his chest. "Maybe I'm running too fast." He thought as he watched the two reach the door, tumbling over each other as they tried to stop their momentum.

Kiba then saw a switch that read "door", and he hit it, the door in front of them opening. There was another matching switch on the other side, and a the door above them opened. They climbed out using a ladder, and Kiba and Akamaru began sniffing the air looking for the village.

"You're wier" Naruto began before Kiba interrupted him, pointing in a direction and saying, "That way." The three ran in that direction, and, soon enough, they found themselves on top of a ledge overlooking the village. To the right, they could see the famous Hokage monument.

Soon the two were walking through the village again, thinking about what to do.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: After everything's digested, they wake up, ...

choices: "...go to Ichiraku's already?"
"...go get some barbecue, so ya stop whining?"
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
The two de-aged shinobi strolled through the village, attracting odd looks from their fellow villagers and even facepalms from a few they knew. They winced, feeling a little overwhelmed by the attention, but it quickly passed.

"So, Kiba," Naruto began, folding his arms behind his head, "whaddaya feel like doin' now?"

"Hmm," Kiba muttered, folding his arms as Akamaru shifted on his head, "well, we could take a dip at the hot springs, or maybe we could check out the playground 'cause it's probably deserted this time of night..."

His stomach suddenly let out a loud growl, and he blushed. "Or, uh, maybe we could grab some dinner."

Almost on cue, Naruto's stomach rumbled, and he rubbed it through his shirt. "Yeah, I could definitely go for something to eat about now..." His face lit up. "Ooh! Ya wanna go back to the buffet, Kiba?"

To both his and Akamaru's surprise, Kiba shook his head. "Nah, not tonight; I just wanna eat and not be watched by a huge freakin' crowd."

Naruto scratched the back of his head, laughing nervously. "Well, I guess you do have a point..." Naruto's head suddenly turned. "Ya wanna go to Ichiraku's?"

Kiba thought for a moment. "Well, there is that, or we could go to that barbecue place Shikamaru and his team like so much..."

"Oh, c'mon!" Naruto suddenly blurted out. "I really wanna go to Ichiraku's!"

"News flash, dummy," Kiba retorted, "Ya can't always get everything ya want! I wanna eat some meat!"

Naruto stomped up to Kiba and got in his face. "Well I wanna eat ramen!"

Kiba did the same. "I wanna eat meat!"

"Ramen!"

"Meat!"

"Ramen!"

"Meat!"

"Ramen!"

As their bickering drew on, Akamaru whined; they were gonna take all night, at this rate...

Luckily, they only continued arguing for a few minutes before they ran out of breath, and they backed away from each other. "Ya know," Naruto began, taking a particularly deep breath, "I'm too hungry to screw around. How about we just..."
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: They are hungry yet again, and think about wher...

choices: They finally find an empty table, and order the largest item that they find.
Team Asuma, sitting at a nearby table, spots them and invites them over.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Kiba was quite surprised that Naruto had finally conceded, glad that he got his way, and a bit annoyed that Naruto told him that he was whining, but he didn't retort, as he was too busy enjoying his little victory over Naruto.

Naruto did concede because he always went to Ichiraku's, and he could just go there tomorrow or something. He didn't like the slightly smug look on Kiba's face, but at least he was getting something to eat.

Either way, the two were soon at the barbecue place, and they looked around for a table to cook their meat and eat it at.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: "...go get some barbecue, so ya stop whinin...

choices: The boys continue eating uninterrupted
Choji and Shikamaru, having come in for a bite, notice them
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
Predictably, it didn't take the two long to find an empty table. Sliding into it, they made themselves comfortable, called a waiter over, and each ordered the single biggest item the restaurant had. The waiter's eyes bugged out; only the Akimichi kid had ever ordered that monster!

Still, the customer was always right, and the waiter, with a reluctant affirmative, had left the table, leaving the two boys to eagerly chat and discuss what the item could possibly be to elicit that kind of reaction out of the man; after all, they hadn't even looked at the menu.
