Their question was soon answered by the arrival of their dishes, at which point their expressions echoed the man's previous one. Each of them had received an absolutely massive dish of rice, complete with two heaping plates of various cuts of meat: beef, short ribs, pork, chicken...all of this was present and ready to be cooked.

"Let me, um, know if you boys need anything else," the man muttered, scuttling away from the table before the boys decided to take him up on that offer.

Neither boy moved: for a few seconds, all they did was gape at the massive dish of rice, then at each other, then at the huge plates of raw meat, then back to each other. Akamaru, though he was shocked as well, simply sighed as he perched on Kiba's head; this was going exactly how he thought it would. All that was missing was...

Almost on cue, the boys looked at each other, grinned, and split their chopsticks. With alarming speed, they ladled copious cuts of meat onto the grill in the center of the table, and followed that by practically spooning the rice into their mouths as they waited for the meat to be cooked.

Kiba, given that he enjoyed rare meat, only gave his meat enough time for it to be just cooked enough before lashing out with his chopsticks and forking piece after piece into his mouth. Grinning and closing his eyes, he chewed reluctantly, a bit of bloody juice dribbling down his chin, much to Naruto's disgust. He distracted himself by cramming more rice into his mouth, and continued to do so until his cuts of meat were cooked to satisfaction. Licking his lips, even though he already had rice in his mouth, he lashed out with his own chopsticks and put several pieces in his mouth, chewing and giggling at the tastes and sensations of the rice and the meat mixing together. As he chewed, he put more cuts of meat on the grill, even as Kiba did the same. Seeing how Naruto reacted to eating the rice and meat together, he forked a great deal into his maw, waiting a minute or two before his meat was cooked enough for his tastes, then crammed the cuts into his maw. He chewed...and his face promptly lit up. Oh, wow, this is good! Kiba thought, chewing happily even as he prepared more meat. Naruto actually had a good idea for once!

The boys continued on in this manner: forking rice into their mouths, cooking the meat, forking the meat in alongside the rice...as the minutes ticked by, Akamaru thought he saw the levels of both the rice and the meat start to go down, but just barely; there was a huge quantity of both. This is going exactly where I think it is, isn't it? he whined, covering his eyes with his ears.
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: They finally find an empty table, and order the...

choices: "I'll take you on now, but I'll go easy on you."
"I'll let you guys get back to your normal ages first. For now, lets eat!"
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.content:
"Hey! It's Naruto and Kiba!" Choji bellowed with jollity as he and Shikamaru made their way to Naruto and Kiba's table, with Shikamaru rolling his eyes at the sight of them. "How troublesome." He said.

"You guys look younger." Choji started as the boys' attention left their food. "Is it that chemical stuff that Shikamaru's been telling me about?" he asked suspiciously. The two nodded eagerly. "Better not tell Tsunade! She'll be mad." Naruto and Kiba got nervous thinking about what would have happened to them in that case.

Choji then continued, "I heard that you guys have been eating a lot lately!" Naruto happily responded, "Yeah! Maybe we'll even be able to take you on!" and though he was joking, Choji replied, "You wanna make it a challenge?"

Kiba was the one to respond this time, cockily demanding, "What'll you give us when you win?" Choji thought about it a bit, then said, "There's this secret Akimichi technique that makes your stomach more stretchy! You could use it on eating contests, or just for fun!"

Naruto and Kiba's eyes brightened at that, and Choji said, "If you lose, you guys have to pay for my food for an entire week!" The two boys then gulped at that. Akamaru watched, somewhat intrigued, while Shikamaru face palmed.

The two exclaimed "Deal!", and Choji, being a nice guy, said...
1111112112212221211122221212211122121111.title: Choji and Shikamaru, having come in for a bite,...

choices: "French fries!"
"Taffy!"
1111112112212221211122221212211122122.content:
Nearly everyone was surprised when they heard the announcement.

"Cola?! But that's a drink, not a food!" Naruto exclaimed, flabbergasted. Nearly everyone had a similar reaction of surprise, but they didn't express it like Naruto did, though Kiba did have a similar outburst, saying, "I thought this was a food festival!". Akamaru merely laid on his back, panting from the last round.

Soon enough Kiba and Naruto were deciding which of them should go. Kiba said, "I have an idea! Let me go! Besides, I ate a while ago and I have plenty of room."

"OK." Naruto replied skeptically. He was unsure of what Kiba was thinking.

Soon enough, Kiba was sitting at the table with Naruto next to him. Both of their bellies were quite distinguishable under their shirts. Naruto's shirt had even risen just the slightest bit. Either way, Kiba was soon presented with six half-gallon pitchers of cold soda. There was no ice in it, but the pitchers rested in a deep tray filled with ice to stay cold.

"What's your plan?" Naruto whispered to Kiba.

"I'm gonna drink the soda..." Kiba began before quickly being interrupted by Naruto, who screamed "What?! That's not a plan!" causing Kiba to recoil, covering his ears with his hands.

"Jeez, let me finish!" Kiba yelled. Soon enough, he had Naruto's attention, so he whispered, "When I take a breath, help me burp. It would be easier than me forcing it."

Naruto understood, and the light bulb went off in his head.

Kiba then lifted up one of the large pitchers, tipping the spout into his mouth and guzzling rapidly. After about thirty seconds, a time which impressed nearly everyone, he had gotten about halfway through the pitcher, and he took a breath.

As soon as he did so, Naruto slapped him on the back as hard as he could, causing Kiba to break into a fit of coughing mixed with burping.

"What the hell was that for?!! I'm not a baby!" Kiba yelled after he had maintained his composure.

"I thought it worked with normal-sized people, too!" Naruto protested.

"The gas is in my stomach! Push it out from there you idiot!" Kiba exclaimed, exasperated as the two were losing precious time.

Peeved, Naruto yelled, "I don't wanna touch your stomach!"

"Quit being a baby. Do you wanna win or not?" Kiba responded, surprisingly silencing Naruto, who simply nodded.

Soon enough, Kiba was back on a roll, and he was near the bottom of the pitcher when he went to take another breath. As soon as he did so, Naruto pushed on Kiba's distended stomach, forcing a gargantuan burp out.

Soon enough, the two began to gain momentum. Kiba finished the last pitcher, burping nearly immediately afterwards thanks to Naruto. Then he swiftly moved on to the next pitcher, his stomach beginning to lift his shirt at that point.

Every time Kiba drank, his stomach would start advancing forward noticeably, and when he took a breath, Naruto pushed on his stomach, causing it to retreat slightly as he burped.

After the second pitcher, Kiba's stomach had lifted his shirt up about an inch.

The third pitcher brought it up another inch.

The fourth brought Kiba's shirt just up to his navel, and his stomach began pressing uncomfortably on his pants button, but he was too focused on drinking the soda.

The fifth fully revealed Kiba's belly button, and as he finished that pitcher, and Naruto had "burped" him, he patted his belly proudly.

Finally, Kiba was on the sixth pitcher. Because he was fairly out of breath from the first five, he couldn't last as long, and it took five installments to finish this pitcher. When he did so, his shirt rested about halfway between his belly button and the top of his belly. Naruto squeezed out one final burp, one which shook nearly everything on the table.

Soon afterwards, the announcer yelled, "That's time!", signifying that the round was finished.

Kiba was tempted to stand up, but he was too exhausted, so he just laid back in his chair, panting while Naruto began working more of the gas out.

"Man Naruto. *Burp* I know this is *Burp* weird to say, but *Burp* you're really good at helping a man burp." Kiba mentioned with a satisfied grin on his face.

"Uhh, thanks." Naruto awkwardly replied as he continued to knead Kiba's belly, which sloshed around as he did so.

Kiba soon sat up and Naruto took his hands away. Kiba said, "Man, this feels really weird" as he grabbed his own belly and sloshed it around. He was then reminded of the pain of his waistband.

He then began struggling with his pants button, trying to work past his belly to unbutton it.

"Here, let me help you." Naruto offered, seeing Kiba's predicament. He then pushed Kiba's belly back while Kiba undid the button, freeing the appendage slightly.

"I thought you didn't want to touch my belly!" Kiba mocked.

Naruto then replied, "I was just helping a friend".

After a minute or so, the announcer chimed back in. "It's time for the next round, and that is..."
1111112112212221211122221212211122122.title: "Cola!"

choices: It was an attempt to capture Naruto, with an ambush waiting outside the village"
Luckily, it was a failed attempt to capture a shinobi in the next room."
11111121122122212112.content:
Once Kiba asked that, Shikamaru realized that he had not even bothered to investigate. He was so worried about making sure that Naruto and Kiba would be taken care of that he forgot to try discovering what could have caused this predicament in the first place.

At that, Shikamaru said, "I forgot. How troublesome. I should take care of that soon." He then formed the classic hand sign for the Shadow Clone Jutsu, and a Shikamaru clone appeared right next to him. "This will make it easier on Akamaru. Oh, and feel free to take some of the new clothes I brought."

"Wait, you're leaving already?" Naruto complained childishly as his eyes began welling up with tears. "Don't worry, Naruto. I'll still be here." The Shikamaru clone assured as he approached Naruto and patted him on the head gently. Naruto then hugged the Shikamaru clone, and Kiba soon followed suit.

Shikamaru then left, and he began gaining intel from the kitchen, intel that lead him to a group of Sound shinobi that was operating just outside the village. He then grumbled, "This doesn't sound good. I don't know if I can handle this by myself. How troublesome."

Meanwhile, at the hotel, the Shikamaru clone was back to watching his show about puzzles while Naruto and Kiba began bickering about the clothes, leading to a small tussle between them. "How troublesome." Shikamaru mumbled as he went to break the two up.

By that time, they were both crying out on the floor. Shikamaru wasn't much of an emotional person, and he didn't know how to respond. Either way, Naruto clutched onto Shikamaru as Kiba was comforted by Akamaru.

Soon enough, like all little kids, Kiba and Naruto bounced back quickly, and they began chasing each other around the room, giggling as if they had never been mad at each other. Soon enough, the Shikamaru clone returned with news.

"Alright, so this was caused by Sound Shinobi. Orochimaru's underling, Kabuto, has created a strange formula that, when ingested, will cause the consumer to regress in age to around 7, weakening the mental and emotional stability that is crucial to shinobi. Anyway, the effects will wear off eventually, and...
11111121122122212112.title: "Did you find out what coulda happened?"

choices: "I don't think the food will be able to make you any younger, so dig in."
"Lets find a place to eat at. I'm getting a little hungry myself."
1111112112212221212.content:
Naruto and Kiba, clad in only their smallest pairs of undies, were sitting on one of the beds together, watching a childish cartoon about dogs. Kiba loved to watch it as a kid, and he suddenly felt the urge to watch it again, so he decided to show it to Naruto. Akamaru, in Kiba form, was laying on the bed like a dog, diligently watching over the door and the window. Shikamaru was glad that they didn't get any younger.

The food was still there, and it was covered up with dish covers. The carts were heated, so the food stayed warm in case they needed it.

"You're finally here! It's about time" Kiba exclaimed, as Akamaru went back into his normal form with another poof of smoke. "Yeah, we're gettin' hungry here!" Naruto complained, patting his distended stomach, which surprisingly growled.

Both of their stomachs were actually quite soft instead of taut, indicating that their stomach still had quite a bit of room left in them.

"Let's get you dressed, first." Shikamaru responded, gesturing to the bags of clothes that he just bought. Kiba and Naruto agreed, and soon, Kiba was wandering to the bathroom, his arms overflowing with a pile of clothes that he haphazardly grabbed from the bags.

Soon enough, he exited, clad in a red t-shirt with a large dog bone printed across the chest that rested on the top of his stuffed belly. (Shikamaru knew that Kiba would love the shirt)

He also wore a pair of tan pants that were not zipped up or buttoned to make room for his belly, revealing the front patch of the new white briefs with various dog-related patterns on them.

It was Naruto's turn to change, and he emerged from the bathroom with a plain orange t-shirt and a pair of matching orange pants with black trim. His clothes were undone like Kiba's, revealing his pair of white briefs that had patterns of ramen bowls and chopsticks.

Soon enough, Kiba and Naruto were demanding food again.

"Haven't you eaten enough already?" Shikamaru inquired, patting Naruto's distended belly. "I guess, but we always eat like this!" Naruto complained. "Yeah, and our bellies always go away after we're done!" Kiba argued, backing Naruto up.

Akamaru sided with Shikamaru, but both of them soon realized that Naruto and Kiba would not give up.

"How troublesome." Shikamaru mumbled in his typical, annoyed manner. He gave in telling Kiba and Naruto...
1111112112212221212.title: They are awake, and hungry

choices: Follow them through from this point to the end; they tie
In the middle of eating, their navels suddenly invert, surprising them
11111122.content:
Akamaru watched as Naruto and Kiba continued gorging themselves, their respective stacks of bowls slowly growing in size, their stomachs getting closer to the cabinets, and their shirts beginning to rise up higher and higher.

Finally, as Naruto established a small lead, his belly finally made contact with the underside of the counter, at about the same time his shirt finally rose up just high enough to expose his navel. If he was aware of this, he gave no indication; rather, he simply continued attacking bowl after bowl, his stomach pressing harder and harder against the cabinets, wedging himself in further in the process. All the while, his shirt continued to inch upwards.

Kiba, noticing this, had picked up his pace, going through ramen bowls faster than he ever had before. As his result, his belly, formerly a few inches away from the cabinets, swiftly made contact, and only pushed harder and harder against the surface as he continued gulping down bowl after bowl. His shirt, as with Naruto's, hiked up higher and higher, revealing his belly button in short order and, in short order, going up even higher. Within a matter of minutes, he was keeping pace with Naruto.

Akamaru closed his eyes and wagged his tail smugly; even if ramen was Naruto's favorite food, there was no way he'd ever REALLY be able to beat Kiba...

The sound of straining fabric snapped him out of his reverie, and he refocused his attention on the two competing boys.

His ears perked up. Where was that noise coming from?

It was then he remembered; neither Naruto nor Kiba had bothered to undo their pants, and the tortured articles of clothings were now on their last legs, trying to hold fast against the ever-growing spheres of flesh pressing against them.

Akamaru whimpered, settling back down on his pillow and covering his eyes with his ears. Oh, this ain't gonna be good....

Naruto and Kiba both winced as the pressure around their waistlines became unbearable, but they pressed on, neither willing to give an inch. Meanwhile, their pants buttons quivered violently, before, finally...

POP!

Their pants buttons, unable to take any more pressure, burst off the fronts of their pants, striking the lower part of the counter and ricocheting, hitting them in their feet in the process. This small pain, however, was overwhelmed by the overwhelming sense of relief that came from their bellies finally getting more room. Predictably, they surged forward, wedging themselves even further in to their seats. While all this was going on, their flies were both forced down partway, though they still had a ways to go. Kiba and Naruto sighed in unison, grinning dopily.

"Oh man, that feels so much better..." Kiba moaned. He blinked, refocusing a bit. "But how..." His eyes widened as he realized that the pressure around his waist had suddenly abated. Reaching a hand under his belly, he blushed as he felt around his pants. "Ah, great, I blew my button out..."

Naruto looked over at him and laughed, until he felt an odd draft. "What the..." Confused, he reached under his belly, and soon began blushing as Kiba had. "Ah, crap..."

Watching this, Akamaru ventured a question at Kiba. So...is the contest over?

At this, Kiba's head whipped towards Akamaru. "You kidding, boy? No way! I'm not losing to this knucklehead!" Turning to the shocked Teuchi and Ayame, he raised an arm. "Oi! Keep the bowls coming!"

Naruto, shocked out of his embarrassment by Kiba's exclamation, grunted and raised his arm. "M-me too!"

Akamaru sighed, settling back down. Nothing else he could really do, anyway...

Where do you want to go from here?
11111122.title: Naruto and Kiba are oblivious, and continue to ...

choices: Soon, the bellies of Kiba and Naruto were touching.
Teuchi ran out food trying to satisfy the ravenous boys.
111111222.content:
Resigned, Akamakru decided to make the most of the situation, and watched silently as the two kept at it. It was amazing that Teuchi and Ayame were able to keep up.

The two were completely focused on their eating. They mindlessly stuffed themselves silly, trying to outdo each other in terms of pure ramen consumption, completely unaware as their stomachs continued advancing under the counter.

Due to the copious stuffing, the bellies of the young shinobi were stretched quite a bit. Soon, their exposed navels, which were actually hidden under the counter, began to shake slightly, the pressure causing discomfort in the competitors, though they were too occupied to notice.

Soon, the pressure was too much, and with a strange popping noise, Naruto's navel, which was originally a small pit in his abdomen, had inverted, becoming a small nub that stuck out due to the sheer pressure.

Naruto sighed in relief, gaining a look of confusion from Kiba, who felt the same sensation moments afterward. He followed suit in sighing. When he did so his belly moved, rubbing against the cabinet under the counter, and, due to the sensitivity of his new protruding navel, it tickled the small nub that was his belly button.

This other sensation was too much for Kiba who began to giggle. Naruto, who had stopped as well, asked, "What's so funny?!" In doing so, he moved his own belly, tickling himself in his bellybutton on the cabinet underneath.

Soon, both boys were in a fit of giggling, turned to copious laughter. Akamaru was completely confused, as the two most stubborn shinobi in existence, who had just been eating furiously, staring at each other with daggers, were now engaged in a feat of laughter, with their stomachs comically large, wedged under the counter.

Teuchi and Ayame were also puzzled by this sudden change in the boys' behavior. Teuchi was relieved, as the two boys had eaten a huge portion of his supply. He chose the wrong time to wait to stock up.

Either way, as suddenly as Naruto and Kiba had stopped to laugh, they glared at each other for a moment, then they simultaneously tore into their current bowl of ramen, each of them finishing their respective bowls in a matter of seconds.

The two boys continued their binge as if they hadn't stopped, and with each bowl, their bellies, having no room to push forward, began to advance out on either side of them along the underside of the counter, filling more and more space under said counter.
111111222.title: In the middle of eating, their navels suddenly ...

choices: Naruto and Kiba free themselves and try waddling home, but struggle
Naruto and Kiba are stuck, and they need help freeing their guts
1111112221.content:
As bowl after bowl vanished down Naruto and Kiba's throats, their bellies grew and grew, spreading out to the sides. Akamaru, meanwhile, watched, his mouth gaping open. He knew they were competitive, but this...

A few minutes passed, and their stomachs continued spreading out, the seams on the sides of their shirts creaking ominously. Finally, unable to handle any more pressure, the seams started to bust apart. If they noticed, the gave no indication, and they continued to stuff their faces. Akamaru continued to gape; only the seams on their sides of their shirts were being compromised, so it wasn't like they were going to rip off, but to see them taking such a beating was...weird, to say the very least.

Naruto winced as he felt his stomach tighten and fill out under the counter, but he pressed on. No way was he going to let Kiba beat him at his own...

Wait...was something touching his stomach?

Blinking, he snaked his arm under the counter, feeling around the bulbous sphere his stomach had become...

Head snapping up, Kiba swallowed his noodles and glared at Naruto. "Mind tellin' me what the hell you're doing, Naruto?"

Naruto looked at Kiba, glaring in return. "What are you talking about, dog breath?"

Kiba growled. "You're touching my gut, dumbass!"

Blinking, Naruto tilted his head. "Huh? What are you talking about? I'm touching my gut!"

Kiba narrowed his eyes. "No, I'm pretty sure you're touching my gut!" Smirking, he snaked his hand under. "Let's see how you like it..." His eyes suddenly bulged as he felt his own stomach. "What the..."

Naruto mirrored Kiba's expression as he felt his own stomach being touched. "Ah, man. Don't tell me..."

Glancing at each other and gulping, they shifted a bit further back (though their guts were still firmly wedged under the counter) and looked down, confirming their worst fears: their stomachs had grown so much out to the sides that they had began pressing against one another.

Both boys blushed intensely, and did their best not to look at one another. Meanwhile, Akamaru looked at them and wagged his tail, shaking with mirth.

Noticing this, Teuchi coughed, clearing his throat. "Um, are you boys..."

"Y-yeah, we're done," Naruto mumbled still blushing intensely. Kiba, too embarrassed to say anything, merely nodded.

Nearby, Akamaru let out a sigh of relief. Phew; glad that's over...
1111112221.title: Soon, the bellies of Kiba and Naruto were touch...

choices: There is a knock at the door, surprising Naruto, who was still in his boxers.
Naruto gets dressed and decides to head out.
11111122211.content:
As quickly as possible, both of the young shinobi struggled to scoot their stools back to free themselves, but they were wedged in fairly tight.

After quite a bit of struggle, Naruto was the first to free himself, breaking the suction, creating a violent plopping sound.

Kiba stopped struggling to investigate the sound, looking at Naruto, who had managed to maintain his balance on his stool, and was sitting back on it, his stomach protruding all the way to the counter, topped with an inverted navel that stuck out for the whole world to see.

His stomach itself was enormously engorged with ramen, and even without being wedged under the counter, it stuck out to his sides by about four inches on each side, the massive bulbous appendage sticking out at least a foot in front of him.

"Man, that was hard, but it feels so good!" Naruto blurted out, his embarrassment and urgency replaced with relief and satisfaction as he temporarily forgot what had just happened. He absentmindedly massaged the massive protrusion of his midsection, fully sated by his massive feast.

Kiba stared on awkwardly, wondering why Naruto wasn't as embarrassed as he was, and his leaning back soon caused his stomach to pop out from under the counter, sending him falling backwards.

Luckily, he was able to catch himself, and he held on to the counter, letting the stool fall as he positioned himself in a standing position. He sighed in relief, as his stomach, which was around the same size as Naruto's was freed, and he had a center of balance again, thanks to the help of the counter. Either way, Akamaru couldn't help but chuckle to himself at the sight.

This caught Naruto's attention, and soon, the two made eye contact again, their faces flushing deep red yet again as they remembered their recent encounter.

At this, the two turned away from each other, and Naruto managed to stand up, again using the counter to balance himself.

The two continued to face away from each other as they struggled to reach their respective wallets to pay for their respective meals. They forgot about the challenge because they were so embarrassed. Naruto, being Naruto, affectionately stroked his frog wallet (which was as stuffed as he was) with his finger as he got the money to pay for it.

Once that was over, the two began to let go of the counter, each of them waving their arms in an attempt to find their centers of balance. Akamaru was giggling again, with Kiba becoming more embarrassed at that.

Soon enough, the two were slowly but surely waddling towards their homes, struggling to maintain balance, ignoring strange looks in their concentration. Because their pants buttons were gone, they both had to hold their pants up with one hand, balancing with the other.

"Why did you have to laugh back there?" Kiba inquired to his trusty ninken, offended that his best friend just ridiculed him.

Akamaru replied simply, "It was pretty funny, and I was laughing at Naruto, too!"

"That's true. He is such an idiot sometimes!" Kiba replied, cheering himself up.

Soon enough, both pre-teens had found their respective apartments. Kiba was especially glad that his mother and sister had gone on a mission together earlier that day, giving him the house alone.

Upon entering his house, Naruto managed to remove his sandals, trying to work around his belly in the process. He also discarded the destroyed shirt and slipped out of his pants, an easy task as they were already unbuttoned. Clad in only a pair of orange plaid boxers, he then lumbered to the couch and collapsed, lying on his back, and he quickly fell asleep, despite it only being 4 in the afternoon.

Kiba hadn't bothered to undress upon his arrival, only removing his destroyed t-shirt. He merely plopped himself on the nearest couch, laying in much the same fashion as Naruto, rubbing his belly with a queasy expression on his face. He was still proud of himself, and couldn't help but feel that way as well. He also melted into a solid slumber.

Soon enough, Naruto's eyes eased open as he took in his surroundings. His hands, which were originally resting on his gigantic tummy, had since migrated downward as digestion occurred, and now they rested on a tiny potbelly that was currently there. His stomach had stretched out considerably, and there was a small layer of fat covering his abs, though that could be easily worked off.

Naruto was still quite tired, and he laid on the couch for a while, listening to the mid-morning sounds of birds chirping, basking in the sunlight that flooded into his apartment. He also basked in the fact that he still had no missions, and he was free to train or just relax at home.
11111122211.title: Naruto and Kiba free themselves and try waddlin...

choices: En route to the training grounds, Naruto gets hungry again
Naruto reaches the training grounds, but runs into one of his friends there
111111222112.content:
His hands wandering back down to his stomach, Naruto pinched the small bit of fat that had developed over his belly, grimacing. "Ugh...better do something about this; I don't wanna end up like Choji." To that end, he got up, walked over to his closet, and pulled out some new clothes; specifically, a pair of blue-black trousers and a white, short-sleeved shirt with Konoha's symbol on the front and the sleeves. They were, essentially, a larger version of some clothes he had liked to wear as a young child. Comfy to wear, and nice for a bit of light training...they would do nicely.

Slipping on the pants, Naruto zipped them up and, with a bit of struggle, buttoned them; they were a bit snug, but nothing that couldn't be fixed once he fully worked off his massive meal. Then, grabbing the shirt, he slipped it on and pulled it down. His stomach pressed against it slightly and somewhat noticeably, but it nonetheless remained confined underneath the article of clothing.

Looking down at himself and smirking in satisfaction, Naruto walked over to his door, where he had thrown his sandals. Bending down, he slipped them on and fastened them firmly. Nodding, Naruto stood back up, straightened his clothes one more time, and headed out the door.
111111222112.title: Naruto gets dressed and decides to head out.

choices: He goes to Ichiraku's, and sticks to his word, only having a bit before training
He finds a new place, finding one of his friends there, so he gets carried away.
1111112221121.content:
Naruto was casually strolling through the leaf village, his arms crossed behind his head as the mid-morning sun coated the village in a pleasant light. As various restaurants were cooking breakfasts, smells began to waft towards Naruto, reminding him that he had not eaten breakfast yet.

A loud growl from his stomach confirmed this, and he thought out loud, "I guess I can't starve myself either. Besides, it'll only be a light snack. I'll work it off training today." With a new goal in mind, he changed his direction, determined to stop his persistent hunger.
1111112221121.title: En route to the training grounds, Naruto gets h...

choices: Gaara
Sai
11113.content: Who else should it be?
11113.title: Someone else

choices: Kiba
More choices
111132.content: Sai isn't really a part of the Naruto series until Shippuden, so here's another suggestion.
111132.title: This isn't Shippuden

choices: He gets carried away relaxing after a mission.
Something else.
1111321.content: Why is he stuffing himself?
1111321.title: Kiba

choices: Akamaru stays asleep as Kiba dove into the meaty treats.
The smell of the jerky caught Akamaru's attention.
11113211.content:
Kiba had just finished a fairly difficult mission, as he was escorting the fire daimyo's nephew to a village on the outskirts of the land of fire, where his girlfriend lived, working with the rest of team eight. The long trip and the near constant stream of bandits was exhausting.

He burst into his house, ready to sit down and relax for once, and he found a note on the dining room table. "Awesome!" Kiba exclaimed, "We get the house to ourselves, buddy!" He burst out because he just found out that his mom was busy tracking down a missing-nin, and his sister was in a nearby village, watching over the village's farms, which recently had some of their cattle stolen. It was quite important, as those farms were where much of the village's food supply came from.

Anyway, Akamaru barked happily in response, settling on the arm of the couch, basking in the early summer sun. "It's nice to have my summer coat!" Akamaru thought as Kiba patted his head.

Kiba, on the other hand, removed his jacket, as he was starting to feel too hot, leaving him in just his fishnet undershirt. He was pretty hungry, so he began rummaging around the cupboards.

A smirk made its presence known on Kiba's face as he found a box filled to the brim with homemade jerky. Beef, turkey, chicken, and even pork jerkies were present. His sister had recently learned the family recipe for each jerky, and was practicing until she got it just right. This left a lot of leftover jerky, as his mom refused to sell jerky that wasn't perfect.

Being a dog clan, the Inuzuka's loved meat, and because of this, they had a tradition of making various meat products for the village, and their meats even became somewhat of a tourist attraction in Konoha.

Either way, Kiba was glad that he could have all this extra jerky, so he eagerly lugged the box over to the kitchen table, though Akamaru didn't really notice, as he was already asleep. Taking a whiff of the spices and meat, Kiba figured that the smell would soon wake up his best friend.
11113211.title: He gets carried away relaxing after a mission.

choices: The two stay at the table, eventually depleting the box
Getting thirsty, Kiba gets something for the two of them to drink
111132112.content:
As Kiba plopped into a chair at the table and reached a hand into the box, the scent of the dried meats wafted into Akamaru's nostrils. Ears perking up, he sat up in his perch, his gaze falling upon the box of jerky on the table. His tail began wagging, and his mouth fell open. Ohhh...that smells so good...

Tensing his legs, Akamaru leapt off the arm of the couch he'd been resting on and rushed towards the scent and into the kitchen. As he came into the room, he saw Kiba retrieving a large handful of jerky from the box. His ears perked up even more. Homemade jerky! Barking and yipping happily, Akamaru bounded up to the table.

Kiba, the jerky halfway to his mouth, turned his head and looked down to see his buddy at the base of his seat, barking and practically hopping in place. Laughing, Kiba set the jerky on the table and held his arms out towards the floor. "Heh; don't worry, buddy, I didn't forget about you." Barking happily, Akamaru hopped into his arms. Sitting back up, Kiba deposited the tiny dog onto the table. Barking in thanks, Akamaru snapped up a piece of beef jerky and began gnawing on it happily. Smiling at his friend's contentment, Kiba reached into the large box with both hands and retrieved two more huge handfuls of jerky.

Plopping them onto the table, he grabbed a piece in each hand and ripped off about half of each in one mouthful. He spent a few seconds chewing the halves before he crammed the remaining halves into his mouth. He chewed for a few more seconds before swallowing. Licking his lips, he grinned. "Beef and pork...oh yeah." Grabbing a few more pieces of jerky-this time with a few in each hand-he took big bites of each of them, throwing the remainder in his mouth and repeating the process. All the while, he savored the myriad tastes that came to his tongue: beef, chicken, pork, turkey...mixed together with the spices with which they'd been treated, it created a mixture of flavors and textures that left Kiba hungry for more. As such, he picked up his pace; grabbing more at a time, going through them quicker...

Akamaru, likewise, had become delighted with the different flavors, and began ripping off big pieces of jerky at a time. In the back of his mind, he felt a bit nervous-he knew how this could end, after all-but he just couldn't help it. It all tasted so good...

About half an hour later and several piles of jerky later-which still left the box with a great deal more than half of its original contents-Kiba and Akamaru let out satisfied burps. Leaning back in his chair, Kiba licked his lips and patted his belly. "Mmm...Hana really outdid herself this time, huh, Akamaru?" Feeling it to be oddly curved, he looked down at his stomach, even as he patted it. It had begun to round out a bit, beginning to push very slightly and almost invisibly against his fishnet shirt.

Akamaru, lying down his side, glanced down at his own stomach. It had begun to fill out, rounding out the tiniest bit. Yeah; we're gonna hafta ask what her secret is.

Kiba laughed, retrieving another big handful and depositing it on the table for the two of them. "Sounds like a plan. For now, though, let's go on!" He popped an entire piece of beef jerky into his mouth. "This is too good to pass up!"

Akamaru sighed. I can't believe I'm saying this, but... He got to his paws and attacked another piece of jerky. Let's go!
111132112.title: The smell of the jerky caught Akamaru's att...

choices: A few two liter bottles of soda.
A couple gallons of milk and juice.
1111321122.content:
"As good as this jerky is," Kiba said as he tried to catch his breath, "It's still dry. I'm gonna get a drink!" Akamaru took that chance to take a break, and he examined his stomach, which was now distended quite a bit.

Kiba, on the other hand, rummaged through the fridge, and while he tried to find something to drink, he spotted a couple more boxes. He opened them to find more meat products, uncooked sausage, meat sticks, and other cured meats. He smiled, thinking, "At least Hana's been busy lately!"

He didn't take the other meats out yet, but kept them in mind as he did take out...
1111321122.title: Getting thirsty, Kiba gets something for the tw...

choices: The two finish the box, and decide to sleep it off
The two finish the box, and retrieve the rest of the meat Kiba found
11113211222.content:
Kiba grinned widely as he saw several gallons of milk and different kinds of juice in the fridge. "Heh; bingo," he muttered, grabbing a huge armful and lugging them over to the table, plopping them all down. Akamaru, stumbling to his paws, gaped at them all.

Uh, Kiba, he started, staring at the gallons of liquid on the table, I'm thirsty too, but don't you think this is overdoing it a bit?

Smirking, Kiba ruffled Akamaru's head. "Nah, it's fine; we've still got a ton of this box left, and I found a bunch of other meat in the fridge! We're gonna need all this if we're gonna tackle that, too!"

Akamaru's eyes bugged out, going to the box of jerky on the table-still filled at least halfway-then to his friend. Please tell me you're joking, he whined. I mean, we're already halfway through, and...just look at your stomach!

Blinking, Kiba looked down. "Huh? My stomach?"

As Kiba had gorged on the jerky, his stomach had started to push out more, taking on more and more of distinctive round shape. In addition, it now pushed far more visibly against his net shirt, and it appeared as though he were hiding some sort of lump underneath the piece of clothing.

To Akamaru's dismay, Kiba merely grinned and smacked his belly. "Ah, relax, Akamaru! We've got a few days off, and you know how fast my metabolism is; what's the problem with letting loose every now and then?" Without waiting for Akamaru's answer, he plopped back in his seat, reached into the box, and retrieved another handful of jerky, cramming the whole thing into his mouth and chewing rapidly, smiling dopily at the tastes that came to his mouth. He spent a few long seconds chewing before he grabbed a gallon of apple juice, popped the top off, and brought the whole thing to his lips, tilting his head back.

Akamaru watched, awed, as Kiba used the initial influx of juice to wash the jerky down, then continued to chug the gallon like there was no tomorrow. At the behest of some sudden urge, his gaze went to Kiba's midsection. To his shock, it seemed to swell as the liquid entered it, the lump underneath his net shirt growing.

Finally, after what seemed like an eternity, he slammed the now empty jug onto the table. Belching rudely, he wiped his sleeve across his mouth. "Ah, man, that hit the spot!" Standing up suddenly, he made his way over to the cabinets, retrieving several extremely large bowls. Bringing them back to the table, he set them down and filled them each with either juice or milk. Laughing good-naturedly, he pushed them all towards Akamaru, ruffling him on his head and setting more jerky in front of him as he did so. "Here ya go, buddy; drink up!" Making his way back over to the fridge, he retrieved yet more milk and juice, bringing it back to the table, popping the cap off a gallon of milk, and proceeding to chug it as he had the juice.

Watching in wonderment as Kiba's belly slowly swelled as the thick liquid entered it, Akamaru managed to tear his gaze away, eying the juice, milk, and jerky in front of him instead. He spared another glance at Kiba, his jug almost depleted and an arm already reaching towards more jerky. Akamaru gave a resigned sigh. Well, we are on break... He looked again at his treats.

Screw it; I'm parched, anyway. This thought in mind, Akamaru trotted towards one of the juice bowls and began lapping it up. His tail began wagging. Mmm...grape! He began lapping it up with more enthusiasm, ripping a bite out of his jerky every now and then. As he tackled more of the jerky and drinks, his stomach began growing at a slower pace than Kiba's, but he did not let up. Meanwhile, Kiba was still going full-stop on his jerky and drink, his belly continuing to swell as cured meat, juice, and milk were crammed into it.
11113211222.title: A couple gallons of milk and juice.

choices: The two wake up early the next morning.
A knock at the door wakes them up.
111132112221.content:
Soon enough, both of them were back into the fray, wildly shoving the dried meat into their faces, taking the occasional swig of juice or milk. As they did so, both of their bellies were showing it.

Kiba's belly continued to challenge his net shirt, which was barely stretching to fit around the growing globe. With each bite of jerky or gulp of drink, his belly pressed harder and his shirt. That was nothing, though, compared to his pants, the button of which was quivering violently, threatening to pop off at any time.

Akamaru's belly continued to expand as well. He looked beyond pregnant as his belly pushed closer and closer to the floor. It also pushed on his legs quite a bit the more he ate.

Suddenly, Kiba reached his hand into the box to grab more jerky, but his hand wasn't successful in his search for more, and he exclaimed, "We finished the whole box, buddy!", proud of their accomplishment.

Akamaru couldn't help but feel proud as well. That was nothing!

Kiba then stood up, and the sudden shift in his weight caused his belly to sway, and that was the final straw for his shorts, the button of which popping off and ricocheting out the window. He could've sworn he heard someone say "Ow, that hurt!" from across the street, but he didn't care, as his shorts slipped down to the ground.

Kiba blushed a little, as his black boxer briefs were now out for the whole world see, before realizing that he was just with Akamaru, so he just discarded his pants, thinking "Mom's gonna kill me!" He looked over at Akamaru, finding that his companion was already sound asleep, laying on his back with his limbs in the air, his massive belly rising and falling with his breathing.

"That's a good idea, buddy!" Kiba said to himself as he removed his struggling net shirt, then plopped on the couch, falling asleep soon afterwards.
111132112221.title: The two finish the box, and decide to sleep it off

choices: Kiba goes to a restaurant renowned for having huge breakfasts
Kiba goes to a breakfast buffet
1111321122211.content:
The sun's rays shined in through Kiba's window, hitting him right in the face. "Ngghh..." Blearily, he he blinked open his eyes and turned his head towards the source of the disturbance. "It's...morning?" Yawning, Kiba sat up, clad in nothing but his black boxers, and scratched his belly absentmindedly; since the previous day, it had mostly gone down, though it was still rounded and pushed out a little bit.

Hearing the sound of a snore, Kiba looked towards the table and smiled warmly; Akamaru was still lying on his back, limbs in the air as he snoozed peacefully. Like Kiba, his massive meal of jerky, milk, and juice had mostly run its course, with only a curved little tummy to show for it. Kiba chuckled as the sunlight played across Akamaru's face, causing him to twitch and awaken. Mmm...wha? Yawning widely, Akamaru flipped over onto his belly, resting his head on his paws. Man, I slept great... Sensing Kiba, he looked up and wagged his tail. Mornin', Kiba; you sleep good?

Kiba sprang to his feet, stretching. "You bet I did!" He strode over to the table and gave Akamaru a pet, much to the dog's delight.

How much of that do ya think was the jerky? the dog asked, causing Kiba to chuckle.

"Dunno, buddy, but considering how good we slept, I ain't complaining." Almost on cue, Kiba's stomach let out a growl. Blushing a bit, he put a hand on it, smiling. "That reminds me; it's morning, isn't it?"

Tilting his head a bit, Akamaru, nonetheless wagged his tail. Yep; whaddaya ya wanna do for breakfast?

Folding his arms, Kiba closed his eyes. "Let's see; we could just have something here..." He opened his eyes and grinned. "...but this is my day off; I wanna go wild." He let off a little "heh!", showing off his sharp canines. "I got some cash to spare, so let's go get somethin' out!"

Akamaru yipped excitedly, getting to his paws. Sounds good to me! His eyes went down to Kiba's lower body. First, though, could ya put some clothes on?

Suddenly remembering he was only wearing his boxers, Kiba blushed and scratched the back of his head laughing nervously. "Oh yeah...heh heh. Gimme a sec." Still blushing, Kiba slinked off to his room to change.

A couple minutes later, Kiba emerged, wearing white pants and a black hoodie with a yellow stripe down the middle. As he planned to do some exercise that day, he also wore a net shirt underneath. "Alright, ya ready to go, buddy?"

Tensing his legs, Akamaru took a running start, leaping off the table and into Kiba's arms, where he was tucked comfortably into the hood of Kiba's hoodie (which, at the moment, was resting on his shoulder.) Let's go, partner!

Giving his partner an appreciative ruffle, Kiba darted towards the front door, opened it, and dashed out into Konoha's streets.
1111321122211.title: The two wake up early the next morning.

choices: The restaurant has a singular, gigantic meal that they use as a challenge.
The restaurant serves every single dish in massive proportions.
11113211222111.content:
Kiba decided to ask around, and in doing so, he received many recommendations to a diner that specialized in breakfast. Kiba was even told stories about the immense servings that they have.

He quickly located the place, Akamaru being a bit nervous, and he excitedly burst in, ready to have a big breakfast as he was taken to a booth by a waiter. Everything looked clean and new, and the morning sun shined warmly through the adjacent window. The servers were very polite and friendly, willing to cater to Kiba's every whim.

Kiba looked through the menu and soon realized what the gimmick of the restaurant was.
11113211222111.title: Kiba goes to a restaurant renowned for having h...

choices: Kiba finishes the pancakes and rests
The next course arrives while he's still working on the pancakes
111132112221112.content:
Kiba gaped as he looked through the menu. "Holy...is this for real?"

Fighting against the dread rising in his chest, Akamaru looked at the menu from his perch on Kiba's shoulder. In short order, his expression was mirroring Kiba's. Oh, you've gotta be kidding me...

Each and every item on the menu, from the biggest meal to the smallest side, was served massive proportions. Whether it was a twelve-stack of pancakes, two waffles with eight scoops of ice cream with all the fixings sandwiched between them, a six-egg omelet with all manner of meat and other such fillings crammed in, or even bacon stacked at least three plates high, this place didn't do anything halfway. What was more, each individual pancake, slice of french toast, waffle, what-have-you was ridiculously big, at least if the pictures were anything to go by.

As Kiba continued to scan the menu, a waiter came by. "Hello, sir. What can I get for you today?"

Kiba looked up at the waiter. "Um, hold on a sec..." He flipped through the menu for a few more seconds. His eyes widened as they fell upon a particularly huge item. Ah, what the hell; I have a few days off. "Can I get the Daimyo's Breakfast Feast?"

Akamaru's eyes bugged out, but the waiter only chuckled. "Feeling hungry today, are we?"

Feeling a bit sheepish, Kiba rubbed the back of his head, smiling. "Yeah, I guess so."

The waiter chuckled, scribbling something down on his notepad. "Very good. And what would you like to drink?"

"Huh?" Kiba looked over the menu. "Uh, I'll just do milk."

The man nodded, scribbling a final note down on his pad. "Excellent! I'll be right back." He gave Kiba an apologetic look. "And, erm, in regards to the size of the meal, it'll have to be delivered to your booth in several servings."

Smirking, Kiba leaned back in his seat, arms resting on the back of it. "It's OK; I don't have anything big planned, anyway."

The man beamed. "Excellent! The first portion should be out shortly." Turning around, he bustled to the kitchens to put Kiba's order in.

Once the man had left, Akamaru whined, rubbing up against Kiba's cheek. Kiba, I really don't think this is a good idea. You might make yourself sick if you try to down all that. Kiba smiled warmly, touched by his best buddy's concern.

In all honesty, he could understand why Akamaru was worried. After all, the Daimyo's Breakfast Feast was nothing to scoff at. It consisted of sixteen slices of french toast, eighteen pancakes, five waffles with ice cream slathered generously over them, seven scrambled eggs with copious amounts of cheese melted over it, ten slices of toast, and two plates of bacon and sausage that he could only assume would be overflowing.

"Thanks, Akamaru," he replied, scratching the tiny dog's ears. "Trust me, if I can't eat it all, I'll just take the rest home." Akamaru breathed a sigh of relief, his tail wagging.

The tail abruptly stopped wagging when Kiba grinned cockily and declared, "But I'm sure as hell gonna try to eat it all!" Akamaru simply whined at this.

Rubbing his friends head, Kiba settled back into his seat, waiting for the first course to come.

He didn't have to wait long, as a few minutes later, another waiter came up to his table, pushing a laden cart along and drawing the gasps of the other patrons. Kiba noticed the reactions first, wondering what the big deal was...right until the plate was plopped down in front of him. His eyes widened comically. "Whoa..."

Situated in front of him was the massive stack of eighteen pancakes, towering well above his head and already dripping with syrup and butter. And, as Kiba had suspected, each pancake was ludicrously big, each one at least the size of an average pizza (he'd gotten one a few weeks back, so he would know.) Akamaru said nothing, simply staring at the monstrosity in a combination of terror and awe. A second plate was set to the side, so some pancakes could be set aside to allow Kiba some access to the top of the stack.

Panting, the waiter retrieved two more items from the cart and plopped them next to Kiba; one was an empty glass, absolutely huge, while the other was a massive pitcher of milk. "Th-the next platter should be along shortly."

"Thanks," Kiba mumbled, only half-paying attention as he sized up the massive stack. Somehow, he didn't think that would be a problem.

Nodding breathlessly, the waiter towed the now-empty cart away, almost dreading what would be loaded on it next.

Kiba and Akamaru spent the next few minutes gaping at the stack of pancakes before them. Then, Kiba took a deep whiff. "Oh man, that smells awesome!" Pushing some of the pancakes off the stack and onto the second plate, he grabbed the pitcher and filled up his glass, licking his lips at the mighty stack (about eight pancakes) that still sat in front of him. "Hope it tastes as great as it smells!" Grabbing his provided fork and knife, he ripped off a huge chunk and placed it in his mouth, chewing. His face lit up as the pancake seemed to melt in his mouth, and a combination of savory sweet flavors assailed his tongue. Gulping it down, he grinned at Akamaru. "Man, these are amazing! Ya wanna bite, Akamaru?"

The dog shook his head. M-maybe in a bit, but I'm good right now.

Kiba shrugged good naturedly. "Alright; tell me when you want something." Without further preamble, he dove back into his pancakes, savoring every bite even as he gulped them down, taking intermittent swigs of his milk.
111132112221112.title: The restaurant serves every single dish in mass...

choices: Kiba goes with his plan.
One of Kiba's friends spots him, and is willing to help him finish.
1111321122211121.content:
Kiba's consumption of the pancakes was quite a sight to behold. He would use a knife to cut into the top of the pancakes, then he would make his way all the way to the bottom, until he essentially cut of a stack of eighteen pieces. He then grabbed the top half of the stack in one hand, grabbed the other half in the other hand, then stuffed them one by one into his maw, smiling cheerily as he chewed.

He continued this process until he had half of the pancakes gone. At this point, his stomach was distended quite considerably, lifting his hoodie almost to his belly button, revealing a wide strip of net-covered flesh. At this point, however, the structure of pancakes had become less sound, and Kiba barely saved it from falling over, the situation attracting some mildly interested looks from others in the restaurant.

Kiba disregarded this, as he held the portion of the stack that almost fell, which was the top six half pancakes. Shrugging, he took bites out of that mini stack, barely able to open his jaws enough to fit it in.

Soon enough he finished that, then finished the last twelve in much the same manner as he did when he first started. He patted his now larger belly in a satisfied manner, the appendage having lifted up his hoodie almost all the way to the top of his belly.

As Kiba waited for the rest of the meal, it became quite clear that he wouldn't quite be able to finish it all. As Kiba thought about this, the food settled in his stomach, making him feel full at first, but his stomach slowly stretched to accommodate as he waited, relieving the pressure and giving Kiba a new drive to continue.

Next came half of the bacon and sausage, with the waiter placing two considerable platters on the table, each piled high with their respective meats. The waiter politely asked, "How's the meal so far?" Kiba merely belched in response, smiling. The waiter chuckled at this saying, "Glad you're enjoying yourself! Let me know if you need anything!"

As Kiba looked at his platters, though, he remembered that he probably wouldn't be able to do it alone, and decided to eat as much as he can, then take the rest home if necessary.
1111321122211121.title: Kiba finishes the pancakes and rests

choices: The waffles with ice cream
The other half of the meat
11113211222111212.content:
Licking his lips, Kiba reached out towards his plate of bacon, intending to take a large handful. His fingers had just come within reach of the bacon when he heard the door to the diner open. Akamaru's ears perked up, but Kiba just shrugged and continued to reach for the bacon.

"I still can't believe I let you drag me here, Konohamaru..."

Kiba's eyes widened, and his hand once again stopped. "Naruto?" He wondered, looking towards the entrance.

Sure enough, there was the blonde genin, clad in a white t-shirt with a stylized flame symbol (not to be confused with Konoha's symbol) on the front, back, and sleeves, along with a pair of blue/black trousers. Beside him, a young boy with goggles on his head and a scarf around his neck, turned to him and looked up, folding his arms.

"Boss, I told ya, you can't eat ramen all the time. And besides, um..." He laughed nervously and rubbed the back of his head. "Uncle Asuma's on a mission right now, and I kinda feel weird eating by myself."

Whapping the boy lightly on the back of the head, Naruto turned away and folded his arms, grumbling. "Could be eating Ichiraku's right now..."

Akamaru stopped rubbing the sore spot and grinned at Naruto. "Ah, don't be like that, boss; I've heard this place has really awesome breakfasts!" Scanning the restaurant, his eyes settled on a certain very surprised dog-nin and his ninken. "See, that guy seems like he had a really good meal!"

Naruto scanned the diner. "What? What guy are you..." Konohamaru pointed, and Naruto followed it. His eyes widened. "Eh? Kiba?"

Smirking, Kiba waved. "Hey, guys." Akamaru barked a greeting, wagging his tail.

Noticing Kiba's swollen, net-shirt-covered belly, Naruto made his way over to his booth, not even waiting to be seated; Konohamaru followed close behind. "Damn, Kiba, what did you eat?"

Kiba burped, grinning. "Oh, just eighteen pizza-sized pancakes; it's the first course of the Daimyo's Breakfast Feast."

Naruto's eyes widened. "Th-that was the first course?!" His eyes fell upon the heaping plates of bacon and sausages. "And you're only on the second course?!"

Kiba leaned back, patting his stomach in satisfaction. "Yep; believe it or not, this is only half the meat."

Konohamaru stared at the plates. "Wow...you musta been hungry, huh?"

Kiba laughed a bit sheepishly. "Yeah, but I think I mighta misjudged on this one; I might have to bring some home." He fixed the two with a determined grin. "Still, I'm gonna eat as much of it as I possibly can!"

While he'd been speaking, Konohamaru had been staring at the plates, thinking hard. Suddenly, an idea came to him. Reaching up, he tugged Naruto's shirt. "Oi, Boss, I think I've got an idea."

"Eh?" Blinking, he looked down at the younger boy. "What is it, Konohamaru?"

Grinning, Konohamaru gestured at Kiba's stomach, then at his and Naruto's. "Easy; this guy says he won't be able to finish it all, and the Daimyo's Breakfast feast is supposed to be the biggest thing this place has, so how about we help him?"

Naruto's eyes widened, while Kiba scowled. "No way! You're not bumming a free meal off of me!"

Akamaru growled. Yeah, what do you take us for?

Seeing that things were about to get ugly, Konohamaru waved his arms. "N-no, that's not what I meant." He gestured at himself and Naruto. "The boss and I have some money to spare, so I figure we can split the bill three ways, and we all get a meal out of it."

Naruto looked between Konohamaru and Kiba, thinking. "Huh...you know, that's actually not a bad idea."

Kiba considered this for a moment; when he'd been by himself, he'd been willing to pay for the fairly pricey meal alone, but if these two were splitting it with him...he smirked, reaching out and ruffling Konohamaru's hair. "Huh, for someone who hangs around Naruto, you've got some pretty good ideas." Konohamaru beamed as the second half of the comment registered, while Naruto just spluttered angrily at the first part.

At that moment, a waiter came by, noticing the two boys standing by the booth. He coughed politely, getting their attention. "Excuse me, sirs...would you like to sit at this booth as well?" At their nods, the waiter gestured, and Naruto and Konohamaru slid into the opposite end of the booth.

"Thanks!" Naruto exclaimed, getting comfortable. "And don't bother taking our orders; we're sharing his!"

A bit shocked at this, but nonetheless relieved Kiba wouldn't be tackling the monstrous Feast by himself, bustled off to the kitchen to retrieve the next dish.

Soon, the next course had arrived, and it was...
11113211222111212.title: One of Kiba's friends spots him, and is wil...

choices: Without further ado, the three dig in to the same plate wildly.
Naruto had an idea.
111132112221112121.content: The tower of sweet goodness was placed before the three beaming boys by the waiter, who smiled at their reactions as he left to serve more customers. Kiba let the other two take it in as they stared, amazed at the sheer size of the massive breakfast.
111132112221112121.title: The waffles with ice cream

choices: The other half of the meat, which they put with the other uneaten half
The scrambled eggs
1111321122211121212.content:
Before the three dove into the massive breakfast, Naruto's eyes widened as something occurred to him. "Hey, wait a second, guys." Kiba and Konohamaru, started, forks and knives halfway to the plate.

"What?" Kiba asked irritably; these waffles looked and smelled amazing, and the ice cream slathered over each individual waffle didn't hurt either. "This better be good, 'cause you're holdin' me up!"

Konohamaru, though similarly disgruntled at being delayed, was a bit more patient. "What is it, boss?"

Seeing he had their attention, Naruto began to explain. "OK, so I was thinking, we all wanna get through this, but we can't if one of us gets too stuffed to even think about it, right?"

Kiba rolled his eyes. "Uh, yeah, that was what I was planning..."

Ignoring Kiba's jibe, Naruto pressed on. "I was thinking, what if we split up each course between the three of us!" Seeing the understanding spark in their eyes, Naruto grinned. "Yeah! All we gotta do for this one is cut it into three; I can get the top part, and you guys can get the middle part and bottom part! That way, we all get to eat a lot, but we can still get through it all!"

The other two processed this for a moment. Then...

"That's an awesome idea, boss!" Konohamaru exclaimed, grinning.

Kiba smirked. "Kid's got a point; that was pretty good for you." Raising his fork and knife up, he began cutting it into sections.

Naruto beamed, puffing out his chest. "Heh, thanks, I...hey!" Grumbling, he began cutting out a section for himself and Konohamaru (since the kid would be at a height disadvantage.)

Soon enough, each boy had a generous helping of waffles and ice cream in front of them, each of which nearly came up to their heads. They spent a few seconds beaming at their helpings, licking their lips...

Then they dove into their plates.

Naruto forked waffle and ice cream into his mouth, his face lit up. "Mmm, this is good! The waffles are really crispy, but soft on the inside!" He swallowed and began cutting himself another piece.

Kiba nodded, forking a hunk of ice cream into his mouth. "Yeah, and the ice cream's really smooth, too!"

Konohamaru, preoccupied as he was with cutting off pieces of waffle and shoving them into his mouth, only nodded in response.

The minutes ticked by, and the mounds of waffle and ice cream on their plates slowly shrank. As they shrank, the boys' stomachs began showing the effects.

Kiba's stomach expanded further, pushing out and inching closer to the table of the booth. He could feel his fly slowly being forced further open, and his net shirt, though it remained over his growing belly, strained harder.

Naruto's stomach took a little longer to grow, since he hadn't eaten anything previously, but soon enough, his stomach began to look distinctly round. As he powered on though the waffles, it began to push out, making a noticeable imprint on his shirt, pressing against the flame symbol on his front.

Konohamaru's belly started pressing against his yellow shirt, slightly pushing against the Konoha symbol on his front. Konohamaru giggled slightly, even as he stuffed himself. He could see why the Boss like to do it; it was fun!

Soon, the waffles had been completely depleted, and all three boys leaned back in their seats, rubbing their bellies and licking their lips.

"Mmm...that was good," Konohamaru mumbled, tongue sticking out the side of his mouth. His stomach had become round under his shirt, pushing it out more. What was more, the Konoha symbol he had on the front had begun pushing a bit further out as well.

"You said it," Naruto added, burping. His own belly had grown noticeably, becoming quite round under his shirt. As a result, his flame symbol was now pushing outwards, though the tapered off-bit that reached to his chest was untouched.

"Heh, it is pretty damn tasty, ain't it?" Kiba grinned, licking his lips. Predictably, his own stomach had bulged even more. His fly was mostly forced open, with only a few teeth still holding together, and his hoodie still rode completely on top of his belly. His net shirt was still holding steadfastly, though he was beginning to feel a slight strain...still, it was nothing compared to other strained clothes he'd had to deal with.

The boys spent the next few minutes resting, rubbing their bellies and burping. Soon, the next course was brought out, which was...
1111321122211121212.title: Naruto had an idea.

choices: He ate from both plates with gusto, despite his belly.
Akamaru wanted in on the fun, so he gave the plate to Akamaru.
11113211222111212121.content: Now the group had four plates piled high with meat, which shone brilliantly in its greasy goodness. Kiba loved sausage, so he took a plate of sausage. Naruto and Konohamaru each took a plate of bacon, and they left the last plate of sausage for Kiba, as he had ordered the meal in the first place, and he was still a bit annoyed that he couldn't have the meal to himself. Kiba gave a toothy smiled at the gesture, his prominent canines showing in all their glory, and...
11113211222111212121.title: The other half of the meat, which they put with...

choices: They put on a burst of speed, demolishing what's left of their meat
Thirsty from all the meat, they target the pitcher of milk
111132112221112121212.content:
Akamaru looked at the plates of sausage longingly. He wasn't thrilled with the idea of Kiba stuffing himself even more, but they smelled so good, and the way the juice dripped off and pooled around them...

Akamaru hadn't even realized he'd been panting, but evidently, Kiba had. Looking over at his buddy, Kiba chuckled. "Ya want some, boy? Why didn't ya say so?" Akamaru yipped, tail wagging in glee. "In fact..." He leaned forward a bit; catching his drift, Akamaru leapt off his shoulder and onto the table.

Naruto, his mouth already full of bacon. "Huh? What're ya doin', Kiba?"

Kiba smirked. "Lettin' Akamaru join in the fun."

As he said this, Akamaru reached his plate. Licking his chops, he opened his mouth wide and grabbed a sausage, demolishing it in a few quick bites. His tail began wagging even faster, the tender meat and savory juices of the sausage better than he'd thought they'd be. Without further ado, he lunged towards more of the sausage, gobbling them up.

Grinning at Akamaru's delight, Kiba picked up a fork in one hand, looked at at...and shrugged, setting it back down. He drew his plate closer to him, diving in with his hands and shoveling sausage after sausage into it, chewing just enough to get it down. His face lit up. Oh man, these are amazing! Licking some sausage grease that had found it's way onto the corner of his mouth, he gulped his current mouthful down and resumed attacking the sausage with gusto.

Naruto and Konohamaru were no less enthusiastic with their plates of bacon. Upon their first bites, they had discovered the bacon to be extremely juicy and flavorful, a perfect mix between crispy and soft. They had grinned widely at this, and had begun cramming the sizable strips into their both in their entirety, chewing it with little difficulty and immediately filling their mouths with more bacon once they'd swallowed. In fact, their method of eating the bacon was remarkably similar to Kiba's.

As with the waffles before them, the plates of meat slowly diminished, and as they did so, their stomachs changed to accommodate them. Kiba's stomach slowly bulged outwards even further, placing even more strain on his net shirt. Akamaru's furry tummy had already begun to round out, and as he guzzled more of his sausages, it began to grow, slowly but noticeably. Naruto's belly continued to push out, further stretching out his flame symbol. Likewise, Konohamaru's belly continued growing outwards, stretching out his Konoha symbol a bit more.

As they reached the end of the piles, their upper torso garments began to give up the ghost; Kiba could feel the area of his net shirt around his belly starting to fray, and Naruto and Konohamaru's shirts had slowly begun to rise up, and soon a bit of flesh would be exposed to the world. As they came within the last few pieces of meat on their plates...
111132112221112121212.title: Akamaru wanted in on the fun, so he gave the pl...

choices: "We'll go with the juice!"
"Next course it is!"
1111321122211121212122.content:
After eating so much meat, the four were incredibly thirsty. They all looked at the pitcher of milk, then each other, and they were about to fight over the pitcher, but the waiter had already noticed this dilemma, so he brought two more pitchers of milk, and even a bowl for Akamaru just as they were about to jump at the milk.

The three boys took their pitchers, put their mouths on the spouts, then guzzled down their milk as fast as they could. Akamaru licked the milk in his bowl ferociously, lapping up large gulps of milk. Either way, each boy's belly began to bulge outward noticeably to accommodate for the sudden influx of the dairy fluid.

Naruto's shirt finally gave up, being forced upward by his belly, which slowly pushed outward with milk. When he was done, a sliver of his belly revealed itself to the world.

Konohamaru was the slowest of the four, but he was still able to finish his pitcher in time, his belly filling out much like Naruto's. Because he was the smallest, his shirt rose more than Naruto's, his belly filling in every inch of space.

Akamaru's furry belly pushed out even farther, and by the time he was finished with the massive amount of milk, it almost touched the ground as it swayed slowly.

Kiba was by far the fastest of the group, the size of his belly not fazing him one bit as he gulped the milk down vivaciously, his stomach bulging out quickly, straining each string of his net shirt immensely.

Because of this pressure, the first string, which crossed his belly button, snapped violently, starting a chain reaction of snapping sounds that didn't end until Kiba's entire belly was free, beginning to strain a ring of strings around the edge of his belly. After he finished first, he patted his overfilled belly proudly, causing it to wobble and making a cool plopping and sloshing sound. The patting also forced some trapped gas out, and Kiba belched loudly.

As the boys began to play with their bellies, the waiter returned. "Do you guys want anymore drinks, or are you ready for the next course?"

Kiba said, "I'm ready for the next course already!" and Konohamaru said, "I could use a pitcher of oj!" Akamaru didn't care either way, so everyone stared at Naruto, waiting for his answer. Kiba even said, "I'm fine with either, but it's up to you." Naruto then exclaimed...
1111321122211121212122.title: Thirsty from all the meat, they target the pitc...

choices: The french toast
The scrambled eggs
11113211222111212121221.content:
Once Naruto made this exclamation, the waiter nodded and bustled off. As they waited, they played with and further inspected their bellies. Naruto's had already begun to peek out, though it had a ways to go before his belly button was showing. Konohamaru, by contrast, had more of his bare tummy showing, and it was only by an inch or two that his navel was still concealed. Kiba, having ripped the area of his net shirt around his stomach, had a good portion of his bare tummy in addition to his navel showing for all to see. Akamaru simply laid on his side, licking his chops and occasionally burping.

Soon, the waiter returned with three large pitchers of orange juice, with a bowl for Akamaru. The man walked away, and the three boys, unable to wait any longer, seized their pitchers and began guzzling away. Even Akamaru staggered to his feet, belly wobbling, and began lapping up the juice.

As with the milk, all of their midsections swelled as the orange juice entered it. Naruto's belly continued to push up, and his shirt slowly continued to rise, exposing more of his stomach and slowly scrunching up the flame symbol on the front. His pants also began to feel a bit snug, but he shrugged it off. By the time he finished and slammed it down, a good portion of his bare tummy was showing, but it was still an inch away from exposing his navel.

Konohamaru, though he was still the slowest, didn't let up. Shortly into his guzzling, his yellow shirt was exposing his navel, and it continued to rise as his belly bulged. His shorts began feeling tight as well, but like his idol, he pressed on. As he let out a wet belch and set his pitcher down, his belly sloshed, his shirt having ridden a few inches above his belly button.

As Akamaru lapped up his juice, his belly swelled even more, growing closer and closer to the table. By the time he'd lapped up the last of it, his white-furred belly was touching the table. Letting out a wet burp, he flopped onto his side, sluggishly wagging his tail.

Kiba's belly grew closer to the table, the strings around the edge of his belly continuing to strain; as he was halfway through the pitcher, he felt the strings begin to fray, much to his satisfaction, and he continued on, his pants beginning to feel tight in spite of being unbuttoned and unzipped. Once he'd depleted his, a few of the strings had begun to snap, and his pants were now feeling quite tight. He winced, but laughed it off; it he kept eating, that wouldn't be a problem.

As they waited for the waiter to return, they resumed playing with their bellies, finding, to their delight, their stomachs had grown sloshy and jiggly from all the liquid, and they spent a few minutes shaking and smacking their stomachs to watch as they rippled. Naruto and Konohamaru were giggling freely. Kiba was doing his best to keep from doing the same, though the occassional giggle still escaped his lips.

Their play was interrupted by the sudden arrival of the waiter, who had brought them...
11113211222111212121221.title: "We'll go with the juice!"

Kiba still managed to eat the fastest, though not by much, and the growth of his belly reflected it, as another string on his net shirt broke, sending another chain reaction that tore the entire front of his net shirt open, his belly flopping out slightly, taking advantage of the new-found room.

Kiba's midsection continue to grow, growing closer and closer to the table, moving quicker now that the whole front of his net shirt (the part not covered by his ridden-up hoodie, obviously) had been busted open. His pants, in spite of being unbuttoned and fully zipped, once again began to feel snug, but he paid it little mind; he wasn't going to lose the lead he had now!

As soon as the plate was set down in front of them, all three boys (and Akamaru) jumped upon their eggs, shoveling them into their mouths as quick as they could. Kiba, in particular, couldn't help but grin as he swallowed mouthful after mouthful. The eggs were light and fluffy, salted just right with the right amount of cheese... Oh man, these are probably the best eggs I've ever had! He continued shoveling in his mouth, his belly continuing to swell, now only about an inch or two from touching the table.

Akamaru's belly had grown to the point where his belly was all but lifting him off the table, and he had to almost lay down on it to continue eating his eggs, a task that slowly grew more difficult as more of the eggs entered his furry gut.

Naruto and Konohamaru were diving into their eggs with equal amounts of gusto. With every bite that Konohamaru took, his belly bulged out further and a bit quicker, now that his button was gone. In addition, his fly was slowly forced down, a few teeth at a time. Naruto's shirt continued to rise and the flame symbol continued to crinkle; before long, it was resting squarely on top of his belly. In addition, his pants began to feel very tight, but he didn't want to lose his groove by unbuttoning them...

Opening wide, he guzzled the milk, ignoring the streams that ran down either side of his face; besides, his shirt was mostly white, so it wasn't like it would show.

His stomach grew steadily as the milk entered it, pushing further out and straining his pants...

Kiba's eyes bugged out as he looked at the check. "Holy...are you kidding me?!""

Instantly getting worried, Naruto reached over. "Lemme see that." Kiba handed Naruto the piece of paper, and Naruto examined it. Soon, his expression was mirroring Kiba's.

Feeling a similar sense of dread, Konohamaru tapped Naruto on the shoulder. "Hey, Boss, can I see that?" Wordlessly, Naruto handed Konohamaru the check. The young boy looked at the number written upon it and gaped. "Oh man...is that really how much it costs?"

"W-well," Naruto managed, slowly turning his head towards Konohamaru, "It was a lotta food..."

I dunno about you two, but even if we split it three ways, I'll be outta cash" At this, Naruto and Konohamaru rummaged around in their pockets, pulling out their wallets and peeking inside. "You boys aren't going to have to worry about the check."

He reached towards the table and plucked the check out of Konohamaru's hands. "That's why..." He held it up in full view.

"...this one's on the house." He tore the check in half, discarding it on the floor.

"Of course!" The man replied cheerily. "I am the manager, after all." He strode forward and placed something on the booth table. "A little something to reward you all." Giving them one final nod, he turned and walked into the back of the diner.

Exchanging an odd look, all three boys looked at the three slips upon the table. Cautiously, they reached out and each took one, holding them up to examine them.

Kiba's eyes widened. "N-no way."

Konohamaru blinked. "I-is this..."
