At around twenty minutes, the strain was too much, and a string over the front of his belly broke, causing a few around it to break as well. At this point, he already went through another serving of waffles, and was delighted to see that more was waiting for him. He dug into that one just as fast, and the results showed. At thirty minutes, another ring of net shirt was demolished. By forty minutes, all of the net shirt around his belly had broken, leaving the mass of food-filled flesh completely open to the world. In addition, his pants button was crying for dear life as it was about to be popped off.

Kiba then started on another serving, as his current one was depleted. He made sure to unbutton his pants before he broke them, as they were his favorite, and after doing so, his belly pushed out even more.

Naruto and his two clones dug into their pancakes just like last time. They were still quick in their eating, but not nearly as fast as Kiba. Either way, they greedily stuffed the hotcakes into their maws, and their bellies pushed out even farther as a result.

The actual Naruto's belly proceeded to work farther down the zipper, making room for itself as it did so. After twenty minutes, it was at the bottom of the zipper, and was filling in any and all spaces it could. The Naruto clones had significantly smaller bellies, having only eaten from this most recent stack, and their bellies were pushing against their shirts as much as possible without starting to lift them.

Ten minutes later, all three Naruto's finished, with the original rubbing his belly contentedly as it strained against his inseam. The other two had bellies that lifted their respective shirts just enough to reveal a strip of flesh. At this point, they had finished their first stack, but Naruto decided to keep his two clones in

Twenty more minutes later, each clone had stomachs that lifted their shirts enough to reveal their navels, and the actual Naruto had ripped his inseam, his belly making room and straining the bottom of his shirt.

The two Konohamaru's worked almost as fast as Naruto did, and they trudged through their eggs and bacon, switching about every twenty minutes too keep things interesting.

Halfway through the hour, Konohamaru's belly had lifted up the entirety of his shirt, and it was threatening to pop the button off of his shorts. His clone wasn't that far behind, his belly lifting up his shirt considerably. The pair finished their current dish, and were ready for another

Towards the end, the two Konohamaru's had finally stopped for a breather, his own stomach having filled in the area above his inseam, and his clone's having lifted his shirt up just past his navel.

Naruto was the first to disperse, and as he did so, he felt the taste of all of the pancakes at once as his belly stretched out quickly to accommodate. The bottom of his shirt ripped, and he had half a mind to take it off. His pants also ripped further to make room, and if it wasn't for his belly, Naruto would be revealing his underwear quite clearly.

Konohamaru had dispersed soon afterwards, and his belly also expanded outwards, stretching then ripping his inseam slightly before his shirt began to strain.

Because the two had eaten so much, for the last ten minutes, Naruto and Konohamaru took a breather as Kiba caught up surprisingly quickly. Kiba crammed waffle into his mouth viciously, and his belly began to stretch the bottom of his net shirt. His inseam was also straining considerably, and, to preserve his pants, Kiba made sure to slide them downwards, revealing the back of his green boxers. He didn't care, though, as those pants were his favorite, and his mom would kill him if she had to buy another pair.

That brings us up to the present moment, with Naruto having the largest belly, and Kiba lagging behind just a bit. Konohamaru was in last as far as size went, but he was determined to keep going. At this point, Akamaru, who had been working on his bacon at a steady pace, had finished his plate, and was himself finished, as he couldn't touch his paws to the ground, even if he tried. He merely chose to watch the other three with intrigue.

All three tenderly rubbed their bellies, and their bellies had put a considerable strain on the table, so they each scooted back for comfort. Either way, their next courses finally arrived. They more or less ate the same, except for Naruto, who had a clever idea to create another shadow clone, and have that shadow clone feed him so he didn't have to reach around his massive belly.

The three continued eating until each had their fill, and it was clear that...

11211.title: Naruto

choices: Naruto plows through several bowls before taking a breather
He goes through several bowls, and shows no signs of stopping
112111.content:
Naruto, grinning at the steaming bowl before him, clasped his hands together. "Itadakimasu!" With that, he grabbed his chopsticks, split them apart, and began digging into the ramen. Teuchi and Ayame watched, surprised: even after having Naruto as a regular at Ichiraku's for several years, it still amazed them how much he loved their ramen.

Naruto-clad in civilian clothes consisting of his regular orange pants and black shirt bearing Konoha's symbol-had just returned from a particularly grueling mission, and upon returning, had learned that he had a few days off. Ecstatic, he had grabbed his wallet (bulging with money earned from various minor missions and odd jobs) and run straight to Ichiraku's, ordering the biggest bowl of ramen they had.

Swallowing his current mouthful and licking his lips, Naruto beamed at the duo. "Wow, the ramen's really good today! Thanks, old man!"

Laughing, Teuchi rubbed the back of his head. "Ah, it's nothing, Naruto; anything for our best customer!"

Smiling and laughing in return, Naruto returned to his ramen, eagerly slurping up the noodles, broth, meat, and vegetables. Oh, this was good...too good to have just one bowl!

In spite of the fact that there was over half of the bowl left, Naruto raised his hand and yelled, "Oi! Old man! Another extra-large bowl of miso ramen, please!"

Teuchi, having long gotten used to this sort of thing, simply nodded and went about preparing Naruto's next bowl.

Naruto licked his lips, grinning to himself. It wouldn't be just that one bowl, though; today...today he was gonna go buck-wild!
112111.title: Just another Ichiraku's binge.

choices: Partway through, he gets a stomachache, and leaves the stand
He finishes the massive bowl and orders another one
1121111.content:
About five bowls later, Naruto slammed his current bowl down, turned around in his seat, and leaned back, resting one arm on the counter, while the other rubbed his stomach. "Oh man, that was tasty!" Naruto exclaimed, burping a bit to emphasize this.

His stomach, filled with the contents of five extra-large bowls of ramen, had filled out accordingly; it pressed against the fabric of his shirt, forming a noticeable round shape under it. Naruto, looking down, noticed this and grinned. Heh...my gut's startin' to look a little bigger, too!

This was nothing new, of course: sometimes, when he'd eat at Ichiraku's, he'd completely eat his fill, leaving his tummy somewhat swollen under his jacket. He'd always been somewhat fascinated by this, but it had always vanished after an hour or two.

His hand ceased its ministration of his belly, and wandered to his pocket, where his overfilled wallet was being kept. His eyes gleamed as an idea occurred to him. He had off for a few days, and he really had nothing else planned...

This in mind, Naruto spun around in his seat, grinning at Teuchi. The man blinked, somewhat confused. "So, uh, Naruto...you done?"

"Done?" Naruto repeated, patting his stomach. "I've just gotten started! Get me the biggest bowl of miso ramen ya got; ya know, the one usually meant for a buncha people!"

Ayame's eyes widened. "A-are you sure? I mean, that might be a lot, even for you..."

Naruto grinned, squeezing his eyes shut. "Eh, so what if it is? I'm not doing anything for a few days, and besides, I love a challenge!"

Shaking their heads and smiling at the antics of their number one customer, Teuchi and Ayame went about preparing Naruto's request.

In short order, a truly massive bowl of miso ramen was set before. It took up a great deal of the length of the counter, and stood about three feet tall. It was filled to the brim with broth, noodles, and a few other toppings Naruto liked. Eyes gleaming, he licked his lips, grabbed his chopsticks, and dug in.
1121111.title: Naruto plows through several bowls before takin...

choices: He continues to stuff himself until he finally takes a break.
He continues to stuff himself, initially oblivious to a visitor.
1121112.content:
As Naruto slurped through his second bowl with gusto, Teuchi was preparing a third bowl, and he had it ready before Naruto finished. He knew Naruto well enough to know when Naruto was in the mood to stuff himself with ramen, and now was one of those times.

The stream of ramen kept coming, and Naruto easily caught up, with each additional bowl causing his stomach to round out more. After the third bowl, Naruto's stomach had become large enough to create quite the impression in his shirt.

After another two bowls, Naruto's shirt began to rise slowly with every bowl. He continued to eat with gusto, ignoring everything around as he was focused on the ramen and eating as much of it as possible.

Soon, another three bowls had gone down his ravenous maw, and his stomach was showing obvious signs of it. It now protruded out considerable, lifting up his shirt to reveal a large strip of flesh under his navel. At this point, Naruto's orange pants began to feel strain, and Naruto's engorged belly began to push out above his pants button.

Teuchi was surprised that Naruto was still going as fast as he was. Typically, Naruto would slow down at that point, and he would eventually stop, but now, he continued going fast and strong, maybe even faster than he usually went.

He would have asked Naruto why he was going so fast, but he didn't want to break Naruto's focus, so he cooked more bowls, heartily laughing as Naruto grabbed the bowl, raising a quick thumbs up to thank him.

Naruto then took the tenth bowl and slurped through the noodles in glee.
1121112.title: He goes through several bowls, and shows no sig...

choices: After a few minutes, he gets his second wind and dives right back in
He decides he's had enough ramen, and goes to get something sweet
11211121.content:
Within a matter of minutes, Naruto had downed his tenth bowl, and his shirt had risen up a little further. Not missing a beat, he drew his eleventh bowl towards him and started slurping up the noodles ravenously. As the noodles and broth poured down his throat, his stomach slowly grew, and his black shirt rose up a little further, exposing the bottom half of his navel.

Once the noodles were gone, Naruto picked up the bowl and downed what broth was left. Sighing, he looked up, and was delighted to see Teuchi had already prepared his next two bowls in anticipation. Grinning, he drew his twelfth bowl towards himself and started going to town on it. Again, as the ramen and broth went down his gullet, his stomach swelled a bit more, bringing his shirt up higher; about three-quarters of his navel was exposed.

As Naruto downed the broth, he noticed his pants were starting to feel a little tighter. He frowned, and almost reached down to undo them, but decided against it; he was in the zone, and he didn't want to lose his focus. With that, he seized his thirteenth bowl and began devouring it. Again, his stomach bulged, and again, his shirt rose up, up, up...

By the time Naruto downed the broth of his thirteenth bowl and gave a satisfied burp, his shirt had ridden completely above his navel, showing it in its entirety. His pants now felt even more snug, but Naruto only grinned; just went to show how good he was doing.

Sighing happily, he turned around in his seat and leaned against the counter on one arm, happily patting his engorged belly with the other one. "Phew, I'm really eating a lot today..." He burped again, and giggled a bit. "'Course, I'm gonna eat even more once I rest up a little bit!"

Hearing this, Teuchi and Ayame shared a resigned glance. Naruto, it seemed, was far from finished, but that was nothing new...

Unable to help himself, Naruto dipped a finger into his exposed navel, giggling at the ticklish sensations produced as he wriggled it. Oh yeah, this was gonna be fun...
11211121.title: He continues to stuff himself until he finally ...

choices: Naruto found one of his friends stuffing themselves there.
Naruto continued his binge, surprising the store owner.
112111212.content:
Teuchi saw that Naruto was finished with his break, and he was about to start making more bowls for Naruto, but he was surprised to see Naruto get up off of his stool and wave goodbye.

"I'm surprised that you're done already!" Teuchi exclaimed, wanting to make sure that his favorite customer was satisfied. Naruto merely responded, "I guess I'm just in the mood for dessert!" while rubbing the back of his head.

At that, Teuchi nodded, and Naruto walked off cheerily, with a hand resting on the orb of flesh on his abdomen. With every step, it wobbled a bit, but he merely continued towards his destination with a goofy, satisfied grin on his face. He got a few strange looks, but most of the villagers were used to him walking away from Ichiraku's with a stuffed tummy, so they brushed it off.

Typically, Naruto would be walking to his apartment for a nap, but he wanted sweet food now, so he made his way to the dango shop that Anko loved to go to. He initially had a bit of trouble finding it, but soon he had arrived.
112111212.title: He decides he's had enough ramen, and goes ...

choices: Naruto continues stuffing himself
Naruto suddenly realizes how tight his waistline's become
1121112122.content:
As he walked into the dango stand, the store owner looked up at him and blinked, surprised at what he saw. Apparently, the boy had already eaten well, if his swollen belly and exposed navel were anything to go by, and blinked as he heard a growl come from Naruto's stomach.

Oblivious, Naruto walked up to the counter, grinning and smacking a sizable wad of cash down on it. "Oi! One extra-large stick of dango, please!"

Blinking, the store owner coughed. "Al-alright..." He bustled about, getting the treat ready.

Smiling, Naruto called out again, his hand resting on his stomach. "Also, after ya get that one done, keep 'em comin', and don't stop till I can't eat anymore!"

His back turned to Naruto, the store owner's shoulder's hitched, then slumped. "Very well, sir..."

Soon enough, the first stick was ready, and the store owner handed it to Naruto, his features resigned even as he turned back around and began preparing more. Naruto, on the other hand, grinned and licked his lips: just like he'd asked, the dumplings were really big, so much so they had to be practically clumped together on the stick.

Without wasting any more time, Naruto brought the stick to his mouth, grabbing hold of a dumpling and pulling it off with his teeth. Chewing, he grinned at the sweet flavor that exploded in his mouth. Ah yeah, that hits the spot... Swallowing, he quickly attacked the other two dumplings, and soon, they were going down his gullet as well.

Licking his lips, Naruto dropped the empty stick on the counter. Wow, that was pretty good; I gotta come here more often! Even as he was finishing this thought, the store owner walked over to him and handed him two more of the extra-large dango sticks. Eyes lighting up, Naruto took them both, opening his mouth extra wide. Then, putting the sticks close to his mouth, he chomped off two dumplings each from one, chewing happily and swallowing before downing the remaining dumplings. Dropping the sticks next to the first one, he grabbed the next two sticks as they were being offered to him and repeated the process. Two more sticks dropped...then two more...then another two...

As the dumplings went down his throat, his stomach slowly bulged, forcing his shirt a little higher above his navel with every couple sticks. In addition, with each stick eaten, his pants began feeling a little tighter. Noticing this, but determined not to lose his groove, Naruto continued downing dango sticks like there was no tomorrow. As before, with every couple dango sticks eaten, his stomach got a little bigger, his shirt rode up a little higher, and the waistline of his pants began feeling tighter. Meanwhile, the few sticks he had started off with had begun growing into a small but nonetheless sizable pile.
1121112122.title: Naruto continued his binge, surprising the stor...

choices: He can only finish one or two more plates.
He keeps going strong.
11211121222.content:
Naruto was plowing through the dango so fast that the store owner was having trouble keeping up, so after this next pair of dango sticks, Naruto had to wait for the store owner to make another batch.

While he waited, he became painfully aware of how tight his waistline was becoming, as he couldn't see the quivering pants button under his overstuffed stomach. He sought to remedy the problem, doing so by sucking in his gut as much as he could, then struggling to undo the button.

As he did so, the store owner returned with more dango for him. The store owner just stared at Naruto awkwardly for a moment, as Naruto was currently crouching over, struggling with his pants button.

Naruto was finally able to free his belly, and it nearly flopped out onto the counter, forcing Naruto's fly halfway down and his shirt up as it did so. His stomach finally came to rest just below the counter. Luckily, there was quite a bit of overhang on the counter, so Naruto's belly had plenty of room down there.

Either way, now that his pain was relieved, Naruto sat back, patting his belly, ignoring the weird stare from the store owner. His eyes then lit up at the sight in front of him.

The store owner, sick of having to give so many sticks to Naruto, piled a dozen sticks onto a plate so that he would just have to give the plate to Naruto. Either way, Naruto cheerily grinned at the store owner to show that he appreciated the gesture, then he went back to stuffing himself.

He saw how the dango was stacked into rows of three, then got an idea. Using both hands, he managed to pick up a row of three dango sticks, then he lined them up in his mouth, and took three at a time.

This was somewhat of a struggle, however, as the dumplings were so big. Naruto managed it, however, and the dumplings completely filled his cheeks, and there was so much food in Naruto's mouth that he could barely close his mouth.

Slowly but surely, he had made it through those three, and repeated the process, getting the hang of it and gaining momentum. Soon enough, he was finished with the first stack and he discarded the sticks in the pile, swiftly moving onto the next set of three, his stomach lifting his shirt slightly higher after each set of three.

Soon enough, his plate was emptied and the pile of sticks was considerably larger. To his delight, there was another plate right next to it, waiting for him, and he dug in without hesitation.

112111221.content:
Naruto, grinning, continued slurping up his noodles like there was no tomorrow. Soon enough, he had finished his eleventh bowl and, after draining the broth, reached for his twelfth bowl...

"One large miso ramen, please!"

Naruto yelped, spilling some broth in the process. Turning his head to the side, he saw Konohamaru sitting beside him, his arm still raised in the air. "Konohamaru? What are you doing here?!"

The younger Genin turned towards him, grinning. "Oh, hey, boss. Don't mind me; just gettin' some ramen, like you." His eyes drifted towards Naruto's belly, and the strip of flesh that was already exposed. "Huh, how much have ya eaten?"

Naruto smirked, patting his stomach. "Eleven bowls, so far." He laughed, picking up his chopsticks again and drawing his twelfth bowl close to him. "'Course, I haven't even gotten started yet!" He dipped his chopsticks inin, lifting some noodles to his mouth. "I'm gonna keep goin' through bowls till I pass out!" With that, he resumed slurping up the noodles. Teuchi, blinking, nonetheless set a couple more bowls by him.

Seeing this, Konohamaru got an idea. "Hey, old man!" he called, raising his arm in the air again. "Do what you're doing with Naruto; keep the bowls coming 'till I can't eat any more!" Teuchi, starting at this, nonetheless went about preparing Konohamaru's order.

Pausing and swallowing his current mouthful, Naruto looked towards Konohamaru, smirking. "Same as me, huh?"

Konohamaru shrugged. "Hey, if I'm gonna be Hokage after you, I gotta surpass you in every way." Noticing something out of the side of his vision, he turned back to the counter and grinned as he saw Teuchi setting his first bowl down. Licking his lips, he parted his chopsticks and began digging in.

Naruto, even as he continued slurping his own noodles, smiled; he was actually looking forward to seeing how far the kid could go...
112111221.title: Someone who also wanted to eat lots of ramen.

choices: Naruto stops in a few more bowls, unable to tolerate the stomachache.
Naruto fights the pain, eating many more bowls before he stops.
1121112211.content:
It was obvious that Naruto was skilled at eating copious amounts of ramen, as he had done it so many times before. He was able to keep the same pace up while simultaneously keeping an eye on Konohamaru, glancing over at his follower between bites.

The young, brown haired genin, on the other hand, was completely focused on his eating, ignoring Naruto's interest in his progress. Because of this, he was slurping down the noodles just as quickly as Naruto was, consistently staying twelve bowls behind the blonde that he looked up to so much.

As he did so, his small stomach began pushing on the fabric of his t-shirt. After two bowls, the shirt had given up, rising about halfway to his navel. Naruto's stomach, on the other hand, was able to push his shirt above his navel at this point, revealing it to the world.

Another two bowls had brought Konohamaru's shirt to his bellybutton, showing how much smaller he was than Naruto, who was currently working on his pants button, trying to free the monstrous globe behind it.

Soon enough, Naruto's belly surged out with a wobble, and he sighed contentedly before continuing to dig in with renewed fervor.

Noticing this, Konohamaru thought,"That must feel really good" before taking the cue to undo his own pants button, a much easier task as his stomach wasn't nearly as large. Due to this, Konohamaru's bloated belly only pushed out a little bit, though now there was much more room for Konohamaru's belly.

With each passing bowl, the stomachs of the two swelled out even more, lifting their respective shirts up. Four bowls later, Naruto's shirt had reached the top of his stomach, framing the bulbous symbol of gluttonous glory.

After another two bowls, Konohamaru's stomach had done the same. At this point, he had had enough, and he laid back, rubbing his belly with a look of discomfort on his face. "I think I ate too much." Konohamaru complained, gaining Naruto's attention.

He merely responded with a smile, "More for me, then!" as he dug into yet another bowl, ignoring the fact that his stomach was now completely wedged under the counter. Teuchi merely smiled warmly, with memories of Naruto's ramen eating antics popping into his head.

As Naruto stuffed his face, Konohamaru was amazed, exclaiming, "Wow, boss! You're the best! I wanna eat that much ramen someday!" He continued to stare at Naruto in excitement and anticipation of the next bite. Naruto couldn't help but chuckle as Konohamaru nearly lost his balance with his belly flopping around when he turned his stool.

Naruto went back to his ramen afterwards, regaining momentum in his goal to eat as much as he possibly could.

112111222.content:
Sakura had arrived at Ichiraku's, politely denying Teuchi's offer for ramen. Tsunade told her that she needed Naruto, so she made a beeline for Ichiraku's, as that was Naruto's favorite place to eat at.

She found Naruto stuffing himself with ramen, so focused on his binge that he didn't notice Sakura come in. Sakura tried to get his attention, only to be ignored. Soon enough, she conked Naruto on the head, leaving a red bump on the head of Naruto, who was rolling on the ground, holding his newly acquired bump.

Soon enough, Sakura was yelling at Naruto, "Lady Tsunade needs you! You should pay more attention instead of stuffing your face so much!" This went on as Naruto and Sakura walked over to the Hokage's office, with Naruto being a bit bummed about his interrupted ramen binge.

Once they were in the Hokage's office, and Tsunade was sitting at her desk reading paperwork, with Shizune holding Tonton at her side. "Good, you're here." Tsunade said before going over the reason why Naruto was here.

"Recently, we've received a strange mission request. It's only a D-rank..." and at that, she was interrupted by Naruto's complaining, and Sakura conked Naruto on the head again. Now that she was free to speak again, Tsunade continued.

"It is only a D-rank, but you're perfectly suited for this mission. Anyone in the leaf village that knows you knows that you have an obsession with ramen. You eat practically every meal at Ichiraku's, and it's a wonder that you stay as slim as you are with how much you eat there sometimes."

"Yeah, what's your point, granny Tsunade?" Naruto demanded, getting impatient, receiving an annoyed response from Tsunade, "My point is that this mission involves eating a lot of ramen. You see, there is a village in the Land of Fire that is famous for its agriculture, particularly rice, and the astounding amount of food that they can produce."

"Then Why didn't you sent Choji?" Naruto interrupted.

"I didn't send Choji", Tsunade said through clenched teeth, losing her patience, "Because he is busy with other missions, and he doesn't like ramen nearly as much as you do. Anyway, the village exports a lot of food, but they still have quite a bit of excess, so they have a ramen eating competition every month or so to get rid of the excess. Unfortunately, their usual participants will not be nearly enough, so they requested that we send one of our best eaters to help them. That's where you come in. Go to the village and make sure that they have no more excess. They're paying Konoha in quite a bit of food, and we need more food here. There's also money in it for you, of course."

Sakura, essentially forgetting her annoyance, expressed her concerns, saying, "But Naruto can't go alone! What if the Akatsuki finds him." Tsunade was prepared for that, responding with, "I know that you want to go with him, but medical ninjas are always in short supply, so we're saving you for more dangerous missions."

She then continued...

112112221.content:
"Ugh...my head..."

Groaning, Naruto slowly sat up, rubbing the back of his head and wincing. "The hell happened?" he mumbled to himself, eyes still shut. "Last thing I remember, I was on my way to Ichiraku's..." Grunting, Naruto blinked his eyes open...and started at the sight that greeted him.

He was not in his apartment, or in a hospital, but rather in what appeared to be a room at some sort of inn. The room itself was surprisingly nicely-furnished; there was a bureau for clothes, a nice-look closet, and...

Naruto looked down at the surface he was resting on. He'd been right; he was lying on a bed, though he was still fully-clothed.

Naruto scowled. "What the hell's going on?"

"Oh hey, you're awake!"

Naruto's head snapped towards the direction of the voice...and his jaw promptly dropped open when he saw the speaker, entering through the room's door.

Walking towards him was a wolf, but not like any wolf he'd ever seen. He stood upright, knees bent and the back of his feet-paws-lifted up into the air like a regular dog or wolves' hind legs. His fur was a dark brown, a crop of lighter-brown fur that resembled hair resting on his head; a pair of triangular ears, near-identical to a regular wolf's, stuck up out of it Further adding to the strangeness, he wore a black, short-sleeved T-shirt and khaki shorts, though no footwear of any kind. Completing the ensemble was a pair of glasses resting on the bridge of his muzzle, amplifying the sight of his hazel-brown eyes.

Noticing Naruto's flabbergasted expression, the wolf laughed nervously, scratching the back of his head. "Uh...how's that bump on your head feeling." He soon had his reply, by way of a kunai embedded in the wall a few scant inches from where his head was.

Yelping, he jumped to the side. "H-hey, watch it! You coulda killed me!" All he received in response was an angry glare. "Right, that was probably the idea..."

"Yeah, and that's what's gonna happen if you don't tell me what the hell's going on!" Naruto retorted, springing out of the bed and angrily facing the wolf.

The wolf groaned, massaging his temples. "Alright, alright; I was gonna come clean with you anyways, but better just to get it out of the way now..." He looked to the side and mumbled to himself, "If only to avoid more thrown weaponry..."

Turning back to Naruto, the wolf took a deep breath. "Ok, first off, the name's Hunter. I already know who you are, Naruto, so no need to introduce yourself."

"What?!" Naruto exclaimed, glaring at Hunter with a mix of anger and confusion. "How..."

"I have my sources," Hunter replied evasively. Before Naruto could inquire further, he continued speaking. "Second, you're probably wondering where you are..." He scratched the back of his head again. "It's an inn not too far from Konoha; it doesn't look like much, but it's actually quite nice. As to how you're here..." Hunter trailed off, gulping and pulling at the neck of his T-shirt. "I, uh...kinda-sorta kidnapped you." As soon as the words left his muzzle, several shuriken embedded themselves into the wall opposite where the kunai had landed. "Geez, watch it! Just lemme explain..."

"Explain?!" Naruto practically screamed, getting in close to Hunter. "You hit me in the head, knocked me out, and dragged me out here to do whatever to me! How does that need explaining!" Momentarily out of breath, Naruto took a step back, panting furiously.

Taking a deep, shaky breath to steady himself, Hunter continued. "I didn't hit you on the back of the head; I had an acquaintance shoot a tranq dart into your neck." He laughed, this time a bit more earnestly. "I woulda done it myself, but I'm sorta lousy shot." He winced as Naruto's hand went to his neck; indeed, there was a tiny puncture wound there. "The, uh, reason your head's hurting is because you somehow ended up falling backwards when you fell unconscious." He smiled. "Good thing you have such a hard head, huh?"

Growling, Naruto felt the back of his still-tender head. "I guess...but that still doesn't answer my big question: WHY the hell have you brought me out here."

"Why? That's a very good question," Hunter muttered, looking slightly nervous. "Look, Naruto, the truth is, I kinda brought you out here so I could, um...help you stuff yourself?"

Almost immediately, Naruto's angry look faded, replaced by one of utter confusion. "Wh...what?"

Hunter nodded. "Uh, yeah." He took a deep breath, choosing his next words carefully. "This inn's in a small town that's got some good restaurant's for a cheap price, and I'd be more than willing to treat..."

Abruptly, the anger returned to Naruto's face. "Why, so you can eat me once I'm ready to bust?!"

Hunter's eyes widened, and he waved his hands/paws in front of him frantically. "Wh-what?! No, no, nothing like that. I just, uh, wanna see you stuffing yourself up close and personal." He fixed Naruto with a nervous smile. "So, you game?"

Naruto glared at Hunter for a few seconds, only to be interrupted by the growling of his stomach. Placing a hand over it, he scowled at Hunter. "Grrr...fine. Just don't try any funny business, got it?"

Hunter grinned a wolfish grin. "Wolf's honor." Walking to the inn room's door, he opened the door and gestured for Naruto to walk through. "So, I've seen a lot of restaurants around town, but I found two that might be good to start with; a ramen place and an ice cream shop. Which one you wanna tackle first?"

It only took Naruto a moment to think before he replied...
112112221.title: Captured

choices: "I could actually go for some more bowls of ramen..."
"I'm craving meat right about now."
1121122211.content:
"Well, I was on my way to Ichiraku's before you decided to 'invite' me to this little food run of yours..." grumbled Naruto in annoyance, causing Hunter to chuckle sheepishly as he brushed the back of his head, then said, "Eheheh, yeah, again, sorry about that...but if you want ramen, there's a great ramen joint not to far from here that I'm sure'll do the job just fine!"

Naruto rolled his eyes at the notion of anything comparing to Ichiraku's, but as he did, his stomach once again rumbled hungrily, and so with a shrug, he said, "Hey, ramen's ramen, I guess...why not." With that, Hunter almost eagerly led Naruto to a little ramen shack nearby the inn. Hunter sat himself atop one of the stools as he called for the cook. Naruto; in a less than enthusiastic manner, simply plopped himself a seat away from Hunter and waited. "Excuse me, sir," Hunter started as the cook arrived, "but my new friend here would like to try a few bowls of your steamiest ramen, if you'd be so kind." The cook nodded then headed back to resume stirring his pot. A moment of uncomfortable silence passed before Naruto sighed then turned to Hunter.

"Soooo exactly WHY do you want to watch me stuff myself?" asked a legitimately curious Naruto. Hunter fumbled nervously for a moment then turned to the blond, "Well...my sources say you're one of the biggest eaters in all of Konoha. I've always been rather fascinated in seeing how far one's appetite allows them to devour, and as a wolf..." Naruto's look grew sterner as Hunter trailed off, but he followed up with, "...I've always wanted to see if humans could truly consume more than us. If their appetites didn't exceed their stomachs capacity. From what I've heard, that's not a problem for you, Naruto."

It was an odd notion to say the least, but Naruto accepted it at face value. "Still doesn't explain why you had to KNOCK ME OUT first!" blurted out Naruto in annoyance.
"Well, you might've said no."
"I also might've killed you."
"....Yeah, I...suppose you might've...b-but you didn't! So that's a start, right?" chuckled Hunter in an effort to loosen up his 'dining guest' a tad. It wasn't really working. But then the ramen arrived.

Naruto grabbed a bowl and took a whiff. The aroma was surprisingly pleasant to say the least, but still nowhere near as mouth watering as the broth's scent from Ichiraku's. But as his mind continued to compare the two, his stomach once again rumbled indiscriminately, and so, he began to slurp down the noodles. The warm flavorful broth rushed down his throat and warmed his belly soothingly, causing Naruto to ease up a bit as he began to slurp down his bowl at a faster rate, until it was completely drained clean.

Smacking his lips, Naruto raised an eyebrow. "Huh. Not half bad..." he said to no one in particular as he began to get to work on the second bowl. Then the next bowl. Then the next. As the noodles and broth continued to travel down his throat and into Naruto's eager stomach, he cared less and less about comparing what was better, and even less about why this Hunter character had 'invited' him out. If it meant free food that was at least half-way decent, why complain?

Hunter meanwhile, observed and watched Naruto as he almost mechanically slurped down one bowl after another. He was unlike any human he'd ever seen; like a ramen eating machine with no stop sign anywhere to be found. As the bowls began to stack up, Hunter knew this was going to be an interesting experience.

Some time had passed until finally, a respectable stack of ramen bowls piled up behind Naruto as he leaned back and sighed with satisfaction, giving his satisfied belly a good few happy pats. Hunter glanced down to see Naruto's concave stomach had the slightest of outward curves to it now from ingesting all that ramen at once. "S-so, did'ja like your meal?" asked Hunter nervously.
"Hey, it actually wasn't half bad," responded a semi-impressed Naruto, which was good enough for Hunter, knowing he wasn't planning on calling it quits anytime soon. "Great! Where to now?" asked Hunter.

Naruto thought for a moment...
1121122211.title: "Ramen is ramen, I guess..."

choices: "I'll get the same thing as him, but bigger; no way I'm getting shown up!"
"I'll take the whole roast chicken, biggest ya got!"
11211222112.content:
"That ramen was pretty good," Naruto admitted, standing up and rubbing his stomach, "but it didn't have too much meat in it; I'm kinda in the mood for some right now."

Grinning, Hunter plunked some money down on the counter and stood up, thanking the cook. "I think that can be arranged." He smirked. "Meat sounds good." He rubbed his own stomach. "I could actually go for some, too." He winked at Naruto. "You're not the only one who can put it away, ya know."

Naruto raised an eyebrow as he followed Hunter away from the stand. "Wait, you're gonna..."

"Stuff myself?" Hunter finished, arms folded behind his lupine head. "Well...I might go a little crazy, but I probably won't go too far; someone's gonna have to help you around by the time this is all over."

Naruto's brow furrowed. "Help me...how much do ya expect me to eat?!"

Hunter yelped. Oops, Hunter thought, ears heating up, Guess I said a little too much...

"Hey!" Naruto bellowed, even as he followed Hunter to the meat restaurant. "I'm talkin' to you! What did you mean by that?"

Hunter sighed, lowering his arms to his side. Well, no use hiding it now... He turned to look at Naruto. "Look, Naruto, I'll be honest...I've seen you stuff yourself before."

"Wh-what?!" Naruto exclaimed, clenching his fists. "When?!"

Hunter took a deep breath, nervously scratching the back of his head. "Well, um...do you remember that time a couple years ago when you were really, really depressed, so you gorged yourself at Ichiraku's?"

Naruto blinked, remembering. "Yeah...I sneezed on Sakura, she got mad and hit me, I ate a ton of ramen, got a really big belly..."

"And your belly button popped out, don't forget that," Hunter piped up despite himself.

Naruto nodded. "Yeah, that part was kinda weird...hey, wait a minute!" He rushed up behind Hunter. "You were watching me then, too!"

Hunter whined, his ears folding down. "Well...I wasn't actually there; I just had some of my acquaintances film you." Against his better judgment, his muzzle widened into a toothy grin. "I gotta say, that was some mighty impressive eatin'."

Naruto, in spite of his anger, felt a twinge of pride at that. "Ya think so?"

"Oh yeah!" Hunter responded eagerly. "And that's not even counting the other times I, uh, had you filmed..." he shrank back a bit under Naruto's glare. "Like that time when you ate way too much at that festival a couple years back, that eating contest you entered with that other guy, Choji...gotta say, it sucks you never managed to eat the ramen." He laughed a bit. "Ya got a pretty nice gut off the first course alone."

Naruto winced, remembering the event. "Yeah, and the ramen tasted really good too..."

Hunter smiled. "Yeah, well, don't feel too bad about it." He winked again. "I've got a little surprise planned for you later...no telling!" he added cheerfully at Naruto's inquisitive expression.

Suddenly sensing something, Hunter looked up; there, in front of him, was the meat restaurant. "Oh, hey, we're here!" He turned to Naruto. "Before we go in, though, can I ask you a weird question?"

"Yeah, sure, whatever..." Naruto replied grumpily, still a bit disgruntled with this whole situation.

Hunter nodded. "Thanks." He took a breath. "What are you wearing under that jacket?"

Naruto's eyes widened. "Eh? That is a pretty weird question..." Thinking for a moment, he unzipped the top few teeth of his jacket zipper and peered inside. "Looks like a black t-shirt with Konoha's symbol on it...why?" He zipped his jacket back up.

The anthropomorphic wolf laughed a bit sheepishly. "Eh, I just prefer it when guys like you are wearing regular shirts instead of net shirts when they're stuffing themselves." He laughed heartily at Naruto's flabbergasted expression.

Still chuckling, he led Naruto inside the restaurant, where he quickly got the two of them seats, where they were soon looking through their menus. Seeing a waiter come by, Hunter waved him over. "Hi!" Hunter chirped up, ignoring the man's confusion at his appearance. "Can I get the jumbo steak/rib combo?"

"S-sure," the man replied, scribbling it down on his notepad. He looked towards Naruto. "And for you, sir?"

Naruto spent a few more moments looking through the menu before he replied...
11211222112.title: "I'm craving meat right about now."

choices: The two polish off the rest of their steak.
They wait a little while longer before finishing.
112112221121.content:
"Hmm, the jumbo steak/rib combo, eh? Sounds pretty good," started Naruto, "got any sizes bigger than jumbo?" Both the waiter and Hunter raised an eyebrow at Naruto's question.

"Well, we uhhh, have the jumbo DELUXE steak/rib combo, but that's about as big as it gets," responded the waiter. Naruto grinned, then nodded with certainty and said, "Then I'll have one of those!" as both he and Hunter handed the waiter back the menus. "And to drink?"
"Oh, just some orange juice would be nice," said Hunter.
"Cola if you've got it," responded Naruto. The waiter once again scribbled on his notepad and carried on.
"Jumbo deluxe combo, eh?"
"Hey, wolf or not, I'll be damned if I'm gonna let someone who isn't even going to stuff himself show me up on a meal."

Hunter smirked happily. Seemed Naruto was starting to come around to this little venture, and perhaps a little competitive edge was just what he needed to get Naruto completely on board and stuffing himself to his absolute max. So, after a moment, Hunter said, "I dunno, the jumbo combo's pretty big as is. You sure you can stomach it?"

As if to answer his question, Naruto's stomach let out a hungry growl which almost sounded as angry as Naruto would have sounded answering himself. Smirking, Naruto turned to Hunter and said, "Oh don't you worry about me, slim. Before you know it, you're gonna learn a thing or two about how a real warrior eats." Hunter was indeed hoping that would be true.

Sure enough, the food was ready. The waiter brought both their drinks, then the main courses. For Hunter; a large platter of sirloin steak and BBQ ribs, and to Naruto; a much larger platter with much larger servings. Naruto's eyes widened with shock at the sheer size of his meal-to-be, but the wonderfully rich smell of smoked beef and BBQ sauce was enough to make both their mouths water with anticipation. Wasting absolutely no time, both dug right into their meals.

As if in unison, both Hunter and Naruto grabbed the ribs stack with their hands and sunk their faces into the juicy, sauce laden pork. Hunter occasionally glanced back at Naruto with amazement to see the boy 'wolfing' down his larger stack at a considerably faster rate than he was currently eating. Internally cheering, he knew his plan to get Naruto going was working like a charm.

Naruto was an eating machine, tearing big heaping chunks of meat from the bones and gulping down big hearty mouthfuls at the seams, and all with no lag time between the next go. Glancing at the boy's stomach, he could see it begin to push out ever so slightly with every gulp of meat deposited into his abdomen, and still, he pressed on. Suddenly, Hunter glanced down at his own stomach, and winced slightly. He'd almost forgotten how filling these sauce drenched ribs could be sometimes. Naruto caught this moment and smirked cockily before saying, "Aww, what's the matter? Is the big bad wolfie's itty bitty tummy full already?"

At first, Hunter didn't quite appreciate Naruto's taunting him, but then he stopped and thought about it: if Naruto was joking around with him, then maybe he was starting to loosen up around him afterall, which would make this escapade even better. Still, Hunter wasn't one to be considered a light weight, despite his currently flat stomach. And so, he began to pick up the pace a bit. All the while, both their stomachs continued to expand little by little with each passing rib consumed.

Before they knew it, the ribs were all but reduced to a pile of bones on eat of their platters. Licking his sauce smeared lips, Hunter sighed with relief and patted his belly happily. To his surprise, his stomach no longer felt flat, but slightly concave, distending outward at a slight curve. Naruto's own belly began to press slightly against his jacket, enough to satisfy anyone else. Naruto on the other hand, was already sinking his fork and knife into his giant piece of steak. Not wanting to appear weak, Hunter also began to dig into his sirloin.

Eat bite of steak was a blast of juicy, well seasoned flavor. Of which, both enjoyed immensely as they continued to gorge themselves on steak. As time went on, their pace began to slow down just slightly, and their bellies had begun to visibly distend. Both took a brief moment to rest up and catch their breath. "Ohh man, now THESE people know how to cook a steak..." said Naruto as he rubbed his bloated belly tenderly with both hands. While not quite full, he was starting to get his (or in this case; Hunter's) money's worth with this place alone.

Hunter however, was feeling a bit more strained as he groaned slightly and began to massage his stomach slowly from over his shirt. His belly had expanded just slightly, creating a vaguely noticeable bump in his shirt, enough to lift his t-shirt slightly and expose a sliver of brown belly-fur from the bottom of his shirt. It had been quite a while since he'd eaten so much at once, and his stomach needed a little more time to adjust than Naruto's did. And sure enough, adjust it did, when from out of Hunter's maw, came a surprisingly loud burp. Blushing, he immediately covered his mouth and apologetically said, "Excuse me! I-I'm terribly sorry about that!" he said with embarrassment, much to Naruto's amusement as he laughed aloud at Hunter's embarrassment and expense.

"Haha, good one, wolf-boy!" nudged Naruto to the still embarrassed wolf, "But let's see you top this..." and as those words left the blond's mouth, Naruto clutched his bloated abdomen with one hand and let out a belch loud and long enough to be mistaken; ironically enough, for a wolf's roar. After a few deafening seconds which caused Hunter's ears to twitch slightly, Naruto smacked his lips and patted his belly happily. "Ahh, much better," said Naruto, giving his stomach more good bad. He then glanced back at Hunter, and said, "Oh, c'mon, even you gotta admit that your stomach's feeling a little better now."

Considering his remark, Hunter placed his palm flat against his stomach. It seemed to have deflated just slightly, and it did indeed feel much less tense. Not only that, but if Hunter didn't know better, he was starting to feel hungry again.

And so...
112112221121.title: "I'll get the same as him, but bigger!"

choices: "The buffet; I'm gonna show you just how far I can go!"
"It's been a while since I've had baked goods; let's do the bakery!"
1121122211211.content:
It wasn't long before the two picked up their utensils and began to tackle the remaining steak. Hunter ate at a somewhat quick but nonetheless leisurely pace, savoring the taste of the steak. Naruto, as he had before, attacked his steak with a will, cutting off pieces, shoveling them into his mouth, chewing, and swallowing before repeating the process.

Hunter watched with rapt attention even as he chewed his steak, still fascinated by the ease with which Naruto got himself into a groove and how smoothly he kept himself going. What was more fascinating, though, was how Naruto's belly continued to bulge slightly with every piece of steak that entered it, beginning to press a bit harder against his jacket.

Damn, look at him go, Hunter mused, cutting another piece of steak for himself. Hope he can keep this up...

Eventually, Naruto dropped his utensils, the plate in front of him utterly depleted save for a few drops of sauce. Licking his lips, he leaned back in his chair, rubbing his belly with one hand. "Gotta say," he admitted, looking across the table at Hunter, "Ya did real good this time, wolfy."

Hunter, ignoring the nickname, smirked. "Thanks," he replied, leaning back in his own chair with one hand resting upon his belly. He'd finished his steak a good bit before Naruto had, and the bump in his shirt had grown rounder and more apparent, forcing his shirt up a bit more to reveal more of his brown, furry belly. He blushed a bit at this realization, but shrugged it off; even if it had been a while, it's not like it hadn't happened to him before...

Choosing to set that thought aside for the moment, he redirected his attention towards Naruto's belly, and couldn't help but grin a bit. The blonde's midsection now bulged quite noticeably against his jacket, and was now visibly distended. It was still completely concealed underneath the clothing, of course, but hopefully that would change soon.

Hunter whistled (odd, considering he had a muzzle instead of human lips, but that's neither here nor there) and smiled at Naruto. "You did real good yourself, Naruto."

Patting his belly, Naruto looked down at the swollen appendage. "Heh; I did, didn't I?"

Laughing, Hunter took his wallet out and plunked some more money down on the table. "Sure did..." He smirked. "But, uh, you're not full yet, are ya?"

Naruto smirked. "Heh; you wish! I've just gotten started!" Pushing away from the table, getting to his feet.

Wagging his tail, Hunter did the same. "Now that's what I like to hear!" He and Naruto began walking towards the exit. "Alright, so where do ya wanna go next? There's a really good bakery nearby that's having a sale, but there's also a buffet if you're not sure what to have." He turned back towards Naruto, grinning. "So, what'll it be, chief?"

Folding his arms, Naruto thought as they exited the restaurant. After a minute or two, he finally replied...
1121122211211.title: The two polish off the rest of their steak.

choices: Family sized bowls of Ramen
Various beef shanks and kebabs.
11211222112111.content:
"Y'know what? Let's go with the buffet this time! I'm gonna show you just how far I can REALLY go," decided Naruto, slapping his bloated belly for emphasis, causing it to jiggle just slightly from beneath his shirt and jacket. Hunter's tail wagged happily upon hearing this. "Sounds great! Let's get going then!" And so, the two headed off to the restaurant, still cradling their distended tummies along the way.

Upon reaching the buffet, Hunter; like an excited child, trotted along to the waiter up front and said, "Hiya! Can we get a table for two, please?" Paying up front, the waiter nodded, then seated both to a nearby table. The surplus of various aromas was overwhelming enough to almost make them forget how much steak and ribs they had just previously eaten.

"Say, I was thinking..." started Naruto, catching Hunter's attention, "since this an all-you-can-eat place, how about we make it interesting this time around?" Hunter was intrigued, "What do you mean?"
"Well, earlier you said you were a pretty big eater too. And after that steak and rib combo, I'd say you kinda lived up to your word," responded Naruto, gesturing towards Hunter's distended stomach, causing him to chuckle slightly.

"So how about we see which one of us is the bigger eater?"
"W-what, you mean, like an eating contest?"
"You know it! I mean, that is unless you're chicken..." as if to drive his point, Naruto began making clucking and other various / cliched chicken sounds.

Hunter wasn't quite sure at first, because if he were to go all out and completely stuff himself, then he may not be able to enjoy watching Naruto stuff himself fully the way he had hoped to see. On the other hand, Naruto's got a thing for competition, and that competitive edge seemed to really drive him to outdo himself in a lot of his previous stuffing escapades. Maybe it's what he needed to roll with if he wanted Naruto to REALLY go all out this time. And so, Hunter smirked and said, "You're on, then! Whoever can put away the most plates is the biggest eater amongst us!" Naruto was excited to prove that he could not only out-eat anyone in Konoha, but a WOLF of all things, while Hunter; too, was excited, to see how far he could push Naruto on his consumption conquest.

With that, they were off.

Grabbing a plate, Hunter began to top his plate with various dumplings, some honey sesame breaded chicken, and some shrimp. When he turned to Naruto however, he saw his plate had similar items, but in much higher volume. His previous meal, while filling, was also notably smaller than Naruto's, and so to make sure it would be fair, he put an equally ridiculous amount of food atop his plate and sat back down. Wasting no time, the two began to inhale the dumplings a few at a time. For a buffet, the food was quite delicious, bursting with flavor in every bite. "Mmmm, pretty good dumplings! Wonder if they've got any tempura." noted Naruto between bites. Gulping a larger than usual mouthful down, Naruto sighed then got to work on his own pile of breaded chicken.

The dumplings alone began to cause Naruto's belly to stretch out even further, to the point where they were beginning to cause a bit of a strain against his attire. But Naruto disregarded the strain and simply continued to eat, expanding just little by little as the food began to pile up within his gut. Hunter had also made some impressive progress. Having just finished his immense pile of dumplings, Hunter sighed and leaned back against his chair, rubbing his belly in satisfaction. Glancing down, he began to see more of his bare fur coated belly exposed from beneath the visible but small bulge emanating from his torso. "Mmm, they ARE pretty tasty, aren't they?" said Hunter. Naruto simply nodded as he continued to ingest more chicken. Not wanting to fall behind, Hunter also got to work on his chicken, at a surprisingly quicker pace than normal.

Some time had passed, but eventually, their plates were licked squeaky clean. Both Naruto and Hunter merely sat for a moment, rubbing their aching bellies in an effort to coax the stress from eating so much. Between the two, Naruto's stomach had distended to a more noticeable size than Hunter's, but all things considered, he wasn't doing half bad. After a few moments, the two hoisted themselves from their seats and got themselves drinks. Like before, Hunter poured himself a cup of Orange Juice while Naruto poured himself a bubbly cup of cola, then set them on the table before heading back for their next plate.

What would their next plate consist of?
11211222112111.title: "The buffet; I'm gonna show you how far I can go!"

choices: The two continue to eat until the bowls are halfway depleted and take a breather
The two continue eating, finishing the bowls and going back for more
112112221121111.content:
It didn't take long for Naruto to find his next course; specifically, a truly gigantic bowl of ramen that easily dwarfed Ichiraku's biggest bowls; it would have easily fed a group of four or five. Grinning, he picked it up, struggling a bit under its weight, much to the shock of the attending cook. Hunter, seeing this, followed suit and grabbed a giant bowl of his own.

Naruto shot him an odd look. "Huh? You're getting ramen too?"

Hunter shrugged, even as the two began walking back to their table. "Hey, I've never had ramen before, and I figured this is a good opportunity to start." He leaned his muzzle in close to the steaming bowl and took a deep whiff. "Ah...smells delicious."

Naruto frowned, leaning in close to his own bowl and sniffing it. "Maybe, but it probably still won't be as good as..." He suddenly stopped as the smell assailed his nostrils. No way...couldn't be... Beside him, Hunter was doing his best not to grin. Reaching their table, they sat down, with Hunter picking up a pair of chopsticks and splitting them, but Naruto continued to stare at the bowl of ramen, sniffing it once more. "Nah, couldn't be..." Naruto murmured to himself even as he prepared his own chopsticks. Hunter watched him, a knowing smirk on his muzzle even as he reached his chopsticks into his own bowl and drew some of the noodles up to his muzzle, blowing on them to cool them off a bit.

Tentatively, Naruto did the same, bringing a few noodles to his lips, blowing on them, and slurping them up. As soon as they traveled down his gullet, his eyes bulged. "No way...is this...Ichiraku's?!"

Laughing, Hunter slurped up a few of his own noodles, tail wagging at the taste. "Got it in one."

"B-but how..." Naruto stammered, even as he drew up a large helping of noodles and toppings.

Hunter chuckled, taking a swig of his orange juice. "Remember I said I had a surprise you? I made arrangements for this buffet to serve Ichiraku's, at least for the day." He gave Naruto a surprisingly apologetic look. "I kinda figured, seeing as how I gipped you outta going to Ichiraku's in the first place, I kinda owed it to ya, ya know?"

"...thanks," Naruto finally said, oddly touched. He slurped up his new helping of noodles, not taking his eyes off the wolf.

Hunter shrugged, smiling. "Hey, I'm a lotta things: crazy, weird, and without a lick of common sense, but I still like to pride myself on being a nice guy...or wolf." He drew up some noodles and topping, slurping them into his muzzle. "Oh wow, this is really good..."

At this, Naruto shook himself out of his shocked state and grinned. "I know, right? Ichiraku's is the best!" Giggling, he dove back into the gigantic bowl, this time with gusto. Hunter, seeing this, got a fierce gleam in his eye and followed suit, slurping up noodles and various topping, even as he marveled at how good they tasted.

The two continued on at this pace, slurping up noodles and toppings like there was no tomorrow. And, considering how much food was already in their bellies, it didn't take long for it to start to show, much to Hunter's delight; for every mouthful of ramen that entered the blond's gullet, his already distended belly bulged a tiny bit, creating more strain against his clothing. And, as he continued to gulp down the contents of the massive bowl, it only continued to grow.

Suddenly curious, Hunter let one hand wander down to his stomach, even as his other occupied itself with scooping up more ramen. Sure enough, with every mouthful he swallowed, his tummy bulged a little bit, the shape slowly growing bigger and more prominent, in addition to slowly lifting his shirt further up. Blushing a bit, Hunter nonetheless shook his head and returned his full attention to his meal.

The minutes ticked by, with both ninja and wolf attacking their ramen, their stomachs slowly swelling to accommodate it all; still, at this point, they'd barely even made a dent in the massive bowl. Choosing to ignore his own growth for the time being, Hunter focused on Naruto, even as he devoured his own meal. To his delight, Naruto's stomach continued to grow steadily, pushing more and more against his jacket. Ooh...won't be long now... Hunter thought giddily.

Indeed, as Naruto gulped down his latest mouthful, a couple of the teeth of jacket came apart, the first of many losing battles his clothes would fight before the day was out. Feeling this, and looking slightly puzzled, Naruto looked down at his stomach. His eyes widened when he saw the teeth pried apart, but he shrugged and kept on going, not wanting to lose his groove. A few more gulps, and a few more teeth popped apart, this time exposing a bit of the black t-shirt he wore underneath. Several more gulps, and a couple more teeth gave up the ghost, showing a bit more of the black shirt, as well as a hint of flesh beneath it; evidently, his t-shirt had begun to be affected even before his jacket had.

Hunter continued to watching, his tail wagging. Oh wow, look at him go...and we've barely made any progress on the bowls yet! He continued to slurp up his own noodles, watching Naruto as he did so. This is gonna be epic, I can tell!
112112221121111.title: Family sized bowls of Ramen

choices: Consume the rest of their Ichiraku's and go for more food.
Sit a while longer, and digest a bit before moving onto the second half.
1121122211211111.content:
More time went as both continued to slurp down their noodles a seemingly unstoppable pace. With every mouthful gulped down, more and more, their respective bellies continued to distend outward little by little. Hunter's stomach, while smaller than Naruto's continued to bloat outward, growing rounder and larger with every ridiculously large mouthful gulped down into his gullet, exposing more of his furry brown belly as his t-shirt continued to lift from the increased mass.

Meanwhile, Naruto's notably larger stomach only pushed outward more and more, causing more of the teeth in his jacket to separate as it continued to open more and more. His t-shirt had already begun to rise up from beneath his jacket, to the point where more flesh began to expose itself from beneath Naruto's bottom open jacket. Hunter was still too occupied with filling his own growing gullet to see how much of an impact the ramen had on Naruto's gut.

After several minutes of this, the bowls had reached their half way points, and both Naruto and Hunter, stopped to catch their breath, and in unison, burped loudly, before resting their hands atop their semi-exposed bellies, and sighing with relief. "My word, no wonder you like Ichiraku's so much. That's the best ramen I've ever eaten in my life!' explained Hunter as he licked his maw happily. Smiling, Naruto nodded and said, "You got that right! Man oh man, I think this'll be the most Ichiraku's I ever wolf down in one sitting." Hunter chuckled at the 'wolfing down' remark, then continued to rub his distended gut firmly until he finally noticed how distended Naruto's belly had become. His eyes widened with joy as Naruto's stomach had grown to the point where it looked like he had swallowed a small beach ball. His t-shirt had risen to expose flesh just below his belly-button, and his jacket had all but completely split open, save for a few zipper teeth near the top. "Wow, that ramen really did a number on you, didn't it?" said Hunter as he gestured towards Naruto's balloon belly. Looking down, Naruto smirked and gave his belly a hearty slap then said, "Haha, well Ichiraku's tends to do that."
"Do you think you can still finish the rest? Afterall, we're only half way in."
"Hey, man, when it comes to Ichiraku's, I never leave a bowl unfinished. Even if that bowl just happens to be family sized..."

The two laughed for a moment and continued to rest their swollen stomachs. Then Naruto said, "Y'know, I gotta say, despite how things started, this is actually turning out to be a pretty awesome night." Hunter's tail wagged as he smiled and said, "Really?"
"Sure! Not a lot of people...or animals would go so out of their way to treat me to a feast this epic, let alone actually manage to keep up with me when it comes to eating Ichiraku's," responded Naruto as he gestured Hunter's own belly, causing him to rub the back of his fuzzy head, flattered by Naruto's remark. "...You're alright, Hunter."
Hunter smiled grateful for that remark, and very gratefully said, "Thank you."
1121122211211111.title: They eat until halfway through and take a breather

choices: They plow through their plates, not stopping even as their pants grow tighter
Partway through, they stop to unbutton their pants
11211222112111111.content:
Naruto and Hunter only spent a couple more minutes resting their stomachs before diving back into their ramen with gusto, continuing to gulp down massive mouthfuls of ramen and toppings. And, as before, their bellies bulged out with every mouthful, doing their best to make room for the food.

Hunter's rounded, furry tummy slowly grew larger and more apparent, forcing his shirt further up and exposing a bit more of his brown-furred midsection; any further, and it wouldn't be long before his furred-over belly-button would be showing as well. Midway through his current mouthful, Hunter winced as the waistband of his shorts started to cut into his stomach, but he pressed on; he probably had a little while before he'd need to unbutton them, after all...

Naruto, seeing that Hunter wasn't letting up, grinned and continued on with his meal as well. With every swallow, his larger stomach bulged out more and more, continuing to lift his shirt up. A few bulges later, and the black article of clothing exposed his stomach from half of his belly-button downwards. Hunter, noting this with glee, picked up his pace, eager to get to the same point. Not one to be outdone, Naruto returned the grin and quickened his pace as well.

Bigger and bigger their stomachs bloated, and higher and higher their shirts rose up. Naruto's belly button continued to peek out more and more, until finally, his shirt had risen up to expose it in its entirety. Hunter, on the other hand, was currently where Naruto had just been, half of his furred-over belly button poking out for the whole world to see. Undeterred by this, the two went even faster, consuming their Ichiraku's like there was no tomorrow. Quicker and quicker their shirts slid up, and tighter and tighter their waistbands became.

Eventually, all that remained of their bowls was the frankly formidable quantity of broth left within them. Rubbing their stomachs (which, in Hunter's case, exposed his furry navel in its entirety, and in Naruto's case, a good few inches above it), they seized the massive bowls, opened their mouths, and tilted the bowls back, letting the savory liquid flow down their gullets. Almost like water being poured into a balloon, their bellies slowly inflated to accommodate it, pushing out more and making their shirts ride even higher up. In addition, the strain on the respective waistline steadily increased, but they ignored it for the moment; they were doing too good to stop now.

Finally, after a minute or two of gulping down the broth, they slammed their bowls down, sighed, and leaned back in their chairs, massaging their bloated bellies.

"Oh man..." Hunter moaned, rubbing his belly with one hand while resting his other arm on the chair. "That...that was the best ramen I've ever tasted." He burped, but only smiled and licked his muzzle at this.

Naruto, choosing to massage his gut with both hands, merely grinned. "Well, it's Ichiraku's; of course its amazing." He shook his exposed belly, giggling a bit at how the broth inside it caused it to slosh a bit.

Hunter chuckled, but winced as a sharp pain in his waistline interrupted him; his shorts were beginning to become unbearably tight. Naruto, likewise, groaned and massaged his belly as a sudden bolt of pain shot through his waistline as well. However, neither of them made any move to unbutton their pants; as at ease as they had become, they were still in a competitive spirit, and in no mood to show any weakness to the other.

They sat there for a few more minutes, gently massaging their exposed tummies before, with a groan, they hoisted themselves up out of their chairs, their guts shaking and sloshing a bit. Blushing, they nonetheless made their way back to the buffet, grabbing plates and loading them up with all manner of sweets: cake, cookies, dango, ice cream, and every other baked good and dessert known to man. Almost staggering under the weight of both their plates and their midsections, they lurched back to their table and practically dropped their plates down, plopping their rumps in their seats shortly afterwards. Gently rubbing their bellies, they burped a few times to make some room before diving into their plates.
11211222112111111.title: Consume the rest of their Ichiraku's and go...

choices: They polish off the dessert plates with gusto and take another breather
The pressure becomes too much and the buttons to their pants finally give in
112112221121111111.content:
Wasting no time at all, the two immediately began to consume the sweet contents on their plates. Hunter was shoveling as many cookies as he could fit in his paws right into his mouth, chewing on them and gulping down big hearty mouthfuls before shoveling even more into his mouth. Naruto on the other hand, was stuffing his face with a hearty bowl of ice cream, shoving one mouthful after another. After a few bites, he stopped and winced at the ensuing brain freeze, earning an amused chuckle from Hunter before he regained composure and resumed scarfing down more cookies. After a moment, Naruto got back to work on his ice cream, suffering through it as best he could. All the while, both their stomachs continued to push outward with every other mouthful, causing further strains against their pants.

A few minutes later, they had both completed the first wave of desserts, and immediately moved onto the next wave. Hunter and Naruto immediately decided on their cakes and wasted no time scarfing big heaping chunks from their forks into their respective mouths. The vanilla cake was heavy on cream, occasionally spilling over each others faces. Occasionally, they'd stop and notice the smears on their faces, end would end up giggling like children. Naruto would wipe his face with a napkin while Hunter's tongue was long enough to simply lick the frosting from his face and resume eating. Their bellies continued to expand all the while, causing the front of both their pants to creak up under the vast pressure from all the added weight.

By the time they had both finished that rich slice of cake, they needed to stop for a moment and catch their breath, whilst rubbing their aching bellies in an effort to sooth their discomfort. Burping deeply into his paw, Hunter groaned as he rubbed his bloated furry belly firmly all over. "Ugh, I honestly don't think I've ever eaten this much before in my life..." said the wolf as he took a drink of his orange juice to try and cool his belly down.

"Awww, don't tell me you're calling it quits now, Wolfie..." responded Naruto as he continued to massage his own bloated midsection. Still in competitive spirits, Hunter put his glass down and said, "Sorry, Naruto, but you're not gonna beat me THAT easily." Smirking, Naruto nodded then took a hearty gulp of his soda, causing his belly to expand outward slightly more due to the vast ingestion of carbonation entering his stomach at once. The button to his zipper was on the verge of snapping right off. "Glad to hear it. I mean, I'm gonna beat you regardless, but I'm hoping you'll at least make it a challenge for me first," said Naruto smugly before a huge belch erupted from the young ninja's mouth, causing his belly to deflate just slightly, just enough to decrease the tension to the waist of his pants for the time being.

"Oh, trust me, that's not going to be a problem," responded Hunter before the competitive edge he was working got the better of him, and led to him chugging the rest of his orange juice in one go, also causing his belly to distend outward and strain the button to his khakis. He then clutched his bloated belly and let a slightly louder burp than Naruto's. The sheer amount of gas exiting his belly also caused his stomach to deflate just enough before tearing into the waist of his pants.

A moment passed before the two burst into complete laughter, causing their bloated bellies to slosh around in the process. "Haha, NICE one, man!" said Naruto before high fiving Hunter, causing his tail to wag happily. "Oh man, first I get to eat more Ichiraku's than I've ever eaten in one sitting, now I'm having a burping contest with a different species? This night just gets more and more awesome as it goes!" Hunter smiled warmly at the remark, then said, "I'm very happy to hear that, Naruto. Thank you. Now...you ready to lose?"

Scoffing, Naruto confidently said, "Yeah, about as ready as you are to have your fur completely shaved off in the winter!" Hunter stopped and grimaced for a second, trying to suppress an unfortunate moment in his youth where that had in fact happened to him, then regained his composure. The two then immediately dove into the third wave of their desserts, all the while straining the waist to their pants even further.
112112221121111111.title: They plow through their plates.

choices: They finish their plates, and decide to have a cola-chugging contest
They finish their plates, and decide to go somewhere else
1121122211211111112.content:
Naruto and Hunter both winced as they attacked a few massive slices of pie, sharp bolts of pain shooting through their waistlines as their stomachs swelled and pressed harder against their pants and shorts, respectively. Somewhere at the back of their heads, their minds screamed at them to stop, to unbutton their pants, before they ended up regretting it. However, their competitive spirits were at full blaze, and they soldiered on, ignoring these very well-meaning warnings.

They were maintaining an even pace with each other, something neither of them failed to notice. To this end, their unoccupied hands/paws reached out as they used the occupied one to keep shoveling pie into their waiting maws, their empty hands finding a spoon and scooping copious amounts of ice cream into their mouths alongside the pie. This created a rather pleasant pie a la mode flavor, but they barely noticed; they were too focused on cramming their maws and getting ahead of the other.

However, despite their best efforts, they still maintained an even pace with one another. All the while, their stomachs continued to grow, pushing their shirts further up, and creating even more strain on their pants in the process. Soon, their pants buttons began creaking audibly, clear indicators that they were losing the struggle. Then, they began quivering violently.

Finally, as another huge mouthful of pie and ice cream traveled down their gullets, it finally happened.

With an audible 'POP!', Naruto's pants button sailed off, flying under the table and striking Hunter in the foot. The young ninja felt an immense sense of relief as the button vacated itself and a few of the teeth of his fly undid themselves, followed by sheer embarrassment at the realization of what had just happened.

Likewise, as Naruto's button hit Hunter's foot, the wolf yelped, the motion causing his shorts button to bust as well. Luckily, it flew in an upwards arc, striking the underside of the table and clattering harmlessly to the floor. As the pressure in his waistline released, Hunter sighed with relief, his long tongue lolling out the side of his mouth. "Oh man..." he moaned, dropping his utensils and leaning back as he rubbed his belly. "That feels so much better..."

Naruto, dropping his own fork and spoon, gaped at the wolf. "How can you be so calm?!" Naruto exclaimed, feeling around his waistline and blushing intensely. "We just busted our buttons!"

Hunter waved dismissively back. "Eh, don't sweat it; I know a great seamstress with great prices; we'll get our pants fixed up after this is all over and done with. More to the point..." He leaned forward as much as his belly would allow and smirked. "Doesn't that feel better?"

Naruto thought for a moment. "Well, yeah; my stomach doesn't hurt as much anymore..." He fixed Hunter with a fierce grin. "...which means I can just keep goin'!"

Hunter laughed heartily, picking up his utensils again. "That's the spirit!"

Naruto chuckled before a thought occured to him. "Just one question..."

Hunter paused, a large forkful of pie halfway to his muzzle. "Yeah, Naruto?"

"Are you goin' commando or what?" Naruto asked, causing Hunter to splutter a bit at this. "I mean, since our buttons are gone, there's nothin' to stop our guts from forcing our zippers open, and I just wanna make sure I don't see any more than I need to..."

Hunter, still a bit shocked at the question, nodded. "Don't worry, I'm wearing undies." He smirked, plopping his forkful into his mouth. "Just hope you are too.." he retorted through a mouthful of pie.

Naruto blushed. "O-of course I am! What do you take me for?!"

Shaking his head and smiling, Hunter swallowed his mouthful before he resumed going to town on his ice cream and pie. Not one to be outdone, Naruto quickly followed suit.
1121122211211111112.title: Pop!

choices: The two continue drinking away, but Naruto gains momentum.
The two contine drinking away, but somehow Hunter gains the upper hand
11211222112111111121.content:
Both Naruto and Hunter continued to wolf down the remnants of deserts atop their plates, as their bellies continued to expand outward free of any obstructions. The two devoured their pastries and various desserts at an equally quick pace, due to the extra space their busted pants now permitted them. Scooping up bits of ice cream alongside his fork of pie, Hunter continued to ingest both at once, while Naruto would grab a handful of dango pieces and just stuff it right into his eager maw. Spending a good while chewing the many sweets in his mouth, and taking the briefest of moments to enjoy the plethora of flavor each one emitted within his mouth, he would swallow a big heaping mouthful and send it straight into his growing gullet before stuffing yet another handful of dango into his jaws.

As more time passed, their ridiculously loaded plates began to lighten as more and more of the deserts were going straight into the bloated stomachs of the ninja and wolf. All the while, their bellies continued to expand outward just a little more than they already had, to the point where both looked like they had swallowed medicine balls, give or take a few size differences between them.

Finally, after several seemingly endless minutes, the two had licked their plates clean, and were now resting against their chairs, blissfully rubbing their ridiculously bloated stomachs slowly in satisfaction and in an effort to coax the strain of overindulgence. "Man...I don't think I've ever eaten this much in my life...." said a beyond stuffed Hunter as he rubbed his paw all across his domed out belly as best he could. Smiling, Naruto drummed his fingers atop his even larger fleshy globe of a gut and said, "You're telling me, wolfie...can't even remember the last time I felt this full...nor can I remember the last time ANYBODY managed to keep up with me all the way through in a binge like this." Wagging his tail feebly, Hunter chuckled, patting his belly happily and said, "Glad I could give you a run for your effort. I suppose we should call it a draw then?"

Shaking his head, Naruto slowly hoisted himself and his distended gut from his seat. Struggling slightly under his newfound weight, he headed over to the vending machine. Curious, Hunter looked back at Naruto's direction and watched as he grabbed two empty pitchers usually used to serve entire tables of people and began to fill them both up with cola.
