He raised an eyebrow curiously as Naruto brought both pitchers back to the table. Glancing at them, Hunter noted that they were both an equal amount of soda.

"What's this for?" asked Hunter, to which Naruto replied with, "Think of this as the tie breaker. See, any time Kiba and I would have these little eating competitions to see who could eat the most or the fastest, more often than not, we'd both end up at one tie after another. So, what we'd do if ever we tied, is we'd take these giant pitchers of soda, and just chug away." Hunter gulped nervously at the concept, "and whoever finished their pitcher of cola first would be the winner."

With that said, he slid Hunter his pitcher as he glanced down nervously at the bubbly drink and hesitantly said, "Umm, actually, Naruto, I've never been a huge fan of soda. That's why I always settle for things like juice or milk whenever I go out." Naruto scoffed then said, "Oh please. If you kept up this far, I'm sure you're more than tough enough to handle a little bit of cola."

Hunter was taken back for a moment. It was very seldom anyone ever called him tough, which; cheesy enough, made his tail wag just slightly with appreciation. Then at that moment, yet another thought entered his mind. All that carbonation and liquid would bloat Naruto's belly up to a whole new level, ESPECIALLY if he's going to drink it as fast as he can. If it meant he'd have to suffer through the bubbly beverage to get Naruto going again, then it would at least be worth it. And so, Hunter smiled and grabbed one of the two pitchers.

"Remember, the first to drink all their soda wins. Ready? Chug!" With that, both lifted the pitchers to their lips and began to chug heaping bounds of cola all at once. Hunter visibly winced at first at the excess carbonation floating and sizzling atop his tongue and heading straight to his ever expanding belly, but after a little while, the immediate dislike began to wade away. Instead, he found himself chugging at a faster rate than before, with a smile slowly creeping over his maw, which Naruto caught as he chugged, causing him to smirk too, as he couldn't help but feel a little proud of the wolf for getting over his dislike of the beverage so quickly.

After a few moments, Hunter put his pitcher down and gasped for breath. "Wow, that's actually some pretty sweet stuff!" He exclaimed, then clutched his belly firmly with one hand, "but man is it doing a number on my stomach..." As soon as those words exited Hunter's mouth, he paused for a moment and let out a sharp, bassy belch, followed by a much softer burp immediately afterward. "Excuse me," he muttered as Naruto stopped for a breather, and promptly let out a massive burp of his own shortly after, followed by a sigh of relief and him heartily slapping his belly, before smirking at the wolf and saying, "Admit it, feels kinda good letting all that air outta your belly at once, doesn't it?" Hunter thought for a moment, then shrugged, "Yeah, it kinda does. Hehe, quite fun too!"
"That's the spirit! Now, less talky-more drinky!" With that, Naruto immediately resumed chugging from his pitcher. Caught off guard, Hunter stumbled a tad then continued to chug away at his pitcher as well.

The two had only reached about a quarter of the way into their pitchers, still keeping at an even keel. Occasionally, the two would stop to catch their breath, rub their bellies and burp loudly to make more room for their drinks, then resume drinking in a rather unison fashion, but there would still only be one victor...
11211222112111111121.title: They finish up and have a cola-chugging contest

choices: Naruto wakes up the next morning, and Hunter has ordered breakfast for them
Naruto wakes up, but Hunter is still sleeping
112112221121111111211.content:
As Naruto and Hunter continued to chug away at their pitchers, their bellies steadily swelled as the carbonated liquid entered them, pushing out even further and growing nearer to the table. By this point, both their flies had been forced all the way open, but their positions, as well as their growing guts, kept their undergarments concealed for the time being.

Disregarding this, the two kept chugging away, once again causing their already-engorged midsections to swell up comically, growing ever closer to touching the table, in addition to creating a bit of strain on their fully-opened flies and the side seams. Luckliy, considering only their midsections were growing, the garments would still stay on; however, the seams probably wouldn't make it out intact.

As they both reached the halfway point, Naruto lowered his pitcher to belch loudly and create some more room in his gut. As he did so, he frowned. Was it just him, or did his belly-button feel a little...weird? Shrugging at this thought, he took a breath and lifted his pitcher back to his lips.

Hunter, even as he put his pitcher back down for a quick breather, couldn't help but notice this. He grinned, and his tail wagged; if what he thought was about to happen happened, it'd be unbelievably epic.. Licking his chops, he promptly lifted his pitcher back up to his muzzle and resumed going to town on it, eager not to fall behind.

However, as time went on and the levels of liquid in their pitchers steadily went downwards, Hunter could feel himself beginning to flag; he was chugging for shorter periods of time, taking longer breaks, and burping more often before going back to drinking. Naruto, seeing this, pressed his advantage; he chugged for as long as he possibly could until he felt like he'd bust, slammed the pitcher down, let loose with a titanic belch to free up some room. As he did so, he couldn't help but notice; yes, something definitely felt off about his navel, almost like there was kind of an odd pressure there. This realization caused him to frown a bit, but upon noticing Hunter once again tilting the pitcher up to his muzzle, he disregarded it for the moment and went back to chugging.

In spite of this, Hunter was now noticeably lagging behind; his pitcher had noticeably more soda left in it than Naruto's. In fact, the level of liquid in Naruto's pitcher was going down faster by the minute, feeding into his ever-expanding belly; it had even started to press against the table.

Hunter, noticing this, tried to put on a burst of speed, but no matter how much he burped, rested, or breathed, his distended stomach would accept no more cola. Groaning, Hunter placed his pitcher back on the table, leaning back in his chair and massaging his stuffed tummy with both paws, unable to repress a childish giggle at the way it sloshed, thanks to all the soda inside of it. Burping softly, he looked up to continue watching Naruto's progress.

To his delight, Naruto's stomach had swollen even bigger, his navel peeking up over the table even as his belly pressed visibly against it. His eyes went to the pitcher; it was almost empty, and Naruto showed no signs of slowing down.

Licking his chops to get a few stray drops of cola off, Hunter watched eagerly as the cola continued to flow down Naruto's throat and into his belly. Bigger and bigger it swelled (and tighter and tighter Naruto's belly-button felt, though Hunter had no way of knowing that,) until, finally, Naruto tilted the pitcher all the way back and let the last of the soda flow into his gut.

Two things happened in the instant following that. First, his stomach bulged just a little more. Second, well...

POP!

Hunter let out a little 'squee' of delight while Naruto sighed in relief as the young ninja's navel popped out wards, sticking out and wobbling about for the whole world to see. Slamming the now-empty pitcher back down, he let loose with a might belch and leaned back in his seat, rubbing his engorged tummy with one hand and inspecting his newly-inverted navel with the other. "Oh man, that felt amazing..." he prodded and poked the protrusion a bit, giggling a bit. "Heh, that feels kinda funny..." As he did this, he looked up at Hunter. "Nice job, Hunter; ya didn't win, but ya gave it a damn good try."

Chuckling, Hunter rubbed the back of his head. "Heh heh, thanks!" This was interrupted by a massive belch tearing its way out of his muzzle. "Ugh...I think we mighta overdone it a bit." He indicated the exit with his head. "Ya wanna head back to the inn?"

Naruto belched as well, scooting his chair away from the table. "Yeah; I'm kinda gettin' tired anyway."

Taking a deep breath, both of them hoisted themselves out of their chair, holding their massive bellies as the did so. Groaning a bit, they staggered towards the exit, trying their best to ignore the stares of the other patrons.

It was slow going, what with the slow pace they were forced to take, but eventually, they made it back to Naruto's room at the inn. Sighing in relief, Naruto waddled over to his bed, tossed his open jacket off, and collapsed backwards onto the bed; it creaked under the weight of his midsection, but that was all. Chuckling a bit at this, Hunter staggered over to one of the closets, opened it, and pulled out a futon. Laying it on the floor beside Naruto's bed, he carefully got down to the floor,laid on his side on top of the futon, and rolled onto his back, his huge belly sticking up into the air like Naruto's was.

In a short amount of time, they had both fallen asleep in a food coma nap, their snores the only sound between them.
112112221121111111211.title: A winner!

choices: Competition gets the better of them again.
They finish their hearty breakfast with gusto.
1121122211211111112111.content:
The sun shines down upon the young ninja's face, eventually waking him from his food induced slumber. Wincing from the bright light, he eventually sat up and yawned heartily as he stretched his arms up, and eventually brought one down to scratch his stomach from under his shirt. Looking down, he lifted his shirt up and felt his stomach more closely to see that it had done the seemingly impossible, and digested virtually all of his immense meal from the night prior, and had returned to his previously flat state from before, with just a tiny amount of fat layered down to his lower abdomen, near and below his once again normal innie-belly button.

Dropping his shirt back down, he stretched a little more, then rose from his bed. Groggily, he rubbed his eyes and sluggishly looked around the room, to see no sign of Hunter. Until the door to the bathroom opened, and out came a wide awake and recently showered Hunter just putting on a new shirt. Turning, he spotted Naruto, and with a smile said in a tone that only a morning person could have, "Morning, sunshine!"

"Mornin'," mumbled Naruto, as he rubbed his face, still trying to wake himself. Glancing down, he saw that, like himself; Hunter's stomach seemed to had digested virtually all of his meal over the course of their deep slumber and had returned to its' once again flat state. "Guess I'm not the only one who digests stuff fast." Smirking, Hunter patted his stomach and said, "Guess not. But hey, that's us wolves for ya! Still, that was some gooooood eating, wasn't it?"

Naruto smiled, still practically tasting the many flavors from last nights binge. "Suuuuuure was. Hell, I haven't even that good in ages!" said Naruto, as he rubbed his stomach reminiscently. Then continued with, "Y'know, speaking of which, I don't think I properly thanked you for that. I mean, I know we kinda got off on the wrong foot, but it was still really cool of you to treat me to so many great eats like that. So, thank you very much, Hunter." Hunter smiled, brushing the back of his head, and said, "My absolute pleasure, Naruto. Still," his smile faded away a bit as he continued, "I feel real bad for that ambush before. I didn't really think there was any other way I'd get you to go eat and hang out last night, but that doesn't excuse what I did. So, I'm really sorry about that."

Chuckling, Naruto waved his hand dismissively and said, "Oh, don't worry about the dart thing, I'm waaaaaaaay over that. But do it again, and I'll shave off your fur and leave you in an igloo." Laughing slightly, Hunter nodded and said, "You got yourself a deal." Still, his smile wavered a bit, as he looked away, almost somber, catching Naruto's attention. "Hey, you okay, man?" asked Naruto, to which Hunter simply nodded, then said, "It's just that, I have associates and employers and all that, but I...well, I don't really have a lot of friends. And, getting to see what it was like last night; even if just for a night, felt nice..."

Smiling, Naruto walked up to the distraught wolf then held his hand out, much to Hunter's surprise. "Well, Hunter, you've got a friend now." Hunter didn't know what to say. Finally, he shook Naruto's hand and smiled, completely humbled and grateful. "Thank you, Naruto." He replied, tail wagging happily, much to Naruto's amusement.

The moment was quickly halted when a loud rumbling emanated from within the room. Chuckling sheepishly, Naruto placed a hand on his noisy tummy and said, "Hehe, guess last nights feasting didn't sate me as long as I thought it would." Suddenly there was a knocking at the door. Smiling, Hunter said, "I didn't think it would. That's why I took the liberty of ordering us a little breakfast."

Opening the door, a hospitality worker came in with a large cart with several silver platters and placed them on the room table before Hunter paid him, and left a generous tip then left the two with a hearty breakfast to enjoy. Lifting the covers off the platters, Naruto's jaw gaped at the sight of strawberry waffles, stacks of buttery pancakes, piles of bacon and sausage, scrambled eggs, omelets, and french toast, with a pitcher of milk and OJ to wash it down.

"Hunter....I think this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship...."

And with that, the two dug in.
1121122211211111112111.title: Naruto wakes up, and Hunter has ordered breakfast.

choices: "Yeah, let's go out to eat; I saw a nice-looking diner the other day"
"I don't really feel like going out; let's get some room service"
1121122211211111112112.content:
Naruto winced as something bright assaulted his closed eyelids.

"Nngh..." he mumbled, twitching. Slowly, he brought a hand up over his still-closed eyes. "Too bright..."

Grumbling, he sluggishly slung his legs over the edge of the bed, his upper body still lying on it. With a great deal of grunting, Naruto slowly sat up, scratching his side as he did so. Yawning, he slowly blinked as eyes open and looked out the window. "Morning already?" Yawning again, he looked down at his stomach. His metabolism had kicked into overdrive, and his belly appeared as flat as it had been before this whole thing had started. Curious, Naruto felt under his shirt; yes, there was a little bit of extra skin around his belly-button (which had receded to its natural, innie state), but it was nothing some training wouldn't take care of.

Slowly coming more awake, Naruto looked over to the other side of the bed, and couldn't help but crack a smile at the sight that greeted him.

Like him, Hunter's metabolism had worked its magic, and his furry belly now appeared perfectly flat. He was sprawled out on the futon, his limbs and tail splayed haphazardly about, his muzzle hanging open and his tongue lolling out the side. He had apparently flailed around in his sleep, as his shirt was rumpled up and fully exposed his now-flat, brown-furred tummy. His shorts, sans a button, had their fly completely unzipped, revealing him to be wearing dark blue boxers with some kind of large shape down the side that he couldn't quite make out.

Naruto chuckled, before feeling a draft and remembering, to his embarrassment, that his pants were in the same state, and were doubtlessly exposing his light blue, heart-patterned undies. Blushing heavily, he quickly despaired that he didn't have a spare set of clothes, but then something occured to him: if Hunter had been thoughtful enough to arrange for the buffet to serve Ichiraku's and generally just being a nice guy (or wolf), he probably would have packed him some spare clothes.

This in mind, he walked towards the closet and opened it; indeed, there were a variety of shirts hanging up, as well as several pants. Naruto smiled warmly, before he took a closer look. Wait a minute...these are my clothes! He scowled. Did he...did he break into my place? His face contorted angrily, but as he thought about it, the anger slowly faded. Well, he doesn't seem like the kinda guy who'd steal my stuff...Besides, I really like these clothes, and I'd probably be screwed if he didn't grab them... He shrugged, perusing the closet. Eh, I'll ask him about it when he wakes up. Eventually, he'd selected a teen-sized version of an outfit he'd liked to wear as a kid; specifically, dark blue/black trousers and a white, short-sleeved T-shirt with a stylized flame symbol on the front and sleeves.

In a matter of seconds, he'd slipped them on. Satisfied, he looked over at Hunter, who was still sleeping. He briefly considered waking him up, but decided against it; he'd been nice to him, so it was only fair he returned the favor. Smiling, he turned...and nearly tripped on something on the floor. Cursing, he looked down to see that it was a duffel bag with a large crescent moon on the side. Curious, he knelt down and unzipped it, rummaging through its contents. It was mostly an assortment of shorts and t-shirts, along with basic toiletries and some objects that were completely foreign to Naruto.

Confused, he lifted one out-a plastic rectangle with some sort of screen on hit- and lifted it up, examining it. To his surprise, there was an assortment of buttons on it. Not having the faintest idea what any of them did, he tentatively pressed one. Almost immediately, the screen flared to life. Eyes widening, Naruto took in the picture; it was Hunter, his arm draped companionably over the shoulders of a young, black-haired man, the latter's arm draped about his shoulders as well. Both had goofy grins on their faces, and were waving at the camera.

Naruto stared at it. "Huh, must be a friend of his..." Tentatively, he touched the screen; to his surprise, another picture was brought up, this one of Hunter and several...odd individuals around him. Some looked at ease, others looked, eager, but others just looked pissed.

Naruto laughed. "Heh, wonder what the story behind that is..." Shrugging he touched the screen again, bringing up more pictures: Hunter with all kinds of strange creatures and people, some looking happier to be in the picture than others. Naruto raised an eyebrow. "Huh, interesting company he keeps..."

"Naruto?"

The sleepy-sounding voice caused Naruto to jump, and he had to fumble about to keep the object from dropping. Eyes widening, he turned his head behind him; Hunter was starting to sit up, his shirt falling down to once again cover his brown-furred belly. He squinted, his glasses askew. "What're you doing with my phone?"

"Phone?" Naruto looked at the device again; he'd seen phones before, but none like this. "S-sorry about that; I didn't..."

Chuckling, Hunter yawned, adjusting his glasses as he did so. "Hey, so long as ya didn't break it and you're not plannin' to steal it, I got no complaints." Getting to his feet/paws, Hunter stretched his arms high in the air, letting loose with another, more monstrous yawn. "So, ya see anything good on there?"

"Uh..." Naruto thought for a moment. "Well, first I saw a photo of you posing with this human friend of yours..."

Hunter's ears perked up. "Kai?" He smiled warmly. "Yeah, he's my best buddy; he wanted to come, but he was busy."

Tilting his head in confusion, Naruto continued. "Then, when I touched the screen, I kept on getting photos of you with really weird people..."

Hunter laughed, scratching his side. "Ah, yes. I travel a lot, so I meet a lot of folks. Some are friends, some are acquaintances, and some..." to Naruto's surprise, the wolf shuddered. "...well, let's just say you gotta be REAL careful with interdimensional warlords, hostile aliens, and all those nasty kinds of things."

Naruto gaped, his jaw opening. "Huh...wha..."

Hunter laughed heartily. "I'll tell ya about it later." He looked down at his shorts. "First, I gotta get changed." Strolling over to his duffel, he pulled out another pair of khaki shorts and a maroon tank top. Nodding in satisfaction and standing up, he set his new clothes to the side...then he peeled his shirt off and tossed it aside.

Naruto's eyes bugged out, and he jumped to his feet. "Hunter, the hell!"

Hunter gave Naruto a smug grin. "Chill, Uzumaki." Reaching down to his waist, he slid his shorts off, leaving him only in his boxer shorts, which bore the same crescent moon as his duffel on the side. "I only wear clothes 'cause I like 'em; when I'm home in the woods, I go au naturale. I am a wolf, after all."

Naruto stared at him in horror. "You mean you go naked sometimes?"

Hunter shrugged. "Yeah. It's not a big deal, though; like I said, I might be anthropomorphic, but I'm still a wolf. Besides," he added chuckling, "my fur covers my body in such a way that...certain things are concealed from view, so you wouldn't have that to worry about."

Naruto's mind goggled, still trying to process everything. "Yeah? Well..." He thought for a moment before continuing. "Just put your damn clothes on."

Hunter smirked. "As you wish." With that, he pulled his khaki shorts on and slipped his tank top over his head. He looked down at himself, smiling. "Yep, that about does it."

At that moment, Naruto's stomach let out a noisy growl, followed by Hunter's own.They both started. "So, uh," Hunter offered, scratching the back of his head, "ya wanna get something to eat."

Naruto considered for a moment before replying...
1121122211211111112112.title: Naruto wakes up, but Hunter is still sleeping

choices: As they eat, Naruto asks about the phone and pictures.
"The questions can wait.  Right now, let's eat!"
11211222112111111121122.content:
"Actually, I don't really feel like going out just yet," shrugged Naruto. Hunter nodded then said, "I gotcha. One of those lazy-don't-do-nothing mornings, right?" Scratching the back of his head, Naruto chuckled and nodded. "Something like that. Actually, I was kinda wondering how the room service in this place was."
"Are you kiddin' me? The food here's good enough to be in restaurants," boasted Hunter eagerly.
"Well then it's good enough to be in our stomachs," said Naruto with a smirk as he patted his hungry stomach in anticipation.

Smiling, Hunter nodded and held his paw out towards Naruto, confusing him slightly until he realized he still had Hunter's phone on him. "Oh right, s-sorry about that!" He handed him his phone and he immediately dialed the front desk. "And good morning to you as well! I'd like to order some room service. Yes, I'd like the deluxe breakfast special, with extra everything and a pitcher of Milk and OJ if you'd be so kind? Why thank you very much!" He immediately hung up the phone and stuffed it into his pocket, whistling a little morning chyme despite the maw's lack of human lips, but Naruto was too preoccupied with previous issues to really care about the physics of talking, walking wolf-people.

Glancing back, Hunter noticed the distant look on Naruto's face. "Is something on your mind, Naruto?" Hesitant, Naruto stopped for a moment, debating if he wanted to bring it up, "Naruto? You okay, pal?"
Finally deciding, Naruto sighed and said, "Well, actually, I was meaning to ask you about something."
"Sure, what's up?"

Naruto walked towards the closet and opened it. Hunter's smile dropped slightly. "Oh."
"Look, the whole knocking me out bit was one thing, but breaking into my place?"
"I-I didn't steal anything if that's what you're worried about," responded Hunter a bit nervously.
"It's not that. I mean, you don't seem like the kinda guy who'd do something like that to someone else, but why'd you break into my place to begin with?"
"Well, I mean to be fair, I didn't really...break in per say..." replied Hunter as he rubbed the back of his head a bit nervously. "What do you mean?"
"Yesterday, before my acquaintance knocked you out, I was kinda...watching you, to see when you would be heading out so he could intercept."
"And by intercept, you mean ambush."
"R-right. Well, when you left your apartment last night, you kinda...forgot to lock the front door."

A moment passed before Naruto sweat dropped with embarrassment. "....Ah."
"But as to WHY I entered your house, well..." Hunter rubbed the back of his head a bit hesitantly, then continued, "...I was kinda hoping maybe you'd be interested in a few other feast days too, and figured you'd probably need some additional digs."
"Well, I guess I did bust my fly last night, and I REALLY wouldn't have wanted to run back home with my pants falling off to get a new pair," said Naruto, blushing a bit at the prevented embarrassing situation that could've been.
"Still, I'm not exactly comfortable with other people rummaging around my stuff like-oh crap! If I forgot to lock up, then that means my apartment's still unlocked, I gotta-"

Laughing, Hunter waved Naruto's panic aside and said, "Don't worry, I made sure to lock up after I gathered what you needed." Naruto stopped for a moment, then glanced sternly at Hunter. "...And how did you manage to do that?" Hunter looked away, a bit embarrassed for Naruto, before reaching into his bag and pulling out Naruto's keys. "You left them on the counter." He said, handing them to a humiliated Naruto.
"...Right."

Hunter smirked then playfully nudged Naruto in the arm, "Ah don't sweat it. Happens to the best of us," said Hunter, knowing full well neither he, nor anyone he knew, would ever do something that absent minded. "Well, thanks for locking up. I guess I owe you one there. Still, I WAS pretty hungry..." remembered Naruto. And as if on cue, a knocking came at the door.

Eagerly, Hunter opened up and greeted the hotel busboy with his payment and tip while he wheeled in a massive cart of food. Pulling the cart towards the room's table, Hunter licked his maw hungrily and said, "Well now that we've got all that settled, I say we dig in!"

Naruto smirked back. More than ready to cram as much food into his gullet as he could.
11211222112111111121122.title: "Let's get room service instead."

choices: They finish their platters and get two more plates  for themselves
They finish their platters and decide to share a second, gigantic platter
112112221121111111211221.content:
Rubbing his hands together eagerly, Naruto grabbed one of the platters off the cart. Sitting at the table, he lifted the top off, revealing a huge stack of pancakes, at least half a dozen, topped with butter and drenched in syrup. Grinning widely, Naruto moved the platter in front of him and grabbed the fork and knife that had been provided, cutting into the fluffy pancakes. Hunter, likewise, grabbed an equally large platter and opted to sit across from Naruto. He lifted the top off, practically salivating at the veritable mountain of bacon that awaited him. Licking his chops, he set it moved the platter front of him and grabbed two big pawfuls of bacon, taking a bite out of one at the same time Naruto took his first bite of pancake.

Both their eyes lit up as their mouths were assailed with wonderful tastes;Naruto's with sweet fluffyness, and Hunter's with greasy, savory saltiness. Licking their lips, they continued attacking their first courses. They continued on in this manner for a minute or two; Naruto cutting off huge pieces of his pancakes and shoving thm in his mouth, Hunter taking huge bites of his bacon.

Finally, Naruto broke the silence. "Say, Hunter, I've been meaning to ask," he spoke up through a mouthful of pancake. "What's the deal with that phone of yours?" He swallowed. "I mean, I've seen phones before, but a lot of 'em are big and bulky and have a cord."

Hunter chomped off another mouthful and gulped it down, smiling. "Ah, yeah, that." He got up to grab a couple glasses, along with the pitchers of milk and orange juice, from the cart, plopping the pitchers in the center of the table and giving Naruto a glass, keeping one for himself. "Well, see, the thing is, I'm from somewhere where we've got crazy-advanced tech." He reached across the table and grabbed the pitcher of OJ, pouring himself a glass and taking a sip.

"Really?" Naruto replied, pouring himself a glass of milk. "Never heard about that in any of the villages we were told about..." He grabbed the glass of milk and lifted it to his lips. Hunter, smirking, watched as he tilted it back, waiting until the milk was flowing down his throat to reply.

"Oh, that's 'cause I'm not from this world at all."

Naruto spluttered, spraying the milk in front of him (but somehow missing the platter.) "Wh-what?!" Naruto exclaimed, grabbing a napkin and wiping his mouth. "You some sort of alien or something?!"

Chuckling, Hunter took another bite of his bacon. "No, no, nothing like that; I'm Earth born and raised..." He smirked again. "Just not this Earth."

Scowling, Naruto cut himself a few more bites. "You're not making any sense! Where are you from?!"

Hunter licked his chops. "Well, since you asked so nicely..." Hunter ripped off another mouthful of bacon and gulped it down. "See, the thing is...I'm from another dimension entirely."

Naruto, the fork halfway to his mouth, stopped and gaped. "Wh-what?!"

Hunter laughed. "Yessir. Of course, I don't do it myself; I have friends and acquaintances who help me travel from place to place."

Naruto, staring, took another sip of milk. "So, when you said you traveled a lot..."

Hunter nodded. "Yep; I travel a lot in my own world, too, but I still go to a lot of different worlds, see the sights, meet the folks there."

Naruto nodded back. "So, your dimension...do wolf-people live there instead of humans."

The wolf laughed. "Nah, there's plenty of humans; they're the ones who live in the cities. The 'wolf-people' like myself, as you so eloquently put it, tend to live in the woods, outta sight of prying eyes."

Naruto tilted his head. "But if you were living outta sight, then why..."

"...did I start exploring different places?" Hunter finished; the young ninja nodded. "Well, there's a fun story behind that, and it starts with probably the most amazing smell you can imagine...but I'll save that for another time." He crammed more bacon in his maw, grinning cheekily.

Naruto scowled, feeling gipped. "Oh, whatever," he mumbled, cramming more forkfuls of pancake into his mouth. "Well, if you're not gonna tell me about that, why don't you tell me about some of the guys on your phone?"

"The pictures?" Hunter replied, gulping down the rest of his glass of OJ and reaching over to refill it. "Oh, those are the pictures I took of the friends, acquaintances, and, er...enemies I've made along the way." He reached into his pocket, pulling his phone out. Fiddling around with it some, he gave a satisfied "ah!" and held it up for Naruto to see. The photo depicted Hunter grinning and making a peace sign; beside him, a young, spiky-haired man with pinkish hair wearing long white pants, sandals, and an overcoat without a shirt was grinning and giving at thumbs-up. Beside the man, what appeared to be a blue cat with white, feathered wings was hovering about and grinning at the camera. "See here? Believe it or not, this guy, Natsu Dragneel, is a wizard."

Naruto blinked. "Wizard?"

Hunter nodded. "Yep; a Dragon Slayer, to be precise. And this..." he pointed to the cat. "Is Happy, Natsu's best friend." He chuckled. "They're kinda insane...actually, their entire guild is...but they're alright guys."

Naruto, curious, opened his mouth to say something, but his stomach suddenly growled, suddenly reminding him that he was still quite famished. "Tell ya what: you can show more more pictures after we eat." He promptly cut off a huge hunk of pancake and crammed it into his mouth.

Hunter nodded as his stomach growled as well. "Agreed; there are a lotta pics anyway, and everything'll be cold if we screw around too much." With that, he resumed tucking into his bacon.
112112221121111111211221.title: As they eat, Naruto asks about the phone and pi...

choices: Half way in; the two take a quick breather.
They finish the rest of this massive platter.
1121122211211111112112212.content:
The two continued to inhale their platters for a little while longer at a seemingly uninterrupted pace, until eventually they were all but licked clean, safe for a few crumbs, syrup remnants and grease. Satisfied, Naruto leaned back and patted his stomach happily and said, "Mmmm-mmm! Those were some of the fluffiest pancakes I've had in ages!" Smiling, Hunter nodded, still licking his maw and enjoying the crispy flavor of bacon on his tongue. "Told you this place was great. Now, what next?" Hunter asked himself as he examined the many platters to choose from. As if in unison, both his and Naruto's eyes locked on a giant platter shining brighter than the others.

"Whoa..." they both muttered at the same time. Naruto grabbed the surprisingly heavy platter and placed it at the center of the table. Lifting the top off, both their eyes widened with awe.

Dozens upon dozens of thick, soft waffles, accompanied by an immense amount of sausage, fruits, and various syrup cups. The heavenly aroma wafting from this particular tray was enough to carry the boy and the wolf by the noses as they each smiled, mouths watering at the sheer sight of it all. "Well...that's certainly new..." said Hunter to himself.
"Look at it all...I don't think even I could eat all that by myself..." said Naruto, still mesmerized. "Wanna go half and half?"

Nodding eagerly, the two licked their lips/maw as they helped themselves to several waffles, and topped them with syrup and an occasional side of sausage. Finally, they each cut off a piece and, again, in unison, took that wonderful first bite. The buttery sweet and moist taste was like a tidal wave of flavor crashing down upon their tongues in one fell swoop. Almost immediately after, the two began to quickly cut off more pieces and stuff them into their mouths. "I can't believe I'm saying this, but in all the dimensions I've traveled, and of all the waffles I've sampled, these bad boys take the cake!" said Hunter between mouthfuls, enjoying each one.

Naruto's attention turned to Hunter, intrigued. Gulping down a hearty amount of waffle, Naruto sighed happily and as he cut up another piece, and said, "Speaking of which, what kinda stuff is there is to eat in other dimensions?"
"Huh? Oh, well, a lot of them, believe it or not, have pretty similar meals to what you'd find anywhere in Konoha. But others...?" he swallowed a mouthful and continued, "...Can be a bit more...exotic."
"Exotic?"
"Some dimensions have entirely new species of animal, fruit, vegetable, and a lot actually taste pretty great! Some? Less than others. Plasmaberry smoothies aren't drinks I'll be having anytime soon...took me almost a week to shed off the feathers..."
"...The wha-?"
"Oh, right, yeah. One thing I love about this dimension is your food doesn't come with any weird science-y side effects. Can't say the same about other dimensions..." said Hunter with a shudder as he resumed eating more and more waffles.
"How's this for exotic?" said Naruto with a grin as he wrapped a piece of sausage around a piece of waffle and took a big hearty bite. "Mmmm! T-that's actually not half bad!" said Naruto with surprise in his voice as he continued to consume his waffles with other various additions, such as strawberry and banana slices.

More and more, the two continued to rip their waffles apart, drench them in syrup and stuff them into their mouths. As time went on, their stomachs began to slowly show the true extent of the amount of waffles and sausage consumed, creating the slightest of curves in their stomachs from the intake...
1121122211211111112112212.title: They finish and share a second, gigantic platter.

choices: "I'm in! No way is Naruto gonna beat me again!"
"I'm in, but only if you let Akamaru in on it too!"
11211222112111111121122121.content:
When half of the platter had vanished, Naruto and Hunter took a deep breath and sighed, settling back into their chairs and rubbing their bellies contentedly. Their stomachs had curved outwards a good deal more, and were starting to make an impression on their respective shirts; the flame symbol on Naruto's shirt, in particular, was starting to appear pushed-out.

"Oh man," Naruto breathed, licking his lips. "Haven't had a breakfast that good in ages..."

Hunter burped, smiling and wagging his tail. "Hey, don't talk like that; we're not anywhere near done!" He scratched his still-concealed belly, causing one his legs to kick slightly under the table.

Giggling a little bit, Naruto replied, "Yeah, true...but this is still some of the best grub I've had in a while." He looked and grinned at the half of the platter still remaining, then at the cart, still creaking under the weight of the platters upon it. "And to think; we've barely gotten started!"

Hunter laughed, scratching the back of his furry head. "Yeah, its something, ain't it?" His expression suddenly turned nervous. "Still, it would be a shame to keep all this to ourselves..."

"Huh?" Naruto's brow furrowed. "What are you talking about?"

The wolf laughed nervously. "Well, see, I kinda sent an, um, anonymous invitation to, er, someone from your village...he should be getting here right about now."

Naruto's eyes narrowed. "Someone from the village? Who did..."

Suddenly, a knocking sounded from the door, followed by a loud, rough voice. "Oi! Anyone in there?"

Naruto's eyes widened. "Wait; is that..."

Gulping, Hunter nodded. "Y-yeah. Say, why don't you go answer the door? He might freak if he sees me first..."

Naruto groaned. "Fine, fine..." Grunting, he scooted his chair out and walked over to the door, grumbling all the while. He sullenly opened the door, revealing a brown and spiky-haired teenage boy with slit eyes and red markings down the side of his face. He was wearing a gray, short-sleeved shirt and dark-black/blue shortss. Beside him, a massive dog stood, whining in surprise at the sight of Naruto.

The boy's eyes widened. "Wha-Naruto?"

"Hey, Kiba," Naruto grumbled. "Hey, Akamaru." At his name being called, Akamaru looked up and wagged his tail a bit.

Kiba took a step back, blinking. "Wha-how-what the hell are you doing here?!"

"Long story," Naruto mumbled. "What about you?"

Scowling a bit at Naruto's recalcitrance, Kiba folded his arms. "Well, it was late last night; me 'n Akamaru had just gotten back from a really, really exhausting mission, and I felt like I could eat a horse. When I went to get myself somethin', I saw a note on the table; it gave me the address of this inn, and it said 'Hungry? Come to this address ASAP."

"And you just took it at its word?" Naruto asked, incredulous.

Kiba shrugged. "Hey, it was free food, and besides..." He knelt beside Akamaru and gave the dog an affectionate ruffle on top of his head. "...as long as I've got Akamaru with me, there's nothin' I can't handle!" Akamaru barked and licked Kiba's face, eliciting a laugh from the boy.

Standing back up, the Inuzuka returned to the subject at hand. "So, about this free food... where is it?" Smirking, he prodded Naruto's slightly-curved belly, eliciting a blush from the boy. "It's probably somewhere close, if you're any indication."

Stepping back and covering his stomach with his arms, Naruto stammered out an answer. "Y-yeah, it's in here, but before ya come in, there's something ya gotta know."

Kiba raised an eyebrow. "What is it?"

Naruto took a breath. "Well..." He leaned in close to Kiba's ear and whispered something into it.

Kiba's eyes widened. "Seriously?" He barged into the room, muscling past Naruto, Akamaru close behind. "The guy who got all this food is seriously a...." He trailed off as he came into the room and saw the other individual seated at the table.

Putting on his cheeriest smile, Hunter raised a paw in greeting. "Hey, Kiba. My name's Hunter; how's it goin'?"

Kiba and Akamaru stood, gaping at the strange creature at the table. After a few tense moments, Kiba spoke for both himself and his partner:

"What. The. Hell."

One lengthy explanation later....

"...and that's how we got here," Hunter finished, addressing Kiba, now seated at the table alongside him and Naruto. Akamaru was lying on the floor beside Kiba's chair, looking at Hunter as he spoke.

Kiba and Akamaru shared a look before the former turned his attention back towards Hunter. "So...lemme get this straight," Kiba began. "You kidnapped Naruto, took him out to eat, and you both crammed as much food into your guts as you could. Am I right?"

Naruto blushed. "Y-yeah, that's about the size of it."

Kiba nodded. "Alright. And now, you're gonna spend a few days doing the same thing, and you invited me to be a part of it."

Akamaru whined. Oh man, I don't like where this going...

Hunter chuckled. "Relax, Akamaru; everything's gonna be fine."

Kiba frowned at Hunter. "Hey, bug off, Akamaru's just..." He stopped as something occured to him. "Wait...how did you just understand him?"

"I'm a wolf, remember?" Hunter replied, smirking. "Kinda comes with the territory..."' He scratched the back of his head. "So...you in or out?"

Kiba and Akamaru exchanged another look. They looked back at Hunter, then back at each other again. Finally, Kiba looked directly at Hunter and said...
11211222112111111121122121.title: Half way in; the two take a quick breather.

choices: Much to Naruto's surpris, Kiba manages to finish the second half of the platter.
Half way into it, Kiba has to take a break, as Naruto expected.
112112221121111111211221212.content:
"Yeah, sure. I'm in," responded Kiba, much to Hunter's delight, but he followed with, "BUT! Only if you let Akamaru in on it too!" Hunter smiled and immediately said, "Of course! The more the merrier, right? Besides," he turned to Akamaru's way and grinned as he followed up with, "I was starting to feel a little outnumbered by all the humans here. It'll be nice to eat with my own kind." Akamaru chuckled and wagged his tail, Well, if you insist.... Akamaru thought as he stood beside Kiba, who once again ruffled the dog's fuzzy head.

Naruto turned curiously to Hunter and said, "Y-you really don't mind paying for all four of us? I mean this guy may not be able to put away as much as I can, but he can still put a dent in your wallet." Kiba immediately glared at Naruto and sternly said, "Whadduya mean I can't put away more than you?!" Akamaru's paw immediately rose to his face as he seemed to be shaking his head. Ugh, heeeere we go...

Upon hearing this, Hunter's ears dropped slightly as he suspected this wasn't going to end well.

Smiling smugly, Naruto pointed towards Hunter and said, "Just last night, the two of us were stuffing more into our guts than I'd ever eaten in my entire life. Not once have I ever seen you ever even come NEAR wolfing down as much as I did. Hell, even HE managed to keep up more than you ever do!" Kiba's attention turned to Hunter, "Who? This skinny wolf guy?!" Hunter, caught off guard, looked stunned as he fumbled at the sudden spotlight, "H-hey, how'd I get dragged into this? I'm just-"
"Just what? Someone who thinks he can eat more than I can?!"
"I-I didn't say-"
"You bet your ass he can!"

Hunter was dumbfounded. On one hand, he was flattered that Naruto was complementing him, which made his tail wag a bit, much to Akamaru's amusement, but on the other hand, Kiba was certainly a bit more competitive than he thought he was prepared for. "That's it, break time's over, you wimps! Let's do this!" said Kiba as he sat himself right on down at the table between the ninja and wolf. His attention immediately focused on the massive platter of waffles. "Oi! Who was eating what around here?" said Kiba.
"Oh, we were just sharing this platter and stopped for a little breather, but-"

Before Hunter could finish his statement, Kiba grabbed the platter and immediately began rapidly wolfing down the waffles by himself, much to Hunter and Naruto's surprise. "Yeah right, like he's gonna eat that whole thing by himself," scoffed Naruto as he took a gulp of milk. Hunter, however, was bewildered at the sight. More and more, Kiba stuffed several pieces of waffle into his mouth, gulping it down and just kept on going like a hot headed eating machine. Between bites, he turned to the two and said, "You guys think you can eat more than me? I'll show you how it's done!" Gulping down another hearty mouthful, he helped himself almost angrily to some sausage, poured some syrup onto a few waffles and immediately went to town while everyone just watched. "Again, I-I didn't say anyth-"
Don't bother. Trust me, he's loooooong gone, thought Akamaru, until his stomach growled, Oh, and while you're at it, could you pass a platter my way? Still focused on Kiba's eating prowess, Hunter grabbed a tray of bacon and placed it down for Akamaru to immediately start scarfing down.

More and more time went on and Kiba was still eating at the same machine-like pace. Slowly, his stomach began to distend slightly beneath his shirt, not so much as deterring him in the slightest. Hunter was impressed, but Naruto paid no real heed. "Is he always this intense?" asked Hunter.
"Ah don't worry, he's just trying to prove a point. Just you watch, in a few minutes, he's gonna start feeling it," responded Naruto, still confident that Kiba wouldn't be able to eat the second half of the waffle platter by himself, whereas Naruto and Hunter had to share to get half way through.

As time went on, Kiba's gut began to grow slightly nearer to the same size and Naruto's and Hunter's, and more and more, Kiba began to slow down...
112112221121111111211221212.title: "I'm in, but only if you let Akamaru in on it too"

choices: Hunter picks at his food, preferring to watch the two stuff themselves
He begins tearing into his meal, not wanting to fall behind
1121122211211111112112212121.content:
Kiba winced as the full impact of how much he was eating hit him, but he soldiered on, determined not to show weakness. Akamaru, even as he scarfed down his bacon, looked at him out the side of his eyes, giving a small, worried whimper. Hunter grinned, practically rubbing his paws together in delight, while Naruto watched, impressed despite himself.

Kiba grunted and crammed forkful after forkful of light, fluffy waffles and syrup into his maw, ignoring the discomfort in his abdomen. With every forkful, his stomach bulged out a little bit under his shirt, making more and more of an impression with every several bites that went down his throat.

Naruto, Hunter, and Akamaru watched, marveling, as the waffles slowly disappeared from the platter, Kiba's stomach distending and bulging in reverse proportion. Kiba winced again, and slowed noticeably, but he never once let up, and maintained a steady rhythm.

Finally, Kiba let his fork and knife clatter to the empty plate, flopping back in his chair. "Oh...oh man," he groaned bringing a hand up to his distended tummy and gently massaging it through the shirt. "That...that was really something..." Suddenly, his eyes flew wide open, and he let loose with a considerable belch. He sighed, smiling. "Ahhh....that's better."

Hunter grinned. "Woo!" he whooped, pumping a paw in the air. "Way to go, Kiba!"

Naruto blinked. "...whoa," he finally said, staring at the picked-clean platter. "Didn't actually expect ya to make it all the way. Not bad, Kiba." The other boy, hearing this, ceased in his ministrations and looked at the blonde, smirking cockily. This quickly faded when he added, "Of course, ya still don't hold a candle to me or Hunter!"

"Please stop dragging me into this..." Hunter muttered, ears drooping.

Kiba scowled at Naruto, not hearing Hunter's complaint. "Oh please, Uzumaki! If you honestly think either of you can hold a candle to me..."

"Think?!" Naruto exclaimed. "Hey, Hunter and I stuffed ourselves like crazy last night, and it took us a while to slow down, unlike you!"

"H-hey, I didn't have time to prep!" Kiba protested, lightly slugging Naruto in the shoulder. "Besides, you didn't win all of our eating contests, in case you've forgotten!"

I didn't, that's for sure, Akamaru whined. Wasn't any fun explaining to your mom why you looked pregnant... Huntetr, hearing this, chuckled, even as his tail wagged giddily at the implications of Akamaru's statement.

Naruto grit his teeth. "I-I was off my game those times! Besides, even if you did win some, your gut never got as big as either of ours got!"

Kiba grinned cheekily. "How would you know? The times I won, you were too sick to even see straight!"

Naruto scowled. "Same for you, dog-breath!"

Hunter got out of his seat and raised his paws in the air. "Easy, easy fellas; calm down." Both boys stopped and glared at Hunter. Shrinking back a bit, he nonetheless continued. "Look, it's obvious you can both put it away, especially when you're competing, but this is supposed to be fun for all of us. Now, I'll admit its fun watching you two bicker..." Naruto and Kiba's faces grew confused, while Akamaru just wagged his tail, amused despite himself at the sentiment. "...but try to tone it down a bit, OK?"

Naruto and Kiba glared at each other for a few moments before, finally, they looked away. "Okay, whatever..." Naruto muttered, crossing his arms.

"Yeah, fine," Kiba mumbled.

Hunter clasped his paws together. "Excellent! Now that that's taken care of, there's still plenty of food left; help yourselves!"

Needing no second bidding, Naruto and Kiba sprang to their feet, bolting over to the cart and retrieving two more platters, the latter with a bit of sniffing. As he prepared to return to the table, something occurred to him, and he grabbed another plate, struggling to hold it with one hand. Bending down, he set it in front of Akamaru, whose tail started wagging at the delectable scents emanating from it. Laughing, Kiba took the top off, revealing a truly titanic pile of sausages. The sight of this caused Akamaru's mouth to open, panting in anticipation. Chuckling at his buddy's excitement, Kiba stood back up and lugged his platter over to the table. Sitting down at about the same time Naruto did with his platter, they both took the lids straight off.

Their eyes lit up at the sight of the meals upon their plates. Naruto's was a massive mountain of french toast, several cups of syrup on the side. Beside them, several well-toasted bagels sat, little dishes of butter nearby and ready for use.

Kiba, on the other hand, had chosen a plate piled high with protein. A huge mound of scrambled eggs sat upon it, with equally-large piles of breakfast meats-sausages, bacon, and the like-beside it.

Chuckling at their reactions, Hunter took the opportunity to get a plate for himself-this one containing a large breakfast sandwich, several large slices of french toast, and a side of fruit-and sat down, picking up an apple and waiting for the show to begin.

He didn't have to wait long.

Snapping themselves out of their shocked trances, Naruto and Kiba looked at each other, smirked, then dove into their meals.

This, Hunter thought, taking a bite out of the apple, is gonna be good...

Akamaru, even as he attacked both his new plate and his remaining bacon, shuddered. I've got a bad feeling about this...
1121122211211111112112212121.title: Hotheads' Determination

choices: Kiba challenged Hunter to an eating contest.
Kiba challenged both Naruto and Hunter to an eating contest.
11211222112111111121122121212.content:
As Hunter watched both Naruto and Kiba gorge themselves on their plates, his own stomach rumbled audibly, reminding him that he was still quite hungry himself. Placing his apple down, he thought to himself for a moment, "Hey, Naruto's the one who kept saying what a big eater I was. Wouldn't want to make a liar of him, right? Besides, look at how much Kiba ate in one go. And all because Naruto said we could eat more than him. Guess Naruto's not the only one whose competitive nature gets the better of them..." And so, Hunter also began to tear into his meal, still focusing as best he could on the young ninja's dining beside him, in the hopes that, despite his trying to keep the peace, that the two would continue not letting up.

Naruto continued to dip entire pieces of french toast into the syrup and stuff it directly into his mouth shortly after, before chewing heartily while prepping another piece. Gulping it all down in one go, Naruto sighed with satisfaction, and took a big shark-like bite out of his next piece, enjoying the buttery sweet flavor. Meanwhile, Kiba just continued to scarf down one fork full of scrambled eggs into his mouth after another. Occasionally, he'd stop and start scarfing down big chunks of sausage mixed with bacon. Even Akamaru had let his hunger get the better of him as he greedily scarfed down his breakfast sausages like ordinary dog food. Truly, it was food bliss all around for everyone.

After taking a huge wolf-like bite out of his extra large sandwich, Hunter paused, catching his breath as he rested one paw against his stomach happily, feeling it's gradual increase with the more consumed. As he did though, he examined the others to see how progress was going. Naruto's belly had begun to balloon outward, much like it started to last night. Kiba's in so short a time, had already ballooned outward, almost surpassing Naruto, while he continued to eat more. Even Akamaru's sides began to distend as more and more sausage entered his belly.

Smirking, Hunter rested one hand atop his own belly, feeling how much smaller it was than everyone else's in comparison, and began to wolf down his meal at a faster rate while stuffing more and more slices of french toast into his maw at once before he moved back onto his sandwich. All the while they were putting their meals away, in almost four-way unison, all their bellies were growing and distending.

Finally finishing up his sandwich, Hunter leaned back against his chair, rubbing his distended belly with one hand while the other grabbed his cup of OJ. As Hunter gulped it down, he began to notice Naruto was starting to eat things at a faster and more rapid pace than Kiba, who was now beginning to stagger a bit behind the blond. He also noticed that his own stomach was currently exceeding Kiba's, much to his surprise. "Hehe, perfect," thought Hunter as Kiba stopped eating for a moment to catch his breathe and massage his wary tummy, "Losing to Naruto may be one thing, but if he sees he's not even eating more than I am, then maybe he'll pick up the pace. But how to get his attention..."

Hunter's thoughts were interrupted by a loud belch erupting from Kiba's mouth. Kiba sighed and smacked his lips as he finished making some more room in his gut. In that instant, Hunter grinned to himself as watching this gave him an idea to subtly get Kiba's attention. He pressed one paw firmly into his own belly, forcing out an even louder and surprisingly lengthier belch than Kiba's to get both his and Naruto's attention.

"Wow, NICE one, Hunter!" cheered an impressed Naruto. Hunter smiled as he sighed with relief. "Ahhh, thanks. Just makin' a lil extra room," he said as he patted his distended belly proudly in satisfaction and more importantly, for emphasis. And sure enough, Kiba had noticed that Hunter's stomach had indeed exceeded his own, immediately firing him up, just as Hunter had intended and hoped.

What Hunter DIDN'T expect however, was what happened promptly after that...
11211222112111111121122121212.title: He tears into his meal, not wanting to fall behind

choices: All three keep pace with one another, with Hunter establishing a lead
All three keep pace with each other, Kiba and Naruto vying for the lead
112112221121111111211221212122.content:
Kiba gaped at Hunter's gut; though it still remained underneath his tank top, it had ballooned outwards noticeably, and it appeared as though he were hiding a large ball of some sort underneath it. With some disgruntlement, the young dog-nin looked down at his own belly; though it had also ballooned considerably and also formed a distinct spherical shape underneath his gray t-shirt, it was still noticeably smaller than Hunter's.

Grumbling, he looked over at Naruto, who was leaning back in his chair and gulping down a glass of milk, his unoccupied hand massaging his belly. Though it was still fully concealed, just as Hunter and Naruto's were, it was actually slightly (but still noticeably) bigger than Hunter's belly, and the flame symbol on the front was being pushed out and distorted even more than it had been before. Scowling, Kiba looked back at his own belly, prodding it a bit with a finger.

His eyes suddenly widened, and a sly smirk formed on his face. "Say, Naruto, Hunter..." he began, looking back up. "Ya both looked like you were doin' real good."

Naruto gulped down the last of his milk and turned towards Kiba. "Heh, damn right!" He gave his gut a hearty smack, releasing a sudden burp. Naruto blushed, but nonetheless giggled childishly.

Hunter tilted his head and frowned; unlike Naruto, he had caught the tone in Kiba's voice. "Um...yeah?"

He wasn't the only one who'd caught Kiba's tone. Akamaru-his sides now noticeably distended-paused in his scarfing of his sausages and looked up at Kiba, whimpering. Kiba...what do you have planned?

Kiba only smirked in response. "Trust me, Akamaru, this is gonna be fun," he assured the dog without looking at him. His smirk became a full-blown grin as he looked at Hunter and Naruto. "Well then..." A gleam formed in his eyes. "...you guys wanna have an eating contest?"

Hunter, who had been mid-sip on a glass of OJ, sprayed it out (thankfully having the foresight to turn to the side before he did so. He coughed a bit, wiping his muzzle with a napkin. "Um...did you say eating contest?"

Kiba nodded. "Yep! We all eat as much as we can, and whoever can go the longest without giving up wins!"

Naruto grinned, turning his head towards Kiba while rubbing his belly through his shirt. "Heh, you're on, Kiba!"

Hunter raised his paws up. "N-now hold on..." he began, before a thought occurred to him: he'd been trying to get Kiba to pick up his pace by appealing to his competitive nature, and it seemed to have worked extremely well. What was more, seeing as how he'd actively declared a challenge, no doubt he'd be doing his damnedest to eat as long and fast as he could...

Hunter's frazzled expression slowly resolved into a smile. Hmm...this could...actually be quite epic.

Grinning, he bowed his head. "I'd be happy to accept your challenge, good sir, on the condition you both give it your all."

Kiba raised an eyebrow at Hunter's choice of words. "Um, OK..."

Naruto, on the other hand, was slightly more used to Hunter's behavior by now, and grinned. "You're damn right we'll do our best!"

Hunter grinned back. "Attaboy, Naruto! Now," He scooted back and got to his feet, trying to maintain his center of gravity as he did so, "help me grab as many of these plates as ya can and bring 'em over to the table!" He moved as quickly as his growing gut would allow him, grabbing two large platters and bringing them back to the table, even as he staggered under their weight.

Grinning, Kiba and Naruto got to their feet and grabbed two more platters each, staggering back to the table and setting them down as Hunter had. The three then repeated the process, bringing platter after platter to the table, until the cart was all but depleted, and the table was practically creaking under the weight of all the platters.

Once that was done with, Naruto, Kiba, and Hunter set to work taking the covers off the plates, taking deep whiffs as they did so, salivating slightly(Kiba and Hunter even panted a bit, owing to their sense of smell), accomplishing the work in seconds.

With that done, they all took their seats, and stared at the feast before them. Arrayed on the table was the biggest selection of breakfast food they'd ever seen: pancakes stacked half a dozen to a dozen high, french toast made from whole loaves of bread, gigantic waffles(some of which were slathered in ice cream, and others in syrup), sausages, sausage patties, bacon, eggs prepared in every way imaginable, mountains of muffins, piles of bagels, stacks of buttery toast...

All three of them simply sat where they were, alternatively gaping at the platters and taking deep whiffs of the delectable aromas that assailed their nostrils. Even Akamaru looked up from his sausages, his tail wagging and his tongue lolling out. Oh man...those look and smell so good...

Luckily for him, Kiba had heard him even through his trance, and dazedly grabbed a few platters and set them in front of Akamaru. Tail wagging in delight, Akamaru licked Kiba's hand. The dog-nin smiled, but did not tear his sight away from the food.

The three continued gaping at the spread, before someone broke the silence. And, predictably, that someone was...

"Enough staring!" Naruto grabbed a fork and knife. "Let's eat!"

Kiba and Hunter needed no second bidding; grabbing their own utensils, the licked their lips, grinned, and, in near-perfect synchrony with Naruto, dove into the spread, starting with whatever was nearest to them.
112112221121111111211221212122.title: Kiba challenged both Naruto and Hunter to an ea...

choices: Naruto and Kiba pick up the pace once again.
Hunter continues to trailblaze in the lead.
1121122211211111112112212121221.content:
Within mere moments of starting, all three were face deep into a pile of various entrees. This time, Naruto was plowing throw a massive pile of waffles, mentally hoping to tear them down quicker than Kiba had previously. Kiba, on the other hand; being the meat lover that he was, ravenously tore into a massive pile of sausages and assorted eggs, while Hunter worked on a massive stack of pancakes lathered in syrup and butter, with a side; albeit big side of French Toast. All three ate at a rapidly unison pace, with no one showing any signs of slowing down any time soon.

Akamaru looked up uneasily at the trio while he continued to scarf down one of the platters of sausages Kiba had left for him. They're gonna have such bad stomachaches by the time this is finis-wow, for hotel food, this stuff is really good!

With that, he just resumed eating, too distracted with his own plate to worry about Kiba or the others. Hunter observed the two boys whilst he hungrily tore into his fluffy sweet breakfast stack. As the two continued to inhale their meals, slowly, both their stomachs continued to distend and push outward with neither one showing any signs of giving the other the satisfaction of their defeat.

Both occasionally glanced at the others progress while continuously and competitively resuming their feast. Seems he'd managed to get the ball rolling quite nicely. But then, another thought occurred to him. Competition seemed to not only push Kiba into an eating frenzy, but as last night had proven, it got Naruto eating nice and proper as well. And with two ridiculously competitive heads duking it out like this, what better way to push them further than to give them a very real run for their money? Competing with each other would only take them so far, but if they're competing and still losing to someone else, who knows how far they'll go? Hunter intended to find out, and so he began to pick up the pace a considerable amount.

He began cutting bigger pieces of pancake, and scarfing down quite a few at a time instead of his usual amount. Like a machine, Hunter wolfed down the stack as it gradually began to shrink more and more. And little by little, his belly continued to distend at a slightly quicker rate than the other boys, to the point where his tanktop began to rise just ever so slightly at the bottom. More and more, he continued to chop and eat away at the once large stack of pancakes, until finally, it was all but licked clean. Hunter winced, feeling a familiar, uncomfortable tightness in his growing gut, but smirked to himself as he was dead set on taking the lead.

So, rather than slow down like he usually would, Hunter took a page from Naruto's technique last night and poured himself a full cup of OJ and began to gulp it down as quick as he could without stopping. Finally depleting the cup, he had to catch his breathe momentarily, before gripping his gut and unleashing a loud and lengthy belch, freeing up as much room in his belly as he could expel. The loud, disgusting sound startled both Naruto and Kiba as they looked up to see Hunter just closing his mouth as the burp drew to its' end, then sighing with relief as he gave his gut a hearty slap and moved onto his next plate.

Much to both their surprise, Hunter had already completely cleared his first plate, and was now moving onto his second, while both Naruto and Kiba were still working on their first. Catching this, Hunter looked back at them and smirked slyly as he decided to egg them both on further by saying, "What's the matter, guys? You're not having a hard time keeping up, are you?" And with that, he began to quickly scarf down the contents of his second plate.

Flabbergasted, Naruto and Kiba stared for a moment, before they immediately shared a glance then began to tear into the remaining contents of their plate faster and more intently to pick up the pace. Catching this, Hunter glanced back at the two then chuckled in his head. Haha, I knew this'd be epic...

All three were now devouring their meals at a faster and more quantitative pace than before, and in doing so...
1121122211211111112112212121221.title: All three keep up, with Hunter taking lead.

choices: All three continue strong, but after a while, Hunter stops to undo his shorts
All three continue strong, but one of the boys stops to undo their pants/shorts
11211222112111111121122121212212.content:
Hunter had already gotten started on his second platter-a stack of half a dozen waffles with several scoops of vanilla ice cream wedged between each of them-by the time Naruto and Kiba had finished their plates and chosen their own second plates: a huge stack of muffins for Naruto, and a massive plate of cinnamon rolls for Kiba. Gritting their teeth, they grabbed two of their respective treats in each hand and took massive bites out of each of them, not stopping until both were gone, at which point they'd grab two more and repeat the process.

Hunter smirked as he cut off massive pieces of the waffles and ice cream and crammed them into his mouth, determined not to lose his pace; he was still ahead, but Kiba and Naruto were picking up speed, tearing into their treats with reckless abandon. As all three of them continued to tear into their meals, their bellies resumed growing, though Hunter's still grew noticeably faster than the two boys'. Hunter's stomach continued to push his tank top up to slowly reveal more of the brown, furry belly underneath. Likewise, Naruto and Kiba's shirts had started to rise up as well, though the tiny slivers of flesh they exposed were noticeably less than the strip of brown, furry flesh that Hunter showed. This, of course, only encouraged them to tear into their muffins and cinnamon rolls even faster, expediting the growth of their bellies as a result.

Hunter, noticing this, wagged his tail in delight, but still did not slow down, fully willing to keep ahead, if only so the two would try even harder to catch up. As he continued cramming waffle and ice cream into his maw, his stomach continued to swell, and his tank top continued to rise up. His shorts began to feel snug; Hunter winced and shrugged it off, but privately resolved to unbutton them at some point; no sense in busting two pairs of shorts in a row...

Oblivious to Hunter's inner musings, Naruto and Kiba soldiered on, continuing to tear into their individual treats. Their bellies continued to distend, and their shirts continued to rise up. Looking down at their bellies, they scowled, obviously not satisfied with their progress. To this end, they each found another platter and drew it closer to them, taking the tops off to reveal more finger-food; specifically, bagels for Kiba and toast for Naruto. This done, they changed their tactics a bit, grabbing two of their treats in one hand and two of their treats in the other hand and took even bigger bites out of them simultaneously. The effect was immmediately apparent; their bellies began bulging bigger, faster, their shirts rising higher and higher up.

Hunter, even as he continued attacking his waffles and ice cream, smirked. That's it, fellas...show me what you got.
11211222112111111121122121212212.title: Hunter continues to trailblaze in the lead.

choices: Naruto and Kiba consume til the point where they need to undo their buttons.
Hunter starts to feel a little too full.
112112221121111111211221212122121.content:
Naruto and Kiba continued to rapidly scarf down numerous portions of their entrees at once, which continued to inflate their stomachs further with every heaping mouthful gulped down. Smirking, Hunter continued to press onward in an effort to egg both on and continue their progression. Glancing back as he stuffed more bits of waffle and ice cream into his maw, Hunter's tail wagged as he observed both ninja's bellies continuing to grow, lifting the bottom of their shirts up and causing more flesh to expose in the process. Awesome. Just gotta keep this up...
Hunter thought to himself as he had noticed his lead over the others was beginning to blur due to their newfound tactics.

So he decided to follow suit and simply grab a waffle by the paw and chomp on it by hand, taking about half a waffle in a single mouthful. Gulping it down, he sighed with relief then attempted to stuff the second half into his jaws shortly after. Upon doing so however, he winced as he felt an immense tightness holding him back. Letting his free hand reach down to his distended belly, Hunter could feel his stomach had distended to the point where it was beginning to repress beneath his own button and zipper. Ah shoot, can't let my shorts bust again... Hunter thought, as he lowered the remaining half of his waffle back onto his plate and reached down to try and undo his button.

Half way into a bagel, Kiba gulped down a hearty mouthful then glanced back at Hunter who was struggling a bit to get his button undone from under the weight of his own stomach. Smirking, Kiba wiped his mouth of crumbs and said, "Awww, what's wrong? Does the Wolfy have a tummy-ache?" then proceeded to stuff the rest of his bagel into his mouth. Jeez, what is it with these two and lame nicknames...? Hunter thought as he rolled his eyes, then finally, after a brief struggle to get a hold of his button from beneath his distended belly, he said, "Nope, just taking care of something..."

With that, he undid his button, and in that instant, his furry brown belly pushed outward considerably by a few inches more as he sighed with relief and stuffed the second half of his waffle into his mouth and gulped it down with gusto. Kiba's jaw nearly gaped at the sight, "....Are you kidding me?!" Even Akamaru was surprised at the mere extent Hunter had consumed. And I thought these two overdid it...

Scoffing, Naruto said, "Man, how'd you get so much better at this...?" To which Hunter shrugged, as he cut a large chunk of waffle and lathered it with ice cream and with a cocky grin, said, "Maybe you guys are just slowing down a bit?" then stuffed the vanilla ice cream smothered waffle chunk into his maw.

And like clockwork, both Naruto and Kiba immediately picked up the pace, despite the snug fullness both had begun to feel. Akamaru glanced back at both of them and shook his head. Just haaaaaaad to push them, didn't you.... he thought as he consumed some of his remaining sausage links. Hunter merely grinned at the dog and shrugged as he finished up the remaining bits of waffle and ice cream, before moving onto his third platter...
112112221121111111211221212122121.title: All three push on, then Hunter undoes his shorts.

choices: "Sure, count us in!"
"Eh, you can do it if ya want;; we're fine"
1121122211211111112112212121221211.content:
Hunter, even as he tackled his third platter-holding a massive stack of pancakes and a huge mound of scrambled eggs-grinned as he saw Naruto and Kiba tearing away at their bagels, muffins, and cinnamon rolls even faster than before, only pausing for a quick breath or a quick drink of milk. Their stomachs inflated as they downed the treats, forcing their shirts further up and exposing more skin. By the time they polished off the last of them, a decently-sized strip of flesh was showing for each of them, just short of their navels.

Not missing a beat, they each sought out another plate, pulling it in front of them. They pulled the tops off each, revealing massive breakfast smoothies for each of them-strawberry for Naruto, banana for Kiba. Ignoring the straws they had been provided, they grabbed the smoothies and tilted them up to their mouths, gulping the thick liquid down, heedless of the smoothie that ran down the sides of their faces and onto their shirts. As they did so, their tummies steadily swelled bigger and bigger as the smoothie entered them, causing their shirts to rise up even further in the process. By the time they'd demolished half their smoothies, their shirts had ridden up to expose their belly buttons. Noticing this with only a downward motion of their eyes, Naruto and Kiba continued guzzling their smoothies, inflating their stomachs further.

Hunter's tail wagged wildly, even as he forked a massive helping of eggs into his mouth. Thaaat's it...keep it up...

Akamaru, finishing up the last of his sausage links, licked his chops and looked up at t he two, whining. Oh man, they're really getting into it now...their guts are gonna be huge by the time they're done everything... Suddenly, his own stomach gurgled, causing him to look at it and notice he wasn't much better off; his own belly was noticeably protruding, sticking out underneath him and bulging out to the sides. His ears drooped. How do I always get sucked into these things?

Oblivious to Akamaru's musings, all three competing parties continued to stuff their faces, Hunter with his eggs and pancakes, Naruto and Kiba with their gigantic breakfast smoothies. Within a matter of minutes, Naruto and Kiba had depleted their smoothies, plunking the empty glasses on the table. At this point, their stomachs had grown even more, their shirts now situated a good several inches above their belly-buttons. Wiping their mouths with their sleeves, Naruto and Kiba quickly moved to seek out their next platters, but suddenly winced and clutched their bellies. Hunter, gulping down a mouthful of pancake, smirked cheekily at them. "Whassamatter, boys? Gettin' full?"

Kiba glared at Hunter. "Dunno about the idiot, but not even close." He reached his hands down to his waist, fumbling around for something. "Just...gotta...get these shorts...taken care of." Naruto bristled at the insult, but nonetheless did the same, struggling to grab something around his waist. Hunter watched, amused, as they continued to fumble around for their pants buttons. Finally, they both got a grip on them, and, in surprising synchrony, pulled them free.

Both boys sighed in relief as their bellies surged outwards, no longer confined by their buttons; not quite as much as Hunter's had, but still enough to force their shirts up a good bit further. Panting, they massaged their bellies a bit, but beforre they continued, Hunter spoke up. "If I may...I may have an idea of how to spice this up a bit."

Curious, Naruto looked up from rubbing his belly. "Eh? What didja have in mind?"

Akamaru whined. I've got a really, REALLY bad feeling about this...

Hunter gave Akamaru a reassuring grin, before returning his attention to the blonde. "Ya remember how ya said the different foods I've eaten throughout different dimensions have weird effects on me?"

Naruto nodded, while Kiba just looked confused. "Different dimensions? What the hell..."

"I'll tell ya later," Naruto explained.

Giving Naruto an appreciative grin, he got up from his seat, belly wobbling as he did so, cradling it to keep it steady. "Wait right here." Staggering over to his duffel, he lifted it up onto the bed and rooted through it, retrieving three vials of a bright green liquid. Nodding, he brought them back to the table, sitting back in his seat and setting them down.

Naruto stard. "Uh...what are those?"

Hunter grinned. "They're a special kinda juice I picked up from one of my travels." His tail wagged. "Once you ingest one of these, your body regresses into an eight-year-old state."

Naruto and Kiba gaped. "...what?" Naruto finally spoke up.

Hunter smirked. "Ah, don't be like that, it only lasts a few hours. Besides, haven't ya ever noticed how much kids can eat? Not to mention, it sorta affects the mind too; we'd still have our memories, but we'd probably have a lot more fun doing this." He grinned at the two. So? Whaddaya say?"

Naruto and Kiba exchanged a bemused glance, before looking back at Naruto and saying...
1121122211211111112112212121221211.title: Naruto and Kiba consume til the point where the...

choices: Hunter continues to take the lead.
This time around, one of the boys is in the lead.
11211222112111111121122121212212111.content:
"Sure, count us in!" exclaimed Naruto as he grabbed one of the vials. Kiba paused for a moment, then grabbed one as well, despite an uneasy whining from Akamaru. Looking down at his buddy, Kiba smiled assuredly and ruffled the top of his head said with a smile, said, "Oh don't worry, boy. It's only gonna be for a little bit! Besides, who hasn't wanted to just relax and be a kid again, right?" Smiling back, Hunter nodded and said, "That's the spirit, guys! Trust me, it'll be a blast!"

Akamaru glanced back at Kiba then nodded, Well, if only for a few hours, then I suppose there's no harm...

In that instant, the three competitors clanked their vials together in a toast-like fashion, and in unison, all three downed their vials to the last drop. Scowling from the taste, Naruto coughed a bit, "Ack! Man, why didn't you warn us how sour those things were?" hacked Naruto.
"Eh, tasted fine to me," responded Kiba as he smacked his lips, rather enjoying the tart flavor of whatever it was he had just consumed.

In that instant however, he began to feel a tingling sensation grow over his entire body. As did Naruto and Hunter. Within that instant, Akamaru watched, jaw practically gaping as the three began to shrink in their clothing. Their bodies grew softer, younger, as the boys and wolf almost seemed to retreat within themselves. Their feet were now dangling off their chairs as their shoes and sandals slipped off as a result of their shrunken state. By the time it was done, both Naruto and Kiba regained composure, rather dazed, then looked down at themselves, then back at each other, jerking back suddenly from the surprise of being greeted by such young yet familiar faces greeting them. "Whoa! W-we're actually kids again!" exclaimed Naruto in a seemingly more spritely and youthful voice than before. They then looked back at Hunter, who looked almost like a brown anthro puppy compared to his usual wolf-state. The two young boys burst into a fit of giggles at the sight.

"BAHAHAHAHA! D'awwwwww, look at you now, little Wolfie? You're adorable!" spouted Kiba between his hysterical laughter.
