Hunter rolled his eyes, "Hardy har har..." he said as he looked forward, and much to his surprise, found things a bit blurrier than normal. "Aw crud...I forgot, my glasses don't fit anymore," complained Hunter as he hoisted himself from what looked like a booster seat this point and reached into his bag. "Don't worry, guys. I have a few extra pairs of clothing here for just a sitch like this!"

Both Naruto and Kiba looked at each other confused, "Sitch?" Kiba asked. "Eh, probably a dimensional thing or something," replied Naruto as his feet kicked back and forth from the seat of his table. Putting on a smaller pair of glasses, Hunter grabbed three separate pairs of clothing, and tossed a pair for Naruto and Kiba each. Their softer more pudgy bellies had all shrunken a considerable amount along with their new younger bodies, but had still distended rather noticeably for all three.

After the three had changed into more suitable but vaguely familiar attire, Hunter rubbed his paws together and asked in a much more youthful yet still just as energetic as his older self tone, "So, how's it feel?"
"Kinda cool! I feel all jumpy now!" said Naruto as he hopped around all excited and eager-like. "Anyone wanna fight or something?" Kiba and Akamaru shared a glance then sighed. "Still the same moron...." Kiba muttered under his breath, much to Akamaru's amusement, before he licked Kiba's face, causing the boy to laugh.

So how do you feel, little fella? Kiba shrugged and said, "Definitely way more energetic, and I wouldn't mind clobbering Naruto in a bit of sparring right now either," responded Kiba with a grin as he turned Hunter and asked, "How about you, wolf-boy? How are you feeling?"

Hunter scowled a bit less subtly than he usually would at nicknames he didn't like, then after a scoff, opened his mouth to respond, when suddenly a loud rumbling filled the room. Hunter rubbed the back of his head sheepishly and chuckled with embarrassment as the source was in fact, his distended but shockingly hungry brown tummy. With a childish grin, finally he answered, "Hungry."

As if on cue, both Naruto and Kiba's stomachs also emitted hungry growls, causing the boys to also blush and smirk with a bit of embarrassment as they all remembered why they had agreed to this 'little' venture to begin with. "Whadduya say, boys? Ready to chow down?" asked Hunter eagerly.

Immediately, Naruto and Kiba nodded eagerly as all three hopped back onto their chairs, and immediately chow down on whatever they can get a hold of; with their newfound youth allowing them to eat a lot more than before and at a much quicker rate than before as well...
11211222112111111121122121212212111.title: "Sure, count us in!"

choices: Naruto and Hunter eat eagerly, but Kiba maintains his lead
Naruto or Hunter manage to pul ahead after a while
112112221121111111211221212122121112.content:
Despite the fact that the three freshly-regressed competitors were tearing into their food even quicker and eagerly than before, it didn't take long for their attention to wander; specifically, Naruto looked up from his plate of pancakes at Hunter, who was busily scarfing down a huge omelet filled with all kinds of meat, his muzzle upturned in a massive grin and his little tail wagging like crazy. "Say, Hunter," Naruto spoke, in between bites of pancake, "can I ask ya a couple of questions about that stuff we just drank?"

Hunter swallowed his current mouthful and gulped down some orange juice. "Sure, Naruto; ask away." He continued tearing into his omelet, tail wagging all the while.

Giggling, Naruto took a drink of milk. "Thanks! So, uh, first off: how long exactly is this gonna last? You said a few hours, but you were kinda vague..."

Hunter burped, giggling, before jumping back into his omelet. "I guess I was, wasn't I? Well, I may have understated it a bit...it's actually more like a day."

"A day?!" Naruto repeated, eyes widening. "We'll be stuck like that that long?" Kiba, hearing this, spluttered a bit, but continued shoveling food into his mouth, glaring at Hunter.

The little pup shrank back a bit. "Sorry..." To his surprise, Naruto's face split into a huge grin.

"What are ya sorry for? We have a whole day of relaxing and having fun ahead of us! I was just surprised it would be that long." Naruto licked his lips.

Hunter sighed, a relieved smile coming across his face. "Phew; thought you were angry..."

"Angry?" Naruto replied. "You kidding? Yesterday was some of the most fun I've had in a while, and I'm havin' lots of fun right now!" His brow furrowed. "Speaking of which...about how much did that stuff affect our minds?"

Hunter gulped down the rest of his current glass of orange juice. "Well, like I said, we still have our memories, but our attention spans are a good bit shorter, we get excited a lot more easily, we have way more energy, and we have a lot less control over our emotions."

Naruto raised an eyebrow, even as he forked more pancake into his mouth. "What do you mean by that?"

Hunter shifted a bit nervously in his seat. "Well...if you start to think of some really unpleasant memory or something, don't be surprised if you start tearing up." He scratched the back of his head. "Same if you skin your knee or something..."

"...oh," Naruto replied slowly.

Hunter grimaced apologetically. "Sorry about that." Instantly, his expression brightened. "But it works the other way, too. When you're feeling happy, you're really happy, and all the things that are bothering you just seem...unimportant." He winked at Naruto. "In other words, the pros outweigh the cons." With that, he returned to his omelet with gusto.

Naruto smiled at Hunter, then turned to Kiba. "Ya hear that, Kiba? This is gonna be..." His eyes widened as he saw that Kiba was almost done his own platter, and was already drawing another close to him.

Naruto's eyes narrowed. "H-hey, that's not fair! You cheated!"

Kiba, swallowing his mouthful, smirked. "Hey, it's your own fault for getting all chatty with Wolfy over there." Hunter scowled and pouted a bit at the nickname. Ignoring this, Kiba grinned and smacked his belly, which had distended a bit more, and had started to once again force his shirt-a dark green v-neck with red lining around the neck and a cartoony dog face on the front-up once more. "I just took advantage of it." Laughing cockily, he resumed tearing into his plate of huge breakfast sandwiches.

Pouting, Naruto's hand went down to his own distended tummy-still covered by a sleeveless orange hoodie over a short-sleeved blue shirt-and compared it to Kiba's. "Yeah, enjoy it while you can, dog-breath..." Naruto muttered, jumping back into his pancakes.

Seeing this, Hunter, rubbing his own stomach-peeking out the tiniest bit from under his black sleeveless shirt, emblazoned with a partially-shadowed moon-he licked his maw and jumped back into his omelet.
112112221121111111211221212122121112.title: This time around, one of the boys is in the lead.

choices: All three take a quick breather after a little while.
Hunter finally regains the lead from Naruto.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122.content:
Akamaru watched from near the table with utter awe at the sheer speed these three youngsters tore into their meals, all the while, their tummies continued to distend further and further just ever so slightly with each bit of food stuffed into their hungry maws. Jeez, at this rate, their bellies'll be even bigger than they are...

Kiba maintained the lead for a good while as he plowed through his breakfast sandwiches, but as time went on, Naruto and Hunter began to gain momentum over Kiba, consuming at a much quicker rate and with more being consumed at a moment to moment basis. Noticing this sudden change of pace, Kiba began eating at a quicker rate, neglecting the portion sizes the two had switched to.

After a good while of consuming a majority of what was on their platters, both Naruto and Hunter stopped briefly and took a hearty gulp of their cups of Milk and OJ respectively to wash down some of the contents of their meal thus far. As they finished, the two youths ended up slamming their cups down on the table and both burped loudly in unison, causing the boy and the wolf to giggle childishly. Even Kiba couldn't help but snicker a little bit as he took a drink from his own cup, but as he did, he noticed both Naruto and Hunter immediately went back to scarfing down their platters. "H-hey! No fair, you distracted me!" pouted Kiba as he sputtered and resumed eating his sandwiches. Sticking his tongue out at the boy, Naruto grinned mischievously and said, "Not our faults. Me and 'Wolfy' were just taking an advantage," and once again, he resumed eating. "I have a name, you know..." replied Hunter, unamused as he continued to work on his omelet.

As time went on, the tides were starting to even out. All three looked as though their bellies had bloated outward to about the same length, with all three having a vague sliver of flesh exposed from the bottom of their shirts as they rose up to accommodate their ever growing stomachs. As more time went on however, it seemed as though Naruto was beginning to eat a little quicker than Kiba and Hunter. Finally finishing his pancakes, Naruto sighed with relief as he gave his belly a few hearty pats. Glancing back at Naruto, Hunter's tail wagged immensely as he smiled and said, "Nice job, Naruto! Didn't think you'd get ahead of Kiba so quick!"
"He's only ahead for now! J-just you wait and see!" said Kiba uneasily as he attempted to finish the remaining contents of his platter.

Hunter, however, had just finished his omelet, causing his shirt to ride up a bit more, exposing more of his bloated furry tummy to the two boys, and only making Kiba more uneasy about losing to the two, which resulted in the dog-nin chowing down even quicker to finish the rest of his platter. Wasting no time, both Naruto and Hunter moved onto their next platters. For Naruto, an assortment of hash browns, boiled eggs and tons of bacon. As for Hunter; a huge plate of breakfast sausage, the aroma strong enough to make the young pup's maw water. The two immediately dug right in as Kiba finally finished his sandwich and needed to take a quick breather before moving onto his next platter...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122.title: Naruto or Hunter pull ahead after a while

choices: "Sure; I don't like the idea of being cooped up here anyway"
"Nah, let's just keep going."
11211222112111111121122121212212111221.content:
As Kiba leaned back in his seat, trying to catch his breath, Naruto and Hunter tore into their new platters, Naruto, a fork in each hand, picked up large helpings of boiled eggs and hash browns, shoveling them into his mouth and chewing happily, occasionally setting the utensils down to cram several slices of bacon into his overstuffed mouth, chewing them messily until he could get his mouth closed, then gulping them down after chewing a bit longer. Because of the sheer quantity he gulped down, his tummy bulged out, slightly but noticeably. Licking, his lips, he picked up his forks and repeated the process.

Hunter, on the other hand, eschewed forks and used his bare paws to shovel sausage after sausage into his waiting maw, cramming in as many as possible before shutting his mouth and chewing, giggling all the while. After a while, he gulped them down, and, like with Naruto, the sheer amount he gulped down at once caused his belly to bulge out slightly, making his shirt rise up and exposing more of his brown-furred flesh.

Kiba, seeing the two of them like that, grit his teeth and selected his next platter, a plate of two large omelets. Eager to regain his lead, he eschewed utensils and simply picked them up, ripping huge bites out of it, heedless of the fillings and meats that spilled all over the place.

They continued on like this for a while; Hunter and Naruto cramming their maws before gulping them down, Kiba ripping into his omelets with reckless abandon. As they went, their tummies bulged bigger and bigger, slowly forcing their shirts up higher.

In a few minutes time, they had begun to slow down, feeling the fullness in their stomachs. Rather than continue and eat themselves sick, they set their food and utensils down and leaned back in their seats, closing their eyes and massaging their midsections. Each of their stomachs had swollen considerably and forced their shirts up a good way, exposing a decent amount of skin on all three and stopping just short of their belly-buttons.

"Oh man..." Naruto moaned. "This is one of the best breakfasts I've had in a while." He opened one eye and sat up a bit. "I can't remember the last time I had this much fun just stuffing myself."

Kiba sighed and massaged his belly. "Yeah; it's been a while since I got to really unwind like this." He looked at Naruto, grinning. "I can see why you like doing it so much." Akamaru licked the side of Kiba's face, causing him to giggle.

Hunter belched, giggling. "Pretty great, isn't it?" He indicated all three of them, kicking his feet. "It's even better when we make ourselves kids again."

Naruto licked his lips, scratching the exposed portion of his tummy. "Heh, you said it!"

Kiba ruffled Akamaru's hair, giggling as the dog nuzzled him. "Ain't gonna argue with that!"

Hunter smiled, and settled back in his chair, relaxing. Soon enough, Naruto and Kiba were doing the same, rubbing their stomachs and relaxing in companionable silence.

It didn't take long for someone-this time, Hunter- to break the silence. "Listen, guys, I was thinking: we got a day left being stuck like this, and while stuffing ourselves is fun now, spending a lot of that time sleeping that off seems like a waste. So, whaddaya say we stop eating for now, relax, let these," he smacked his furry gut for emphasis, 'digest a bit, then maybe go out and spend a day on the town." He beamed at the two, giving them a toothy grin. "So whaddaya say, boys?"

Naruto and Kiba looked towards the ceiling, pondering this question. Finally, one of them answered...
11211222112111111121122121212212111221.title: All three take a quick breather after a little ...

choices: Either Naruto or Hunter won the race.
Kiba and Akamaru catch up and beat the others to the park.
112112221121111111211221212122121112211.content:
Finally, with a big grin, Naruto said, "Sure! I don't like the idea of being cooped up here anyway. Outside, we can go play, wrestle, race, do whatever! Whadduya say, Kiba?" Looking back down at Akamaru, he asked, "Sounds fun to me. How about it, boy?" Akamaru's tail wagged at the idea of time in the park, and going out. In turn, he licked Kiba's face again, causing the boy to giggle from the ticklish sensation while Hunter and Naruto laughed with him.

And so, the two kids, one pup and giant dog decided to put a hold on finishing the breakfast platter, leaving all their bags in the inn where it'd be safe, and went on their merry way. Konoha seemed so much bigger and livelier to their smaller, child-forms as they just took it all in, almost in a bewildered state.

Having such a young, childlike innocence not hampered by the mindset of adulthood allowed the three youths to appreciate the little things as they wandered the town. The birds chirping, how the nice blue sky and white fluffy clouds looked like something out of an old oil painting, things seemed to have more color and vividness to them than usual. All of which brought a comforting warmth to the three. It was enough to almost make them forget how full their tummies had gotten since this morning's feasting escapades started. Resting his arms behind his head in a relaxed state as he walked, Naruto broke the ice and asked, "So whadduya guys wanna do first?"

"Wanna head to the park and play?" suggested Kiba. As if on cue, both Hunter and Akamaru's tails wagged in unison, causing the human boys to laugh. "I'll do ya one better," Hunter started, "let's all race to the park!" Both Naruto and Kiba's faces lit up at the notion. "Hey, yeah! That sounds like fun!" Naruto gleamed.

Grinning a devilishly toothy grin, Hunter clutched his glasses tight to make sure they wouldn't fall off, and immediately sprinted off. "Starting right now!" he shouted slyly in the distance, catching Naruto and Kiba off guard. "H-hey! That's cheating!" Pouted Kiba, only to see Naruto had immediately sprinted after the wolf pup, trying to catch up. Slapping his palm to his face, Kiba glanced back at Akamaru and said, "Rgh, those lousy-Alright, buddy, let's show these dweebs what fast really means!" Akamaru chuckled to himself and immediately, he and Kiba tailed shortly behind the other two, catching up at a surprisingly quick pace.

Upon reaching the park...
112112221121111111211221212122121112211.title: "Sure; I don't like the idea of being cooped up."

choices: Lunchtime rolls around, and they go to get something to eat
Taking another break from playing, they see an eating contest going on nearby
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Despite their best efforts, Kiba and Akamaru arrived at the park to find Hunter already waiting for them, arms folded behind his head. Naruto was beside him, looking slightly disgruntled, but this turned into a rather smug expression as Kiba and Akamaru came into sight.

"Hey, slowpokes," Hunter piped up, tail wagging. "What took ya so long?"

Kiba, screeching to a stop, scowled at the two. "Oh ha ha," he grumbled. He pointed an accusing finger at Hunter. "Don't go lookin' so smug; you cheated!"

Naruto, folding his arms, smirked. "Cheated? I didn't see him cheat."

"He was running on all fours!" Kiba retorted, once again pointing at Hunter. "Besides Akamaru, the rest of us were stuck runnin' on two feet!"

The pup shrugged. "Hey, what do you expect? I'm a wolf; running on all fours comes naturally to me." He giggled, turning around and beginning to walk into the park, the other three following him. "Don't go bein' a sore loser; wasn't the whole point of the race just to have fun? I know you two are naturally competitive, but didn't you have fun anyway?"

Naruto and Kiba glanced at each other as they walked, Naruto smirking, Kiba still scowling. "Well..." Kiba began, "I guess it was pretty fun..."

Naruto nodded, grinning. "Yeah, it was fun. Ya know what else is fun?"

"What?" Hunter asked, still strolling along.

"This!"

Kiba started. "Hey, wha---"

That was all he had time to get out before Naruto lunged at him, tackling him to the ground. "Naruto! What the hell are you..."

Naruto grinned impishly, grabbing Kiba's arms. "Its called wrestling, dog-breath; learn it!"

To the blonde's surprise, the little dog-nin smirked. "Actually, I already have." Before Naruto could utter anything in response, Kiba used the grip Naruto had on his arm to flip them both over. He wrested his arms free from Naruto's grip, pushing down on Naruto's chest.

Akamaru barked. Nice one, Kiba.

Kiba looked to the side and grinned at the dog. "Thanks, bo---"

Unfortunately for Kiba, this brief moment of distraction was all Naruto needed to push Kiba's hands off his chest and send him stumbling off him and to the ground. Getting to his feet, Naruto giggled and stuck his tongue out at Kiba. "Heh, whatcha gonna do no---"

That was all he had time to get out before a ball of brown fur tackled him, pushing him to the ground. Hunter's arms wrapped around Naruto's armpits, pinning him down. "Heh; eyes on the ball, Uzumaki; eyes on the ball."

How about eyes on the dog?

Confused, Hunter looked up towards where Akamaru's voice came from. "Well, I've never heard that o---" His eyes flew wide open as he saw Kiba and Akamaru, rushing at the both of them. Before he could disentangle himself from Naruto, the boy and his dog collided with the two, bowling them over and causing all over to go rolling along the ground. Even as they came to a stop, they had already devolved into a happy ball of chaos; the kids and pup laughing and crawling over one another and Akamaru, trying to wrestle with the others, and occasionally tickling one another, adding to the cacophony of laughter. Akamaru, not one to be left out, roughhoused with the three, pushing them with his head, batting them with his limbs, and licking their faces, much to their delight.

They went on like this for a good few minutes, roughhousing, wrestling, and generally just having a great time. Eventually, though, they disentangled themselves from one another and sprawled out on the ground, panting.

"Oh man," Naruto panted, arms splayed out to the sides, "This is some of the most fun I've had in a long time..." He looked to the side at Kiba, who was sitting up and reclining against Akamaru. "This what having friends is like? As a kid, I mean?"

Kiba, panting, nonetheless grinned back at him. "Sure is, bonehead; better get used to it." Naruto's nose wrinkled slightly at the jab, but he quickly settled back down, lying his head back on the ground.

Hunter, also spread out on his back, his tongue hanging out the side of his muzzle, giggled. "Hee hee, nothing like some exercise to get ya goin' after a big meal..." He rubbed a paw over his tummy for emphasis. It had gone down a great deal, and had even retreated back under his shirt, but it still had a definite round shape.

"You said it," Kiba muttered, patting his own tummy, in much the same state as Hunter's.

Naruto, instead of saying anything, simply nodded in agreement, massaging his own stomach, which had also retreated within his hoodie.

The three of them (plus Akamaru) remained like this for a good while, relaxing, chatting, and massaging their bellies. Soon enough, though, their eight-year old bodies had gotten their second wind, and they immediately jumped back into the fray, and soon enough, they were roughhousing and crawling over each other all over again, laughing, giggling, and generally having the time of their lives.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Either Naruto or Hunter won the race.

choices: They get one huge pizza to share
They all order a big pizza for each of them
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
It was a good several minutes until the three youngsters, unable to go on fighting, playing, and wrestling, lay sprawled out of the ground, panting happily. Their clothes were dirty and dusty, their faces equally so, but the huge smiles plastered across their faces indicated they didn't mind in the least. Akamaru, lying beside them and panting wildly, looked over at them and wagged his tail. <i>You guys...you guys have fun?</i>

"What...what did he say?" Naruto asked between gasps of breath.

Kiba opened his mouth, but Hunter beat him to it. "He...he asked us if it was fun." Kiba scowled and looked over at Hunter, but he didn't move from his spot.

"Oh," Naruto gasped. "In that case...yeah, it was really fun." He grinned like a goof and giggled tiredly.

It proved infectious, and it wasn't long before Kiba lost his scowl and began giggling as well. "Heh, for once, I agree with ya." He looked over at Hunter again, but this time with a smirk. "Especially you, Wolfy; ya can definitely hold your own."

Hunter looked over at him and growled playfully. "Thanks, but my name's Hunter; try to remember." Sighing, he placed one hand on his stomach; thanks to all the play-fighting, it had retreated back to its normally-slim state. Glancing over at the other two, he noticed their bellies seemed to be in much the same state. <i>Heh; thank goodness for active metabolisms and hyperactivity.</i> Hunter giggled at the thought...right before his stomach growled audibly. <i>Oh yeah; guess it's been a while since we ate.</i>

As if reading his mind, Naruto sat up clutching his stomach. "Um...anyone hungry?"

Feeling his own stomach growl, Kiba also sat up, scratching Akamaru's ear as he did so. "Yeah, kinda." He looked up at the sky. "Still, considering where the sun's at right now, it's probably about lunchtime."

"Lunchtime?" Hunter echoed, sitting up and stretching. "Great timing; I was gettin' a little hungry myself." He rubbed his flat, furry tummy through his shirt. "So...any ideas on where ya wanna eat?"

Naruto's face promptly lit up. "Ooh! How about Ichiraku's?"

Kiba rolled his eyes. "You always eat that stuff, Naruto." He grinned. "How about some steaks?"

Hunter blinked. "Sounds good, but Naruto and I just had steaks yester-" He suddenly began sniffing the air, his ears perking up.

Kiba looked over at him. "What is it, Wol---Hunter? You smell something?" He and Akamaru began sniffing the air as well.

Hunter closed his eyes, sniffing deeply. "Yeah...it smells like..." His eyes flew open and a huge grin spread across his muzzle. "It smells like pizza!" Tail wagging wildly, he bolted to his paws and began rushing off. "C'mon!"

"H-hey!" Naruto protested, getting to his feet and running after him. "Slow down!" He yelped as Akamaru and Kiba, having picked up on the delicious scent as well, blew past him. Cursing, he put on a burst of speed and rushed after them.

Upon reaching the restaurant...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Lunchtime rolls around, and they go to get some...

choices: All four begin scarfing away like crazy.
"Wanna see who can eat the most pizza?"
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Eventually, Naruto reached the outside of a new Pizza Place in Konoha, where Hunter, Kiba and Akamaru were already long since waiting. Huffing and puffing, Naruto leaned forward, trying to catch his breath, before chuckling albeit horsed, then said, "Jeez...I...I had no idea you guys...*phew*...liked Pizza so much!" Hunter grinned, practically re-energized; despite all their rough housing not too long ago, and said, "Are you kiddin'? Pizza's got it all! Tons of smoky meat, melty cheeses, more meat, sauce, doughy crust, and did I mention the meat?" Naruto chuckled, seeing Hunter and Akamaru's tails wagging as he went on and on, until finally, he said, "Well, what're we standing around here for? Let's go grab a bite!" With that, all four headed inside, and were immediately greeted by the waiter. "Welcome! What can we do for you lil guys today?"

"Pizza!" Naruto spontaneously blurted out, causing Kiba to facepalm while Hunter snickered a bit. "Sorry, uhh what my boneheaded buddy over there MEANT to say was-" Kiba stopped, sniffing a particularly strong aroma emanating from the brick-stacked oven in the kitchen. Catching the scent as well, Hunter licked his lips and asked, "Whadduya guys got in the oven right now? It smells amazing!" Catching the scent as well, Akamaru barked in agreement. You can say THAT again, pup!

The waiter smirked and said, "Oh, that? That's our specialty; 'The Maestro', we call it. Picture it, boys. A deep dish pizza, lathered with the zestiest pasta sauce you've ever tasted. Layered with mozzarella, cheddar, melted to gooey perfection. Then, take smoked sausages, crispy pepperoni, garlic chicken, and smother it into the cheese with onions, fresh bell peppers, and-oh, did I mention the crust was also stuffed with cheese as well?" By the time the waiter was done describing the pizza to the three youths and big dog, all four of their mouths were watering as they simply stood in awe at what could arguably be considered the perfect pizza to all of them. "That...sounds....amazing...." muttered Naruto, still in a dazed state. "C-can we get four of those, please?" The waiter laughed and shook his head, "Whoa there, boys. The Maestro may be a delicate piece of art, but she's not a piece to be taken lightly. See, in order to get everything layered and proportioned to perfection, she only comes in one size; Extra Extra EXTRA large. We're talking thirty two immense slices of pizza heaven waiting to melt in your mouth and redefine your notions of taste. No one man; let alone a boy, a puppy boy...or big dog, could ever tame such a canvas single handedly."

Kiba shrugged and said, "Well, heck, that's like eight slices each. That's practically a regular pizza each. Plus, if this bad boy is as good as it sounds and smells...." Kiba licked his lips and rubbed his growling tummy in anticipation. He then turned to the waiter and said, "Alright, we'll take one Maestro in whatever size you said it came in, and a few pitchers of soda." The waiter smirked and said, "Coming right up, boys. Just sit tight and we'll bring The Maestro out in just a moment." The four nodded then headed to a nearby table, awaiting their upcoming venture eagerly. Hunter grinned toothily and said, "I knew there was a reason my nose picked up on this pizza more than the usual kind..." Naruto smirked and said, "I just hope this thing is as good as that guy said."

As if on cue, the waiters came out carrying the massive pizza over to the boys' table, once again, filling their eyes with awe as 'The Maestro' was placed before them, along with their plates and beverages. "Welp, moment of truth..." muttered Naruto as he, Hunter and Kiba all grabbed a slice of the cheesy, meat laden pizza. In unison, all three took a huge bite, chewed a bit to get a good taste, then gulped it down. Suddenly, silence struck the table. Akamaru turned to the boys and pup. Well? How is it?

"It's...it's...." was all Naruto could mutter. The anticipation was almost starting to get to Akamaru, until Hunter blurted out...

"...AMAZING! H-holy cow, it's like eating a slice of Heaven itself...!" Both Hunter and Naruto proceeded to chomp away at the slice in their hands. Kiba grinned to Akamaru and pulled a slice for him and said, "Here you go, boy! Taste for yourself!" Akamaru's tail wagged as he took a big, gaping bite out of his slice. Like with the others, his eyes lit up with disbelief. ...If this is pizza...then what have we been eating all this time...? As with the others, Akamaru immediately began scarfing away at his slice.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: They get one huge pizza to share

choices: Upon completing their fourth slices, they continue tearing into the pizza
They take a break upon finishing the fourth slice, catching their breath
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Despite the fact the large, deep-dish slices were easily bigger than their forearms, the three youths and big dog plowed through it quickly, lost in the cheesy, meaty, delicious flavors the slices produced.

"Oh man," Hunter moaned through a mouthful of pizza, already well over halfway through his slice. "This is the best pizza I've ever had!" He licked some sauce off his lips, but some had already begun to stain his fur. "Didn't even know pizza could <i>taste</i> this good!" He resumed scarfing away, little tail wagging.

Kiba swallowed his current mouthful, wiping an arm across his face. "Yeah, and the meat's top-notch, too! Cooked just right, the exact amount of seasonings..." he trailed off as he opened his mouth wide and tore a massive piece off, continuing to tear into the slice of pizza.

Naruto nodded enthusiastically as he tore a piece off his own slice. "Yeah, and even the veggies taste great!"

Akamaru continued wolfing down his slice, his own tail wagging at breakneck speed. <i>Only problem: any pizza we eat from here on out is gonna taste like crap compared to this!</i> Hunter and Kiba giggled; Naruto, not understanding any of it, simply continued tearing into his piece.

Time passed as the four continued tearing into their slices of pizza, until only the cheese-filled crust remained. Licking their lips, all three youngsters chomped down on a piece of the crust and pulled away, pulling a string of gooey, melted cheese along with it. Grinning, they slurped the cheese up and chewed. Akamaru, on the other hand, ripped off half of the crust and chomped on it, his own eyes lighting up at the taste.

Not wanting to wait any longer, the three young ones stuffed the rest of their crusts into the mouth, cheeks bulging as they chewed. Finally, after a few long seconds, they swallowed, licked their lips, and promptly helped themselves each to another slice (with Kiba taking an extra for Akamaru). Exchanging delighted looks, the four began tearing into their second slices. Then a third. Then a fourth, as they completely lost themselves in the delicious flavors of the pizza.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Pizza, pizza, pizza!

choices: Slowly but surely, they all continue to wolf down their pizza.
Someone starts to feel full.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
After nearly four slices of 'The Maestro', the boys and Akamaru were utterly enveloped by the ecstasy of pure flavor. Unbeknownst to them, however, was just how filling each slice of pizza truly was. By the time they'd all reached their fourth slice, their tummies had begun to bulge rather noticeably from beneath their respective shirts. Even Akamaru's belly was beginning to distend from his pizza consumption. Bite after bite, the boys continued chomping away at their fourth slices. After reaching around half way in, Naruto began to slow his pace down, as he winced, feeling his belly push outward. Neither Kiba nor Hunter were fairing much better. Nevertheless, the flavor bomb was too great to allow anyone to flag just yet. So, they all pushed on, one small bite at a time, still enjoying the taste in each bite, until they'd all finish scarfing down the cheesy crust.

Upon completion, the boys and pup; in unison, sighed with relief, and leaned back in their chairs, their bellies pushing outward, but still contained beneath their shirts. Resting his hand on his tummy, Naruto smirked and said, "Wow...I don't think I've EVER eaten pizza that filling before..." Kiba burped, then giggled, massaging his own bloated tummy in the process. "You're telling me. Sheesh, can you imagine if we actually DID get one of these per person?" Hunter laughed, while Akamaru shuddered at the thought. They'd have to tear down an entire wall just to roll all four of us out of here...

Kiba and Hunter laughed at his remark as Kiba ruffled the big dog's head and said, "I'm surprised you've been able to keep up with us so far. Nice job, boy!" Akamaru glanced down at his furry bloated belly and smirked a bit. What can I say? It's not every day I get to wolf down one of the best pizzas ever conceived by human hands.

Naruto poured himself a glass of soda from his pitcher and began gulping it down while Hunter glanced down at his own distended belly and chuckled. "Wow, you weren't kidding about how filling this thing is! Heh, hope we can all still finish it," Hunter said. Placing his now empty cup down, Naruto burped loudly and sighed with relief as he patted his belly proudly, then said, "Sure we can! This pizza may be filling, but I've never come across a pizza I couldn't scarf down!" Kiba grinned and said, "Me neither! How about you, boy?" Akamaru's tail wagged as Kiba tore him another slice. I've never come across a pizza worth scarfing down anywhere near as much as this one.

Immediately, Akamaru began getting to work on his fifth slice. Kiba smirked at the sight then turned to Naruto and Hunter and said, "So now that we're all rested up, whadduya say we follow Akamaru's example and get to work on slice number five?" Naruto grinned and grabbed himself another slice. Kiba and Hunter did the same. Wasting no time, all four were right back at it, scarfing down their next slice of pizza, though still at a slightly slower pace than earlier...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: They take a little break after their fourth slice.

choices: Hunter or Kiba notice's Naruto's hoodie coming open
Naruto notices his hoodie coming open
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
All four of them were beginning to truly feel the effects of the huge slices of pizza they were consuming, and their pace was noticeably slower than before, but they still gave no indication that they were going to be stopping any time soon. After all, to leave anything this tasty uneaten seemed a crime.

Slowly, but surely, their fifth slices began to shrink as they vanished down their gullets, the four savoring every single bite. The only interruptions were an occasional burp, or a pause to take a deep swig of soda, after which they immediately resumed eating. In minutes, they had eaten their fifth slices, and were already reaching in for their sixth slices. Kiba burped a bit queasily, but nonetheless lowered a sixth slice to Akamaru. Barking appreciatively, Akamaru began working on it, as did the three youngsters. The three only spent a minute or two eating, however, before all three winced.

Concerned, Akamaru looked up, licking sauce off his muzzle. <i>Guys? Is everything OK?</i>

Sweating a bit, Kiba smiled. "Y-yeah, we're fine, buddy." Grunting, he reached down to his waistline. "Pants are just feelin' a bit tight is all..."

Naruto giggled, even as he fumbled with his own pants button. "Eh, why don't we just pop 'em? It's fun, and it'd be a lot quicker."

Hunter rolled his eyes as he managed to get a good grip on his pants button. "Normally, I'd be all for that, but the sooner we get rid of this tightness, the better chance we'll be able to keep eating." He pulled the button out and undid it, sighing happily as the pressure abated and his stomach bulged out a little more. Kiba and Naruto, in that order, did the same, grinning like goofs as their waistlines were freed up and their stomachs pushed forward a little more; a little strip of flesh had even begun to peek out at the bottom of Kiba's shirt.

"Ohhh man, that feels better," Naruto grinned, rubbing his bloated tummy. "Not feeling nearly as full now."

Hunter nodded, tail wagging. "Yeah; I was actually gettin' worried for a second there." He beamed as he looked over the slice in his hands and the remaining pizza on the table. "I actually think we might be able to finish this bad boy."

Kiba, smirking, opened his mouth wide and ripped off a big piece of his slice, newly invigorated. "Then what are we waiting for?!"

Evidently, Naruto and Hunter agreed, as they began tearing into their slices with renewed vigor. As they did so, the effects became apparent; Hunter's tank top and Kiba's t-shirt, slowly but surely, began rising upwards slowly. Naruto's hoodie was also being affected, albeit in a different way: as he crammed more of the delicious pizza in his mouth and his stomach bulged more and more, a couple of the teeth of his hoodie strained noticeably, before popping apart, giving a tiny glimpse of the short-sleeved blue t-shirt he wore underneath...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Slowly but surely, they all continue to wolf do...

choices: Catching up and all four work on slice number seven, a bit fuller.
Naruto continues to stay ahead, making things a little more competitive.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
The three youngsters and dog continued tearing into their sixth, immense slices of pizza. With each gooey, meat and sauce lathered bite of pizza consumed, their bellies continued to distend outward just ever so slightly. With every few, more of the teeth from Naruto's hoodie began to un-pop from each other, but the young blond was too busy demolishing his pizza to notice. However, as Hunter ate, one of his ears twitched; catching the sound of the zipper on Naruto's hoodie beginning to snap open. He turned and saw Naruto's tummy pushing his hoodie open. Stopping for a moment, he began to snicker a bit, catching Kiba's attention.

"Errrm...hehe...N-Naruto?" Hunter attempted to warn, too amused by the boy's obliviousness. Stopping mid-bite, Naruto turned to Hunter, mouth full of pizza. Gulping down a heaping mouthful, he sighed with relief and said, "What's up, Hunter?" before turning right back to his pizza and taking another huge bite. Giggling a bit himself, Kiba pointed down to Naruto's zipper as it was nearing closer and closer to reaching the top, his belly distending outward a bit more as more of the teeth pop open. "Oi, bonehead. Hehe, ya might wanna unzip that thing before it-" before Kiba could finish, the zipper snapped open, causing his hoodie to burst open and expose Naruto's blue t-shirt, and causing his stomach to push outward slightly more as a result. He simply stared for a moment, eyes widened in surprise. "Oops." Both Hunter and Kiba began laughing as a result. Naruto scowled a bit. Akamaru, seeing Naruto's busted hoodie, smirked to himself. I guess busting the zipper was quicker than unzipping...

Both Hunter and Kiba laughed some more as Naruto grunted in annoyance and said, "C'mon, no fair!" Kiba grinned a bit and said, "You said earlier that it would be more fun and quicker to bust our buttons than unbutton ourselves. He said you figured it'd be quicker to bust your zipper than unzip instead." Naruto scoffed for a moment, but quickly started giggling a bit himself, shortly after and started patting his tummy proudly and said, "Well, for your information, it WAS. And while you two were busy laughing at my broken zipper, I was too busy enjoying this awesome pizza!" He then proceeded to stuff the rest of his sixth slice into his mouth, and with a hearty gulp, sent the hefty mouthful down his throat, and into his bloated tummy, causing it to push outward and making his now exposed blue t-shirt rise up just slightly, now only barely containing his tummy. Sighing happily, he burps loudly and grins, then grabs his seventh slice and looks back at the others, grinning impishly, then says, "Better hurry up, boys. Those last few slices aren't gonna eat themselves, right?" He then opened wide and took a huge bite, grinning cockily as he chewed vigorously on the mouthful of pizza in his mouth.

Hunter and Kiba shared a glance, then grinned to each other, before hauling to finish their sixth slices as well...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Hunter and Kiba notice Naruto's hoodie unzipping.

choices: They put on a burst of speed and try to see who can finish first
One of them can't go on, and lets the others have their share
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Eager to catch up, Hunter and Kiba took huge bites out of their sixth slices, the mouthfuls plopping into their bellies and causing them to bulge slightly outward with every piece swallowed. Seeing that Naruto was almost done with his slice, they both narrowed their eyes and began chomping down even faster, causing their sizable slices to disappear even quicker. Eventually, they had caught up enough that, by the time Naruto tossed the last piece of cheesy crust into his mouth, they had only their own crusts left. Not wanting to be left in the dust, they crammed the entire things into their mouths, cheek bulging as they chewed.

Akamaru, swallowing his own crust, looked up at them. Easy there, guys; don't try to swallow too much at once. As if to punctuate this point, Hunter's eyes went wide as he attempted to swallow the mass of bread and cheese; as it had only been chewed a bit, it got slightly stuck. Naruto and Kiba looked towards him with concern, but Hunter waved a dismissive hand even as the other pounded on his chest. Eventually, the food went down, and he breathed a sigh of relief.

The dog wagged his tail. See what I mean? He suddenly stopped as he felt his stomach; owing to his consumption of six huge, deep-dish slices of pizza, it now felt very heavy. Ugh...Hold on a second. He rolled over onto his back, letting his paws go limp. His belly, engorged with the six slices of pizza, was notably swollen, sticking up as a decently-sized sphere. Urp...Kiba, could you give me a tummy rub?

Kiba moved to oblige, but a tightness in his own stomach stopped him. "Um...hold on a second, boy." Groaning, he leaned back in his chair, massaging his tummy. Naruto and Hunter, feeling similarly uncomfortable, did the same.

Though they had only consumed two slices since their initial break, the sheer size of them, and the fact that their bellies had already been filled with four rather large slices of pizza beforehand, ensured their their bellies had grown noticeably, pushing out more than before. In Hunter and Kiba's case, the small strips of furred and bare flesh, respectively, that had begun to peek out from their shirts when they'd undone their pants, had grown as their shirts had been forced higher and higher. Naruto's shirt, additionally, had begun rising up slightly, exposing a small sliver of flesh. In addition, some of the teeth of their flies had been pried apart by their growing bellies, though they were a good way from being fully unzipped.

"Oh man..." Naruto moaned, massaging his midsection. "My tummy feels really heavy..."

Kiba burped queasily. "Ain't gonna argue with you there, bonehead..."

Hunter licked his maw as he looked at the other two. "Well, those slices were freakin' huge; only makes sense we're getting full." He massaged his own swollen midsection, unable to suppress a grin. "Not to mention the fact our guts are like this." He burped, giggling. "Kinda fun, ain't it?"

In spite of his discomfort, Naruto grinned. "Yeah, it is; 'specially since we're like this right now."

Sighing, Kiba leaned back in his chair, folding his arms behind his head. "Yeah, I think I could get used to this."

Hunter smiled. "Well, I still have lotsa that little concoction left," he giggled at his own pun, "back at the inn, so we could spend days like this!" He looked down at Akamaru. "Heck, I even have enough for Akamaru, if he wants in!"

Kiba's eyes widened, but he grinned at the thought. Akamaru perked up, curious. "Ya hear that, boy?" Kiba asked as he beamed down at the dog. "How would ya like to spend a few days riding around on my head again?"

Akamaru, surprised, nonetheless wagged his tail. I think that'd be fun. He sniffed the air, the aroma of the remaining pizza causing his mouth to water in spite of his fullness. First, though, can we finish this pizza? It's too good to leave alone.

Kiba winced as he felt the fullness in his belly, but he brushed it off. "Sounds like a plan!" He retrieved a seventh piece for Akamaru, then took one for himself. He looked at the other two youngsters, grinning. "You ready?"

Naruto and Hunter moaned a bit, but, never one to pass up a challenge, they nodded and took their own seventh slices. With nods to one another, the four began tackling their new slices, taking small bites, but determined not to fail now.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Catching up and all four work on slice number s...

choices: Someone manages to finish first...
Somehow, all four finish their pizza at the same time.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Despite a near overwhelming fullness that had befallen all four, not a one was going to let themselves be taken back by pizza, no matter how absolutely delicious. All four chomped vigorously; through shorter bites but at a much quicker pace between bites. Kiba took several bites at a time before stopping occasionally to chew on a heaping mouthful and eventually send the gaping mouthful down his throat with a hearty gulp, each time, he would occasionally gasp heavily due to the vast content being deposited into his distending tummy at once. Spotting this, Hunter smirked and said, "Careful, Kiba. I tried biting off more than I could chew a few times, and it started hurting after a while." After gulping down a hefty mouthful, Kiba winced then thumped his chest a few times then burped sharply before giggling and sighing with relief. "Ah, don't sweat it, Wolf-ieeeerrr...Hunter. The only person who's a big enough goof to actually choke from eating too much at once is king goof over there," Kiba said, grinning mischievously as he pointed towards Naruto, who scowled with a mouthful of pizza.

Gulping it down, he scoffed then said, "How was I supposed to know the guy making my boneless wings forgot the BONELESS part?" Immediately, both Hunter and Kiba started snickering, even Akamaru couldn't hold back a chuckle or two. Blushing a bit with embarrassment, Naruto eventually rolled his eyes and smirked a bit, then said, "Ah, whatever..." suddenly, Naruto grinned. "Buuuuuut, in case you three didn't notice...." he held his large slice of pizza forward for emphasis, showing the three that he'd eaten more of his pizza than the others. Immediately, they all proceeded to speed things up a bit, taking faster and more frequent bites at a time of their large slices of pizza. "Don't choke now," mocked Naruto as he continued to scarf down his pizza.

With every passing bite, Kiba's t-shirt and Hunter's tanktop continued to rise up as their tummies continued to distend, exposing more flesh from Kiba and more fur from Hunter. Naruto's own shirt had finally begun to rise up enough to expose a sliver of flesh beneath his blue t-shirt and busted hoodie. Akamaru's own belly had seemingly seemed to inflate more and more, hanging well beneath him as he continued to chomp down on his seventh slice of pizza along with the three youths. Occasionally, the three youths would stop and take a quick breath, down more of their drinks, or burp, then would resume chomping away at a surprisingly close knit competition.

Eventually, Naruto finished his seventh slice of pizza just seconds before the others then held his arms up in victory. "Boo-ya!" Naruto cheered as he leaned back in his chair and massaged his greatly bloated belly happily. Kiba scoffed and said, "More like Boo-nah, bonehead. There's still another slice left for each of us." Naruto's victorious grin died down to an expression of disappointment as he glanced down and saw one more massive, cheesy slice left. "...Right." he muttered, then glanced down at his swollen midsection, "Man, I didn't think pizza was capable of fillin' me up like this..."

Massaging his own distended gut, Hunter belched then chuckled, "Heh, awesome, isn't it?" Naruto grinned and nodded, burping suddenly, causing him to giggle a bit more. His grin slanted to one of a more impish kind as he turned to Kiba and said, "I'm still gonna totally demolish that last slice before any of you though." Kiba scoffed then said, "Pfft, yeah, in your dreams, Uzumaki."

Meanwhile, Akamaru rolled back onto his back, and let out a massive belch before sighing and letting his tongue hang from the side of his muzzle as his immensely bloated belly stuck upward. You know what? It doesn't even matter who finishes first...eating this good? That makes us all winners already...

Kiba smiled down at his fuzzy buddy and began scratching the big dog's bigger tummy. "You said it, boy!" Said Kiba as the dog's tail wagged. He then turned to Naruto and; with an impish grin of his own, said, "Still, finishing faster than the dope'll definitely a be a plus..." Naruto laughed then said, "Ha, I bet! It's just too bad that ain't gonna happen." Hunter grinned with amusement, watching the two continue their competitive banter, then decided to get in on the competitive side some more. "Welp, whadduya guys say we settle this and see which of us can finish this tasty sucker off first?" Kiba grinned and said, "Sounds like a plan to me! You ready, Naruto?" Naruto grinned back and said, "When it comes to food? Always!" Akamaru, despite his immense fullness, rolled himself back on all fours as Kiba gave him his eighth and final slice. Hehe, what can I say? No use letting this slice feel left out...

And with that, all four got to wolfing down the last four slices of the Maestro...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: They burst with speed to see who can finish first.

choices: They reach the inn without incident, and promptly fall asleep after re-dosing
They reach the inn, then head back out after re-dosing
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
As the four chowed down on the last four, immense slices of pizza, they began feeling the fullness in their midsections even more than before, but none of them let up in their pace; both because none of them, not even Akamaru, wanted to fall behind, and because, well, the pizza was that damn tasty. Predictably, as they crammed more of the pizza into their mouths, their already-engorged tummies swelled even more. Hunter's tank top and Kiba's t-shirt slowly rose further up and exposing more of their bare stomachs as they crammed bite after delicious, cheesy bite into their maws, Naruto's following close behind, the tiny bit of flesh that had begun to be exposed growing in size. In the meantime, the gradual growth of their bellies was forcing the teeth of their respective flies open more and more. Akamaru's belly, already hanging well below him, got lower and lower as his slice slowly vanished into his waiting maw.

The minutes ticked by as their slices shrank, their stomachs grew, and the heaviness in their tummies intensified. All four of them winced, but they pressed on, determined not to stop now that they were on a roll. Up the three youngsters' shirts slowly slid, and bigger and lower to the ground Akamaru's furry belly became....

Finally, Naruto, reaching the last of his cheesy crust, tossed it in his mouth, and smirked. <i>Heh! Done!</i> Satisfied, he let out a loud burp...which sounded out at the exact same time three others did.

His smug expression quickly transformed into one of disgruntlement and understanding. "Oh, come on!" he protested, looking up at the other two. Sure enough, Kiba and Hunter had polished off their slices and were leaning back in their chairs, hands on their distended bellies and staring at Naruto with the same expression the blonde was wearing. Something suddenly occured to the three of them, and they looked down at Akamaru, who was busily licking his chops. Sensing something, the dog looked up a them and tilted his head. <i>Did...did we all just finish at the same time?</i>

Neither Hunter nor Kiba said anything; instead, they merely looked at one another, then at Naruto...

Hunter suddenly burst out laughing. "N-no way!" He managed through his gasps, tail wagging wildly. "There were four of us, and we <i>still</i> tied?!"

Kiba smirked. "Heh; looks that way."

Naruto, though looking slightly disgruntled, couldn't help but smirk in return. "Ah, well; if I had to tie with anybody, I'm glad it was you guys."

Hunter grinned...right before he groaned and slumped back in his chair, rubbing his belly. "Oh man...I feel like I'm gonna bust."

Feeling similar discomfort in their stomachs, Naruto and Kiba did the same, doing what they could to ease their discomfort. Akamaru, unable to rub his stomach like they did theirs, simply rolled onto his back and let his tongue loll out the side of his mouth.

After consuming eight immense slices of pizza each, their stomachs were all noticeably distended, pushing out even more than they had been earlier in their meal. Hunter and Kiba's shirts had risen up enough to expose a sizable amount of furred and bared flesh, respectively, and were even exposing their navels. Naruto's blue t-shirt had ridden up quite as high, but it was nonetheless situated right above his belly-button. In addition, each of their respective flies were all but fully opened, and though none of them were sitting at the proper angle, their respective undergarments were fully exposed. Akamaru's tummy, on the other hand, had taken on the appearance of a white, furry beach ball that had even begun to force his back legs apart.

Kiba burped, gently rubbing his belly. "Oh man...I feel like I might pop..." his face split in a happy grin. "...but I haven't eaten anything that good in <i>ages</i>."

Akamaru burped, licking his maw. <i>You said it, little buddy.</i> He fixed Kiba with a pleading stare. <i>Can you rub my tummy now?</i>

Laughing, Kiba reached down, scratching Akamaru's engorged midsection and causing one of his hind legs to kick. Naruto and Hunter laughed at the sight, before going back to their own ministrations.

After a few minutes, the attendant who had welcomed them walked by to collect their plates and empty tray. As he picked them up, he threw approving glances at the two stuffed kids, stuffed anthro-pup, and the equally stuffed dog that was lying on the floor beside their table, belly up. "Heh; looks like you all enjoyed the Maestro."

Hunter licked his muzzle, burping contentedly and looking up at the man. "Sure did; that was the best pizza I ever had!" He fished around in his pocket, pulling out his wallet and getting the cash to pay the man, which the latter accepted.

Naruto giggled, wiggling a finger around in his exposed navel. "Yeah! I'm normally a ramen kinda guy, but I'm definitely coming back here again!"

The man chuckled. "Glad to hear you enjoyed it!" He spared a glance at their stuffed bellies. "You, uh, need any help getting out?"

Kiba waved a dismissive hand. "Thanks, but I think we're good."

The man raised an eyebrow. "Well...all right." He smiled. "Well, you kids have a good day." Nodding, he turned and walked away.

The four watched him leave, continuing to rub their stomachs for a few seconds. Then, takinga deep breath, the three youngsters,slid out of their chairs, rubbing their bellies with one hand and holding up their pants with the other. Akamaru, in turn, flipped back onto his feet; he stumbled a bit, owing to his midsection, but he managed to regain a semblance of balance. The big dog wagged his tail, barking happily. <i>Well, that was a heck of a meal.</i> He looked at the three kids trying to keep their balance. <i>Where to now?</i> Before any of the three could reply, he cut in again. <i>Actually, before we do anything else, can we head back to the inn?</i> He winked at Hunter. <i>I think I'm gonna take you up on your offer.</i>

Kiba's confused expression quickly became one of glee. "Really?!"

Akamaru nodded. <i>It'll be nice to be a pup again, even if only for a little bit.</i>

Hunter, happy at Akamaru's decision, decided to add his own two bits. "Awesome! And while we're at it, we'll re-dose so we can stay like this for another day or so!"

Though he didn't understand Kiba and Hunter's initial reactions to Akamaru's decision, for obvious reasons, Naruto raised an eyebrow. "Wait; if we take another drink of that stuff, won't we go back too far?"

Hunter smiled reassuringly. "Don't worry, Naruto. I've done it before; the potion can't regress you any further than it initially does; just makes it last longer." He began stumbling off, holding his shorts up. "Now c'mon, we're burning daylight here!" Kiba and Akamaru were only too happy to follow. Naruto was still slightly confused, but he followed behind them anyway.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Somehow, all four finish their pizza at the sam...

choices: "How about we go play at the park and work these tummies off?"
"Anyone else feeling kinda hungry...?
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
After what seemed like forever; due to the sheer size of their midsections, the three engorged youths and bloated big dog made their way back to the inn, where; upon arrival, Hunter eagerly grabbed four more vials of his regression potion. Sighing contently, Naruto plopped down on the bed, causing his belly to stick upward as he rested both hands atop it. "Hey, don't tell me you're tired already!" said Kiba, still massaging his own distended tummy as he spoke. Burping wetly, Naruto shook his head then said, "I'm just reeaaally full right now..."

Grinning, Hunter pulled out the vials and said, "Sounds like you're in need of another dose of the potion. So, here you go, guys. Drink up!" He then proceeded to hand Naruto a vial, two for Kiba and Akamaru, and kept one for himself. Leaning down, one hand still rested on his bloated tummy, Kiba ruffled Akamaru's head and said, "You might feel a lil funny after you drink the stuff, but don't worry, you'll feel right as rain like immediately after." Akamaru barked eagerly as he opened his maw nice and wide for Kiba to pour the vial down his fuzzy buddy's mouth. Seeing this, Naruto grinned and said, "No wonder you two were so excited back at that pizza place!"

Akamaru lapped his tongue a few times. Huh, you weren't kidding, my whole body feels kinda....tingly.... Just then, Akamaru winced as he felt his body begin to shrink immensely. In a matter of moments, the giant dog opened his eyes, and noticed everything; the boys especially, were substantially larger than they were before. In addition to which, he felt a large burst of energy he hadn't felt since...I...I'm a pup again!

Hunter's eyes widened as he smiled and said, "Wow, who'd have guessed a dog so big could ever be so small?" Smiling down at his little buddy, Kiba scooped up the tiny pup with both hands and smiled a wide mouth smile at Akamaru. "How do ya feel, buddy?" Akamaru barked a happy, pup bark as his tail wagged immensely. Both Hunter and Naruto smiled at the sight. "Awwww, I forgot how adorable he was as a puppy," said Naruto.

Akamaru happily licked Kiba's face, earning a laugh from the ticklish young dog-nin before he immediately propped the pup on top of his head. Kiba laughed then reached up and scratched the pup behind the ears as he said, "Just like the old days, eh, buddy?" Akamaru barked happily. I almost forgot how much I enjoyed just lazing around up here! Boy...this takes me back...

"Well, we should probably take our dose too, right?" suggested Naruto. In unison, all three bloated youths then proceeded to down their own vials shortly after. "Huh, I don't feel as funny as I did last time," noted Kiba. Hunter grinned then said, "Well, of course you don't. We've already regressed, afterall!" Naruto smirked then said, "I actually feel a lil more energetic again! How about you guys?" Kiba examined himself for a moment, then nodded, "Y'know, now that you mention it....yeah, me too!" Hunter smiled and said, "Drinking more not only extends your regression period, but it also gives you a lil boost of energy too. Like waking up after a good nap. Good thing too, cause the day is still young!" Naruto laughed as he nudged the anthro-pup in the shoulder playfully and said, "Amen to that! Sooooo then, whadduya guys wanna do?"

The four youths thought for a moment, until someone suggested...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: They reach the inn, then head back out after re...

choices: The four relax for a while before heading back out
They find things in Hunter's bag that interest them and distract them
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Naruto perked up. "Ya maybe wanna go play some more?" He rubbed his exposed tummy and burped. "It'll help us work these off."

Kiba rolled his eyes. "Yeah, only one problem with that, dummy; it took us forever to get here, and the park's a ways away. Not to mention," his hands went down to his waist and gripped his undone pants. "We'd hafta be holding our pants up the whole time, and I dunno about you, but that doesn't sound like much fun to me."

Akamaru yipped from the top of Kiba's head, He's got ya there, Naruto.

Naruto scowled, but nonetheless blushed when he realized Kiba was right. "W-well, then, what do you think we should do?" Kiba raised a finger as he opened his mouth...only for the finger to drop down and his mouth to shut. Naruto snickered, while Akamaru looked down at Kiba from his perch. Heh; he got you too, Kiba.

Hunter, having climbed up onto the edge of the bed, looked down at the others as he kicked his legs idly. "I have an idea; how about we hang around here for a bit until our stomachs go down enough for us to button our pants, then we can go play?" He flopped back on the bed, splaying his arms out to the side. "'Sides, while I'm not really feeling tired, I don't really feel like running around just yet, either."

Naruto and Kiba looked at Hunter, then back at each other. The blonde boy shrugged. "Eh, sounds good to me. What about you, Kiba?"

Kiba folded his arms and looked away. "Well, I'd rather be doin' something, to be honest...but I guess it's as good a plan as any." Akamaru barked his agreement, tail wagging.

Hunter grinned. "Great! And to pass the time..." he hopped down from the bed and made his way over to his duffel. "...I got all sortsa cool stuff in my bag we can look at to pass the time." He winced. "Just, uh...if one of 'em starts whispering arcane secrets into your ear, throw it as far away as you possibly can."

Naruto raised an eyebrow. "Uh...OK?"

Akamaru whined, looking down at Kiba from his perch. He's crazy, isn't he?

Kiba looked up at him, nodding. "Uh-huh."

Hunter blushed a bit, but quickly regained his cheerful demeanor. "Alright! Now that that's taken care of..." He began rummaging around in his duffel. "...let's find something to do while we wait!" Naruto and Kiba looked at each other and grinned, rushing up to either side of Hunter as they, too, reached their hands in and began rummaging around. Even Akamaru hopped off Kiba's head and began nosing around, trying to find something appealing inside.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: "How about we go play at the park and work ...

choices: A strange looking device with a black screen on it.  (A portable gaming console)
An ancient relic.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
The four youths continued to rummage through Hunter's bag, until Kiba stopped and gaped. "Whoa..." he muttered as he pulled out a small electronic device with a long wire attached to two ear pieces plugged into it. "...Where'd you say you were from again...?" asked Kiba as he examined the strange device in his hand. Hunter laughed and said, "Neat, huh? That's called an mp3 player." Kiba, Naruto and Akamaru's heads all tilted in confusion. Hunter rolled his eyes and laughed to himself. "You guys know what music is, right? Well, in my world, and some other worlds I've visited, most people walk around with these devices so they can listen to their favorite music wherever they go! It's great for when you go for longs walks, train, reading, or if you just wanna kick back and listen to your favorite tunes!" He stopped himself from continuing when he saw how lost the others still were. Rolling his eyes again, Hunter pressed the play button and held the ear buds close to the three so they could listen for themselves as music started playing. "Whoa!" exclaimed Naruto as he listened closer. Akamaru gaped as the sounds began emanating from the buds. People walk around with musicians trapped in these devices?! Forget crazy, he's a witch!

Hunter laughed and continued rummaging through his bag. Suddenly, Naruto remembered one device from earlier. "Hey, Hunter. What about that phone from earlier? You got any more pictures of other world people on it?" Hunter smiled and pulled it out. "You kidding? This bad boy's got 32 Gigs of space! I've got more pictures than I know what to do with!" Naruto scratched his head at the terminology. Nonetheless, he and Kiba gathered around while Akamaru was still trying to figure out where the voices from the device were coming from. Flipping through the many photos, Hunter eventually caught up to the pictures he'd left off on. "Now, THIS is someone I think you guys would'a definitely gotten along with at some point," Hunter noted as he flipped to a picture of a young man with an open vest, sandals, a scarf and spiky pink hair. Next to him, a flying cat. Both had big smiles on their faces. "This here is Natsu Dragneel, and that lil fella there is Happy!"

"He sure looks happy!" noted Naruto. Hunter laughed. "No, no, that's his name. He's Natsu's best bud. Believe it or not, but this guy's a dragon slayer who can actually swallow and breathe fire on a whim! He's what's known down there as a fire mage. Beyond that? He's a really nice and funny guy, one of the biggest eaters I've ever seen...though, he's not all that bright." Grinning, Kiba turned to Naruto and said, "Heh, I bet you two would get along real well." Hunter snickered a bit while Naruto glared at Kiba in annoyance. Suddenly, the image changed to a really short blond teen in black, wearing a red coat. Next to him, what looked like a giant suit of armor, both waving at the camera. "This here is Edward Elric and his younger brother Alphonse. He's known in his world as the 'FullMetal Alchemist.' Pretty fitting title, I'd say."

Both Naruto and Kiba examined the suit of armor and nodded. "No kidding. The guy looks like he's MADE of metal!" noted Naruto. Kiba nodded and added, "Yeah, and how much older is he than the Alphonse kid? Cause he looks like he's twice his size!" Hunter laughed and said, "No no, Al is the suit of armor. Ed's the little guy." Immediately, both gaped. "...What? But...he's so tiny!" noted Kiba. Hunter rubbed the back of his head sheepishly and smirked, "He sure is...juuuuuust make sure he doesn't catch you hearing that. He's a little...animated, when it comes to his height. But beyond that, he's a real nice, and incredibly smart guy. He's one of those 'put others before yourself' types, who always goes around helping people and stopping bad guys with his brother." Naruto smirked. "Heh, sounds like a pretty cool guy." He then grinned impishly and added, "but seriously, look at how small he is. I bet he wouldn't even last one round in a ramen eating contest." Hunter raised an eyebrow and added, "Don't be so sure, Naruto. This guy might be short, but he eats like a shark who hasn't eaten in weeks."

As Hunter continued, Akamaru trotted over and dug through the bag. Curiosity peaked the young puppy when he stumbled upon...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: They find crazy and neat things in Hunter's bag.

choices: ...never disturb me again
...ensure I return to my world in the future
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Akamaru tilted his head as he saw something unusual poking out of Hunter's duffel. Eh? What's this? Curious, he took part of it in his mouth, tugging it out into the open. Releasing it, he looked down at it curiously. What the heck... He lifted his head and yipped, Oi, Kiba!

Turning his head, the young dog nin focused on his buddy. "Yeah? What is it, boy?"

Akamaru indicated the object. Come take a look at this.

Curious, Kiba got up and made his way over to Akamaru. Hunter, curious to see exactly what they'd found, followed close behind. Naruto, not understanding a thing Akamaru had said, nonetheless followed, wondering what all the fuss was about.

Reaching Akamaru, Kiba knelt down, examining the object Akamaru had found. "Looks kinda weird; what is it?"

Hunter smiled as he reached the two and knelt down as well. "I believe I can help with..." he trailed off as his eyes fell upon the object, his smile rapidly fading and the color draining from beneath his fur. "Ohhhh, crap..."

Confused, Naruto knelt down and leaned in close to the object. "Huh? What's the big deal?"

The object in question was rather odd in appearance; it consisted of a small, flat stand with two spires sticking up on either side of it. Naruto, confused, tilted his head. "Seriously, what's the big deal?"

Hunter didn't answer; he was too busy hyperventilating. "Oh crap oh crap oh crap, how did this end up in my bag oh my GOD we're all screwed..."

Kiba looked at the young anthro-pup, blinking. "What? What is it?"

Akamaru, staring at the object, suddenly began to get a very uneasy feeling. Um, guys... However, none of the three heard him.

Hunter gulped, whimpering. "I kinda have a bad habit of collecting dangerous objects; artifacts capable of leveling entire buildings, devices capable of rending the fabric of space-time, prisons holding beings of great evil and power..." He slowly turned his head towards the now rather ominous artifact. "This falls into that last category."

Kiba gulped, sweating a bit. "And, uh, what does this hold...?" He winced, immediately regretting the question.

Akamaru yelped as the artifact began to hum with power, the spires starting to turn red. Guys, seriously...

Hunter stayed silent for a few seconds before answering. "In his world, the guy went by the title of the Dark Lord. He was defeated in battle and his physical body destroyed, but he lived on..."

"Like a ghost?!" Naruto blurted, his face going white.

Hunter shrugged. "Sort of, but minus the actually-being-dead part. Anyway, he lived on for centuries, manipulating events and people to his advantage, and he managed to amass a huge army. Thankfully, they lost, and the artifact binding his presence to the mortal plane was destroyed, reducing him to a mere spirit..." He gulped again, tugging at the collar of his tank-top. "...but he'd thought ahead, and had his minions construct a reliquary of sorts to hold his essence. I happened to blunder into that world around that time, and figured, hey, the further away he was from that world, the better..."

"...and so you picked it up, even though it contained an evil spirit," Kiba finished, fixing Hunter with a glare.

Akamaru whined, backing away in fright from the artifact as a small ball of blazing orange light began forming between the spires. Guys...

Hunter, in spite of his fright, scowled. "Hey, it seemed like a good idea at the time..."

GUYS!

At the piercing bark, all three turned their attention towards the young pup. Kiba, briefly wearing a shocked expression, looked towards Akamaru. "What is it boy? Is something..." his eyes widened as he noticed the steadily-growing ball of light...no, fire...that was arising between the two spires. "Oh, crap!" Without thinking, he lunged forward and scooped up Akamaru, pulling back and holding the little pup protectively to his chest. Hunter and Naruto, however, were too transfixed by the sight of the ball of fire which was beginning to rise into the air above the artifact.

"Hunter," Naruto asked faintly, his brain still trying to process what was happening. "What's happening?"

Hunter, equally quiet, but knowing full well what was coming, replied. "I think he's coming outta the..."

Without warning, the ball of fire exploded outwards, thankfully not torching anything but causing the three youths to hold a hand up to their faces and shut their eyes.

Who dares disturb me?

At the horrible, booming voice, the four young creatures trembled, but managed to lower their hands and slowly blink open their eyes as they looked towards the ball of fire...and their eyes widened in terror.

The ball of fire had now becoming a gigantic, flaming eye, a slit, reptilian pupil smack dab down the center of it. The eye focused squarely on the four, and each of them shuddered as they felt the pure malice pouring out of it.

Hunter quivered, but managed to stammer out a response. "L-Lord Sauron, forgive me; I didn't..." The eye's pupil narrowed, the fire composing it blazing harder as it focused on Hunter. Yelping, the anthro-pup cowered, covering his ears and shaking. Neither Naruto nor Kiba were quite at that point yet, but their lips were quivering, Kiba clutching Akamaru's shaking body even closer to him.

Flattery will not avail you, maggot,, the entity-Sauron's-booming voice echoed. Did you honestly believe you could take Sauron, the Lord of Mordor, and take him captive as though he were some sort of mere trinket? The Dark Lord's voice became even angrier as the left few words left him.

Shaking uncontrollably now, Hunter still managed to say, "O-o-of c-course not, L-Lord Sauron. I just admired your..." The pup whined as the eye blazed even greater, the fury practically blazing out of it. "S-surely we can negotiate..."

Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru looked at him with widened eyes. Akamaru was the first to speak. Hunter, are you cra... He thought for a moment. Well, OK, I KNOW you're crazy, considering you brought something like THAT with you...but you seriously wanna negotiate with that thing?!

Sauron, fortunately, only heard this as a series of whines and barks. It appeared to mull over Hunter's request for a moment, while the rest all waited on pins and needles, chewing their lips and whimpering (human AND canine). Finally, the eye refocused on Hunter and declared, I find this acceptable. You three! The eye suddenly focused on the young shinobi and the young pup, who all shrank back in its glare. Leave this room, and do not re-enter until the Dark Lord bids you. It refocused on the cowering anthro-pup. The warg-child and I have matters we must discuss.

Naruto and Kiba looked at each-other, briefly pondering Sauron's odd wording, but their expressions quickly became ones of concern when they looked at the still-terrified Hunter. In spite of this, Hunter managed a weak smile and a thumbs up.

Slowly, Naruto and Kiba got to their feet, Akamaru in tow, and hastened to the door, opening it and walking outside, shutting the door and standing outside it.

They spent a few seconds standing in silence before Naruto turned to Kiba and asked, "Do you...do you think Hunter's going to be OK?"

Kiba tried to smirk, but it didn't look very convincing. "I hope so, bonehead..." he sighed as he placed Akamaru back on top of his head. "I hope so..."

The two spent several tense minutes waiting, occasionally glancing at each other and worrying about Hunter. Finally, after what seemed like forever, Sauron's voice boomed, You may enter. Looking at each other and gulping, they slowly pushed the door open and stepped inside, dreading what they'd find.

To their relief, Hunter, while still looking terrified, was otherwise completely unharmed, though the eye of Sauron still blazed.

We have come to an accord, Sauron growled, setting everyone's hair (or fur) on edge. I shall once again retreat within the reliquary and spare you, but in return...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: An ancient relic.

choices: They reach the park in time to play while the sun's still up.
By the time they reach the park, it's already dark.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Ensure I return to my world in the future...and henceforth, shall no wandering peasant disturb me again. Should this agreement not be made...I shall bestow upon you; o tiny maggot, a reckoning the likes of which you have yet to experience in even your most horrifying nightmares. Is this understood?

Dumbstruck. Frozen with fear, Hunter nodded ever so slightly, pale with fear beneath his brown fur. Then it is decided. Carry on with your inconsequential existence, dullards. With that, the flaming eyeball dissipated and retreated back into the reliquary. Leaving the four youths, mortified; none more so than Hunter, who was still shaking as the relic was once again nothing more than an inanimate object. Akamaru whined, still fearful at the sight. Kiba nuzzled the pup close and said, "It's okay, buddy. He's gone for now...I think...maybe..." I'm just glad I didn't wet myself...again... Kiba couldn't help but chuckle a bit before adding, "Not as glad as I am..."

Naruto cautiously approached Hunter and asked, "A-are you okay?" Hunter nodded, still too petrified to speak coherently. Finally, after the shock of such a terrifying presence had faded slightly, he said, "...I'm gonna have to think on this one at some point..." Kiba turned to Hunter and said, "You're not seriously gonna send that thing back to its' world, are you? What if it gets out and does who knows what? I mean, shouldn't we be taking that relic and dumping it in the bottom of the ocea or something?" Then Hunter snapped back and said, "Look, when pure evil tells you to do something, you don't ask questions. You just nod your head and hope it doesn't turn you into a pile of ash, alright?" He then started smacking his forehead with his palm a few times, cursing himself angrily. "Stupid! Stupid! STUPID!! Why'd I think taking that damn thing was a good idea?!
