Why don't I ever THINK before I do these kindsa things?! What the hell's wrong with me?!" he barked to himself. Akamaru leaned from his perch towards Kiba's ear. Might wanna take it easy, buddy. We're still regressed, remember? And I don't think we wanna see a crazy wolf-person getting emotional cause of this potion...

Taken back a bit, Naruto nonetheless walked up to the wolf-pup and patted him on the shoulder. "Hey, c'mon, ya just did what ya thought was a good idea. It's not like WE'VE never done anything stupid like that, right Kiba?" Unable to suppress a smirk, Kiba said, "Trust me, when it comes to boneheaded decision making, no one'll ever top king bonehead there." Scowling, Naruto regained composure and said, "I'm just saying, we all make mistakes. And you know what? If something that evil is MAD that you took it from its' home world? Then I'd say you probably made the right move." Kiba nodded then stepped in and said, "Exactly, don't beat yourself up. Sure, what ya did was risky and dumb beyond all comprehension-" Before he could continue down a tangent, both Naruto and Akamaru (from his perch) glared down at Kiba, causing him to stop and regather his words a little better as he chuckled sheepishly and cleared his throat. "-errm, but yeah, risky or not, keeping that fireball from his home world; I'm willin' to bet, is probably good for a LOT of people."

Hunter stopped for a moment, then turned to Naruto, a bit hesitantly, "Y-ya think so?" Naruto smiled and playfully nudged the anthro-pup in the arm and said, "You betcha!" Processing everything the others had said, Hunter finally turned tothe rest and said, "Y-y'know, maybe you guys are right. Sure, he may melt us all to a pile of ash in a split second, but the people from his world are safe from his wrath. And like you said, risky or not, it's better for the people of his world that he ISN'T there!" Naruto, Kiba and Akamaru all went white upon hearing that ash in a split second bit. Nonetheless, Hunter gradually regained a slightly cheerful demeanor and smiled at them. "Thanks, guys!" Looking back down at the relic, he gulped and slowly and carefully picked it up as gently as he could. He then reached with a free hand into his bag and pulled out a silver case which he slowly placed the relic into, before sealing it shut. "There. This won't hold him, but at least he won't feel if anyone messes with his reliquary..." Hunter explained. Naruto sighed with relief and plopped onto his rump, leaning back as he said, "Sheesh, what a day..."

Getting back up, Hunter suddenly noticed something. As looked down, he saw that his furry tummy had shrunken a considerable amount, to where his shorts once again fit enough. "Whoa...guess my life flashing before my eyes took longer than I thought..." Both Naruto and Kiba examined their own stomachs and saw that they too, had deflated a good amount, to where they could once again button and zip them without having to hold them up. Regaining his composure, Naruto grinned and said, "Whadduya guys say forget all this almost dying and go play before the sun goes down?" Kiba smirked back and said, "Yeah, I think that's enough rummaging through demonic artifacts for one day..." he then pet the pup on top of his head. "Wanna go play, boy?" Akamaru barked a cute puppy bark of excitement as a response. Kiba laughed. "That's the spirit!"

Hunter grinned and said, "Sounds like fun to me! I can worry about what do with Sauron's reliquary later..." After carefully tucking the container back into his bag and stuffing the bag into a closet, Hunter then put the do not disturb sign on the door. The four youths more than eagerly took their leave. Better pick up the pace before it gets dark, guys!
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: {b}Ensure I return to my world in the future.{/b}

choices: Partway through playing, someone gets hungry
They play until it's dark, then decide to check out a buffet for dinner
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Luckily, a combination of their eagerness to get out of the inn and determination to get some playing in before it got too dark out allowed them to reach the park while the sun was still in the sky. However, time had passed, and it sat low in the sky, casting the soothing oranges and reds of a sunset.

Naruto pouted, folding his arms. "Ah, crap, the sun's already setting..."

Hunter, rather more cheerful, nudged him playfully. "Hey, we still got time; it's still pretty light out."

Kiba smirked, Akamaru wagging his tail from his perch on top of Kiba's head. "Yeah; quit being such a downer, Naruto."

Naruto flushed. "I-I wasn't being a downer!" he protested. "I-I was just saying, we don't have all day, and we still have these to work off..." He rubbed his blue-shirted tummy absentmindedly; it had shrunken a good deal, but it still exposed a sliver of flesh just above his waistline. In addition, he still wore his busted hoodie, but it now looked more like an open vest than anything.

Hunter smiled, patting Naruto on the back. "Hey, don't worry about that; like I said, it's still light out, and if we play like we did earlier today..." he rubbed his own belly, a sliver of brown-furred flesh poking out from underneath his tank-top. "...we'll have these things worked off in no time."

Kiba grinned, rubbing his own belly (which was in the same state as Naruto and Hunter's.) "Sounds like a plan...but why don't we stop talking and start playing?" His grin turned impish. "No time like the present, after all."

Naruto, in spite of himself, laughed. "Yeah, I guess that's trMMMPH!" His sentence was promptly cut off as Akamaru leapt off Kiba's head and onto the blonde boy's face. Taken completely off guard, Naruto toppled backwards. Before he'd even hit the grass, Akamaru leapt off Naruto's face, giving him just enough time to see Kiba rushing at him. "H-hey, Kiba, that's not OOOF!" He was once again cut off as Kiba tackled him to the ground. Scowling, Naruto managed to push Kiba aside and clamber to his feet, only for the young dog-nin to grab his ankles and cause him to fall. "OW! Damn it, Kiba!"

Hunter watched this for a few seconds, amused, before deciding that two-on-one wasn't quite fair. To that end, he dropped to all fours, dashed around, and, tongue lolling out the side of his mouth, pounced on top of Kiba. In his surprise, the young dog-nin let go of Naruto. Taking notice of this, Naruto scrambled to his feet once again, throwing an appreciative look at Hunter. "Thanks!"

Hunter grinned and gave a thumbs up...right before a sharp pain appeared in his leg. "Ow!" Wincing, he saw that Akamaru had clamped his teeth firmly onto his furry leg. "Ah! Puppy teeth, puppy teeth!"

Kiba smirked, even as he got to his feet. "Nice one, Akamaru!" He rushed towards Hunter, and the anthro-pup had only time enough to turn and widen his eyes before Kiba tackled him to the ground.

"Ack! Naruto, ya mind helpin' a pal out here?" Hunter winced as he struggled with Kiba and Akamaru, the latter of whom had now clamped onto his arm.

Naruto grinned. "Hey, I still owe ya." He rushed towards the three, just as Kiba managed to pin Hunter to the ground. Unfortunately, he miscalculated, and he ended up tackling both Kiba and Hunter, eliciting pained cries from the two youngsters as the four once again devolved into a rolling, cursing, laughing ball.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: They reach the park in time to play while the s...

choices: They waste no time grabbing as much food as their plates can carry.
They decide to eat a little competitively amongst each other...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
The four youths continued to roll down a grassy incline until landing at the bottom near the field side of the park. Immediately, Naruto rose from amidst the three dazed piles and held his arms up victoriously. "And that's how you d-oh..." cheered Naruto, before stumbling on his words midway, eyes widening as the small white puppy leaped towards his face again. All Naruto could do was watch as the tiny pup leaped in seemingly slow motion, before pouncing right on his face and causing the boy to stumble back with a sudden but expecting yelp. Hunter and Kiba laughed amongst themselves, before Hunter grinned impishly at Kiba. "Ohhh Kiiiiba..." he chanted. Kiba turned, "Eh?" And immediately, Hunter returned the favor and tackled him to the ground, causing the two youths to struggle around carelessly through the grass and dirt.

Time flew as minutes turned to hours, and sunset turned to evening, and the four youngsters were no less winded. By the time they had finally worn themselves out, the moon had long since been shining down on the empty park. The four youths laid on their backs, bruised up and dirty, panting for breath, but nonetheless, all with big, exhausted smiles upon their faces. "Phew...man! That was *pants*...that was awesome!" noted Hunter, barely able to catch his breath. Kiba laughed and playfully punched the anthro-pup in the arm. "Heh...heh...didn't know you could...*pants*...hold your own like that, man!" Naruto simply smiled, resting peacefully upon the cool grass as Akamaru trotted towards him and licked his face. Good to know I can still whoop your butt even as a pup!

Naruto just laughed and ruffled the puppy's head playfully. "Awww, good game to you too, Akamaru!" said Naruto, oblivious to Akamaru's remark, earning a chuckle from the dog-nin and wolf-pup. Suddenly, Hunter noticed the moon and started to laugh wearily, as he noted, "Wow, time really does fly when you're having fun!" Kiba nodded then smirked as he said, "See that, bonehead? All that whining about it being too late to play, and we STILL played into the dead of night!" Naruto pouted a bit and said, "I didn't say it was too late! I-I just said..." he stopped protesting for a moment, then flushed a bit before rubbing the back of his head and chuckling to himself, "Heh, guess you're right. It didn't even make a difference how late it was, cause even in the dark, I whooped all three'uh you!" Kiba raised an eyebrow. "Are you kiddin' me?! Akamaru mopped the floor with you!" He grinned and added, "And he's a tenth your size!" Naruto opened his mouth to respond, when suddenly a loud, hungry growl emanated from his stomach. Blushing, he rested a hand atop his tummy, and grinned. "Welp, guess you weren't kiddin', Hunter. Looks like our guts are worked off and THEN some!" he added, noting that his tummy has shrunken back down to its' originally flat state, completely concealed by his roughed up blue t-shirt and hoodie. Hunter laughed and patted his own once again thin stomach and nodded. "Yup! If there's one thing I know that gets the metabolism running in a hurry, it's a lil friendly roughhousing!" Like Naruto, Hunter's own concealed stomach began to growl, as did Kiba's; also in the same state as the others. Suddenly, an even louder hungry growl emanated, earning curious glances from the three, until they looked down at the young Akamaru, who was blushing like a rose beneath his white fur, covering his tummy sheepishly. What can I say? Walloping Naruto left and right works up an appetite!

Kiba laughed and rose to his feet, picking up the puppy and scratching his tummy playfully. "Awww, don't worry, boy, we'll fix that soon enough." Akamaru barked happily as Kiba placed him back on his head. Naruto rose to his feet then helped Hunter to his feet as well. Just then, Naruto spotted the lights of a late-night buffet not too far in the distance and licked his lips. "A buffet, eh? Whadduya guys say we put give 'all you can eat' motto a run for its' money?" Hunter grinned and said, "Sounds like a plan to me!" Kiba and Akamaru both nodded in agreement.

Immediately, the four entered the practically empty buffet and were immediately seated at a table not too far away from the food...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: They play until it's dark, then check out a buffet

choices: Partway through, one of them comes up for air
They power on through their plates uninterrupted
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
No sooner were the three youths (and Akamaru) seated and had their drinks ordered than they immediately bolted out of their seats, ran to the buffet lines, grabbed the biggest plates they could find, and began loading them up.

Naruto giggled as he piled noodles, rolls, various pastries onto his plate. "Oh man, this stuff looks so yummy!"

Hunter's little tail wagged as he loaded his plate up with burgers, fries, wings, fried chicken, and onion rings. "Yeah, no kidding!" He took a deep whiff, his sensitive nose absorbing the smells and causing him to drool a bit. "Not to mention it all smells amazing, too..."

Kiba and Akamaru simply nodded in agreement, too entranced by the delectable scents to answer him as the young dog-nin loaded his plate up with ribs, steak, wings, and beef strips. In addition to the massive plate he had grabbed for himself, he was also loading up another plate with much the same things for Akamaru.

It was a good few minutes before, sensing their plates could carry no more, the three youths hefted their overloaded plates (each reaching about three feet into the air, except Akamaru's, which reached "only" two feet into the air) into comfortable positions and staggered back to their table. Upon reaching it, they grunted and plopped the four plates onto the table. It creaked ominously under the weight, causing a jolt of alarm in all four, but it nonetheless held. Breathing a sigh of relief, the three promptly hopped back into their chairs, settled in, and grinned widely at the massively-loaded plates before them.

Hunter licked his chops, tail wagging eagerly. "Oh man, we're gonna be eating good tonight..."

Kiba took a deep whiff of his food, his mouth watering. "You're tellin' me; with all the food we have here, we're probably not gonna hafta eat for another week..."

Naruto giggled, licking his lips. "Who says we have to stop with these? If we feel up to it, we can go right back and load 'em back up!" From atop Kiba's head, Akamaru whined, but said nothing else.

Hunter beamed. "Great idea, Naruto!" He grinned mischievously. "In fact, how about we go crazy, and we don't stop till we can't feel our feet, we're about to bust, and we can't see straight?"

Kiba and Naruto grinned in return, looking at each other. "I'm game if you are, bonehead," Kiba jabbed playfully. Naruto smirked. "You bet it, dog-breath!"

Hunter laughed. "It's decided, then! Let the feast commence!" Wasting no further time, he dug in, shoveling treat after delicious treat into his maw. Naruto and Kiba, not wanting to be outdone, did the same with theirs. Akamaru remained on top of Kiba's head for a few seconds, staring at his plate. ...I'm gonna look like a white, furry bowling ball by the time this is over, aren't I? Kiba, his mouth full of food, didn't reply, but he grinned and nodded.

Akamaru sighed. Well, then, like Hunter said... let the feast commence. With that, Akamaru hopped off Kiba's head onto the table and began digging into his own plate (careful not to swallow the bones, of course).
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: They waste no time grabbing as much food as the...

choices: Resting only momentarily, they immediately move onto their next course.
They catch their breath first, a bit winded from such an ample rush of food.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
The sight of these three starving youths gorging was truly a sight to behold. Not one slowed down remotely as they stuffed more and more of their various entrees into their gaping maws. Hunter almost rapidly continued stuffing onion rings and fries down his throat, making big gaping mouthfuls before chewing and gulping them down heartily. Naruto was munching down on as many rolls as he could fit into his big mouth, chomping and gulping left and right as his pile of rolls began to deplete rapidly. Kiba grabbing as many beef strips as he could get a hold of and stuffing them right in his mouth, chewing relentlessly before taking big, hearty mouthfuls. And Akamaru was taking huge gaping bites from his steak slices, taking only seconds between chewing before going for another bite and another and another.

Eventually, the four had finished that section of their plates, and moved onto more prominent portions. Hunter grabbed a burger and took a huge gaping bite, smiling with delight as the juicy burger filled his mouth with a burst of sudden flavor. "Mmmm! Wow! Those itty bitty onions just burst in your mouth!" he exclaimed before taking another huge bite. Naruto simply took his chopsticks and wasted no time shoveling his noodles into his mouth as if he were enjoying his fabled Ichiraku's, stuffing comically huge mouthfuls in his mouth before stopping to chew on the ample amount of noodles and gulping it down heartily. Sighing with relief, he rubbed his belly happily and licked his lips. "It may not be Ichiraku's, but it's still pretty damn good!" After chomping down a few pastries from his plate, he grabbed his sticks and immediately went back for more noodles. After gulping down an ample mouthful of rib meat, Kiba rolled his eyes and said, "Always gotta open up with 'It may not be as good as Ichiraku's', don'tcha, bonehead?" Hunter chuckled, before gulping down the remainder of one of his burgers and smacking his lips then moving onto another. Naruto chuckled and shrugged mid-gulp. "I don't wanna be a liar, now do I?" He stuck his tongue out then gulped down yet another gaping mouthful of noodles.

More time passed as more and more of the ample towers of food atop the dishes were beginning to shrink considerably. As more and more food began to deplete, the boys' midsections began to distend once more. While still complete concealed beneath their shirts, their tummies were beginning create a more than noticeable bulge which pushed their shirts outward as more and more food began to be deposited into their gullets. Akamaru's own tummy was starting to protrude downward and make the pup look like something of a low rider, and his now tiny legs weren't going to provide him much footing at this rate. Nevertheless, the four youths continued pressing onward, stopping only seconds to catch their breath and relish the ample flavor, before demolishing yet another segment of their plates, leaving it bone dry. More and more they ate, and more and more their tummies continued to expand and grow, until finally, their plates had been reduced to little more than crumb remnants and bones.

Leaning back in their chairs, the boys and anthro-pup sighed heartily as they rested their hands atop their distended bellies. Akamaru panted with relief before rolling onto his side and letting his bloated furry tummy rest on the table...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: They power on through their plates uninterrupted.

choices: They experience a sugar rush partway through, and go even faster
The four continue, but start to slow down
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
"Ahhhh..." Naruto burped, licking his lips. "That was good."

Kiba rested one of his arms on the back of his chair, rubbing his belly with the other. "Yeah; for a late-night buffet, the stuff here's really tasty."

Hunter licked his chops, tail wagging as he massaged his belly. "You're tellin' me; I couldn't stop!"

Akamaru, lying on his side, whined. <i>Neither...urp!...neither could I...Ooh, my tummy...</i>

Thanks to the three feet of food the boys had consumed, their stomachs had swollen rather considerably, sticking out a good bit in front of them. In fact, their shirts had already begun to be forced up, to the points where their navels, along with a rather visible sliver of flesh, where exposed. Akamaru, as a result of nearly two feet of food being packed into such a tiny body, now had a veritable white sphere sticking out from underneath him, stopping just above his tiny paws.

Naruto looked down at his stomach, surprised. "Wow, our tummies are already starting to show?" He poked the exposed sliver of flesh and wiggled his finger in his belly button a bit.

Kiba scoffed, even as he examined his own belly. "Well, we did eat three feet of food; I guess we should expect that."

Hunter wagged his tail happily, scratching the exposed portion of his belly and causing his foot to start kicking a bit. "Well, boys, I think it's safe to say we're off to a great start." Naruto and Kiba made exclamations of agreement and grinned. Even Akamaru wagged his tail, even as another burp escaped his muzzle. "Of course...I could probably eat some more."

Naruto smirked. "Yeah, me too. Besides, I can still see straight..."

"...and I can still feel my feet," Kiba finished, grinning.

Hunter beamed. "Then what're we waiting for?" He hoisted himself out of his chair, stumbling a bit as his feet/paws hit the floor. "Let's load up again!" Naruto and Kiba, all too eager to take Hunter up on his suggestion, did the same, stumbling but quickly regaining their balance.

Akamaru started to follow them, but stopped when he saw his belly. <i>Uh, Kiba, I don't think I'm gonna fit on your head.</i> Kiba and Hunter laughed good-naturedly at this.

"Fair enough, pal," Kiba grinned, scratching the white, fluffy sphere that stuck out from Akamaru's abdomen and causing the pup's hind leg to kick in delight. "Anything you want us to bring you?"

Akamaru thought for a second. <i>Hmm...how about some vanilla ice cream? It'll help cool my tummy down a bit.</i> His tail wagged. <i>Even if I end up looking like a white, fluffy beach ball by the time this is over, I fully intend to keep up with you guys.</i>

Kiba giggled, ruffling Akamaru's head. "Can do! We'll get you a great big bowl of it!"

Naruto grinned. "That gives me an idea." At this, Hunter and Kiba regarded him curiously. "How about this time, we just get dessert stuff?"

Kiba smirked. "Heh; for once, that's a pretty good idea."

Naruto rubbed the back of his head. "Heh heh, tha---hey!"

Hunter laughed. "Chill, Naruto; that is actually a great idea." Without waiting for a response, he moved as quickly as he could towards the buffet line. "Dunno about you guys, but the dessert line's calling my name!"

Never ones to be outdone, Naruto and Kiba followed quickly behind him. Upon reaching the line, they grabbed one huge plate each, along with two sizable bowls that, when placed upon the platter, only took up a bout half the surface area (Kiba, of course, took an extra bowl for Akamaru.) With that taken care of, they darted about, filling the unoccupied spaces of their plates with all manner of sweets: cake, pie, donuts, jello, pudding, danishes...all of this was piled high on their plates. Once they were stacked to a reasonable height (again, about three feet tall), they immediately went over to the ice cream dispensers, filling their bowls to the brim with chocolate, vanilla, strawberry, and everything in-between, then proceeded to top THAT with a truly ridiculous amount of toppings: cookie crumbs, chocolate syrup, peanut butter sauce, marshmallow topping, whipped cream, and cherries. Kiba simply got Akamaru a huge dish of ice cream with peanut butter sauce and whipped cream; he didn't want to add anything else, for fear of making him sick.

Plates loaded up as such, they lugged them back to the table, plopping them on top of it. Naruto and Hunter immediately took their seats, grabbed a spoon, and began going to town on their massive plates. Kiba, on the other hand, took Akamaru's ice cream bowl off his plate and pushed it towards the pup. "Here ya go, buddy; enjoy." Akamaru, wagging his tail and barking appreciatively, struggled to his paws; his belly hung low beneath him, and just barely avoided touching the table. Disregarding this, the pup stuck his head into the ice cream, lapping it up. Laughing, Kiba hopped back into his own seat and began shoveling his own treats into his waiting maw, grabbing a spoon in the other hand and shoveling ice cream into his mouth simultaneously.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Resting only momentarily, they immediately move...

choices: Their sugar rush lasts them just before reaching their ice cream.
The sugar rush wears off and they begin to slow down.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
The four youths continue to power through their vast dessert. Naruto was stuffing as many donuts into his mouth as he could fit. Kiba was chomping down various danishes at a rapid pace. Hunter munched on several cookies at once, and little Akamaru was lapping at his giant bowl of vanilla ice cream at a neverending pace. "Mmmm! This stuff is so yummy!" exclaimed Naruto happily as he rubbed his tummy happily and resumed stuffing more and more donuts into his jaws. Kiba, having gulped down a hefty mouthful of danish, licked his lips and nodded in agreement. "You said it, bone-head! This stuff's like what you'd get outta the pastry places down the block...and nowhere near as expensive!"

He then proceeded to grab another danish and, before stuffing it into his mouth, grinned, and dipped it in his pudding, before taking a huge bite. Seeing this, Hunter's face lit up as he grinned back and said, "Nice! Why didn't I think'uh that?" Wasting no time, Hunter took several cookies, dunked them all in his own bowl of pudding, and popped them right into his mouth. Not wanting to feel left out, Naruto did the same with his donuts, and chomped away. Akamaru was too enticed by the surplus of vanilla ice cream to even notice what the kids were doing. Boy, the guys aren't kidding! This ice cream is yummier than most ice cream I've eaten!

The kids continued to mix their pastries with their pudding and stuff away, absorbing the ultra sweet flavor rushing with each bite. As they continued for a good while however, they suddenly stopped, as the sugar finally began to circulate in their system. In unison, the four stopped and simply gaped for a moment. "Whoa..." muttered a dazed Naruto. "...So....much....sugar...." replied Kiba. Suddenly, everyone's eyes began to dilate. Immediately, the boys and pups grinned, and frantically began scarfing more and more of their desserts at an abnormally fast rate. Naruto crammed several donuts into his mouth so fast that they crumbled from the sides of his mouth as his cheeks bulged comically. He'd chew quickly then with a hearty gulp, send the large bulge of pastries down his throat, and straight into his ever expanding belly. Hunter and Kiba were on the same boat. Rapidly chomping and gulping away at more and more pastries at an almost unstoppable pace. Akamaru was now digging his head into the bowl and actually biting at his ice cream now, taking tiny but speedy puppy bites as more and more of his ice cream began to enter his tiny maw.

They would occasionally stop, burp, or catch their breath, then almost immediately dive right back into their desserts at a speedy consumption rate. The boys seemed to have plowed through each pastry variation within minutes. After tearing through one pastry side after another, the boys and anthro-pup grabbed their pudding bowls and shoveled what remained into their mouths, before licking the bowl clean. Naruto then proceeded to tear into a rather tall and jiggly plate of jello in a hurry. Kiba grabbed the several slices of cake he'd placed on his tray, and got to work, tearing them down, while Hunter wasted no speedy time scarfing down one of several slices of pie he'd added to his tray. "C'mon! C'mon! Hurry it up! We still got tons more of this stuff to eat!" Hunter said, noticeably overexcited and overstimulated from his sugar rush. But his words were not lost, as the others seemed to quicken their stuffing their faces, before Hunter grabbed his fork and joined them without haste...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: They experience a sugar rush and plow onward!

choices: Naruto or Kiba's button goes first
Hunter's button goes first
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Sugar coursing through each of the young ones' bodies, they devoured their treats with reckless abandon, sending bits of dessert flying through the air. In the meantime, their stomachs continued to swell and expand as more and more sweets were packed into them.

Time ticked by, and the sugar rush began to fade, the four slowing a bit. However, there was still enough left for them to press on, shoveling donuts, cake, and assorted pastries into their hungry maws (or, in Akamaru's case, scarfing down the massive bowl of vanilla ice cream.)

Finally, the three boys (well, two boys and one anthro-pup) leaned back in their chairs and groaned, rubbing their overstuffed tummies. As they did so, they looked at their plates; with the exception of the rather considerable bowls of ice cream they'd gotten, their plates had been picked utterly clean.

Hunter's eyes widened, even as he stifled a burp. "Whoa. We---URP!---actually ate all that?"

Naruto groaned, looking down at his stomach. "I-I dunno. You tell me." Kiba and Hunter followed his advice, and their eyes subsequently widened.

Their stomachs had swollen even more from the massive influx of sugary treats, pushing out even more in front of them. Their respective shirts had ridden up even further, and were now resting well above their navels; in fact, it wouldn't be too much longer before they were resting on top of the overstuffed spheres. In addition, their pants were beginning to feel uncomfortably tight, but none of them paid that much mind at the moment.

"W-wow," Kiba finally spoke up, licking his lips. "We sure ate a lot, didn't we?" He smirked. "Heh, nothing this gut can't handle!" He gave his stomach a firm pat, inadvertently releasing a belch that caused Naruto and Hunter to giggle. "Heh; 'scuse me."

<i>You're...you're excused...</i> Akamaru yipped sluggishly, lying flat on his back next to the now-depleted bowl of ice cream. <i>Ooh, my tummy...</i>

The appendage in question, as a result of the influx of ice cream, had expanded even more. It stuck out above him, the furry appendage, spreading out and making it so that, at least from an overhead perspective, his paws could hardly be seen, even though his back legs were pushed rather far apart from one another due to the sheer size of his belly.

Kiba raised an eyebrow, concerned. "Uh...you OK, buddy?"

Akamaru barked, weakly wagging his tail. <i>Y-yeah, I'm fine. I shoulda expected this, really. I said I'd end up looking like a white, fluffy bowling ball, and here I am.</i> The pup suddenly whined, leaning his head back down. Sympathetic, Kiba reached out and scratched the large protuberance, much to Akamaru's delight.

Hunter was about to speak up, but he winced as he felt the tightness in his waist. "Oh man, my shorts feel like they're gonna give any minute now..."

Naruto, though he felt the tightness as well, grinned. "Hey, that just gave me an idea!" He gestured to the massive bowls of ice cream the three had. "Let's start eating the ice cream, and see who busts their pants button first!" With that in mind, he grabbed his spoon and started scooping ice cream into his mouth. Hunter and Kiba, not wanting to be left behind, did the same...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Their sugar rush lasts them just before reachin...

choices: One of their buttons pops first...
Their buttons pop at the same time... (again)
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
And so, the three youths scarfed away at the massive bowls of ice cream bestowed upon each one. Naruto had already taken an early lead for scarfing down before anyone else, but the race was close. Both Hunter and Kiba were forcing themselves to shovel bite after bite down their throats, only able to briefly appreciate the flavor before gulping it down and shoveling even more. And with each passing spoonful of ice cream consumed, their tummies continued to swell outward, pressing further and further against their shorts as it constricted their growing bellies.

Grinning confidently, Naruto maintained his lead, while the others continued shoveling bite after bite into their mouths as quickly as they could. Suddenly, Naruto stopped mid-bite, as his eyes widened. Suddenly, he stopped and clutched his head with both hands, leaning back and shouting, "GAAAH! BRAIN FREEZE!! BRAIN FREEZE!!!" He whimpered pitifully as he clutched his head and thrashed around briefly, earning a chuckle from Kiba, who couldn't help but stop and add, "Heh, didn't think ya had anything in there to freeze, bonehead." Angry, Naruto glared back at Kiba, and took a deep breath, before jumping right back in and catching Kiba off guard. However, all the while this was transpiring, Hunter hadn't stopped. His speedy momentum; as a result, gave him the upper hand on the others, and was now leading the race to bust his pants button.

Hunter mentally chuckled to himself, as he continued to trailblaze ahead the boys. With each bite swallowed, he could feel his belly digging deeper into the waistband of his shorts, causing the young anthro-pup immense discomfort. Nevertheless, he soldiered on, determined to win and give the boys some extra drive in the process. He could feel the button beginning to strain as it struggled to maintain his growing midsection. Naruto and Kiba saw this as well, and opted to speed up as fast as they could before that button gave. Catching this, Hunter smirked and sped up as well, despite an immense discomfort and cramped feeling overwhelming his expanding stomach. C'mon...j-just...a little....more.... Hunter thought, shoveling as much ice cream as he could down his mouth as fast as he could, until finally...

*POP!*

Hunter's belly finally surged outward as the button to his shorts fired right off his pants and headed right for Kiba's unexpecting face, but luckily Naruto caught it before it could nail the dog-nin. "Whoa...t-that was close..." Kiba sighed with relief and looked at Naruto appreciatively. "Uhh...t-thanks, man." Naruto smiled and said, "Don't mention it, dog breath!" The two chuckled amongst themselves as Hunter sighed with relief as he then rested his paw against his furry tummy happily. "Ahhh, MUCH better!" he said with glee. He then glanced curiously at the boys and asked, "Errr....did I miss something?" Naruto held his button up. "Ya almost cracked dog breath in the dome with this thing," he said with a smirk, causing the wolf-pup to rub the back of his head sheepishly as he chuckled with embarrassment. "Right....ehhh, sorry about that, Kiba." Kiba laughed and said, "Don't sweat it. Just be sure to duck when my button goes..." he added with an impish grin, causing Hunter to gulp nervously, before turning his attention to his ice cream. "Still, you DID manage to beat us, and that ain't something a lotta people can do. Soooo...nice job, Hunter!" Hunter smiled appreciatively and said, "Thanks!" before he accidentally let out a huge belch, causing him to blush a bit as the boys laughed heartily.

"Good one!" cheered Naruto, Hunter chuckled a bit wearily and said, "Heh...s'cuse me. But if you guys don't mind, I think I need a breather...eating all that ice cream at once kinda left me winded..." Naruto smirked, then turned his attention back to his ice cream, and Kiba. "So? How about it, dog breath? While he's taking his break, ya wanna see which one of us can pop his button next?" Kiba grinned and said, "Oh, you're still goin' down, Uzumaki!" And with that, they resumed shoveling more ice cream into their ever growing tummies.

Both maintained an even keel for a good while, with neither side willing to go down, but in the end...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Hunter's button goes first

choices: Tackle each platter together like they had been doing in the Inn all along.
Rotate between platters to have some downtime between platters.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
The 3 youths continued to roughhouse and wrestle amongst each other for a few minutes more until their tired bodies could tackle and lunge no further. Utterly exhausted, the boys, pop and dog had once again collapsed in a fit of tired childlike laughter in the grass, panting heavily. The sheer extent of their playing had caused their tummies to once again recede and deflate to the point where they had seemingly returned to their normal sizes; albeit slightly pudgy from their newfound youth. "Whew...now that was a blast..." exclaimed Naruto as he giggled to himself and looked up at the sky. Kiba nodded and said, "Yeah, that match where I totally kicked your butt was a blast! Wouldn'tcha say, Wolfy?"

But he got no response. "Wolfy?"

Curious, both Naruto and Kiba turned to the pup to see him glancing over by a large crowd standing over what appeared to be some kind of outside reception area. "Huh. Wonder what's going on over there..." pondered Naruto. Whiffing, Hunter's tail immediately wags as he rises to his paw feet and jesters towards the others to do the same. "Whatever it is, it smells delicious," responded Hunter finally as he licked his maw and rubbed his stomach hungrily.

The four of them soon approached the crowd, only to see a large "Eating Contest" sign near a large table. Both Naruto and Kiba went wide eyed. "What are the odds..." muttered Naruto. Kiba smirked and nudged his friend in the shoulder a bit. "With us? Generally pretty good." Turning to the other boys, Hunter grinned toothily and said, "How about it, boys? Think you're up for it?" As if on cue, a loud rumbling emanated from all three of their stomachs, earning a few sheepish chuckles. "Hehe, guess playtime DID kinda make me pretty hungry..." said Naruto as he rubbed the back of his head with a sheepish grin across his face. Smirking, Kiba nodded and said, "Man, I could eat a horse or two after all that." The two then walked besides Hunter and approached the contest receptionist, and with an eager smile, said, "Hiya! Do you think me and my friends could enter-"
"D'awwwww! Why aren't you the cutest little thing I've ever seen!" said the receptionist as he ruffled the top of Hunter's little head like one would a puppy. Both Naruto and Kiba snickered amongst themselves while Hunter did his best not to scowl in annoyance. "Right....anyway, could the three of us enter this eating contest?"
"Well, I dunno, little fella. You sure you and your friends have the tummies for it?" asked the receptionist as he playfully poked Hunter once in the stomach, once again causing the others to laugh, much to his bemusement. "...I think we'll manage..." grumbled Hunter, clearly annoyed.
"So what're the rules anyhow?" asked Kiba.
"It's simple really," started the receptionist, "we bring out a massive platter of certain foods or drinks, and if you can eat everything on each platter, you win."
"What do we win exactly?" asked Naruto.
"Well, this contest is being sponsored by Ichiraku's. Sooooo if you boys can pull it off, you'll each get all the Ichiraku's you can eat free for one week."

As if time had just stopped, all three gaped in utter astonishment at what they had just heard, especially Naruto, whom; after a moment of wide eyed silence, finally managed to say, "F-f-free for a week...? Free Ichiraku's...?" To which the receptionist nodded and said, "If you're entering as a team, there's two ways you can compete. All three of you tackling each platter in a larger size at once, or you can rotate between platters. I'll let you kids decide that for yourselves while we get this thing going. Good luck!" He then headed back to the main table, leaving the three to decide how they wanted to approach this golden opportunity.

After some careful consideration, ultimately, they decided to...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: After another break, they see an eating contest.

choices: A large, fresh-baked pie
A pile of large burgers of varying kinds
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
"Oh man..." Naruto muttered, licking his lips. "Free Ichiraku's for a whole week...can you imagine?"

At this, Hunter turned towards Naruto. "Well, I wouldn't complain; the bowls we had at that buffet were pretty darn tasty."

Naruto grinned. "Yeah, they were; that's why we gotta win this contest."

Hunter nodded, tail wagging. "Well, whaddaya say we just rotate? That way, we'll all be able to pace ourselves a bit, and make the chances of our winning all that much greater."

Kiba pouted. "Hey, who put you in charge, Wolfy?"

Hunter's ears folded against his head, and he looked at Kiba with a flat glare. "Alright, that's it," he began, eyes narrowing. "First off, it's 'Hunter', not 'Wolfy'; get it right. Second, I wasn't trying to boss you guys around; I was just trying to think of the best way we could tackle this." The side of his muzzle quirked upwards. "Unless, of course, you had any ideas..."

Kiba glared back at Hunter, not saying anything for a few moments. Finally, he huffed, folded his arms, and looked away. "Alright, fine, we'll rotate."

"Great!" Hunter chirped. His stomach suddenly rumbled, and he looked towards the main table, where they were still setting things up. "Man, what's taking so long? I'm starving..."

Akamaru barked jovially, wagging his tail. It suddenly came to a stop, though, when a thought occurred to him. Wait a minute, he ruffed, even if you win this contest, that stuff you guys drank will only last until tomorrow, right? If you win as kids but go to cash in on your prize at your actual ages, will they even let ya do it?

Kiba's eyes widened, and he glanced at Akamaru. "Never thought of it like that, boy..."

Hunter grinned. "Not to worry, guys," he said confidently. "I've got quite a few more bottles of that wonderful little juice; worst comes to worst, we can just down another round and avoid any trouble."

Both Naruto and Kiba's eyes lit up at this. "Really?!" Naruto exclaimed. "That's awesome!"

Kiba smirked. "Well, I do have the rest of the week off; I guess I can go for that." He giggled suddenly as Akamaru nuzzled him. He didn't know why, but upon hearing that Kiba would be staying like this a little longer, the dog had felt an inexplicable surge of joy in his chest...

"OK, boys, everything's set up!"

At the sound of the attendant's voice, the three prospective contestants, with Akamaru in tow, grinned and dashed towards the table, Hunter running on all fours.

As they screeched to a stop in front of the man, he chuckled. "Eager, aren't you?" He indicated the table. "Well, have you boys decided what you want to do?"

"Yeah!" Naruto piped up. "We're gonna rotate!"

The man nodded. "Sounds good!" He pulled a chair away from the table and motioned towards it. "So, which one of you would like to go first?"

"Depends," Kiba answered. "What's the first course?"

The man smiled, gesturing to a large plate being brought out by some of the other attendants. "Why don't you see for yourself?"

Whatever it was, the aroma coming off of it was absolutely delectable, and it even made Hunter and Kiba's mouths water, owing to their enhanced sense of smell. As it was set down, the three could see that it was....
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Rotate!

choices: A massive platter of BBQ Ribs
Dozens of Ramen Cups.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Both Hunter and Kiba's eyes widened with absolute ecstasy. The first course waiting to be consumed was a pile of large, fresh off the grill burgers of all kinds. The young boy and pup were practically drooling at the sight. After a moment, Akamaru barked, getting their attention. So are you guys gonna just stand there drooling all day or are you gonna actually eat those burgers?

The thought immediately broke their trance, as both Kiba and Hunter shared a brief glance, both knowing the other wanted in. Kiba was about a step away from mauling all the burgers he could handle, but he stopped for a moment and turned back to Hunter, then back the burgers, and with a disgruntled roll of his eyes, his head dropped as he said, "Ah, go ahead, W-I mean Hunter." Hunter's face lit up as his tail started to wag. "Really? You sure?" asked the wolf pup. Kiba shrugged and said, "Ah, ya look like you really want to take this round, plus, I mean the whole reason we're out here having fun in the first place was because of you, right? So I figure you should probably get first dibs. Besides," Kiba muttered under his breath, not wanting to continue aloud as he rubbed the back of his head, "I guess I was being kind of a jerk to you, and you've been pretty cool so far. Sooooo, yeah."

Smiling Hunter nodded and said, "Thanks, pal!" and sat right on down while Kiba huffed and stood a bit disgruntled besides Naruto who smirked and nudged the dog-nin in the shoulder as he said, "Pffft, ya big softy."
"Zip it before I tenderize ya, bone-head!" responded Kiba in annoyance, much to Naruto's amusement. Akamaru licked the young Kiba's face and lightened him up a bit as he ruffled the dog's head and said, "Let's just hope he doesn't screw up."

"I don't think that's gonna be a problem..." responded Naruto with a laugh as he pointed towards Hunter's direction. Much to Kiba's surprise, the wolf-pup was already scarfing down those massive burgers voraciously. The juicy tender beef combined with the various sauces and condiments sent a whirlwind of flavor to Hunter's tongue as he hungrily consumed more and more burgers at a surprisingly rapid pace. Even the man who set up the competition was watching Hunter's speedy consumption in awe.

With every bit of burger devoured, Hunter's stomach began to push outward a bit, ever so slightly distending further and further with every burger consumed. "Man, look at him go...must be some tasty burgers..." uttered Naruto. Kiba, however, could still smell the delicious beef from where he stood, then folded his arms and pouted a bit. "Being nice sucks..."

Licking some beef residue from his maw, Hunter opened wide and stuffed a BBQ sauce laden burger straight into his jaws, taking a huge bite and practically biting a complete third of the burger in one go. The grilled and fried onion strips combined with the dripping sauce made for one of the tastier burgers as Hunter stopped for a moment and savored the pure flavor resonating as he chewed happily on the massive burger bite. Finally, the wolf took a huge gulp and sent the contents of his mouth down his throat and into his now slightly ballooned out belly, still concealed beneath his tanktop, but very noticeably rounded out from all the burgers. Hunter exhaled heartily then stopped for a moment and thumped his fist paw into his chest a few times, forcing out a loud belch, before sighing happily and getting back to work on the burgers. Taking bigger bites than before in order to finish a little faster.

Naruto, Kiba and Akamaru watched for a few more moments until finally, Hunter had finally finished the last sizable burger on his plate, leaning back in his chair and resting his paws on his bloated belly, still completely sealed beneath his shirt, but just barely. The man smiled as he held the pup's arm up and said, "Great job, little fella! Now, onto the next course!" Smiling, Hunter hoisted himself from the chair and joined the others, one paw still massaging his strained gut. "So, how were the burgers?" asked Kiba.

Burping loudly, Hunter giggled and said, "Tasty," as he patted his belly happily. Kiba simply grumbled under his breathe. "Thanks a lot for letting me have at that one, by the way!" Kiba's annoyed expression lightened as he smirked a bit and said, "Yeah, whatever."
"I just wonder what the next course is gonna be," said Naruto as he scratched his blond head curiously.

Finally, the man brought out the next dishes for the second course...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: A pile of large burgers of varying kinds

choices: Several very large bowls of ramen
Several large pitchers of soda
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Although he had just finished a huge plate of burgers, Hunter nonetheless grinned alongside Kiba as they saw what the next course was; specifically, a huge plate of ribs slathered with generous amounts of BBQ sauce.

Kiba licked his lips. "Oh man, those look awesome..."

Hunter, though he had begun panting a bit, remembered that Kiba had been nice enough to let him tackle the previous course, so he turned to Kiba and said, "You can take this one, Kiba."

"Thanks!" Kiba exclaimed, throwing a quick smile at Hunter before rushing to the chair and sitting his rump down in it. Rubbing his hands together and running his tongue over his lips once again, he picked up the first rib, opened wide, and took a huge bite out of it. His eyes lit up as the meat practically slid off the bone, and the tangy-sweet flavor of the sauce mixed with the moist tenderness of the meat hit his tongue. Swallowing, he held the bone away from his mouth, which was already ringed with sauce. "Oh wow, these are really good!" Kiba exclaimed, licking some of the sauce off before taking another huge bite out of it.

Naruto smirked, folding his arms behind his head. "Heh, let's hope he does as good as you did, Hunter..."

"Yeah..." Hunter replied absentmindedly, watching as Kiba finished off his first rib and immediately started on the second one. "Oh man, those look amazing..."

"Eh?" Naruto raised an eyebrow. "If ya really wanted them that much, why didn't ya just take it? I mean, I know we're rotating, but still..."

Hunter shrugged, managing to tear his gaze away for a moment to look at Naruto. "Well, Kiba let me tackle the burgers even though he obviously wanted them, so I figured it was only fair I let him take this round."

Naruto tilted his head. "Yeah, I guess that makes sense."

Akamaru said nothing, only watching in amazement as Kiba quickly polished off his second rib, then got to work on his third. Then his fourth, fifth, sixth...

Before long, Kiba's stomach had started to round out a bit under his shirt, the article of clothing already splattered with drops of sauce. Not deterred by this in the slightest, Kiba continued ripping the meat off the bone, at this point finishing each one off in only one or two gigantic bites; owing to how tender the ribs were, he only had to chew each bite slightly before gulping it down, allowing him to keep a good pace.

As the minutes ticked by, the pile of ribs on the plate began to shrink, being swiftly replaced by an ever-growing pile of bones. Conversely, his tummy began bulging out further, pushing out and further pressing against his v-necked shirt, the bottom of the doggie face becoming somewhat distorted. Meanwhile, Hunter, Naruto, and Akamaru all watched, enraptured, as Kiba tore through the remaining ribs, his belly ballooning slightly with each rib devoured.

Soon, the last bone had been dropped on the plate, and Kiba burped and leaned back in his seat, letting one arm hang to the side while the other massaged his tummy. At this point, it was roughly the same size as Hunter's; rounded and bulging out noticeably, but (barely) managing to stay completely under his shirt. However, the bottom of his doggie face was starting to get a little bit scrunched up. Walking over to the little dog-nin, the attendant took hold of the arm that was dangling and held it up in the air. "Wow, great job, kiddo!"

"Thanks!" Kiba exclaimed, grinning and licking his lips in an attempt to get some of the sauce up. The attendant released his arm, and Kiba hopped up off his chair and strode back towards his friends.

Akamaru barked, licking his face (and privately savoring the sauce that had been left on it). Great job, Kiba!

Kiba giggled, ruffling Akamaru's head. "Thanks, boy!" He burped again. "I still got lots of room left, though!"

Hunter massaged his own tummy. "Heh, so do I!" He turned to Naruto, smirking playfully. "What about you, Naruto? You think you can keep up?"

Naruto smirked back. "Heh, bring it on!"

Soon, the next course had been set out on the table, and it was...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: A massive platter of BBQ Ribs

choices: Naruto manages to successfully chug them all down.
Midway, Naruto begins to slow down, struggling a bit more with the second half.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Naruto raised an eyebrow as he saw the next course being placed on the table. "What the hell? That's not food, that's soda! I thought this was an EATING contest, not a drinking contest!" Kiba simply shrugged, still massaging his swollen stomach, while Hunter did the same. "Awww, come on, that's not fair! You guys get to eat foods you wanted, and I get stuck with a buncha soda?!"
"You like soda though," responded Kiba.
"Yeah, but how come it couldn't be something like Ramen? Like, a LOT of Ramen?!" pouted Naruto, to which Hunter smirked and said, "Well, look at the bigger picture here. Do well here, and you can have all the Ramen you can slurp down for a week straight."

Hearing this caused Naruto to reel back a little bit from his disappointment. "Besides, you did great in our soda chugging contest yesterday. We need whoever's best at each course to tackle them if we're gonna win." said Hunter, raising another valid point.

"Ugh, alright. Fine. For Ichiraku's!" Naruto exclaimed proudly, before turning to the other two, and with a sly grin, following up with, "and because considering how full you two look, that much soda'd probably make you explode," and with that, Naruto finally charged towards the table and plopped himself onto the seat.

Wasting absolutely no time, he grabbed the first pitcher and immediately began chugging it down vigorously. Kiba and Hunter watched in awe as the carbonated liquid began to quickly deplete from the pitcher and down Naruto's throat with amazingly speedy and hearty gulps. To both their surprise, the pitcher had already reached the half way point, and somehow, Naruto was still chugging it down without any stops. Seems his temporary state of youth not only increased his appetite, but the extra boast of energy allowed him to chug for an even more extended period of time than he'd usually go before needing to take a breath.

Hunter simply watched, little tail wagging as Naruto kept going and going and going. With so much of the carbonated beverage being consumed at once, Naruto's tummy began to expand outward slightly with each hearty gulp. Even Kiba couldn't help but be a bit impressed with his speed.
"Oh, man, look at him go..." muttered Kiba in awe.
Oh boy...he better pace himself, otherwise, he might make himself sick... thought Akamaru cautiously.

Finally, after somehow depleting his first pitcher of cola in one go, Naruto slammed the pitcher onto the table proudly, before wincing and clutching his stomach. See? I told you he'd make himself sick if he didn't-

*BUUUUUUUUUUUUUOOOOOOOOOOOORRRRRRRRRP!!!*

Akamaru's concerns were promptly and disgustingly disrupted as Naruto released a booming and lengthy belch which lasted a few short but rather audible seconds, earning some hearty laughter from both Kiba and Hunter respectively while Akamaru's ears simply dropped in embarrassment. "Whew, much better!" said Naruto as he sighed with relief and patted his belly proudly before getting to work on his next pitcher.
Nevermind... thought Akamaru as he resumed watching Naruto chug away along with the other two. Still with quite a few pitchers left to chug down, but thus far, his momentum hadn't faltered as the fizzy drink continued to pour into and expand his belly with each massive heap gulped down.

"That Ichiraku's is as good as ours," muttered Hunter as he rubbed his hand-paws together eagerly.
"Tell me about it," muttered Kiba as he rubbed his stomach hungrily, "I just hope the bonehead can keep this pace up."
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Several large pitchers of soda

choices: A mountain of cupcakes
A whole chicken
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
In a matter of minutes, Naruto had finished his second pitcher, plunked it down, and immediately picked up his third pitcher, lifting it up to his lips and beginning to gulp it down. Kiba, Hunter, and Akamaru all watched, awestruck, as the bubbly liquid flowed down Naruto's throat and into his belly, the appendage slowly ballooning outwards as more and more of the cola flowed into it.

Eventually, Naruto polished it off, plunked it down next to the other two, and let loose with another titanic belch. Giving his belly a few more hearty pats, he quickly seized the fourth pitcher and began chugging it down, just as he had the three before. He made it about halfway through the pitcher before he had to lower it, letting out yet another loud belch before jumping back.

"Oh wow, lookit him go..." Hunter muttered in awe. "He must really want that Ichiraku's..." he rubbed his own swollen tummy. "Not that I blame him..." Kiba, finding his gaze fixed on Naruto, only nodded.

Soon, the fourth pitcher was completely depleted, and Naruto immediately grabbed the fifth, pouring more of the cola down his throat. His tummy continued to expand, almost like water being poured into a balloon, pushing out under his hoodie and continuing to bulge with every gulp he took. Soon, even that pitcher joined the other four. Then a sixth, a seventh, an eighth...

Finally, after several minutes, Naruto had depleted the twelfth, final pitcher of soda, slamming it down next to the previous eleven. He sighed, leaned back in his chair, and shook his now-distended midsection with both hands, giggling at the sloshing sensations he got from it. Like Hunter and Kiba before him, his stomach was now quite round, sticking out and barely managing to stay under his orange hoodie. The attendant, amazed, walked over to Naruto and lifted his arm in the air. "Great job, kiddo!"

Naruto, grinning, opened his mouth to reply, but a massive belch escaped instead. The boy blushed, giggling sheepishly. The attendant, thankfully, took it in stride. "You said it, kid!" Letting Naruto's arm fall, he walked off, presumably to grab the next course.

Naruto took this opportunity to hop off the seat, cradling his belly with both hands and continuing to shake it and let it slosh even as he walked back towards Kiba, Hunter, and Akamaru. As Naruto approached them, Hunter grinned, jogged up to him, and gave him a congratulatory pat on the back. "Way to go, Naruto! You did great!"

Naruto beamed. "Thanks!" He exclaimed. "At this rate, we'll win that free week of Ichiraku's no problem!" At this, he smirked at the two. "Still, you guys look pretty full; ya think you can keep up?"

Kiba scoffed. "Keep up with you? No problem; I haven't even gotten started!" He licked his lips, grinning.

Tail wagging, Hunter looked at Kiba. "You and me both; I ain't done yet!"

Akamaru sighed. Maybe not, but by the time you guys are done, I'll probably be stuck rolling you back to the inn... Unfortunately for Akamaru, instead of making them reconsider, it only made them giggle. Whining, Akamaru let his ears droop; he really hoped none of them would make themselves sick...

Soon, the next platter was brought out, and it was...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Soda chugging

choices: A massive pile of beef and pork jerky.
A mountain of chicken wings.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
A bakery sweet smell wafted from the table, catching the trio's attention, as they saw what could only be described as a mountain of cupcakes just lathered atop the platter, awaiting whomever could consume it. Wagging his tail eagerly, Hunter turned to the others and asked, "Hey, do you guys mind if I try this one?" Naruto shrugged and said, "Ugh, it's all yours. I'm still kinda full from all that soda..." as if to emphasize his point, a sudden burp erupted from his mouth as he giggled wearily and rested both hands atop his bloated belly, continuing to enjoy the surprising fullness and sloshiness. Kiba on the other hand, raised an eyebrow and asked, "Those are a LOT of cupcakes, Hunter. You sure you can manage it?"

Before Hunter could respond, his bloated tummy let out an audibly hungry growling. Kiba's arms dropped to his sides as he said, "Guess that's a yes..."

Smiling toothily, Hunter immediately pranced for the table and sat before the massive pile of cupcakes. Taking a brief moment to just appreciate the sheer amount of different flavored treats that awaited him, Hunter licked his maw and proceeded to immediately stuff an entire chocolate cupcake with sprinkles into his more than eager mouth, luckily none of them still had the wrappers on the bottom. Chewing heartily, Hunter smiled, enjoying the immensely sweet chocolaty flavor of the frosting and the immensely moist cupcake.

Upon gulping it down, Hunter grinned and proceeded to grab two more cupcakes with both hand-paws. With one, he licked the frosting clean off in just two licks, and popped the now bare cupcake into his mouth, before stuffing the second vanilla cupcake into his open maw at the same time. He only took a few toothy moments to chew both cupcakes as his cheeks had inflated a bit to accommodate the space in his mouth being occupied before gulping them both down in one hearty gulp. Leaning in his chair, he sighed heartily as he patted his growing belly proudly, enjoying the sweet sugary taste in his mouth. Shortly after, he proceeded to stuff as many cupcakes as he could into his mouth at once, and began chewing at a much more rapid pace than ever.

Naruto and Kiba watched as Hunter seemed to turn into an eating machine. Cramming cupcake after cupcake into his mouth and only chewing on it for what seemed like no more than a few seconds before proceeding to gulp sometimes three or four at a time down his throat and into his gullet. "Boy, that wolf sure can pack 'em in, can't he?" said Naruto as he watched the wolf pup continue to rapidly put away several cupcakes at once like nothing. Kiba examined the young pup's rounded tummy, and saw that a sliver of fur had begun to poke out from the bottom of his tanktop, as his belly began to push outward more and more and more with each passing mouthful the wolf would gulp down.

Before long, that mountain of cupcakes was starting to shrink more and more, as the treats were being stuffed right into his awaiting maw and promptly gulped into his belly in one sudden gluttonous display. Akamaru took notice of Hunter's ballooned out belly, watching is continue to make his shirt rise up and expose more of his furry belly as it continued to inflate more and more. I don't think I've ever seen someone stuff that many CUPCAKES into their stomach at once...
"You said it, boy..." replied Kiba, still in awe besides Naruto.

"Excellent job, kiddo!" cheered the attendant as he rose Hunter's weary arm in the air and cheered happily for him, causing his even larger belly to jostle and jiggle a bit, earning a sudden but audible belch from the wolf as he smirked and smacked his lips. Rising up from his chair, he slowly approached the others. His now vastly bloated and noticeably bare belly had pushed outward a considerable amount with even more of his bare stomach, right below his belly button, now exposed as he absent mindedly rubbed across his aching stomach with both hands. "Nice job, Hunter! I knew you could pull it off!" cheered Naruto happily as he playfully nudged him in the shoulder, earning a smile from the young pup as he said, "Hehe, thanks!"
"Yeah, great job up there. Seeing you put away so many cupcakes at once was awesome to see," congratulated Kiba while Hunter smiled back and said, "Thanks!" and after stifling a softer burp, continued to say with a childish grin, "and REALLY filling..."

I just hope you guys don't get too confident and end up overdoing it early, because it doesn't look like any of you are gonna be off the hook anytime soon...

With those words of warning from Akamaru, the trio glanced back as the next platter was being assigned to the table. Sure enough...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: A mountain of cupcakes

choices: Several large bowls of ramen
One gigantic bowl of ramen
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Kiba gaped as he beheld the next course; specifically massive pile of jerky of varying kinds, easily rivaling (and perhaps even surpassing) the size of the mound of cupcakes Hunter had just consumed. Kiba's mouth twisted into a smile, and a tiny bit of drool began to collect at the corner of side of his mouth. Akamaru, amused, nuzzled the side of Kiba's face. Gee, Kiba; like what ya see?

"Uh-huh," Kiba muttered faintly, eyes not leaving the plate.

Giggling, Hunter gave Kiba a pat on the back. "All yours, buddy."

Kiba zoomed off at that, moving quickly despite his already-full belly and practically hopping up on the chair. Rubbing his hands together gleefully, he initially spent a few seconds just taking deep whiffs of the plate of jerky, practically salivating at the scent of the various dried meats. Soon, though, his stomach grumbled, swiftly reminding him of what it was they were here to do. To that end, Kiba picked up an enormous handful of jerky in each hand, ripped off roughly half of each handful with his teeth, and chewed for a good few seconds, savoring the flavors of the various jerkies. After chewing for a little bit more, he crammed the remainder of each handful into his mouth, his cheeks bulging out slightly as he chewed the second mouthful. After a little bit, he finally gulped everything down, sighed, licked his lips, and picked up another two massive handfuls and began repeating the process.

Naruto, Hunter, and Akamaru watched, intrigued. "Huh, he's not rushing it; guess he took your advice, Akamaru," Hunter muttered.

The giant dog shrugged. Eh, well, jerky's pretty chewy, so there isn't really any other way he could eat it.

Hunter blinked, looking up at Akamaru. "Huh, guess that makes sense."

Naruto, meanwhile, stole a glance at Hunter's brown-furred tummy, sticking out from under his tank top and only just managing to cover his navel. Looking from side to side shiftily, Naruto maneuvered his hand over to the sphere of furry flesh and began scratching it.

Hunter, feeling this sensation, glanced at Naruto. "Naruto, what're you..." he trailed off as his eyes shut halfway, and a goofy grin appeared on his muzzle. His tail began wagging, and one of his feet-paws began thumping up and down. "Ooh, yeah, that feels really really nice...."

Naruto giggled. "Heh; guess ya like having your tummy scratched, huh, Hunter?"

The pup glared at Naruto, but even this melted once again under the pleasurable sensation of having his partially-exposed tummy scratched. Even so, he kept his eyes on Kiba.

Evidently, Kiba had gotten impatient with his intial method of eating the jerky, as he was now cramming as many pieces of jerky as he could into his mouth at a time, his cheeks bulging out much as Hunter's had. Then, when his mouth reached his limit, he slowly chewed the dried meats, grinning and savoring the myriad flavors that danced across his tongue. Finally, when he'd chewed enough, he gulped the whole thing down, the sheer quantity causing his stomach to bulge out slightly, even as he panted for breath. It didn't take him long, though, before he recomposed himself and resumed cramming jerky into his mouth.

He repeated this over and over: he would cram the jerky into his mouth, chew it, swallow it, and his stomach would once again bulge out. Cram, chew, swallow, bulge, cram, chew, swallow, bulge... In the process, the bottom of the cartoony dog face on his shirt was becoming further distorted, pushing out further as his stomach strained the fabric.

Finally, around his fourth or fifth swallow, his shirt had ridden up slightly to reveal a small sliver of flesh. Undeterred, Kiba kept it up. Cram, chew swallow, bulge, cram, chew, swallow, bulge....With every swallow, his stomach pushed out more, and the bottom of his shirt continued its slow journey upwards, exposing more and more skin as it did so.

Minutes later, Kiba picked up his now-empty plate, licking it clean before letting it clatter back to the table. Sighing happily, he leaned back in his chair and rubbed his belly. It had swollen even further from the massive influx of jerky, ballooning out noticeably. His tummy, like Hunter's, now exposed a decent amount of bare flesh; however, unlike the young pup's, Kiba's v-neck shirt had ridden up just far enough to show his navel showing for the whole world to see.

Once again, the contest attendant strode over to the young boy and liftefted his arm up in the air, congratulating him. "Great job! You three have got a heck of an appetite!"

Kiba smirked, licking his lips. "Heh, thanks!" Giggling, he hopped off the chair and made his way back towards Hunter and Naruto, massaging his tummy.

Naruto grinned. "Heh, not bad, Kiba!"

Hunter wagged his tail happily. "Yeah, you did really good!"

Kiba laughed, rubbing his stomach with one hand while rubbing the back of his head with the other one. "I guess I did, didn't I?"

Akamaru, in spite of himself, barked and licked Kiba's face. Well, your stomach's even bigger, and your belly-button's peeking out; you tell me. Kiba blushed a bit at this, but nevertheless laughed joyously and hugged Akamaru.

Smiling at this, Hunter turned towards Naruto. "So, Naruto, are ya rested up enough?"

Naruto let out another belch before replying. "Yeah, I think so." His nose wrinkled distastefully. "Just so long as its not another round of drinks..."

Luckily for Naruto, the next course was quickly brought out, and it was, in fact, food. More specifically, it was...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Jerky Joys

choices: A giant 72 oz Steak
A giant whipped cream laden Chocolate Sundae
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Suddenly, Naruto stopped as a familiar aroma wafted up his nostrils. Taking a whiff, his attention immediately turned towards the table. "Is that...?" Watching the attendant step aside after placing down the newest entry; what looked like about 20 little steaming bowls, Naruto went wide eyed for a moment then like a rapid dog, immediately pranced towards the table, much to the amusement of Hunter and Kiba. Staring down the multiple stacks of cups, Naruto's mouth began to water. "Ichiraku's...." he muttered in a trance-like state, practically drooling like a mutt at this point. Hunter smiled, knowing full well where this was going. Ho hooo boy, this is gonna be epic.... he thought as he rubbed his hand paws together eager to see where this was going.

I just hope he doesn't accidentally smack his face with a bowl again...

Kiba snickered upon remembering that. And in that instant, Naruto was off. He hoisted the first bowl to his mouth and as if he were moving in fast forward, he proceeded to slurp down the noodles at an irregularly speedy pace as his chopsticks almost seemed to become a blur passing the broth soaked noodles from the bowl to his all-too-eager maw. As his cheeks began to bulge comically, Naruto took a huge hearty gulp, sending the bulge down his throat and straight into his ever-distending belly. Within no time whatsoever, he'd drained his first bowl of what little broth remained, and immediately dove for the next. Pouring it into his mouth like one would a cup of soup, a mix of the noodles and the broth began to pour into his mouth with him using his chopsticks to assist the stubborn noodles into his jaws.

Watching from afar, Hunter's tail wagged happily as he noticed Naruto's increasingly bloated tummy continuing to gradually distend with each passing mouthful of noodles and broth gulped down. As Naruto kept the momentum going for a good while, Hunter noticed a sliver of the boy's flesh peaking out from the bottom of his hoodie while his stomach continued to inflate like a balloon. All the while, the stack of empty bowls began to grow taller and taller. "You know? In all the places I've traveled, I don't think I've ever seen anyone as excited for ramen as Naruto," noted Hunter as he watched the boy continue to inhale his noodles. Kiba simply nodded and shrugged as he said, "Yep. That's bone-head for ya. For as long as I've known him, he's always loved the stuff."

And he's always far too eager to show just how much more of it he can stuff into his stomach than anyone around him... noted Akamaru, earning a scoff from Kiba while Hunter merely chuckled. "All I know is, he certainly seems to enjoy the stuff!" responded Hunter, still incredibly fixated on Naruto's monumentally speedy consumption. "If this were a ramen eating contest, we'd have already won our free week with him alone at this rate!"

Meanwhile, Naruto was already on his 15th bowl of ramen, with absolutely no sign of slowing down. As he continued to slurp down his newest bowl, his belly had distended outward to the point where his shirt had ridden up to peaking below the boy's belly-button. But still, despite his stomach seeming to have already expanded beyond capacity, he just kept slurping down those noodles as though there were no tomorrow, and all with a big happy grin on his face as he enjoyed the wonderfully steamy flavor with each passing bowl consumed and how each one made his belly feel nice and warm with so many fresh noodles being deposited into his stomach at once.

Upon finishing his 15th bowl, Naruto had to stop for a breather as he leaned back in his chair, groaning a bit from strain and the rest in utter bliss as he rested both hands atop his impressively distended gut. "How you feeling, Naruto?" asked Hunter. Burping loudly, Naruto sighed and held his thumb up then said, "Ahhh, I feel a LOT better now!" then proceeded to immediately begin slurping down bowl number 16. His pace had slowed down a considerable amount than his previous bowls due to the added fullness he was starting to feel. Thankfully, the sheer burst of flavor that came with every bowl of ramen he'd ever eaten was more than enough to keep him going.

As more time went on, Naruto successfully managed to slurp down bowl 16, 17, 18, and 19. Taking that final bowl up near his face, Naruto savored the moment as he proceeded to take his chopsticks and scarf down that last batch of noodles until his bowl was noodle-free. He then proceeded to bring the bowl towards his lips and leaned his head back as he slurped down the savory broth until his bowl was bone dry. Placing the final bowl upon his stack, Naruto smacked his lips and patted his belly proudly as the attendant; like with the others, approached and congratulated him on his victory. "Wow, excellent job, kid! I don't think there's many people out there who could put away 20 cups of Ichiraku Ramen; let ALONE a child!" Smiling, Naruto thanked the man and approached the others happily.

"Nice job, Naruto!" congratulated Hunter. "Honestly, for a while there, I almost didn't think you'd make it," noted Kiba, admittedly impressed himself. Burping softly, Naruto smiled and gave his bloated belly a hearty slap. "Yeah, well, when it comes to Ichiraku's, there's no way I'm NOT gonna finish!" responded Naruto proudly.

"Alright, boys! Onto our final wave of the competition! Only three more platters to go. If you three can pull it off, then get ready for all the Ichiraku's you can eat for the next week!" addressed the attendant as he went back to get the next platter. "Alright, you heard the guy, it's do or die time!" responded Naruto as he clenched his fists together and grinned excitedly. Much to Hunter's surprise, it seems Naruto's recent round of consumption had managed to make his belly even larger than Kiba's or his own. Playfully, Hunter poked Naruto's rounded gut and asked, "That last round sure had an impact, didn't it?"

Laughing, Naruto pointed towards Hunter and Kiba's own stomachs and said, "Didn't think I'd catch up to you guys, honestly. But we can't let that stop us when we're so close, right?"
"Damn right!' cheered Kiba determined.
"What he said!" responded Hunter in an equally determined voice. Akamaru's ears dropped as he shook his head, weary of what would likely ensue when all this was over.

Remind me to bring a wheel barrel next time we go out...

Finally, the attendant returned with the third to last platter. "I should warn you guys, the servings for these last couple of rounds are gonna be a bit larger than you've endured thus far. So just a heads up." As he stepped away, the three bloated youths glanced to see what was in store for the next round...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Several large bowls of ramen

choices: A huge, triple-decker cake
An entire ham
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Naruto, Kiba, Hunter, and Akamaru all gaped as the next course was brought out and set upon the table. It was, in short, probably the single biggest steak any of them had ever seen; thick, and at least 72 ounces in size, it hung off the sides of the plate on which it had been brought on, itself a considerable size.

"Um...wow," Hunter finally said. "that's, uh...that's a really big steak."

"Yeah," Naruto mumbled, eyes wide open. "A lot bigger than the ones we had yesterday."

Kiba didn't say anything, his mouth wide open, his eyes as big as saucers. Akamaru, gaping it it as well, supplied his own two cents:

You have got to be kidding me...

All three children slowly turned to look at each other. "So, uh," Hunter started, scratching his strained tummy. "Who, uh, who wants to take this one?"

Naruto winced, rubbing his own stomach. "Eh, not me; I still gotta rest up a little bit."

Kiba sighed, looking regretful. "I'd love to, but I need a few more minutes before I tackle anything else."

Hunter groaned. "Well, I guess I'm up, then...." Wincing, he slowly made his way back to the chair, hoisting himself up onto the seat and looking at the steak with a great deal of trepidation. It had nothing to do with the fact that it looked unappetizing; on the contrary, the steak glistened with juices, and the aromas wafting up off it set his mouth watering. Still, he was so full...

No, Hunter thought, gulping. I've come this far, I ain't backin' down now. Besides, if I get through this, that'll be all the free Ichiraku's we can cram into our guts for a week! Steeling himself, he picked up the fork and knife that had been provided for him and began cutting off a piece.

Kiba winced. "Good luck, man..."

Naruto grinned. "Yeah, if you get through this, we get that much closer to winning some free Ichiraku's!" Kiba glanced at him and rolled his eyes, but said nothing.

Slightly bolstered by this encouragement, Hunter finished cutting his first piece of steak and popped it into his mouth, chewing carefully. The juice and the meat-incredibly tender and flavored to perfection with a variety of spices-made his tail wag, but he was once again reminded of how full his tummy was. He chewed a bit more slowly and gulped it down, setting his utensils down and massaging his partially-exposed midsection. Oh man... I keep going like that, and there's no way I'm getting through this! He grimaced as he tried to think of a way to get through this situation.

Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru watched, looking on with a mixture of concern and anxiousness. "C'mon, Hunter, don't give up now!" Naruto shouted, clenching his fists together. "You've been doing awesome so far!"

"Yeah!" Kiba added. "You really gonna let this bonehead show you up?" Naruto nodded, grinning fiercely, before he registered what Kiba said and angrily slugged his friend in the shoulder.

In spite of the situation, Hunter giggled. Heh, yeah, I'm not gonna let him show me up! He looked back at the steak, and as he licked his chops, an idea came to him.
