It was risky, but it also carried a fairly high chance of success. Sitting back up, he grabbed his fork and knife once again...but instead of cutting into the steak again, he set them to the side.

Akamaru tilted his head. Eh? What is he...

To the shock of everyone present, Hunter proceeded to grab the entire, massive steak in his little hand-paws, drew it up to his face, and opened his muzzle wide.

Kiba gaped. "Is-is he really gonna..."

Hunter's muzzle snapped shut, ripping off a large part of the steak, chewing it rapidly before gulping it down. Licking the excess juice off his muzzle, he leaned back in take another bite, even as his tummy protested the extra load.

Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru watched in awe as Hunter continued ripping chunks off the steak and gulping them down, only allowing himself the briefest of breathers before going on. And, owing to how full his stomach already was, it didn't take long for his midsection to start showing the effects of it. With every chunk of meat that fell into his gut, the furry sphere bulged out a little bigger, putting a little more pressure on his shorts and forcing his tank top up higher and higher with every mouthful consumed. Soon, it had risen high enough that his furry navel was showing for the whole world to see, but still he did not let up, gulping down more and more of the massive steak and causing his stomach to grow bigger and bigger.

After a while, Hunter winced as he felt a tightness in his waistline. He considered undoing his button, but knew that if he stopped for any reason, he'd risk losing his groove. Ah well, not like I can't get 'em fixed... To this end, he continued tearing into the steak; his stomach bulged bigger, his shirt rose higher, and his khaki shorts got tighter with every mouthful swallowed.

Soon, he'd demolished half of the massive steak; his tank top now rode a several good inches above his navel, his midsection was starting to look even more like a big furry ball, and his waistline was starting to get unbearably tight. C'mon...just a little more... Hunter picked up his pace, tearing off piece after piece after piece of the massive steak and gulping them down, each swallow making his shorts tighter, tighter, tighter...

POP!

....until, with a determined gulp, his shorts could take no more, and the plastic disc burst free, flying off and hitting the underside of the table. Hunter blushed slightly, but never let up, continuing to tackle the remaining half of the steak, his stomach bulging bigger and his fly slowly beginning to open. Soon, the half of the steak was reduced to a quarter. Then an eighth. Then a half of an eighth...

Finally, the bone of the steak clattered to the plate, completely picked clean of any meat. Groaning, Hunter slumped back in his seat, arms hanging limply to the sides. His stomach had swollen to a ridiculous proportion, his tank-top now resting completely on top of the big, furry sphere. His fly had been forced all the way open, and had anyone been standing in the right position, they'd have been able to see his boxers, emblazoned with a bunch of cartoony-looking moons.

In spite of his discomfort, Hunter smiled weakly. "Heh...I...I did it..."

The attendant, utterly shocked at the strange little fella who had demolished that monstrous steak, nonetheless made his way over and hoisted the overfilled anthro's arm in the air. "C-congratulations, kddo! I don' think I've ever seen anyone eat that much in one sitting!"

Hunter giggled weakly as the man let go of his arm, and, with a great deal of care, plopped down out of his chair; groaning and cradling his massive tummy in his arms, he slowly lurched back to the other three., waddling a bit in his gait.

Naruto grinned. "Awesome! Way to go, Hunter!"

Kiba smirked good-naturedly. "Yeah; for a minute there, I didn't think you were gonna make it."

Hunter smiled weakly. "Th-thanks..." Suddenly, the pup let loose with a rather queasy-sounding burp. "Sc-scuse me, guys...I-I gotta lie down for a bit."

That was all the warning they got before Hunter released his belly, spread his arms out to the side, and flopped onto his back, his completely bare, distended tummy sticking up in the air.

Akamaru's tail wagged. Eh, rest up, little fella; you've earned it.

"Th-thanks..." Hunter muttered, burping again. Feeling a little sorry for the wolf, Naruto walked over and began scratching his now fully-exposed belly, causing the little wolf's tail to start wagging sluggishly.

Satisfied that all was well, the attendant gave the signal for the waiters to bring out the next dish. Soon enough, it was laid out on the table, and it was...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: A giant 72 oz Steak

choices: An incredibly massive bowl of ramen AND a massive pitcher of soda
An extra large, extra plump, roasted Chicken
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
To the astonishment of Naruto and Kiba, it was a monumentally sized Triple-Decker Cake. "Whoa..." was all Naruto could mutter, gaping at the sheer height of the colorful but sizable pastry. The two glanced amongst each other a bit uncertainly. "Looks great...but I could a little more time to digest all that ramen," noted Naruto, before glancing back at Hunter, who was still flat on the floor with his engorged furry stomach sticking outward like an overly inflated balloon covered in brown fur. "Besides, Hunter looks like he could really use a tummy scratch right now."

Rolling his eyes, Kiba shrugged and said, "Ugh, fine. I've come this far. What's one cake gonna do?" He then approached the table while Naruto headed back towards Hunter and Akamaru, and continued to scratch Hunter's vastly distended tummy, causing the pup to smile weakly while his tail wagged faintly. "Oh man...thanks for that, Naruto." Smiling, Naruto said "Hehe, no problem!" and playfully but absent mindedly patted the wolf pup's bloated belly, causing it to jostle a bit, making Hunter go a bit green in the gills as he covered his mouth with his paw and stifled a watery sounding burp. Stepping back, Naruto inched away a bit nervously. "Oops..." was all Naruto could mutter, while Hunter groaned in pain. "S-sorry about that, man..." muttered Naruto apologetically as he rubbed the back of his head sheepishly. Weakly, Hunter smirked, doing his best not to show how uncomfortable he felt, and said, "N-no worries....but maybe you should stick to cheering Kiba on...he's gonna need all the support he can get...*urrrp*....trust me..."

Nodding, Naruto turned back to Kiba, who still hadn't sat down yet. "Hey! What're you waiting for?! You better not be chickening out!" shouted Naruto. Hunter, despite his immense fullness, could only sigh. That's ONE way of encouraging someone.... thought Akamaru. "Ugh, well, If the alternative is him playing the drums with my gut, I'll take this..." responded Hunter.

"Alright! I'm going already, dummy!" snapped Kiba before plopping himself down before the giant cake and gulping nervously. The cake was a Chocolate masterpiece with white frosting outlining each circular layer of the cake. The top however, caught Kiba's eye. To his surprise, there were three kids; technically two and one wolf in clothing drawn out of different colored frosting. Above it, green frosting was used to spell out 'Good Luck, Boys!' Kiba was taken back as he turned curiously towards the attendant. Smiling, he shrugged innocently and said, "Hey, it's not often you get three kids who can put away as much as you guys can. So the bakers and cooks are all rooting for ya!"

Kiba couldn't help but smile, humbled by that. Despite his fullness and the worry that he'd likely end up just like Hunter, this kind of encouragement only served to boost his desire to see this thing all the way through. So, without wasting a second, he dug his knife into the top layer of the cake, cutting out the slice which had the frosted drawing of Naruto on top out first. "Who's a chicken now, bone-head?" muttered Kiba under his breathe, before opening his mouth as wide as he could, and stuffing the slice of cake into his eager mouth. He proceeded to push the entire slice into his mouth in one go, smearing some of the chocolate frosting on his lips as his cheeks bulged out to ridiculous proportions. Naruto's jaw nearly dropped as he muttered, "Holy crap..."

Akamaru put one paw over his face, then thought, Oh this'll DEFINITELY end well...

After a few moments of chewing heartily, Kiba took a massive gulp, sending the entirety of his mouthful down his throat and into his gullet. Sighing from gulping down so much at once, Kiba took a deep breath, and proceeded to force himself to do the same thing to a larger slice from the top, smallest layer; this time, the frosted drawing of Hunter. "At this rate, wolfy...we'll be on the same boat..." muttered Kiba nervously, almost talking to the slice itself before he opened wide and stuffed the whole slice into his maw like before. As he gulped down this second slice of cake, his own belly began to gurgle violently, causing him to wince as he clutched it firmly with one hand. "Ugh, c'mon, just power through it. If the wolf can do it, so can you..." thought Kiba, determined.

"C'mon, Kiba! Don't quit now! You've eaten more challenging things than some cake! You can do this no problem!" cheered Naruto, this time, actually getting the 'encouragement' part down. Hearing this, Kiba nodded appreciatively then, after slicing and stuffing the piece of cake with his own drawing on it. Proceeded to quickly cut smaller pieces and immediately haul them into his mouth, a few at a time before the entire top layer was gone. Gulping it all down, Kiba exhaled tensely as his belly began to distend outward considerably, now exposing his belly-button and a tad bit of flesh above it. Eating those smaller slices was causing some discomfort, but it got the job done. "Okay, just keep going. Don't stop, and you'll get through it..." he thought to himself, determined now more than ever.

He proceeded to immediately cut and stuff one slice of cake after another into his mouth, now on the second layer of the cake, which was a bit larger than the first layer. Naruto watched with amazement and said, "Wow, look at him go..." Hunter glanced back and saw the ferocity in his speed. Chuckling, he said, "Hope he unbuttoned his pants..." then proceeded to once again go limp as his paws absently rubbed over his ballooned belly. Hearing this, Akamaru whimpered...
Oh no...

With each slice of cake gulped down, Kiba's belly continued to push outward more and more, causing his shirt to ride up more and more, exposing more flesh above his navel than before. It pushed to the point where it began to push against his pants, causing him immense discomfort, and straining his pants immensely. Kiba winced in discomfort, but continued to press on. "Can't stop," was all he could keep thinking as he mechanically stuffed more and more cake down his throat. He was down to the last slice from the second layer, and sure enough; as with Hunter...

*POP!*

The button to his pants proceeded to ricochet off the table and fly into the air, causing his belly to immediately surge outward, free from containment, and expanding by a good few inches, causing Kiba to sigh with immense relief. "Ohhh man, that's SOOOO much better!" he exclaimed, before immediately getting to work on the last / largest layer of the cake.

"Just a little more, Dog-breathe! You got this!" cheered Naruto. Despite the insult, Kiba was still encouraged to finish up. His belly grew larger and larger with each passing slice consumed, but Kiba pressed on, determined not to quit. Finally, he stuffed the final, largest slice into his mouth, and after a few more moments of chewing, gulped it down heartily and sighed from exhaustion, as his arms went limp to his sides and he fell back against in his chair, almost dizzy from eating so much so quick. Astonished, the attendant gently rose the young Kiba's arm up and said, "That was incredible, kid! Nice job!" Kiba simply groaned, too exhausted to respond or pick himself up.

Seeing this, Naruto scoffed and helped Kiba out of his seat, and walk him back towards an equally gorged Hunter and an astonished Akamaru while Kiba kept one hand atop his overly distended gut, and the other on his pants to keep them from slipping off after losing his button. "Wow, that was incredible, man! How're you feeling?"

Kiba's only response was a monumental and rather nasty sounding belch, before groaning and saying, "...Full. Very, very...full..." Naruto then gently eased Kiba on the ground next to Hunter, before he immediately plopped down next to the wolf pup in an immense daze; his vast and distended belly sticking up in the air, around the exact same size as Hunter's. Seeing this, Akamaru trotted next to Kiba and licked his face, earning a weak but appreciative smile from Kiba.

Looking back, Naruto clenched his fists with determination and said, "Welp, just one more round to go, and it's all up to me! Time to go all out! For Ichirak-OW!" before he could finish, something fell out of the sky and dropped hard on his head. Rubbing his head, Naruto bent down and examined the object. "Is that...the button to your pants...?" asked Naruto.

Both Kiba and Hunter chuckled weakly, while Naruto sighed and turned his attention back to the table. His eyes immediately widened with shock...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: A huge, triple-decker cake

choices: Naruto takes a quick drink before going back to the ramen
Naruto spends some time working on the cola first
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Naruto's eyes bugged out as he saw the last course that had been placed upon the table: specifically, a gigantic bowl of ramen, easily several times bigger than his head and filled to the brim with noodles, broth, and all manner of toppings. Beside that was a huge pitcher of soda, at least a couple feet in height.

Naruto gulped. W-wow...that's a lotta food... He clenched his fists. B-but if I can do this, we get all the free Ichiraku's we want for a week! Massaging his already swollen belly, he took a deep breath and made his way over to the table, hoisting himself himself up on the chair and slowly picking up and splitting his chopsticks in half. Gulping again, he looked back at the other two bloated children, still splayed out on the ground. "Well, uh...wish me luck, guys." Hunter lifted his head off the ground and gave Naruto a weak but encouraging smile. Kiba, not even bothering, simply raised an arm up in the air and gave the blonde a thumbs-up before letting it flop back to the ground. Akamaru took a moment from looking down at the two worriedly to give Naruto an encouraging bark, his tail wagging.

Smiling a bit, Naruto turned back towards his food, taking a deep whiff. Well, at least it smells awesome...but it's Ichiraku's, how else would it smell? Bolstered by this thought, Naruto dipped his chopsticks in, picked up some ramen, and began slurping it up.

Having a feeling Naruto was going to be a while, Hunter turned his head towards Kiba, even as his paws massaged his furry tummy. "So, Kiba, you havin' fun so far?"

Kiba smirked weakly, patting his own vast gut lightly with a hand. "Well, I am feeling a little sick right now...but yeah, it's been a lot of fun. Stuffing myself, playing...this is some of the most fun I've had in a long time."

Hunter grinned, his tail wagging. "And being a kid? How's that workin' for ya?"

Kiba's face immediately lit up. "It's the best! I have so much more energy, all the problems I have don't mean anything...and everything's just so much more fun!" The dog-nin giggled at this, blushing as he did so.

Akamaru wagged his tail happily, licking Kiba's face. Gotta admit, you're pretty damn cute when you're like this, Kiba. Kiba blushed again, but nonetheless giggled as Akamaru nuzzled him. Once he was done, Kiba turned to look at Hunter. "You said you've got more of that stuff?"

Hunter beamed. "Sure do! I've got enough for a whole week! Plus," his expression turned sly, "a few more days besides."

Kiba grinned widely. "Really?! Oh man, this is gonna be great!"

Hunter laughed, before throwing a sly glance at Akamaru as well. "And there's more than enough for you, Akamaru," he muttered so only the dog could hear him.

The dog yelped, his eyes going wide. W-well, I...uh...

A sudden, queasy-sounding belch suddenly cut through the air, and the two bloated youths managed to lift their heads high enough off the ground to see where it was coming from.

Naruto was leaning back in his chair, wincing and rubbing his tummy with both hands. Though he hadn't even finished a quarter of the massive bowl yet, his stomach had already been affected, his hoodie rising up enough to show his navel and some skin above it.

Hunter's eyes widened. "Uh-oh..."

Kiba scowled. "C'mon, bonehead, don't give up now!"

Naruto's eyes flew open, and he glared back at Kiba. "I wasn't giving up, dog-breath! I was just takin' a break!" His eyes landed on the cola, and they gleamed. "And besides, I think I just found the perfect thing to ease my tummy up a little bit..." Licking his lips, he seized the massive pitcher; his arms struggled a little under the weight, but he managed to bring it up to his lips, the sweet, bubbly liquid flowing down his throat and into his gut.

Hunter and Kiba breathed a sigh of relief; looked like Naruto was just getting started. Akamaru, on the other hand, whined, covering his eyes with a paw. Oh man, how big is he gonna be by the time he gets done?
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: An incredibly massive bowl of ramen AND a massi...

choices: Despite struggling all the way, Naruto somehow manages to drink every last drop.
Before he drinks, he remembers to unbutton his pants first, then drinks away.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Naruto continued to take a good few hearty gulps of cola, but much to Hunter and Kiba's surprise, that didn't so much as put a dent into such a massive pitcher, for as Naruto placed it back down and gasped for breathe, it still looked as if it hadn't even been touched yet, minus maybe a bit off the top now lowered ever so slightly. "Oh boy, I gotta feeling Naruto's not gonna be feeling all too hot by the time he's done with that thing..." noted Hunter as he continued to massage his own aching tummy. "So? Does your stomach at least feel at ease now?" asked Kiba, still doing his best to ease his own. But Naruto didn't respond, instead a strained look grew over his face as he clutched his distended belly firmly with both hands.

*BRRAAAAAAAP!*

Naruto's mouth flung open as he let free a deep, resounding belch for a few seconds straight, much to the amusement of Hunter and Kiba. Akamaru sighed and thought, I'll take that as a yes...

Sighing with relief, Naruto gave his belly a hearty slap. "Ahhh, very much so," he said in response to Kiba's question and proceeded to resume getting back to work on the ramen. Naruto continued to slurp down big heaping mouthfuls of noodles at once, causing his cheeks to bulge out comically as he chewed, savoring the delicious flavor despite his fullness, then proceeded to gulp it all down in one hearty gulp. Hunter and Kiba watched as this pattern continued for a good while, with Naruto slurping up ample amounts of ramen, chewing then gulping before going back for more like clockwork. With every few gulps, Nartuo's already distended tummy continued to expand further and further, causing his hoodie to ride up a little bit more, exposing more flesh above the boy's belly button.

"I hope the bone-head can pull it off..." noted Kiba, seeing that Naruto's bowl had depleted past the half way point. Confident in Naruto's abilities, Hunter smirked a bit; albeit groggily, and said, "Yesterday night when we had our own massive bowls of ramen, I asked the same thing, and he told me that when it comes to Ichiraku's, he NEVER leaves a bowl unfinished. Sure enough, he plowed through that massive steamy bowl like it were fun-sized."
"Fun-sized?" asked Kiba quizzically.
"...Really small. Point being, he was true to his word and gulped it down without hesitation. And considering the reward, I got no doubt in my mind that he'll do the same thing here."

Kiba chuckled a bit. "Guess that knucklehead's ramen obsession for all these years'll finally pay off." said Kiba, before glancing back and seeing Naruto leaning back to massaging his aching tummy. "...Hopefully."

Burping softly and rubbing his immensely bloated midsection, Naruto was starting to get a sense of that same fullness Hunter and Kiba had felt, but was determined not to quit just yet. "C'mon, airhead, you're almost there!" cheered Kiba weakly. Looking down, Naruto noticed that he had indeed almost finished his ramen. With just roughly a fourth of the ramen left to go, Naruto was reinvigorated with confidence and determination. Feeling how much lighter the bowl had become with so much of the ramen already depleted, Naruto decided to power through the rest of the ramen as quick as he could before his aching belly could protest any longer.

Lifting the ample bowl and bringing it to his lips with all his might, Naruto's mouth opened wide as he; much to everyone's shock, began to pour the still steady amount of ramen and broth into his determined mouth. Only now, rather than take big mouthfuls, he took steady, smaller mouthfuls and swallowed them on the spot, practically inhaling and gulping down the ramen as he went without chewing it any longer.

Kiba, Hunter, even Akamaru all watched in amazement as the bowl steadily decreased with each quick passing gulp. All the while, his belly continued to press outward more and more, to the point where; like Hunter and Kiba, it was beginning to restrict against Naruto's pants. Naruto winced with discomfort as he continued to gulp down his ramen, but didn't want to stop and unbutton in fear of losing momentum. So he continued to gulp down his ramen, causing more of a strain on his pants button as he continued to gulp down the incoming ramen.

However, much to everyone's surprise, Naruto had finally and successfully drained his massive bowl of any ramen or broth before his pants button could be busted off. Slamming his now empty bowl to the table, Naruto groaned weakly and leaned back in his chair as his arms dropped to his sides, as he smiled weakly and said, "Finally...." He was about to unbutton his pants and celebrate winning a weeks worth of the best ramen ever cooked by man, but before he could unbutton anything, Kiba got his attention and said, "Umm, Naruto, aren't you forgetting something?"

Confused, Naruto looked back at the table, and in that instant, his enthusiasm and spirit had all but died. "....Oh." was all Naruto could mutter, upon seeing the sight of the practically untouched and massive pitcher of cola he still had to drain. The boy's lip quivered a bit pitifully as he almost wanted to cry at what was sure to await him and his all-too-full tummy. As he grabbed the pitcher, his ballooned out gut growled in protest, causing him to whimper in pain, and let go of the pitcher. As much as he wanted to, his belly was in far too much pain from all he had already consumed, that not even the thought of free Ichiraku's could push him to continue.

"C'mon, Naruto! You've toughed it out through worse, you can do this!" cheered a slightly more energetic Kiba, who; for once, didn't refer to Naruto as some kind of insult with head attached to the end of it. "You got this, ninja boy! We believe in you!" cheered Hunter, also a bit more enthusiastically despite his own fullness.
"Damn straight we believe in you!" responded Kiba. Even Akamaru couldn't help but bark for encouragement for the disheartened blond boy.

Upon hearing all this, Naruto's spirit immediately lightened, as a smile grew over his face. Suddenly, he was filled with new determination to see this last obstacle through. However frighteningly huge that pitcher may be, he was gonna gulp every last drop down. Not for a free week of Ichiraku's ramen, but because his pals believed in him, and the last thing he was gonna do after all this was let his friends down....of course, the free week of Ichiraku's ramen was definitely going to be a plus.

And so, Naruto grabbed a hold of the pitcher and stared down that massive carbonated beverage with confidence. "Alright, let's do this!" shouted Naruto. Once again his stomach groaned in protest, but this time, Naruto simply rolled his eyes and said, "Oh shut up," and proceeded to force himself to lift the surprisingly heavy pitcher...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: After a quick drink, Naruto resumes eating ramen.

choices: The three wake up together later, and it's early evening
Hunter wakes up later, and sees Naruto and Kiba in funny positions
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
Right as the pitcher was being lifted to his lips, Naruto winced as he felt a cutting pain in his midsection. Oh yeah...my pants. Slowly, he set the pitcher back down on the table. Well, finishing the rest of that soda's probably gonna be a lot easier if my pants aren't putting so much pressure on my tummy...

To that end, he leaned back in his chair, sucked his distended tummy in as far as he could, and reached his hands down to his waistline. He fumbled around a bit, trying to get past the massive obstruction. Finally, his hands found the button; pulling it out of the hole, Naruto sighed in relief as the pressure abated,his stomach bulging out a few inches and his fly being forced down a few teeth.

"Ahhh...much better," Naruto smiled, closing his eyes and taking a deep breath. Looking at the massive pitcher of soda on the table, he faltered a bit, but remembering his friends' faith in him (and the prospect of a week of free Ichiraku's), he gathered his courage, seized the massive pitcher, and brought it up to his mouth, tilting it upwards with such speed that some ended up spilling and running down his cheeks. Paying this no mind, he opened wide and began gulping down the sweet, bubbly liquid, wincing as it flowed into his already overstuffed belly, expanding it even more.

Kiba, Hunter, and Akamaru watched in awe as Naruto gulped down the pitcher. "Wow, lookit him go..." Kiba muttered, burping lightly and licking his lips.

Akamaru's tail wagged. Well, at least he remembered to unbutton his pants...

Hunter watched as Naruto continued gulping down the soda, inflating his tummy in the process. "Yeah...but his stomach's startin' to get about as big as ours are, and he's nowhere near done yet. Ya ask me, even if he undid his pants, something's gonna pop..."

Kiba looked over at him quizzically. "Huh? Whaddaya mean?" Hunter smirked and pointed to his own furry navel, itself a pit. "...oh, I get it." Kiba giggled. "That's actually happened to the bonehead and I coupla times in the past when we competed." A thoughtful look appeared on his face. "It felt kinda weird, but nice, too..." Kiba looked over at Akamaru, smirking. "And Akamaru liked it, too." The dog immediately blushed and looked away. Ya bat at someone's belly-button one time, and no one lets you forget it...

Hunter laughed, causing his belly to jostle, though the food had begun to settle, and he no longer felt quite as sick from it. Regardless, he calmed down, managing to still his belly and look over at Naruto.

The boy was currently leaning back in his chair, pitcher on the table. Naruto was groaning and massaging his tummy, which was even further inflated from the soda and causing his hoodie to ride up even further. And, though Hunter was in no position to see it, his fly had also been forced down several more teeth. Hunter winced, but as his eyes fell upon the pitcher, his eyes widened. Astonishingly, within that first go, Naruto had polished off a quarter of it; he really was determined to win that prize.

Naruto spent a few more seconds groaning, before he pressed upon his belly and let loose with a massive belch. Licking his lips, he picked the pitcher up again and resumed guzzling the cola.

Minutes ticked by as the liquid poured into his gut, and his tummy continued to inflate. By this point, it easily rivaled Hunter and Kiba's in size, and it still kept on going. By the time he plopped it down again, it was down to half its original size.

Hunter whooped, holding an arm up in the air. "Woohoo! Go, Naruto!"

Kiba did the same. "C'mon, don't give up now!"

Bolstered by these words, Naarruto spent only a few moments resting before forcing out another burp and picked the massive pitcher up once again. However, instead of tilting it to his lips immediately, he began taking deep breaths.

Akamaru stared. Is...is he really... His eyes bugged out. No way...he wouldn't...

With a glint in his eyes, Naruto once again brought the cola to his lips, tilting it back even further and gulping it down even faster than before. As a result, his stomach started ballooning out even faster than before. By now, his fly was undoubtedly fully opened, but that was of little concern to him at the moment as he guzzled the soda down. By now, his hoodie was resting completely atop his belly, the fleshy globe totally exposed for the whole world to see, and it only continued to get bigger.

The minutes ticked by as Naruto continued gulping down the beverage, only lowering it slightly to take several quick breaths before continuing to gulp it down.

Soon, there was only a little cola left in the pitcher. Naruto was starting to turn a bit green, but he steeled himself and pressed on, guzzling the soda even as he felt a familiar sensation in his navel. And, as with the night before, as the last of the soda landed in his gut...

POP!

...his navel violently inverted, popping out and wobbling for the whole world to see. When that was done, Naruto promptly dropped the massive pitcher to the ground and slumped back in his chair, looking completely out of it. "Uhhhh...." he moaned. Suddenly, his cheeks bulged, and his hands flew to his mouth.

Hunter's eyes widened. "Naruto?!"

Kiba swore. "Ah man, don't lose it now..."

Akamaru winced, turning away. I can't watch this....

Naruto continued to hold his hands over his mouth, heaving a couple of times. Then, his hands fell away...

"BRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAP!"

...and the young boy let loose with what was quite possibly the loudest, longest, queasiest belch any of them had ever heard. Some of those in attendance could have even sworn they'd felt the ground vibrate.

The attendant, on the other hand, quickly composed himself and walked over to Naruto, holding the bloated boy's arm high in the air. "Congratulations, kiddo! You did it!" Naruto was too queasy to say anything, but he did manage a weak grin. "Hope your appetites hold up, 'cause you've just won a week of free Ichiraku's!" Reaching inside his pocket, the man brought out three slips of paper and slid them inside one of Naruto's pockets. "Make sure ya hold onto these!"

"..m'kay..." Naruto mumbled, dazedly. Chuckling, the attendant helped him out of his seat and towards the others, his belly and navel jostling, sloshing, and wobbling all the way.

Hunter and Kiba's faces lit up as the boy drew near them. "All right, Naruto!" Hunter cheered, massaging his tummy. "You did it!"

Kiba smirked. "Whaddaya know, bonehead; you're good for something after all."

Naruto glared at Kiba, but this quickly devolved into a weak giggle, ending in a belch. Laughing himself, the attendant helped Naruto to the ground, gently laying him out next to Kiba. "Rest up, boys; you've earned it!" Ruffling them each on the tops of their heads, he headed back towards the table to help clean up.

The two youths spent a minute or two congratulating Naruto, who didn't reply but simply grinned like a dope, both at the praise and at the prize they'd won. Soon, though, Hunter yawned. "Dunno about you guys, but I could really go for a nap right about now."

"Yeah," Kiba agreed, yawning. "Me too."

"..m'too," Naruto mumbled, belching again and causing his gut and navel to wobble.

Looking at the three stuffed youths, Akamaru couldn't help but wag his tail. You three are crazy, he woofed fondly, moving behind them and gently nudging them into upright sitting positions. When the were sitting up enough, Akamaru settled down, the three resting against his body. Still, I guess I should congratulate you; you all did great. Akamaru's tail wagged for a few seconds before he realized that no one was replying. Guys? Looking down, he saw the three...and smiled a doggy smile.

The three children had already fallen fast asleep, leaning against Akamaru's body in various positions. Hunter's head was leaning towards the side, one hand on his belly and his tongue lolling out the side of his mouth. Kiba was snoring slightly, his head tilted back and his arms up on Akamaru's body as though he were sitting on a bench. And Naruto...Naruto was snoring gently, one arm lying limp at his side while his other one was being held up, his thumb squarely in his mouth, a contented smile on his face.

They're so cute, Akamaru thought, wagging his tail. Almost makes this all worth it. With that, Akamaru yawned, laid his head down, and shut his eyes, ready to get some sleep.
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Before he drinks, he remembers to unbutton his ...

choices: "Let's warm it up and polish off every single platter we can!"
"Eh, you guys can go ahead, I'm gonna rest this one out..."
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.content:
A considerable amount of time had passed as day turned to night, and what little crowd was nearing the area was all but gone, leaving the three youths still resting atop a now sleeping Akamaru. Some more time had passed as the four slept away the night, until the young pup groaned a bit and groggily rubbed his eyes. "Rgh...whoa, how long were we out?" asked Hunter, still half asleep as he absent mindedly rubbed his considerably deflated tummy, now small enough only to expose a bit of furry flesh just below his belly button. "Guys?" Curious, he turned to see everyone else; Akamaru included, still out like lights. Upon seeing the silly but undeniably adorable positions Naruto and Kiba were in as they rested on the giant dog, Hunter giggled, then excitedly rose up from his position as carefully as he could so as not to wake anyone, while still holding his pants up because of his busted button. "Oh man, this is too good!" he said to himself doing his best to contain his laughter.

Stepping back to get a clear view of all three of them, it seems more time had passed than Hunter initially thought. Kiba's stomach had also shrunk a good amount, to where it was once again small enough to only expose a bit of flesh right near his belly button. Naruto's stomach seemed to have extended out the largest of the three, but his belly had also shrunken down to where his hoodie was now only riding just above what was once again, his innie navel. Hunter grabbed his phone; notably larger in his paws due to his condensed size, and flash-snapped a perfect shot of all three resting the days' feasting. Looking down at the image on his phone, Hunter smiled and said, "Perfect," before glancing at the time on his phones. Suddenly his smile dropped as his eyes widened nervously. "Oh crud..."

Immediately putting his phone away, he stepped towards the resting three and shook the heavy sleepers awake, causing them to slowly flutter awake in annoyance. "Ugh, what's the big idea?" asked a half dazed Kiba while Naruto groaned in the same annoyance as a child would being woken to go to school. Akamaru's eyes eventually opened as he glanced back at Hunter and thought, What's wrong?

Grasping his tanktop's collar and pulling it nervously, Hunter replied to all three and said, "We may've slept in a little longer than we should have."
"mm'so?" replied Naruto as he once again tried resting against Akamaru.
"Soooo it may be in our best interest to head back to the inn so we can put on our adult clothes before we grow back and bust all the clothes we're wearing."
Upon hearing that, both Naruto and Kiba's eyes immediately snapped open, as they nervously turned towards the pup and asked, "...All?"
"ALL." replied Hunter.

Glancing back horrified amongst each other, Naruto and Kiba immediately rose up and, despite their still pretty distended tummies, sprinted faster than they'd ever sprinted in their lives back towards the inn. Hunter immediately followed, gaining enough momentum to where he had to run on all fours. Akamaru simply sighed, watching the three go off, then opted to follow them.

With all three youths running for their lives...or in this case, their dignity, it became a pretty close knit race that no one was really racing. Without even realizing it, all three managed to make it to the inn at the exact same time with Akamaru watching, surprisingly impressed with their speed.

Upon entering the inn, all three youths stopped, panting and gasping from utter exhaustion. "Phew...w-we.....we made it...." muttered a beyond exhausted Naruto, before plopping on his back, still breathing heavily. "Hey...un-unless you plan to get changed on the ground, y-you getter get your butt up and change!" complained Kiba as he immediately grabbed his adult clothes and ran into the bathroom. Groaning in annoyance, Naruto forced himself up and grabbed his clothes, waiting for Kiba to get out while Hunter grabbed his clothes and just changed them and there. Looking back, Naruto immediately turned away and yelled, "Aww, again with that?!"

Rolling his eyes, Hunter scoffed and said half exhausted and half annoyed, "Fur! Wolf! Remember?!" As Akamaru pranced inside, he saw Hunter wearing his adult clothes about a couple sizes too large for himself while Kiba stepped out of the bathroom in his clothes in the exact same state. He couldn't help but snicker. I've never seen anyone look so ridiculous yet so adorable at the same time!

"Har har," was all Hunter could muster, still panting and breathing heavily while Naruto went inside and changed into his adult clothes as well. Stepping back out in his oversized clothes, Naruto couldn't help but smirk victoriously, "Least we made it in time..."
"We sure did!" exclaimed Hunter.
"I was terrified the whole way here...honestly, I thought every step I took, I was gonna suddenly grow back into an adult and find myself running around town NAKED..." noted Kiba as he shuddered, mortified at the thought.
"Yeah...there's an image I don't need to be seeing..." responded an equally horrified Naruto.
Did you notice how much faster you got here than you did when you were racing to the park? asked Akamaru to only Hunter and Kiba, causing them both to turn to him curiously.

"Well, yeah, when we raced, we were just having fun. This was life or...utter embarrassment..." responded Kiba while Hunter nodded in agreement.
But when you were just competing, you were still being hindered by wanting to get somewhere faster than each other, responded Akamaru. Notice how when you all ran and didn't care who got here first, you all pushed yourself equally hard enough and got here at the same time?

Stopping for a moment, Kiba considered that, and after glancing back at Hunter and Naruto, and recollecting the race against time to get to the inn, he gaped, "Wow, we DID all get here at the same time!"
"Well, yeah," responded Naruto to Kiba, "we didn't wanna be too late and grow back up and be running around showing things we....shouldn't be showing..."
"Not even just that," noted Hunter as he struggled to keep his adult glasses over his face, "look at how much food we stuffed into our guts today. We didn't tough it out the way we did because we wanted to beat each other. We toughed it out because we were all working together to get ourselves-"
"-Free Ichiraku's for a FULL WEEK!" snapped Naruto happily, cutting Hunter off as he smirked and rubbed the back of his furry head, "Yeah..."

"Huh..." noted Naruto as he scratched his head, trying to process everything that was being said. "So it's like, we get what and where we need when we're not going up against each other, but...just pushing on towards whatever the goal is..." chuckling, he continued and said, "we do pretty good, don't we?"
Smiling, Hunter nodded and said, "You got that right!"
Folding his arms together and smirking, Kiba nodded and said, "Sure, when it MATTERS, we know how to pull through. But there's nothing wrong with a lil competition if it's just for fun, right?"

Shrugging, Hunter nodded and said, "Heh, guess you got us there."

Suddenly, the three began to feel a little funny as their bodies began to tingle all over. "Whoa....I feel weird," noted Naruto before hiccuping suddenly. Within that instant, all three grew back into their adult forms, fitting snugly and perfectly into the overgrown clothes their child forms were sporting.

Glancing back at each other, and observing their own bodies. Their midsections had all shrunken down to virtually their normal sizes in the process of growing up. Admittedly, there was a loss of energy between the three in their older forms, but they retained enough of what they'd learned and enjoyed throughout the day to where there was still a universal sense of happiness and joy between them, even if they were still pretty exhausted, moreso now that they were older again. "Ahh, feels good to be back to normal," noted Kiba. "Yeah....still, it felt awesome to be a kid again..." noted Naruto. With a smile, Hunter waved his hand-paw forward and said, "Ah don't worry about it, we got plenty of those vials to last us all week and THEN SOME! But since it's late, it's better if we stay grown up since we'll be sleeping soon, and if we slept in our kid forms, it'd kinda be a waste."

Nodding in agreement, Naruto yawned and said, "Good thing too, cause I'm pooped..." Hunter yawned in agreement and scratched his once again thin furry stomach from beneath his tanktop and said, "Guess we should probably call it a night then?"

Kiba didn't respond. He simply grinned mischievously and glanced back at the two. "I dunno about the rest of you, but all that growing up suddenly kinda made me a lil hungry," he said, still smirking as he pointed the two towards the still ample amount of room service they had left since the morning. "Whadduya say we warm all that up and end the night the way three winners SHOULD end a night?"

Scratching the back of his head, Naruto glanced uneasily and said, "I dunno, I kinda just wanna sle-" But before he could finish his sentence, his own, slim-again stomach let out a rather audible roar of hunger, causing him to blush suddenly, while Hunter's own stomach groaned in agreement with Kiba. Smirking, Hunter turned to Naruto. "I'm pretty tired too, but I definitely wouldn't mind going to sleep with a full gut," he said as he patted his stomach eager. "But you pulled us to victory, so it's up to you, Naruto."

Naruto thought for a moment while his stomach was still growling to where it almost sounded mad at Naruto for not immediately saying yes. Finally, he decided...
1121122211211111112112212121221211122111.title: Hunter wakes up, and sees them in funny positions.

choices: Hunter gets a tummyache from eating too much too fast
One of the two ninja begins lagging behind the other
11211222112111111121122121212212112.content:
Hunter raised an eyebrow. "Ya sure?"

Naruto gulped. "Y-yeah; no offense, but that sounds like it might be a little...weird."

Kiba nodded. "Not to mention, we don't really know ya that well." His eyes narrowed. "How can we be sure you're not just trying to slip us something?" Akamaru growled at Hunter, making his agreement known.

Surprisingly, Hunter simply smirked good-naturedly and shrugged. "Eh, I don't blame ya; crazy wolf-person offers you a weird-looking vial, tells ya it'll be fun?" He chuckled. "Sounds like the opening to a raunchy joke." Naruto and Kiba exchanged a confused-and vaguely uncomfortable-look. "Besides, you're ninja; taking stuff at face value can land ya in a lot of trouble, right?"

Smiling, he uncapped one of the vials. "Still, just cause you guys are skipping out..." he licked his chops eagerly. "...doesn't mean I'm gonna skip out on an opportunity for some fun." And, with that, he brought the vial to his muzzle, tilted his head back, and knocked the whole thing back.

Naruto's eyes widened. "H-Hunter?!"

Kiba's mouth dropped open. "Did you seriously just..."

Smacking his chops, Hunter set the empty vial down on the table and sighed happily. "Yes, yes I did." He reclined in his chair, gently massaging his belly. "Sit back and relax, boys; show's about to start." He closed his eyes and smiled contentedly.

Akamaru whined, tilting his head. Show?

Hunter simply nodded, exhaling through his nostrils. He took a breath...

And that's when it started.

The wolf slowly began shrinking, his stomach following suit at a slightly slower pace. His shirt and shorts-at least, those parts still not being pushed against by his belly-slowly began taking on a more baggy appearance.

Naruto recoiled, causing his chair to scoot back a bit. "H-he's getting smaller!"

Kiba squinted at him. "N-not just that..." His eyes widened as his muzzle and head began noticeably shrinking along with the rest of his body. "H-he's getting younger!"

Cracking open an eye, Hunter grinned impishly at Kiba. "Toldja," the wolf retorted playfully. The two boys (and dog) started; his voice was noticeably lighter and higher than it had been before. Sighing, he closed his eyes again and continued to relax as the change continued to sweep over him. At this point, his stomach had actually shrunken a good deal, to the point where his now rather-baggy shirt all but completely covered it...but he wasn't done yet.

He continued shrinking into his clothes, his arms retreating further into his shirt. His fur, though not necessarily coarse before, grew softer and softer, almost like that of a pup's. In addition, his muzzle became less pointed and more rounded, again like a pup's. Even his legs were beginning to retreat within his shorts.

The three from Konoha watched, awestruck, as Hunter continued to grow younger, his limbs vanishing into his clothing. Even his glasses, unable to be supported by his muzzle, tumbled off and clattered to the floor.

A few minutes passed as the transformation continued, until, finally, Hunter stopped shrinking. Sighing and opening his eyes, he looked at Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru's expressions, squinting...and promptly burst into a fit of giggles. "Heehee, you guys should see your faces!" His voice, matching his body, was now that of a young child's: perky, high-pitched, spritely, and full of energy.

The three were too shocked by what they saw in front of them to respond. Sitting at the opposite end of the table, every part of his body except for his head and tail swathed in garments that were now far too big for him, was what could only be described as an anthropomorphic wolf pup. The fur covering his head (and the rest of his body as well, presumably) now had a softer, almost fuzzy look to it, and little tail, having shrunk in proportion with the rest of him, wagged merrily behind him. Even his stomach had shrunken a great deal, to the point where it was only visible as a slight impression beneath the shirt concealing his body.

Finally, Akamaru forced himself to bark, Damn, he's...

"He's adorable," Kiba muttered, not quite able to believe what he was saying. Naruto snickered, but was unable to tear his gaze away.

Beaming, Hunter reached a much smaller arm out of his clothes and rubbed the back of his head. "Aww, you guys are too nice," he giggled, kicking his legs happily through his shorts. "Ya know, if ya wanna, I really like tummy rubs..." He tried to move his other arm to scratch his tummy for emphasis, but found it restricted by the overlarge clothing. "Heh heh...just gimme a second." Vanishing within his shirt for a moment, he fumbled with it for a bit before getting a good grip on it and tossing it off him. That taken care of, he all but hopped out of his shorts and onto the floor.

Kiba's eyes bugged out. "Oh come on, now you're streaking too?!"

Naruto, covering his eyes with a hand, nonetheless said, "Well, he said nothing's really showing 'cause of his fur...buuuut it might still be creepy if I look."

Giggling at the two, Hunter squinted and made his way over to his duffel. Rooting through it (and throwing various items and articles of clothing through the air in the process), he finally came up with an outfit he liked. Grinning, he slipped the clothing on. Once he'd gotten the shirt adjusted and the shorts buttoned and zipped, he rooted through the bag for something else. His now much smaller hands/paws grabbed something; wagging his tail, he retrieved a new, smaller pair of glasses and perched them on his muzzle. Adjusting them, he grinned as his vision cleared. "Ahh, much better."

Looking down at the clothes he'd chosen to get a better look-a black tank top with a blue crescent moon in the center of it and brown khaki shorts-he nodded in satisfaction before darting back to his chair and clambering back up. "There we go; lots more comfy now." Choosing to ignore the stares of the others, Hunter rubbed his stomach-the appendage having shrunken enough that it was now only a bump beneath his shirt-and grinned. "Well, I dunno about you two, but I'm still famished!" Drawing an extra-large plate of scrambled eggs and bacon towards him, he began cramming it into his waiting maw, not even bothering to use utensils as his tail wagged and his legs kicked gleefully.

Naruto and Kiba, still not quite able to fully process what had just happened, continued to gape at the little anthro-pup happily stuffing his craw. Hunter took note of this; scrambled eggs dotting his muzzle, he looked up and smirked at the others. "Well? What are you guys waiting for?" He giggled impishly. "That is, unless you're planning on losing to a little pup..."

That did it: Naruto and Kiba glanced at each other, exchanged determined glares, and drew more food toward them as well, stuffing their mouths as well (though still using utensils.) Beaming in satisfaction, Hunter continued stuffing his own craw, satisfied.

Akamaru merely stared at the sight. This day just keeps on getting weirder and weirder...

As the minutes ticked by and they continued to eat and eat...
11211222112111111121122121212212112.title: "Eh, you can do it if ya want;; we're f...

choices: Hunter maintains his lead
Either Naruto or Kiba takes the lead
112112221121111111211221212122121121.content:
The little anthro-pup gleefully crammed as much scrambled eggs and bacon into his mouth as he could possibly fit, occasionally so fast that he'd have to adjust his glasses to keep from jumping off his eager little head. Neither Naruto nor Kiba were letting up either, occasionally glancing up at Hunter and back down at their food, more determined than ever to put away more than the little critter stuffing his little face across from them.

H-holy crap...who'd uh' thought being younger could make you THAT much faster...?! Naruto thought hastily as he continued cramming his mouth with more and more scrambled eggs. Kiba fared no better, frantically not wanting to be shown up by a kid...let alone a puppy kid. Akamaru simply watched, still a bit dumbfounded, but at the same time, partially amused by the sight of watching the little anthro pup so eagerly stuffing his face, occasionally spewing bits of egg in the air as he tore into his plate with both paws.

Hehe, he's eating just like Kiba used when he was around at that age. It's a bit silly to watch, but I'll be damned if it isn't a little adorable... Akamaru mused, snickering to himself as the sight went on.

More and more, Hunter's pile of scrambled eggs and bacon had shrunken considerably, while that little bump his tummy was making beneath his shirt continued to get larger and larger with the sheer volume of food being consumed in such ample and quick volume. Both Naruto and Kiba's stomachs also continued to bloat with their stuffing their craws, but their plates still carried much more than Hunter's, and both had a bit of a more anxious look, seeing that they were losing to a pup, causing them to try and eat faster.

Then suddenly, little Hunter stopped mid-bite, and grasped his belly with both paws as a look of discomfort grew over his face. Eventually both Naruto and Kiba looked up and noticed, and immediately started smirking smugly. "Hehe, awww, what's the matter? Feeling full already, little fella...?" Kiba taunted. But Hunter didn't respond, and instead, began to whine, causing the smirks on Naruto's and Kiba's faces to vanish as a look of concern grew slowly grew over their faces. "H-hey, you okay?" asked Naurto.

"My tummy hurts..." whined Hunter, as he attempted to massage his aching belly.

I think he got a little too carried away too quick, Akamaru noted. Kiba nodded in agreement and said, "Looks like it." Then; as if a light bulb had gone off in his head, immediately, he smirked and got up from his seat, approaching the little aching pup, earning a curious glance from Naruto. "Hey, what're you up to, Kiba?"

Grinning, Kiba knelt down towards Hunter and rested his hand atop Hunter's tummy and proceeded to gently rub the anthro wolf pup's tummy, as he replied, "Well, he DID say he liked tummy rubs...besides, wolf-person-kid-thing or not, a pup is a pup. Right, Akamaru?" Akamaru barked in agreement.

Almost immediately, the pained expression on Hunter's face vanished, and in its' stead, an almost blissfully goofy smile grew over his muzzle as he opened his jaw and let his tongue hang out slightly, panting as his little tail wagged happily. "Ohhh yeah...that's the spot, right there!" Hunter exclaimed happily as his hind leg began kicking senselessly, earning a laugh from Kiba as he continued.

Watching the scene, albeit dumbfounded, Naruto couldn't help but grin. "Haha, hate to say it, but you were dead on, Kiba. He is adorable," admitted Naruto, earning a chuckle from Akamaru.

Especially like that. Most pups are stupidly cute when they're getting their tummies scratched, noted Akamaru, despite Naruto not understanding a single word of it.

Finally, after some time had passed, "Feeling better?" asked Kiba as he took his hand off the pup's tummy. "Much better!" replied Hunter as he glanced back up at Kiba and beamed happily at the teen. "You're a miracle worker, Kiba! Thanks a bunch" Kiba simply grinned and ruffled the top of the pup's fuzzy head gently, so as not to knock his glasses off. "Heh, anytime, 'kiddo'."

Hunter rubbed the back of his head and giggled as Kiba headed back to his seat, earning a lick from Akamaru. Nice job, buddy.

Even Naruto playfully nudged Kiba in the arm and said, "Y'know, that was pretty nice'uh ya," noted Naruto. Kiba simply shrugged and said, "What can I say? Being a dog-nin means I'm kind of a pro in this department." He then glanced back at Hunter and, more slyly, said, "besides...wouldn't be fair of me to school you and this little fella if his gut's achin'." Immediately, Hunter grinned back and licked his chops. "That's the spirit!" Hunter said eagerly as he rubbed his paws together and pulled his chair back towards the table. "And how about you, Naru-"

Hunter stopped mid-sentence as he saw that Naruto had already resumed stuffing his face with a grin on his face. "H-hey, no cheating!" barked Kiba as he too; resumed stuffing his face competitively. Hunter simply grinned and said, "Get ready to lose, 'old timers'," and immediately, resumed stuffing his little maw with as much food as he possibly could.

Akamaru simply shook his head and smirked to himself. Ehh, as weird as this whole thing may be, at least it's in good fun...

As more time went on...
112112221121111111211221212122121121.title: Hunter gets a tummyache eating too much, too fast.

choices: Hunter finishes his plate and decides to focus on drinking milk
Naruto manages to finish his plate first, prompting Kiba to eat even faster
1121122211211111112112212121221211212.content:
Hunter, though he continued to blissfully cram pawful after pawful of fluffy eggs and crispy bacon into his eager little maw, forced himself to ease up his pace a bit, so as not to suffer another tummyache. As amazing as Kiba's tummy rub had felt, he didn't want to force the dog-nin to keep on getting up just to comfort him....

Taking note of Hunter's more controlled pace, Naruto and Kiba forced themselves to go even faster, eager to get a lead on the hungry little pup. To this end, they forked massive helpings of eggs into their mouths with one hand, and grabbed huge handfuls of bacon in the other. Soon, the entire table was caught up in a frenzy of flying bits of eggs, bits of bacon, and a great deal of chewing and swallowing.

With the pace the three were going at, their stomachs slowly but surely grew even more. Hunter's tummy continued to grow beneath his shirt, the sphere expanding and continuing to stretch the fabric of his tank top. At this rate, it wouldn't be long before it started peeking out.

Naruto and Kiba's bellies, which had already forced their shirts a couple inches above their navels, nonetheless continued to swell as well, growing heavier in their laps, pushing their shirts up more, and forcing apart the few teeth of their flies that were still zipped up.

Hunter, even as he crammed his mouth full of eggs and bacon, took notice of Naruto and Kiba's growing guts, causing him to giggle wildly, his tail wagging happily. Oh wow...look how quick their tummies are growing! He giggled even harder as the thought occured to him. Damn, I forgot how potent this stuff was! He kicked his legs happily, gulping down his current mouthful and rubbing his tummy contentedly. I gotta do this more often! Licking his chops, he grabbed a huge mound of bacon in two hands and brought it up to his face, happily munching on it.

Naruto and Kiba, surprisingly, paused in their eating to stare at the wolf pup happily chowing down on bacon, a huge smile on his muzzle. Seeing just how damn happy he looked, they were both momentarily overcome by just how cute he looked...

At least for a moment.

Regaining his composure, Naruto glanced at Kiba, still staring at Hunter, then at said pup, who was eating his helping of bacon at a surprisingly leisurely pace. Both of them had slowed down, being as occupied as they were. The blonde smirked. Perfect.

Licking his lips, Naruto pulled his plate closer to him, grabbed a fork in each hand, and began shoveling eggs and bacon into his mouth like crazy, not wanting to waste this opportunity. To his surprise, he was able to do this for a full minute or so before someone notice.

Hearing Naruto's noisy eating, Kiba's head whipped toward the blonde, his face contorting in a scowl. "H-hey, no fair!" Growling, he grabbed a fork in each hand as well and began forking food into his mouth, grunting as he did so. "Lousy cheater...."

Hunter took notice as well, but rather than take offense, he beamed happily. Heehee, looks like Naruto got the drop on us. Shrugging, he set his bacon down and smacked his chops. Better get back in the game, but before I do... His eyes scanned the table, lighting up as they fell on a big pitcher of milk. Ah, there we go. Grabbing the pitcher (and struggling a bit with trying to hold it in his smaller paws,) he lifted the tilted the whole thing to his mouth and let the cool liquid flow down his throat. Mmm, whole milk... His tail wagged, and he had to struggle not to giggle as he drank the milk. Yummy!

Soon, Naruto had established a notable lead over Kiba, his plate looking somewhat more depleted than the dog-nin's. Noticing this, Kiba grit his teeth and dove into his plate even more savagely than before. In the meantime, Hunter had depleted the pitcher halfway; setting it down and licking his chops, he burped, giggled, and dove back into his plate.

At this point, their stomachs had grown some more. Naruto and Kiba's shirts were nearly resting on top of their bellies (though Naruto's was a bit higher,) and they'd had to scoot back a bit so their midsections wouldn't be pressing into the table. Predictably, the flame symbol on Naruto's shirt had gotten even more distorted, crinkling up and folding under itself a bit. Hunter's stomach, as a result of the eggs, bacon, and most recently the milk, had swollen noticeably, even forcing his tank top up slightly to reveal a sliver of furry flesh.

Unperturbed by any of this, the three continued shoveling their respective meals into their mouths, with Hunter occasionally pausing to take hearty swigs of milk.

Soon...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212.title: Either Naruto or Kiba takes the lead

choices: Naruto successfully finishes the remaining contents of his plate before Kiba
Kiba catches on and finishes before Naruto can catch up
11211222112111111121122121212212112121.content:
Akamaru occasionally had to duck on account of all the shards of food fragments flying every which way from the table. Shaking his head, he scoffed. There's a wolf pup scarfing down an entire piles worth of eggs and bacon with his bare paws, and he's STILL not the most ravenous eater at this table...that...should say something... But Akamaru's train of thought was interrupted when a whole piece of bacon nailed him in the face. "Oops! S-sorry about that, boy!" called out Kiba sheepishly, despite a mouth full of bacon. Luckily, Akamaru simply sighed and proceeded to snatch the piece by his jaw and immediately wolf it down.

Hunter; however, kept his focus on Naruto, who had since, taken the lead and was nearing the finish. Thinking a little more competitively, the wolf-pup grinned impishly to himself. Hehe, time to turn the cuteness up a few notches...let's see you resist that, Naruto...

And so, as the three continued on, Hunter stopped for a moment and sighed a big, happy sigh. "Boy oh boy! These are the fluffiest, yummiest eggs I've ever tasted!" Hunter exclaimed gleefully as he shut his eyes and smiled a wide, puppy smile and proceeded to happily pat his bloated tummy with both his little paws. All the while wagging his little puppy tail happily and rapidly. Both teens stopped and saw the adorably blissful look on the puppy's face, and almost immediately in unison, both their hearts damn near melted at the scene. But Hunter didn't stop there. Sensing he had both Naruto's and Kiba's attention, he giggled an innocent, childish, happy giggle, and both teens, despite themselves, both went dopey eyed and at the same time, went "Awwww..."

Being a canine himself, Akamaru chuckled to himself and raised an eyebrow at the scene. Okay, now THAT'S unfair...

Hunter opened his puppy eyes and saw the two ninjas practically gawking at him in a trance-like manner. Hehe, gotcha... Hunter thought as he licked his little chops and proceeded to grab more of the remaining contents on his plate. He continued to scarf away unopposed for a good minute, until Kiba and Naruto shook it off and realized that they'd been had. "H-hey, that's not fair!" Naruto complained, but Hunter simply looked up at him innocently, and again, caused his heart to melt, however aware he may have been. "Oooooh, that's low, Hunter...nnng...and positively a-freakin'-dorable...GAAAH!" Snapping himself out of it, Naruto saw that both Hunter AND Kiba were still chomping away, and immediately, he forced himself to scarf away.

The cuteness overload trance Hunter had inflicted on Kiba and Naruto may have been brief, but it was just the edge he needed to regain the lead on Kiba, and Naruto especially, putting him behind Kiba as well, as his plate had depleted even more than the blond's had. Finally, after some doing, Hunter had managed to polish what was once a massive pile of scrambled eggs and crispy bacon, into little more than a few flakes and crumbs.

"Mmmm, that was yummy!" exclaimed Hunter, patting his tummy proudly, burping audibly shortly after, eliciting a giggle from the pup as he licked his chops and turned his attention back to the pitcher of milk still on the table. "Heehee, and now, for an equally yummy drink to wash that all down with!" Hunter struggled again, but managed to pick up the pitcher as he proceeded to drink away. Watching the pup struggle was so obscenely cute a scene, even Akamaru went a little glossy eyed as he chugged away.

Oh, come on, no pup is THAT madly cute...! Akamaru thought, immediately shaking himself out of his trance.

Meanwhile, Naruto glanced back at Kiba, seeing him once again dumbfounded by cuteness, and grinned mischievously as he proceeded to get to work and try to regain his lead on the dog-nin...
11211222112111111121122121212212112121.title: Hunter finishes and shifts his focus on the milk.

choices: Hunter's shorts begin to feel tight
Naruto and Kiba's navels start to feel funny
112112221121111111211221212122121121212.content:
Kiba gaped, still dumbfounded by how damn adorable Hunter looked as he leaned back in his seat, little paws gripping the sides of the oversizedpitcher and pouring the milk down his eager gullet. Heedless of the milk that streamed down the sides of his muzzle, the pup grinned happily as he chugged, tail wagging and legs swinging. His tummy, already having grown a bit more from his polishing off his plate, continued to slowly swell as more and more of the thick, creamy milk entered it, slowly forcing his tank top up higher and exposing more of his brown, furry belly. His gut's kinda getting bigger, Kiba thought in a daze. Wonder if he's gonna need another tummy rub soon... The wolf pup had looked so happy when he'd given him the tummy rub earlier...

Without warning, a piece of egg smacked Kiba in the face. Eh? What the... Scowling irritably, he wiped it off and turned in the direction from where it had flown...and his eyes widened as he saw Naruto shoveling bacon and eggs into his craw as fast as he could. "Naruto?!" Kiba exclaimed, narrowing his eyes. Naruto started a bit mid-mouthful, causing a look of discomfort to grow across his face. Bolting upright, he rapidly pounded his chest. Finally, after the discomfort in his chest had settled and his face eased up, he turned to glare at Kiba. "What the hell was that about, Kiba?!" Naruto demanded of his friend.

Kiba glared back. "Don't give me that crap! You were stuffing your face while I was...um...occupied," he faltered a bit as he got to the last part, but his glare remained intact. From the floor, Akamaru wagged his tail. Trust me, pal, you weren't the only one who was 'occupied'...

Naruto scoffed. "Occupied? Yeah, so was I, but I was man enough to snap out of it!"

Kiba grit his teeth. "Oh, like you weren't 'occupied' for a full minute before you snapped out of it?"

Naruto opened his mouth, but faltered when he realized Kiba had a point; he HAD succumbed to Hunter's cuteness at least a couple of times, and it had taken some effort to snap himself out of it. "Y-yeah, well..."

Kiba smirked. "Heh, thought so." Then, without warning, he turned back towards his plate and resumed shoveling its contents into his mouth.

"H-hey!" Naruto protested, scowling and turning back to his own plate. "No fa---"

At that moment, he made the mistake of looking up and across the table at little Hunter, still guzzling his milk. At this point, his stomach had swollen enough that it had forced his tank top just high enough so it was barely concealing his belly-button, and the pup appeared to be having the time of his life as he shut his eyes and grinned, adjusting his small paws to get a better grip on the pitcher.

Naruto's eye twitched. "Hnnnngh...damn it, Hunter..." the boy cursed to himself, his heart once again turning to goo at the sight.

Seeing this out the side of his eyes, Kiba smirked and went even faster, determined not to lose his new edge. Bacon and eggs flew every which way as more and more was forced down his gullet, his already-swollen belly slowly bulging bigger. His shorts began feeling tight, in spite of the fact that they were unbuttoned and unzipped, but he ignored it.

Eventually, Naruto managed to snap himself out of the cuteness-trance; looking over at his dog-nin friend, he was shocked to see that the plate was already halfway gone. Panicking a bit internally, he leaped back into his own plate, trying frantically to catch up. However, Kiba had gotten far too much of a head start, and by the time Naruto had reduced his own plate halfway...

"Aaah," Kiba sighed, dropping his fork on his now-empty plate and leaning back in his chair. "That was good..." Giving a satisfied burp, he let one arm dangle at his side while his other hand was used to contentedly pat his stomach. Naruto, even with a mouthful of bacon and eggs, gave Kiba the stinkeye. Unperturbed, the dog-nin grinned in response. Even Akamaru glanced up at the two. Heh; nice one, Kiba.

Kiba laughed, reaching down and ruffling the dog's head. "Aww, thanks, boy..." Glaring at the two, Naruto continued digging into his plate, determined to clean it just as thoroughly as Kiba had cleaned his.

In the meantime, Hunter had plunked the now-empty milk pitcher down on the table. His stomach had swollen some more, enough where his tanktop now exposed just enough of his belly for his navel, furred-over as it was, to be visible. "Mmmm," the pup sighed, leaning back in his seat and massaging his belly with both paws. "That was really yummy..." Suddenly, his muzzle flew open and a rather wet-sounding belch escaped. Giggling, he rubbed the back of his head. "Heh; 'scuse me." Licking his muzzle, he sat up in his seat and examined the other three; Kiba was leaning back in his chair and rubbing his belly, which, at this point, forced his shirt to rest entirely on top of it. In spite of this, he was chatting with Akamaru, even as he threw sly looks at Naruto, whose stomach and shirt was in much the same state, as the blonde whittled his plate down to a quarter of what it used to be.

Hunter beamed happily at the sight. Heehee; even stuffed, they're still spirited. He rested his hands/paws on his seat and idly kicked his legs. Come to think of it, I'm still a little hungry too... His eyes widened as an idea occurred to him. Ooh, that'll work, the pup thought, giggling Plus, it'll give me a chance to clear the air a little bit....

Clearing his throat, he sat up a bit straighter in his seat. "Um, guys?" he called out, waving an arm in the air to get their attention.

"Eh?" Blinking, Kiba looked towards Hunter's voice. "What's up?" Naruto, though he was still shoveling what was left of his meal into his mouth, looked up at Hunter as well, privately relieved that the pup wasn't doing something obscenely cute (even if he was pretty damn cute by himself...)

Hunter rubbed the back of his head. "Umm...I was wondering if you guys would wanna maybe do a final round."

Kiba raised an eyebrow. "A final round?" He looked over at Hunter's stuffed tummy. "The bonehead and I could probably manage, but are you sure you can? I mean, you're looking pretty full..."

Hunter shrugged. "Yeah, I guess; but I still got some room left, so it's all good." The pup sighed. "Plus, um...I figured it's only fair I give you guys another chance to beat me, since I kinda cheated." Hunter's ears wilted a bit. "Sorry about that..."

The breath hitched a bit in both Naruto and Kiba's chests at that (even causing the former to swallow and stop eating, having learned from earlier), but they shook it off; rather than deliberately playing up his cuteness like he had previously, Hunter appeared genuinely apologetic.

Naruto was the first to speak up; straightening, he smiled warmly at the pup. "Ah, don't sweat it," the blonde replied amiably. "All in good fun, right?"

Kiba settled for a smirk that was, nonetheless, no less good-natured. "Yeah, and it's not like a certain someone never pulled that on me when he was a pup..." He looked meaningfully down at Akamaru, who gave his very best innocent 'Who, me?' look.

Hunter sighed in relief. Great, they're not mad, the pup mused to himself, tail wagging. Speaking up again, he let a beaming smile spread across his muzzle. "Great! How do sticky buns sound to you guys?" Pulling a platter close to him (he'd identified it by its scent), he tugged the top off to reveal a truly massive mound of sticky buns, each drenched in sweet, sugary glaze and absolutely covered in walnuts and raisins.

Kiba, picking up the scent, had to keep himself from salivating. "Sounds great to me!" Eyes falling on two more platters, he pulled one towards himself and pushed one towards Naruto. The blonde uncovered the platter, revealing another truly massive mound of sticky buns. "Oh wow, these look awesome!" Naruto exclaimed, licking his lips.

Laughing, Kiba took his platter's top off, revealing the same thing as Naruto and Hunter's. "Yeah, and they smell awesome, too!"

Giggling, Hunter drew his plate closer to him, gleefully rubbing his paws together. "Oh boy, these look so yummy..." Looking up, he grinned. "You guys ready?"

Kiba nodded, a determined grin on his face. "You know it!"

Naruto smirked cockily. "May the best man---er, or wolf-person---win!"

As soon as the "win" left Naruto's mouth, all three competitors grabbed a sticky bun in each hand and began taking massive bites out of them, demolishing them in two or three bites. Hardly stopping for breath, they grabbed two more each and all but crammed them into their mouths, chewing rapidly and savoring the sweet flavors.

Akamaru, meanwhile, sighed and settled back down. Ah, great; at this rate, they're all gonna bust they're clothes... the dog's face lit up as pieces of sticky bun fell to the floor, which he snapped up. ....but it's all in good fun, so I guess its fine.

As the three continued to cram sticky buns into their mouths....
112112221121111111211221212122121121212.title: A Winner, and a Sweet Snack

choices: The button came flying off, much to Hunter's relief
Hunter got a tummyache drinking so much with a snagged button
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
All three continued to tear relentlessly into the mouth wateringly delicious sticky buns. Each mouthful was a burst of flavor, as gooey cinnamon and frosting coated each bite, causing the boys and pups' faces to light up as they immediately and eagerly dug in for even more. They were so good that the trio had almost begun to forget how much they'd eaten already....almost...

As the gang continued tearing away, Hunter paused and winced slightly, looking down and feeling his furry belly get a little snug as it bloated to the point where it had started pushing and compressing against the front of his constrictive shorts. Oooh, that smarts a little... Hunter mentally griped, but did his best to shake it off and get back into the action, so as not to fall behind, or again use his natural cuteness as a distraction. "Oh, b-by the way, guys, there's still plenty of pitchers of nice, cool milk to wash these goodies down with, if ya want!" he said in his still youthful and peppy but notably strained voice. Luckily, the others were far too in the zone to take note of that and simply nodded, too enticed by the raw flavor each bite of the sticky buns had provided.

"Man, it's like Ichiraku's...but STICKY bun-ified!" Naruto exclaimed, happily wolfing down two buns, earning a giggle from Hunter, and a look of bewilderment from Kiba. "How?" Kiba asked in a deadpanned manner. "Cause you're stuffing as much of 'em down your gullet as you possibly can?" Naruto snorted and responded with, "No, dog-breathe, because this is the best dessert I've ever eaten...like Ichiraku's is the best ramen I've ever-ah whatever! You get my point! These things taste awesome!" Kiba chuckled. "Heh, for once, I couldn't agree more, bonehead..." He then shoved a big heaping bun into his maw, happily chomping away.

All the while, both Naruto and Kiba's bellies continued to expand outward and outward, forcing them to have to spread their legs apart just to give their gullets breathing room, as they pushed their chairs back even further to compensate for the ever increasing size of their stomachs, and keep from them getting wedged between the table. Meanwhile, Hunter's bloated tummy continued to swell up, as his tanktop rose higher and higher, exposing more of his bloated furry gullet as it continued to swell up with a mixture of sticky buns and milk. As it did, his stomach continued to press further and further against his shorts and zipper. The pain was starting to get a little less than tolerable as he had to force himself to not whine aloud from the tightness it was causing his poor belly.

But things were going so fast, and he didn't want to throw a wrench into the mix or spoil the fun for the others. He had to think fast...

The ideal thing to do would have been to unbutton his shorts and pull his zipper down to give his tummy some much needed breathing room. Unfortunately, his stomach had bloated outward so much that to do so would result in a struggle that would, no doubt, cause him to fall behind, or worse yet, distract the others until one of them sought out to help the poor pup out. And that simply wouldn't do either.

As he pondered and ate at the same time, his stomach was continuing to bloat up more and more, pressing deeper into his button and causing further ache in the little anthro-wolf-pup's midsection. In addition to which, however, he began to feel the button untether from the front of his shorts. And as though a light bulb had gone off in the (currently) young pup's mind, he grinned to himself. Perfect! he thought as he continued to scarf away. Licking his chops of some bun remnants, he eagerly rubbed his paws together, and once again struggled to grab a hold of his pitcher of milk, which; luckily, hadn't distracted the all-too-occupied Naruto and Kiba as the two teens continued to stuff their craws with as much sticky bun bites as their cheeks could possibly fit, to the point where they occasionally looked like squirrels stuffing their cheeks with acorns. Hunter then proceeded to tilt his head back and pull the pitcher of whole milk back up to his little muzzle, ravenously gulping away as tiny dribbles of milk leaked from either side of his fuzzy muzzle.

Gulping one huge mouthful of milk after another, the pup winced as he felt more and more milk fill up his more than occupied belly, as it continued to swell and strain against his shorts. Akamaru looked up and saw the sight, and before he could inquire as to what Hunter was doing, he immediately had a flash to the times he'd watched Naruto do the same thing when having an eating contest with Kiba, and as if a reflex, shook his head and smirked.

Yeah...you've definitely been spending way too much time with Naruto, pup...

But Hunter paid no heed to Akamaru's musing, and continued to chug away as the button on his shorts continued to untether more and more...all the while, still causing more strain on the pup's strained and distended belly, until...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Hunter's shorts begin to feel tight

choices: All three of their navels start to feel funny
Hunter starts to get sleepy
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Hunter's eyes flew wide open as a sudden, sharp pain shot through his belly. Ooh....maybe drinking all that milk with a snagged button wasn't such a hot idea...
