Coughing a bit, he shakily set the pitcher down on the table and leaned back in his chair, paws massaging the sides of his distended belly. He winced as more pain lanced through his midection. Owww....my tummy hurts...

Against his will, a tiny whine escaped his muzzle. It was too low for either Naruto or Kiba, still shoveling sticky buns into their maws, to really notice. Akamaru, however, lifted his head from the floors, ears perking. Eh? Getting to his paws, he stealthily made his way over to where Hunter was sitting. Looking up, he whined as he saw the pup cringing in discomfort, even as his paws ran themselves over his bare tummy. H-Hunter? A-are you alright?

Wincing, Hunter glanced down at Akamaru. "D-don't worry, Akamaru," Hunter replied, giving a weak smile. "I-I just gotta rest a little bit..."

Really? Akamaru woofed skeptically. 'Cause it looks like drinking all that milk gave you a tummyache. His eyes flitted down to Hunter's button; though it had untethered somewhat from the front of his waist, it was still holding fast. Does your button maybe have something to do with it?

Hunter, still wincing, waved a paw dismissively. "Akamaru, seriously, just gimme a second to get my second wind; I'll go right back to drinking the milk, I'll bust my button, and everything'll be..."

A startled yipe suddenly emitted from the little pup's muzzle as another bolt of pain, this one far more severe than the last couple, ripped through his belly. This time, Naruto and Kiba heard it; glancing up from their platters with their mouths full of sticky bun, their eyes widened as they fell upon Hunter in his seat. Gulping his mouthful down first, Kiba addressed Hunter. "Akamaru, what's going on?" he asked, wincing as he caught sight of Hunter. "Is he OK?"

Hunter opened his muzzle to reassure Kiba that nothing was wrong, but Akamaru beat him to it. He's got a tummyache, Kiba; he drank so much milk without unbuttoning his pants that he's hurting.

"Akamaru!" Hunter exclaimed, eyes widening as he looked at the big dog. "I told you, I'm fi---"

Without warning, another bolt of pain, this one stronger than any that came before, stabbed through him. Yelping, he bolted upright, arms wrapping around his gut. "Owww...." Hunter whined. "It hurts..." To the others' alarm, he sniffled, and his eyes grew watery.

Naruto gulped down his mouthful. "H-Hunter?!" he exclaimed, sitting upright.

Hunter gave a strained smile. "G-guys, I'm serious, just go back to---" He winced again and clutched his belly even harder, a tear streaking its way down his fur. Oh great, I'm crying?

Naruto and Kiba both moved to get up from their seats, but were quickly reminded of the size of their bellies; with how cumbersome they'd become, they'd more than likely end up taking a fall en-route to helping the pup, which would only make things worse for the poor kid.

Both teens cursed inwardly; Naruto had only known Hunter for a couple of days, but he'd seen him to be a nice, funny, and considerate (if a little crazy) guy, who had gone to all this trouble just to make things fun and to make him comfortable. Kiba, though he'd only just met Hunter that day, found himself starting to take a bit of a liking to the guy. Neither of them liked the idea that they couldn't do much to help him...

Suddenly, Akamaru perked up. Wait, I have an idea. Why hadn't he thought of it before? He turned to Hunter. Hunter, I want you to burp.

Sniffling, and taking his glasses off so he could wipe his eyes with an arm, Hunter looked at Akamaru quizzically. "H-huh? Whaddaya mean?" The pup inquired, placing his glasses back on his face.

Akamaru barked encouragingly, wagging his tail. Just burp, loud and hard as ya can. The dog winked. Trust me.

Hunter sniffed again. "O-OK, but..." His eyes suddenly widened as he realized what Akamaru was trying to tell him. "Ohhhh, I gotcha," Hunter giggled, feeling his spirits lift a bit. Taking a deep breath, Hunter placed both paws on his belly and began kneading it, ignoring the resultant pain as best he could.

Naruto's eyes widened. "Hunter, what are you..."

"Relax, Naruto." At the dog-nin's comment, Naruto looked over at him. Seeing that he had the blonde's attention, Kiba smirked. "He's got this." He winked at Akamaru, who wagged his tail in response.

Giving Kiba a grateful look, Hunter continued to knead his belly, wincing at the pain but continuing, as he felt the pressure slowly build up in his stomach. Greater and greater it grew, and harder and harder Hunter kneaded his belly, until, finally, the pup opened his mouth wide...

*BURRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAP!*

...and let loose with a surprisingly loud belch for someone of his size and (current) age. His belly vibrated rapidly, and, inevitably, his button finally gave, bursting off the front of his pants with an audible POP and flying over the table, impacting into the wall and bouncing off it, clattering to the floor. Exhaling, Hunter let his arms flop to his sides, and he sank into his seat. "Phew....that feels so much better..." the pup muttered happily, grinning goofily and letting his tongue loll out the side of his muzzle. At the moment, he didn't particularly care that his fly had opened a bit, enough to expose a bit of his red undergarments.

Naruto and Kiba gaped at the sight of the little wolf pup slumped back in his seat, seemingly basking in his relief. "...wow," Naruto spoke up. "That...that's one way to do it."

"Yep," Hunter agreed, forcing himself to sit up again. He turned to Akamaru, beaming. "And it's all thanks to Akamaru." And, before he realized what he was doing, he leaned over and hugged the big dog's neck exuberantly.

Naruto and Kiba's eyes widened at the sight, dumbfounded. Akamaru, especially, froze. Uh....

Opening his eyes, Hunter realized what he was doing. Blushing furiously beneath his fur, he quickly released Akamaru's neck. "S-sorry about that," Hunter stuttered, rubbing the back of his head sheepishly. "I was just so happy, and..."

He was brought up short as Akamaru stepped forward and gave him a great, big lick across the face. Backing up, he barked in amusement as he saw that he'd knocked Hunter's glasses askew and mussed up the fur on his head. You're welcome.

Once he'd properly processed what had happened, Hunter giggled and adjusted his glasses. "Aww, Akamaru..." Giggling, he fixed up the fur on top of his head as best he could. Suddenly getting an idea, he reached out to his plate and seized a sticky bun. "Here ya go; a little token of gratitude." He tossed it toward the big dog, who snapped it up in his jaws. Oh wow, these are really good, Akamaru mused, gulping it down.

Hunter giggled at the sight, before turning his attention back toward the humans. "Sorry about that, guys," he laughed. "Didn't mean to break up the flow or anything..." He grabbed a sticky bun in each paw. "...but there's no reason we can't get back into it!" With that, he crammed both into his hungry little muzzle, chewing with a huge smile on his face.

Not to be outdone, Naruto and Kiba grinned competitively but good-naturedly at the pup and at each other, right before they, too, grabbed more sticky buns and began cramming them into their mouths.

In spite of all this, Akamaru wagged his tail, smiling a doggie smile. Phew...crisis averted. Trotting back over to Kiba (and receiving a ruffle on the head in the process), he sat down and settled in to watch the three.

As the three continued stuffing their faces, and occasionally taking a drink of milk to wash it down...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Hunter got a tummyache drinking so much with a ...

choices: Hunter's belly button goes first
Either Naruto or Kiba bust their navels first
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Akamaru watched with some semblance of amusement as the trio dug deeper and deeper into their trays of sticky buns, occasionally lapping up remnants scattered from the feeding frenzy, or occasionally fed by one of the three. The sheer volume of food consumed had taken quite a staggering tole on the trio and their ever expanding bellies. Both Naruto and Kiba fared about the same, with both their globular guts practically sagging onto their laps and spreading out further and further. Little Hunter's tummy had swollen outward so much that it almost looked as if the pup had swallowed an extra large beach ball. His tanktop had risen well above his furry navel by several inches. Incidentally, the more he ate, the tighter the middle of his stomach felt. Not a painful tightness like with his button, but a...peculiar tightness. Specifically right against his belly button. It was a rather unfamiliar feeling for the pup, but not one that warranted alarm. And so, he disregarded it, and kept on eating.

This went on for some time, with the trio occasionally stopping to catch their breath, massage their tummies, wash down the buns with some milk, or burp to relieve some pressure, and right back into the fray they went. After a little while, both Naruto and Kiba would occasionally glance down at their middle, feeling that odd pressure as well. Hunter caught this and asked, "Everything alright, guys?"

Naruto nodded, still fixated on his own midsection as he massaged it gingerly. "Y-yeah, just feeling some weird pressure in my gut," Naruto replied, earning a nod of agreement from Kiba as he examined his own vastly distended belly. "Same here," he added. Hunter giggled to himself and added, "Me three." And in unison, an impish grin grew over both the teens and pup's faces as all three knew exactly what that universal feeling meant. Haha, ohhhh, this is gonna be EXTRA epic...! Hunter mused internally, as he rubbed his paws together. "Soooo, whadduya suppose we outta do about this?" Hunter asked the two (currently) elder boys. Kiba nudged Naruto slyly, as the blond grinned and replied, "Well...I dunno about you guys," he then grabbed his pitcher of milk, and licked his lips, "but this weird feeling's gonna distract me til I do something about it. How about you, Kiba?"

Kiba grinned and grabbed his own pitcher of milk. "Took the words right outta my mouth, bonehead. What about you, H-" before Kiba could finish, he saw that Hunter was already grabbing another fresh pitcher with both paws, again struggling to pull it up. "I don't think my tummy has ever been that bloated before for that to happen," he replied. Both Naruto and Kiba smiled assuredly at the already eager pup, as Naruto noted, "To be honest, it feels kinda funny at first...but...in a good way, y'know?"

"Yeah, like, tingly...then after a little bit, it's like a huge relief, since it eases soooo much pressure from your stomach in one sudden pop," Kiba added, earning a giggle from Hunter as the image resonated in his younger mind. Then, his grin grew a bit more mischievous as he suggested, "How about we make it interesting then? Let's see which one of us can bust first!"

Both teens grinned, all too eager to take the pup on his little challenge. "Hehe, sounds good to me," Kiba replied. Naruto nodded and grinned competitively. The trio then held their pitchers up in a 'cheers' fashion, and in unison, all three began chugging vigorously. Akamaru simply watched, smirking to himself as he observed the sight, and watched as the three bloated bellies continue to swell up like water balloons being filled up with water...or in this case, ample amounts of whole milk. Then, another thought entered Akamaru's mind.

Ohhhh, please don't let me start batting around at their belly-buttons...this has been a weird enough day already...the last thing I need to add is a big helping of embarrassment to that list...

Nevertheless, Akamaru watched the three youths chug away, almost anxious to see which one of them would go "pop" first, as Kiba so 'delicately' put it...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: All three of their navels start to feel funny

choices: Their navels pop, and all three leap right back into the fray
Their navels pop, but the trio decides to rest instead of continue
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The two ninja and the pup chugged as fast as they could, heedless of the thin streams of milk that ran down the sides of their faces. Their eyes were narrowed in concentration, only taking the briefest of breaks to breath before resuming their guzzling. All the while, their stomachs continued to inflate, and the pressure around their navels slowly increased.

Hunter had to struggle not to giggle as his stomach continued to grow, and the pressure against his belly button increased. It was a peculiar sensation, that was for certain, but again, it was far from painful, or even unpleasant. Hee hee, getting close, I think; pressure's building...

Eager to 'pop' first, Hunter leaned back in his chair and lifted the pitcher higher, pouring the thick, creamy milk at an even faster rate down his waiting gullet. As a result, his stomach began swelling faster, and the pressure in his navel increased even further.

The pup winced, even as he downed the milk at an alarming rate; even if it wasn't painful, the pressure was beginning to get a little uncomfortable, and his stomach was starting to feel extremely full and stretched. Probably how a balloon feels right before it bursts, Hunter thought to himself. Ironically, this gave him the drive he needed to keep drinking; after all, if his belly was starting to feel this tight, he probably didn't have much further to go...

Faster and faster the milk flowed, and tighter and tighter his stomach began to feel. Hunter winced again, but forced himself to continue. Almost...there... Bigger and bigger his stomach grew, and tighter and tighter the pressure became. Eventually, his ridiculously distended midsection felt as though it would bust with the tiniest provocation. Wagging his tail and smirking, Hunter took one last gulp of the milk, plunked the pitcher down on the table, and as that last mouthful entered his already-swollen belly...

*POP*

...the pup felt a sudden, almost explosive release of pressure around his navel, followed by a rather strange sensation. He raised an eyebrow quizzically. "Huh, my tummy's feeling kinda tingly..." he said aloud, looking down at his globular gut. Naruto and Kiba, despite the growing pressure in their own navels, set their pitchers down to look at the pup...and their eyes promptly widened.

Hunter, preoccupied with looking at his own stomach, nonetheless mirrored their expressions. Instead of the fuzzy little pit of a belly-button he'd had all his life, he now had a rather noticeable, fur-covered nub sticking out from the center of his overstuffed tummy. Wow,, the pup thought, still staring at his navel. My belly button actually popped out... Curiously, he reached a finger out and wiggled it a bit. At this, a feeling that could only be described as both ticklish and tingly erupted...

...and the pup promptly burst into a fit of giggles. "Heehaha! That feels funny!" Still giggling, he retracted his paw, grinning widely as he saw his distended navel still wobbling about. "Lookit the way it's wobbling! It looks so funny!" He reached his paw toward his navel again and continued to wiggle it, burst into even more raucous laughter as the tingly/ticklish sensation once again permeated his belly. "Haha! Oh man, this feels great!" His tail wagged rapidly behind him, and his legs kicked rapidly (or as best they could, given his practically beach ball-sized belly).

Eventually, he stopped giggling and took a deep breath to compose himself...and his eyes lit up. "Oh, wow!" he exclaimed, placing both paws on either side of his fully-exposed belly. "You guys were right; there's practically no pressure anymore!" Beaming so wide his eyes squinted shut, he began shaking his belly (and navel along with it), giggling through his teeth as he continued to kick his legs.

Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru, for their part, could only gape at the anthro wolf-pup, happily playing with his overstuffed belly, only stopping to wiggle his navel. All the while, he giggled uproariously, appearing to have the time of his life. Through all of this, they could only think one thing:

Damn it, is he trying to kill us?

Eventually, Hunter settled down; retracting his arms from his belly, he slid back in his chair, folding his arms behind his head and tilting his head back. "Oh man, that felt great," the pup exclaimed, sticking his tongue out the side of his muzzle. "I really gotta do that more often!"

Naruto, remembering himself, grinned. "Heh; told ya." He looked over at the many sticky buns still left on Hunter's plate. "By the way, are you done, or are you still gonna eat?"

Hunter smirked, wagging his tail. "Yeah, buuut I think I'll wait a few minutes." He winked at the two. "I wanna see the show, first."

It only took Kiba a moment to realize what "the show" was, and grinned. "Heh, sounds good." He turned to Naruto. "Whaddaya say, dummy? I dunno about you, but I don't wanna disappoint the kid."

Naruto smirked in response. "Took the words right outta my mouth."

Grinning at Hunter, then at each other, they each grabbed their pitchers of milk and resumed guzzling. Hunter, even as he leaned back in his chair, watched the two boys with rapt attention. As he did so, he wiggled his navel again, giggling a bit at the tinglish (tingly/ticklish) sensations. Heh heh, this is fun!

As the two ninja were drinking at a rather rapid pace, it wasn't long before...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Hunter's belly button goes first

choices: Someone finishes their buns first
All three finish the their buns at the same time
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Hunter; still occasionally wiggling his inverted navel and eliciting a gleeful giggle, much to Akamaru's amusement, nonetheless focused the majority of his attention on Naruto and Kiba as both boys continued to chug relentlessly, as their already stupendously bloated midsections swelled out more and more with each passing gulp. There was a notable strain on the faces of both young ninjas, but neither one was willing to lose to the other, and both could feel that the pressure that building up more and more, signifying that the end of their little venture was inching nearer and nearer.

And so, they chugged their respective pitchers of milk, as that odd tension in the middle of their bellies grew greater and greater. Both teens occasionally glared at each other a bit competitively, and then shortly after, lifted their pitchers up higher as they tilted their heads back more to accommodate as gravity forced more milk down their throats at a quicker rate. Like with before, a bit of milk would trickle down either side of both their mouths, but they paid no heed, and opted to keep going, even as the pressure became greater and greater...until finally...

*POP!*

In unison, both boys flinched as their navels each inverted to outies at the same time, wobbling outward comically from their greatly rounded bellies. Hunter giggled hysterically as he began to happily clap his paws together. "Haha, oh wow! I didn't think they'd both come out at the same time! That was totally epic!" cheered the little pup eagerly. Even Akamaru couldn't help but snicker at the comical sight, or turn of events that led to said sight. I really shouldn't be surprised that they tied. Again. Literally, no matter how hard these two try, they're always toe-for-toe in any competition they have against each other...ever....

Both Naruto and Kiba set their pitchers down and sighed great sighs of relief as they gasped for breath and leaned back in their chairs, resting their arms atop their tummies, causing them and their inverted navels to bounce a bit. Giving his gut a hearty pat, Kiba belched loudly and wiped his mouth with his forearm. "Phew! Oh man, I forgot how much of an actual relief that is on a fuller-than-full stomach!" He then grinned to himself and saw that Naruto, rubbing his belly gingerly with both hands as his own belly button had popped as well, and judging from the reception they were receiving from Hunter and Akamaru, it was safe to assume neither one beat the other. "Lemme guess...we tied...again..."

Akamaru barked in acknowledgement, as Hunter giggled and chirped in, "Yup! Sure did!"

"Hehe, ahhh whatever. Least you enjoyed the show," Kiba responded, giving the pup a wink. Naruto nodded in agreement, and was about to respond, but froze up as he felt a rush of warmth rising up his throat, and as soon as he opened his mouth...

*BBBUUUUUUUUURRRRRRAAAAAAAAPPPPPP!!*

Naruto accidentally let out a massive, queasy sounding belch, causing his belly and inverted navel to wobble from the sheer force, much to Hunter's amusement. When it was done, Naruto chuckled sheepishly as Hunter burst into a fit of childish giggles. "Heh, s'cuse you, bonehead," joked Kiba as he playfully nudged the bloated blond's shoulder.

"Oh man, I don't think I've ever drank that much milk in my entire life," remarked Naruto, stifling another burp as he soothingly patted his stomach. Clearing his throat, he smirked with a hint of relief on his face and looked back at his platter of sticky buns still remaining. "Well, I dunno about you guys, but all that belly-button popping and burping's left my gut with room to spare..." said Naruto as he grinned back at the two and added, "Whadduya say we polish the rest of these bad boys off?"

Hunter sat up right, (best as he could, given his comically bloated tummy), rubbed his itty bitty paws together eagerly and licked his muzzle. "Sounds yummy!" Kiba also grinned and said, "Yeah, I guess I got some room now. Who knows? Maybe this time, I'll actually beat you..."

Naruto glanced back at him a bit more competitively as he grinned confidently and said, "Guess we'll see..." He then turned his attention back to Hunter and a bit more playfully, added, "All I know is, I'm watchin' out for this lil fella. He already put away all his eggs and bacon first, and popped first!" Kiba turned his attention onto the pup and nodded in agreement. "Fair point, bonehead...fair point. If we're not careful, this kid might top us three times in a row..."

But Hunter just giggled and rubbed the back of his head bashfully, and said, "Awww, you guys are too much! Luckily, it's anyone's game!" Both teens nodded eagerly as they turned their attention to the buns. "Well then, may the best man...or wolf-person win!" added Naruto, and like before, with the word win, all three immediately dug right into the remainder of their respective sticky buns, each one grabbing a pair and wolfing them down with newfound vigor.

All the while, their swollen bellies and inverted navels wobbled with each bite and motion, earning a snicker from Akamaru as he found his paw reaching outward, as if swatting at the wobbly appendage...and immediately, he stopped and put his paw down, flushing with embarrassment beneath his white fur.

Smooth, furball....reaaaal smooth...

As time went on, the trio ate and ate, as they began to steadily deplete their platters, occasionally stopping to catch their breath or wash down the buns with whatever milk they each had left in their pitchers, until finally...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Their navels pop, and all three leap back into it

choices: Hunter wakes up first and eagerly rouses the others to go out
Naruto and Kiba wake up first, and gently rouse Hunter
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Akamaru marveled at how quickly the three had managed to deplete their platters; in a matter of minutes since resuming their contest, they had picked their plates almost completely clean, leaving only three or four on each platter. In spite of himself, the dog found himself watching intently; whatever the outcome was, it was gonna be close. Evidently, the same thought ran through the minds of the boys and pup; throwing determined, competitive grins at one another, they each reached out toward their plates, grabbed them...

...and proceeded to tilt them back, dumping the remaining few buns into their waiting maws. Akamaru gaped for a moment before shaking his head. <i>Yyyyyyyyeeeaaahhh, not really surprised at all...</i>

Slamming their plates back down, the three chewed their massive mouthfuls as hard as they could. When that failed to get them down to a swallow-able size, they seized their pitchers, hoisted them up, and proceeded to pour as much into their mouths as they could, heedless of the milk that splattered around them. Their cheeks, already bulging with the contents of the remaining buns, swelled out even more as more and more milk entered them. Akamaru watched, dumbfounded, as they kept at it, despite the obvious discomfort on their faces. <i>Oh man....they better swallow soon, or we're gonna have a big mess on our hands...or paws...</i>

Thankfully, just when it looked like their cheeks had reached maximum capacity, Naruto, Kiba, and Hunter steeled themselves and took a mighty gulp, somehow forcing the mass of chewed-up sticky bun and milk down their throats, causing them to wince as they did so. Letting the now-empty pitchers clatter to the table, the three leaned back in their chairs, put their hands on their comically overstuffed tummies, and let out a loud, satisfied belch each...before their eyes blinked open, and they looked across the table at each other, their eyes wide. Akamaru, realizing what had just happened, shook his head, wagging his tail. <i>Yeah, not surprised by that, either...</i>

Naruto (big surprise) was the first to speak up. "Um...was it just me, or..."

"Yep," Kiba spoke up, patting his belly heartily and causing it and his inverted navel to wobble. "We all finished at the same time."

Little Hunter, rubbing his tummy and looking down at the overstuffed, furry appendage, giggled as his ministrations caused his belly to slosh a bit from his ministrations. "Heh, imagine that, huh?" He beamed, looking up at the two. "You guys musta been real determined to beat me, huh?"

Naruto scowled playfully. "Yeah, rub it in, why don't ya?"

Hunter tilted his head. "Hey, I was trying my hardest to make it three for three; I was going all-out, too." He beamed again, wagging his tail. "I'm impressed, guys; really." Then, to their surprise, he curled one of his paws into a fist and reached it across the table. Getting his message immediately, the boys smiled and bumped their fists with his. "Good game."

Kiba smirked. "Heh, same to you, little fella."

Hunter giggled. "Aw, thanks!"

Suddenly, the little pup tilted his head back, letting loose with a massive yawn.

Naruto chuckled, even as he felt his own eyes beginning to droop a bit. "Heh...tired, Hunter?"

Hunter nodded, licking his muzzle. "Heh, yeah." He give his midsection a hearty pat with both little paws. "All the food that's packed in my tummy's makin' me feel a little sleepy." His eyes lit up. "But, before I doze off..." Reaching to his side, he seized one of the vials of green fluid, uncapped it, and knocked it back, much as he had done earlier.

Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru's eyes all flew wide open. "H-Hunter?!" Naruto exclaimed. "What are you..."

Hunter waved a paw dismissively. "Relax; this lovely little concoction doesn't regress you past this stage." He beamed. "All it does is tack on more hours to how long it lasts."

Kiba gave the pup the stinkeye. "And you didn't tell us this because..."

Hunter grinned impishly. "Where's the fun in that?" The pup giggled, kicking his feet a bit. "Besides, I don't wanna go back to normal while I'm sleeping and rip these clothes." Before Kiba or Naruto could respond, Hunter yawned again, this time more widely than before. "Mmm...better go lay down before I fall asleep in the chair." Turning himself around and supporting his tummy with both arms, he hopped down from the chair. As soon as his legs/back paws hit the floor, he stumbled and staggered, the weight of his engorged belly threatening to pull him down. Luckily, he was able to right himself. Sighing in relief, he waddled over to the futon he'd slept on the previous night, turned around so his back was facing it, and promptly flopped backward, his his belly wobbling as it surged up into the air. Splaying his arms out to the sides, he smiled, shut his eyes, and took a deep breath. Within a matter of seconds, the gentle, rhythmic movement of his belly expanding and contracting with his breathing signified that he'd fallen asleep.

Naruto and Kiba smiled warmly. "Awww...look at him," Naruto said, his chest warming as a blissful smile spread across the sleeping pup's muzzle. "He looks even cuter like that..."

Kiba's eyes widened as the pup opened his mouth and unconsciously put the thumb of one of his paws inside it. "Y-yeah..." Without taking his eyes off Hunter, he pounded his chest a little bit, sighing in relief as he felt his heartbeat resume its normal rate. "He is..."

Eager to shake off the odd look Naruto was giving him, Kiba yawned widely, stretching his own arms. "Well, he definitely has the right idea; I could go for a nap about now." Grabbing his belly with both arms, he staggered off his chair. Akamaru, taking the hint, trotted off towards the opposite side of the bed and plopped down. Nodding and smiling at his buddy, Kiba made his way over to the dog, practically sinking into a sitting position and leaning against him once he'd reached him.

Naruto, also yawning, cradled his belly in the same fashion and waddled toward the bed, flopping onto his back once he reached it. "G'night...or morning," Naruto mumbled, closing his eyes.

Kiba nodded, also letting his eyes shut. "Whatever...see ya in a few hours."

Within a matter of minutes, all the occupants of the room were fast asleep, sleeping off their massive meals. Naruto snored loudly, a bit of drool tracing a line down the corner of his mouth. Kiba was leaning against Akamaru, his arms lain along the dog's body as though he were a bench. Hunter, still smiling in his sleep, had one arm sticking out the side, while the other was held close to his chest, sucking his thumb without a care in the world. All of their bellies gurgled as they began to digest the massive quantities of food they had ingested.

Later on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: All three finish the their buns at the same time

choices: Hunter decides to stay a pup for a little longer
Hunter decides to let himself return back to normal
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
After several hours of resting up, Kiba groaned and finally woke up, still leaning idly and peacefully against Akamaru. He slowly rubs his eyes tiredly, so as not to wake Akamaru, who was still resting peacefully atop the bed. He looked down and scratched his stomach, feeling it had shrunken considerably since the hours prior. "Least I can actually move around this time," Kiba joked groggily as he turned his attention to Naruto, who was still sprawled on his own bed, snoring like a goon. Laughing to himself, he nudged Naruto awake, causing him to groan and grumble in annoyance. "Hey, wake up, you living noise box," Kiba said, still tired. Eventually, Naruto mumbled in annoyance and eventually woke, stretching back as he yawned heartily, rubbing his eyes.

Kiba smirked, despite his own tired state. "Morning to you too, sunshine." Naruto just nodded, barely conscious, then rubbed his stomach absent mindedly. "Ohh man, did I need that," Naruto said, lifting up his shirt, to see his own stomach had also shrunken to little more than a small little bulge in his lower belly from the sheer volume of food consumed. Dropping his shirt back down, he smirked and asked, "So how's the little champ holding up?"

Immediately, both boys turned and immediately, went doughy eyed as they say Hunter nuzzled snug atop his bed, with his little paw covering his face, but not enough to hide a puppy smile across the little fella's muzzle. Naruto nudged Kiba and grinned, "Holdin' up okay there, Kiba?" Kiba cleared his throat, trying his best to keep a tough image up. "Huh?! Eh-er, y-yeah! Why wouldn't I, bonehead? A-anyway, we better wake him up before that formula of his wears off," Kiba responded, doing his best to maintain composure. He then saw Hunter's blissful state, and again, his heart started melting. Awww, I almost feel bad waking him up when he looks so freakin' peaceful'n cuddl-

"...D-did I almost just say cuddly...?" Kiba muttered to himself...forgetting he was thinking that, and not saying that, and subsequently, earning a raised eyebrow and bewildered gaze from Naruto, who turned to him and in a deadpanned voice, asked, "...did you almost say what now?" Coughing nervously, Kiba regrouped and said, "Eh, h-hey, the longer we wait, the sooner his formula might wear off! You want round two of streaking wolf person in full adult form, bonehead?"

Immediately, Naruto grimaced, realizing Kiba had a point. So, much as he'd have loved to continuing hazing the dog-nin, the two stepped over towards the little wolf pup, just glancing down at the little fella for a few seconds longer, until Kiba; being the dog-nin and canine expert, gently nudged the little pups' shoulder. "Rise and shine, sleepy." After some doing, Hunter's eyes fluttered open as he squinted up at the two (currently) older boys and smiled happily; albeit tiredly. "Mmmph, mornin', fellas!" Hunter beamed as he sat up and stretched his little arms up, and as if on reflex, yawned a youthful high pitched puppy yawn.

Now, Kiba was already smiling like a dope at the sight, but hearing that just too much for the young dog-nin, try as he might to maintain a tough-guy image, particularly around Naruto, but upon hearing that cute little sound, as if a reflex, Kiba said...

"Awwwwwww...."

Naruto started snickering. "Wow, Kiba, hehe, I knew you were a big softy, but...wow..." Hunter, on the other hand, simply giggled childishly and rubbed the back of his head bashfully. "Awww, hehe, you're too much, Kiba!" Hopping out of bed, Hunter examined his own tummy, and discovered it had shrunken a hefty amount, due to his much faster metabolism, to the point that there was little more than a tiny barely noticeable bulge contained beneath his tanktop.

And as if on cue, said pup's tummy then growled hungrily. Followed swiftly by both Naruto and Kiba's stomachs. "Hehe, sounds like the three of us can use some breakfast in our tummies to top the day!" Hunter exclaimed, happily patting his tummy with both paws. To Kiba's surprise though, a thought had occurred to him, which he felt compelled to address...

"Soooooo, lil fella...I guess that potion stuff-err-whatever's gonna be wearing off fairly soon, right?" Looking away and rubbing the back of his head almost embarrassed, he asked, "...You gonna be taking another hit of that stuff, or...?"

Hunter thought for a moment...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Naruto and Kiba wake up, and gently rouse Hunter.

choices: They decide to find a place that has a discount for eating with kids
They decide to forgo a normal lunch and get desserts instead
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Hunter looked up at the two, beaming happily. "Eh, I think I'll stay like this for a little longer; it's a lotta fun, ya know?" Still smiling, the pup clambered to his feet and made his way back over to the table (holding his button-less shorts up along the way so they didn't fall down), where the empty plates and the vials of the formula still laid out. With a "hup!", he clambered up onto the chair, grabbed one of the vials, and uncapped it. Before tilting it to his mouth, though, he smirked at the two boys. "You sure you guys don't wanna try? It'd be fun!"

Kiba laughed, rubbing the back of his head. "Aw, thanks, little fella, but, uh, I might hold off on it for a bit." He smirked back at the pup. "Still hafta get used to the idea, ya know?"

Hunter shrugged. "Fair enough." He looked toward the blonde. "Naruto?"

The blonde laughed, folding his arms behind his head. "Ehhh, I'm with Kiba; being a kid again could be fun, but I'm still a little weirded out by the idea." The boy laughed again, but this time, Akamaru, Kiba, and Hunter's eyebrows all raised. Something about the laugh was oddly...forced.

Deciding to think on it later, Hunter smiled. "Alright." Licking his chops, he raised the vial to his muzzle and knocked it back. Letting it clatter to the table, he licked his chops again. "Still, I got plenty of that stuff left; not just here, but in my bag too." The pup beamed, wagging his tail. "If ya change your minds, don't hesitate to..."

C-can I try?

Kiba's eyes widened at the sound of Akamaru's voice. He looked towards his buddy, giving him a surprised glance. "A-Akamaru?"

Akamaru shrugged his shoulders. I dunno; I guess just seein' how energetic and playful he is like this just kinda reminded me of what it was like when I was a pup, and you were still in the Academy. I was just kinda curious to see what it'd be like to be a pup again. The dog whined a bit. St-still, if you don't think it's a good idea...

Chuckling, Kiba ruffled his pal's head. "Aw, go for it, Akamaru!" He smiled as he saw the dog's eyes widen and his tail wag. "Only reason me and the dummy aren't doing it's 'cause we ain't ready just yet." He smirked. "No reason you can't give it a go!"

Naruto's eyes widened as they focused on Kiba and Akamaru. "W-wait, Akamaru's actually gonna..."

"Yep," Kiba answered, giving his pal an encouraging pat on the back. Giving a grateful bark, Akamaru licked Kiba's hand and trotted over to Hunter, tail wagging eagerly. A huge grin split the pup's face.

"Attaboy, Akamaru, that's the spirit!" Grabbing one of the vials, he uncapped it and motioned for Akamaru to sit down. The giant dog obliged, to which Hunter grinned even wider. "Alright, Akamaru; now just open wide..."

Tail wagging eagerly, Akamaru tilted his head back a bit and did as he was asked, opening his maw wide. Giggling, Hunter then extended his arm and upended the vial over the dog's open mouth, emptying the whole thing in.

Akamaru's tail wagged even faster as his tongue rapidly lapped up the liquid. Once the last of it had vanished down his gullet, he gave Hunter a grateful lick (eliciting a giggle from the pup) and trotted back over to Kiba.

Kiba gave his buddy an expectant smirk. "So, ya feeling anything?"

Akamaru smacked his chops. Not just yet, but it took Hunter a few seconds to...

The dog's responding bark was cut off by a startled whine. Concerned, Kiba asked, "You alright, boy?"

Akamaru nodded. Yeah; I just feel kinda funny...

No sooner had this left the dog's mouth than his body began to feel rather warm...and he felt himself slowly begin to shrink.

Naruto's eyes widened. "Wh-whoa!"

Kiba's own eyes shot open, tinged with concern. "Akamaru?!"

Indeed, before their very eyes, they saw the massive dog slowly begin to grow smaller. His well-muscled limbs thinned and shortened, his entire body following suit.

Akamaru looked up, and yelped a bit when he saw the room and its occupants beginning to grow. W-wow... Looking down at himself, he marveled as he grew smaller, his body losing the muscles and tone it had gained over his time as Kiba's partner. As he grew smaller and smaller, his eyes widened as the room seemed to grow even bigger.

Naruto and Kiba watched, awestruck, as Akamaru continued to grow younger, marveling at the sight, while Hunter merely rubbed his paws together gleefully and giggled. Finally, after about a minute or so, Kiba gaped at the sight before him; in place of the gigantic dog that had accompanied him was a tiny, white-furred puppy, much as he'd been during their first year in the Academy. Said pup looked up at Kiba, eyes widening at how much bigger his buddy seemed to have gotten, then slowly spun around in place, taking in the room and the furniture that now appeared positively monolithic. Then, he stopped, and gave himself a once-over. I-I can't believe it...I-I'm actually a pup again...

Naruto was the first to break the silence. "Wow...never thought I'd see Akamaru like that again..." A smile spread across his face. "Almost forgot how cute he used to be..."

Giving only a small nod in acknowledgement, Kiba knelt down so he didn't tower over Akamaru quite as much. "Akamaru?" Kiba inquired, examining his pal closely. "How ya feeling?"

The little pup looked up at Kiba, then down at the floor, internally debating. Hmm...how do I feel... Then, without warning, he felt a burst of something. Looking back up at Kiba, he took a breath...

...and let loose with a series of happy puppy barks. Kiba, I feel amazing! the puppy yapped, little tail wagging at breakneck speed. It's... I dunno how to describe it! Without warning, he darted to one end of the room, then the other, Kiba following his movement. A smile slowly broke out across the dog-nin's face. I have so much energy! he barked again, practically running in place. His butt began wiggling along with his tail. Everything seems so fresh and bright! It's like I don't have a care in the world!

Hunter giggled, hopping down from his chair and making his way back over to his duffel. "Heh, it's great, isn't it?" He shucked his broken shorts (revealing that he was wearing red boxers with multiple full moons plastered over it) and rooted through his bag, retrieving a pair tan khaki shorts and slipping them on.

At this point, Kiba's smile widened into a full-on grin. Not wasting any time, he extended his arms toward the pup. "Aw, c'mere, Akamaru!"

He hardly needed to be told twice; Akamaru sprang toward Kiba, aiming for his chest. The young dog-nin caught him, laughing joyously. "Heh, lookit you!" Still laughing, he stood back up, gently grabbed hold of Akamaru with both hands, and plopped him on top of his head.

Naruto laughed. "Heh, never thought I'd see that again either..."

Looking up at Akamaru, Kiba smiled. "Comfy up there, boy?"

Akamaru yipped happily in response, wagging his tail. Really comfy! Man, this takes me back...

Suddenly, a rather audible growling cut through the air as Naruto, Kiba, and Hunter's stomachs made it known that they still needed food. Rather than blushing, the wolf pup trotted over to the three, tail wagging eagerly. "C'mon, what're we just waiting around here for? Let's go get something to eat!" Practically prancing toward the door, opened it, and promptly zipped out on all fours.

Kiba, let's race him! Akamaru barked excitedly, tail wagging. Laughing, Kiba nodded and took off after the pup (making sure to re-button his shorts, of course...)

Naruto grinned. "Oh, no way you guys are beating me!" Re-buttoning his own shorts, Naruto zipped out the door after them.

As they made it out of the inn...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: A dog joins in

choices: Naruto or Kiba
Hunter again
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The trio and pup continued to sprint onward, joyously, and competitively, with little Hunter taking the lead on all fours, Kiba trailing just behind him with Akamaru firmly atop his head, panting happily, and Naruto, trying to catch up. Eventually, all four make it to the park, panting and laughing amongst themselves. "Haha, ohhh man, I haven't done that in ages!" gasped Kiba, earning a strained laugh from Naruto. "Tell me about it...forgot how much fun racing about was...don't think I've done it since I was..."

"A kid?" pepped Hunter gleefully as he rose to his feet (hind paws) and adjusted his glasses atop his muzzle, tail wagging vigorously as he did. Naruto chuckled and rubbed the back of his fuzzy head. "Yeah, I guess..."

Akamaru barked happily. Still got it, eh, old man? Kiba just laughed, still trying to catch his breath, then reached atop his head to ruffle the little pup's head playfully. "Heh, I'm just glad you were able to hang on, boy!" Naruto grinned impishly and replied, "Well, it's not like you were running THAT fast..." To which, Kiba turned and; with a sly grin himself, replied, "Faster than YOU, bonehead." Hunter snickered to himself, as did the pup atop Kiba's head. Naruto, however, immediately scowled and said, "Hey, you guys had a head start! If I had-"

His griping was cut short when his stomach once again chimed in, reminding him how hungry he was. Resting a palm against his stomach, Naruto chuckled and said, "Ah, whatever...I'm too hungry to care. Where do you guys feel like eating?" Hunter looked around, still trying to figure that out himself. "Good question..."

Then, Kiba's face lit up. "Y'know, there's this steak joint not far from here! I dropped by once...y'know, since they didn't seem to mind having a giant dog in the restaurant..."

Well, didn't mind...after a while... Akamaru chimed in, earning a nervous chuckle from Kiba as he recalled the first time he recalled the faces of the wait staff and patrons seeing the young dog-nin and his gigantic canine companion drop by...

"A-anyway, I was thinkin' about that place cause if memory serves, it's got a great discount for kids, and like this, I think you could get tons of way less than you would in your regular form...plus I'm really craving meat..."

Hunter's tail wagged at the idea as he smiled and said, "Sounds like a great idea, Kiba! And I think my wallet agrees with you!" As if to add to that, his tummy growled hungrily as he giggled and added, "...and I guess my tummy thinks it's a great idea too!" Both Kiba and Naruto couldn't help but laugh at the remark, but nevertheless, they were starving...however, Naruto being Naruto...

"Hold up, guys. I just thought of something," he said. "Say, Kiba, this is the place by that Sundae place, right? Remind me again, how far is that?" Kiba shrugged and replied, "Eh, probably about a five minute walk from here. Why?" Naruto immediately grinned mischievously and answered. "Cause I think I just got my second wind!"

As soon as the word 'wind' left the boys' mouth, he was trailblazing off, much to the surprise of the others. "H-hey, no one said-" before Kiba could finish, Hunter grinned, and sprinted off, before picking up momentum and prancing off on all fours.

Akamaru leaned down from atop Kiba's head and barked, Well? We griping or we racing?

Unable to suppress a big competitive grin, Kiba chuckled and said, "Hold on tight, boy...cause we're goin' for the gold!" And immediately, he charged onward.

The trio raced on, until reaching their destination, and the one who reached it first was...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: They find a place that has a discount for kids

choices: "We'll take a 72 oz ribeye each; one for Akamaru, too!"
"Can we get an appetizer first?"
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Kiba dug his heels into the ground, skidding to a stop in front of their destination. Panting, he nonetheless grinned and looked up at the pup on his head. "Haa...haa...whaddaya think, Akamaru?"

Panting happily, the pup wagged his tail exuberantly. Oh man, that was awesome! Almost forgot what it was like to be in the passenger seat...

Kiba chuckled, reaching a hand up and ruffling the dog's fur. "Heh, well, since you seemed to be enjoying that formula, figured it was the least I could do to give ya a little taste of nostalgia..."

As Kiba continued ruffling Akamaru's fur, Hunter came rushing up behind Kiba, still going full tilt on all fours. Eyes widening as he realized what was about to happen, the anthro-wolf pup dug all four paws into the ground, causing him to skid along the ground...

...right into the back of Kiba's legs, completely arresting his movement. Feeling this, the dog-nin looked down. "Hey, the hell was...Hunter?"

Said pup yelped and fell backward, his glasses askew. Whining, he massaged his muzzle, wincing a bit. Somewhat concerned, Kiba turned around and knelt down. "H-hey, you OK?"

Still massaging his muzzle, Hunter sat up. "Owowowowow...." One paw still massaging his snout, he reached his other one up to his face to adjust his glasses.

Akamaru raised an eyebrow. Uh, Hunter...?

Hunter, still rubbing his muzzle with both paws (having successfully adjusted his glasses), looked up at the dog-nin and his tiny partner. In spite of the ache in his snout, he managed a smile. "Y-yeah, I'll be fine; a tender muzzle ain't the worst injury I've ever gotten." That would go to that incident from a few years back... He scowled a bit, even as he continued tending to his muzzle. Ghirahim, you crazy bastard; no sense of personal space...

Kiba smiled, a bit relieved. "Heh; if you're sure...."

At the sound of a third set of feet approaching, Kiba looked up, smirking. "Oh, hey, Naruto; nice of you to join the party."

Ears perking up, Hunter turned his head and looked up as Naruto skidded to a stop beside them, panting as he bent over and rested his hands on his knees. "Hi, Naruto!" Hunter chirped as he removed his paws from his muzzle, the pain having mostly subsided. "Little tired there?" Snickering, he clambered to his hind paws, dusting himself off as he did so.

Still panting, Naruto looked at the wolf pup and scowled. "Sh-shut up...I-I just got done sleeping off a huge meal..."

Standing up, Kiba smiled impishly, planting his hands in his pockets. "So did we, dummy; didn't stop us from beating you." Akamaru barked his agreement, wagging his tail from his perch.

Giggling, Hunter folded his arms behind his head. "Heehee, and to think you got a head start, too..."

Eyes flying open Naruto stood upright and pointed angrily at Hunter. "Oh, what are you so damn smug about, wolf-boy? You came in second!"

Hunter grinned, sticking his tongue out at the blonde. "But I still beat you. Nyeh nyeh!"

A vein bulged in Naruto's forehead. "Why you...!" Opening his eyes, Hunter yiped at Naruto's expression. A bit shocked at just how worked up Naruto had gotten, he stepped back, taking a breath in through his nostrils...

...and immediately froze, eyes widening. "Whoa..." he muttered. His alarm forgotten, he turned toward the source of their smell, which happened to be their destination. Blinking, he lifted his muzzle to the air and took another whiff, causing his tail to start wagging. "Mmm....smells great..."

Knowing exactly what Hunter was smelling, Kiba turned toward the building-a decently sized establishment, all told-and did the same. "Oh yeah...this is the place..."

Akamaru, yipping happily, looked down at Kiba from his perch. Kiba, Kiba, can I get a steak too?

Laughing, Kiba scratched Akamaru's ears, causing the pup's hind legs to kick happily through his hair. "Sure thing, pal!" He turned toward the still-seething Naruto. "C'mon, Naruto; those steaks aren't gonna eat themselves!" Licking their lips (and muzzles) in anticipation, Kiba, Hunter, and Akamaru made their way through the doors.

Spluttering, Naruto tried to come up with some sort of retort. "I--but---you---GAAAH!" Grasping at his hair and gritting his teeth, the blonde barged in through the doors after them.

Once inside, he saw that Hunter was already talking to the waiter at the front desk. The man's eyes widened at the sight of the humanoid wolf pup, and even more so as they fell on the tiny pup resting on Kiba's head. He could have sworn the pup had been a full-grown dog the last time he and his Inuzuka partner had been here...

Naruto, in spite of himself, snickered. Heh, that guy doesn't know WHAT to make of this whole thing...

In spite of his confusion, the waiter led the group to a rather nice-sized booth, took their initial orders for drinks (a bowl of water for Akamaru, and cola for the other three), and gone off to leave the three to pore over the menus. For a time, surprisingly, the three were quiet as they looked over the surprisingly extensive menus (except for Akamaru; he just elected to get whatever Kiba got.)

Eventually, the waiter returned. Sensing this, Naruto, Hunter, and Kiba all looked up from their menus. "Well? Have you decided what you'd like?"

The three looked at each other, grinned, and replied...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Naruto or Kiba

choices: All four continue to tear into their steaks rapidly
They once again, get a little competitive
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
"We'll take one of those 72 oz ribeyes each, please!" Hunter beamed as the waiter glanced curiously at the little wolf pup and two teens, but nonetheless, recalled the last time he'd seen Kiba in his restaurant, and nonetheless, nodded and wrote down their orders.

As he did, Kiba's face lit up as he recalled Akamaru's request, and added, "Oh, and one more of those ribeyes for my lil pal here!" The pup barked appreciatively as Kiba grinned and ruffled the little canine's head playfully. Again, the waiter raised an eyebrow, as he was...pretty sure a 72 oz steak was probably bigger than the puppy was...buuuuuut he wrote down the order nonetheless and took their order to the kitchen.

"Mmmm, whatever's cooking in the kitchen suuuure smells yummy!" exclaimed Hunter eagerly as he licked his muzzle and rubbed his tummy with anticipation. Kiba smirked and nodded, "Trust me, guys, you're about to sink your teeth into some of the best damn steaks you've ever tasted," he said as Akamaru yipped atop his head with agreement.

You said it, buddy! Every single bite is so juicy and yummy that it'll surprise ya with every bite! Both Kiba and Hunter chuckled at the pup's remark, which sounded like little more than happy puppy barks to Naruto, who just scratched his head and shrugged. "Eh, smells decent at least," he said with a half-hearted smirk, mind clearly a bit preoccupied.

He continued to sit, distracted while Kiba, Akamaru and Hunter continued to converse amongst each other. Finally, after some pondering, Nauto turned his attention to Hunter, rubbing the back of his fuzzy head with a bit of embarrassment attached as he said, "Look, Hunter, errr...about my little outburst earlier-"

"Don't think too much of it, kiddo. The bonehead there throws temper tantrums and hissy fits like that ALL the time," Kiba said, grinning impishly, as Naruto scowled angrily at the dog-nin. "I DO NOT, DOG-BREATHE!" barked Naruto, earning a snicker from Kiba and some odd stares from the other patrons and wait staff in the restaurant. "I rest my case," retorted Kiba as he folded his arms and leaned back against the booth seat.

"Ah, cram a chew-toy in it," grumbled Naruto under his breath. But nevertheless, he regained his composure and turned his attention back to Hunter, who tilted his little head curiously at the frazzled teen. "ANYWAY...I know you were just playin' around. I shouldn't have acted like such a pissy jerk, or a poor sport, so...I'm sorry."

To his surprise, the wolf-pup just giggled and smiled back at the boy. "Hehe, I'll admit, I was kinda surprised that you got as worked up as you did over an itty bitty game, but hey, you're only human, right?" Hunter pepped, before giggling to himself and adding, "Though, it WAS kinda funny, now that I think about it." Kiba joined in on the laughter, and added, "Still not as funny as him losing a race even after getting a cheap head start."

Practically fuming, Naruto glared at the smug dog-nin, doing his absolute best not to deck him then and there. Luckily, Hunter chimed in once more and said, "Bottom line, I'm just glad to be hanging out with you guys, cause it's been an absolute blast so far!" Easing up a bit upon hearing that, Naruto smirked and playfully nudged the wolf-pup in the shoulder. "Heh, yeah, I guess it has been hasn't it."

Suddenly, Kiba caught a potent and sensational scent wafting nearer and nearer. Immediately, he turned around, and his mouth almost instantly began to water. "Hohoho...and it's about to get even more fun," he said as the waiter returned and hefted over four 72 oz steaks, fresh and sizzling from the kitchen as he placed each one before the two teens, the wolf-pup, and a spot next to Kiba for Akamaru. He then placed down a bowl of water for Akamaru and three pitchers of cola for the teens and Hunter.

All four simply sat in silence and marveled at the delicious smelling feast-to-come bestowed upon each of them, until; in unison, their tummies all growled, practically begging each of them to stop gaping and to start eating. And with Hunter licking his chops, grabbing a fork and knife, and saying, "Mmmm! If this tastes as yummy as it smells..." all four immediately began digging into their steaks, all utterly dumbfounded by the whirlwind of flavor bursting in their mouths with that first, gloriously juicy bite.

"Holy crap...if THIS is steak...then...what the hell have I been eating my whole life?!" gaped Naruto, still in awe. Kiba simply grinned toothily, savoring the flavor in his bite as he gulped it down, and said, "Told ya!"

And so, the four proceed to dig into their steaks, enjoying each and every sauce smothered bite. And as time went on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: "We'll take a 72 oz ribeye each; Akamaru too!"

choices: Hunter musters up the courage to ask Naruto what the problem is
Kiba, getting fed up, demands to know what the problem is
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The boys and pups continued to eat at a good clip, savoring the tastes of the steak before gulping it down. "Oh, wow!" Hunter exclaimed, beaming through a mouthful of steak. "This is really yummy!" He looked across the booth table at Kiba, swallowing the mouthful. "How didja come across this place, Kiba?"

Kiba smirked, even as he cut another piece of steak and forked it into his mouth. "Eh, well, one time me, Hinata, and Shino stopped by this village on the way back home from a mission." He swallowed, cutting another piece. "I was hungry, so I walked around, trying to look for someplace good, and, well..." he winked at the pup, forking the piece into his mouth. "...the smells did all the rest." He looked to his side, chuckling as he saw Akamaru with his face practically in the massive steak as he chomped away. "Right, Akamaru?"

The pup's ears perked up. Eh? Lifting his juice-stained muzzle up from his meal, he gulped his mouthful down before replying. What was that, Kiba?

Smiling, Kiba ruffled the dog's head. "Ah, nevermind, buddy; you just go on back to your steak."


Akamaru yipped happily in response, licking Kiba's hand. Well, if you insist.... Licking his chops, he stuck his head back in, continuing to devour the flavorful, succulent meat.

Naruto, cutting himself a piece of his own steak, laughed. "Careful there, Akamaru; by the time you're done, you're probably gonna end up looking like a big, fluffy bowling ball..." Hunter giggled, imagining the sight.

Akamaru stopped mid-bite, his tail coming to a halt. Oh yeah... His mouth still full of steak, he looked at the monstrosity before him; it was easily bigger than he was. No doubt Naruto's assertion wasn't too far off...

B-but...it's so yummy... Akamaru whined, ears drooping. Seeing this, Kiba scratched his pal's back, smiling. "Look at it this way, Akamaru; once you polish that monster off, I'll give you a nice tummy rub." He laughed as Akamaru perked up a bit. "Imagine how amazing it'll feel on a fuller-than-full gut..."

Hmmm, Akamaru mused, tail wagging. A stuffed tummy rub would feel great, no doubt about that. Well, when ya put it like that... Tail now wagging at full speed, he dove rigth back into his steak.

Giggling, Hunter resumed cutting into his steak. "Heh heh, he seems excited..." Shoving a piece into his mouth, he chewed happily, legs kicking a bit as he did so. "Don't blame him, though; tummy rubs on a full stomach feel great." With the piece still in his mouth, he cut an even bigger piece and forked it in, his cheeks bulging a bit as he chewed happily.

Naruto, watching even as he ate his steak, smiled. "Awww...look how happy he looks."

Kiba smirked at Naruto. "'Course he looks happy; he's a kid eatiing some of the tastiest steak this side of the Land of Fire." He chewed, looking thoughtful. "Who knows? Maybe I'll take a hit of that stuff later, see if I feel the same..." He looked back towards his blonde friend. "What about you, Naruto? You wanna spend a few hours as a kid later on?"

To his surprise, Naruto's body went rigid at the question. It didn't escape Hunter's notice either; mouth still full of steak, he looked up at the blonde boy. "Naruto?" he inquired, his speech somewhat muffled by the meat. "Are you OK?"

Naruto shook himself, and rapidly began cutting himself another piece of steak. "Y-yeah, I'm fine; bit of steak just went down funny, that's all." He gave that strange, forced laugh again before shoving the steak into his mouth and getting to work on cutting another piece.

Hunter, Kiba, and Akamaru exchanged a confused, worried glance; what was going on with him?

Still, they weren't likely to get him talking; he was annoyingly stubborn. So, with more than a little reluctance, they dove back into their meals. Soon enough, they were once again savoring the flavors, but Naruto's odd behavior still nagged at the back of their minds.

Eventually...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: All four continue to tear into their steaks rap...

choices: They stop to wash down the steak with a nice, cool drink
A little friendly competition once again kicks in
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Kiba, Hunter and Akamaru all tried their best to resume sinking their teeth into the 'tastiest steak this side of the Land of Fire' as Kiba put it earlier, but it simply wasn't possible. They couldn't enjoy themselves the way they were prior with Naruto's strange behavior nagging at them. And Naruto was far from oblivious to their observations, and so he just continued tearing into his steak, almost like he was trying to look as busy as he could possibly be. And that only made it harder for any of them to concentrate. Hunter shifted his paws nervously, almost raising one to inquire as to what was going on with Naruto, but decided against it, in fear that it wasn't his place to ask or that Naruto would get mad at him.

Unfortunately, Kiba was less tactful, as he found himself getting annoyed by Naruto's strange behavior and stubbornness to just be forward about what was ailing him. And so, he dropped his fork and knife on his plate and shifted his focus square on Naruto as he glared in annoyance. "Alright, that does it," griped Kiba sharply, much to Hunter and Akamaru's alarm. "What the hell's going on with you?" Looking up nervously, Naruto cleared his throat. "Huh? W-what're you talking about?"

"Oh, will you cut it out?"

Nervously, Naruto's attention shifted up to Kiba as he regained his composure and asked, "Huh? Cut what out?"

"That! Every time Hunter or I bring up maybe using that special age formula, you start acting all weird and nervous."

"What? No I don't!" responded Naruto, earning a scoff from Kiba and a nervous, uneasy laugh from Hunter. "Ehehe, hey, y'know what, guys? It's okay, we don't have to talk about it now," Hunter chimed in as he attempted to ease the situation, but alas, it was to no avail as Kiba waved his hand dismissively. "I just wanna know why he's acting weird, is all."

"Kiba, can you please just leave it alone?" Naruto pleaded, earning a whine from Akamaru as he turned to Kiba and barked lowly. ...Maybe you should let this one go, buddy...

Still, Kiba pressed the issue. "No, I'm tired of him acting like this and spoiling everyone's fun. Just spill it, bonehead!"

"Will you drop it?" responded Naruto, a bit more sharply.

"Oh, stop being so damn defensive, it's like-" Kiba stopped mid-sentence, as a sly grin grew over his face. "Ohhhh, hehe, I get what's going on here. You're afraid, aren'tcha?"

"What?"

"Yeah, that's it, isn't it. Hehe, you're scared you're gonna get stuck like that, so whenever anyone brings up the formula thing, you start acting all weird and change subject."

Whining a bit himself, Hunter's ears drooped as he saw Naruto's face darkening and his fists tightening against his form and knife firmly. "Uh, Kiba? Maybe you should-"

"What? I'm just telling the little baby that he shouldn't be such a damn chicken about-"

"SHUT UP!!!" barked Naruto angrily as he slammed his fists against the table, earning stares from other patrons and the staff, and silencing everyone at the table on the spot. Taken back, Kiba raised an eyebrow, holding his arms forward in an 'calm down' motion. "Hey, hey, take it easy, Uzumaki! I was just trying to see what the hell your problem w-"

Kiba stopped as he inspected the angry young man's face a bit more carefully. Naruto was still gritting his teeth angrily, seething with enough anger that Kiba knew if he said the wrong thing, he'd probably get decked. But that wasn't what caught his attention. It was Naruto's eyes. He was pissed, to be sure, but, if Kiba didn't know better, he could swear that Naruto was getting a little misty eyed.

Both Hunter and Akamaru caught it too, and shared a concerned glance, too nervous to say anything. (Of course, in the latter's case, it wouldn't matter since Naruto wouldn't understand a word he was saying anyway.)

Immediately, Kiba's demeanor eased up as a look of concern for his friend grew over his face. "H-hey...you okay, man?" Kiba asked. But Naruto didn't respond. Instead, he looked down, almost distantly, until finally, he said, "...Do you know why I keep 'acting weird' whenever either of you bring up becoming a kid again?"

Neither Kiba nor Hunter answered. "...It's because I never want to re-experience that part of my life ever again..."

Despite his better judgement, Hunter turned to the blond boy and asked, "But why not? Being a kid's fun."

"For you guys, maybe. Tell me something...do you have any idea what it's like to be alone...in every sense of the word...? To be neglected...feared...HATED...by everyone around you...for something that isn't even in your control...?"

Internally, Kiba was kicking himself for being thoughtless enough to forget what a burden having the Kyuubi sealed within was for his friend, and how cruel and misunderstanding those in his village were to him as a result. Glancing sympathetically, he tried to apologize. "N-Naruto, I-"

"-And do any of you have ANY idea what it's like to carry all of that that on a day-to-day basis, and come home to an empty apartment...without anyone to lift that hurt off your shoulders...to care for or love you or..." Naruto had to catch his breath at that last statement, visibly getting choked up as he clenched his fists tighter while his head sank lower...but not low enough to conceal the tears now trickling down his cheeks. "...N-now...tell me...would ANY of you want to relive that...?"

...Oh God, I didn't even TOUCH his stupid formula...and I'm STILL crying like a damn baby... Naruto griped mentally as he tried to calm down, to no avail. Stop...stop it...

Glancing back at the others, Kiba got up and sat beside his friend, placing his hand atop Naruto's shoulder in a brotherly fashion. "Look, I-I'm sorry I was such a jackass...I didn't mean to bring all this back up...but y'know what? You got it wrong." Still tearing up, Naruto nonetheless turned his head towards Kiba, as did Hunter and Akamaru. "Yeah, the road was rough starting out, and no, I can't imagine going through the crap you went through. I don't think any of us ever could. And it could have completely ruined you...hell, no one would blame you if it did...but it didn't. You didn't let it ruin you. Know why?" Naruto shook his head as Kiba smiled warmly at his pal and said, "Because you're one of the strongest people I've ever met. In EVERY sense of the word."

Naruto didn't know what to say. He simply wiped his face with his forearm and just...sat there, almost dumbfounded by the remark. But Kiba just grinned and continued. "Look at it this way; you faced hardships no kid ever should, and you still did everything in your power to work your ass off every single day and earn the respect of those around you. You not only pulled that off, but even after basically being damned at childhood, you STILL manage to be a complete and utter goofball!"

At that remark, in complete unison, an eyebrow rose from Naruto and both pups at the same time. "...Huh?" was all Naruto could mutter as Kiba laughed. "Y'know, you're always cheery, you always got a positive attitude, and even if you can be a little bit of a dumbass sometimes...like...a really...REALLY dumb kind of dumbass-"

If there's a point to this, you should probably hop to it and fast, buddy... barked Akamaru, still a little perplexed himself.

"-My point is, you stay positive and good hearted about everything despite what happened. You don't sit around feeling sorry for yourself. You tough it out and put that stupid smile on your face every day. And you know what? You gotta be pretty damn tough to pull that off. And like I said...they don't get tougher than you, bonehead," remarked Kiba finally as he playfully nudged his friend in the arm for emphasis.

A moment of silence passed. Until finally...

"...Well, I guess it did kinda get easier over time," Naruto finally said, before glancing back at Kiba and, with a warm and grateful smile, adding, "...cause eventually, I was lucky enough to have friends like you by my side."

Kiba smiled a wide smile and again, playfully punched the blond's arm. "Ah, ya big sap..."

Suddenly, Akamaru yipped happily as he hopped atop the table and trotted on towards Naruto. Friends like US, you big dope! He barked as he licked the boy's hand, causing him to laugh as he ruffled the little pup atop the head. Hunter, meanwhile, watched the sight and smiled warmly himself, seeing how strong a friendship these guys shared. Hell, who couldn't appreciate something like that?

"Look, guys, I'm sorry I was acting all weird about this whole...de-aging thing, I should'a just been upfront and said what was bothering me about the whole thing," Naruto said, apologetically. But Hunter simply waved his little paw dismissively and replied, "No no, I'm the one who should be sorry. I shouldn't have pressed on the issue since it was obvious from that painfully forced laugh that it made you uncomfortable." Naruto chuckled sheepishly, recalling said laugh. Nonetheless, Hunter beamed, "But I only did so cause you're not reliving childhood itself...just the sensation and feel of being a kid again! And who knows, maybe revisiting it could undo the sour taste it left ya the first time around."

Kiba grinned and added, "At the very least, this time around, you won't be alone, right?" Akamaru barked in agreement. Suddenly a loud rumbling emanated from their tummies. Giggling, Hunter rubbed his tummy eagerly and said, "But that's enough'uh that! Whadduya say we hop back to these tasty steaks?" Naruto grinned and turned back to the others. "You heard the kid, these things ain't gonna eat themselves!"

With that, all four were once again going to town on their massive steaks, now a bit more joyously and eagerly than prior. The two boys and two pups went at their large, juicy steaks relentlessly until...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Fed up, Kiba demands to know what the problem is.

choices: Their waists are starting to feel a bit snug
They decide to order something else alongside their steaks
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
"Aaaahhh," Naruto sighed happily, leaning back in his seat and patting his belly. "Man, this steak's good..."

Kiba smirked, licking his lips to get a few morsels left on his face. "Heh; told ya."

Hunter leaned back, folding his paws over his tummy. "Mmmm...can't remember the last time I had such a yummy steak..."

Akamaru burped, sitting down and licking his chops. Heh, and to think we're not even halfway through yet...

As Akamaru had said, the four hadn't even gotten a quarter of the way through their monstrous steaks before they'd had to take a breather. However, thanks to the sheer size of the steaks, their stomachs were already starting to be affected. For Hunter, Naruto, and Kiba, this took the form of a barely-visible outline under their shirts. For Akamaru, this meant his stomach took on slightly less of a concave appearance.

Hunter burped, lifting his paws off his tummy and examining it. "Oh wow...we're not even a quarter of the way through yet, and our tummies are already starting to grow..."

Kiba laughed, patting his belly heartily. "That's nothing; you shoulda seen me the last time I ate one of these monsters..." He smiled at the memory. "I was practically using Akamaru as a crutch the whole trip home..." The pup in question winced at the memory, but shook it off.

Hunter clapped his paws, giggling at the mental imagery. "Hee hee...if that's right, were' probably gonna hafta use each other as a crutch on the way back, huh?" Naruto and Kiba laughed at this, while Akamaru just whined and shook his head. "Still, that steak already has me parched." He grinned at the two. "Dunno about you, but I could really go for a drink about now." Grabbing his pitcher of cola, he pulled it closer to him, lifted it up (his little paws once again struggling to keep a firm hold on it) and opened his mouth, allowing the cola to gush into his maw. As the cool, bubbly liquid flowed down his throat, his legs kicked happily, his tail wagging.

Smirking, Kiba looked at Naruto. "Heh; kid seems like he has the right idea, Naruto." Licking his own lips, he grabbed his own pitcher and began guzzling the cola inside it. Not one to be outdone, Naruto began doing the same with his pitcher.

Akamaru gaped at the three chugging away. Sighing a doggie sigh, he trotted over to his bowl, lowering his head. Well, I guess I'm a little thirsty too... the pup reasoned, beginning to slurp up his water.

The four went on like this for a minute or so, only stopping to take a breath. Soon, though, the two boys (and one anthro-wolf pup) lowered their pitchers and Akamaru lifted his head up from his bowl, their thirsts quenched for the moment.

Naruto burped, grinning and licking his lips. "Ahh, that hit the spot..." Picking up his fork and knife again, he resumed cutting into his steak. "Still, I don't wanna leave this steak sitting any longer than I need to!"

Laughing, Kiba picked up his own utensils. "Heh; you've got a good idea for once, bonehead."

Giggling, Hunter resumed cutting pieces of his steak away. "Eh, all I know is my tummy's still growling, and I ain't stopping till it shuts up!"

Akamaru wagged his tail, even as he dug his head into his oversize steak. Music to my ears, Hunter; music to my ears...

The four continued on like this for a few minutes, eagerly savoring every single bite. Naruto, though he was enjoying it just as much as the other three, had an oddly thoughtful look on his face as he ate. This was not lost on Hunter, who looked up from his own plate at the blonde. "Naruto?" the wolf pup asked, tilting his head quizzically. "You OK?"

Naruto smiled. "Y-yeah; I was just thinkin' about what you said; about that formula getting rid of the sour taste the..." his face briefly fell before it perked up again. "...the first time around left." He laughed. "And, well...I'm thinkin' that might not be such a bad idea."

Hunter's face lit up. "You mean..."

Naruto nodded, reaching across the booth to ruffle the anthro-pup's fur. "Yep; I'm thinkin' I'll take a hit of that stuff later; gonna see what it's like."

Grinning and swallowing his mouthful, Kiba playfully punched Naruto in the arm. "Heh, that's the spirit, Uzumaki!" He winked at the other boy. "Still, don't think you're gonna be leavin' me out..."

Beaming widely, Hunter resumed tearing into his steak. Just you wait, guys; it's gonna be a blast!

Shortly afterward, Naruto and Kiba returned to their own steaks, shoveling as much of the delicious meat into their waiting mouths as they could. And, as all four of them continued tearing into their steaks, their stomachs, slowly but surely, began to show the effects; the outlines under the two humans' (and one wolf pup's) shirts began to to thicken and round out, slowly but surely making more of an impression under their shirts. Likewise, Akamaru's tummy became less and less concave as more meat plopped into it.

By the time they stopped for their next break...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: They stop to wash down the steak with a nice, c...

choices: Unbutton and unzip now to play it safe.
Leave their pants be, busting them is way more fun anyway...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
All four had torn a fair amount from their slabs of steak, but nevertheless, there was still plenty left to go down. And the more that went down, the larger the gangs' tummies grew. For the boys and wolf pup, their bellies were now just barely contained beneath their respective shirts, having created a noticeable bulge in their middles. And the little white furred puppy's tummy had started to bulge downward slightly, as if the little fella had swallowed a particularly large grapefruit whole. (Which; for a tiny puppy, is fairly sizable.)

After some time had passed, again the four had to stop and take a little breather...

Hunter leaned back against his chair, patting his bloated tummy happily with both hands. "Phew! 72 ounces of steak is...a lot of steak, isn't it?" Kiba laughed, massaging his own belly with one hand while the other hung off his chair. "You better believe it, kiddo." Eventually, he saw Akamaru sighing with relief as he pulled his little face from the large steak. Laughing, he ruffled the pups head playfully with his free hand, causing him to yip happily. He then turned his attention towards Naruto and asked, "And what about you, bonehead? How ya holdin' up?"

As if to answer his question, Naruto burped loudly, earning a few giggles from Hunter and a chuckle from Kiba. "Ah, that's how," he joked, patting his bloated belly with one hand. He then looked down and glanced curiously at his waist, noticing something peculiar. "Hey, anyone else starting to feel a bit snug around the waist?" he asked.

Kiba examined his waistband curiously, as did Hunter. "Now that you mention it, maybe a little bit..." remarked Kiba. "Mm-hmm, same here!" chimed Hunter. Akamaru just snickered to himself. I don't have any pants to make me feel snug, so there! Though a tummy rub wouldn't hurt...

Naruto, thought for a moment, the grinned impishly. "Hehe, I think I have a fairly good idea what that means," he said, earning a curious glance from the others, until they both connected the dots and figured out what he was talking about. Almost immediately after, both the wolf-pup and dog-nin had similar grins on their faces. But then, Akamaru figured out what Naruto was talking about and whined before turning to Kiba and chiming in.

But if you bust your pants, that means all three of you will have to haul yourselves back to the hotel trying to keep your balance AND keep your pants from falling off!

Kiba's smile dropped as he realized his (currently) little buddy made a fair point. He then turned to the others and said, "Y'know, we're not at that room. We're all gonna be preeeetty damn full when this is done. It might be kind of a pain in the ass to trying to grip our pants when we're already gripping our guts, won't it?" Both Naruto and Hunter glanced down at their waists then at each other. It was a fairly short distance because they had raced twice to get to the restaurant...when they're done...the LAST thing they'd do is race anywhere...

"Whadduya guys say? Should we just play it safe and unzip and unbutton now while we can?" Kiba inquired.

They pondered on that question for a brief moment, then decided to...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Their waists are starting to feel a bit snug
