choices: They reach full speed, their undone shorts giving them a much-needed boost
They become thirsty again, and decide to drink more cola
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Hunter winced. "Ya know, after the nasty tummyache I got when I tried busting my shorts, I think it'd be easier for me to just undo my shorts." Reaching his paws down, he began fumbling with his button, trying to work around his belly. Naruto, though he hated the thought of giving up, realized how damn embarrassing it would be if his shorts dropped en-route back to the hotel, and began doing the same, trying to get a good grip on the pesky button.

Kiba shrugged. "Eh, I guess it'd work out better that way..." Plus, I don't want everyone seeing the patters I have on my undies... Akamaru wagged his tail as he saw the dog-nin begin to work on his shorts.

Finally, Naruto got a grip on his pants button, followed shortly by Kiba and Naruto. Smiling, he undid his button, as did his companions. As soon as the buttons were undone, their bellies bulged noticeably outward, hiking their shirts up a bit higher, just enough to show a sliver of flesh. Sighing in relief, they each grabbed their zippers and pulled them all the way down. Their stomachs pushed out the slightest bit, though not as much as when they'd undid their buttons.

Hunter let out a little sigh, rubbing his tummy. "Aaaahhh..... that was a great idea...." he suddenly let out a burp, which only caused him to giggle.

Naruto grumbled a bit, leaning back in his seat. "Yeah, I guess...still woulda preferred busting my button..."

Kiba smirked, massaging his own belly. "Eh, look at it this way, Naruto; least ya won't be running around without your shorts on the way back."

Akamaru whined, lowering his head. Even if people can still see your undies through your pants... His own stomach gurgled, and he looked down at it, wincing as he saw it was about the size of a grapefruit. Uh, Kiba? Just so you know, I'm proooooobably not gonna fit on your head once we're all done...

Seeing the pup flush beneath his fur, Kiba laughed, scratching his tummy and causing one of the dog's hind legs to kick a bit. "Eh, no problem; I'll just put ya in my shirt." In spite of his embarrassment, Akamaru yipped happily and licked Kiba's hand. "Awww, there's a good boy..."

Naruto smiled at the sight...until something occured to him. "Wait a minute," he spoke up, turning to Kiba. "We said we were gonna take a hit of that formula later, right?"

A bit surprised at the change in subject, Kiba nonetheless smiled. "Yep; what about it? You're not havin' second thoughts, are ya?" This last jstatement was said tauntingly, but with a hint of concern.

Naruto hsook his head. "Nah; I was just thinking about the clothes situation." He gestured to the garments they were currently wearing. "I mean, yo udon't look like you brought anything at all, and I've only got clothes back at the inn in the size I'm at now..." He chuckled a bit, rubbing the back of his head. "Dunno about you, but I don't feel like running around naked."

Hunter, even as he giggled at the imagery, spoke up. "Well, that's no problem; if ya want, you can borrow some of my clothes." He giggled again. "Always like to be prepared..."

Kiba smirked, reaching across the table and ruffling the pup's fuzzy head. "Thanks, Hunter, but ya don't need to do that." He winced a bit. "Plus, uh...it might be a little weird, wearing someone else's clothes."

Hunter shrugged. "Well, then, that's no problem; I'll just call up one of my contacts and have them pick up some clothes for you."

Naruto grinned. "You'd do that? Thanks a lot!"

Akamaru was a bit more skeptical. Umm...what sorta contact?

Hunter giggled. "Ah, don't worry; she's reliable, even if she's got a bit of an attitude problem..." Taking his phone out of his pocket, he dialed a number, held it up to his ear, and waited as it rung. Finally, when his contact picked up, he grinned. "Hey, it's Hunter." His eyes widened. "Why do I...oh. You remember that formula I showed you?" His eyebrow raised. "How can you know it's me?" He grinned impishly, much to Naruto and Kiba's confusion. "Weellll...last time we met in person, you got drunk and admitted you had a crush on Link."

Before any of the three from Konoha could wonder who 'Link' was, they pulled back as they heard loud, unintelligible squawking emanating form the device. Wincing, Hunter pulled it away from his ear, wincing. "Maaaybe that wasn't the best thing to say," he admitted to the others, laughing nervously. He waited a few moments until the squawking subsided a bit, then held it back up to his ear. "Sorry, but you asked for proof..." The voice at the other end of the line evidently replied, as Hunter groaned and massaged the bridge of his muzzle. "OK, OK, I'm sorry!" He sighed, shaking his head. "A-anyway, could you do me a favor?" Hunter waited a few moments before a relieved smile broke out across his mujzzle. "Yeah, could you pick up some clothes for a couple of 8-year-old boys?" Hunter again went silent, and to Naruto and Kiba's alarm, he frowned. Was his contact refusing?

Thankfully, Hunter smiled, lowered the phone and looked toward the two boys. "Um...she wants to know what kinda clothes you want."

Naruto's eyebrows raised. "What kind of clothes?" He scratched the bakc of his head. "Uh...it's a nice day, so tell her I'll just do short-sleeved shirts and some shorts." He looked toward his dog-nin pal? "Kiba?"

Kiba blinked, but nonetheless replied, "Uhhh...just some pants and hoodies; I don't really care whether the hoodies are short or long sleeved..." He laughed, scratching his cheek. "...or if they're pants or shorts." His eyes brightened. "Oh, and maybe a necklace with a metal tag; I've always liked those..."

Smiling and nodding, Hunter brought his phone back up to his ear and repeated the boys' requests. "Ya got all that?" he asked after he'd finished relaying the information. Evidently, his contact protested in some way, as Hunter groaned and replied, "No, I don't think you're stupid; I just wanted to make sure you got all that." His contact apparently answered in the affirmative, as Hunter nodded and smiled. "Awesome! Here's where we're staying..." Hunter relayed their address, then fell silent for a few seconds until his contact affirmed that she'd gotten it. "Great! Just, uh, pick the clothes up, drop 'em off at the room, and you can be on your way." Another few seconds of silence ensued, before Hunter beamed. "Awesome! Thanks a million! You're a gem, Midna!" Hanging up, he pocketed the phone.

"Well," he finally spoke to the others, "that takes care of that."

Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru simply stared at him. "Um...." Naruto began, then fell silent, apparently thinking better of it.

Disregarding this reaction, Hunter grabbed his utensils. "Enough waiting around! We don't wanna let these steaks get cold!" With that, he resumed digging into his massive ribeye. Kiba and Naruto, smirking, followed suit, with Akamaru burying his face back in his steak.

Soon after they resumed eating...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Unbutton and unzip now to play it safe.

choices: One of them is getting closer to finishing than the others
All four slowly but surely finish at the same pace.
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Sure enough, all four were going to town on their hearty slabs of beef, with no end in sight. The boys and wolf-pup were tearing out chunk after chunk of steak, stuffing one hearty forkful after another down their throats and enjoying the burst of flavor with each bite. Little Akamaru's face seemed to almost never leave his steak as he bit deeper and deeper into the ribeye.

Some more time had passed and the gang was still 'fighting the good fight' and doing so seamlessly. And boy, was it starting to show...

Both Naruto and Kiba's bellies had bloated outward to the point where that sliver of exposed flesh beneath their shirts had increased as their shirts stretched outward more and more, to the point where the bottom of their shirts were just barely concealing their bellybuttons. Hunter's own shirt continued to ride up as well, exposing more and more of his bloated furry tummy to where it was in about the same state as the boys, and with every couple passing gulps, their bellies would swell just ever so slightly and force down a few more teeth on their pants zippers. And Akamaru's own tummy had rounded out to where it was sagging a good deal beneath his torso, to the point where he had to stretch his hind legs apart just slight to accommodate its' ever increasing form.

And still, the four youths continued soldiering onward, consuming more and more of their oh-so-delicious and tender steaks.

Finally, upon the four consuming almost half their steaks, they pulled back from the meat to catch their respective breaths.

Burping loudly, Akamaru sighed then plopped to his side, letting his tongue hang out of his muzzle as his belly sprawled on the table. Best. Steak. Ever...

"Phew! Good thing we undid our pants when we did!" Kiba exclaimed with a hint of relief in his voice as he rubbed his extended gut firmly with both hands. "Heh, could'ja imagine if we tried to plow through this beast if we hadn't?"

Massaging his own tummy, Hunter burped and grimaced, "Ugh, I don't have to imagine..." he noted, recalling that dreadful tummyache he suffered for doing exactly what Kiba had just warned against. Nonetheless, a smile returned to his fuzzy little face as he leaned back and happily patted his bloated belly with both paws, giggling as he did. "Still, I can't believe how yummy these steaks are! I always figured the "good" meat was always from those fancy shmancy restaurants where they charge too much and only give you an itty bitty cut of beef. Well, boo to that!"

Laughing, Naruto nodded in agreement and ruffled the pups' head playfully, as he grinned and nodded with agreement. "Took the words right outta my mouth," remarked Naruto as one hand massaged his distended belly. He then glanced at Hunter and asked, "Y'know, one other thing I was wondering about with that formula stuff, if you get younger, doesn't that mean your stomach gets smaller too? How is it you can still eat as much as me'n dog-breath?"

Giggling, Hunter glanced at the two and said, "Cause as a kid, you got way more energy, and your metabolism is a whole lot faster than when you're all grown up and stuff! It kinda makes up for being a lot smaller." Hunter then grinned impishly and added, "Plus you have a lot more fun stuffing your face!"

Naruto turned to Kiba and, with a smirk, said, "Hehe, and how competitive you think it'll make us?" Kiba grinned smugly and added, "Nowhere near enough for you to ever beat me, bonehead. So don't get your hopes up." Raising an eyebrow, Naruto scoffed. "Oh, you can talk smack now, Kiba, but juuuuust youuuuu wait..."

Glancing up at the two, Akamaru chimed in. How much more competitive could the two of you possibly get? If you looked up the word competitive in the dictionary, there's probably a picture of you two glaring angrily at each other!

Hunter laughed at that mental image, but Kiba just grinned a bit more competitively and said, "Y'know what? Why wait? How about after we finish up our steaks, we'll see who can polish off their soda first." Naruto smirked and said, "I'll do ya one better, after we finish, let's REFILL our pitchers, and whoever can drink the most after that wins. Think you can handle that?"

Akamaru whined at the prospect. But won't we already be really...REALLY full when we're finished? Getting back's gonna be a nightmare...unless the wolf kid's got a contact that can carry all of us out on a wheel barrel... He then turned to Hunter and, a bit hopefully, asked, DO you have a contact that could carry us out in a wheel barrel?

But Hunter didn't hear him. Instead, the young wolf pup grinned and raised his paw eagerly as he asked, "Oooh! Oooh! I want in too! Can I play too?" Despite their competitive banter, both boys couldn't help but chuckle at the young wolf-pup's childlike eagerness. Laughing, Naruto nudged the wolf-pup in the arm and said, "Heh, why not? The more, the merrier, right?" Turning towards Kiba, he grinned mischievously and added, "and by that, I mean the merrier it'll be when Kiba gets his ass kicked by BOTH of us." Kiba grabbed his fork and knife, chuckling as smugly as he could. "Oh, dream on, ya dunce. Now come on, we don't want these things getting cold, right?"

Nodding, both Naruto and Hunter grabbed their silverware and went right back to town on their beef, alongside Kiba. Akamaru rose to all four of his paws after some doing, and glanced down at his tummy. Ugh, I'm gonna look like a fuzzy ball once this is over...

A second later, he licked his chops and dug his little face right back into the steak, chomping away.

Worth it!

All four press on, consuming more and more steak, stopping occasionally to catch their respective breaths, wash down meat with cola or water in Akamaru's case, and immediately, would dive right back into their tasty steaks. All the while, their tummies continue to expand as more and more meat is gulped down.

Eventually, as time presses on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Their undone buttons give them a new jolt of speed

choices: As the three chug, one of them feels something rip....
As they chug away, a familiar sensation begins to form in their navels...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Time ticked by as the four hungry youths dug into their still-sizable steaks, the tender, juicy flavor of the meat driving them onwards as much as the promise of the upcoming competition. However, owing to the fact that they had each already consumed roughly 36 ounces of beef, they began slowing down, starting to feel just how much was packed into their bellies.

Naruto and Kiba's shirts had now hiked up over their navels, the garments rising ever higher as their tummies expanded, and their zippers were nearl completely forced wide open, coming open even further as their swelling midsections intruded on them. In addition, their bellies were beginning to get ominously close to the table, but they were so engrosed in their steaks that the scarcely noticed.

Little Hunter's tummy and clothes were in much the same state, his fuzzy midsection forcing his shirt up over his belly-button and opening his fly further and further. Like with the two humans, his tummy had also started growing slightly. Unlike the two boys, he noticed that his belly was starting to get uncomfortably close to the table, but the aroma of the steak beckoned him back, as did the promise of the upcoming competition. With that, he put it out of his head, tightened his grip on his fork and knife, and dove right back in.

Akamaru, as he continued chomping on his steak, winced as he felt his stomach slowly expanding even more, forcing him to gradually move his back legs further and further apart. Oh man, he whined, gulping down his current mouthful and glancing at his tummy. Sure enough, it was now sagging even further beneath him, and he appeared as though he'd swallowed at least a few grapefruits whole. And, to his added dismay, the appendage was now alarmingly close to the table. My tummy's getting so big... Suddenly, the delectable aroma of the steak lured him back in, and he continued chomping away with reckless abandon. Still too yummy to pass up...

And so, they continued on in this manner for some time, chomping away at the still massive slabs of beef. Naruto, Kiba, and Hunter's shirts continued rising up, their flies now completely opened as their bellies, free from any restraint, grew closer and closer to the table. Akamaru's belly swelled bigger and bigger, forcing his back legs farther and farther apart and sagging ever closer to the table until, finally, the pup felt the growing appendage make contact with the surface. Akamaru whined, knowing he must look ridiculous, but his puppy-fied mind demanded he finish his steak. And so, with a queasy burp and another whine, Akamaru dove back in.

Eventually, they had reduced the remaining 32 ounces of beef to 16 ounces. Then eight, four, two, one...

Finally, three sets of silverware clattered to three plates, followed by three rather loud, queasy belches. As one, Naruto, Kiba, and Hunter groaned and flopped back in their seats, arms hanging at their sides. In the anthro-pup's case, his tongue was hanging out the side of his muzzle.

"O-oh man," Hunter groaned, bringing both paws up to sluggishly massage his furry belly. "Akamaru was right; best steak ever..." Naruto and Kiba, also massaging their tummies, were about to speak their assent, when...

*BBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AP!*

The three's eyes flew wide open at the noise of the truly monstrous belch. Slowly, they turned their heads towards the source...and their mouths promptly dropped wide open.

Akamaru was standing before his empty plate, wobbling in place a bit. Ooohhhh...so...so much URP!....steak... Said pup's belly had swollen massively, to the point where it looked as though he'd swallowed a fully-inflated basketball whole. His tummy, rather than simply sticking out from under him, now stuck out under all of his underside as a furry white sphere, even reaching out to the front and back of him. To their shock, it had grown so much that it appeared to be lifting his paws off the table a bit. His back legs, predictably, were stretched as far apart as they could possibly go.

In spite of himself, Kiba closed his mouth and smirked good-naturedly at the pup. "Heh; enjoy your steak, Akamaru?"

Akamaru whined, paws swiping through the air as he tried to get some purchase on the table. You could...URP!...say that, yeah... The pup stopped kicking his paws, deciding even trying to get himself in a good position was a lost cause, and instead flopped over the side onto his back, his massive white tummy sticking up into the air and his front paws hanging limp Oh man, I feel like I'm gonna explode.... Looking at Kiba, he made his eyes as big and watery as he could. Tummy rub? Pretty please?

Kiba laughed, reaching an arm out. "Ah, c'mon, Akamaru, you know you don't hafta use 'The Eyes' on me..." Reaching toward Akamaru's stomach, he began vigorously rubbing the appendage, causing the pup to pant happily and kick his leg (at least, as much as his tummy would allow.)

Hunter smiled, rubbing his own tummy. "Heh; think we might all need tummy rubs right about now..." At this, he, Naruto, and Kiba glanced down at their stomachs, even as the dog-nin continued rubbing his buddy's belly; indeed, their stomachs had all swollen to ridiculous proportioins, each looking as though they'd swallowed a large beach ball. Their shirts were now resting completely on top of their bellies, and the fronts of their respective shorts were feeling somewhat tight, in spite of the fact that their flies were completely opened and their buttons were undone. In addition, each of their bellies was now pressing noticeably against the table.

Naruto's eyes widened as he massaged his tummy. "Wow...our guts got his big just on one steak...."

Belching as he rubbed his own stomach with his unoccupied hand, he turned to Naruto and smirked. "Well, whaddaya expect when ya eat 72 ounces of meat in one sitting?"

Akamaru wagged his tail sluggishly. Ya end up looking like you're carrying a dozen puppies, that's what...little to the left. Chuckling, Kiba obliged, scratching the indicated spot.

Burping wetly, Hunter licked his chops. "Maybe, but for the best steak ever, it's worth it." His eyes flicked down to his midsection, frowning when he saw it pressing against the table. "Gettin' a little cramped here, though..."

Puzzled, Naruto looked down and noticed his own tummy pressing against the table. "Eeesh, he's right." He turned to Kiba. "You, uh, think we should adjust?"

Kiba smirked. "Nah, the booths are pretty big; we should be able to squeeze out." Akamaru, knowing how much bigger their stomachs were likely to get with the upcoming soda competition, whimpered; he had a sinking feeling he knew EXACTLY what would end up happening...

Hunter giggled. "Squeeze out? Now? We still have soda to drink!"

Naruto smirked and nudged Kiba in the shoulder. "Kid has a point, dog-breath; you sure you're not trying to weasel your way outta losing?"

Kiba smirked back and playfully hit Naruto on the shoulder. "In your dreams, Uzumaki; I'm planning on drinking you two under the table." Seeing a waiter passing by, he raised an arm up in the air. "Oi! Can we get refills on our pitchers?"

The waiter nodded, turning toward them. "Why, certain...ly..." he trailed off as he noticed the four's ridiculously distended tummies.

Naruto couldn't help but laugh. "Something wrong?"

The waiter pulled at his collar. "Erm...n-no, but...are you sure? I mean, you four seem pretty full already..."

"Yeah, but we're still thirsty," Hunter piped up, looking directly at the man. "Can't we have just one refill?" His eyes widened, and he began whimpering a bit. "Pretty please?"

"Err...." The waiter faltered a bit, initially not sure how to deal with the sudden onslaught of wet eyes and hopeful whimpering. "...certainly." He grabbed each of the still-partially full pitchers (and Akamaru's water bowl) and carried them off.

Kiba, chuckling, looked at Hunter. "Nice use of the Puppy Eyes, Hunter."

Laughing, Hunter rubbed the back of his eyes. "Heh heh, thanks!"

The four continued chatting, laughing, and egging each other on until the waiter returned. With an uncertain "Um...enjoy...?", he set their drinks on the table and bustled off, eager to be anywhere else.

Grinning, Hunter picked up his pitcher as Naruto and Kiba followed suit. "Ready?" The pup asked, wagging his tail. Giving an affirmative nod, Naruto and Kiba licked their lips, lifting the pitchers up to their faces. "Awesome! Ready...set...go!"

And with that, the three were off, guzzling their soda like there was no tomorrow. Akamaru, even from his prone position, looked around at the three and rolled his eyes. Well, this can only end well...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: All four slowly but surely finish at the same p...

choices: Both Naruto and Hunter start feel rips forming too
One of the three gains the upper hand
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Akamaru grimaced as he watched the three youths chug relentless amounts of soda, filling up their already packed tight bellies. As he watched, he could see their tummies swell up more and more as a mixture of liquid and carbonation filled their guts in a hurry. From Akamaru's observation, it would have appeared as though the trio were chugging at around the same rate, with more than ample amount of their respective fizzy beverages left to go down. Least they said 'whoever can chug the most wins'...because there's no way any of them are gonna finish that much soda when their tummies are already that full...right...? Akamaru thought to himself, hopefully...kind of.

Meanwhile, the trio just kept powering through, with not a single one of them ready to be outdone by the other. As it stands, Naruto and Kiba had already been bested by the little pup a few times already, and they weren't about to let him best them yet again, especially when each one was desperately trying not to be outdone by the other. Hunter, on the other hand (or in his case, paw), didn't particularly care about winning, he was just having an absolute blast and kept on chugging as a result.

After a few moments, the trio pulled the pitchers from their lips and caught their breaths, occasionally letting out a series of loud burps each to relief the pressure in their tummies. Thumping his fist against his belly, Naruto let out a particularly strong belch, and grunted with relief. "Mmf, hope you guys can manage, cause we still gotta ways to go," he said, gesturing towards his and their still amply filled pitchers.

Kiba scoffed and shook his head, "Worry about yourself, bonehead, cause at this rate-"

Kiba's eyes widened and his face went blank as he heard a slight rip. To his alarm, both Naruto and Kiba seemed to have heard the same noise as they looked around for the source. "Huh? Didja hear something?" asked Hunter, ears perking. Naruto nodded and examined his attire, "Didn't come from me, how about-"

He stopped and spotted Kiba's face now flushing a bit with embarrassment. Immediately, a grin grew over Naruto's face as he nudged Hunter. "Heh, think we found the culprit," Naruto said, still grinning impishly as he leaned towards the embarrassed dog-nin.

...Please tell me that wasn't your pants... Akamaru whined, in fear that his 'uniquely' patterned undergarments may now be exposed, and if so, he wouldn't hear the end of it, which would eventually lead to more and more bickering.

To his and even Naruto's surprise, Kiba didn't grit his teeth or get angry like he usually did. Instead, a smug grin grew over his face as folded his arms together and leaned back. "Yeah, ya caught me...that's the sound'uh the front of my pants giving in..."

Naruto started snickering as immediately, he asked, "Aaaand, err-hehe...you wouldn't happen to be wearing a certain pair of doggie pattern boxers...would'ja?" Even Hunter started giggling to himself, but still, Kiba didn't lose his cool.

"Maybe, but I don't care. Know why?"

When he didn't get a response, Kiba leaned back and patted his swollen gut proudly. "Because I didn't hear anyone else's pants start to rip, which means I'm packin' away more than the two of you! And since we all ate the same steaks, I'd wager that puts me in the lead, doesn't it?"

Naruto's smile dropped as the rusted wheels in his head started turning and piecing together what Kiba was insinuating. And immediately, he scowled and snapped back, "H-hey, no you didn't! Your clothes are just-"

And before he could stutter a comeback, Kiba had already picked up his pitcher and proceeded to gulp vigorously. "What the hell?! That's no fa-" and again, before Naruto could complain, Hunter giggled and after some doing, got his pitcher up to his puppy muzzle and started guzzling away.

Naruto just sat there, flabbergasted for a moment as the dog-nin and wolf-pup chugged away. Shaking his head, he grumbled under his breath and grabbed his pitcher. "Ah, whatever..." he muttered, then proceeded to chug along with the other two.

Akamaru just sat there for a moment, glancing up at Kiba almost impressed as his little tail wagged. Wow, I...think you just ninja'd the obnoxiousness out of the bonehead! the puppy barked, earning a wink from Kiba and a muffled giggle from Hunter as they continued chugging. Naruto, spotting the exchange, grumbled, knowing whatever the puppy just said was probably at his expense, but nonetheless, just kept on chugging with the other two.

This continued as their bellies continued to swell up with the increasing amount of soda filling them up. More and more, Kiba felt the front of his pants tear just slightly more, but shook it off and just kept drinking.

And as time went on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: As they chug, one of them feels something rip...

choices: Akamaru convinces Kiba they need to go before they end up completely wedged in
They start back up, but find themselves 'wedged in' to an awkward situation....
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Akamaru stared in amazement as the three's already-engorged bellies continued swelling as more and more of the fizzy, carbonated liquid entered them. Wow...it's almost like watching someone fill water balloons, the pup thought to himself, burping as he did so. Sighing, he licked his chops. Then again, considering how much they already have packed in there, it's not too surprising...

As he watched, their bellies continuously expanded, pressing more and more into the table. They evidently noticed this, as they winced slightly, but they continued guzzling, none of them willing to let up. As such, even as their tummies pressed harder into the table, the appendages started bulging out to the sides as well.

Akamaru's eyes widened. Ohhh, that doesn't bode well...

Oblivious to Akamaru's distress, the three continued chugging away, the cool liquid further inflating their already comically-large tummies and causing the appendages to continue bulging out to the sides. Kiba, in particular, grinned as he heard (and felt) the front of his pants slowly but continuously ripping. Heh; don't care how embarrassing this is, if it means I'm beating those two!

Seeing that Kiba was continuing to rip his shorts, Hunter and Naruto chugged as fast as they could, desperate to catch up. They felt the front of their opened shorts continuing to grow tighter and tighter as their bellies continued intruding on them, until...

Rrrrrrrrriiiip.

Naruto and Hunter both beamed as they felt the front of their shorts rip a bit, freeing up a bit of extra room. Giving determined grins to each other, they renewed their chugging with even greater vigor than before. Kiba, having heard the ripping noises as well, scowled and redoubled his efforts, not planning to let either of them get ahead.

Akamaru sighed as, over the next several minutes, the air was filled with soft ripping noises as the boys and wolf pup continued chugging away, swelling their bellies even further and causing more damage to their shorts. Their zippers, already stretched past their limits, forced their way further and further down their struggilng shorts, ripping the fabric apart and, though none of them could see it at the moment, slowly exposing more of their undergarments.

Akamaru groaned. Of all the days to wear the boxers with the silly dog faces on them...

Naruto and Hunter weren't much further behind, though, as their own shorts continued ripping further and further as their bellies inflated further and bulged out further to the sides as they chugged away.

Eventually, just as Akamaru thought they'd rip the whole front of their damn shorts open, they all slammed their still considerably filled pitchers down, leaned back in their seats, rested their hands (or paws) on their bellies, and all let out rather loud, queasy-sounding belches.

"So...much...soda..." Hunter groaned, belching again and rubbing his tummy with both paws.

Naruto winced, resting one hand on his belly while he let the other one dangle at his side. "You're...you're not kidding. Feels...feels like my stomach's gonna explode..."

Kiba smirked, albeit in a pained manner. "Heh; you...you guys giving uUUURRRRRRP!" His taunt was cut off by a massive, belch. Hunter giggled uproariously while the dog-nin blushed.

Naruto, on the other hand, smirked in return. "N-no...not giving up...just gotta rest..." The boy exhaled, moving his hands up and down his stupendously swollen tummy. "Phew..."

As they reclined in their seats, they looked down and examined their midsections. The copious amounts of cola they had consumed had made their bellies grow even further, pushing even harder into the table and bulging greatly out to the sides. Their liquid-packed midsections sloshed and shimmied with the slightest of movements (much to Hunter's delight, who took to shaking his belly with both paws and giggling at its movement), and a breeze playing underneath the table informed them that, by now, their shorts had probably ripped enough to expose most of their undergarments, and a bit of their bare legs too.

Akamaru looked to toward Kiba's stomach (or as best he could, given his belly-up position) and gaped at just how big it had gotten. Kiba, Akamaru whined, ears drooping, exactly how much more soda were you guys planning on drinking...?

Kiba smirked and scratched his pal's bulbous tummy (much to the pup's delight). "As much as we can fill our guts with, buddy." With that, he sank into his seat, sluggishly rubbing his midsection and occassionally burping to release pressure. Naruto and Hunter followed suit, massaging their tummies, belching, and in Hunter's case, occasionally shaking his belly and giggling as it sloshed and jiggled.

After a few minutes of resting up....
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Both Naruto and Hunter start feel rips forming too

choices: "Keep burping until your tummies deflate enough for you to slip out."
"Have Hunter squeeze under the table to push it away enough to you to slip out."
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
After some resting up, Naruto sighed with relief and said, "Well, I dunno about you two, but I think I'm gettin' my second wind here!" Both Kiba and Hunter nodded and, in unison, all three leaned forward and reached for their pitchers. Once more; in unison, all the three yelped sharply in pain. Akamaru's ears perched up as he tried to lift his head enough to see what the commotion was about. Sure enough, just as he feared...

You're all wedged against the tables, aren't you...

Hunter whined a bit as he massaged his bloated tummy tenderly to coax the pain he'd just inflicted upon it. Kiba and Naruto both just groaned in pain and annoyance. "Ah, crap...now we've done it," Kiba complained, seeing his bloated belly wedged firmly against the table, just like the others. Naruto tried to forcibly pull himself from the table, but the sensation of his stomach scraping against the edges of the table was immensely painful and forced him to stop immediately. "Ow!" yelped Naruto, wincing in pain as he did. Scowling, Naruto turned to Kiba and barked, "Why didn't you guys just get a regular table?!"

The dog-nin raised an eyebrow at the accusation and replied, "Hey, don't blame us, dumbass! They sat us! How were WE supposed to know our guts would get this big?!"

Hunter, on the other hand, just whined, still trying to pull his bloated furry tummy free from the table. "C'mon, guys, please don't fight. That's not gonna help us get out!" the young wolf-pup whined as he continued to struggle against the table. Glancing back at him and each other, both boys sighed and nodded reluctantly.

"Ugh, kid' right. We gotta find a way out, not bicker at each other like a pair of jackasses," muttered Kiba, earning a nod from Naruto as he scratched the back of his head. "Nah, that was my fault. Sorry for losing my lid like that," Naruto said, earning a surprised glance from Kiba and Akamaru, (who was still too full to lift his head properly in order to make eye contact).

Smirking, Kiba just said, "Ah, don't worry about it. Right now, we just gotta find a way outta here." Ears perking, Hunter turned to his two (current) elders and asked, "Oh! Can't we just ask the staff for help?" Immediately, both Naruto and Kiba grimaced and shook their heads. "Nooooo thanks..." muttered Kiba, shuttering at the embarrassment that would ensue if they actually asked someone to undo the table because they let their stomachs grow so large that they were actually trapped in their booth.

Naruto's face lit up as he added, "Well, why don't we try and pull the table off the hinges ourselves? These things aren't that strong, right?" To which both Hunter and Kiba shared a glance, before Kiba sighed and turned his attention back to Naruto, rubbing his forehead, nodding unenthusiastically.

"Okay, bonehead, that's a...semi viable option. So I guess we could do that. But lemme ask you something; you liked the steak here, yeah?" asked Kiba, to which Naruto scoffed and said, "Pfft, you kiddin'? Best damn steak I've eaten in years!" he exclaimed, patting his belly proudly, and wincing at the subsequent pain that resulted, earning another quick and sharp nod from the dog-nin. "Good, I did too. So did Hunter, and Akamaru ESPECIALLY. Now, wouldn't you want to KEEP enjoying these delicious steaks? Because I certainly would."

Scratching his head, Naruto just raised his shoulders and asked, "What's your point?" To which Kiba slapped his forehead with his palm and said, "Oh for the love of-you think these guys'll ever let us back in if we break their damn tables?!"

Immediately, Naruto was able to put two and two together. "Ohhhhhhhh, okay!" Naruto said, FINALLY getting it. "Sheesh, why not just say that?" Kiba sighed, shaking his head, unwilling to respond to another boneheaded remark from the ultimate bonehead himself. The pain in their stomachs wasn't going away however. "Ugh, guys, we gotta get outta this soon, or I'm gonna be sick..." Kiba groaned, earning unenthusiastic nods of agreement from the others, to imply they were on the same boat. Stifling a particularly queasy burp, Hunter grimaced and said, "Well, what do we do then?"

Just then, Akamaru's face lit up as he slowly hoisted himself in the direction of the three youths, still unable to lift his little paws up to support his massive belly. Guys! I've got it! barked the tiny pup, earning curious glances from Kiba, the pup and Naruto, who then turned to the others and asked, "Huh? W-what's he saying, guys?"

Grinning, Kiba replied, "Akamaru says he has a plan!" He then turned his attention to his little bloated canine pal and asked, "So? Let's hear it, boy!"

Akamaru shuddered, realizing his plan wasn't going to be pleasant for those involved, and likely not anyone else around them, but nonetheless chimed in as he turned to Kiba and proceeded to bark.

Okay, well, first of all, this might be a bit...unusual, but if we're lucky, it just might do the trick. All you three need to do is...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: The trio get 'wedged in' an awkward situation...

choices: Naruto and Kiba take the formula when Hunter goes to take his bath
Naruto and Kiba decide to wait until Hunter's back to normal to take the formula
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Kiba's eyes widened at Akamaru's suggestion. "...burp?"

Akamaru barked, nodding enthusiastically. Yeah! I mean, you guys drank a ton of soda; it shouldn't be a problem for you.

Naruto tilted his head. "Eh? What's he saying?"

Kiba turned toward his friend. "He's, um, saying we need to burp until our guts deflate enough for us to slip out."

Naruto blinked. "Really?"

Hunter nodded eagerly. "Uh-huh, and it might just work! I mean, we got wedged in after we drank all that soda, right?" Naruto and Kiba, blushing slightly, nodded in response. "Yeah, I'm sure it'll work! In fact..." the wolf pup got a mischievous look on his face. "...why don't we make a game of it?"

Kiba blinked. "A...game?" he repeated, already having an idea of what the pup was suggesting.

Hunter bobbed his head. "Yuh-huh! We burp as long and loud as we can until we can slip out!" He giggled, rubbing the back of his head. "I mean, if we're gonna embarrass ourselves worse than we already have, why not have some fun doing it?" As if to accentuate this, he licked his chops, took a deep breath....

*BRAAAAAAAAAAP!*

...and let loose with a rather considerable belch. He giggled, even as several of the patrons and wait staff looked toward him in a mixture of shock and disgust. "See?" he piped up, completely ignoring the looks. "We can still make this fun!"

Naruto and Kiba glanced at each other. "Well..." the blonde began, slowly beginning to grin. "If the kid insists..." Leaning back, he brought his hands up to his overstuffed tummy and began kneading it with his thumbs.

Kiba grinned in return. "...then I guess we don't have a choice." He began kneading his own belly, taking deep breaths as he did so.

Hunter giggled. "That's the spirit, guys!" Taking their cue, he began kneading his own belly.

Akamaru watched, a bit anxious, as the three continued kneading their bellies. This continued for a minute or so, before...

*BRAAAAAAAAAAAAP!*

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURP!*

*BUUUURRRRRARRRRRRRRRRRP!*

....the three let loose with massive belches that shook the table and drew even more disgusted looks from the rest of the restaurant. "Phew!" Naruto exclaimed, heartily patting his tummy. "That was a good one!"

Kiba, already kneading his belly again, grinned. "You're tellin' me; that felt great!"

Hunter beamed, eagerly sloshing his tummy about. "Yeah, but we're still stuck! Keep burpin', fellas!"

Akamaru began rolling (rolling!) over on his side, but he managed to right himself, his paws batting uselessly at the air. Well, at least they're enthusiastic...

Within short order, the three once again let loose with more titanic belches. Laughing and catching their breath, they wasted little time before getting to work kneading their bellies again....

*BRAAAAAAAAAAAAAP!*

*UUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRP!*

*BURRARRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRP!*


...and again...

*BRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAP!*


...aaaaaaaand again......

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRAAP!*

This went on for several minutes, the three overstuffed, stuck occupants of the table continuously belching, kneading their bellies, belching again, and then repeating the whole process all over again.

Akamaru wagged his tail in spite of himself. Heh, pretty good pipes on all of them... His gaze fell on Hunter as the young pup let loose with a massive belch, his mouth opening wide. Especially him; wonder what he can do at his regular age...

Finally, after what seemed like forever, Naruto shifted in his seat, and grinned when he felt his belly moving. "Hey, guys! I think we've burped enough!" Grabbing the sides of his ruined shorts, he tugged, grunted, and finally stood up. Wincing, he shimmied out the side of his booth, still holding up his ruined pants. Finally, with an audible PLOP, Naruto freed himself from the booth. Stumbling a bit, he nonetheless managed to right himself and stand upright. Smirking, he turned to his companions. "Well? You guys coming?"

Kiba smirked in return. "Yeah, just gimme a sec..." Reaching out, he grabbed Akamaru with both hands and deposited the overstuffed puppy into the neck of his shirt. Smiling, he looked down. "Ya OK down there, Akamaru?"

The pup barked his assent. Well, there's a lot to rest on, I'll give ya that much... Kiba, laughing, grabbed the sides of his shorts, stood up, and shimmied out the same way Naruto had. He sighed in relief as he stood beside Naruto...before the blonde looked down and snickered. "Heh...nice undies, Inuzuka..."

Kiba flushed a deep red as he realized that ripped state of his shorts ensured that he, and by extension the entire restaurant, could see his green boxers patterned with cartoony dog faces. "Sh-shut up!" he snarled. He looked down at Naruto's undies. "Like those stupid heart-patterned undies are any better?"

The smirk fell from Naruto's face, and his skin reddened as well. "C-cram it, dog-breath!" Akamaru whined, fearing they'd stand there for minutes and bicker about each others' underwear. Wow, that came out sounding weird...

Luckily, Hunter managed to free himself at that moment, awkwardly hopping down from his seat (after having left his payment on the table) and somehow maintaining his balance as he gripped his shorts, which also revealed his crescent-moon patterned undies in all their glory. "Phew; thought we were gonna be stuck there for hours!" Lurching up beside the boys, he looked up at them, beaming. "I dunno about you guys, but I'm about ready to head back to the inn." He giggled, his tail wagging. "That bathtub's callin' my name!"

Naruto and Kiba looked down at him, confused by the seeming non-sequitur. "...wha?" Naruto finally said, blinking.

Hunter giggled even harder at his expression. "Of course! I'm not sleepy, but I still wanna relax somehow! Plus," he added in a mock-conspiratorial tone, "It'll give me an opportunity to grow back to my proper age without skeeving you guys out."

Akamaru poked his head out of Kiba's shirt, tilting his head curiously. You mean...

"Yep!" Hunter replied cheerfully. "It's been tons of fun being like this, but I kinda wanna go back to normal for now." He grinned. "Of course, don't let that stop you from usin' that formula..."

Kiba grinned. "You kidding? No way we're passing that chance up!"

Naruto nodded in agreement. "Yeah! Not to mention," he added, smirking, "With you at your regular age, maybe we can get a little revenge for you manipulating us with your cuteness..."

Akamaru barked happily. I can help with that; think I'm gonna take another hit of that stuff too. Eyes widening in delight, Kiba reached inside his shirt and gave the dog's tummy another scratch, causing his tongue to loll out in delight.

Hunter only giggled. "Heh heh, I'd like to see you try!" Keeping a firm hold on his ruined pants, he began lurching off toward the exit. Kiba and Naruto, not to be outdone, followed close behind him, moving as fast as they dared. As they went, the whole restaurant watched them go with wide eyes. Wasn't every day you got customers like that...

The three lurched along the streets of the small town, drawing odd looks from passerby. They ignored them as best they could, trying to support their bellies and shorts to the best of their ability, and occasionally belching.

Finally, after what seemed like ages, the three reached the inn. Smiling in relief, they made their way inside, stumbled to their room, and...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: "Keep burping until your tummies deflate en...

choices: Try out the formula now to get a feel for being a kid again
Wait until after they rest off their meals to become kids again
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
"Ugh! FINALLY!" griped Naruto, in an exhausted manner before plopping backwards onto his bed, causing his ridiculously swollen belly to stick upward. Kiba shook his head and hoisted himself down on the end of his own bed, leaning back as Akamaru still rested atop his especially large stomach. Seeing the puppies head pop out from his shirt, he grinned and, despite his exhausted state, ruffled the little critters head, causing him to turn and lick the boy across the cheek.

As Hunter entered the room, still clutching both his extended tummy and shorts for support, Kiba turned to the other two and with a sigh and smirk, said, "Well, that was certainly...an interesting outing, huh?" Naruto, still dazed and fully reclined on his bed, just burped wetly and patted his belly happily. "Sure was..." he remarked, recalling the taste of that delicious steak, the ample amount of soda the trio chugged, and post-soda embarrassment that occurred.

Taking a seat on a nearby chair, no longer needing to support his shorts, Hunter's hind paws kicked idly, still massaging his own tummy as he pepped in, "But at least you guys had fun, right?"

Both Kiba and Naruto; after sitting up from his formerly lazed position, shared a glance and smiled, before turning back to the wolf-pup and nodding in unison.

"Hehe, sure was!" replied Naruto as Kiba grinned and added, "and lot of that was thanks to you, kiddo!"

Hunter just giggled and rubbed the back of his little fuzzy head. "Heh, you guys are too nice!" he replied, but Naruto and Kiba hefted themselves off the bed and headed near the youthful wolf-pup. "Seriously. You got this kinda energy about you that just makes things fun!" Naruto exclaimed, earning a nod of agreement from Kiba, who added, "Yeah, like the sticky buns, racing around the village, hell, even having a burping contest so we'd at least have a little fun when we tried deflating our guts!"

To which Naruto grinned boastfully and added, "Which I totally won, mind you!"

But Akamaru shook his head and barked, Ha! Those were squeaks compared to the ones exploding out of Hunter!" To which, the wolf-pup just snickered some more.

Pfft, you think that's impressive? You outta hear Natsu...that pink haired lout gives a whole new meaning to the phrase 'Dragon-Breath'....yeesh... He thought to himself, but nonetheless, began blushing beneath his fur as he rubbed his head bashfully before smiling up at the two elder boys and saying, "Aww, thanks, you guys! I appreciate that big time, but really, I'm just glad you're all having fun!"

Kiba just ruffled the wolf-pup's head playfully and said, "An absolute blast."

Naruto grinned slyly at the display then turned to Kiba and said, "D'awww, you big sap, you gonna miss him being in his cute lil puppy form?" Hearing that, Kiba immediately sputtered and turned to Naruto sharply, "W-what?! No! I mean, y-yeah, b-but...onlycausehessocutelikethis!" Upon accidentally spouting that last statement, Kiba's face flushed with embarrassment and annoyance as Naruto snickered in amusement.

Hunter just giggled and nudged the dog-nin playfully. "Heehee! That's okay, Kiba! I'm just taking a break for now so I don't get TOO used to being a pup. Besides, now, it'll YOUR guys turn to be adorable!" His grin then turned impish as he added, "Y'know...if you can out-cute THIS..." with those last words, Hunter smiled a wide, puppy smile at the dog-nin who turned away, absolutely flustered and overwhelmed trying not to succumb to the last ditch cuteness overload...and failing miserably. The result of which left Naruto laughing hysterically as even Akamaru couldn't help but snicker to himself. It's gonna take a lot to be cuter than that...for you two, not me, Akamaru barked confident in his own natural puppy cuteness.

Thankfully, for the sake of Kiba's embarrassment, Hunter stopped as his face lit up. "Ooh! That reminds me, I gotta give you guys your vials!" He said, reaching for his bag to grab his attire and some vials, but Naruto just shook his head and said, "Don't worry about it. We'll wait til you change back first."

"Plus, we should probably wait til we've digested enough of our meals to actually do something," Kiba added, before turning back to Akamaru and with a grin, said, "cause unless we decide to roll Akamaru around like a ball, I don't think he's gonna be going anywhere anytime soon." The pup blushed beneath his white fur, but Kiba just smiled playfully and sat back down next to him, scratching his tummy, causing the pup to forget about the short term embarrassment of his current girth, and just smile blissfully as his dangling hind paws kicked happily.

Hunter shrugged, putting the vials back down and instead grabbing his adult clothes and pressing them against his tummy as he still tried to maintain a hold of both his swollen gut and his busted shorts. "No problem. See you guys in a bit!" he pepped before hopping into the shower.

As they heard the water run and what sounded like a progressively older wolf voice whistling to himself in the shower, both boys continued chatting amongst themselves as they relaxed atop their respective beds. The two chatted about past missions, training, some of their other competitive ventures, and their escapades over the past few days, to which, Kiba thought back to the steak house and, with a competitive grin, added, "Y'know, we still got unfinished business we'll have to settle sooner or later, right?"

Naruto raised an eyebrow quizzically. "Huh?"

"That soda chugging contest, ya dolt! We never got to see who could outdrink who cause'uh what happened with that damn table!" Kiba responded. But Naruto just grinned smugly and replied, "Yeah, sure, act like you're TOTALLY not grateful that us getting wedged spared you the embarrassment of getting your ass kicked by me...again."

"Uhhh, excuse me, but last I checked, my pants were busting before either of you guys!" Kiba responded, but Naruto waved his hand dismissively and said, "Yeah, having weaker made pants means you were drinking more, eh? I don't think so. We all had the same amount of soda in our pitchers! You just wanted to psyche me out!"

Kiba stared for a moment, then chuckled to himself, before saying, "It worked, didn't it?"

To which, Naruto just sat there, dumbfounded for a moment, then...he too, started snickering to himself as he shook his head and added, "Hehe, guess so. Still, me'n Hunter had one a few nights back and I drank him way under the table. Who knows, maybe we can give it another try later on...y'know...if we're not sitting in a booth..."

Both boys grimaced at the not so faint memory of all three of them getting wedged between the booth and their seats. Akamaru just snickered to himself and barked, But thanks to the quick thinking of one part-time puppy, you all got out! I think that calls for a tummy rub. Wouldn't you agree, Kiba?

Kiba just laughed and shook his head. "You win, boy," Kiba said before rubbing his pup's tummy playfully, again, earning a dopey grin from Akamaru's little white furred face.

Both boys continued to chat for a while, until finally, the faucet shut, and after some drying off, out came Hunter, once again in his adult form, wearing a pair of khaki shorts and a black tanktop. "Ahhh, gotta admit, being a kid felt great, but it's refreshing being my old self again!"

Akamaru snickered and barked, Emphasis on OLD.

To which, Hunter laughed and rubbed the back of his head, "Eh, not quite yet." He then turned to the others and asked, "So, you guys wanna wait til you digest your food first, or do you wanna take a hit so you can get a little more use what being a kid is gonna feel like? Either way's cool, I got plenty of these things to go around!"

The two boys thought for a moment, then turned their attention back to Hunter and decided to...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Naruto and Kiba wait until Hunter's back to normal

choices: The boys regress, and they're awed at their transformations
As they regress, one of them starts panicking
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Naruto shrugged. "Eh, we should probably rest our lunch off before we take a hit of that stuff."

Kiba nodded, patting his belly heartily. "Yeah; I mean, I know your gut shrank some when you took that formula, but it wasn't anywhere NEAR as big as ours are right now..." He smirked, exposing a couple of pointed canines. "Plus, we're probably gonna have a ton of energy once we shrink, and we won't be able to do much if we all look like we swallowed beach balls." He scratched Akamaru's bulbous tummy, causing the pup to kick his leg a bit. "Besides, Akamaru won't be able to move at all till we've rested a bit."

Akamaru looked toward Hunter, even as his tummy was being scratched. That reminds me; can I have another hit of that stuff? I wanna stay a pup for a little longer.

Hunter chuckled. "Sure!" Making his way over to his duffel, he retrieved a vial of the formula, walked back over to Akamaru, and popped the cork off. "Open wide, little fella."

Yipping happily, Akamaru obliged, opening his muzzle as far as it would go. Chuckling again, Hunter upended the vial, letting it fall into Akamaru's mouth. The pup happily lapped up the liquid, not stopping until the last drop had entered his mouth. Smacking his lips, the pup wagged his tail. Ahhh....that's the stuff.

Laughing, Kiba gave his pal's tummy a final ruffle and looked back toward Naruto. "So...whaddaya wanna do now? I mean, we got some time..."

Naruto shrugged. "I dunno, really; I'm not really tired, but it's not like we can do much with these." He gestured to his overfilled belly, smacking it and belching loudly.

Hunter chuckled. "Worry not, gentlemen." Getting back up, he retrieved his duffel and brought it back over to the boys. "That nifty little formula ain't the only thing I got in there..." Unzipping it, he set it in the middle of himself and the teens. "I like to carry little knick-knacks and gadgets to keep myself entertained when I'm traveling."

Kiba raised an eyebrow. "You...really don't mind us going through your stuff?"

Hunter shook his head. "Nope." He winced a bit. "One thing, though; if any of the knick-knacks in here start whispering in your ear, drop 'em like a sack of potatoes."

"You mean knick-knacks like this?" Naruto piped up, holding up an object that he'd fished out while Hunter and Kiba had been talking.

Hunter turned toward Naruto. "Items like wha-holy hell, how did that end up in my bag?!" He paled noticeably under his fur as he laid eyes on the item in Naruto's possession.

The item appeared to be a mask, though not like any mask Naruto, Kiba, or Akamaru had ever seen before. It was vaguely heart-shaped, and covered in a variety of almost psychedelic colors and patters. It had two long, spike-like protrusions sticking up from its "eyebrows", with several more spikes just like it sticking out along the sides of its "face". The most striking-and eerie-aspect of it, however, were the eyes. Taking up a good part of the mask, they were large, red things, with black irises containing black pupils that were only visible because of the eerie green coloring around them.

Naruto noticed Hunter's expression and frowned. "Eh? What's the matter, Hunter?"

Akamaru only looked at the mask for a few seconds before looking up at Kiba and whining, Kiba, I'm getting some SERIOUSLY bad vibes from that thing, whatever it is...

Gulping, Kiba scratched Akamaru's ears in a way he hoped was reassuring. "Me too, Akamaru..." He turned toward Naruto. "Oi, Uzumaki! Drop that damn thing!"

Naruto began to turn to Kiba and protest, but when his eyes fell upon the mask, he felt a cold sensation slither down the back of his neck. "...yyyyeah, I'm thinking that might be a good idea," Naruto conceded, gently setting it upon the ground. No sooner had he done so than Hunter reached into his bag, grabbed some sort of odd container, opened it, and stuffed the mask inside. Slamming the container shut, he sighed. "Phew, that was way too close for comfort..."

The three from Konoha looked at him strangely. "...Hunter, what the hell was that thing?" Naruto spoke up, shuddering a bit.

Hunter sighed, shaking his head. "In my travels, I've kinda picked up the habit of grabbing whatever caught my interest..." he winced, but forced himself to continue. "...which, unfortunately, includes a great number of dark talismans and sentient relics of pure evil bent on destruction." He motioned toward the container. "That little piece of horror was the latter."

Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru exchanged an uneasy look. "So, uh..." Kiba began, trying to keep his composure, "any...anything else in there we should know about?"

Hunter closed his eyes, thinking. After a few moments, he opened them again and replied "Nah, I don't think so; the rest of the stuff in here's pretty innocuous..." at this, he managed a slight smile. "...though probably nothing you guys have seen before." He began rummaging through his bag, looking for anything of interest. Naruto and Kiba, looking at each other somewhat nervously, quickly joined him.

A few hours passed as the two ninja and anthro-wolf examined the contents of Hunter's bag. Among them, they discovered a small, rectangular device with some sort of bifurcated cord attached to it ("An MP3 player," Hunter had explained, placing the two split ends of the cord inside his ears. "Plays all kinds of music!"), a bulkier, rectangular device with an assortment of buttons on it, and a screen that responded to certain button presses ("'Video game'"? Kiba had asked, fiddling with the buttons. "Nothing you can do in these most ninja can't do in real life..."), and another odd, rectangular device, this one with a screen that took up most of its surface ("An electronic reader; it can store a whole bunch of books at a time," Hunter had beamed as he showed them the books he had uploaded; there were at least a dozen or so. "Eh heh, I'm kinda a bookworm..."). Finally, as they placed the last of the objects back in the bag, Naruto and Kiba had looked down and noticed, to their relief, that their tummies had shrunken a great deal, existing now only as round shapes beneath their shirts (even if their pants were still busted.) Even Akamaru's tummy had shrunken enough for him to once again stand on his paws, though he still looked as though he'd had a good meal.

Kiba grinned, rubbing his belly through his shirt. "Heh, wouldja look at that..." he looked toward Naruto, grinning. "I dunno about you, but I'm about ready to try that stuff out for myself..."

Naruto smiled, albeit sadly. "Y-yeah, I guess I am too..."

This was not lost on either Kiba or Hunter, the latter of whom asked "You still sure you wanna do this? I mean, I know it wasn't exactly a picnic the first time around..."

Naruto looked toward Hunter, and some of the sadness left his eyes. "Y-yeah, I'm sure." He sighed. "I mean, I didn't really have any friends the first time through..." He reached an arm out beside him and gave Kiba a friendly pat on the back. "...but I do now."

Kiba scoffed, though his smirk belied his true reaction to the gesture. "Ah, don't go gettin' all soft on me," he jabbed good-naturedly, throwing a friendly arm about Naruto's shoulders.

Smiling once again at the friendship the two shared, Hunter reached into his duffel, pulled out two vials of the formula, and handed them to each boy. "Alright, guys," he began once the two had uncorked their vials. "Midna will have already stopped by with your clothes, but she'll probably have thrown them every which way in the closet to get back at me for that little jab about her being drunk earlier." He scratched the back of his head nervously. "Do you, uh, wanna wait until I've got the clothes out, or..."

Kiba smirked. "Nah; way I figure, we'll drink thiis stuff, then just relax in these clothes for a couple minutes till ya find them." Naruto, blushing a bit, nonetheless nodded in agreement.

Hunter smiled. "Great!" He made his way over to the closet, even while keeping an eye on the two.

Eying their vials, the boys glanced at each other. "Well..." Kiba began ,raising the vial to his lips.

"...bottoms up," Naruto finished, doing the same. As one, they knocked them back in one go, smacking their lips at the peculiar flavor. "Ya feel anything?"

Kiba shook his head. "Nah, not ye---"

Suddenly, both boys began feeling rather odd. Akamaru, seeing the confusion on their faces, wagged his tail. Heh heh, any second now...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Wait until after they rest off their meals to b...

choices: "Can we go play in the park?"
"All that de-aging made us hungry, how about Ice Cream?"
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
"W-whoa..." muttered Naruto, feeling an overwhelming tingling sensation overtake his entire body. He turned to Kiba, who seemed to be having the same reaction, then, suddenly, things seem to be getting progressively bigger. Or, more accurately, THEY seemed to be getting progressively smaller, and as their facial features began to adjust and alter, yes; younger as well.

Holy cow, l-look at their faces! Akamaru barked excitedly, tail still wagging as he watched the two youths progressively shrink and shrink inside their own attires. Turning his attention over to the boys, Hunter just laughed heartily, nodding as he said with a snicker, "Yep! Now wait til the whole thing is done! Cuteness overload, guaranteed!"

Finally, after a long, overwhelmingly 'funny' sensation, Naruto's eyes slowly fluttered open. "Huh, i-it worked!" he said, with a notably higher pitched, and more youthful sounding voice, which caught him off guard, as his tiny hands clamped over his mouth. Examining himself further, seeing himself just sitting in his oversized baggy adult clothes, he started giggling just slightly to himself. "I...I'm a kid again...!"

"Wow-wee! This is...really cool!" said another youthful voice. Naruto turned and spotted a much younger Kiba sitting in his oversized attire as well, just gazing at himself wide-eyed with a big toothy smile on his face. Naruto smiled and said, "Holy crap, look'it you, Kiba! You look so...so small!" Kiba glanced back at Naruto and started giggling childishly.

"Look who's talkin'!" chimed Kiba, still giggling to himself, before turning up and looking up at his puppy companion. "So? Whadduya think, boy?" asked Kiba eagerly. To his surprise, Akamaru barked a youthful bark, and leaped from the bed and into the boy's chest, causing to laugh heartily as the puppy licked his face affectionately again and again, yipping happily as he did.

Hunter stopped browsing through the closet for a moment and turned to get a closer look at the boys. Between watching a youthful Kiba laugh and play with his puppy pal, and watching Naruto still just stare wide-eyed in his oversized attire, giggling happily to himself, the sight was surprisingly overwhelming for Hunter, who cleared his throat and turned away a bit, to keep his heart from melting then and there.

"Ehehe, so? How's it feel, boys?" chimed Hunter curiously, unable to advert his gaze from the three youths.

Kiba just beamed happily and said, "Awesome! Just, awesome! I got all this energy in me that I ain't had in years! Like, like I just wanna run in the park and chase things with my little buddy over here!" Akamaru yipped especially happy at that chasing things in the park notion. The two went on missions and adventures all the time, but it'd been literally ages since either one had just gone to play in the park like when they were kids.

Hunter just nodded and smiled as he said, "Yup! Like I said, your body and mind not only regress to a more youthful state, but so does your energy and metabolism. So you're all gonna be a lot more energetic and excitable than you'd usually be...and that's saying something considering how energetic and excitable you both were already." Kiba just giggled and rubbed the back of his head bashfully. "Heehee, fair point."

Both Hunter and Kiba then turned to Naruto, as Hunter; slightly more cautiously, once again asked, "How about you, Naruto?

A moment of silence had passed. Naruto stared down at his tiny form in silence for a moment longer. In all truth, Naruto had come into this, expecting a resurgence of painful memories to hit him all at once like a ten ton sack of bricks. That suddenly, he'd be a kid again, and all the pain and heartache and misery that he suffered as a child would come waltzing right back into his life as soon as that vial was gulped down.

But in this moment of becoming a child once more, he realized something...

...No one was afraid of him. No one was mad at him. Not a single person was telling him to crawl back to that empty, lonely apartment and wait there all alone for the rest of his life.

He was allowed to be a kid again, and in this moment, he wasn't alone or hated. For the briefest of moments, he almost went misty eyed at this overwhelming feeling of relief and awe. Instead...

...Instead, he just smiled a wide, happy smile, and; to the surprise and relief of the others, started giggling. "I feel...great!" Naruto finally replied, causing the anthro-wolf to inwardly sigh with relief, as he too, partially expected the worst. "Heck, I feel greater than great! I feel fantastic!!" Laughing happily, he stood up, earning a snicker from Hunter as the boy's entire body; save for his head and little arms were completely covered by his now tarp-like T-Shirt.

"I dunno, I just wanna...play!" Naruto blurted, giggling to himself. Kiba chuckled, placing the pup atop his head like the old days and stood up, also completely covered by his giant shirt as he playfully nudged Naruto as he said, "Heh, ya took the words right outta my mouth, bonehead!"

Hunter just laughed as he continue searching high and low in the closet and said, "Well, don't worry, we won't be cooped up for much longer, just gotta find-" Then, his ears perked up, "Aha!" he exclaimed happily as he reached beneath a sea of crumpled clothes, and pulled out the respective attires for both Naruto and Kiba, both of which were still in surprisingly pristine condition.

Hehe, thank you, Midna... Hunter thought to himself as he turned to the boys and handed them their more appropriately proportioned attires. "Here ya go, boys!"

The two youths beamed happily, admiring the change of clothing in their little hands, before Naruto headed over to the bathroom to change, leaving Kiba to keep playing with Akamaru for a moment before Naruto returned, fully dressed. Kiba gave the boy a thumbs up then headed to the bathroom as well, before returning with his new attire and necklace. Despite himself, Naruto grinned and said, "Lookin' snazzy, Kiba!" Kiba just laughed and said, "Heh, thanks, Uzumaki!"

Hunter then turned towards the three and asked, "Well, boys? Whadduya feel like doing?"

The two youths turned to each other for a moment, then grinned mischievously, before turning back to the elder wolf-person and answering...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: The boys regress, completely in awe...

choices: The boys reach the park
The boys and Akamaru are stopped by a large dog, much to Hunter's concern...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
"Can we go play in the park?" Naruto asked excitedly, holding his fists in front of him and grinning. "I gotta ton of energy right now, and I really, really wanna play 'n run 'n stuff!"

Hunter chuckled at the enthusiasm of the little blonde boy-now wearing a dark-blue, short-sleeved t-shirt with a thick, green horizontal stripe running across his midsection and black khaki shorts, with a brown belt looped around the waist (not visible under the shirt, of course)-practically vibrating in place before him. "W-well, that depends," Hunter managed through his laughter. "Do ya know if this town has any good parks?"

Kiba-himself wearing a red, short-sleeved v-necked hoodie (with the hood down near his shoulder, and Akamaru nestled snugly inside said hood) with the opening far enough down his chest where the entirety of his necklace, holding a simple metal tag at the end, could be seen, two yellow streaks not unlike the red ones on his face beginning from the bottom of the hoodie from the left side of his waist and running diagonally all the up to the opposite shoulder, alongside a pair of brown khaki pants and a black belt (again, hidden under his hoodie)-smirked. "Yep; me 'n Akamaru found a really nice one on our way over here." His smirk became a wide, toothy grin. "It's real big and open, lotsa trees, lotsa space..."

...and I think I even saw a few squirrels there! Akamaru barked excitedly, tail wagging at the thought of chasing a few of the small, swift rodents.

Hunter laughed at the pup's eagerness...and that of his human friend's, who appeared to be buzzing with as much energy as Naruto, as if his massive, toothy grin wasn't evidence enough. "Yeah, I guess we can go," the wolf agreed, smiling. "You remember where it is?"

Kiba nodded eagerly. "Yeah! Me 'n Akamaru'll lead the way!" As though to punctuate this, the pup leapt out of his hood and landed on the floor beside him, yipping eagerly.

Naruto pouted. "You're leading?"

Laughing, Kiba jabbed Naruto playfully in the arm. "Well, duh; me 'n Akamaru know the way, remember?"

"Well, yeah," Naruto admitted, folding his arms. "Still, I kinda hoped we could...um..." Naruto gulped, suddenly looking a little unsure. "Ya know...race?"

Kiba laughed, giving Naruto another friendly jab in the shoulder. "What're ya gettin' all nervous for, ya big goof? Ya wanna do something, ya say it!" Beaming, he took the arm he'd used to jab Naruto and draped it about his shoulders, pulling him in closer. "We're friends, remember?"

At this, Naruto appeared to get a bit misty-eyed, and both Kiba and Hunter got slightly alarmed...at least, until Naruto's face split in a huge grin. "Aww, don't go gettin all sappy on me!" he retorted, playfully shoving Kiba away. The little dog-nin, rather than get upset, simply giggled and shoved Naruto back with his shoulder.

Hunter smiled warmly at the sight. Man, for all their arguing, they really are friends, aren't they... Still smiling, he went over to his duffel and grabbed his MP3; he'd need something to do at the park, after all...

As he did this, Akamaru looked up at Kiba and wagged his tail. Hey, Kiba, I think I know how you 'n Naruto can have that race and we can still get to the park.

Kneeling down, Kiba grinned at his pal. "Really? What didja have in mind?"

Naruto, hearing this, turned toward the dog-nin and his partner. "Huh? What's Akamaru sayin' now?"

Kiba, still kneeling, turned his head toward Naruto. "Akamaru says he knows how we can get to the park and still have that race." Naruto's face damn near lit up and this revelation, but before he could respond, Kiba turned back to Akamaru. "So what's your plan, boy?"

Akamaru wagged his tail. OK, so what I was thinkin' was this: I'll lead the way, and you 'n Naruto can follow behind me and race each other to your heart's content. Sound like a plan?

Kiba grinned, ruffling his buddy's head. "Sounds great to me, boy!"

Naruto was scarcely able to keep from grinning as Kiba got to his feet and turned to face him. "So? What'd he say?"

Kiba smiled. "He said he'd lead the way, and the two of us could just race one another." The smile became a smirk. "You OK losing to a puppy?"

Naruto smirked in return. "Heehee, so long as it means I beat you!"

Kiba folded his arms, still smirking. "Heh, in your dreams..."

Laughing at the display, Hunter walked toward the door. "Well, whoever's gonna win, you boys look like you're about ready to go." At Naruto and Kiba's eager agreement, Hunter opened the door. "Shall we?"

No sooner was that word out of Hunter's muzzle than Akamaru, in a flash of white fur, bolted right out the door, followed closely by the two young boys. Hunter, initially a bit flustered, managed a smile. "I'll take that as a resounding 'yes'." Grabbing his earbuds, he placed them in his ears and strolled out the door after them. Eh, so long as I can follow their scent, I can find the park and maybe catch up with them.... He smiled and shook his head as he heard Akamaru's yips and Naruto and Kiba's shouts and giggles in the distance, and saw their shrinking forms as they ran. And then of course, there's that... Chuckling, he reached into his pocket, hit the 'Play' button on his MP3 player, and strolled after them at a brisk pace. All the while, the music played:

Ooga chaka, Ooga ooga ooga chaka...

After a few minutes, Hunter finally caught up to the boys, just as...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: "Can we go play in the park?"

choices: All that playtime worked up an appetite
The boys ask Hunter to play too
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
I'm hooked on a feeling...

As the minutes ticked away, Hunter was walking and bopping his head to the beat of his mp3 player, even idly singing and grooving to the beat himself. "I'm high on believing...that you're in love with m-" he stopped singing and grooving mid-sentence upon reaching his destination, and discovering the two youths panting and gasping for breath as they slouched forward, catching their breaths while the little energized puppy continued yipping happily. Oh boy! That was fun, wasn't it, Kiba? We haven't raced to the park like that in years!

Kiba just laughed, exhausted, but utterly thrilled as he turned towards his equally pooped buddy and gave the boy a thumbs up. "I still can't believe you actually beat me this time, Uzumaki! Nice job!" Still catching his breath, Naruto smiled and rubbed the back of his extra fuzzy head bashfully as he said, "Heehee, thanks, Kiba! Still, you definitely didn't make it easy! Heck, that was one of the closest races we've ever had!"

Hunter watched the scene as the two boys laugh joyously amongst themselves and couldn't help but smirk himself, before eventually joining up with the gang and interjecting with, "Well, here we are, boys! So go ahead and have a ball, I s'pose," Hunter said as he walked by the two youths and ruffled the tops of their heads before plopping a seat at a nearby bench. As he did, both boys turned to each other as Kiba raised his shoulders and asked, "Welp, Naruto, anything you wanna do now that we're here?"

Naruto didn't say anything for a moment. Instead, a mischievous grin grew over his face as he bopped Kiba on the shoulder, yelled "Tag! You're it!" and immediately sprinted off. "Wha-ohhoho no you don't!" Kiba finally responded before pursuing after the boy. The two immediately took pursuit across the park for a fairly decent period of time, with Naruto sprinting as fast as his little legs would take him, and Kiba trailing not far behind, trying to tag him back. As they ran off, Naruto turned his head over-shoulder and asked, "Heh, what's wrong? Can'tcha catch me?" Kiba just grinned impishly and rather than just 'tag' the boy, proceeded to pounce at him, yelling "GOTCHA!"

Somewhat concerned, Hunter paused his music and rose from his seat and watched the two take a hearty tumble as they rolled down the grassy slope, but his fear immediately subsided when he paused his music and heard the two boys laughing heartily the whole way down. Upon landing, both boys landed sided by side against each other and on their backs, panting and laughing as Naruto giggled exhausted and said, "Hehe, nice one, dog-breathe!" Kiba just laughed and said, "Yeah, but not as nice as-" and as if earning a second wind, bopped Naruto, startling him as Kiba jumped to his feet and sprinted off, whilst screaming, "TAG! Now YOU'RE it, bonehead!"

"Hey, that's MY thing!" joked Naruto before hopping to his feet and taking off after Kiba. Hunter just smirked as he turned to the pup near him and asked, "Man, these two can play pretty rough, can't th-" but before he could finish, Akamaru was already taking off after them, yipping merrily as he took off and pounced against the boys as well.

Hunter just chuckled to himself and shook his head as he sat back down, at ease as the boys and pup laughed and played, (albeit roughly). As he watched them carry on as playfully and innocently as they did, he couldn't help but smile a bit warmly at the sight. Those guys are pretty lucky to have such a strong friendship like that, Hunter thought to himself, before once again, hitting the play button...

'Cause baby, there aaaain't noooo moooountain hiiiiiiiiiiigh enooooooough...

The time just ticked away as the boys and pup ran across the grass, chasing and tackling each other with Akamaru occasionally pouncing across someone's face and knocking them down in a hurry. After a good amount of time, all of which just ticked by like a second for the three youths, eventually, both Naruto and Kiba had once again landed on their backs side by side, chests rising and dropping rapidly as they panted for breath, and all with hearty smiles across their faces. In addition to which, the time they'd spent as active as they had seemed to work off whatever was left to work in from their tummies from their earlier escapades.

"Hehehe, y'know what, Naruto? That was some of the most fun I've had in years!" Kiba exclaims to his blonde friend, just as Akamaru parks his exhausted little body atop Kiba's chest, panting as his tail wagged rapidly. You're telling me! I even chased a few dumb squirrels!

Laughing, Kiba ruffled the pups head before folding his arms behind his head. "Took the words right outta my mouth," Naruto replied as he chuckled to himself, whilst nodding in agreement. Resting one arm behind his head and the other on his chest, Naruto turned to both Kiba and Akamaru and in a more sincere tone, said, "Y'know, I wanna thank you guys."

Turning his head towards Naruto, Kiba raised an eyebrow and asked, "Hm? What for?"

"I guess, for helpin' me see that being a kid really CAN be fun! Truth me told, I was...kinda scared when I drank Hunter's vial, cause I thought I'd start remembering all the bad stuff again, and feeling the way I did the first time around...but, I don't. Because I got you guys, and, I just wanna let you both know how grateful I am, so, thanks, really."
