Kiba just smiled warmly and playfully nudged Naruto in the arm as he said, "Hey, what're friends for, right?"

Akamaru just got up and trotted over to Naruto before licking him merrily across the face, earning a ticklish laugh from the boy as he playfully ruffled the pup's head in turn, before Akamaru trotted back and plopped between the two boys. Shortly after, the trio sighed blissfully as both Naruto and Kiba tilted their heads skyward, staring off peacefully into the sky.

More and more time had gone by, with the boys and pup exhausted and continuing to just lay in peace atop the grass, and Hunter continuing to bop his head to more tunes.

When enough time had passed...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: The boys reach the park

choices: "You kids feel like ice cream?"
"You kids up for something sweet?"
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
So now we fly ever free, we're free before the thunderstorm...

Leaning back against the bench with his arms folded behind his head, Hunter smiled as he lightly bobbed his head to the tune of his MP3. Ah man, this is great; nice day, good tunes, Naruto and Kiba relaxing... He sighed happily and shut his eyes. Doesn't get any better than this...

No sooner had he thought this than his eyes flew open, his breath whooshing out of him as something crashed into his midsection. Coughing and removing his earbuds, Hunter looked down to see Naruto leaning against him, beaming and leaning his hands against the wolf's stomach. "Oof...hey, Naruto..."

Giggling, the boy looked up at him, grinning so wide his eyes squinted shut. "Heya, Hunter!"

Coughing a bit more, Hunter took a few deep breaths to recompose himself before replying, "So...you got your second wind?"

"Yup!" Kiba piped up as he came up behind Naruto, arms folded behind his head with Akamaru following close behind. Coming to a stop beside his friend, he looked up and gave Hunter a toothy grin. "Still can't believe I have so much energy again, though; all it took was a little rest..." He stretched, smiling as he did so. "...and I feel like I could run from here to Suna!"

Giggling, Naruto took his hands off Hunter's midsection. "Yeah!" He exclaimed, hopping up and down in place. "I feel like I could play all day!"

Chuckling in spite of himself, Hunter reached out and ruffled the boys' heads. "Heh, yeah, that stuff's pretty great, ain't it?"

Both boys nodded emphatically...before they fixed Hunter with mischievous grins. Almost dreading what they might have been planning, Hunter nonetheless asked, "Um, boys? What're you smiling about?"

Naruto and Kiba glanced at one another, giggled, then looked back at Hunter. "Weeeeell," Naruto began, folding his arms behind his head. "We were thinkin'; since you were nice enough to give us some of that formula..."

Kiba, getting the drift, grinned even more mischievously. "...it only makes sense we'd repay the favor,and..."

At this, both boys spoke up simultaneously:

"Ask ya to play with us!"

Hunter blinked slowly. "...you want me to play with you guys?"

"Yeah!" Naruto exclaimed, rocking on his feet a bit. "I mean,even if you're at your normal age right now, it'd still be fun roughhousing with ya..."

Kiba smirked. "And besides, playing with Akamaru like he is now is a ton of fun, but I kinda feel like playin' around with something that's big and furry..." Akamaru, from beside Kiba, yapped his agreement.

Hunter took a deep breath. "W-well," he began, scratching the back of his head. "I-I appreciate it, boys; really, I do, but see, wolves play kinda rough, a-and there's the fact we have a bite pressure of 1500 pounds of pressure per square inch, and if I got too into it, I'd..."

"Pleeeeeeeeeeaaaaaaase?" Naruto and Kiba entreated, giving Hunter their widest, toothiest, most hopeful smiles. At this, the wolf's eyes flew wide open, and he began to become short of breath as the unexpected onslaught of cuteness assailed his senses. "I-I-er, um..."

Taking advantage of Hunter's momentary distraction, Naruto and Kiba took a paw each and eagerly pulled him off the bench, tugging him along until they were out in the grassy field, Akamaru following and barking happily all the way. "Don't worry, Hunter, we'll be fine!" Naruto insisted,giggling at Hunter's reaction. "We're ninja, 'member? We can handle it!"

"Yeah, don't be chicken!" Kiba added. He smirked, nudging the wolf's side. "Unless, of course, ya don't wanna..."

"H-huh?" Hunter mumbled. Shaking his head, he freed himself from his trance and looked down at the two boys. He studied them for a few seconds before, finally, he nodded. "Alright, I guess I'm game..." At this, Naruto and Kiba let out a cheer, pumping their arms in the air. "But," he added, the sides of his muzzle twitching upward, "you two should know something..."

Surprised, the boys lowered their arms, looking up at the anthro curiously. "What's that?" Naruto asked, tilting his head in confusion.

Hunter's smirk widened, exposing some of his sharp teeth. "That there are consequences for using your cuteness against me."

The blonde boy's eyes widened. "Wh-wha--"

He scarcely had time to say anything else before Hunter dropped to all fours, turned toward him, and playfully lunged at him. He stopped within a few inches of him, but the movement was enough to knock Naruto flat on his rump. "Owww...." he winced, rubbing the seat of his shorts painfully. Hunter, however, had no intention of giving him any respite; still on all fours, he closed the distance between them in seconds, startling Naruto again, and causing him to fall flat on his back.

Perfect, Hunter thought to himself, tail wagging. Grinning mischievously, he got on his knees, reached his paws out...

...and grabbed the bottom of Naruto's shirt, pulling it up so that his bare tummy (and the belt below it) were showing for the whole world to see. Naruto's eyebrows raised in surprise and confusion. "H-Hunter? What're you..." Kiba, who already had an idea of what Hunter was planning, snickered, even as he feared that the same 'punishment' would be visited upon him...

"Tell me, Naruto," Hunter began casually, eyes gleaming. "Have you ever been tickled before?"

"E-eh?" Naruto's eyes widened. "H-Hunter, whaHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

The boys arms and legs began flailing wildly as Hunter reached his paws out and began tickling every part of Naruto's exposed tummy that he could find: the sides, the front, even the belly-button. All the while, the boy laughed uproariously, eyes squeezed shut. "Hunter, StaHAHAHAHAHAP! That-thaHAHAHAHAHAT ticklHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

Kiba, unable to keep still any longer, leapt at Hunter's back, eager to 'save' his friend from his 'torment.' However, Hunter spun around with surprising speed, reaching his arms out and pinning Kiba to the ground. As the boy playfully struggled, Hunter looked toward Akamaru. "Akamaru, if you please..."

Akamaru barked, wagging his tail. It'd be my absolute pleasure. Prancing over to Kiba, he began climbing up on the boy, stopping right before his hoodie. Eyes widening, Kiba stammered, "A-Akamaru? What're you..."

Nothin' personal, pal, Akamaru woofed smugly before he ducked down, squirmed underneath the hoodie...and began crawling up Kiba's torso, pulling the hoodie up along with him and exposing more and more bare flesh. By the time Akamaru stopped and hopped off of Kiba, the entirety of his bare tummy was showing, in addition to his black belt. Satisfied, Akamaru looked up at the anthro. All yours.

"A-Akamaru!" Kiba exclaimed, though his laughs distorted it somewhat. "You traitAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

His protest was cut off as Hunter released Kiba's arms, only to reach his paws out and mercilessly begin tickling the child's bare stomach as well. "H-hey, that's no faiHAHAHAHAHAHASTOPPIT, STOPPIT! I'm tickliHAHAHAHHAHAHAHA!"

Seeing Kiba laugh and flail harder, Hunter only grinned and tickled the boy with greater intensity. He was getting so into it that he didn't notice Naruto climbing to his feet behind him, pulling his shirt down, and grinning. Tensing his little legs, Naruto leapt...

...and landed directly on Hunter's back, the anthro not reacting in time. Eyes widening, Hunter retracted his arms and playfully stood up and grabbed at his back, trying to get the boy off. He twisted and spun about, laughing...only to let out a surprised yelp as Kiba got up and lunged at his legs, knocking him off balance and sending him crashing to the ground. Even as he lay there and adjusted his glasses, though, Kiba, Akamaru, and Naruto leapt upon him in a dogpile. Not planning to give up, though, Hunter began rolling, taking all three youths with him, though if their laughs, giggle, and yips were any indication, they were hardly objecting.

Soon, all four were laughing, barking, and roughhousing, Hunter sneaking in tickles where he could, with the two boys and pup playfully hitting and nipping at him. They carried on in this fashion for a while, before, finally, all four collapsed back on the ground, arms (and paws) splayed out at their sides as they panted happily, exhausted but happy to be so.

Finally, Hunter looked from side to side at the two happily-panting boys, and asked...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: The boys ask Hunter to play too

choices: Head into the bakery and order as planned
Enter the Pie Eating Contest
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
"Something sweet, eh…?" Kiba remarked, licking his lips eagerly, still trying to catch his breath. "Come to think of it, I COULD go for something sweet and sugary right about now. How 'bout you, boy?" Akamaru yipped happily, giving Kiba all the answer he needed as he and Hunter turned their attention to Naruto. "What about you, little guy?" asked Hunter. As if to answer his question, Naruto's tummy let out an audible growl, causing the boy to blush as he rubbed the back of his head, chuckling sheepishly.

Hunter just laughed and playfully patted the boys' shoulder. "Then it's settled," remarked Hunter as he rose to his feet, adjusted his glasses and dusted himself off. Both youths simply hopped to their feet, and; likewise to Hunter, dusted themselves off, as Akamaru hopped atop Kiba's head. And in no time at all, all four were off, inspecting the small little town.

As they walked on, Naruto beamed happily at the three others and said, "Wow-wee, hehehe, I honestly don't remember the last time I had so much fun!" Looking down at the boy, Hunter smiled and ruffled the boys fuzzy head. "Y'know something? Same here! I mean, don't get me wrong, I'm not OLD or anything, like even remotely, but you guys know how it is. Ya get older and you don't really get to just to roughhousing or playing the way we just did. Heck, it was kinda…refreshing," Hunter admitted, rubbing the back of his head. Kiba nodded in agreement happily and said, "Tell me about it! Even if we ever did, I never had this much energy just firing me up now then at my regular age!"

"Exactly," the anthro wolf replied, then looked down at the two boys and; with a mischievous grin on his muzzle, added, "Eeehehehehe, not to mention, now I know your ultimate weakness…" And to emphasize this, he held his paws up the way he did before he began tickling the two boys, causing their eyes to widen as they both stepped back cautiously, causing the pup atop Kiba's head to snicker as Hunter looked towards him and gave him a subtle wink.

Just then, the wolf stopped in his tracks as his nose twitched, as a certain aroma filled his nostrils. "Ohhh, wow..." he muttered, licking his chops at the mouth watering scent. Kiba turned curiously and asked, "Huh? What're ya-" and like Hunter, he too, caught a whiff a heavenly and sweet aroma wafting fairly close by. Sure enough, Akamaru was in the same boat, leaving Naruto scratching his head as he saw his three entranced compatriots. Finally, his shoulders rose in curiosity as he asked, "Errr...am I missin' something here?"

Not a single one replied. Instead, they each started 'following' the scent, all their mouths practically watering as they did. However confused by this scene, Naruto nonetheless just shrugged and followed along the others, looking around to see what it was had them all looking and acting so goofy.

Sure enough, as time went on, Naruto caught the scent, and was immediately greeted by a nearby bakery, with several freshly baked pies waiting at a table out front. Outside, an older man; possibly the owner or chef, was sweeping up outside merrily as he looked up and saw the three youths and anthro-wolf person in glasses glaring in awe. Surprisingly, he just smiled warmly and put his broom aside. "Hehe, yeah, we get that a lot. What can I do you youngsters for?"

Snapping himself out of his trance, Hunter adjusted his glasses and worked up a friendly smile. "Hiya! Well, my little pals and I were actually wandering through town looking to find something sweet, and then that heavenly aroma picked up and well..."

Immediately, the older man started laughing as he remarked, "Well, shoot, son, pies don't get any sweeter than ours. Come on in, see if there's anything you boys like! Even the little fella over there," he added, pointing at the pup atop Kiba's head, still panting happily from the scent.

If we're sitting down, then no booths! barked Akamaru.

The trio grimaced, immediately remembering that earlier onslaught as they nodded, making sure they'd get a table this time. As they did however, the table with the freshly baked pies caught Naruto's eye as he turned to the older man and asked, "Hey, Mister, what's going on over there?"

The older man turned and with a hearty grin, replied, "That; young man, is a little event we throw every now and then."

"An event?" Kiba added, tilting his head curiously. The man nodded and replied, "Well, people always say they LOOOOVE pies; that they can eat 'em for days, right? So, we have people put their money where their mouth is, so to speak. And we do so, by throwing a pie eating contest. Rules're simple really. The contestants who can eat every single pie on their platters win a free 'all-you-can-eat' pass for any day of their choosin'."

Upon hearing that, the two youths and wolf-person shared a glance, while Akamaru whined to himself, already knowing where this situation was leading. That is, until the man laughed to himself and added, "Hehe, but I tell ya, boys, awful lotta greenhorns 'round these parts. Cause to this day, not a single contestant's ever had the stomach to put away these little beauties. Anywho, come on and see what you boys like."

They thought for a moment, then ultimately, they decide to...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: "You kids up for something sweet?"

choices: The four start strong, tearing through their pies
The pies are rather rich, so they ask for something to drink alongside them
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Naruto grinned widely. "Do we hafta do anything special to enter the pie-eating contest?"

The man stared at the small boy, no more than eight, for a few seconds before replying, "Well, no..." He fished around in his apron, pulling out a sheet of paper. "All ya gotta do is sign here, and yer in." The man scratched the back of his head. "But, erm, you sure about this? I mean, it's a lot of pies, and I don't want you getting a stomachache..."

Kiba smirked, patting his flat belly. "Stomachache? Ah, we can handle it. Right, boy?" Akamaru simply whined from his position atop Kiba's head.

Hunter chuckled, ruffling the top of Kiba's head (and taking care not to knock Akamaru off in the process). "Eh, I think I'll enter, too..." he winked at the man. "...but I wouldn't worry too much about these two. Trust me, they can put it away like nobody's business." As if to emphasize this, both boys stomachs rumbled. Rather than wince, though, they simply grinned.

The man, staring at them, finally sighed, the smile returning to his face. "Alright; I was startin' to wonder if anyone would come around, anyway." Walking over to the long table, he set the paper down on a part of it not filled up with pies. "Just c'mere, sign the paper, and yer in."

Eagerly, Naruto and Kiba rushed ahead, leaving a chuckling Hunter to follow them. Within moments, all three of them crowded around the table, pens in hand (the man had been thoughtful enough to provide a few), eagerly scribbling their names down. Once they had, the man nodded, took the paper, and instructed the three of them to sit down in front of the pies. The three of them (and Akamaru, of course) obliged, practically drooling as the delectable scents of the pies assailed their nostrils.

Hunter took a deep whiff of a pie in front of him, tail wagging. "Ooh...smells like apple..." He licked his chops. "My favorite..."

Kiba, likewise, grinned as he took in the scents of the pies. "Yeah; they also got blueberry, cherry, chocolate cream..."

Naruto, sniffing deeply, giggled. "I don't care what kind they are; they all smell great!"

Chuckling, the man nodded. "Smell? Heh, wait'll you taste 'em!" The man looked at his watch. "Ya won't have to wait long, either; it starts up in ten minutes!"

Naruto groaned, taking a deep sniff. "Aw man... that long?"

Laughing, the man ruffled Naruto's head (eliciting a giggle from the boy in the process). "Ah, don't worry; I know it seems like a bit, but trust me, it'll be worth it!" With that, the man made his way back inside the bakery, presumably to prepare more pies.

The four passed the ten minutes with small talk, some chatting, and more than a little boasting. Akamaru, for his part, actually looked a little excited; even though he knew how things were going to end up, the pies smelled so yummy...

As they chatted, they noticed a few people beginning to show up; the spectators, no doubt. Evidently, they weren't used to seeing a wolf-person and two little kids competing, if their startled looks and confused murmurs to one another were any indication. Hunter couldn't help but smirk. Heh, they have no idea...

Over the next few minutes, more and more people began showing up until, finally, there were at least a few dozen people. Hunter raised an eyebrow. Huh; must be a pretty well-known event around here. He grinned, licking his chops. Ah well; least that means more people to watch us win...

Finally, the bakery owner/chef emerged. Waving to the spectators, he announced, "Thank you all for coming, for what is sure to be a contest unlike any other!" At this, the crowd cheered. "Will these three...er, gentlemen..."

And dog, Akamaru added, hopping down from Kiba's head and landing on the table.

"...achieve that which no other contestant has before?" The man smiled, gesturing toward the contestants. "Let's find out, shall we?"

Turning back to the crowd, he continued, "The rules are simple: the contestants are to eat all the pies before them, as well as the ones that will be brought out. If they can finish, they win, and receive a pass for all the free baked goods they want! There is no time limit!"

Walking up to the four, he smiled. "Good luck, all of you; hope your stomachs are ready." At the eager nods from all four, the man turned back to the crowd, raised his arm, and yelled, "Let the contest begin!"

And with that, Naruto, Kiba, and Hunter grabbed the forks that had been provided to them and mercilessly leapt upon their first pies. Akamaru, not wanting to be left out, joined in as well...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Enter the Pie Eating Contest

choices: The four keep tearing away at excellent pace
Their pace began to slow down just slightly
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The gang was tearing into the pies for about a few seconds tops, and in unison, both the boys, the pup and the wolf-person all stopped for just a moment, as their eyes widened with bewilderment...

"T-this..." started Hunter, before Naruto giggled joyously and finished for him, "This is the best pie I've ever eaten!"

Nearby, the owner just smirked proudly and tipped his chef's hat. "Nothin' but the absolute finest here, boys," he said with pride as the others looked amongst themselves and grinned eagerly. Within no time at all, the four were tearing through their pies with rapid speed, trying to fit as much of that delicious and perfectly warm pastry into their mouths as they possibly could. Little Akamaru was practically stuffing his entire head into the plate as his tiny maw chowed down on the warm gooey deliciousness of his classic Cherry Pie.

Within no time at all, the four had torn through their first rich, delicious pies with gusto. "Mmmm!" muttered Naruto as he rubbed his tummy happily, "What was that? Yummy Meringue Pie?" The man just chuckled and said, "Lemon Meringue, but close enough, young'n." Kiba simply smacked his lips and said, "Well, if the rest of these are even half as good as these were, something tells me we're gonna REALLY like this contest!"

Hunter patted his stomach and nodded with agreement, still licking pie crumbs from his muzzle. "You said it, kiddo." He then glanced up at the man and added, "I'll say this much, these were definitely the richest pies I've ever eaten. Don't suppose we could have something to wash these bad boys down with, could we?" But the owner just winked at the wolf and replied, "Say no more, young fella!" With that, he headed back to his shop just briefly, and; almost comically, juggled three pitchers of creamy whole milk, and a bowl of water atop his chefs hat. "Afterall, what's dessert with a lil bit'uh milk to wash it all down with?"

And as gracefully as a wild hog, the man managed to shuffle all three pitchers directly before the three bipedal contestants, and the bowl atop his hat directly before the tiny pup. Naruto and Kiba giggled at the scene. Even Hunter couldn't help but snicker at the display, but nonetheless, the trio thanked the man and went right to town on their next respective pies. Each bite was somehow better than the last as more warm, gooey and rich pie slid down their throats and right into their eager tummies. After a little while, Hunter grabbed his pitcher and chugged away for a brief while to wash down the delectable baked pastry. Placing his pitcher down, he sighed with relief and wiped his maw with his forearm, before turning his attention to the two youths.

Like when he was a pup, they both struggled a bit to raise their heavy pitchers, but eventually managed, both chugging away with big hearty smiles on their faces as their little legs kicked about joyously. Awww, okay, fine, THAT is pretty adorable... Hunter thought as he smirked and watched the two youths carry about happily. Within no time at all, the boys had placed their pitchers down and sighed happily before tearing into their pies.

The second wave of pies had been all but demolished by the four, and already, it was just barely starting to show, as their stomachs all made the slightest and just barely noticeable bulges beneath each of their shirts. Even Akamaru's furry little concave tummy had now flattened a bit as more and more pie entered it. But that didn't slow them down none, not by a long shot.

Almost immediately after finishing their second pies, all four were getting to work on their third pies. Naruto glanced at Akamaru digging his little face into his pie and couldn't help but giggle as he turned to Kiba and said, "Heehee, y'know, with pies as good as these, I'm almost disappointed we can't just stick our faces into our pans like that." Kiba just snickered and said, "Knowin' you, ya'd probably get your head stuck in the pan."

"H-hey, that only happened that one time! How was I supposed to know they made pans that small?"

"It was extra large!" retorted Kiba, laughing heartily. Naruto just grumbled beneath his breath and grabbed his pie. "Pfft, yeah, extra large for a hummingbird!" But their bickering immediately subsided when they took a bite of their flavorful pies, causing them to dig right back in again.

Akamaru pulled his head out and started drinking from his waterbowl as he happily yipped. These things are so good, that I almost don't even care how blimped out we're all gonna be when we finish! Hunter just chuckled and said, "Good thing we're not at a booth, right?"

And at that thought, all four stopped eating mid bite for a moment and stared blankly for a moment, shuddering at the memory...then immediately and happily dove right back into their pies, demolishing the third in no time as they eagerly moved onto their fourth pies. The crowd of spectators watched ever eagerly as they tore into their pies, all wondering if these boys and canines could pull through or falter like the rest.

As time went on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: The pies are rich, so they ask for a drink.

choices: "All the pies in the next batch are three times as big as the ones you just ate"
"There's four times as many pies this time around, and they're a la mode"
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The four dug into their fourth pies with gusto, cramming as much of the baked dessert into their waiting maws as they could. This, of course, had less to do with the fact that they were in a competition than the fact that the pies were just that damn good. Apple, banana cream, blueberry...the fresh-baked pies assailed their taste buds with explosions of warmth and sweetness, creating a delightful warming sensation as they swallowed, sending the chunks of pastry and filling down their throats and into their waiting bellies.

Mmm, these are so yummy! Naruto thought to himself as he forked a particularly large chunk of pie into his mouth, splattering some blueberry filling on his cheeks. I don't even care whether we win or not! Giggling through his mouthful, he kicked his feet a bit, struck by how much fun he was having.

Likewise, Kiba grinned happily as he chewed a particularly large mouthful of banana cream pie. Oh man...I really wish the village had bakeries with stuff this good! He grinned even wider at te sight of Akamaru, once again sticking his entire head into a pie (this one peach) and gobbling as much of it up at a time as he could. Heh, don't blame ya buddy... Licking his lips, he dove right back into his pie. Hunter, eagerly scarfing down his apple pie, simply looked at the two boys having the time of their lives as they went to town on their pies and smiled. Aww...look at how happy they are...

Soon, their respective pies had been reduced to empty tins. They only stopped for a quick drink of milk (and water, in Akamaru's case) before leaping into their fifth pies, not losing any speed at all. Soon, the sixteen empty pie tins became twenty. Then twenty-four. Then twenty-eight, thirty-two, thirty-six...

The crowd watched, awestruck, as the bipedal wolf, two young boys, and little puppy devoured pie after pie, only stopping to catch their breath or taking a drink before diving back in. During the previous events, most of the contestants would have at least started slowing down a bit...

However, due to the sheer size of the pies, their tummies continued to be visibly affected by their efforts. The tiny bulges underneath Hunter and Naruto's shirts and Kiba's hoodie slowly grew and grew, making more of an impression as each pie was polished off. In the meantime, Akamaru's tummy flattened more and more, before, finally, it began to curve outward a bit.

Nonetheless, they pressed on, enjoying the tastes and textures of the pies too much to worry too much about the effects they were having on their midsections. As such, they continued gobbling their pies, empty tins continued to pile up, and their bellies slowly bulged bigger and bigger.

Finally, after they had each polished off a dozen pies each, they each let out satisfied belches and leaned back in their chairs to rest, laying their hands (or paws, in Hunter's case) on top of their bellies. Akamaru, likewise, lay on his side, letting his tongue hang out the side of his mouth. The three bipeds' stomachs had grown considerably, each looking as though they'd swallowed a basketball whole. In Naruto and Kiba's cases, this caused the patterns on their shirt and hoodie (the horizontal stripe and the diagonal yellow 'slash' marks, respectively) to distort a bit as they pressed outwards. Their stomachs were still completely concealed, but if they kept up the pace they'd been going at, that wasn't likely to last long. Akamaru, on the other paw, looked as though he'd once again swallowed a grapefruit whole.

"Oh man," Naruto sighed happily, burping. "I don't think I've ever eaten that many pies at once..."

Kiba licked his lips, getting a few crumbs off his face. "Don't tell me you're slowing down NOW, Naruto..."

Naruto smirked at Kiba. "With pies these tasty? In your dreams!" Kiba smirked in return, belching as he did so.

Hunter, licking the sides of his muzzle, grinned down at the two boys (and pup). "Seriously, though; these pies are amazing!" He laughed, scratching the back of his head. "You don't think they'd let me have the recipe, do ya?"

Belching surprisingly loudly for a pup of his size, Akamaru licked his chops and wagged his tail. With pies these fantastic? Doubt it. Laughing, Kiba reached out and scratched Akamaru's grapefruit-sized tummy, causing the dog's leg to kick a bit.

Laughing, the owner came up to them. "Well, boys, color me impressed; I've never seen anyone get past the first round this fast before."

Kiba laughed. "Well, the pies are really tasty, and we're really hungry; it's to be expected, ya know?"

The man smiled and ruffled the boy's head. "Heh; hope you're right, kiddo, 'cause the next round's gonna be a doozy..."

Hunter, slightly curious, flicked his ears, even as he rubbed his belly with a paw. "How so?" Even as he asked the question, though, he noticed a ripple of excitement going through the crowd. Huh, must be pretty big...

Akamaru, sensing this as well, whined. I've got a really, REALLY bad feeling about this...

The man chuckled, standing back up and rubbing the back of his head. "Well..."
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: The four keep tearing away at excellent pace

choices: Their pants begin to feel a bit snug
Their pace slows down as the pies take their toll
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
"There's something you young'ns outta know 'bout the next batch'uh pies you're about to take on," the man started before heading into his bakery for a moment, leaving the four contestants outside, scratching their heads with curiosity. Then, he returned, wheeling a fairly large cart, which; as soon as the others saw it, practically made all their jaws drop to the table, for on that cart, was four trays. And on each of those trays was an ample amount of pies...pies which were...substantially larger than the ones they'd just ingested.

With a mighty heave, he planted a tray before each contestant, letting the delicious aroma and overwhelming size sink in from point blank with each one. Naruto, Kiba, Hunter, even Akamaru; all of them, simply gazed at their trays so wide eyed, that their eyes looked about the size of saucers. All four just sat there, dumbfounded, in utter and complete silence. Until finally, Hunter broke the silence...kind of.

"T-t-these...ummm...they're-"

"These are freakin' HUGE!" blurted out Naruto, utterly flabbergasted, earning a laugh from the owner as he nodded and said, "Yep! They sure are, kiddo! Roughly three times the size of the pies you youngsters just ate. But hey, three times the size means three times the flavor, if ya catch my drift."

He stepped back and gestured towards the pies then said, "Well, bon appetit!"

But still, the four just sat there, utterly overwhelmed, earning some silent chatter from the onlookers. The man just shook his head and chuckled to himself. "Yeah, these babies tend to do that to people."

"So...three times as big, huh?" replied Kiba, nervously grabbing his fork and knife. Hunter gulped nervously and added, "I don't think I've ever even seen pies this big before...let alone eaten one...or several..." Akamaru whined in agreement as he placed his little paws atop the tray to support himself as he lifted himself up and glanced down at his massive pie. Am I suppose to eat this thing or...live in it...?

Admittedly, even Naruto was immensely overwhelmed and a bit intimidated, but after what seemed like a timeless moment, he worked up a grin and grabbed his fork and knife. "Well, fellas? These things ain't gonna eat themselves! Let's do this!" exclaimed Naruto, to which Kiba simply glared at the boy and blurted out, "You see the freakin' size'uh these things?!"

But Naruto just grinned confidently and said, "Oh boy, do I! But so what? We've handled way more than this, and even if these things are...huge, who doesn't love a good challenge, right?" His grin turned a bit more eager as he added, "Besides, ya heard what he said; three times the size means three times the delicious flavor! And we all know how good these pies are, right?" The others glanced amongst themselves, slowly working up grins. "They are pretty tasty," Hunter added, licking his chops. Smiling back, Kiba patted Naruto on the shoulder and said, "Alright, bonehead, I'm with ya. Let's do this th-"

No sooner than his sentence started, Akamaru had already dug his tiny head into his pie, nearly falling in completely, before sustaining himself and chowing down eagerly. Laughing, the trio wasted no time in joining the pup as they stuffed their faces with ample mouthfuls of rich, gooey...gigantic pie. Immediately, their faces lit up as that warm treat slid down their throats, but not before welcoming their mouths with a plethora of sweet, warming flavor. "Wow...these are even better than the ones we just ate!" Kiba exclaimed. Naruto just giggled merrily and nodded as he added, "Yuh-huh! I think these might be the new yummiest pies I've ever eaten!"

Hunter simply smiled and turned to the owner. "My complements to the chef!" he said merrily before he and the others resumed stuffing their faces with newfound vigor and once again; in rapid speed. The man just tipped his hat gratefully and said, "Like I said, son, nothin' but the ab-so-lute finest at our table."

Within no time at all, they had managed to tear down their first massive pie, and all pulled out the next pies, (or in Akamaru's case, have Kiba pull it for him due to their sheer massive size) and already, they were going to town on the next one, overwhelmed not by the size, but by the pure delicious flavor greeting the insides of their mouths. However, while the size wasn't taking its' toll on the contestants yet, it had already begun to take a toll on their bellies, as those basketball sized bulges the three bipedal contestants tummies were making had grown more and more, to the point where just a slight sliver of flesh could be seen beneath their shirts, or in Hunter's case, brown fur. And little Akamaru's tummy continued swelling outward to a more and more rounded state.

Nevertheless, not a single one let that stifle them as they continued into a mixture of tearing into their pies and occasionally drinking milk or water for Akamaru to wash down their delicious treats before hopping right on back for more.

As time pressed on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: All the pies are three times as big in this batch

choices: "We're gonna bust our belts!"
"We'll unbuckle, but we're still gonna bust our buttons!"
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Soon, Naruto, Kiba, Hunter, and Akamaru had demolished their second massive pies as well, only taking a quick drink before pulling out their third pies and diving into them with as much gusto as they 'd tackled the previous two with.

Mmmm, Naruto thought, gleefully kicking his legs as he forked mouthful after mouthful of delicious peach pie into his waiting maw. It's so warm and sweet...and there's so much flavor!

Kiba, likewise, grinned widely as he went to town on an apple pie. Man, I thought it'd be a pain eating these monsters...but they're so good, it doesn't even matter! A giggle escaped him as he chewed, causing him to blush slightly. Shaking his head, he swallowed and continued tearing into his pie. Man, I can't get enough of this stuff!

Hunter, likewise, was wagging his tail as he dug into a particularly moist blueberry pie. Wow...I definitely gotta come back here sometime, if only for these pies! He burped, but he simply licked his chops and dug back into the pie. Definitely didn't expect this when I came here...

Akamaru, his head stuck a good ways into a banana cream pie, wagged his tail. I'm probably gonna look like a friggin beach ball by the time I'm done all the pies... he whined a bit at this realization...before wagging his tail again and diving back in. ...but I don't care! They're all so yummy!

As they ripped into their third pies, the pastries continued taking their toll on their tummies; slowly, the three bipeds' stomachs bulged bigger and bigger, gradually causing their shirts (or hoodie, in Kiba's case) to pull further upwards and expose more skin (or fur, in Hunter's case). Obviously, in both the boys' cases, the fact that some of their bare tummies were showing meant that their belts were fully visible as well.

In Akamaru's case, his tummy continued swelling, growing bigger and rounder as more and more pie entered his gullet. It slowly began to hang a bit more under him, and the pup swore he could feel his back legs beginning to become forced apart.

Finally, each of their third pies were polished off. Licking their lips (and muzzles), they prepared to retrieve their fourth pies...

...when the three bipeds winced slightly. "Uh..." Naruto began, rubbing his belly. "Anyone else's pants beginning to feel a little tight?"

Kiba felt around his belly, which was beginning to press against his pants. "Yeah, just a bit..."

Hunter winced as he massaged his belly. "Well, whaddaya expect when you've downed a dozen pies and three giant pies?"

Akamaru, lying on his side with a noticeably larger belly that forced his back legs apart somewhat and stuck out a bit in front of him a bit, whined. Ya look like you're carrying puppies, that's what... In spite of his words, Akamaru had caught the scent of several of his pies that set him to salivating. What was more, he wasn't even feeling full yet! Who knew how pregnant he'd end up looking by the time he was done?

Hunter smirked. "Well, I dunno about you guys, but I don't wanna sit around any longer than I hafta without eating more of these awesome pies." Reaching his paws down to his waistline, he fumbled around with the front of his shorts before he got a handle on his button. Grinning, he undid his button, sighing in relief as his tummy bulged out a bit more and forced his zipper down a few teeth, pushing his shirt up a little more and exposing more belly-fur. "Ahhhh....that feels better." Smiling, he looked at the two boys. "What about you two? You unbuckling and unbuttoning?"

Naruto and Kiba got thoughtful looks on their faces. On the one hand, if they unbuttoned and unbuckled now, they'd be able to continue eating more and more of the delicious pies uninhibited. On the other hand, the snugness, while a bit uncomfortable, wasn't anywhere near painful, and undoing their belt and pants now felt almost like they were giving up. Besides, they'd skipped out on busting their clothes, at least intentionally, at the steak place, and they'd never busted a belt before; what did it feel like?

"Well?" Hunter spoke up, looking at them expectantly. "What're you boys gonna do?"

Finally, Naruto and Kiba grinned at each other and looked up at Hunter. Happily, they declared...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Their pants begin to feel a bit snug

choices: Both Naruto and Kiba's belt buckles snap off at the same time.
Either Naruto or Kiba's busts their belt buckle before the other.
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
"Well, we missed the chance to bust our buttons last time cause we wanted to play it safe," Kiba started, giggling mischievously as he turned to Naruto, who looked up at Hunter and added, "So we're gonna bust our buttons AND our belts!" Hunter; on the other hand, just stared blankly at the two eager youths, while Akamaru whined to himself. I don't think that's such a good idea, you guys...

Hunter nodded in agreement with the pup. "Don't get me wrong, it sounds fun, but don't you think that could be a little risky? My stomach was friggin' killing me when I tried to pop my button off my pants as a pup," Hunter warned them. Both boys laughed and waved their arms dismissively. "We know it might hurt a little bit, but that's the fun! We just fight through the pain and bust these bad boys to their limits!" exclaimed Kiba proudly. "And if it gets way too bad, we can always just unbutton and unbuckle," Naruto said, before grinning and patting his tummy with anticipation, "but something tells me we'll manage." After a moment passed, Hunter's muzzle worked up a smile as he ruffled both boys heads and said, "Well, if you kids are sure you can handle it." And as if to remind them that there were pies to be demolished, all four of their bellies rumbled eager for more. "Let's get this show on the road then!" exclaimed Hunter, before all four jumped back into their pies (literally in Akamaru's case)

With the additional room Hunter freed up, his belly was allowed room to extend a little more freely as he wolfed down (no pun intended) more and more of his deliciously gooey and immense pie. Seriously, that guy HAS to share this recipe... he thought to himself; tail wagging, as he gulped down another ample mouthful of pie.

Akamaru, on the other hand, was a bit more distracted as he occasionally pulled his pie-jelly stained head from the pan and glanced back at the boys, who were more than eagerly stuffing their faces and down to their ever increasing midsections. Both boys had reached the point where their tummies were now being constricted by their belts AND the button accompanying the front of their pants, and seeing the two wince slightly once they reached that capacity made the pup whine a bit more. I just hope these two don't get a tummyache... Akamaru mused to himself.

However, his woes were quickly subsided as the sound of the two youths giggling happily filled his little ears. Well, least they're having fun... Tail wagging at the sight and joyous laughter, Akamaru stuffed his head right back into the pie, as his own white furred belly continued to swell, until; without a doubt, he was now forced to separate his hind legs apart to allow his swelling tummy more space. Ugh, I just hope I don't end up rolling off the table once this is done...

Both Naruto and Kiba continued to gulp down more and more pie, regardless, feeling their bellies expand with every few hearty mouthfuls gulped down, exposing more and more flesh, and doubly exposing how tight their belts were getting. Eventually, the two youths, now feeling their belts and buttons constrict the lower half of their bellies, glanced at each other and grinned.

"Say, Kiba..." Naruto started, grin growing ever more impish as his young mind started formulating a scheme, "whadduya say we make a little game of this?" Kiba raised an eyebrow and turned to his blonde friend, already putting it together. Nevertheless, he grinned and replied, "All ears, bonehead."

"These things are getting more and more snug, but I think if we keep at it a lil longer, we'll bust 'em right off the hinges! Soooo..."

"You wanna see which one of us can bust our belt and pop our button first?" replied Kiba bluntly, earning an eager nod from the young blonde. "Don't we usually tie every time we try crap like this though?" Naruto shrugged innocently and replied, "That doesn't make it any less fun, does it?" And after a moment of silence, Kiba grinned toothily and said, "Hehe, then let's do it!"

As if getting a second wind, both boys quickly dug their forks and knives into the remains of their pies and gobbled up more and more mouthfuls as a quicker pace, causing their tummies to swell up at a quicker rate as well, which caused them to wince ever more as their guts pressed deeper and deeper against their uncompromising belt buckles. But that didn't stop them even remotely.

Finishing their fourth pies before Akamaru and Hunter, both boys placed their pans aside and grabbed their fifth each, licking their lips eagerly before they dug in. After working on their fifth for a little while, Naruto stopped and reached for his pitcher of milk, hoisting it up to his lips after a brief but adorable little struggle, and quickly began chugging down hearty gulps of milk. Watching his friend chug away, Kiba stopped eating pie for a moment to do the same. "Heh, smart thinkin', bonehead," remarked Kiba as the young dog-nin grabbed his own pitcher and started chugging away. Both boys winced even more, visibly in a bit more pain as their bellies pushed against their belt buckles more and more, but neither one was willing to let up.

After chugging their pitchers for a good while, Naruto heartily slammed his still fairly full pitcher back on the table with both hands and burped loudly, blushing slightly and earning a chuckle from Kiba as he placed his pitcher on table and wiped his mouth with his forearm before turning to Naruto and saying, "Heh, excuse yo*uuUUUUUUUUURRRP!*" Kiba's remark was interrupted as he accidentally let out a surprisingly massive belch. Immediately, the young dog-nin clamped his hand over his mouth and blushed redder than a ripe tomato as Naruto grabbed his currently bloated sides and burst into a fit of laughter. Even Hunter and Akamaru couldn't help but snicker amongst themselves. Hehe, good one, buddy.

However, this humiliating outburst was interrupted when the sound of metal cracking slightly caught the ears of all four parties. Eagerly, both Naruto and Kiba looked down as the cracking grew louder, until...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: "We're gonna bust our belts!"

choices: Several pies later, the four are starting to slow down
Several pies later, they're still going strong
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Naruto and Kiba grinned at the sight of their belt buckles, being pressed against by their swollen bellies, quivering violently. Slowly, the metal cracked, growing louder and louder with each one, the leather connecting the buckles audibly and visibly tearing. The crowd watched, flabbergasted; those boys were actually going to break their belts?

Hunter, even as he forked more pie into his muzzle, wagged his tail as the cracking and ripping grew louder and louder. Heh heh; whether one of them ends up busting their buckle first or they do it at the same time, it's bound to be epic...

Akamaru, pulling his head out of his massive pie, had the opposite reaction as he glanced at the two and whined. Oh man...I just KNOW at least one of their belt buckles is gonna hit someone... Gulping, he dug his head back into the pie, not wanting to watch.

Naruto and Kiba, oblivious to either of their canine companions' inner musing, watched with growing anticipation as their belts continued to rip, and the metal buckles continued to crack. The cracks and rips continued to grow louder and louder, until, finally...

RRRRRRRRRIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIP!

....Kiba's eyes flew wide open as his belt frayed and tore, each side of his belt flying to the sides and sticking out out beside his belly as his buckle exploded off his waist, sending a much-needed jolt of relief through his waistline even as his stomach pressed harder against his pants. The metal object sailed clear above the table and straight into the crowd....

"Ow!"

...where, evidently, it struck some unfortunate spectator in the crowd. Akamaru, even with his head in the pie, whined. Yep, knew it...

Naruto, even as his own belt buckled continued to crack and rip, gaped at Kiba, unbelieving that the dog-nin had managed to bust his buckle ahead. Scowling, he leaned over to the other boy and opened his mouth to utter a protest, but a rather loud ripping stopped him. Startled, he looked down at his own belt buckle....

RRRRRRRRIIIIIIIIIP!

...and followed it as it burst off his waist, sailed over the table and into the crowd....

"Ow!"

...where it once again struck somebody; the same poor sap who had apparently gotten hit by Kiba's buckle, if the voice was any indication.

The crowd, wincing, simply stared back at the boys; exactly how much pressure had they built up for their buckles to come flying off like that?

Kiba, gaping at the sight of Naruto's buckle flying into the crowd, nonetheless managed to compose himself. Settling back in his seat, he smirked at Naruto. "Heh; looks like I busted my buckle first, eh, Naruto?"

Naruto glared back at the dog-nin. "H-hey, don't give me that! W-we still hafta bust our..."

Feeling an immense tightness in their waists, both boys immediately stopped what they were doing and looked down at their waistlines. The release of their belt buckles, in addition to hiking their shirt and hoodie up a little higher, to the point where a tiny bit of their navels were beginning to show, had caused their bellies to bulge out slightly, pressing harder than ever against their shorts and pants. As a result, their buttons quivered violently, putting up a valiant effort to hold back the swelling appendages. Their arguments with each other forgotten, Naruto and Kiba once again stared eagerly at their pants, watching with rapt attention as the threads loosened, and their buttons quivered harder and harder, until...

POP!

...as one, their buttons gave and blasted off their pants, once again sailing over the table and into the crowd...

"Oh, come on, that's not fair!"

...and once again striking the unfortunate spectator.

With the loss of their buttons, Naruto and Kiba sighed and grinned like dopes as their bellies surged out, unzipping their flies a bit and forcing their upper garments up high enough to rest just above their belly-buttons. Letting their arms hang at their sides, they sank into their chairs. "Oh man, that feels SO much better..." Naruto exclaimed breathlessly, bringing a hand up to massage his tummy. Kiba, letting his head tilt back and his tongue hang out of his mouth, simply nodded.

Hunter grinned gleefully, tail wagging even faster as he watched the two. Oh man, I was right; that WAS epic! Chuckling, he continued forking pie into his mouth, not taking his eyes off the two.

Without warning, the boys' eyes opened wide, and they looked back at each other, then their missing buttons, and then back at each other again. Then, as one, they burst into hysterical laughter.

"O-oh man!" Naruto managed through his laughter. "W-we actually popped our buttons at the same time!"

Giggling, Kiba gave his belly a few hearty pats. "Well, considering I broke my belt first, guess it only makes sense another part of our clothes gives at the same time!" He belched rather wetly, which only served to widen his grin. "Oh man, I feel amazing! All that pressure...just gone!"

Naruto giggled in return and patted his belly with both hands. "Yep! I feel like I could eat a dozen more of these monsters!"

At this, both Naruto and Kiba looked down to see the states their bellies and clothes were in. Their stomachs had bulged noticeably bigger after breaking their belts (the ruined halves of which now stuck out and curved around their midsections to either side, to the point where they appeared to be framing them), their shirt and hoodie exposing their navels in their entirety, but not much else above them. Their shorts and pants, sans buttons, were unzipped by a few teeth, though not just enough to start showing their undergarments...yet.

Seeing the boys' grins, Hunter interjected, "Heh, doin' good, fellas!"

Naruto beamed up at the anthro-wolf. "Hee hee, thanks, Hunter, but we're nowhere near done yet!" Licking his lips, he once again grabbed his fork and knife and immediately resumed digging into his pie.

"H-hey, that's no fair!" Kiba protested, grabbing his fork and knife. "I wasn't ready!" Grumbling, he, too, dove back into his pie.

Shaking his head, Hunter smiled. Well, when in Rome... With that thought, he turned back to his own pie and continued digging into it.

Akamaru, having pulled his head out to see what all the commotion was about, simple shook his head and wagged his tail. Heh; totally called it. Once again, his tummy rumbled, and he stuck his head back into his pie.

The spectators, even the one who had been beaned by the buckles and buttons, watched with rapt attention. How much longer were they going to be able to keep this up?
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Ballistic Belt Busting

choices: They belch until they have enough room to finish their pies
They rest until they don't feel as full, giving Naruto the lead
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Both Akamaru and Hunter were gradually catching up to Naruto and Kiba as the two polished off their fourth pies and immediately jumped onto their fifth each. The two youths, having done quick work of their fifth pies due to their second wind, put their adrenaline rush to use as they plowed through their fifth pies in no time at all, and immediately jumped at their sixth pies, tearing chunk after chunk right from the gooey sweet delight and gulping it down with gusto. All the while, their tummies continued to blimp right up, causing their respective shirts to continue to slowly hike upward more and more after each mouthful going down.

The spectators all watched in astonishment as these two youths and two canines continued to tear down one pie after another in rapid succession. Up til now, not a single contestant had ever kept up such momentum. Then again, not a single contestant built enough pressure to snap their belt buckles and pants buttons...

This continued for a good while, as all four were on the same boat now. Six pies down became seven pies, and seven became eight, and eight became nine...but once these four had reached their ninth pies, that rapid eager pace starting to turn to a scene of familiarity for the spectators. Their pace had decreased tremendously. Their moves were now sluggish, tried. But so few people had ever come this far that everyone watched all the same, more invested than ever.

But boy oh boy, was the amount of pie in their bellies taking its' toll on all four contestants.

Both Naruto and Kiba's bellies had bloated to the point where their shirt and hoodie had each risen well above their belly buttons, as their stomachs pushed outward enough to push down the zippers in the front of their pants exposing their 'uniquely patterned' undergarments, not that either one really cared at this point. Hunter was more or less on the same boat, his tanktop well above his furred over navel as his immensely swollen brown furred gut pushed out, utterly packed with pie and the occasional gulping of milk. And little Akamaru's tummy had rounded out enough to where it was beginning to touch the table and press firmly against the pie pans. It wouldn't be long before the little white pup was a furry bowling ball at this rate.

The four continued, ever slowly tearing off smaller and smaller pieces of pie and taking a bit more effort than before to gulp each bite down. And with each passing bite, their gullets grew more and more drum tight as it continued to carry on beyond capacity. Finally, the four gradually stopped altogether for a moment.

"Urgh....so...much...p-pie..." groaned Hunter as he tried to lift a fork up to his paw, but stopped and groaned in discomfort some more as he sat back and began rubbing his belly soothingly, trying to coax away enough pain to wolf down (again...no pun intended) what was left of his ninth. The others fared no better, all seemingly dazed from so much pie being ingested.

"C'mon, guys, w-we can't quit now, we're so close," said Naruto as he looked back and saw the others catching their breath. "Nah, we ain't giving up yet, bonehead, but we need a breather first...l-least, I do..." groaned Kiba as he rubbed his own tummy in a daze. Akamaru whined to himself as he looked down at the remains of his ninth pie. I'm seriously half tempted to just take a nap in one of these things...

Whining just slightly to himself, Hunter glanced at what was left of his ninth pie, then back at his tray, realizing each one still had ONE more whole pie left to go after they had finished their ninth...if ever they would. "On second thought, they can keep their recipe...if ever I had it, I'd have my own gravitational pull..." remarked Hunter, to no one in particular.

Whilst the others were catching their breath, Naruto decided to try and soldier on, despite his own belly feeling fuller than ever. And so, the young boy forcefully tore a piece of pie out and; however reluctant, opened nice and wide and started chewing away before gulping it down and moving onto his next piece, then his next...and his next, trying his best to finish his ninth pie as soon as possible before fullness really caught up with him...which, unfortunately, happened sooner than Naruto was expecting or hoping it to do. Upon gulping down his latest mouthful of pie, Naruto's eyes widened as his stomach lurched audibly, making the boy lean back and grip his belly with one hand as it gurgled quite audibly. And just then, to everyone's alarm, the young man appeared as though green in the face as he clamped his one free hand over his mouth.

"N-Naruto...?!" started Kiba, concerned for his buddy and woeful of what he feared was about to happen.

"Oh no..." remarked Hunter, wincing nervously as the sight. Even Akamaru whined and ducked his head back into his pan. I can't watch...

Naruto's cheeks bulged outward a noticeable amount as the contestants, the spectators and even the owner alike inched back, not wanting to see what they all feared was about to transpire...

But instead, Naruto's mouth flung wide open...

*BBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPP!*

...and out came a massive, queasy sounding belch. The others just glared as the disgusting sound carried on for several seconds, making the boys' belly shake from the sheer force, enough so to actually cause the front of Naruto's pants to rip just slightly, but not enough for anyone to notice.

Once Naruto's burp reached its' end, the boy sighed with immense relief and leaned back in his chair. "Phew...MUCH better!" exclaimed Naruto as he patted his belly happily with both hands. He then looked up at the gaping stares from the spectators; both astonished and disgusted by what just happened, then turned and saw the owner in the side ringing out his ears.

Then, Naruto's shoulders sank a bit as he chuckled nervously. "Ehehe...e-excuse me..." the boy said apologetically to the crowd and owner as he rubbed the back of his head sheepishly.

Akamaru just gaped for a moment. Goodness, Naruto! What on EARTH did you ea-oh right...pies. Several...massive...apartment sized...pies. Gotcha.

To his surprise, Naruto felt Kiba playfully jab his arm as he said, "Haha, jeez, man! Next time, warn us! Ya almost gave me a heart attack!" Kiba exclaimed, laughing as he did. Again, the boy blushed a bit and said, "Heh, sorry bout that." But to his surprise, Hunter reached over and ruffled the boys head. "Hey, don't feel too bad. I didn't think a kid your age could EVER make a sound like that. You at least feeling better now?"

The boy nodded eagerly and, to his surprise, said, "Yep! In fact...I think that actually made some room for more pie!"

And as if to accentuate this point, the boy turned to his pie and immediately dug in for more at a quicker pace than he was initially going not too long ago. Kiba, Hunter and Akamaru just watched for a moment as Naruto continued tearing away more and more pie. Akamaru tilted his little head, impressed. Wow, look'it him go...

He then looked at the remains of his own pie, then back at his ridiculously rounded middle, then whined. I don't think I have any more room...

Kiba groaned a bit himself as he nodded in agreement, scratching the pup's head as he did. "Same here, boy...I mean, I want to eat more, but I feel like if I eat another bite, I might actually explode..."

Hunter chuckled to himself as he watched Naruto continue trailblazing onward. "Well, at least Naruto managed to make some room," he said, chuckling as he did. As soon as he said that, all three turned to each other for a moment, all with the same thought in mind...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Several pies later, the four start to slow down.

choices: They finish their pies, and are awarded their all-you-can eat passes
They finish their pies, but the bipeds' navels start to feel funny...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Almost as one, the two canines and boy grinned as the same idea occured to them all at once. After all, even if they felt like they were going to explode, they didn't want to stop, not after they'd come so far...and besides, the pies were just too damn tasty to let go to waste

The crowd watched, dumbfounded, as Hunter began kneading his swollen belly, taking deep breaths as he did so. That confusion only increased as Kiba grinned and began doing the same to his belly with one hand, the other gently pushing Akamaru over on his side (and causing his ridiculously rounded tummy to lay out on the table) and kneading his the dog's tummy. Naruto, oblivious, continued tearing into his pie, not wanting to waste his second wind.

Nonetheless, Hunter and Kiba continued kneading their (and Akamaru's) tummies, taking deep breaths all the while. Feeling the pressure slowly grow, they kneaded even faster and taking even bigger gulps of air. This, finally, caused Naruto's eyes to flick over to them, even as he continued shoveling pie into his mouth. Eh? What're they doing?

Soon, the pressure in the other three contestants' bellies had grown nearly unbearable, but they continued on. Finally, they felt a rather familiar gurgling in their bellies. Eyes gleaming in anticipation, Hunter, Kiba, and Akamaru looked at each other, took a deep breath, tilted their heads back....

*BURRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAP!*

...and let their muzzles (and mouth) fly wide open as three loud, queasy belches, easily rivaling Naruto's in length and intensity, exploded out of them. The empty pie tins on the table rattled, and the table itself even vibrated a bit. Their bellies also vibrated, causing the front of Hunter's shorts and Kiba's pants to rip a bit, much as Naruto's had done. Naruto, no longer able to ignore what was going on, looked up from what was left of his ninth pie and turned his head, gaping at the sight of the belches STILL escaping from the other three's mouths. The crowd, for their part, stared at the three in a mix of awe and disgust; those had to be some of the loudest burps they'd ever heard!

Finally, after several long seconds, the burps wound down, and as one, Hunter, Kiba, and Akamaru sighed, leaned back in their chairs (or rolled onto his back, in Akamaru's case), and smacked their lips. "Ahhh," Hunter muttered, licking his muzzle and gently rubbing his tummy with a paw. "That was a good one..."

Kiba beamed, patting his stomach heartily. "Heh, you're tellin' me; that had ta be some kinda record!"

Akamaru, for his part, simply shook his head, eyes wide. Who knew I had a burp of THAT size in me?

Naruto, his pie forgotten for the moment, turned to the others, eyes wide. "Uh...guys?" he finally spoke up, blinking. "What was that about?"

Kiba smirked. "Heh; ain't it obvious, Uzumaki? We saw ya belch and start trailblazin' through what was left of your pie, and we figured, why not try it ourselves?" He grinned widely. "Besides, these pies are too good to let go to waste!"

Hunter nodded, rubbing his tummy with both paws and grinning. "And it worked! I feel like I could take on a bunch more pies now!"

Akamaru wagged his tail, his own stomach feeling rather freed-up. Heh, weeeellll, let's just focus on what's left of our pies right now...

Kiba grinned, helping his buddy back to his paws, giggling as the pup's tummy noticeably touched the table. "Hee hee, took the words right outta my mouth!" Taking up his fork and knife again, he began tearing into the remains of his ninth pie with renewed gusto. Hunter, wagging his tail eagerly, did the same, with Akamaru digging his own face back into his own pie. Naruto watched them for only a couple of seconds before he shrugged and got back to his own pie.

The crowd watched in awe as the four, who had seemed on the verge of giving up before, proceeded to demolish what was left of their ninth pies. No one had ever gotten that far before, much less on such a powerful second wind! If that second wind lasted long enough for them to finish their tenth and final pies, they'd be the first contestants to ever win the contest!

Within record time, their ninth pies had been reduced to empty pie tins. Licking their lips (and muzzles,) they pushed the empty tins away, only to pull their tenth and final pies toward them. "Welp, this is it, boys," Hunter muttered, eying his pie intensely. "You ready to win?"

Naruto and Kiba licked their lips eagerly. "Oh yeah," Naruto replied, smirking.

"Bring it!" Kiba exclaimed, picking up his fork and knife.

Akamaru, whining as he felt his belly pressing a bit more noticeably against the table, eyed his final pie. Well...guess it's time to become a fuzzy bowling ball again...

All four shared determined looks, nodded, then dove into their final pies. The crowd watched all the while, riveted; were these guys actually going to...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: They belch until they have enough room to finis...

choices: And immediately decide to rest off their meals
Hunter shows off more items from his bag to pass time while they digest
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The entire crowd grew silent with anticipation as the four competitors drew to the close of the contest, venturing unknown territory that would separate them from the chaff that had tried and failed before them. Even the owner watched on the side, ever anxious to see if these four unconventional contestants could overcome his infamous yet oh so delicious and massive pies. But the four paid no heed to any of this, as they were far too invested in this final task.

Their second wind had pulled them each through the half way point of their tenth and final pies each. As they began venturing into the second half, again, they had begun to slow down once more, as their bellies were now well beyond maximum capacity. A few rips here and there could be heard as the front of each bipeds' lower attires, but they were far too determined to pay any heed to that either, each one taking forkful after forkful of pie and scarfing it down vigorously. Akamaru would occasionally stop and whine, feeling his tummy expand outward more and more, gradually until it reached the point where his belly was actually beginning to lift his little hind paws off the table, forcing him to lean onto his pie bowl infinitely tighter for support. *URP!* Ugh, m-maybe this is how they determine different bowling ball sizes...I was a size eight before I got to work on this one, which means by the time I'm done, I'll be a size twenty...and I don't think they even make bowling balls that big...

The boys and wolf-fella fared no better, each one sluggishly working through each grueling forkful, temporary rewarded by a warm burst of delicious flavor, and immediately back into the discomfort of total fullness. Occasionally, they'd stop and catch their breath, or force themselves to down a little more milk to help wash down a mouthful of pie, or have a sudden green look to their faces, only to belch loudly and relieve however much pressure in their bellies as they could before working on their pies once more.

Naruto continued soldiering on, but stopped for a moment and winced peculiarly down at his swollen belly, grasping the middle of his tummy curiously. There was an odd sensation coming from around his belly button. A tightness. Not a particularly painful tightness, but a...peculiar one. "Huh," Naruto started, "the middle of my tummy feels kinda weird..."

Kiba gulped down his mouthful of pie and snickered at the realization that Naruto had actually said 'tummy', but then noticed his was also feeling odd. "Y-yeah, me too," he remarked, clutching his middle oddly. Hunter nodded, feeling his own furry belly with his paw. Then, in perfect synchronization, the trio's faces lit up as they each shared an impish grin, knowing exactly what was about to happen to them. Oh man, this is gonna be EXTRA epic... Hunter mused, snickering to himself as his tail wagged happily.

Wasting no time at all, the trio immediately dove into their pies, however uncomfortable it may have been, and tried their best to speed up the pace as they ate more and more. Akamaru, sensing this, glanced curiously at the trio, then; to his own surprise, found himself eating faster, so as not to fall behind. All the while as they ate, that odd tightness felt tighter and tighter.

This burst of energy was short lived for all four, but thankfully, after a few quick, ample mouthfuls of pie consumed, that tightness in the bellies of the trio grew tighter and tighter, until finally...

*POP!*

The crowd gasped as Naruto, Kiba and Hunter all jerked back as a surge of pressure forced each of their belly buttons to pop outward as wobbly appendages. The owner just scratched his head at the sight. "That's...different," he said to himself as he raised an eyebrow.

As if a wad of pressure had just been alleviated from their bellies, the trio sighed with immense relief and leaned back in their chairs. "Oh man, it's like a boulder just got lifted off my stomach," Hunter said blissfully as he patted his bloated belly, causing his navel to wobble a bit. He then turned to the boys who were now giggling merrily. "Heehee, I forgot how much this tingles!" mused Kiba, feeling his own inverted navel wobbling comically, making the young dog-nin laugh some more. Hunter couldn't help but smile at the merry sight of the two previously sluggish boys just carrying on so happily. Even a few reluctant "D'awww's" could be heard from anonymous spectators watching the scene.

After a moment, Naruto beamed up at the others and said, "Welp, I dunno about you guys, but with all that pressure just gone, I'm about ready to finish this thing off! Who's with me?" Kiba playfully punched Naruto's arm and said, "Right beside ya, Uzumaki!" Hunter grinned and said, "Let's do this, boys!" And with their THIRD wind, they went back to town on the remains of their respective pies.

Quickly, the remains of the once massive pies depleted more and more, as each pan grew closer and closer to empty. Finally, with a great gasp of astonishment from the crowd, the trios pans were completely licked clean. Naruto, Kiba and Hunter all leaned back in their chairs, and belched quite loudly each, before their hands (and paws) rested atop their ridiculously swollen bellies. Suddenly, a fourth, much louder burp erupted from besides them as they saw Akamaru now resting on his back, completely dazed, little paws limp in the air as his bloated furry tummy bulged comically above him, once again giving him a bowling ball-like look. So....much....pie....

Sure enough, his pan was just as empty as theirs.

These two boys, this one puppy and humanoid wolf person had done what no one else in this village could.

...After the briefest silence, the crowd erupted with cheers for the gangs victory.

"We did it!" cheered Naruto happily, earning a grin from Kiba as he turned to his friend and said, "Pffft, as if there was ever any doubt." Hunter leaned back in his chair, gently massaging his swollen tummy then gave the boys a thumbs up. "Great job, boys. You two did fantastic!" Naruto rubbed the back of his head and said, "Aww, thanks! You did too!"

Sure enough, the applauds and cheers faded as the owner approached the contestants, smiling widely at them. "In all my day, I would'uh NEVER guessed anyone could eat that much pie!" Naruto smiled and opened his mouth to thank the man, but instead, accidentally let out a massive belch, causing him to blush furiously as he smiled apologetically at the unphased man. Kiba laughed then said, "Heh, I think what my pal here means is, with pies this yummy, it was impossible to stop!" The man just laughed heartily and ruffled the two youngsters heads playfully.

"Well, thank you. Mighty kind words, boys," said the man as he stepped before the crowd and added, "I dunno 'bout the rest'uh y'all, but if these pair'uh youngsters, their pup and this here young...wolf...fella, can pack away THIS much pie, then they've earned these!" With that, he handed the trio their passes. "And here's one for the lil fella," he added, handing them one more pass before stepping aside. "Let 'em hear it one more time, folks!"

Once more, the crowd erupted with cheers of congratulations. Hunter's tail wagged at the scene as Kiba smiled back at the crowd. But Naruto, simply sat in awe. Kiba turned and; to his surprise, saw Naruto's dumbfounded face. "Hey, you okay, Naruto?"

"I just..." Naruto started, feeling a little choked up, much to Kiba's temporary alarm, "...when I was a kid last time, I always used to just...dream up moments where people would be happy and proud of me and not...the way they were...but to actually experience it...and as a kid..."

Kiba smiled and placed his hand atop his friends' shoulder. "Feels good, don't it?" Naruto blinked his brief tears away and smiled right back before turning the crowd and waving happily at them.

After a while and some doing, the trio got up and; after Kiba had picked up his much heavier bowling ball sized pup, decided to head back to the inn. Kiba struggled, but managed to put Akamaru inside his hoodie, allowing him to rest atop Kiba's bloated tummy which he supported with one hand whilst grabbing his pants with the other. When we're back, I'm gonna seriously need a tummy rub... whined Akamaru as he looked up at Kiba who smiled back at the pup and said, "Sure thing, boy."

"Ahhh, man, I dunno about you guys, but with this much pie in my belly the first thing I'm gonna do is have a nice, loooong food coma," said Hunter, cradling his own furry belly with one paw as held his shorts with his other. Naruto, doing the same, turned to the (currently) elder anthro and said, "Umm, Hunter...?"

Hunter turned to the young blonde and asked, "What's up, little guy?"

"I just...wanted to thank you."

The wolf person tilted his head curiously. "For what?"

"For this...second chance," Naruto started, "I never ever thought I could enjoy being a kid after my first run at it, but today, I not only learned to have fun and enjoy being a kid, I...I got to see and feel what it was like to not be hated by crowds of people. To be, liked, admired...for people to be happy for me instead of hating me, and I wouldn't have gotten that second chance if it weren't for you, so...so..."

To Kiba's, Akamaru's, and especially Hunter's surprise, the boy rushed over to the wolf's side and gave him a surprise hug (even if one hand quickly went back to keep his lower garments from plopping off). "...Thank you," he said gratefully. Initially hesitant, Hunter eventually smiled back and ruffled the boy's head. "Heh, no problem, kiddo."

"Ah, you big sap," said Kiba playfully, unable to suppress a smile at the sight, then added, "Now, whadduya say we head back before our pants completely bust?" With a brief shudder of embarrassment, the others nodded and eventually made their way back to the inn...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: They finish up, but the bipeds' navels feel funny

choices: After a while, Naruto calms down a bit, and Hunter and Kiba try talking to him
While Naruto's still crying, Akamaru tries cheering him up
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Naruto blinked as a rather warm, tingly sensation formed in his chest and slowly spread throughout the rest of his body. "Huh, I'm feeling kinda funny..."

Kiba, likewise, held a hand up to his face, studying it. "Once you down these, are you supposed to be feeling kinda tingly, but in a good way?" Akamaru, from his place on the floor, barked, wagging his tail. Yep; that's normal.

Hunter, even as he rooted through the closet, looked back at the two and smiled. "Sure is. Not to mention, it means your shrinkage is gonna start soon..."

Naruto gave Hunter a look. "Shrinkage? Seriously?" He shook his head. "Couldn't you have come up with something el-"

Abruptly, Naruto felt his shorts become a bit looser. Eyes widening, his hands flew down to his waist, grasping it so they didn't fall down around his ankles. Kiba, noticing this, tilted his head. "Eh? What's wrong, Naru-" Suddenly, he felt his own shorts loosen, and he, too, grasped at them to keep them up. "Wh-whoa!"

Hunter chuckled. "Yep, it's starting..."

Naruto's eyes widened. "Y-you mean..." he looked down at his shirt, eyes widening; sure enough, it was already starting to become rather baggy, as was Kiba's shirt. He gave himself a once-over; unless he missed his guess, he was a little shorter, too...

Akamaru wagged his tail eagerly. Yep; pretty soon, you guys are gonna look just like you did when we started at the academy...

Hunter wagged his own tail as he noticed the two slowly but surely beginning to shrink. "Yeah, and I bet you'll have adorableness to match..." Naruto and Kiba flushed a bit at this, but examined themselves again; as they'd suspected, their shirts had become even baggier, and they had to work a bit to hold onto their shorts, which were becoming rather baggy as well. Then, their attention went to the room around them; sure enough, the room seemed to be growing a good deal bigger.

Naruto and Kiba continued examining themselves and the room, more than a little awed as they continued to shrink and the room continued to grow bigger. In addition, though neither Kiba nor Naruto could feel it, Akamaru and Hunter could see their faces adjusting and changing, losing their rough edges and becoming softer and more rounded in appearance.

Naruto looked around him, marvelling as the room became bigger and bigger. "Wow, this is weird..." His eyes widened, and a hand flew to his mouth; his voice had become a good deal lighter and higher.

Kiba laughed. "Yeah, but it's cool!" he replied, his own voice having become noticeably lighter. Akamaru simply wagged his tail; unless he missed his guess, the two were now at the age they'd been when they'd first graduated the academy. And what was even better, they still had a ways to go...

Hunter, enraptured, laughed. "You guys holding up OK?"

Kiba looked at Hunter and grinned, even as his face became more youthful and rounded and he grew smaller and smaller. "Yep! Feels kinda cool, actually!" His grin widened as he looked back at himself and noticed his clothes had become even bigger.

Naruto chuckled. "Well, it is kinda weird, but I gotta say-"

"Get lost, you little brat!"

Naruto's eyes flew wide open. What was...?

This was not lost on Hunter, whose amused expression darkened with a bit of concern. "N-Naruto?"

Kiba, likewise, noticed the shift in his pal's mood, and looked up to address him. "H-hey, you alright, man?" His voice had noticeably lightened even more.

Naruto shook his head vigorously. "N-no, it's nothing," he insisted, noticing his own voice had become more youthful as well. "I just..."
