As he reached the end of it though, something occurred to the (currently) tiniest member of the group...

Wait a minute, Akamaru whined. Is he really gonna fit in the room?

At this, the eyes of all those present (save Naruto) flew wide open as they processed his statement...just as Hunter hit the last note. "Wait, wha--" Kiba started.

He never got the chance to finish as, without warning, a huge pair of white wings sprung up around them, enveloped them, and filled the room with light...

When the light faded, Naruto's subconscious was empty.
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: "It's worth a shot."

choices: "Can we play?"
Suddenly, a loud rumble emitted from the kit's tummy
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Back at the in, the area where the four had gathered around the statue, all hooked up to Hunter’s gizmo, had now become shrouded in bright white light, as suddenly, the great white wings that had enveloped the scene from within Naruto’s subconscious enveloped the scene once more. They spiraled, making a rapid circular shape as they span faster and faster, until, with a great fluttering of white feathers, it was gone. In its’ place, stood the four, in the same position as they were before they had left, eyes still squeezed shut.

Slowly, they fluttered open.

Kiba, Akamaru and Hunter, all with nervous looks on their face, as they assessed the damage a young but still oversized Kyuubi would have caused to the inn, expecting the worst. But, to their surprise, the room was…untouched.

Naruto, oblivious to their concerns, glanced around for a different reason. “H-hey, where’s Kurama?” he asked, catching the attention of the others. For the briefest moment, they feared their plan had failed, and that the poor creature was still trapped in his cage within Naruto’s subconscious. But their fears were quickly sated when a familiar youthful voice piped up.

“You know, you guys are a lot bigger up close.”

Immediately, all four turned around, and nearly gaped in astonishment. Behind them was the young fox kit sitting calmly and firmly; his tails gently wafting behind him, to be sure, only…they found they were no longer looking up just to see the creature.

Yes, the trek from subconscious to the physical had brought young Kurama into the physical world, just as Hunter planned. Unexpectedly, however, the young kit seemed to have shrunken a considerable amount. He hadn’t regressed to a younger state than he already was, but now, he had shrunken down to about a little smaller than both Naruto and Kiba’s size; a size in which Naruto was NOT used to seeing the Kyuubi.

Still gaping, Naruto, Kiba and Akamaru immediately darted their gaze back to Hunter, who just scratched the back of his head and said, “Well, c’mon…there were bound to be SOME side effects to transporting spiritual beings to the physical. Don’t worry, I’m pretty sure he’ll revert back to his proper size when he’s back. Maybe.”

A bit nervous, Naruto scratched the back of his own head and asked, “Sooooo, Kurama….how do ya feel?” To his; and everyone else’s relief, the kit smiled gleefully as he exclaimed, “I feel great! This place is WAY nicer than that other place!”

Akamaru barked in amusement and some relief at the sight of the creature. Heh, least he’s too small to make fox kibble out anyone…except maybe me…

Kiba just laughed at Akamaru’s musing and ruffled the little pup’s head assuredly.

Naruto smiled with some relief. “Well, I’m glad to hear that,” then his smile faded a bit as he turned to the kit a bit more somberly and added, “but…you should know, this is only for a little while, so you wouldn’t have to spend all that time alone in your cage. But, well…eventually, we’re going to have to go back.”

Kurama’s smile softened a bit. However unpleasant a notion, deep down, he knew he’d eventually have to go back, especially if this was the Old Man’s wishes for him. And so, he nodded softly at the boy, looking down slightly. Nevertheless, Naruto smiled assuredly at the young kit and warmly rested his hand atop his orange shoulder. “Still, that doesn’t mean we can’t enjoy ourselves while we’re out here, right?”

At this, Kurama’s spirits immediately lifted as his smile returned in full form, nodding his head all too eagerly. Naruto smiled back at the creature, feeling a load of relief being lifted from his previously heavy heart. It was still a rough situation, all things considered, but he was glad to be able to see this (currently) innocent creature wouldn’t have to suffer in this state.

Hunter meanwhile, smiled warmly at the sight. Catching this, Kiba grinned and playfully nudged the wolf with his elbow. “Hehe, quite a sight, ain’t it,” he said. Hunter simply nodded. He hated to admit it, but the ‘fearsome’ Kyuubi he’d heard of, in this current form, at this current size, and in his currently chipper mood, was bludgeoning the anthro upside the dome with what could only be described as ‘maximum cuteness overdrive.’

Dropping his hands down to his sides eventually, Naruto took a few steps back, giving the young kit some room and asked, “So, Kurama, now that we’re out here? What would’ja like to do first?”

The young fox tilted his head slightly as he pondered for a moment…
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: They get back, but one of them's 'downs...

choices: While Hunter's gone, the kids spend some time getting to know each other
While Hunter's gone, Kurama asks about Hunter's bag
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
*GRRRRRRRRRRRRRROOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOWWWWWWWWWWLLLLLLLLL.....*

Naruto, Kiba, Akamaru, and Hunter all took a step back, eyes widening as the kit's orange-furred tummy suddenly let rip with what was quite possibly the loudest, longest growl any of them had ever heard. Kurama, for his part, blushed as red as a tomato beneath his orange fur. "Eheheheh...sorry," he apologized, sheepishly rubbing his stomach with one arm. "G-guess I'm a little hungry..."

"Really?" Hunter replied faintly, sticking a finger in his ear and wiggling it. "Never woulda guessed..."

At that moment, rumbles of similar intensity and length emitted from the bellies of the four non-Tailed Beasts in the room. As Naruto and Kiba clutched at their bellies, slight blushes rising on their faces, Hunter chuckled and said, "Heh, guess we're a little hungry, too..."

Kurama's own blush dissipated a bit, and he giggled. "Heehee, ya think?"

Kiba, letting go of his stomach, managed a smirk, elbowing Naruto. "Heh, guess goin' back and forth from your mind works up an appetite, eh, Naruto?"

Laughing, Naruto elbowed Kiba back. "Yeah, well, considering we barely touched our sundaes earlier, it would kinda make sense we were..."

"What's that?"

At Kurama's question, Naruto and Kiba both directed their attention toward the young kit. "Eh? What's what?" Naruto asked, smiling at the creature.

Kurama blinked, tilting his head a bit curiously. "What's a sundae?"

Silence reigned in the room for a moment.

"You're joking, right?" Kiba asked, raising an eyebrow. "A sundae! You know, lots of ice cream, toppings, cherry on top---"

The kit's face scrunched up in a puzzled frown. "What's ice cream?" If anything, he sounded even more confused then before.

Hunter raised a paw to answer him, but something suddenly occurred to him: from what he'd heard, Kurama, along with the other Tailed Beasts, was easily centuries old. If that were the case, they wouldn't have had anything like ice cream back when he and his companions were children...

Naruto, however, was not so quick to come to this conclusion. "Come on, ice cream! It's cold and sweet and melty and..." before he could ramble on to the increasingly confused fox much longer, Hunter stepped forward and placed a firm paw on Naruto's shoulder. This brought the boy up short, and his head swung up to look at Hunter. "Hunter, what're you..." Hunter said nothing, but smiled and gave the boy a wink. The message was clear: I'll handle this. Naruto pouted a bit, but stepped aside.

Giving Naruto a thankful nod, Hunter stepped forward. "Weeeelll, I guess we COULD explain what ice cream is," he began, tail wagging slowly, "buuuuuuut I think it's better if we showed ya."

Immediately, Naruto's face lit up. "Yeah! We're goin' back out for sundaes!" He pumped his arms in the air, grinning.

Kiba, though he too was licking his lips at the thought of ice cream, frowned as something occurred to him. "Wait," he began, stepping in. "Is takin' Kurama out in public really a good idea?"

Hunter opened his muzzle to answer, but Naruto beat him to the punch. "Kiba!" Naruto hissed in a low voice. "Keep your mouth shut!"

Kiba scowled at him. "What? I'm just sayin', people might not take seeing the Nine-Tailed Fox well, and..." he trailed off to a stop as he remembered that Kurama had none of his adult memories. His comments may have done a lot of damage."

"Why are you whispering?"

Eyes widening, both Naruto and Kiba faced Kurama, who was tilting his head curiously as his long ears twitched. Stammering, Naruto tried to explain. "K-Kurama, we..."

To both his and Kiba's shock, Kurama giggled. "You don't hafta whisper; I know I shouldn't go out into human villages."

This comment took both boys off guard, and Hunter even asked, "...really?"

"Yep!" Kurama exclaimed, smiling and nodding. "There was this one time me n' Gyuki snuck into a human village, just to see what it was like, even though the Old Man told us never to go there 'less he was with us. And, well..." His expression grew a bit nervous, and he winced. "The Old Man ended up having to pay, 'cause half the village got wrecked." All four of the non-Tailed Beast's eyes widened. You know, suddenly I'm REALLY happy he got downsized... Akamaru thought, whimpering.

Oblivious to their reactions, Kurama pouted a bit, puffing his cheeks out. "I told that mean old cabbage merchant I was sorry about his cart..." he focused back on the four, who had managed to smooth out their expressions somewhat. "Besides, we didn't even hurt anybody!"

Hunter blinked for a couple of seconds. "Well that's...good..." he muttered.

"Yeah!" Kurama replied, his grin quickly returning to his face. "So, anyway, yeah, I know I can't go into villages, so that's not a problem. Still," he added, wincing as his tummy rumbled again. "I wanna try some of this 'ice cream' you guys keep talkin' about. We don't hafta go into a village to get it, do we?"

Hunter grinned, shaking his head. "Nope, and I wasn't even planning to go into the village in the first place!"

"You weren't?" Naruto and Kiba asked, their eyes widening. Akamaru, from within Kiba's hood, merely whined. Why do I have a bad feeling about this...?

Hunter merely grinned wider. "I was not." Then, to their surprise, Hunter walked over and grabbed the Kaepora Gaebora statue.

Kiba blinked. "What're you doing with that thing again?"

Naruto nodded. "Yeah, I don't think there's any ice cream in my head..." Kurama, though he STILL had no idea what 'ice cream' was, couldn't help but giggle at his comment.

Hunter chuckled. "Nah, nah, nothing like that. See," he began, walking back over to his bag and procuring the Ocarina, "I actually got those lovely little statues in quite a few places, and I can choose where I wanna go, so long as I picture the location in my mind. These folks in one particular location owe me a bit of a favor, so I'm heading there to cash it in, and then coming back."

"With the ice cream?" Kiba asked, tilting his head. That seemed a lot of trouble to go for for some ice cream...

To his irritation, Hunter smirked. "Youuuuuu'll seeeeee," he singsonged. Scowling, Kiba opened his mouth to demand Hunter tell them, but the anthro cut him off. "Oh, and you kids are gonna wanna stay away from the statue; don't wanna drag you along, too."

"You're leaving us?" Kurama suddenly exclaimed, eyes widening. "W-won't that leave us all by ourselves?" He may have only just met Hunter, but he was the only adult in the room...

Hunter's face twitched a bit, feeling sympathy as he remembered that, unlike Naruto and Kiba, Kurama did not have the benefit of his older self's memories, and as such was very much a child. "I'll only be a little bit," he promised, his tone earnest. "Besides," he added, smiling a bit, "Naruto and Kiba might be small, but they got a lotta muster; you'll be fine with them." Naruto and Kiba beamed inwardly at the praise, the blonde giggling and folding his arms behind his head, and the little dog-nin winking and giving Kurama a thumbs-up. "See? Nothing to worry about." And besides, this might give them a chance to get to know each other a little better... the wolf mused.

Bringing himself back to the present, he walked closer to the statue, while the children scrambled to take cover behind the bed. Satisfied that they were far enough away from the spell's radius, he shut his eyes, concentrated, and brought the Ocarina to his muzzle.

From behind the bed, Naruto, Kiba, Akamaru, and Kurama heard that same short, repeating set of notes being played. Then, in a few moments' time, they caught a flash of white, a burst of light...and when they peeked over the bed, Hunter was nowhere to be seen.
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Ice Cream Travails

choices: Hunter finally returns
The boys continue showing off more items from Hunter's bag
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
With Hunter gone, the two boys, pup and young Nine-Tail sat idly for a moment. Naruto glanced at the young kit curiously as he looked away somewhat nervously. "Huh? What's wrong, Kurama?" the boy asked. "Well, I'm...I'm not used to doing things without a grownup around. Before, I had the old man, but now...I just, don't wanna do anything bad or get into trouble..."

The blonde boy laughed assuredly for a moment then playfully nudged the kit's arm, causing him to wince slightly; still not used to Naruto's playful demeanor, but nevertheless, he smiled nervously back. "Ah, heck, don't sweat it! Nothing bad's gonna happen! We're just gonna hang out for a bit before ol' wolfy comes back!"

Kurama tilted his head curiously. Again with these foreign expressions... "Hang out?"

Kiba rolled his eyes, chuckling softly to himself. Oh brother...

But Naruto paid no heed, instead, simply laughed and said, "Oh, heh, sorry. Hang out means to spend time together. It's what people do when they want to get to know each other, or do fun things together." At this, the kit's eyes lit up as he pipped in, "Oooh! That's what it's called? In that case, me and the others hang out all the time! It's really fun!" The others laughed to themselves, Naruto especially. This was certainly not a side he expected to see of the Kyuubi, even in this state. He ruffled the young fox's head playfully, eliciting a giggle from the kit as he added, "Well, don'tchu worry. Cause we're all gonna have a great time too, just you wait!"

Again, there was a visible eagerness emanating from the young creature. It's a strange notion that anyone could be this eager to just 'hang out' with people, but for a creature in Kurama's current state, to awaken to such a previously cruel situation, it really meant a lot.

"Do you two 'hang out' a lot?" Kurama asked. Both boys shared a glance and grinned at each other. "Heh, oh yeah, all the time," Kiba responded before wrapping his arm around Naruto's neck playfully and ruffling the boy's head as the pup atop Kiba's head barked happily. Again, Kurama was a bit startled, but quickly relieved when he heard Naruto laughing as he pushed the other boy aside. In the process, Kurama took notice of a bag in the distance behind the two boys.

"Say, what's that?" Kurama asked, pointing curiously at the bag. The others turned to it. "Oh that? That's Hunter's bag of doohickeys and thingamajigs!" replied Naruto. Again, Kurama tilted his head not having a clue, only this time, Kiba laughed and said, "Yeah, don't worry, I didn't catch a word of that either." Despite himself, Kurama couldn't help bit giggle at the funny sounding words Kiba clearly thought were silly too. "Those are Hunter's items. Like, you saw his statues, that stick and his weird flute thing, right?" The kit bopped his head up and down, acknowledging Kiba's inquiry. "Well, that's where he keeps ALL his crazy stuff."

A moment passed, before Kurama smiled and, a bit hopefully, asked, "...Can I see?"

The two boys glanced for a moment, until Kiba said, "Tell ya what, we'll show you, since a lot of his stuff is kinda...well...fragi-errr, easy to break."

Giddy with excitement, Kurama happily trotted over to the bag, sitting patiently and excited to see more as the boys and pup rummaged around, looking for things that didn't seem...dangerous. Immediately, both boys eyes widened. Even Akamaru couldn't help but gape. Well, that's...different...

Carefully, Naruto reached in and pulled out a rather wide bottle corked at the top. Inside, was a glowing pink circular light with little transparent wings attached to it, fluttering about idly inside the bottle, shimmering with light, and absolutely mystifying the young kit as he loomed closer at the spectacle in the bottle.

"That's so pretty and shiny...!" Kurama mused, "...What is it?"

Neither boy had an answer until Naruto noticed a sticky with some scribbles written on it. "It says, 'Fairy - Keep in case attacked by...Ganon....dork?"

Kiba rolled his eyes. "That says DORF, you dork!"

Naruto scowled at the other boy, as Kurama again giggled at their humorous back and forth. Gently, they put it away and rummaged around until another interesting item caught their eye. "Saaaay, this one's new..." Naruto said as he rummaged about and pulled out another interesting looking item. Kurama was a bit startled by the almost eerie sight, but nevertheless, asked, "W-what's that...?"

The item in question appeared to a mask, one with strange red markings and at the center, what looked like a piercing cyclops-like eyeball. Kiba examined the note attached to the back. "Huh, it's called, The Mask of Truth.'"

Naruto glanced at the sticky, and added, "Wear to unlock secrets from inanimate objects, it says. Also, 'Be Warned. Statues are jerks.'" Raising an eyebrow, Naruto cautiously placed the mask over his face, much to the alarm of the boy, the pup and the kit. Even Kiba had to admit that Naruto looked a bit freaky with that thing clamped over his face, but nonetheless, asked, "...So? How's it feel?"

The blonde just shrugged. "No different. Lemme give it a test run," he replied, turning his attention towards the activated owl statue. "Alright, Kippula Gabbosomething...I command you to...uhh...talk, er something!"

The statue glowed ever so slightly, alarming everyone in the room, until...

Eh, buzz off, you little bonehead. And take that mask off. It looks even dumber than your face does!

All four just gaped in silence for a moment, before Naruto took the mask off

"Wow..." Kiba muttered, dumbfounded that it actually worked.

"I know," Naruto muttered, a bit dumbfounded himself, before his face scrunched into an irritated scowl, "statues really ARE jerks!" Quickly, he stuffed the mask back into the bag, when suddenly, the kit's tummy emitted yet another more than audible growl, startling the others slightly. Rubbing it hungrily, he once again blushed and smiled a bit apologetically, before adding, "I sure hope that wolf-person gets back soon. I'm getting REALLY hungry..."

Naruto laughed as his and Kiba's own stomachs roared in agreement to Kurama's, though nowhere near as frightfully loud. "Heh, ah don't worry," Naruto started, "I'm sure he'll be back in no time. Til then, let's see what other cool stuff Hunter's got in here."
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Kurama asks about Hunter's bag while he's gone.

choices: Kiba continues searching while Naruto and Kurama get to know each other
Kiba decides to come over and join in
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
With that, Naruto and Kiba immediately went back to rooting around in Hunter's bag, doing their best to avoid anything that looked (or felt) too dangerous. All the while, Kurama sat expectantly, tails swishing eagerly. "You guys find anything cool yet?" the kit asked, a wide smile on his face.

Naruto grinned at the kit, even as he continued rooting through the bag. "Not just yet, but considering how much is in here, it probably won't be long till..."

"Hey, I got something!" At Kiba's triumphant exclamation, both Kurama and Naruto glanced over at the little dog-nin as he rooted through the bag and, with a grin, withdrew a small item held it up in the air, inspecting it. It appeared to be a small, metal cylinder with some sort of button on the side.

Naruto, curious, looked over at Kiba, and the object he was holding. "Eh? Whaddaya suppose that is?"

Kiba shrugged, turning the object over in his hands. "Dunno, but it feels sorta light," he admitted. With some difficulty, he took it in one hand. "Fees like you're supposed to hold it, but I'm not sure why..." As he said this, his thum brushed against the button...

...and he nearly dropped it as, without warning, a flash of light burst from the opening at the top. Luckily, he managed to bring his other hand up quickly enough to regain his grip on it. "Phew, that was close..." he muttered to himself. Once he'd calmed a bit, he looked up at the item...and his and Akamaru's eyes widened. Whoa.... Akamaru barked, a bit lost for words. Likewise, Naruto and Kurama were gaping at the object now held in Kiba's hands.

The cylinder now had what appeared to be a blade of pure energy emerging from it-the hilt, Kiba realized-glowing blue and humming audibly. "A-a sword...?" Naruto muttered, eyes widening. "N-never seen one like that before..."

"M-me neither..." Kurama muttered, muzzle gaping wide open.

Kiba, too shocked to say anything, merely nodded as he continued to stare at the sword, only tangentially noticing the hum it gave off. This continued for a few seconds before Akamaru whimpered, Uh, Kiba? Maybe you should turn the blue, glowy sword off now...

"Y-yeah, probably a good idea..." Kiba muttered, eyes still focused on the weapon. He adjusted his grip to get closer to the button, but as the hilt shifted in his hands, the blade made an odd noise that was somewhere between a hum and a disruption of air. "...eh?" Tentatively, he moved the blade through the air again, once again making the odd noise. Then again, and again, and again...

Slowly, a grin formed on Kiba's face. Hey, that's...that's pretty neat. Gradually, he began swinging the blade quicker, the blade humming and almost leaving a trail of light as it moved about. The children (and Akamaru) all stared awestruck, grins forming on their own faces. The same thought ran through all their heads:

Cooooooooooooool....

Soon, though, Kiba tired of swinging the energy blade and flicked it off with his thumb. Setting it aside, he continued rooting through the bag, Naruto doing the same. As they did so, Kurama piped up, "Um...where did Mr. Hunter get all this neat stuff?"

The boys and pup snickered a bit at "Mr. Hunter", but Akamaru managed to recover and bark, Eh, he says he's been to a lot of different places, and that he likes to pick up stuff from there.

Kurama blinked. "Really? What kinda places?"

Kiba shrugged. "Eh, he hasn't really been specific, but..." he trailed off as something occurred to him. "Wait...you understood him?" At this, Naruto started, looking straight back at Kurama. The young Tailed Beast winced a bit; had he said something wrong?

"Y-yeah, I did," Kurama admitted, scratching the back of his head. "W-was I not supposed to? I mean, I'm sorry if I wasn't, but..."

To his relief, Kiba burst out laughing. "Haha! Nah, you're good, Kurama. Guess I just sorta forgot that foxes are technically canines too, so it would make sense you'd be able to understand my little buddy here." He gave the dog a pat on the head, much to his delight.

Kurama giggled. "Yeah, I guess it would..."

His laughter dissipated as he noticed Naruto scowling, his eye twitching a bit. "N-Naruto? Are you OK?"

The blonde said nothing for a moment. Then:

"Seriously?! I'm the ONLY one who can't understand a word Akamaru says?!"

That did it; both Kurama and Kiba burst into a fit of laughter. "Oh, shut up!" Naruto snapped, incensed. But the two other children, in the grip of their mirth, only laughed harder. Grumbling, Naruto continued rooting through Hunter's bag.

Eventually, the laughter died down, and Kurama settled back into a sitting position, smiling contentedly. "Ya know, I gotta say," Kurama admitted as Kiba resumed rooting through the bag alongside the blonde, "never thought I'd be 'hanging out' with humans like this, but you guys are pretty fun to be around."

Naruto, his previous foul mood forgotten, beamed at Kurama. "Heh heh, thanks!" His smile grew thoughtful. "But, ya know, hanging out isn't just having fun together; it's gettin' to know each other, too." Getting up, he walked over to Kurama, plopped down next to him, and threw a friendly arm about the kit's shoulders. "So why dont'cha tell us a little bit about yourself?"

A bit surprised at the contact, Kurama nonetheless managed a smile. "What do you wanna know?"

Naruto shrugged. "What you like to do for fun, things you might like, things that might bug you,what you like to eat...ya know, stuff about yourself!"

Kurama beamed. "Oh, that stuff's easy!" the kit exclaimed, eyes lighting up. "Well..."
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: The boys continue showing off more items from H...

choices: The boys rummage for more 'magical masks'
Hunter finally returns
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Kiba continues to rummage through the bag with Akamaru's help, both hoping to find more nifty items, all the while hoping none of them would inflict any harm...or mouth off. Meanwhile, as they do that, both Naruto and Kurama continue chatting amongst themselves; Naruto's arm still wrapped around the kits shoulders in a buddy-manner.

"We spent a lotta time just talking to each other. Some of us would even play every once in'uh while, but the Old Man liked it more when we behaved ourselves," Kurama explained, smiling as he thought fondly of his time with the other Nine-Tailed beasts and the Old Man. Despite himself, Naruto snickered at the last part, "So he probably didn't like it a whole lot when ya snuck into villages and busted cabbage crates, huh." The kit frowned, rubbing the back of his fuzzy head. "It was just that one time! Honest!" But Naruto just laughed and playfully ruffled the fox's head with his arm still wrapped around his shoulders, surprising Kurama at first, but eventually eliciting a giggle from the young fox.

"And bugging, that's when you get attacked by insects? Because I HATE spiders!" Kurama exclaimed, earning a laugh from Naruto as he shook his head. "No no no, things that bug you mean, things that annoy you; things you don't like."

"Ooooooooh!" Kurama exclaimed, finally getting it as his muzzle screwed to the side slightly in deep thought. "Weeell, I guess...Shukaku bugs me. He's always so mean and angry...I don't like it when others are mean like that..." Naruto nodded, more than in agreement with the sentiment. "Heh, I hear ya," the boy replied, earning a sudden giggle from the kit. "Of course you hear me, you're sitting right next to me!"

Again, Naruto burst into a fit of laughter, playfully rocking the smaller sized fox a bit. "No, that means I understand what you're saying, and I feel the same way." Again, Kurama giggled and rubbed the back of his head. "Heehee, sorry. I hope me not understanding some of the things you say isn't getting annoying." But Naruto just shook his head and smiled assuredly. "Nah, it's not annoying. Heck, I actually like being able to explain some things to you. It ain't often I get to do that."

Just then, both their tummies rumbled as they winced, then chuckled a bit some more. "On that note, what sorta stuff do ya like to eat?" Naruto asked, to which Kurama beamed and said, "Oh! That's easy! Whatever tastes yummy!" The boy just laughed, accepting that what Kurama said was as close to an accurate answer as he was likely to get. "Y'know something, Kurama? We ain't so different."

Kurama just turned to the boy and tilted his head. "We aren't?"

"Think about it. We both really like a lot of the same things, like being with our friends, getting into a bit of trouble here or there, we both love eating whatever tastes yummy, we both can't stand jerks...and...well, we both know what it's like to be alone."

Kurama glanced more sincerely at the boy as he looked away, a bit somberly. "You mean, you were left alone too...?" To which, the boy sighed and nodded. Kurama frowned sympathetically at the boy and rested his own hand against his shoulder. "I'm sorry."

At first, Naruto was surprised, but then he recalled the situation, and just smiled warmly at the kit and, to some extent, at the irony. Then, Kurama added, "B-but you're not alone now, right?"

Naruto looked up for a moment. He glanced up at Kiba and Akamaru still digging around for items, and thought fondly of the time he was lucky enough to share with the two. Be it going on missions together, training together, having wicked eating contests together, heck, even their constant bickering. He then thought about his other friends, and all the memories he'd shared with them that he was grateful to have, even these few days hanging out with crazy ol' Hunter. Then, he looked back at the it and smiled, almost gratefully, and nodded. "...No. I'm not. In fact, I've got some really great friends now, and I'm lucky they tolerate a bonehead like me, heh."

Kurama smiled, glad to hear that, but then added, "You're not a bonehead! I don't care what that mean old statue said, you're a nice, good person!" Naruto couldn't help but snicker, surprised someone would say he WASN'T a bonehead, but nonetheless, he smiled gratefully at the kit and said, "Thanks, Kurama. You're a pretty swell fella yourself."

The young kit giggled bashfully, when suddenly, Kiba returned to the duo grinning impishly. "Well, nice to see you two are gettin' along nicely, but check THIS out!"

In an instant, Kiba pulled out a very bizarre looking cap...resembling long bunny ears. Both youths gaped. "Ummm...what is that?" asked Naruto. Kiba read the note aloud. "The Bunny Cap. Speed plus one, heh, look what it does!" Kiba then placed the cap on his head, and immediately both Naruto and Kurama giggled at the ridiclous sight of Kiba with bunny ears. Even Akamaru snickered.

Hehe, yeah you DO kinda look silly with those things...

But Kiba just grinned, and in an instant, vanished, causing both youths eyes to widen. "I know, speedy, ain't I?" Kiba's voice called, as the two turned and found him standing confidently behind him. "Whoa, those things really DO make ya fast!" Naruto exclaimed as Kiba grinned. Kurama just giggled, and added, "But they ARE pretty silly looking." Again both boys giggles as Kiba grumbled and took them off...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Kiba searches while Naruto and Kurama talk

choices: The boys find another mask...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Kiba frowned as Naruto and Kurama continued giggling. "Yeah, yeah, laugh it up," Kiba grumbled. Still scowling, he took the Bunny Hood back to Hunter's bag. Setting it aside, he once again continued rooting through his bag. Looking back at Naruto, he asked, "Well, Uzumaki? You gonna keep laughing like a dope, or are ya actually gonna help me look?"

Still chuckling, Naruto got to his feet. "Alright, alright; no need to get mad, dog-breath." Kurama giggled at the name, getting to his paws as well. "I'm comin'..."

Together, the boy and fox made their way back over to Hunter's bag, joining the young dog-nin and his little ninja dog. Kurama sat to the side, his tails swishing in anticipation as Naruto knelt next to Kiba and continued rooting through the bag alongside his friend. "Ya think there are any more nifty masks here?" the blonde asked, his eyes still scanning the contents of the bag.

Kiba smirked, his previous grumpy mood forgotten. "Only one way to find out..."

The boys continued rummaging through the bag for a few minutes, Kurama watching eagerly, until Naruto grinned. "Hey, I think I've got something!" Curious, both Kurama and Kiba looked toward the blonde as he pulled yet another mask out of the bag. This one resembled some kind of wild boar, two fangs sticking up from its lower jaw.

Akamaru, peeking out of Kiba's hood, woofed, Wow, that's one ugly mask...

Kiba grimaced. "No argument there, buddy..." he gave a small "heh!", smirking as he looked toward Naruto. "Buuuut it'd still be an improvement..."

Naruto glared at the other boy. "WHAT would be an improvement?" he demanded.

Giggling, Kurama replied. "H-he said that mask would be an improvement on your f-face." That was all he managed before dissolving back into giggles.

Face reddening, Naruto glared harder at Kiba. "You're starting to sound just like that stupid statue, dog-breath..."

Kiba shrugged. "Ah, don't be like that," the boy replied easily. His eyes flew to the sticky note on the mask. "Why don't ya read that note, so we can see what it does?"

"Ooh, yeah!" Kurama nodded, a wide grin of anticipation on his muzzle. "Tell us, Naruto!"

Try as he might, Naruto couldn't help but crack a small smile at Kurama's sheer enthusiasm. Deep down, he wondered how this sweet, sensitive, happy fox kit had grown up into such a monster...

Naruto forced the thoughts out of his head; now wasn't the time for them. Instead, he lifted the mask up so he could better see the note and read, "'Mask of Scents': enhances your sense of smell."

Kiba laughed. "Heh, is that all it does?" he asked, rubbing his own nose with a finger. "Heck of a lot of good it'd do me. I'm an Inuzuka; we got the best noses in the business!" Akamaru barked, Yeah, and I'm an Inuzuka dog! Nothing gets past this sniffer!

"I got a pretty good sense of smell, too," Kurama admitted, silently wondering just how good a human's sense of smell could actually be. "Doesn't seem like it'd do a lotta good...."

Naruto scowled at the others. "Well, sorry, but not all of us are canines...or dog people," he amended, throwing glance toward Kiba. "I'm trying this thing on." Slowly, he lifted the mask up to his face and placed it on.

Upon seeing Naruto with the pig mask on, Kiba couldn't help but giggle. "Heehee, I was wrong, it's not an improvement; ya just look like even more of a dummy with it on." Naruto, glaring at Kiba through the eyeholes, opened his mouth to retort, but Kurama spoke up first.

"Heehee, you do look really silly!" Kurama giggled, tails swishing eagerly.

Naruto rolled his eyes. "Yeah, yeah, hilarious," he deadpanned. "Just gimme a second to test this thing out." Preparing himself, he closed hi eyes, took a deep breath through his nostrils....

...and promptly cried out in shock, falling first onto his rump, then his back. "Gah!" he yelped, tearing the mask off and covering his nose with his hands.

Kurama's eyes widened. "Naruto?!" He darted over to the boy, looking over him worriedly. "Are you OK?" Kiba, on the other hand, was struggling not to bust a gut, wrapping his arms around his midsection.

Naruto lowered his hands enough to gasp, "G-gah! It burns! So many smells..." He threw a dirty look at the little dog-nin, who was swiftly losing the battle to contain his laughter. "How the hell do you stand it?!"

Kiba, even through his mirth, replied, "Heh heh, y-you only just got a heightened sense 'a smell; I've been livin' with it my whole life." A snort escaped him. "Most people just can't take it..."

Kurama, in spite of his worry, managed a smile. "Y-yeah; its all about learnin' to filter out all the different smells."

Naruto's eyes flew up to Kurama. "Th-thanks, but I think I'll stick with what I've got for now," the boy, grumbled, sitting back up and resting on his hands.

Kiba smirked. "Suit yourself." Shrugging, he continued rooting through the bag. Naruto, after a few moments of resting on his hands, got up and went back over to the bag.

Kurama watched eagerly all the while, tails swishing about. What kind of neat masks would they find next?

A sudden rumble from the kit's belly caused him to wince, reminding him that he was still rather hungry. When's Mr. Hunter gonna be back? he silently wondered, rubbing his orange-furred tummy. I really wanna see what 'ice cream''s like, and why Naruto and Kiba seem to like it so much...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Smelly Scents

choices: Hunter returns in that moment, and immediately realizes what happened
Hunter returns, and is completely lost for words
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
After a couple more minutes of rummaging, Kiba grinned as he felt his hands wrap around something. "Found another one!" he announced loudly, causing Kurama to grin and, at least momentarily, forget how hungry he was. Getting a grip on it, he hoisted it out of the bag and held it up for the rest of them to see. It was a surprisingly simple-looking mask; it was dark blue in color, and had no discernible eyeholes of any sort. All that distinguished it was a picture of a cartoony-looking skull.

Kurama tilted his head. "What sorta mask is that?"

Kiba smirked at the fox kit. "Lemme check." Holding it up so he could see the sticky note, he read, "Blast Mask; creates an explosion around you..."

Akamaru perked up. That sounds like it could come in handy.

"...that also..." Kiba's eyes widened. "...hurts you. The hell?" he muttered, lowering the mask. "What's the point of using a mask that hurst you?" Shrugging, he tossed it aside.

Naruto thought for a moment. "W-well, maybe if you need a quick explosive or somethin' like that, and you're in a pinch..."

Kiba gave Naruto a nonplussed look. "What the hell would you even need an explosive for?" Kiba replied, raising an eyebrow.

Naruto scowled. "H-hey, don't ask me!" the blonde retorted, folding his arms.

"Why not?" Kiba demanded, folding his own arms. "You were the one who suggested it!" Akamaru, from within Kiba's hood, wagged his tail a bit. Here we go again...

Naruto reddened a bit. "Well, you coulda thought about it and used that head for thinking instead of whatever the hell it is you use it for!"

Kiba's eyes widened. "Seriously? You're calling me stupid?!" Kiba demanded, slugging Naruto in the arm. "You're one to talk!"

As Naruto and Kiba continued bickering, neither they nor Akamaru paid attention to where the mask had landed; specifically, by Kurama. The kit, oblivious to the boys' arguing, had stared at the mask, almost entranced by it. An explosion? he wondered idly. Who would make an exploding mask? Making sure that neither Naruto nor Kiba were looking, he slowly reached out and grabbed the mask with both arms. Holding it up in the air, he turned it about this way and that, examining every inch of it. His muzzle screwed up in a puzzled frown. I don't get it; it looks like its just a mask. He held it closer, inspecting it. What would make it explode? Still utterly confused, he turned the mask around so that the skull face was facing him. Resting it against the floor and pinning it their with one paw, he slowly reached toward the skull symbol with the other one. That's a weird looking skull... Meanwhile, Naruto and Kiba continued bickering, oblivious to Kurama's investigations.

"Dumbass!"

"Dog freak!"

"Ramen freak!"

"Idiot!"

"Goofball!"

Akamaru watched as the boys went at it, resting within his perch on Kiba's shoulder. Ah, it's true what they say: the best entertainment in this world is fr---

KA-BOOM!

The sound of a small explosion immediately cut through his thoughts, and the arguments of the boys. Immediately, all three whipped their heads toward the source of it. There was a sizable, black, sooty spot from where they'd heard it, and in the middle of it lay the young Kyubi, sprawled out on his back and fur colored black.

Naruto's eyes widened in horror. "Kurama!" he exclaimed, overcome with fear for the kit. Bolting to his feet, he rushed over to him, Kiba and Akamaru following closely behind. Once he'd reached Kurama's side, he dropped down, leaning over the fox kit and inspecting him closely. His orange fur, as they'd seen, was colored completely black, and his eyes had taken on a rather swirly appearance. "Kurama? Kurama!" Naruto bellowed, shaking the kit's shoulder frantically. "C'mon, wake up! Say something!"

Mercifully, the young fox groaned at that. "Uhhhhh...." Shaking his head a bit, he hoisted himself up onto his front paws, much in the way Naruto had done earlier. "Kurama!" Naruto exclaimed again. "Are you OK?!" Kiba and Akamaru said nothing, anxiously awaiting a reaction.

Kurama groaned again, reached a paw up to the back of his head, and rubbed it, the soot falling off to reveal his orange fur. "That..."

His eyes suddenly flew wide open, and he looked toward the boys and dog...and his muzzle formed a huge grin.

"That was awesome! Let's do it again!"

Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru stared in disbelief for a few moments. Then, as one, they burst into laughter, falling onto the floor and clutching their middles. Even Akamaru rolled back and forth, unable to contain his relief and mirth. Kurama, initially confused, eventually succumbed to it as well, launching into an uproarious fit of laughter and falling onto his back, rolling about and shaking off the rest of the soot, revealing his orange fur and the flesh beneath it to be completely unharmed.
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: The boys find another mask...

choices: Hunter shows the four youths everything he returned with
Hunter first shows Kurama how good ice cream is
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Unbeknownst to the four hysterical youths, a familiar white glow began to fill the room, until two large white wings emerged from the rift of time and space, and relinquished none other than a smiling Hunter and a MORE than bountiful surplus of items. However, his smile was short lived as a look of confusion had overtaken him. On the floor, he saw the four youths laughing uncontrollably and not too far away...a small blast mark...?

He knew the boys were rowdy...but THIS chaotic...? That was a twist Hunter didn't see coming.

"Ummm..."

Immediately, the four stopped dead in their tracks, eyes widening as they saw the wolf-person standing over them, eyebrow firmly raised as he nearly gaped at the war torn sight. Nervously, Kurama propped back up to his front paws, sitting up straight. "Uh...h-hi, Mister Hunter!" the young Kyuubi piped somewhat fearfully. The boys, less fearful, but still a bit embarrassed, got up, still snickering slightly. "Hey, Hunter, did'ja get what ya needed?" asked Naruto. But the wolf didn't respond, still far too dumbfounded.

Laughing a bit, Kiba rubbed the back of his head sheepishly. "Ehhh...y-yeah, MAYBE we kinda made a bit of a mess while you were gone..."

Hunter blinked dully. "You don't say..."

Rubbing his own fuzzy head sheepishly, Kurama stepped forward, frowning a bit as he lowered his head in shame. "P-please don't be mad at these guys. It was my fault. See, I asked them about your bag, and they started showing me all the really cool stuff you had inside...and then Naruto and Kiba found these really strange magical masks...and then I fiddled with one of them and it..." he pointed towards the blast mark and the soot around them, "...did that."

Glancing at the devastation and then back at the ashamed kit, Hunter rubbed the back of his head a bit embarrassed himself. "Ugh...y'know, I keep meaning to dump that crazy Blast Mask off, but for the life of me, it keeps slipping my mind..." Internally, Hunter scowled to himself. Yeah, probably because I keep knocking myself out each time I use the thing...

He then knelt down in front of the kit and rested a hand-paw atop the young creature's shoulder. "Y'know, kiddo, I gotta admire your honesty. Not a lotta kits or kids your...kinda age, would take responsibility for their own actions like that. Buuuuut really, this was more my fault than anything else. I warned the boys about some of the dangerous stuff, but didn't figure to warn 'em about the exploding mask, heh. You're not hurt or anything like that, are you?"

To Hunter's surprise, the kit quickly shook his head 'no' and smiled gleefully. "Nope! In fact, that was...actually really cool! Heehee, my FACE blew up!" The other boys broke into a fit of laughter as Kurama snickered himself. Hunter paused for a moment, processing the mental imagery of what Kurama had just told him, and; to Kurama's surprise, began laughing heartily himself. "Hehe, yeah, it IS kind of a rush, isn't it?"

The kid bopped his head up and down happily, causing Hunter to smile as he ruffled the fox's head, causing him to giggle happily as he did. "Well, I'm just glad you boys had a blast."

...Because puns.

Again, Kurama smiled and added, "Yuh-huh! We had a lot of fun too!" Hunter rolled his eyes and smirked, the joke clearly over the young creature's head. Naruto smirked then stepped towards the kit, patting him on the shoulder and smiling up at Hunter. "Yeah, it was awesome! This lil fella's really fun and downright nice!"

The two smiled warmly at each other as Hunter himself, smiled at the sight. It was an absolute tragedy that these two would never be able to stay friends. But, given the circumstances, it was best to just enjoy the moment then and there. So, he just grinned toothily and ruffled both the boy and kit's heads, causing them both to laugh and squirm as Hunter rose back up to his hind paws.

Just then, the young kit's orange furred belly again emitted an immensely loud growl as he whined a bit and clutched his tummy, trying to 'cool it' as it were. Immediately, another thought entered the kit's mind as his face lit up. "Say, Mister Hunter, did'ja bring any of that Ice Cream you were talking about?"

At this, Hunter grinned widely.

"...And THEN some..."
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Hunter returns, and is completely lost for words

choices: They put the sundae together, using all the supplies
They assemble the sundae, but there are stilll a few supplies left
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Still grinning, Hunter strode back toward the items he'd brought, beckoning the boys to follow. "C'mon over here, kids; I'll show ya what I got." The youths, all too eager to comply, rushed over, grins on their faces. Kurama's, however, was the widest. Oh, wow; if Naruto and Kiba are THIS excited, this ice cream stuff must be really yummy!

Beaming, Naruto skidded to a stop, bringing Kiba, Akamaru, and Hunter up short behind him. "So, whaddaya got for us, Hunter?"

Hunter folded his paws behind his back, grinning. "Weeeelllll..." He stepped to the side, sweeping an arm out to indicate the supplies. Kurama's eyes merely widened at how much was there, but Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru, fully grasping it, were beaming so widely their faces threatened to split in two.

Standing before them was a massive, yet empty, glass dish, standing at least six feet above the floor. It was at least ten feet in diameter, and easily three feet deep. In short, it was easily the size of a small swimming pool. Even this, however, paled in comparison to what lay around it.

There were dozens upon dozens of colorful tubs, each big enough to hold at least a couple gallons, scattered about. By the ecstatic looks on Naruto's and Kiba's faces, Kurama assumed they must have held ice cream. Around the tubs were glass jars easily as tall as the two boys (and young kit) were, filled to the brim with tiny, colorful objects. Some were round, others shaped like tiny sticks, and even some like circles. Around those were huge bottles (though smaller than the jars) with odd, cone-shaped projections on top, filled with thick-looking substances that were colored everything from brown, cream, pink, and everything in-between. Amongst those were rather large cans made of steel, with protrusions coming out the top that were somewhat cylinder-shaped.

Kurama gaped, totally taken aback by just how much was there, but that didn't compare to the looks of pure glee on Naruto's, Kiba's, and yes, even Akamaru's faces as their faces bore huge grins and their eyes practically gleamed.

Holding back snickers at their expressions, Hunter continued speaking, gesturing to the scattered products. "Behold!" he declared, earning giggles out of the boys. Grinning, he continued. "Huge tubs of chocolate, vanilla, strawberry, mint chocolate chip, cookie dough...pretty much every flavor known to man," his arm swung toward the jars, "candy and sprinkles," he indicated the bottles, "all sortsa sauces, from chocolate to strawberry and everything in-between," finally, he indicated the can, "and of course, whipped cream!" Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru were practically salivating at this point, but Kurama just seemed more confused than ever.

Hunter took a deep breath. "Of course, that ain't all..." He moved around, revealing yet more supplies they had somehow missed the first time...and, Kurama, Kiba, and Akamaru swiftly realized, were producing absolutely wonderful smells. There were large, brown squares of some sort in square containers, bowls of bananas, jars of cherries in some sort of red liquid, and containers of some sort of brown sauce that was letting off steam. "Fresh-baked brownies, ripe bananas, the sweetest maraschino cherries you've ever tasted, and, of course, plenty of hot fudge to go around!"

Naruto's eyes lit up, and held his fists up in front of him. "Oh man!" he exclaimed happily. "Can't wait to make sundaes outta all this stuff!"

Hunter raised an eyebrow. "Sundaes?" he repeated. "No no no, Mr. Uzumaki, we're only making one sundae."

"WHAT?!" Naruto and Kiba protested, looking utterly crestfallen. The little dog-nin spoke up first. "But that's not fair! You brought all that stuff! Why would we only..."

Smirking, Hunter gestured to the massive glass dish. "Why would we only..." Kiba tried again, irritated at the interruption. However, as his eyes focused on the dish, the wheels in his head began to turn....

"Um, Mr. Hunter?" Kurama spoke up. "N-no offense, but it seems kinda mean, bringin' all this stuff and then saying we can only make one..."

Hunter merely grinned, confusing and upsetting the young kit...until Kiba's face once again split in a grin. "No, he's not being mean," he assured the kit. "In fact," he continued, sharing a grin with Naruto, who seemed to have come to the same conclusion. "he's being really, really awesome."

Still befuddled, Kurama examined all the sundae supplies, then the dish, then back again...until it finally clicked. "You don't mean..."

"Yep!" Hunter declared, beaming. "Today, gentlemen, we are to embark on the greatest of endeavors..." he swung both arms out to the dish and the sundae supplies. "Today, we make the Ultimate Ice Cream Sundae!"

A resounding cheer went up from Naruto and Kiba, both of them pumping their arms in the air and whooping. Poor Kurama, however, was completely lost. "Um, that's great," he began uncertainly, "but, uh, why are you guys so happy?"

Naruto gave the kit a befuddled look...before he giggled and slapped his forehead. "Oh yeah, I almost forgot." He beamed at Kurama, then rushed over to the nearest tub of ice cream, grabbed it, and rushed it back to Kurama. Grinning, he peeled the top off, revealing it to be full of some thick, white substance. "Here, Kurama!" Naruto beamed at the befuddled fox. "Just dip your paw in and scoop some in!"

Slowly, Kurama did as he was instructed, digging his paw in, withdrawing a sizable scoop. At a reassuring look from Naruto, he opened his mouth wide, put the paw with his ice cream in, closed his muzzle around it...

...and his eyes suddenly shot wide open. "Well?" Naruto asked, grinning. "How is it?"

Kurama didn't respond at first. He was too distracted by the chilled sensations that melted in his mouth, the sweet, creamy flavor that assaulted his tongue, and the pleasurable cold feeling he got as the ice cream ran into his tummy. This is ice cream? he wondered privately, slowly withdrawing his paw, finally closing his muzzle all the way. This... He gulped, swallowing the rest of the ice cream. Slowly, he looked at Naruto...

...and the widest grin they'd seen from the young kit yet formed on his muzzle. "This is so yummy!" he exclaimed, swinging around to look at Hunter, Kiba, and Akamaru. "It's cold, and sweet, and melty..."

Giggling, Naruto folded his arms behind his head. "Heh heh, told ya..."

Giggling happily himself, Kurama took a look at the assorted tubs of ice cream and the various toppings and other supplies. "And...and we're really gonna be putting all of it..." he looked toward the dish. "...into that?"

Laughing, Hunter stepped forward and ruffled the kit's head. "Yes we are." He stepped back...

...and grinned as Naruto, Kiba, Akamaru, and Kurama all erupted into a second cheer, even louder and more uproarious than the first.
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Hunter shows the four youths everything he retu...

choices: All five trailblaze at the same pace
Surprisingly, Kurama's eating at a much faster rate than anyone else
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Wasting no time whatsoever, Naruto, Kiba, Hunter and even Kurama had begun to scoop out the tubs of ice cream into the massive bowl, practically dumping the tubs together atop each other. As they did, Akamaru watched, wagging his tail. Just then, a thought occurred, causing him to bark aloud. Hey, guys! Remember, I'm gonna need a corner without any chocolate anything!

Kiba laughed, nodding, as he began to start dumping a lot of strawberry ice cream in one corner, specifically for his puppy companion, all the while, the others, practically oblivious to the flavors they were even dumping at this point, just continued piling ice cream upon ice cream atop their specific corners each. Naruto turned and watched Kurama continue dumping ice cream into the pool-like bowl, grinning giddily and; like before, saw his orange-furred body practically vibrating with excitement. "Oh boy, oh boy, this is gonna be the yummiest treat ever!" the young kit exclaimed merrily as he poured out a tub. Naruto laughed, and said, "You know it!" Then his grin grew a bit more impish as he added, "Hehe, hope you guys're gonna be able to keep up with me, cause I'm gonna be blazing through this monster like no tomorrow!"

As Kiba continued pouring a tub of Cookie Dough flavored ice cream on top of a previous gallon of Mint Chocolate Chip, he scoffed and said, "In your dreams, bonehead! You're probably just gonna give yourself brain freeze and-ohhhh wait, that requires havin' a brain. Hehe, nevermind." Hunter and Akamaru snickered as Naruto scowled angrily at the dog-nin. Kurama just tilted his head, a bit taken back. "B-brain freeze...?" he added, somewhat nervously. Immediately, both boys turned to him, then Naruto just smiled assuredly.

"Oh, right. No no, it's nothing. Just, when ya eat ice cream, make sure you don't try and eat too fast, or-"

"...Or it'll f-freeze my brain...?"

Again, the blonde laughed and shook his head. "No no no, nothing like that. Brain freeze is just a head chill ya get for a few seconds. It's not pleasant, but it passes. It's more or less just a reminder to slow it down." Hunter nodded then; with a smile, added, "Besides, with so many majestic flavors in the bowl at once with SOOOO many toppings on top of them, why would you wanna hurry anyway? Trust me, kiddo, the second you're scooping this stuff in your mouth, you're gonna wanna savor every single mouthful." The kit thought for a moment. That one pawful he scooped up was unlike anything he'd ever eaten. And with so many other flavors to choose from, he could only imagine how delicious they were bound to be. So, his nervousness subsided, and he was once again, merrily and excitedly dumping ice cream along with the others.

Then, another thought entered the young Kyuubis mind.

"Say, if the five of us actually eat ALL of this yummy ice cream, won't our tummies get really, really big?" he asked the others, who immediately glanced amongst themselves, all four grinning impishly now as they each chuckled and nodded. "Ohhhh, you better believe it," Naruto replied, patting his own stomach eagerly. Kurama snickered to himself, "I don't think I've ever eaten that much before," he admitted, "I once tried that one time we sneaked into that village, cause there was a building full of yummy crops and meats, but the Old Man got mad and told me not to do that..."

Kiba grinned and said, "Well, ain't no one gonna tell you to stop THIS time." Kurama grinned at the notion, rather eager to get into this upcoming endeavor. But the truth was, there really was a LOT of ice cream that needed to be dumped into the gigantic bowl, and it was taking quite a while. However, slowly but surely, they managed to dump every single tub into the bowl, towering it higher than any of them had ever....EVER seen a bowl of ice cream in their lives. Hunter nodded with pride at the sight while the others simply gaped at Mt. Sundae.

"Perfect! And now....the Coup de grâce..." Hunter said, before turning towards the toppings. "Boys, if you'd be so kind?"

More than eager, the other youths hopped towards the many many toppings, and proceeded to grab whatever they could fit in their arms (or paws) and dump them into the ice cream. Kurama examined each of his toppings, not quite sure what any of them were, so he'd occasionally take a sample bite to see what they tasted like, and sure enough, his eyes widened even more than before. "Wow! Even the stuff we're putting on TOP of the ice cream tastes really yummy!" he exclaimed as he proceeded to just dump whatever he could into the bowl. Both Naruto and Kiba laughed and joined him, doing the same as Hunter grabbed one of the many sauces and proceeded to gracefully pour it atop the mountain. This went on for quite some time, each side; a plethora of flavors, toppings and sauces, and Akamaru's own section, void of any chocolate, but nonetheless, ample in flavors and cherries especially.

By the time it was finally over, all five simply marveled at the sight. The sight was almost TOO GOOD to be true...and if they didn't know better, they could have sworn they heard heavenly voices hymning in the background as they continued to gape. But nonetheless, they shook it off.

"Get ready, boys, cause this...is gonna be the single best dessert any of you ever have...EVER," Hunter replied, grabbing a large spoon and handing the others large spoons as well.

Naruto turned to Kurama and asked, "You ready to taste pure flavor, Kurama?" The young kit bopped his head up and down quickly, eyes never leaving the sight of the monstrous bowl carrying an obscene amount of ice cream, toppings, sauces, and all smothered by a layer of whipped cream and cherries. It was just picture perfect.

"Well then, boys, let's dig-"

Before Hunter could finish, the four youths IMMEDIATELY dove in, shoveling as much ice cream as they could possibly fit into their mouths at once. "...In," Hunter finished, chuckling to himself, before diving in himself.
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: They put the sundae together with all the supplies

choices: They maintain a good pace, with Kurama noticing their stomachs changing
One of them suddenly gets brain freeze
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The five wasted no time in shoveling spoonful after spoonful (or, in the case of Akamaru, was standing on a chair so he could reach the towering dish, mouthfuls) of ice cream and toppings into their mouths, their eyes lighting up as they did so. Naruto, Kiba, and Kurama, on the other hand, had to stand on their tip-toes (or paws) just to reach the dish, but none of them seemed to mind in the slightestKurama, in particular, dug into the sundae with relish. Mmmmmm! the young Kyubi exclaimed inwardly, giggling even as he put a spoonful of ice cream that was hefty with toppings and sauces into his mouth. This is so yummy! There are so many different flavors, but they're all so good! Gulping down his mouthful, he licked his chops, giggled again, and dove right back in. The stuff we put on top of it is yummy, too; makes it even better!

Naruto and Kiba, obviously, were greatly enjoying the sundae, if their wide grins as they shoveled spoon after spoonful into their eager mouths (which were alread starting to get splattered with melted ice cream and toppings) were any indication. "Oh MAN!" Kiba exclaimed through a particularly large mouthful. "This has to be the best sundae I've ever tasted!" He gulped the mouthful down and glanced over at his little buddy, who was currently sticking his head into the veritable mountain of ice cream as he chowed away. "How ya holding up over there, Akamaru?" At this, the tiny pup withdrew his head, and Kiba giggled as he saw the dog's entire head was covered in whipped cream, ice cream, and a good few sprinkles.

Unperturbed, Akamaru licked his muzzle. I don't care how big of a bowling ball I'll look like when this is over! Akamaru barked happily, waving his tail. There's so much ice cream, and toppings, and flavors...I just can't get enough of it! With that, the pup dug his head back in, not wanting to let the delicious sundae sit idle for a moment longer. Grinning at the sight, Kiba dug his own spoon back in, gteting a huge spoonful of ice cream, hot fudge, and steaming hot brownie, before shoving the whole thing into his mouth.

NAruto giggled as he withdrew a spoonful filled with strawberry sauce, vanilla and chocolate ice cream, rainbow sprinkleos and some bananas. Oh wow, even the fruit tastes amazing! Naruto thought gleefully, chewing rapidly. "Gotta agree with ya, dog-breath," Naruto said out loud, looking toward the little dog-nin, "this is, hands down, the BEST damn sundae I've ever had!" He beamed up at Hunter, who was just as busily shoving ice cream into his mouth. "Thanks a bunch, Hunter! You're the best!"

Hunter, even as he withdrew the spoon, smiled back down at the boy, reaching one paw out to ruffle his head. "Heh, nothing but the best for you boys..." Even as Naruto giggled, the anthro turned his attention back to the monstrous sundae and immediately resumed digging in. Even as Naruto did the same, he couldn't help but think, He's been so nice to all of us, and he just met us a few days ago! He smiled warmly, even as he shoved a spoonful overflowing with sauces into his maw (and splattering some around his lips in the process). I should try and do something nice for him... Abruptly, his stomach growled, as if to remind him "Sundae now, nice later." Unlike at the ice cream place, Naruto was all too happy to oblige, and dove right back into the massive chilled dessert alongside the others.

Together, they forked spoonful after spoonful into their eager mouths, internally delighting at the sheer abundance of textures and flavors, even as they dug their utensils back in for more. The boys (and Kurama) were heedless of the bits that splattered on their faces, or of crumbs and pieces that tumbled down their upper torso garments (and fur, in the young fox's case.) They went at a good clip, rapidly shoving spoonfuls into their mouths, yet somehow taking enough time to savor each and every flavor before going back in.

Hunter took a momentary pause to check out their progress; true, they had just begun a few minutes ago, but they'd still been going at a decent clip; he hoped they weren't going through it too quickly...

Much to his relief and delight, the monstrous sundae hardly looked touched at all. Made sense, considering how much was in the dish, but he'd still been a little worried...

No need for that, Hunter thought, shaking his head and smiling. Size this monster is, our guts'll start showing progress well before the sundae does... With that exciting thought, Hunter dove right back in.

As the minutes ticked by, and the five continued devouring as much of the delicious cold dessert as possible...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: All five trailblaze at the same pace

choices: The gang still keeps up a great pace
Someone's tummy begins to feel a bit snug
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
More and more time passed, with not a single boy or canine showing any signs of slowing down anytime soon. It was such a phenomenal experience; to be savoring such a vast amount of flavors with every single mouthful gulped down. Despite every bite and mouthful already taken, each one managed to taste completely new, whether it be the mixture of flavored ice creams, or the toppings, or sauces, or everything in between.

Not a single one of them had ever had a taste experience remotely like it, and that went doubly so for the young Kurama, who merrily continued gulping down mouthful after mouthful, with a more than merry smile across his ice cream smeared muzzle. The flavors exploding on the tip of his tongue, the nice cooling sensation traveling down his throat and into his belly, and the sight of such happy faces (equally mesmerized by the treat) was such an overwhelmingly wonderful experience for the young fox kit.

After some time had passed, Kurama finally pulled back from the massive bowl for a moment and licked his muzzle, giggling happily as he did. "Mmmm, I can't believe I've never had such a wonderfully yummy treat before!" exclaimed the young Tailed-Beast as he rubbed his tummy happily with one paw, earning some chuckles and nods of agreement from the others, before immediately digging i for more.

As Kurama happily rubbed his belly, he paused for a moment, and glanced down curiously at his midsection, staring somewhat surprised.

With such delightful flavors overwhelming the kits' senses, he hadn't noticed just how much ice cream he had already eaten, as he discovered that his stomach had now distended outward a bit, creating a noticeable bulge in his middle.

Wow...have I already eaten that much ice cream? thought the kit as curiosity took him. Immediately after, he glanced back at the others, and sure enough; Naruto, Kiba, Hunter, even little Akamaru's tummies had all bulged outward slightly. Gulping down another hearty mouthful, Naruto smacked his lips, then noticed the distracted Kyuubi. Wiping his mouth with his forearm, he turned to the kit and asked, "Hey, Kurama, everything okay?"

Kurama turned to the boy and nodded, then rested one paw atop his orange furred tummy. "Oh, yes, everything's more than okay!" exclaimed Kurama happily. "I'm just surprised that our tummies are already starting to get bigger when we barely touched any of the ice cream."

Hunter wiped his mouth and smirked. "Well, whadduya expect, kiddo? There's a LOT of ice cream, and not a lot of us, heh."

Naruto chuckled and shook his head. "Ohhh ho ho ho, trust me, THIS is nothing," the boy exclaimed, patting his belly for emphasis. "Just wait til we actually start to put a real dent in this giant sundae. We're all gonna look like we swallowed boulders that swallowed smaller boulders!" A bit surprised by the mental imagery, Kurama nonetheless giggled, actually kind of anxious to see such a silly sight from these boys and other canines. "Heehee, good thing we aren't outside then! Otherwise, we'd have to roll ourselves around like boulders too!" joked Kurama, earning a few laughs from the others, as Akamaru shuddered to himself.

...Yeaaaah, it's not exactly a...pleasant experience having to roll around from place to place, trust me...

Internally, Akamaru was just praising the stars above that neither Tsume nor Kuromaru were around to witness such an inevitably embarrassing sight.

Hearing that, Kiba just laughed and was about to ruffle the pup's head, but stopped...and immediately burst into a fit of giggles. "Eh? What's up, dog-breathe?" asked Naruto, earning the curiosity of both Hunter and Kurama. "C-c-check out A-Akamaruuuhooohohooho!" responded Kiba, best as he could between his laughter.

Curious, the others glanced just as Akamaru realized what was going on...

Like before, the little pups' face had been completely consumed by whipped cream, only this time, there were a few sprinkles scattered right where his maw was, and right above his eyebrows, making him look like he had a sprinkled smiley face gradually melting into a frown. And the cherry on top was a LITERAL cherry on top of the pup's head!

In a matter of moments, Naruto, Kurama and even Hunter had all burst into a fit of laughter as Akamaru just stood atop the chair, flushing red with embarrassment beneath his fur...and beneath the whipped cream.

...Have I mentioned how glad I am that Tsume and Kuromaru aren't around to see this...?

Licking the whipped cream and sprinkles from his face, Akamaru tilted his head back and allowed the cherry to roll towards his little maw for him to immediately gulp it down. Wiping tears of laughter from his eyes, Kiba ruffled the bemused pup's head playfully. "Ah, c'mon, don't sweat it, boy. It's all in good fun, you know that."

Akamaru scoffed and nodded. Yeah, yeah, all I know is there better be a really good tummy rub waiting for me after we finish this monster...

Kiba just grinned and nodded. "Deal."

Despite himself, Akamaru's tail started wagging a bit as he chuckled, and immediately dug his little face right back for more, while the others quickly joined him.

As more and more time went on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Keep uping, Kurama notices their tummies changing

choices: His first button eventually gives, flying straight off
A couple of buttons give way at the same time
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The five kept on digging into their ice cream, delighting in the explosions of flavor and sweetness that assaulted their taste buds. They each had their own reactions to this, though it all resulted in them eating faster and faster, eager to get more of the creamy, cool flavors: Hunter wagged his tail and grinned, Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru giggled as their young minds marveled at just how yummy the sundae was, and even Akamaru was shaking his rump and wagging his tail at the same time, almost overwhelmed by all the flavors.

As more and more ice cream and toppings entered their gullets, their tummies slowly but surely grew to accommodate it. The slight bulges under Naruto, Kiba, and Hunter's upper garments grew increasingly larger, growing rounder and making more and more of an impression. Akamaru's now concave tummy slowly swelled, becoming more of a distinct round shape, and the bulge in Kurama's middle slowly distended further outward, much to the kit's fascination...and utter delight.

Oh wow, lookit my tummy growing! the kit giggled, poking his midsection with one arm even while the other spooned more ice cream into his waiting mouth. This is fun!

The five continued, eating more and more of their obscenely large sundae. As the minutes ticked by, their midsections slowly but surely swelled bigger and bigger as more of the chilled dessert went from the dish to their bellies. Hunter's belly bulged bigger and bigger under his tank top, Kiba's tummy pushed his hoodie out further and further (of course, missing the stripes that ran down from his shoulder), Akamaru's tummy slowly grew further and further down from his torso, Kurama's belly pushed outward even more, and Naruto...

Naruto raised his eyebrows as he felt his tummy becoming a bit tight. Huh...that's weird... Stepping back from the massive dish, he looked down and examined his tummy. It now appeared as though he'd swallowed a basketball; looking up, he noticed that the others, still engrossed in their treats, appeared to look the same (with the exception of Akamaru, who looked as though he'd swallowed an orange whole), but the sundae still looked as though it had barely been touched. Wow, Naruto marveled privately. Just how big are our guts gonna be by the time this is over? He felt the snugness again, and he once again looked down, examining his belly closer.

The basketball-sized appendage still remained under his button-down shirt, but it was pressing rather noticeably against it, the buttons pushing outward. Naruto blinked. Huh; never thought a shirt could feel tight like that...

Out of the corner of his eye, Kurama caught Naruto examining his belly. Confused, he swallowed his current mouthful and looked toward the boy. "NAruto?" he asked, licking some sauce and melted ice cream from his muzzle. "Are you OK? Do you have a tummyache?" At the question, Hunter looked down at Naruto as well, and Kiba glanced over at his pal. Even Akamaru withdrew his head from his corner (thankfully devoid of any whipped cream 'faces' this time around) and looked over at the boy.

Privately touched at how concerned they all appeared, Naruto smiled. "Nah, it's nothing like that. It's just..." he gestured to his stomach pressing against his shirt. "My tummy's starting to feel a little tight..."

Hunter raised an eyebrow, getting the beginnings of an idea. "That right?" he asked, massaging his basketball-sized belly with one paw. "Must be all those buttons..."

Kiba nodded. "Yeah," he added, fiddling with his necklace a bit, "ya don't usually wear those kinds of shirts..."

Kurama stared at the boy's shirt, the fabric and buttons being noticeably pushed against. "Ya might wanna unbutton that, Naruto, or your tummy's gonna start hurting..."

Naruto nodded, reaching his hands down to his shirt. "Yeah, I guess I should..."

His eyes suddenly flew wide open as his mind fully processed what was going on. His button-down shirt was feeling tight because his growing belly was putting pressure on it, and if he ate any more like that, it would only grow tighter...

A grin slowly spread across Naruto's face. Just like a bunch of my shorts and pants have done before, he thought. And yet, he'd always fought past the pain and discomfort, until the constricting tightness of his pants had "popped" away...

Kurama tilted his head. "Naruto?" he asked , unsure as to what the boy was thinking. Hunter and Kiba, on the other hand, looked at each other and smirked. Yep, they'd seen this coming...

...as did a certain puppy, who whined and covered his eyes with his ears. Well, this is gonna be fun...

"Naruto?" Kurama asked again, clearly concerned. "Are you feeling OK?" To the kit's relief, Naruto looked at him, beaming. "Never better, Kurama, never better..." he gestured to his shirt and its buttons. "'Course, I'll feel even better once I pop these suckers off!"

Kurama's eyes widened. "Pop..?" he began, before Naruto smirked and dove right back into the sundae, eating faster than ever. Grinning, and not wanting to be shown up, Kiba did the same, with Akamaru following close behind. Shrugging, Hunter dove back in, but Kurama could have sworn he saw a big smile on his muzzle...

Utterly befuddled, the poor Kyuubi nonetheless shrugged and got back to eating his sundae. Well, Naruto seemed excited, so it can't be anything too bad....

....right?

As the minutes passed, and NAruto shoveled more ice cream into his mouth...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Someone's tummy begins to feel a bit snug

choices: The gang begin to slow down a bit
Naruto busts a few more buttons
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
As more time ticked away, the boys and canines just continued to shovel more and more various ice cream flavors smothered with various toppings down their throats. Same pace, same newfound delight. All the while, their bellies continued to swell outward more and more with each passing gulp. Both Kiba and Hunter had eaten enough to where both their stomachs had gotten so big that a sliver of flesh was now showing beneath their upper body attires. Akamaru's tummy had distended beyond the point of 'orange', and now looked as though he had swallowed a melon.

Kurama's belly had grown to distend outward to about the same size as Kiba and Hunter, though that didn't slow the kit down remotely. Instead, his pace maintained its' steady rate, since he didn't want to miss a single bite of this delicious and frosty treat. He'd also stop periodically as he consumed more and more ice cream, to examine how big his tummy had gotten, and then poke at it, giggling happily as he felt his tummy bounce with the simplest touch, earning the attention of the others, and earning a few chuckles before they would promptly jump back for more ice cream.

And Naruto...

Naruto's pace had hastened a bit more than the others after he felt his gut getting cramped beneath his button down shirt. His tummy had bloated more and more, but appeared constricted beneath his shirt, to where some flesh was showing between the straining buttons barely containing his torso. Nonetheless, he soldiered on.

As he ate, he gulped down his last mouthful, he winced, feeling his belly getting tighter and tighter. Again, Kurama caught this, and glanced with concern for the boy. "Naruto? Are you okay? You look like you're in pain," the kit asked worriedly. To which, the boy smiled and nodded. He was about to open his mouth and assure the kit was fine, but then he heard what sounded like a slight tearing, and then...

*POP! POP! POP!*

Eyes widened, Kurama ducked as a few of the bottom buttons on Naruto's shirt blasted clean off his shirt and banged against the wall, freeing the bottom of his belly just slightly, and easing some of the tension to the rest of his shirt. "Ahhh, much better," exclaimed Naruto, almost going rag doll for a a moment as he slouched back a bit and patted his tummy happily.

As he felt his tummy surge outward just slightly, he felt the lowest button strain just a little more, until…

*POP!*

This last one ricocheted off the wall and bounced right back…

"Ow!" yipped Kurama, clutching at his muzzle in pain. Immediately, Naruto's eyes widened with embarrassment. "Oops! Ehehe, sorry 'bout that, Kurama. You okay?"

The kit rubbed the tip of his still tender muzzle, then, after wincing a bit, glanced back at Naruto, and…burst into a fit of laughter.

"Heehee! Wow, that was awesome, Naruto! I can't believe you actually managed to bust your buttons like that AND nail me right in the nose!" the kit exclaimed merrily, still rubbing his muzzle and nose, but giggling as he did. "Maybe a little warning next time though."

Chuckling as he rubbed the back of his head sheepishly, Naruto nodded. "Heh, consider it a deal."

Kiba just chuckled to himself. "Good thing you ain't tryin' to bust a belt buckle, bonehead…heh, imagine how bad it'd smart to get pegged with THAT!"

The others just laughed some more as Akamaru shook his head. C'mon, even Naruto isn't boneheaded enough to try and bust his belt buckle…right?

Hunter laughed and shook his head. "Nah, I doubt it." He then smirked to himself. But it WOULD be pretty epic if he tried, hehe...

Naruto glanced back at the kit as he resumed stuffing his face with even more ice cream, smiling warmly at the happy creature. Internally, he looked down for a moment, and, a bit more somberly, thought, Y'know, I'm gonna miss seeing him...like this... The boy continued to ponder, wondering how and why the kit would eventually go so wrong. But, as with Hunter's previous musings, pushed those thoughts back.
