Screw it, no use dwellin' on what coulda or woulda been, just enjoy the present! the boy thought happily to himself, then, after feeling the buttons on his tummy still straining, he grinned a bit more toothily and turned to the kit and the others.

"Heh, somethin' tells me you guys are gonna wanna start ducking pretty soon," Naruto said, grinning impishly as he turned back to the massive bowl of ice cream and resumed stuffing his craw with more and more diverse and bountiful flavors...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: A couple of buttons give way at the same time

choices: The button bursts free, and the relief it grants allows Naruto to jump back in
The button flies free, but the force of it knocks him on his rump
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The five continued digging the massive sundae, finally beginning to make a bit of a noticeable dent in it. Of course, there was still the majority of it left, but that didn't concern any of them; all that concerned them was getting more and more of the delicious frozen dessert into their waiting maws. And, predictably, their tummies continued expanding as more and more entered into them. Hunter and Kiba's tummies continued pushing out, forcing their tank top and hoodie, respectively, up higher and exposing more flesh. Akamaru's belly grew lower and lower to the chair, until, finally, it began brushing against the chair. Akamaru blushed under his fur, well aware of what was happening, but he found himself pulled back to the ice cream, unable to resist the flavors.

Kurama, even as he spooned more ice cream into his muzzle, poked his tummy with the other hand, giggling as it slowly grew larger and larger. Heehee, this feels so funny! the kit thought gleefully, giving it a light smack and practically squealing as the growing appendage bounced a bit. By the time we're done, my tummy's gonna be so big, I'll be able to roll around, just like Isobu! Squeezing his eyes shut as he grinned, he continued spooning the treat into his mouth.

Naruto, grinning eagerly, spooned heaping spoonful after heaping spoonful into his mouth. He winced as the remaining buttons on his shirt strained against his growing belly, but he pressed on. He'd endured long enough to bust four of his shirt buttons, and he wasn't about to give up now!

At this point, Naruto had four buttons remaining on his shirt: one directly over his navel, with another three going upward. All of them strained extremely noticeably, and it was anyone's guess as to which would come flying off next. To Naruto, of course, it made no difference; he was gonna bust them all, anyway...

More and more they ate, and bigger and bigger their tummies grew. And, slowly but surely, the massive sundae began diminishing....

Naruto winced as he felt his buttons cutting into his belly more than ever,but he pressed on. Not long now... he thought, grinning. With this, he began spooning ice cream in faster and faster, his buttons quivering faster and faster, and cutting even more into his skin. He didn't know which, but one of 'em was gonna come flying off...

Swallowing, Naruto called out, "Hey, guys! Incoming!" At this, his four companions looked up, eyes widened, before they ducked down. Giggling, Naruto reached his spoon back in, even as his buttons quivered, took a huge spoonful, stuck it in his mouth, swallowed....

*POP!*

...and the button above the one that was covering his navel burst off, flying straight off and whizzing over Kurama's head. Naruto, giving the kit an apologetic glanced, nonetheless giggled again. "Oh, man, that felt great! I can't wait till,,,"

*POP!*

His eyes flew wide open as the bottom at the very top of his chest came whizzing off, flying off...and hitting Akamaru right in the rump. Yiping, the dog jumped a bit, pulling his head out of the ice cream and glaring at Naruto. Naruto laughed nervously. "H-heh, sorry, Akamaru. I..."

*POP!*

Naruto couldn't help letting out a loud giggle as the one of the two remaining buttons on his shirt-the one between his chest and his navel-popped off, flying off and somehow flying clear over the sundae.

Hunter, standing back up, grinned. "Heh, three in a row; that's gotta be some kinda record." Naruto grinned, scratching the back of his head sheepishly. "'Course, ya still got one left..."

"Huh?" Naruto blinked, looking down. Sure enough, there was one button remaining on his shirt, the one that barely covered his navel. At this point, though, the loss of the rest of his buttons meant that the sides of his nearly-opened shirt were pushed all the way to the side, framing his exposed chest and belly. Even as the last button struggled valiantly against the horrendous pressure, it was clear it was horribly tight, and when the button gave. "Huh, you're right..." He looked back up at Hunter and smirked. "Heh, only one thing for it, then..."

Hearing this, Kiba got up as well, curious, in spite of himself, to see what would happen. Kurama, hearing this, looked back up, his eyes widening and his muzzle widening in a grin in anticipation. Even Akamaru pulled his head back out of the sundae, looking at Naruto curiously. Seeing he had an audience, the blonde grinned. Far be it from him to disappoint them...

With that, he dove back into the sundae, shoving spoonful after massive spoonful in his mouth. With each one, his belly bulged more and more, placing even more strain on the final button. Then, with one final swallow...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Naruto busts a few more buttons

choices: All five push on with no signs of slowing down
The five begin to slow down
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The others leaned in, anxious to see what would happen as Naruto savored the flavor of this last more than ample mouthful, then with a hearty gulp, sent it right into his belly, causing it to push outward slightly more. The result of which, made the button quiver greatly as the others leaned closer. Grinning, Naruto turned to them and said, "Heh, ya might wanna d-"

*POP!*

Too late.

With a great snap, the button shoots off Naruto's shirt like a rocket, barely missing Hunter as it hit the wall, ricocheted back, hit the bowl, bounced back on the wall again, and finally, surprised Kiba as it nailed the young dog-nin right in the forehead.

"OW!" yipped Kiba, startled as his hands snapped to his face, earning snickers from the others, especially Akamaru. Not so fun, is it...

Grumbling, he glared back in annoyance at Naruto, who was also snickering to himself. "Heh, sorry bout that, Inuzuk-" Naruto's sarcastic apology fell short however. Seems that button finally freeing itself and exposing the boys' navel and opening his shirt completely, had also released his tummy from the constraints the shirt was causing him completely. As a result of which, his belly pushed outward considerably; as though a rush of water pushing outward past the now breached floodgates as it were, and the sudden force from the boy who was previously standing on his tip toes was enough to make him waver uncontrollably and lose his balance, until finally, he fell backwards and comically landed flat on his rump with a great "OOF!"

There was a moment of silence, until everyone still standing burst into a fit of uproarious laughter. "Smooth, bonehead, reeaaaal smooth!" muttered Kiba between laughs. Naruto just folded his arms together and grumbled angrily to himself while the laughter eventually faded.

Then, to the boys' surprise, he found an orange furred paw held out towards him. Looking up, he saw a smiling Kurama standing before him, offering his hand to assist the boy back to his feet. Despite his embarrassment, Naruto couldn't help but smile gratefully at the kit as he took his hand, and with surprising strength, helped to hoist the back to his feet.

"Thanks, I appreciate the help, Kurama!" said the boy with some gratitude to his voice as he patted the kit's shoulder. Kurama just giggled and said, "No problem! Sure, it was pretty funny watching you fall flat on your rump like that." In the background, both Kiba and Akamaru snickered to themselves. "And then some!" the dog-nin added. Then Kurama said, "But that was still really cool the way you managed to force your tummy to push off that last button the way you did! I've never seen anything like that!"

Again, the young kits' enthusiasm and cheeriness was so remarkably heartwarming for the boy that he couldn't help but smile and ruffle the top of his head, earning a giggle from the young Kyuubi. "Aww, now you're just bein' too nice," replied Naruto, chuckling as he did. Hunter snickered to himself and added, "Kid's right, y'know. I knew it was gonna be an epic last snap, but the bouncing off the walls and bowls? Even that I didn't see comin'! And only partially cause I was trying not to get nailed right between the eyes, hehe."

Kiba chuckled, "Yeah, I guess that was pretty cool...y'know, except where it landed..." he pointed to the button imprint still on his forehead, earning laughs all around.

Kurama then giggled and pointed towards the boys' much larger belly and said, "Wow, lookit how much bigger your tummy looks without all those buttons holding it back!" Glancing down at his now exposed chest and bloated belly, the boy smiled and gave his tummy a hearty pat, causing it to bounce just slightly, much to Kurama's amusement. "Yep! And all that button snappin's freed a lotta restriction, and I'm ready for more! How about you?" The young kit bopped his head up and down eagerly as his tails wafted with excitement. Naruto laughed then said, "Well, then what're we all standin' around for? This monster ain't gonna eat ITSELF, right?"

With that, all five turned their attention back to the sundae, and in no time at all, proceeded to get right back to town, shoveling as much ice cream as they could possibly fit into their maws. All the while, their tummies steadily increased in size to accommodate with every single ample mouthful gulped down into their eager gullets.

And as more and more time began to press on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: It flies off, but the force knocks him on his rump

choices: Naruto, Hunter, and Kiba's pants buttons begin fraying...
Kurama, while eating, feels something strange in the middle of his tummy...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Slowly but surely, the sundae, already reduced to half capacity, continued to diminish as the five continued shoveling it into their mouths, the children splattering their faces (and muzzles) with whipped cream, sprinkles, crumbs, and melted ice cream, and Hunter not quite managing to keep his muzzle clean either. Akamaru, having been sticking his head into the sundae to eat it, ended up splattering even more ice cream, sauce, and sprinkles over his head,

At this point, their tummies had swollen even more, to the point where their bellies had gone past "basketball" to "small beach ball"; Hunter's tank top and Kiba's hoodie now hiked a couple of inches above their navels (scrunching up the stripes that ran down from the dog-nin's shoulder in the process), while Naruto's belly, unrestricted by his shirt buttons, slowly pushed outwards, past his button-down. Kurama'a's belly, easily as big as Hunter's, Naruto's, and Kiba, continued pushing out in front of him. Glancing down, he gave it a hearty pat, giggling as he saw it bounce. Then, as it settled down, he looked closer...and began giggling even harder. Heehee, my tummy must really be getting big; I'm startin' to have trouble seeing my feet! Indeed, his (small) beach-ball sized belly had expanded out enough that his hind paws were now partially obscured by his distended orange belly. Any further, and he wouldn't be able to see them at all... This thought, of course, only induced another round of giggles in the kit, and he immediately dove back in, shoveling more and more into his muzzle.

Akamaru's belly was now resting firmly on his chair, and his belly had even begun forcing his hind legs apart. Feeling this, Akamaru whined to himself. Oh man...any more, and I'm gonna end up looking like a bowling ball again... He examined the ice cream that was still left. Scratch that...I'll look like a freaking beach ball! As soon as that thought entered his head, though, some strawberry ice cream dripped into his mouth, and he was reminded just how cold, creamy and oh so yummy the sundae was. How do I keep on getting dragged into these things? the pup lamented, even as he dug his head back in.

In spite of all this, they did not let up in the slightest, shoveling more and more ice cream in their mouths and slowly inflating their bellies bigger and bigger. As they did so, the giant sundae continued to diminish....

Hunter, even as he shoveled ice cream in with one paw and rubbed his exposed belly (which continued to stick out more and more as his tank top rose up further), he glanced around at the children, all spooning ice cream into their mouths, all practically paiting their faces with ice cream and toppings, and all grinning and giggling. Hunter couldn't help but smile warmly at the sight.

Aww...they look kinda cute, having fun like that... the anthro thought fondly. He watched as they continued spooning ice cream rapidly into their mouths, then at their engorged bellies that continued to swell bigger. Oh wow...they've eaten that much ice cream, and they're still not letting up? Of course, he wasn't either, but he was awolf; having a healthy appetite was part of the package. So why...

Ah, Hunter thought, grinning. How could I have forgotten? His tail wagged as he saw Kurama stick his spoon in his mouth, closing his eyes and giggle. Love of sweets is damn-near wired into kids' brains... Chuckling softly, he got back to his own part of the sundae; no sense in letting it go to waste...

Th time continued to tick by, the sundae continued to shrink, and the fives' bellies grew larger and larger. All the while, Hunter and Kiba's upper garments slid further and further upward, Naruto and Kurama's bellies continued to push outward, and Akamaru's belly continued to round out and push his hind legs out further apart. And yet, their pace never let up. The message was clear: they weren't stopping till the whole damn sundae was devoured.

As they continued tearing away at the sundae...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: All five push on with no signs of slowing down

choices: Their buttons snap off at the same time
Someone's button pops before the others
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
More and more, the gang continued tearing into that steadily depleting sundae like nobodies business. The four youths, merry and happy as can be as they tore into the still bountiful heaps of ice cream within the bowl, and the anthro wolf, happy to see the younger companions having such a great time as he too, continued to tearing into the delicious and frosty treat.

All the while, the more and more ice cream they consumed, the larger each of their respective tummies continued to swell up. Akamaru's tummy had distended to the point where he could feel it reaching lower and lower to the chair he stood on. He whined to himself, knowing it was only a matter of time before he'd lose footing and be resorted to a rounded orb just like before. But nonetheless, he'd conceded that his love for such a delicious treat superseded common sense, and in his case; dignity. So, he saved face and just kept stuffing away.

Kurama's orange furred belly had filled up to the point where he could just barely see his hind paws now. Gulping down his latest mouthful, he licked his chops and examined how large his tummy had grown, giggling as he patted it and felt it jostle and bounce. Heehee, I can't believe I've actually eaten so much...and that I'm STILL eating even more! the kit mused, smiling as he did. But I can't help it! This 'ice cream' is the tastiest thing I've ever tasted in my entire life!

The kit was about to grab another spoonful, but stopped as he noticed a brief look of discomfort growing over the face of his new blond friend. "Naruto? Are you guys okay?" he asked. Naruto burped, then smiled at the young fox as he nodded assuredly. "Oh, yeah, everything's cool. Just feels like my gut's gettin' a bit snagged by my pants button is all," he said, massaging his distended belly tenderly. Kiba chuckled, feeling his own belly getting caught by the button of his pants. "Heh, y'know somethin', bonehead? Mine too," he responded, earning a laugh from the (currently) elder Hunter. "Hehe, me three."

Almost as one, the trio shared an impish look, which Akamaru caught immediately. Ohhh great...

Kurama, on the other hand, tilted his head curiously at the peculiar display, but then Naruto chuckled and said, "Heh, guess ya know what that means, don'tcha, guys?" The others nodded, but Kurama just scratched his head curiously. "W-what's going on?" the kit asked. Hunter smiled and replied, "Weeeeell, our stomachs have all taken on quite a bit of ice cream, but sadly, those of us who have to wear clothes...or choose to, in the case of yours truly, have these buttons on our pants that keep 'em up, and remember how Naruto's stomach had to bust through all those buttons on his shirt?" The kit just giggled and nodded, fondly recalling that hilarious display. "Same thing for our pants. These buttons are constricting 'em, and rather than unbutton and unzip to give our guts' some breathing room, these two over here prefer to make a lil game of it."

"A game?" piped Kurama, earning a grin from the boys as Kiba nodded and said, "Yup! Who can eat enough to bust their button first!"

Immediately, Kurama's face lit up. "Oooh! So more buttons are gonna start popping off and flying around the room?" he asked, earning a laugh from Naruto as he leaned over and playfully nudged the kits' arm. "You know it! Can't very well polish this thing off if our stomachs are being held back, right?" Naruto then turned to his dog-nin pal and the anthro wolf. "Ready to lose, fellas?"

Kiba just scoffed and said, "Ready to wipe that smug look right off y'er face, bonehead!" Hunter just laughed and said, "Alrighty, boys, let the games begin!"

Immediately, the trio started digging into the ice cream rapidly, shoveling as much into their mouths as they possibly could. All the while, Kurama watched eagerly, excited to see the show, and who would win...and of course, keep his eye on flying buttons to avoid getting pegged again. Akamaru on the other hand, just smirked to himself and shook his head. I just hope you guys aren't gonna be embarrassed, exposing your silly looking undies...AGAIN...

Kurama giggled at the pups' musings and just kept watching. There was a notable strain in the trios faces, clearly from the pressure the button was pressing against their bellies, but nonetheless, they each soldiered on, each one striving to beat the other, until finally...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Naruto, Hunter, and Kiba's pants buttons fray

choices: The pressure in Kurama's tummy builds, until, finally, it releases....
The pressure starts to make the kit uncomfortable, and he has to take a breather
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Kurama, an enraptured grin on his muzzle even as he resumed spooning ice cream into his mouth (albeit at a much more leisurely pace than his companions), watched as Naruto, Kiba, and Hunter spooned mouthful after mouthful of sundae into their mouths, wincing as their pants buttons cut more and more into their bellies. In spite of this, they kept up their pace, none of the three wanting to be outdone by the other. Ooh...I wonder who's button is gonna go firstt? the kit wondered, digging his spoon back in and getting a big chunk of brownie

Each of the other three were determined to make that answer "mine," and, as they felt their button threads snapping one by one, they grinned and ate even faster. More and more their tummies swelled, and more and more their threads loosened and snapped, until their buttons were quivering violently, just barely holding on.

With a victorious grin on each of their faces, the boys and anthro took one heaping spoonful of ice cream and toppings each, spooned them into their mouths, gulped, and as the mouthfuls reached their bellies...

*POP!*

*POP!*

*POP!*

...three separate plastic disks, in perfect unison, burst off their waists. One dinged off the side of the sundae, only to ricochet and smack into the wall, another embedded itself directly into the sundae, and the third...

Kurama's eyes widened as the third shot straight for him. Yikes! Desperate, he jerked his head to the side, the projectile whizzing past his head. He sat back down and sighed in relief...

...before that one ricocheted off the wall and hit him right the back of the head. "Ow!" he exclaimed, almost dropping his spoon and his unoccupied paw going to the back of his head to rub it. "Wow, that really came flying off, didn't it..."

Even as the other three gave Kurama an apologetic look, they sighed in relief as the pressure around their waists abated, and each of their flies tugged themselves down a few teeth. "Oh man, that felt amazing..." Hunter moaned, letting his tongue loll out the side of his muzzle as he rubbed his freed belly with a paw. The boys sighed in agreement, massaging their own bellies. "Can't believe we busted our buttons at the same time..."

At this comment, the three immediatly stopped massaging their midsections, Kurama stopped rubbing the back of his head, and even Akamaru pulled his head out of the sundae to look at the three. Yyyyyyeah, not really surprised at all...

Silence reigned over the room for a few moments as the boys and wolf looked at each other, and the young Nine-Tails stared at the three, mouth gaping open slightly. Then...

Then, grins formed over all their faces, and as one, the four burst out laughing.

"Heeheehee!" Kurama giggled, his paw moving from the back of his head to his muzzle. "Y-you all...at the same time..." He managed nothing else before he dissolved back into hysterics.

Laughing, Naruto felt underneath his belly, grinning as he felt the missing button and the slightly-opened zipper of his cargo pants. "Heh, guess we did!"

Burping, Kiba rubbed his stomach, even as he snorted, "H-heh, seems that way!" Taking a deep breath, he calmed down a bit. "Normally, I'd be pissed, but..."

The timing was just too good? Akamaru offered, wagging his tail. By way of answer, Kiba grinned, nodded, and gave his canine pal a thumbs-up.

"Yeah, the timing really was awesome," Hunter agreed loudly, making sure Naruto heard. "Wonder how we managed that..."

Kibashrugged. "Who cares?" He gave his belly a hearty slap, causing it to bounce noticeably (much to Kurama's delight). "All I know is, my gut's freed up, and I'm ready for more!"

Naruto grinned. "Took the words right outta my mouth, dog-breath!" Hunter said nothing, but grinned and licked his chops. Nodding at each other, the three dove right back into their sundaes. Kurama, the pain having abated, beamed and continued digging in.

This went on for a couple of minutes, as the five continued shoveling ice cream into their mouths and slowly swelling their bellies bigger (and, in the case of Naruto, Kiba, and Hunter, gradually forcing their flies down further). It was only when Kurama, his spoon halfway to his muzzle, stopped, his face contorting in a very odd-looking grimace, that the other four took notice. Swallowing his current mouthful, Naruto asked, "Uh, Kurama? You feelin' OK?"

"You're not gettin' sick, are ya?" Kiba asked, his voice teasing, though Akamaru caught the note of concern in it. But Kurama shook his head.

"N-no, I still wanna eat as much of this yummy sundae as I can," the kit affirmed, smiling. "It's just..." his smile faded, and his unoccupied paw wandered down to his bulbous belly, rubbing it tenderly. "I've got this really weird...I dunno, tightness...in the middle of my tummy right now."

Hunter's ears perked. "Tightness...?" he repeated. Naruto and Kiba glanced at each other, realization slowly dawning on them.

Kurama bobbed his head. "Yuh-huh! I mean, it doesn't hurt, but it feels...weird...like there's a lotta pressure right in the center..."

Hunter's eyes widened, and grins slowly spread on the boys' faces as they realized just what the kit was talking about. Akamaru, pulling his head back out, gave a surprised growl. Huh, didn't even think he had one of those...

Kurama's large ears twitched as he heard the dog's comment, but he shook it off. "I-Is that bad?" the kit asked. "Sh-should I take a break till it goes away?" To his surprise, Naruto and Kiba turned toward him, huge smiles on both their faces.

"Nope, that's normal," Naruto assured the kit. "Completely normal..."

Kiba smirked. "That just means you've eaten a lot...and that, if you can get the pressure to go away, you can eat even more..."

Kurama, curious, tilted his head. "How do I make it go away?"

Hunter chuckled. "Just keep eatin', kid."

The fox blinked, confused. "But...won't that just make my tummy tighter?"

"Sure will!" Naruto replied cheerily. "But don't worry; when the pressure finally goes away, it's totally worth it!"

Kurama frowned, puzzled. If eating more would increase the pressure, how would that make it go away?

Still, Naruto was his friend; he wouldn't lie to him. So, with a shrug, he looked back at Naruto. "Al-alright," the kit replied, a bit uncertainly. "I'll-I'll just keep eating 'till the pressure goes away..."

Seeing the kit's reluctance, Hunter smiled warmly. "Don't worry, kid; it's gonna be loads of fun!"

The kit's ears perked, and he smiled a bit. "...really?" At Naruto's eager nodded, the kit grinned, licked his chops, and dug back in. The others, not to be outdone, quickly followed suit....
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Their buttons snap off at the same time

choices: With newfound confidence, Kurama pushes through the pain
Kurama lets his tummy ease up before jumping back
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The gang remained ever relentless in their endeavor to put away the contents of their previously colossal sundae, but no one more relentless than young Kurama. Feeling the tightness in his belly grow tighter and tighter, the Kyuubi would occasionally wince in discomfort, but he shook it off, and soldiered on, gulping more and more of that tasty treat down, only making the tightness amplify tenfold.

However, as he felt his stomach getting tighter and tighter, that uncomfortable tightness gradually began to cause ache, making him wince more and more, a bit more visibly to the others, who caught it. Putting his spoon down, Hunter gave the kit a calm yet slightly concerned glance, as he watched the kit almost forcing himself to eat ice cream at this point. "Hey, kid, are you feeling alright?" asked the wolf. Ears twitching at the question, Kurama glanced nervously at his (current) elder and smiled assuredly at him. "O-oh, y-yeah! I'm fine! It's just, m-my tummy still feels a...l-little tight is all..."

Naruto just smiled at the young creature and said, "Don't worry, you're almost there. Just keep at it, you're doing great!" Hearing this, the creature couldn't help but beam with pride, which forced him back to the ice cream. "...W-well, if you're sure..." he said, hesitantly, and took one more hearty mouthful and gulped it down.

As soon as that mouthful of ice cream slid down his throat and into his belly however, it just became too much.

Immediately after, Kurama jerked back, yipping in pain as he did, catching the ears of the others, and shortly after, began whining as he gripped his belly with both paws. "H-hey, what's wrong, Kurama?" asked Kiba, more notably concerned than last time. Unfortunately, the dog-nin's question was answered with more whimpering from the young fox as he finally replied. "Owww...m-my tummy...really hurts right now...c-can I take a break, please...?"

Hunter's head immediately nodded yes. "Y-yeah, of course!" replied the wolf, inwardly kicking himself for not remembering that; unlike the others, young Kurama had never eaten this much before, so he wouldn't have been used to how tight his middle could feel.

Nonetheless, the kit stepped aside from the massive bowl and sat on the ground, tenderly rubbing his belly with both tries, trying ever so desperately to make the tight, now painfully constricting sensation go away, but all to no avail. Then, much to everyone's alarm, they began to hear sniffles emitting from the kit, almost like before. Oh no... whined Akamaru, much to the concern of Kiba, seeing Kurama turn his head away from the others, and seeing his body jerk slightly with each sniffle.

Seeing this, Naruto immediately stepped away from the bowl, hoisting his bloated and exposed belly with one hand as he made his way to the kit and sat beside him, glancing at him apologetically, despite the fact that the kit's back was still turned towards him. "I'm so sorry, Kurama, I-I shouldn't 'uh told you to push on without explaining what was going on first. Does it really hurt that bad?"

But, to the boys surprise, the kit shook his head. "N-no, it's not that..." he replied. Then, much to Naruto's alarm, the kit's eyes clenched shut and a few tears trickled down his orange furred cheeks. "It's just...y-you guys have all been so nice to me. You cheered me up when I was sad...then you helped me get out of that scary cage for a little while...showed me all those neat masks...a-and you all even shared the yummiest treat I've ever tasted with me! A-and even when getting rid of this tightness is supposed to be fun...here I am, spoiling that fun like a-always...cause I'm...just a big, stupid baby!"

Eyes widened, Naruto got up and sat directly in front of the kit as he said, with a greater sense of certainty in his voice, "What?! No you're not! Hey, look at me." Still sniffing, the kit wiped his eyes with his forearm, and eventually complied as he lifted his low head just slightly and glanced at the boy, eyes still glossy. "You haven't spoiled anything, you hear me? Heck, hanging around you's been a freakin' blast!" Despite himself, Akamaru chuckled, recalling the Blast Mask incident.

...Literally.

Hearing that, Kiba snickered and piped in. "Yeah, you ain't no downer! Remember how stupid the bonehead looked with all those masks on? Cause I remember you busting your gut right alongside me!" Despite an initial scowl from the remark, Naruto nonetheless nodded in agreement. "Not only that, but you're really funny, thoughtful, cheery...heck, you're downright sweet! Trust me, if anyone's grateful to be hanging out right now, it's me. Cause you ain't spoilin' nobodies fun. You're bringing it to life."

The kit's previously lowered gaze widened a bit as he looked up at the boy once again. "...Y-you mean it...?"

Much to Kurama's surprise, the boy laughed and ruffled the top of the kit's head playfully. "Course I do, silly!" Hunter chuckled and added, "Hey, has the kid steered you wrong, so far?" This earned a snicker from Kiba as he added, "Naruto ain't clever enough to lie. THAT requires a functioning brain!" Glaring back at Kiba, Naruto grinned then smugly replied, "Hey, cut me some slack, dog-breath. If I couldn't lie, I'd have told ya how much better your face would look with that scent mask on!"

Taken back, Kiba tried to retort, but couldn't think of anything on the spot, earning snickers from both Akamaru and Hunter. "Kiba, I believe I have some ointment in my bag for that B-U-R-N," said Hunter, causing Kiba to grumble in annoyance and fold his arms together. "Ah shaddup..."

Watching this exchange, Kurama couldn't help but laugh a little himself, much to Naruto's relief, but the kit still winced and clutched his belly with both paws. "Still hurts?" the blonde asked, earning a slight nod from the kit. Akamaru tilted his head and pondered to himself for a moment. Maybe Kurama just needs to burp. That tends to make pressure in your belly go away, right? He was about to tell the kit himself, but stopped before he could open his little muzzle. A-actually, on second thought...if his belly was that loud just from hunger...I'm...pretty quite sure we're not gonna wanna hear how much louder it'd be coming outta his muzzle... he thought, shuddering at the idea.

Oblivious to the pup's internal musings, (like his external musings) Naruto pondered for a moment, as Kurama glanced up at the boy apologetically. "I'm sorry...I know this part's supposed to be fun, but-"

"What're ya sorry for? Getting a tummyache?"

To the kit's surprise, the boy laughed. "You ain't used to eatin' this much the way we are. You got nothing to be ashamed about. Heck, if anything, you should be proud!" To this, the kit tilted his head curiously. "Proud...?" he inquired, earning an enthusiastic nod from Naruto. "You bet! For a first timer? The fact that you've even managed to eat THIS much...is awesome!" the boy replied, playfully but very gently poking the kits' bulbous tummy, causing him to giggle a bit, despite himself. "In fact, first time I ever went nuts with food, I don't even I ate this much...and trust me, even then, I had the WORST bellyache of my life after that!"

Hunter chuckled and nodded in agreement. "Same here. I might be a wolf, but first time I gorged myself, I didn't get anywhere near as far as you did, and I was whining WAAAY more as a result." The wolf piped in, earning Kiba's attention as he rubbed the back of his head sheepishly. "Yeaaaah, same here...and same with Akamaru over here." Hearing that, the pup blushed a bit beneath his fur, but nodded, acknowledging the fact.

Naruto then glanced at the kit and smiled widely as he said, "So don't be ashamed if you can't get it all in one go. That you've managed to keep up such a great pace so far is incredible, ESPECIALLY for a first timer, cause you got all of us beat so far on that front. And TRUST me, you ain't being a downer," with this, Naruto's smile grew warm and his voice sounded a bit more thoughtful, "because I couldn't be more glad to be hangin' out with you, Kurama."

The kit simply didn't know what to say. Even back with the others, he'd never heard (or at least remembered hearing) anyone else say such kind things to him. He simply sat there, processing it all, as though making sure he'd actually heard what he had heard. And when it all clicked to him, in a momentary lapse of judgement, the creature wrapped his arms around the boy, much to everyone's temporary alarm, but that alarm subsided when they saw the kit embracing a stunned Naruto. "...Thank you..." the kit said, tearing up with...gratitude, leaving the others still fairly stunned alongside Naruto. But eventually, the boy worked a smile and patted the kit on the back. "Hey, what're friends for, right...?"

Kiba smirked and shook his head. "Sap..." he said playfully, but Akamaru could hear respect in his voice, and just wagged his tail.

Seeing this, again, Hunter felt his heart melting. The sight was positively adorable and somewhat humorous, seeing the kit lean forward, working around both his and Naruto's more than bloated midsections to hug the blonde, but also a mixture of heart warming, seeing how grateful the kit had been towards Naruto...and in the back of his head...heart breaking, since he; like the others, knew eventually, this bond wouldn't last.

Still, he forced himself to shake that thought off, as Naruto pulled back and nudged the kit's arm playfully. "Don't worry. Soon as you feel up to it, jump back. No rush, okay?" Naruto said. The kit nodded, smiling as he wiped his face clean. Then, the kit asked, "...W-will eating more really make the tightness go away?"

Naruto just smiled back and gave the kit a wink. "Heh, trust me, it'll pop right outta ya...."

With that, the boy headed back to the bowl, leaving the kit to ponder, until finally...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: The pressure's too much, the kit needs a breather

choices: Kurama decides to dig back in with the others
Kurama tells the other four to keep eating while he examines his navel
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Naruto made his way back over to his corner of the bowl, picking his spoon back up. All the while, he kept an eye on Kurama, who was looking downward even as he drummed his furry orange belly, seemingly deep in thought. Man...I hope he doesn't force himself, 'cause it seemed like he was really hurtin' earlier.... Grimacing, he dug his spoon back in, eating at a noticeably slower pace than before, joining the others, who were eating at a similar pace. However, this was less due to them getting full (though they were beginning to feel just how much they had packed in their bellies) and more due to the fact that they were all keeping an eye on the kit. Like Naruto, they werer all hoping he'd take his time, so as not to actually make himself sick. Heck, some of them were wondering if it wouldn't be better for him to just stop now...

So they were all quite surprised when Kurama, with a determined glint in his eyes, struggled to his paws (giggling a bit as he noticed his belly touching the floor, barely allowing him any traction), made his way back over to the dish, and settled himself into the same upright sitting position as before. "K-Kurama?" Naruto asked, licking his lips clean of some whipped cream. Grinning at the blonde, Kurama grabbed his spoon and dug it in. "Kurama, you know if you're not ready, ya don't hafta..."

"I know," Kurama piped,withdrawing the spoon to reveal a heaping spoonful of ice cream, toppings, and sauce. "But if gettin' rid of the pressure's as fun as you say it is, then I want in, too!" Giggling, the kit stuck the spoon in his muzzle, gulping it down and wincing as his belly became a little tighter.

All of the other four's eyes widened in worry, and Hunter raised a paw. "K-kid, seriously," the wolf started, "If you think you're gonna make yourself sick, you really don't have to..."

"But I wanna!" the young Kyubi replied, digging his spoon back in, even as he winced at the increased tightness in his tummy. "Yeah, i-it kinda hurts..." he stuck the spoon in, wincing as he gulped the mouthful down. "....b-but I'm not worried." At this, he looked toward Naruto and smiled warmly. "Not when I got the bestest friends I've ever had behind me."

Something in Naruto's chest hitched at that comment, and how utterly sincere it sounded, but he managed to laugh and rub the back of his head. "Aww, you're not too bad yourself, Kurama!" Kiba, for his part, scoffed and folded his arms, but he wasn't quite able to hide the smile tugging at the edges of his mouth. Akamaru, not nearly so reserved, wagged his tail eagerly. And Hunter... Well, the wolf was barely able to keep his balance, what with his heart turning to mush and all...

Oblivious to this, Naruto beamed and gave Kurama a thumbs up. "In that case, go right ahead!" He winked at the kit. "I know you can do it!"

Giggling at the praise, Kurama dug his spoon back in, gulped it down, winced...then went back in, a little quicker than before. Scoop, swallow, gulp, wince, repeat...with each repetition, he winced a little quicker, scooped a little faster, gulped a little more eagerly, even as his tummy grew tighter and tighter...

Kurama winced as the tightness reached near-unbearable levels. "Nnngh..." the kit grunted, wrapping one arm around as much of his belly as he could. "My tummy...feels so tight..." He whimpered a bit. "F-feels like I'm gonna explode..."

Naruto grimaced, concern for his new friend evident in his face, but he shook his head. "C'mon, Kurama, don't give up now! You're almost there!"

"Yeah, c'mon!" Kiba urged. "You really gonna lie down and give up now?" Despite the harsh words, Akamaru wagged his tail as he heard the genuine encouragement in his voice. Then, turning to Kurama, he barked, C'mon, Kurama! You can do it! Just a little more...

"C'mon, kiddo!" Hunter called. "You're tough, I know you can do it!"

As his new friends kept calling out encouragement to him, Kurama grunted, slowly sitting back up. They were right; he couldn't give up now, especially when they had so much faith in him!

And so, slowly removing his arm from his belly, Kurama jammed his spoon into the sundae, withdrew the biggest spoonful any of them had ever seen, opened his mouth wide, and jammed it in. The chilled trea still in his mouth, he whimpered again as he felt the near-crushing tightness of his belly, but he took a deep breath through his nose, gulped it down, and winced. And, as it plopped down into his already-overfilled belly...

*POP!*

...Kurama's eyes flew wide open as he felt an explosive release of pressure from the center of his belly, the sheer force of it causing him to stagger and knocking him back on his rump. "OOF!" he yelped as he fell flat on his bottom. Wincing, he reached his forearms back to massage his rump...but stopped when he realized something. "Hey..." he started, the sides of his muzzle slowly quirking upwards. "That...that actually felt really good!" Giggling, he rested his arms on the floor behind him. "I mean, it was like, there was all this pressure, then WHOOSH! It was all gone!" Now full-on grinning, he rested a paw on top of his orange belly. "Not just that, but my tummy doesn't feel tight at all any more! I feel like I could eat way more!" Beaming, he looked up at his four friends...but faltered as he saw the looks of shock on their faces; Akamaru and Hunter's muzzles were even hanging open a bit. "G-guys? I-is everything OK?"

Instead of answering, Naruto slowly raised a finger, pointing directly at the middle of the kit's overstuffed belly. "M-my tummy?" he asked curiously. Naruto simply nodded in response. Curious, Kurama ran a paw down his tummy. "What about my..."

His eyes widened as his hands brushed against something. "Huh? What the..." Lifting his paw from the obstruction, he looked down at his belly...and his muzzle promptly dropped open.

There, smack-dab in the middle of his belly-in fact, where the pressure had been concentrated-a large-orange furred nub of flesh stuck out for everyone to see. Curious, Kurama shifted to get a better view, but the protuberance wobbled slightly as he did so. "Is...is that my..."

Naruto, though he still stared at it, began smiling as he nodded. "Yep; sure is."

At this confirmation, Kurama reached a digit out to his inverted navel (which, Hunter noticed a bit incredulously, was about twice the size of Naruto and Kiba's-and that was when they'd been at their proper ages), wiggled it a bit...and his muzzle immediately lifted in a toothy grin. "Heehee! That feels funny!" Pressing his digit a bit more firmly into the protuberance, he wiggled it and wiggled it, giggling at the strange sensations it produced. "It-it's ticklish, but it's also tingly..." Beaming, he wiggled harder, giggling as the tingly/ticklish feeling spread throughout his belly.

At the kit's obvious enjoyment, Naruto's smile widened into a full-on grin. "Heh; told ya."

Kiba stared incredulously at the sight. Didn't even know he had a belly-button... the young dog-nin thought idly. Akamaru, staring at the sight, simply shook his head, even as his tail wagged. And Hunter...

Well, Hunter's eye began twitching. He took in the young, overstuffed Tailed Beast, his popped-out navel, the look of sheer and utter glee on his face as he played with it...

Damn...cuteness...levels...overwhelming... the anthro thought to himself. Must...keep...heart...going... At this, he slowly pounded on his chest a few times to keep his heart beating. Once he was satisfied his heart wasn't going to stop from sheer, unadulterated adorableness, Hunter settled down, smiling at just how happy the young creature looked. Yep, he thought, tail wagging as the young fox laughed joyously. Totally worth it....

After a minute or so had passed...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Pop Goes the Nine-Tails

choices: All five slowly but surely finish...
Someone else's tummy begins to feel tight
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
To everyone's surprise, a re-energized Kurama pulled himself up to his paws, belly jostling as he did, causing his inverted navel to wobble comically, much to the young creatures amusement. "Oh boy, I don't think I've ever felt something so tingly and funny before!" the kit exclaimed merrily before wobbling his inverted appendage one last time and giggling as happy as a child could shortly after. All the while, as Hunter watched, he once again found himself looking away and wincing as he smacked his chest a few times.

Hnnnng....not....fair....too...cute....ngh...must....not....succumb...{/i } the wolf thought, earning an odd stare from Akamaru.

You feeling alright there, wolfy?

But Hunter just nodded, after once again forcing himself not to suffer a cuteness overload and...'go offline' as it were. Eventually, he sighed and shook himself off.

In no time at all, the kit was now standing alongside his new friends surrounding the massive bowl now only somewhat filled with what was once a hike of ice cream. Seeing the kit back to his cheery self, Naruto smiled.

"Hehe, feelin' better, buddy?" asked Naruto, a bit surprised to hear himself just blurt out the word to Kurama, but stifled the doubt and held onto the notion. Kurama simply bobbed his head eagerly as he beamed gleefully at the boy. "Heehee, you betcha! All that pressure popping outta my tummy at once freed up a LOTTA room, cause now, there's no more tightness!" Naruto just laughed and gave the kit a thumbs up. "Glad to hear it, cause we're getting close to the finish line here, and something tells me that we're gonna need your help to beat this thing!"

The kit smiled back and grabbed his spoon. "Well, then what're we waiting for?"

Looking back at the others, both Kiba and Hunter grabbed their respective spoons while Akamaru; after some doing, managed to get into position as he leaned downward to stick his head back into the bowl. "Well, boys, before we banish this oh-so-delicious beast amongst beasts to the fullest of bellies, let's all take a moment to appreciate what we've accomplished here." said Hunter, earning curious gazes from all four other youths. Smiling, he held his one free hand over the massive bowl. "Never before have any creatures been fool hardy enough to take on such a tremendous foe!" He took his other hand and patted his immensely bloated brown furred belly proudly and added, "Never before had any creature the stomachs to contain so massive a treat! Well, to any nay sayers, I say look around!"

He then pointed towards the four youths, each of whom look down at their bulbous bellies, then at each other, smiling proudly as they did. "We have not one; but FIVE dare devils with the stomachs to take on so vicious a beast and the will not to be overwhelmed! Take pride in knowing you have all undertaken a frosty foe no one before you has ever defeated!"

Kurama giggled to himself. "But ice cream isn't a foe! It's yummy!"

The others snickered to themselves as Hunter, a bit caught off guard, chuckled and said, "No, a foe as in, an obstacle of will and-ah forget it." With that, he grabbed his spoon held it high and gestured for the others to do the same. "Well, boys? Bon appetit!"

With those last words, all five dug their spoons (or in Akamaru's case, face) right into the ample but low remains of ice cream. The boys and canines filled with vigor and joy as they stuffed as much of the frosty treat into their eager mouths as they could possibly fit. Slow enough to savor the flavor of each bite, but fast enough for the pile left in the massive bowl to noticeably begin to dwindle.

As more and more time went on, Akamaru found himself struggling to get a bite, between his small size, his massive rounded tummy and the even more grand bowl, he simply couldn't reach his little head down to the corner of ice cream reserved for him. Spotting this, Kiba chuckled to himself. "Having trouble, boy?"

Before Akamaru could ask for help, Kiba stopped for a moment and headed towards the empty gallons, grabbing as many as he could fit into his arms and; one by one, scooping up what was left of Akamaru's chocolate-free section of the bowl into the many gallons and setting them aside for the pup. Barking happily, Akamaru licked the boy's hand gratefully, and after Kiba had picked him up; with some doing, the pup...rolled towards the three gallons he had left, and proceeded to dig his face with no struggle, but not before sighing to himself. Great, I'm a bowling ball...and we haven't even finished yet...

Kurama, despite Akamaru's embarrassment to the notion, giggled happily and said, "Heehee, but isn't rolling around like that fun? Cause it sure looks fun!" Akamaru turned towards the kit and pondered for a moment. Well...it certainly beats trying to WALK with a gut this bloated, heh...

Feeling a bit more at piece with his tummy's current size...if only slightly, the pup dug his head back into the first gallon and went to town, while the others continued doing the same with the bowl...slowly but surely diminishing the contents remaining in the bowl...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Kurama decides to dig back in with the others

choices: They all settle down for a nap
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The five, even Kurama, were beginning to feel just how much ice cream they had packed in their bellies, but they pressed on as fast as ever, not wanting to give up this close to the finish line. They spooned mouthful after mouthful into their waiting maws, internally delighting at the fact they were still experiencing new flavors at this late stage in the game. And so, the sundae slowly diminished further and further.

Hunter and Kiba's tank top and hoodie, respectively, were now resting completely on top of their engorged midsections, which continued to bulge as more and more ice cream was spooned in. Kiba's hoodie stayed put as the boy shoveled more and more in, but Hunter's shirt, not made of such durable fabric, began straining noticeably at the seams. Not taking notice, Hunter continued on, savoring the flavor of the monstrosity they'd constructed, causing his seams to strain more and more...

Naruto's belly continued bulging further and further outward, past his busted-open shirt. Noticing this, Naruto smacked it with a hand, giggling as it bounced noticeably, even as he continued spooning ice cream in with the other hand. As his belly stopped bouncing, he looked across the dish at Kurama and smiled warmly. The kit was gleefully spooning ice cream into his muzzle, his earlier pain and discomfort nowhere to be found. Like Naruto, he was holding his spoon with one paw while the other one played with his belly; in this case, wiggling his inverted navel, causing him to giggle even as he took spoonful after spoonful into his waiting mouth. Awww...he looks so happy now... Giggling himself, Naruto dug his spoon back in, digging in with even greater fervor. Don't blame 'im, though; all that pressure popping out at once feels amazing...

The smallest member of the group scarfed his ice cream down with vigor, wincing as he felt his already bowling-ball-sized tummy bulge bigger and bigger, gradually lifting his paws even further off the chair. Eeyup; definitely gonna look like a beach ball by the time I'm done... the pup lamented, even as he dug his head back into the gallons of ice cream. Damn it, this was too freaking good!

More and more they ate, and more and more the sundae and gallons diminished, and, of course, the bigger and bigger their tummies swelled. Eventually, the seams of Hunter's tanktop below his armpit popped, splitting apart and leaving only the seams from the armpit up intact. Hunter's eyes widened as he realized what had happened, but realized the action had released some pressure, and dug back in. In addition, the three of them that were wearing pants or shorts, their flies already forced all the way open, were feeling rather tight. Indeed, as they neared the end, they heard (and felt) them ripping a bit in the front. They blushed, but continued on. Kurama, oblivious, continued to stuff his face, his belly now completely concealing his hind paws, his navel wobbling as he rubbed his tummy. And Akamaru's belly continued to grow bigger and rounder, lifting him higher and higher above the chair...

Eventually, four spoons clattered into the the now entirely-picked clean sundae dish, and those who had been holding them groaned, clutched their bellies, and flopped onto their backs, their oversized tummies sticking into the air. "Oh man," Naruto moaned, massaging his globular tummy with both hands. "I don't think I've ever eatURP!...eaten that much ice cream in my entire life..."

"M-me either," Kiba mumbled, licking his lips. "B-but that was still the single best ice cream sundae I've ever had..."

Looking up to the top of his furry belly, Kurama wiggled his navel idly. "It's the only one I've ever had..." He burped suddenly, blushing slightly. "...but it was really, really, yummy..." he giggled somewhat sluggishly.

Hunter sighed, massaging his own tummy with both paws. "You said it, kiddo..." Suddenly, he burped, but rather than be embarrassed, he simply smiled and licked his chops.

Akamaru, licking his own muzzle, whined as he looked down at himself. YEah, it was yummy...but look at our guts...

Indeed, their consumption of such a massive treat had left their bellies truly massive. Hunter, the boys, and Kurama each looked as though they had a fleshy or fur-covered beach ball of at least medium size attached to their midsections (curiously, with the exception of Kurama, all their navels were still innies). Akamaru, true to his prediction, now looked like a small, furry beach ball, his paws now several inches above the chair....
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: All five slowly but surely finish...

choices: The youths wake up first, and get dressed
Hunter wakes up first and rouses the kids
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Kurama, examining his own bulbous gut, giggled. "Heehee, our tummies did get really big, didn't they?" The fox looked over at the blonde, who was massaging his own belly. "You were right, Naruto; our stomachs DO look like boulders that swallowed smaller boulders!" At this, the kit burst into a fit of giggles, his massive belly shaking as he did so.

Naruto beamed right back at him. "Heh; I told ya, didn't I?"

Kurama beamed back. "Heh, sure did!" Then, he did something surprising: grunting and groaning, he got onto his front, rested on his bulbous belly, and rolled himself toward Naruto. "Heehee, this is fun!"

Coming to a stop next to the blonde, the fox grunted again, shifting so that he was sitting on his rump, his front legs resting behind him as the supported him. Taking the hint, Naruto forced himself to sit upright. Burping wetly, he glanced at the fox and grinned. "This whole day's been fun, and it's all..." Then, to the fox's surprise, Naruto threw an arm about the fox's shoulders and pulled him close. "...thanks to you, buddy."

Kurama smiled, touched. "Aww...you're fun too, Naruto."

Hunter, having forced himself into a sitting position as well, smiled as he looked over his belly at the two youths. They've become such good friends in such a short time, Hunter lamented. If only there was a way to... His eyes suddenly widened. Ah! That's it!

"Say, boys," Hunter started, smiling at Naruto and Kurama. "I know we're gonna have to rest these off before we do anything else, but how would you like to play later on?"

"Play?!" Kurama's ears shot up, and he looked right back at Hunter, grinning. "Really?!"

Grunting, Kiba sat up, resting both hands on his belly. "What? What happened to not letting him go out in public?"

Akamaru was about to bark his agreement when, without warning, he felt himself rolling....toward the edge of the chair. His eyes bulged open. No... frantically, he kicked his paws as hard as he could, but to no avail. Nonononononono! Kiba, eyes turning toward his canine pal, gasped. "Akamaru!" Forcing himself up off his feet, he lurched as quickly as he could toward the pup, belly wobbling all the while.

Crap! Akamaru yelped as he rolled closer to the edge. This is gonna hurt, I know it...

Thankfully, just as he was about to topple off the edge of the chair, Kiba seized the beach-ball-sized pup, bringing him to his chest and resting him on top of his fully-exposed belly. The boy smiled. "I gotcha, boy." Akamaru, breathing a sigh of relief, gratefuly licked Kiba's face, causing the boy to giggle even as he plopped back on his rear.

Kurama giggled uproariously at the sight, and Naruto wasn't much further behind. Snickering himself, Hunter nonetheless continued. "Yeah, we agreed not to bring him out in public..." the edge of his muzzle quirked up. "...here."

Naruto quirked an eyebrow. "Eh? What are ya talkin' about?"

Hunter grinned, getting to his hind paws and lurching over to his bag. "Well," he began, rummaging through it. "I was thinking: I have those Kaepora Gaebora statues all over the place, including the place where they came from, Termina."

Kurama blinked. "Wh-whaddaya mean?" he asked curiously, even as realization slowly formed.

Hunter looked back at the overstuffed kit, grinning. "Well," the anthro replied, withdrawing from his bag with several small objects in his hand. "It's a pretty fun place; kinda mischievous, but its cool, and there's lots of stuff to do, not to mention a lot of wide-open spaces to run around in..." He chuckled. "...not to mention the Keatons."

Kurama tiled his head. "Keatons?"

Hunter nodded. "Yep! They're a race of three-tailed foxes that live there. Not only are they fairly common, but they're well-regarded by the populace."

At this, the kit's face lit up. "You mean..."

"Yep," Hunter replied, nodding. He sat down on his rump and scooted closer to the youths, objects still in hand. "You'd fit in great, and you could go out in public and play. But to play..." smiling, he held the objects closer, and Kurama noticed they appeared to be small vials with green liquid inside it. "...you're gonna hafta digest first."

Noticing the formula, Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru's eyes widened, but Hunter continued before they could interject. "These little fellas here help you digest; just down one of these, and by the time you wake up, you'll be ready and raring to go." He handed one to the eager fox kit, then to Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru. "I'd take one myself, but I think I'll digest just fine."

Kurama giggled. "Thanks, Mr. Hunter!" Pulling the cork off, he downed the whole thing, smacking his lips. "Huh, kinda tastes funny..."

The anthro merely shrugged. "Funny's better than bad..."

Naruto and Kiba gave the wolf odd looks, but they nonetheless downed theirs, giving some to Akamaru as well. Once that was done, Hunter cleared his throat. "Now, the way I figured it, we'd nap, rest these off, change into some clothes that AREN'T ripped, and head straight off." He smiled at the youths. "That OK with you guys?"

Kurama smiled, his eyes starting to droop. "Sounds great!" And maybe I can try some on, too... He yawned widely, smacking his lips. It must have been contagious, because Naruto suddenly yawned as well, followed by Kiba and his canine companion.

Chest warming at the sight, Hunter yawned himself. "Sounds like a grand idea, boys." He looked out the window, his eyes widening. "Oh wow, night already?" Looking back, he started speaking. "Well, at least we'll get up bright and..." The anthro trailed off...and a smile slowly tugged across his muzzle at the sight that met his eyes.

In the time he'd looked out the window, the youths had all nodded off. Kiba was flat on his back, arms splayd out to the sides, his tummy rising and falling as he breathed. Akamaru, having rolled off his chest, was lying beside his head, his legs kicking a bit in his sleep. Naruto and Kurama were leaning against each other, the blonde's arm still wrapped about the kit's shoulders.

Aww, the anthro cooed inwardly. They sure look content...

At that moment, Kurama reached a foreleg to the side, grabbed his tails, opened his mouth...

Hunter's eyes bulged wide. He's not gonna...

...and closed his mouth around his tails. After a few seconds, the tails began shifting a bit, indicating that...

Oh dear sweet Arceus, he's sucking on his tails, Hunter thought, the sheer cuteness of the sight overwhelming him a bit. K-keep it together, Hunter; you're a wolf, an apex predator, the cream of the...

As soon as that last thought entered his head, Kurama reached up with his other arm, wrapped it around Naruto's shoulders, and tugged the boy closer.

...nighty night.

Eyes crossing, Hunter flopped onto his back, and soon, he was snoring, sleeping off the massive meal with the rest of them.
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: They all settle down for a nap

choices: Hunter gets changed and they head to Termina
The boys want some breakfast first
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The hours ticked away, and night soon turned to day.

Several hours had passed since last nights massive ice cream sundae escapades, and since then, the previously bulbous bellies attached to all five parties had shrunken right back down to their regularly thin forms. Naruto, still wearing his busted shirt, now just exposing his once again thinned chest and stomach, slowly groaned as his eyes fluttered open. Sure enough, he woke to find an orange furred arm rested around his shoulders brotherly.

Turning his head, he smiled warmly to see Kurama; one arm wrapped around Naruto, and the other...holding his tails as he innocently sucked on the top like a baby to a thumb. Normally, Naruto would be cracking up at such a sight. If ever he caught Kiba doing such a thing, he'd probably never stop laughing for as long as he lived. However, what Naruto was focusing on was the arm wrapped around his shoulders like that of a truly close companion, and; behind the tail sucking, a warm smile across the young kits muzzle. Even in this state, Naruto couldn't help but smile an equally warm smile at the young creature; content and peaceful.

Discovering his own arm wrapped around the kit as well, Naruto playfully and gently rocked the kit, until he saw the orange creatures' eyes flutter open. Grinning, he patted Kurama on the arm. "Mornin', buddy!" exclaimed Naruto, catching the creature off guard for a second, before he smiled and 'said', "MRNI-"

Eyes widening, Kurama looked down to see his tails in his mouth, and immediately spat them out, chuckling as he rubbed the back of his head sheepishly. "Eehehee...m-mornin', Naruto...!"

But the blond just laughed and waved his hand dismissively. "Heehee, don't worry, Kurama. I sometimes do that in my sleep too!" replied Naruto, earning a curious glance from the kit as he tilted his head. "You sometimes suck your tails?"

"Haha, no, my thumb. Y'know, like a baby or somethin'."

Both the kit and boy laughed to themselves before Kurama yawned heartily and stretched back, rubbed his eyes with his foreleg. "Boy oh boy, I've never slept that good in my life!" the kit exclaimed, earning a chuckle from Naruto. "Yeah, that's cause you've never eaten that much before either," the boy said, playfully poking Kurama's once again thin tummy, causing the kit to giggle as he rested a paw against his stomach and nodded. "You sure got me there!"

Kurama felt around the lower middle of his orange furred belly, feeling his once again inward navel hidden beneath his fur. Ah shoot, guess that ticklish tingly feeling's gone.

Glancing around and seeing the others still asleep and snoring audibly; Hunter especially, the two youths snickered to themselves as Kurama glanced at the window a bit more fondly and asked, "So...ya really think these people in this...Termina place're gonna be okay with me...being outside...?"

Naruto smiled and stepped towards the kit, patting his shoulder assuredly. "Ya heard what Hunter said. They actually adore Tailed Foxes there! I think you'll be juuuuust fine."

He then glanced over at Kiba; smile widening to a more impish state. "Say, Kurama...wanna see something funny?" The kit's head immediately bobbed up and down as Naruto slowly snuck over to Hunter's bag and reached in as quietly as he could, carefully pulling out a large white feather. "What's that for?" asked the kit; hushed when he saw Naruto being all sneaky. To which, the boy snickered quietly; approaching Kiba...

"...You'll see..."

Seeing Kiba's exposed tummy; once again thinned having digested his ample amounts of consumed ice cream, Naruto slowly brought the feather down around the young dog-nin's navel and began flicking the feather about. In his sleep, Kiba began squirming and giggling, much to Kurama's amusement, before the boy woke up and began squirming a bit more rapidly. "Ahhhhahaha, w-what the heeahahahahaha!" was all Kiba could get out, quickly waking Akamaru in the process.

Kurama began laughing merrily as Kiba tried swiping the feather from Naruto's hands. "Rise and shine, dog-breathe!" replied Naruto, still grinning before discovering his feather immediately missing from his hand.

"Huh?"

He quickly turned to see Akamaru sitting with the feather now in his mouth. The blond scratched his head curiously. "H-how did you...?"

Akamaru just snickered, tail wagging as he did. I think you've got more important things to worry about...

Oblivious to the pup's musings, Naruto was about to ask Kurama what Akamaru said, but was promptly pounced on by Kiba, causing the two to wrestle about on the floor. "This'll teach you, ya jerk!" spouted Kiba amidst the struggling.

Kurama watched for a moment, a bit concerned at first, but as the boys started laughing, he too, found himself easing up and laughing alongside them. "Heehee, are they always this crazy?" the kit asked the pup, who simply nodded and smirked to himself; feather still clamped between his jaws. All. The. Time.

After some more brief roughhousing, the two rolled off each other and found themselves on their backs, panting and laughing weakly. "Heh...that was...still funny..." muttered Naruto; still catching his breath. "Uh-huh, and I...still whooped...your butt...bone...head..." replied Kiba, before the two eventually rose to their feet and turned back to Hunter...who was STILL snoring, sprawled onto the ground like a poor soul who had passed out from a cuteness overload of sorts. "Wow, Hunter's a heavier sleeper than I thought," muttered Kiba, as the others nodded in agreement.

Hand rested atop his exposed tummy, Naruto chuckled a bit sheepishly himself and said, "Say, whadduya say we change into stuff that's NOT completely busted up? I think Hunter's still got some spare attires from his...Midna friend...err...something, in the closet." Kiba blushed a bit, remembering he'd busted his zipper and pants in the process of last nights' ultra chilly gorging.

And so, the two youths marched over to the closet, digging around and clutching onto their lower garments to keep them from plopping off and again; exposing embarrassing boxer patterns. "Aha!" exclaimed the two in unison as they both pulled out a new pair of digs.

First Naruto headed into the bathroom to change while Kiba, Kurama and Akamaru chatted idly. In no time at all, the blonde had returned, now wearing a blue T-shirt under a sleeveless orange hoodie and black pants. Kiba then headed into the bathroom himself, then returned wearing a tan long-sleeved V-Neck shirt, black shorts and still wearing his necklace from his last attire. "Pretty damn snazzy," remarked Naruto. "Thanks, bonehead, you too."

Kurama smiled at the sight, then, fiddled his front paws together as though working up the courage to ask something.

"S-say, guys...this might sound crazy, but....d-do ya think...m-maybe I could...I dunno...try something on too?"

Both boys shared a confused glance for a moment. "What, ya mean like, put on clothes?" asked Kiba, earning a nervous nod from the kit. Naruto just smiled and said, "Hey, if Hunter can do it, I don't think he'll mind you giving it a shot!" The kit beamed then eagerly trotted over to the closet, rummaging himself.

"Oooh! This one looks so cool!" Kurama remarked, much to both boys and the pups interest as they awaited what he'd reveal. Sure enough, the young fox pulled out a tan t-shirt with an orange flame swirl in the middle, and a pair of blue pants. Kiba immediately turned to Naruto. "I-isn't that..."

"Yep," the blonde replied, a bit surprised himself. Nevertheless, he worked up a smile and said, "Well, go ahead and try it on!" The kit smiled joyously as he immediately slipped the shirt on, and; surprisingly, the pants, despite his tails still sticking out the backside and waving about. He then sat upright and held his arms out. "So, whadduya guys think?"

Kiba scratched his head for a moment. "Heh, well, ya look pretty..."

"Pretty damn cool!" blurted Naruto, smiling widely as he gave the kit a thumbs up, causing him to smile ever more gleefully.

"You sure do, kiddo," replied another voice, surprising the four youths as they turned to see Hunter yawning and rubbing his eyes before placing his glaces back atop his muzzle. "Mmph, nice to see you boys up and about. Heh, guess you're all pretty excited for our 'trip', huh?" In unison, all four nodded, causing the anthro to chuckle; albeit groggily. "Right on. Here, lemme get changed and we'll get this show on the road, sound good?"
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: The youths wake up first, and get dressed

choices: They appear in a field
They appear in the middle of a town
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
At the eager nods from the boys, Hunter clambered to his hind paws, gripping his shorts so they didn't fall off. Yawning, he made his way over to his duffel and rooted around for a few seconds. "Let's see...what should I wear..." he began tossing clothes out of the bag, sending them flying through the air. "No, no, no...AH!" With a cry of triumph, Hunter reached into the bag and pulled out a set of folded clothes. Holding them up, he smiled. Hmm...not the sort of thing I usually wear, but this isn't the usual sort of situation, either... Standing up (and making sure to keep one paw gripping his shorts), he brought the clothes over to the bed and set them down. Then, with an impish grin on his muzzle, he peeled his shirt off right there and tossed it aside.

"AH!" Naruto exclaimed, flushing. "Damn it, Hunter, not again!" Kurama glanced over at him, more than a bit confused, but decided he'd ask Naruto later.

"C-can't you go into the bathroom or something?!" Kiba exclaimed, covering his eyes. "We don't wanna see you streaking!"

Hunter chuckled. "Relax, Kiba; it's not like I'm changing my underwear or anything. Besides," he added, pulling his shorts down and kicking them off (and revealing his black, full-moon patterned boxers in the process,) "even if I was, it's not like you'd see anything."

At this, Kurama giggled. "Yeah, 'cause the fur covers everything, right?" Hunter nodded, smiling at the kit. "Got it in one, kiddo; kinda like with you...though I must admit, you look rather snazzy in that getup." As the fox kit beamed and rubbed the back of his head, Hunter grabbed the pants from the pile and unfolded them, revealing them to be, to the boys' and Akamaru's surprise, a pair of long, tan khaki pants. Nodding, he began pulling them on.

Akamaru raised an eyebrow. Huh, and here I was expecting another shorts-and-tanktop outfit...

Hunter, even as he buttoned and zipped up, shrugged. "Eh, little change every now and then never hurt anybody." Reaching back toward the neatly-folded pile, he pulled out a black belt, which he proceeded to loop around his waist and buckle. After making sure it wasn't too tight or too loose, he grabbed the next garment off the bed, which was a long-sleeved, bright white shirt, and slipped it over his head. After making sure it was all straightened out, Hunter smirked. "And now, for the finishing touch..." Reaching over to the bed, he grabbed the last garment that lay upon it- a dark green, sleeveless vest- and proceeded to slip it over his shoulders, leaving it open to reveal the white shirt.

Looking down at himself with a satisfied nod, he looked toward the others. "Well, boys? How do I look?"

Naruto blinked. "Wow...that...that actually looks sorta cool."

Hunter chuckled, rubbing the back of his head. "Aw, thanks you're too..." Aburptly, the smile fell from his muzzle. "Wait. What did you mean 'actually?'"

Kiba, sensing an opportunity, smirked, folding his arms. "Weeeell, no offense," the dog-nin began, "but tank tops and shorts? Kinda plain, if ya ask me..."

Hunter spluttered a bit. "H-hey! Tank tops and shorts are perfectly functional garments, and beside, they look badass!"

Naruto snickered. "Badass, right..." Kiba, predictably, couldn't resist snickering alongside him. "H-hey, knock it off!" Hunter protested, a little offended.

Kurama looked at the two boys in confusion, then at Hunter. "I thought you looked cool," Kurama admitted. At this, Hunter smiled, and Naruto and Kiba immediately stopped snickering.

"K-Kurama!" Naruto exclaimed, looking toward the young fox. "You're supposed to be on my side!"

"I am on your side," Kurama replied, not quite understanding what Naruto was so upset about. "I was just saying he looked cool in his outfit before, that's all."

Akamaru shook his head. Not what he meant...

Before Kurama could reply, Hunter spoke up. "Thank you, Kurama," he said, striding over to the kit and patting him on the head. Kurama said nothing, but beamed in response. Naruto, meanwhile, turned away and grumbled, while Kiba just facepalmed.

"So!" The anthro suddenly exclaimed, stepping back from Kurama. "Shall we get going?"

The fox kit beamed again, getting to his paws. "Yeah!" And, before any of them could blink, he had zipped over to the Kaepora Gaebora statue and plopped down next to it, smiling at the others expectantly.

Kiba laughed. "Heh; eager, ain't he?" Picking Akamaru up and putting him in the front of his shirt, he strolled over next to Kurama.

Naruto, in spite of himself, giggled, his previous disgruntlement forgotten as he rushed over to the statue, coming to a stop next to Kurama. "Heh, c'mon, Hunter!"

Hunter, chuckling, walked back over to his bag and knelt down. "OK, OK, lemme just get something..." He rummaged about for a few seconds before he finally came up with the Ocarina. "Perfect! And now, just one last thing...." Then, to their surprise, he went about the room, picking up his scattered clothes and cramming them in the bag. Satisfied that he had gotten them all, he zipped it up. "Dunno how long we're gonna be in Termina," he explained at the boys' confused faces, "so I figured I'd better bring this just in case." Duffel in paw, he strolled on over to the statue, set it down, and hefted the Ocarina. "You boys ready?" At the chorus of "Uh-huhs!", he smiled, and brought the Ocarina to his muzzle. Closing his eyes, he thought of where he wanted to go, took a breath, and played that same set of three repeating notes a couple of times.

On cue, a pair of massive white wings appeared, enveloped the group, emitted a light....

...and then the light faded, all five of them gone.
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Hunter gets changed and they head to Termina

choices: Onward to Clock Town!
The boys wanna play in the fields first
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The wings spiraled and in a great white flash of light, vanished, leaving the five next to a Kaepora Gaebora statue right besides a rather large tree. But once their eyes had adjusted, all four youths gazed in awe at the vast, rich sight around them, Kurama especially. Hunter just glanced down at them and smiled.

"It's so...beautiful..." remarked the kit, as Hunter gazed upon the sight and nodded. "Yup. Sure is, kiddo."

All around them, far as the eye could see; was an immensely vast valley, green and vibrant. Naruto, Kiba, even Akamaru; all of them, were utterly dumbfounded by the rich, peaceful scenery. Then, something caught Naruto's eyes. "Hey, look!" The others turned to where Naruto was pointing, and; if they didn't know any better...could SWEAR they saw snow in the distance, as a section of the field and the mountains and hills behind it looked shrouded in snow. On the opposite end of that area, looked to be a much dryer scene, leading to two stone towers just barely visible past the mountains.

Akamaru gazed upon the drastically different climates so close together. Wow, the climate's...different over here, isn't it...

Hunter smirked and nodded. "Sure is. Unlike Konoha and most worlds I visit, climates are aligned to each section of this little world. Like that really dry mountainside with those towers waaaaay off in the distance? That's Ikana Canyon. And it can rain for days on end, but you'll never see anything green or colorful there...fitting for 'the land of the dead'."

He let the boys shudder a bit to themselves as he smirked dismissively and pointed towards the snowy part that caught their eyes earlier. "That snowy area you guys see in the distance? That's Snowhead Peak, where it's always snowy, cold, but still really fun; provided you don't get stuck in the blizzard and frozen...time and time again..." The three youths gulped nervously at the thought, but Kurama was just admiring the scenery, eyes wide and eager, not quite hearing as Hunter pointed to the tree besides them and what looked like a forested trail behind it. "This area? Leads to Woodfall, where the Deku Kingdom resides in a swamp. Sounds iffy, but it's actually a pretty nice place! Didn't used to be not too long ago, but then again, none of Termina did..."

"But it's all so pretty..." mused Kurama, still utterly in awe. Hunter just chuckled and said, "It is, isn't it...buuuuut some entities were looking to take this world...and incinerate it with a giant evil moon, heh, but that can wait..."

Much closer in the more nearby distance however, grey walls surrounding and towering over a town with nothing but an immense clock tower visible well above the protective walls. "See that place walled off?" Hunter asked, earning nods from the others. "That's Clock Town, and THAT'S where we'll have TONS of fun. They got great games, great sights, and great food to boot!"

The others grinned as their attention turned to their soon-to-be-destination, but Kurama's gaze was still fixed on the vibrant scenery around him. "So, whadduya kids wanna do first?" Hunter asked. Naruto was about to reply, but he stopped and glanced back at Kurama, seeing the wonder in the young fox kits' eyes, and couldn't help but smile. "Tell ya what, why don't we let Kurama decide?" the blonde boy answered. Hunter smirked then nodded, stepping towards the young kit. "Well, kiddo? How about it?"

Young Kurama turned to the wolf and asked, "Do ya think we can...just, walk around for a little bit and see the sights?" Naruto was a bit taken back. Of all things a child (or kit) would want, to just walk around and enjoy the scenery was seldom one of them, unless it involved racing in the fields, playing or anything like that. But then, he recalled how Kurama probably never got to see many sights; even as a kit, and certainly wouldn't remember any from his malevolent adulthood. All this kit remembered were the few times he and his other Tailed-Beast companions snuck out to nearby villages, never anything like this.
