"Come and get your love...Come and get your lo-ove..." the raccoon sang as he did a little twirl, bobbing his head to the music. The youths gaped at the sight of the surly critter merrily dancing and singing (quite well, actually) along to the tunes emanating from the kitchen. Hunter? Well, Hunter's paw was clamped over his muzzle, evidently doing his damnedest not to bust a gut. Groot, meanwhile, came to a stop behind Hunter, throwing a worried look at the anthro. Rocket, somehow, remained oblivious to all of this.
"Y-eah, Y-eah," he continued, doing another twirl and finaly opening his eyes. "Come and...get your....ah, crap..." he muttered, as he slowly looked up to see the others gaping at him. His eyes widened as they flittled to Hunter, then the kids, then back again. There was a noticeable silence in the air. Then, Rocket lifted a digit, pointed it at them, and said:

"You saw nothing."

Confused, Kurama tilted his head. "B-but, Mister Rocket...."

"You. Saw. No-thing," the creature repeated firmly. Kurama, still befuddled, opened his muzzle to protest, but before he could...

"BAHAHAHAHAHA!" Hunter exploded, bending over and clutching his middle. "Th-this is too freaking priceless!" He opened an eye and looked at the raccoon. "Heh...enjoying your--SNORT---yourself there, Rockehehehee..." Whatever else he said was lost as he dissolved into a fit of laughter.

Rocket gave him the stinkeye. "Oh, shut up," he snapped, folding his arms irritably. "It helps me create..." Quill, I hate you so freakin' much right now...

Seeing that Hunter was still busy laughing, and Rocket was a little upset, Naruto cut in. "So, uh...is everything ready yet?"

At that, Rocket seemed to perk up a bit. "Funny you should ask, kid..." Winking, he made for the door. "Follow me...." He pushed the door open and walked inside. Naruto, Kiba, and Kurama looked at each other, curious, before they followed him. Hunter, still fighting to restrain his snickers, followed them in.

"G-gotta say, Rocket," Hunter gasped, getting himself under control, "Whatever ya made, it smells...really...good..."

He trailed off as he came to a stop behind the boys, each gaping out at the kitchen with shocked, overawed expressions on their faces. His face mirrored theirs as they beheld what the room held.

Around each side of the kitchen, several tables were set up next to one another, forming lines that encircled the entire area. Upon these tables....

Well, upon these tables was the biggest collection of sweets any of them had ever seen, the tables creaking under their weight.

Massive cakes and pies, bigger and more numerous than any of them had ever seen, were stacked upon one another, massive towers of cookies and donuts beside them. Elsewhere, there were literally mounds of brownies, muffins, and cupcakes piled on top of one another, filling the room with a truly amazing aroma. In addition, there were gallons of some thick liquid that, judging by the empty ice cream containers next to them, were some kind of ice-cream based dish.

None of them said anything for a moment. Then...

"It's..." Kurama whispered, eyes wide as saucers.

...it's beautiful... Akamaru murmured, tail wagging slowly.

Rocket, for his part, just smirked at the sight of them in their trance. "Eh? Not too shabby, if I do say so myself..." The others could only nod numbly in agreement.

Figuring that was all he was going to get out of them, Rocket continued. "So, ya jackasses wanna bring these beauties out to the cafeteria, or do ya just wanna dig in right here, right now?"
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Designs of Desserts, pt. 2

choices: Rocket decides to see them dig in and enjoy his work
Rocket heads straight to the Milk Bar and leaves the gang to feast
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Upon hearing his inquiry, Kurama turned to the others, fiddling his paws together a bit nervously and turned back to Rocket and said, "W-well, you went through the trouble of setting them all up so nice and neat here. I don't wanna mess that up, how about you guys?" Naruto and the others turned to each other and smirked as Naruto raised his shoulders innocently and replied, "Nah, me neither. Plus, carrying this much all the way over to the cafeteria? Hehe, noooo thanks." The kit giggled at that then glanced back at Rocket, smiling as he added, "Besides, this way, once we finish up, it'll be easier to put dishes away so Ms. Anju won't have to carry them all the way from the cafeteria!"

Despite himself, Rocket couldn't help but smirk just a bit at that. "Heh, awful considerate'uh ya, squirt." Groot nodded approvingly and added, "I am Groot." To that, Kurama just rubbed the back of his fuzzy head bashfully and added, "Aww, now you're just being too nice, Mister Groot!"

Kiba leaned in towards the others and whispered, "Didn't realize there was a nicer way to say, 'I am Groot,' live'n learn, huh?" The others snickered at that as Hunter rubbed his paws together and said, "Well, I dunno about you guys, but I; for one, believe that this bounty isn't gonna eat itself. So, let's get some chairs, shall we?"

Hunter and the others headed into the cafeteria and grabbed four chairs, (seeing as how Akamaru was just gonna be on the table anyway) and set them down into the kitchen, pulling one of the empty side tables in the center for them to sit, completely surrounded by the bounty of desserts the raccoon had baked for them.

And in no time at all, Hunter had grabbed a plate and set upon it a large pile of cookies and muffins, its' fresh baked aroma still treating the anthro's nose with an overwhelmingly delicious smell of the many flavors he was about to engulf. Likewise, Naruto had set down an entire chocolate cake, smothered with milk chocolate frosting, all layered evenly and perfectly. Naruto's mouth watered as he saw the treat, but his eager expression became one of confusion for a moment when he glanced at the top. Atop this beautiful chocolate cake was a picture drawn with frosting of Rocket and Groot...and several money bags behind him. The blonde raised an eyebrow and turned to the raccoon who immediately took notice and smirked nonchalantly as he muttered simply, "True story."

Despite himself, Naruto couldn't help but chuckle at the surprisingly well drawn caricature, mouth still watering with anticipation.

As with the others, Kiba too, had grabbed an entire cherry pie, still warm and steaming as he set its' pan down before him and grabbed a plate of several donuts and placed it down besides him for his little canine pal who yipped merrily at the sight.

Kurama, on the other hand, had a slightly befuddled look to his face, but eager all the same as he examined the creamy looking liquid in the many pitchers waiting for him. Catching this, Rocket approached the kit and asked, "Somethin' wrong, kid?" The young kyuubi shook his head and added, "Oh, n-no, nothing at all, Mister Rocket! But, errrm," the kit's expression became a bit sheepish as he added, "...I d-dunno what this is."

Rocket immediately raised an eyebrow and said, "Y'er jokin'...ya never had a milkshake before?" The kit tilted his head curiously at that and added, "W-what's a milkshake?" To that, Rocket gaped, but after an insisting glance from Groot, he regained composure and explained.

"Well, squirt...see, a milkshake is ice cream in drink form. Not just MELTED ice cream like some uninformed jackasses might tell ya, but Ice Cream mixed with milk, vanilla extract, some sugar, and all blended into a creamy ice cream drink."

Kurama listened attentively, but was completely lost and befuddled, until...

"Ice cream I can d-drink...?" he asked, bewildered. Rocket nodded and held his paws towards the creamy beverages set for him and added, "And I set 'em up in all kindsa different flavors, so ya don't get bored...orrrr in case ya wanna share with y'er friends since, well, ya seem like the sharin' type...y'know, not that sharin' ever made a crap'uh sense...buuuuut hey, to each their own, right? Tell ya what, grab a pitcher'n give it a sip."

At that, the kit trotted over to the table with the shakes and grabbed a basic vanilla shake. It felt nice and cool just like ice cream, that much was certain. However, he was about to take a sip when his nose accidentally dipped into something white and fluffy on top of the beverage. Glancing at it curiously, Rocket took the hint and added, "That's whipped cream. I topped off all the shakes with 'em, and occasionally, sprinkled some chocolate flakes or cherries on top cause I'll be damned if I ain't gonna kill it with presentation."

Nodding, the kit licked the fluffy cream-like substance from his nose and muzzle and smiled at the taste, before taking a cautious sip of the beverage at hand. The others watched curiously to see how the kit would react while Rocket watched with an all-too-confident grin on his face. Sure enough, the kit pulled the pitcher from his muzzle, smacking his chops slightly as Naruto leaned in and asked, "So? How's it taste, Kurama?" To this, the fox turned to the others and was about to reply, but instead, simply went silent, eyes wide with astonishment. Hunter just smirked and said, "That good, huh?"

"I...I...this...so...so very...I...I can't even..."

Rocket just smirked at the young Tailed-Beasts inability to properly express the delicious creaminess that was the Rocket-Brand-milkshake and raised his shoulders. "Well, if that ain't a positive review, I dunno what is."

The kit; still overwhelmed, simply carried the pitcher over to the table and sat down besides his friends, eyes still wide as saucers, much to the amusement of the three other youths.

"Well, boys? Wolfy? S'pose I don't gotta really say it since I made 'em'n know how perfect they are, buuuuut, hope y'all enjoy!" Rocket declared as the wooden besides him raised a wooden finger and added, "I am Groot," he said, as though reminding, causing the raccoon to snap his digits. "Riiiiiight! Yeah, since you guys apparently liked Red's special homemade soda'er whatever, she left a few more pitchers for you guys too, in case ya want some. Me? I'll stick with the milk, thank ya very much...aaaaand on THAT note..."

The raccoon had slyly turned on one foot and did a complete 180 degree spin, as he headed towards the door, but just then...

"Oooh! M-Mister Rocket?"

At that, the raccoon stopped, exhaled a small, mildly disgruntled sigh and turned right back around. "Yeah, kid?"

"I-I just wanna say...thank you so much. This all looks so delicious'n...it was really nice of you to take the time to bake all this for us." Rocket's expression softened slightly, a bit taken back at the genuine gratitude, moreso when Naruto nodded and said, "Yeah, we really appreciate you actually makin' all this for us." Kiba smirked and said, "Eh, I'd 'uh been happy with just the pies, but SOME people seem to think cake is better...still, thanks, man!" Akamaru barked his gratitude as per usual and Hunter just grinned back at the raccoon and said, "Ya heard the kids, this was damn decent'uh you, pal. Thanks for showing these kids part'uh what makes this place and the people in it so great."

Groot smiled warmly at them and nodded back as he turned back to Rocket who was looking away, clearing his throat, a bit befuddled himself. "Errr, y-yeah, hey, no biggie, right? Just...uh...s-showin' off how killer my desserts are, heh...y-yeah...w-well, enjoy! And uh...yeah..."

As he stammered, Groot leaned down and whispered, "I am Groot?" Rocket, snapping out of his bewildered state, shook his head at the creature. "Why? I know my bakin's good, I don't gotta see 'em enjoy it...n-no matter how genuine'n happy my stuff makes 'em...besides, they're gonna be swellin' up like water balloons and I AIN'T gonna be 'round for that."

"I am Grooooot..." the tree-man said, almost insistingly...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: They all grab chairs and eat right in the kitchen

choices: The taste of the treats encourage them to dig in even more
The taste of the desserts is so amazing, they need a moment to process it
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Rocket shook his head furiously. "Forget it, I'm NOT sticking around!"

Groot blinked. "I am Groot..."

"I told you!" the Raccoon snapped, irritated. "I just get freaked out when people swell up like friggin' water balloons!"

The tree-man tilted his head. "I am Groot?"

The small creature scowled. "Yes, I KNOW there are worse things out there!" Rocket exclaimed. "But that...it's just friggin' weird!"

As the two bantered back and forth, Hunter and the others stared, watching with confusion, befuddlement, or, in Hunter's case, amusement. "Mr. Hunter?" Kurama asked, looking at the wolf from his seat. "Why doesn't Mister Rocket wanna stay?"

"Hmm?" Hunter perked up and looked at Kurama, smiling. "Ah, don't worry about him, it's nothing to do with us. It's just, well.." he laughed a bit, rubbing the back of his head. "...Rocket kinda gets a little skeeved out when people stuff themselves like we did with the sundae?"

Kurama blinked, tilting his head in confusion. "Skeeved out?"

Chuckling, Naruto patted Kurama on the back. "It means creeped out, basically."

The kit's eyes lit up in understanding. "Oh, I get it!" Then, his muzzle screwed up in confusion. "But...why does it creep Mister Rocket out?"

Hunter shrugged. "Eh, I dunno; guess that sort of thing just isn't for everyone..."

Kurama nodded, but he still seemed a bit confused. But as he looked over at Rocket and Groot, still going back and forth, a smile slowly came to his muzzle as an idea occurred to him. "M-Mister Rocket?" the kit spoke up, catching Rocket's attention mid-rant. Spinning around on his feet, Rocket folded his arms. "Yeah, kid, what is it?"

Kurama scratched the back of his head. "Erm, sorry to ask this, but...how come you get creeped out when people eat a lot and get big tummies?"

Rocket's eyes flew wide open. "W-well, kid, see, the thing is..." The raccoon stammered a bit, trying to find the right words.

Misinterpreting this as not knowing what to say, Kurama smiled. "It's really not that bad, Mister Rocket. I mean, heck, just yesterday, me n' the others ate a HUGE sundae! Our tummies got as big as boulders, Akamaru looked like a beach ball, Naruto busted all the buttons on his shirt, their underwear was showing, and my belly button even...are you OK?"

This was said as he'd noticed that Rocket had turned a slight shade of green, and had swallowed rather queasily. Naruto, Kiba, Akamaru, Kurama, and Groot looked at him with some concern. Hunter, on the other, was doing his best not to give into a fit of snickering.

"M-Mister Rocket?" the kit repeated. "A-are you OK?"

Taking a few deep breaths, Rocket shook his head a bit. "Y-yeah, I'm fine, kid," he muttered. "Just threw up in my mouth a little..." He burped rather queasily, and Groot put a soothing hand on his back.

Kurama grimaced. "Ewww...." he muttered, sticking his tongue out. Then, a bit more concerned, he asked, "you want me to get you some water so you can wash the icky taste out?"

The raccoon started, both at the unexpected offer and just how sincere it sounded. In spite of his nausea, he smiled. "Th-thanks, kid, but I got a stronger constitution than that; I'll be fine..."

"I am Groot?" the tree-man cut in, deeming it safe to remove his hand from his friend's back. Rocket's head whipped up toward him. "What, are you kiddin'? If they're gonna get anything like THAT, I sure as hell ain't stickin' around!"

Kiba smirked. "Ah, c'mon, don't ya wanna see if we like your stuff?"

Before Rocket could protest, Naruto spoke up. "Yeah, and its not like our guts are gonna start growing right away; can't ya stick around?"

Rocket, flustered, scratched an ear. "W-well, I guess I COULD..."

"Please, Mister Rocket?" Kurama piped up, smiling. "Like Naruto said, our tummies aren't gonna start growing right away, and Im sure you wanna see how your stuff came out..." He grinned widely at the raccoon as he finished.

Stepping back a bit, Rocket shook his head. "W-well, I, erm..."

Groot looked down at him, smiling. "I am Groot...."

Rocket looked up at his tall friend, then at the others. He said nothing for a moment. Then...

"Oh, fine!" he snapped. "I'll stay here for a bit to watch you jackasses, just to make sure you can process how friggin' great my desserts are!" He scowled. "But lemme make something clear: the millisecond I see the tiniest bulge under your shirts, I'm hitting the Milk Bar!"

Unperturbed, Hunter shrugged. "Fair enough," he replied, smiling. Turning to the others, he asked, "Well, boys," he began, picking up a blueberry muffin. "Shall we?"

A series of cheers answered him as Naruto and Kiba picked up their forks, Akamaru walked closer to his donuts, and Kurama grabbed a vanilla milkshake and an oatmeal cookie. "I'll take that as a yes," Hunter chuckled as he opened his muzzle wide to take a bite....
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Rocket decides to see them dig in and enjoy his...

choices: Rocket sticks around for a bit more as they dig in
Rocket plays it safe and hits the Milk Bar before they can really dig in
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
In one fell swoop, Hunter chomped down on his muffin, both Naruto and Kiba had bitten down on their cake and pie respectively, Kurama took a big bite out of his cookie and Akamaru had done the same with his doughnut. Rocket stood besides his wooden pal and simply observed the faces of his 'taste testers' as it were. In unison, each one's face lit up, the more they chewed; even Hunter, as they all gulped down their tasty baked good, and leaned back slightly, dumbfounded.

Rocket held his paws out to his sides curiously. "And survey says...?"

Hunter sputtered for a moment, trying to process what he'd just taken a bite out of, utterly bewildered; his (currently) younger companions not much further off. Finally, he said...

"...R-Rocket...that...that..."

Finally, Naruto quickly blurted out, "Holy CRAP, that's good!"

Kiba nodded in agreement, utterly amazed by the flavor of his pie as he licked some cherry sauce residue from his lips. "You ain't kiddin', bonehead...I swear, this thing tasted perfect! Just a burst of warm, sweet flavor...and the crust...! It's so soft yet flaky! A-and it absorbs so much cherry sauce that bit of crust has like...a mini burst of cherry goodness to it!"

Akamaru simply stared wide eyed at his doughnut, tail wagging as he did. If this is what a REAL doughnut is supposed to taste like...then what the HELL have I been eating all this time...?

Meanwhile, Kurama licked his chops of all crumbs and just beamed merrily at the taste. "A-and I thought the milkshake was yummy! This cookie taste...taste...like MEGA yummy! It's like, like, if yummy, could double its' yumminess...then double its' double yumminess! THAT'S how yummy this tastes!"

And Hunter...? Well...the bewildered athro was simply gaping down at his muffin, as though staring into the eyes of divinity itself.

"...Rocket...this muffin...it's...CRIMINALLY moist...and the berries...I...I can't even...wow..."

Rocket smiled a confident, just slightly smug smile as he brushed his paw against his chest proudly and said, "What'd ya expect from the master, kid?" Groot, for his part, just smiled and rolled his dark eyes. "I am Groot..."

To that, Rocket glanced up at the walking tree and said, "Whaaaaat? C'mon, I'm the freakin' PERSONIFICATION of humble!" To his surprise, when he turned back, the others still had amazed expressions on each of their faces. Then, his expression softened just slightly as he asked, "You guys really like 'em that much...?"

And immediately, Kurama bobbed his head excitedly, tails swishing about happily as he said, "Yuh-huh! These are the most bestest, yummiest desserts I've ever tasted, Mister Rocket! You hafta be the greatest chef in the world, er' something!"

At that, Rocket's smirk also softened a bit warmly for a moment. "You...really think so...?"

Taking another big bite of his chocolate cake, Naruto gulped down his mouthful and wiped his mouth of chocolate frosting. "I sure as hell think so!" Kiba joined the blonde and took another huge bite himself, smiling gleefully as he savored the surge of flavor emanating from the pie. "Yep! Same here!" Kiba said between chews. Akamaru, simply barked in agreement and proceeded to chomp into his doughnut merrily.

And at this point, if Rocket and the others didn't know any better, they'd swear Hunter was speaking a completely different language at this point. But the general gist of his bewildered rambling; if Rocket could make anything else out, was that he seemed quite fond of the muffins Rocket had baked.

So, at that, Rocket cleared his throat and said, "W-well...err, g-glad you mugs like 'em so much, heh..."

Seeing this, Groot smiled and almost playfully yet gently nudged the raccoon and held his hand out to the table for emphasis. "I, am Groot?"

At that, Rocket smirked a bit and said, "Y-yeah, guess it's...KINDA nice, seein' first hand how much people like my work...like...seein' peoples faces light up...the s-smiles on all their faces...and-" immediately, he sputtered and shook his head. "Uh! I-I mean, y-yeah! No surprise, heh...c-course they like my bakin'...a-as if there was any doubt, right?" Groot just smiled back at the raccoon and shook his head with amusement as he and Rocket watched the others immediately dig back into the desserts. Rocket, occasionally having to force back an impending smile of pride and gratitude.
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Must...process...deliciousness...

choices: The gang starts mixing it up, piling different things on their plates
They continue eating their respective desserts
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
In spite of every sense in his body screaming at him to get the hell out of there and to the Milk Bar before Hunter and the others started to look like they were expecting triples (or even quadruplets...ugh,) Rocket stayed where he was, curious in spite of himself to see just how much they enjoyed his desserts. And, if their eager smiles and enthusiastic eating were any indication, the answer was: a hell of a lot.

Heh; would ya lookit that, he mused, doing his best to keep a smile forming on his face with mixed results. Seem like they're enjoyin' themselves...

Hunter was taking huge bites of of his muffins, his tail wagging as he chewed, often taking a muffin or cookie in each paw and taking alternating bites of each until they were gone. He must have been pretty eager, too, since he would barely be down swallowing when he'd grab a couple more and start the whole thing over again, licking his chops of crumbs all the while.

The blonde kid-Naruto, or something-was still eagerly diving into his chocolate cake, forking mouthful after mouthful into his waiting mouth until his cheeks bulged with the dessert. At that point, he would grin, swallow, lick his lips (still leaving some chocolate frosting on them, Rocket noted with some amusement) and dive right back in.

The brunette kid and his dog-Kiba and Akamaru, wasn't it?- were likewise engaged, the boy forking mouthful after mouthful of flaky crust and cherry filling into his waiting mouth, with the pup taking large bites of the doughnuts (none of which contained chocolate, of course), his tail wagging merrily. Like his blonde friend, Kiba stuffed his mouth to capacity before swallowing, licking his lips, and getting right back to it.

And Kurama...

Well, the little fuzzball seemed to REALLY be enjoying himself; whether it was cramming cookies into his mouth or picking up a milkshake and guzzling it down, he always did so with a joyful smile on his muzzle, eyes clenched shut, and giggle after giggle effusing from the young creature.

Heh, Rocket thought, scratching one of his ears. Guess the kid really DOES like my cookin' a lot.... In spite of himself, he smiled a bit as Kurama grabbed a pitcher of chocolate milkshake and proceeded to guzzle it, hind legs kicking merrily...

And his eyes widened suddenly. Whoa, what the hell? Looking down at his chest, he frowned. Coulda sworn my heart stopped for a second there...

Shrugging, he looked up and back toward Kurama. This time, he noticed, the young fox was dipping a few chocolate-chip cookies into both the vanilla and chocolate milkshakes he'd grabbed and taking big bites out of each, squirming happily even as his muzzle gradually became ringed with ice-cream drink...

Rocket winced a bit. Oh wow; that's, uh... He staggered slightly as-yes!-his heart stopped beating for a few seconds, only to resume its business as though nothing had happened. The hell's wrong with me?

Suddenly, Kurama burped wetly. Blushing, he rubbed the back of his head. "H-heh, 'scuse me..." Then, without another word, he grabbed the pitcher of vanilla, which was halfway-depleted at this point, and leaned back in his chair, chugging as much of it down as he could. After a bit, he lowered it, his muzzle practically covered in milkshake, and giggled. "Oh wow, this is so yummy!" Then, he burped again, rubbing his tummy and licking his chops, kicking his legs happily all the while...

"Nnnngggghh...." Rocket groaned under his breath, earning a concerned glance from Groot. Damn it, he thought, wincing as he felt his heartbeat slow dramatically. Gotta...keep...heart...going...

To that end, he turned away from the others...and began pounding his chest, much to Groot's confusion. "I am...Groot?" The tree-man inquired. Rocket, still thumping on his chest, held up a digit as though to say "wait a minute".

This did not escape Kurama's notice; lowering his pitcher, he looked over at the raccoon. "Mister Rocket?" he asked, his tone concerned. "Are you OK?"

Glancing over at Kurama, Rocket nodded, but did not stop pounding his chest. "Really? You don't look alright..." This caught Hunter, Naruto, and Kiba's notice, and they all looke over at the raccoon furiously thumping his chest.

Akamaru tilted his head. What's wrong with him?

Kiba shrugged. "Hell if I know; maybe he grabbed somethin' from the tables and it got stuck..."

Hunter, however, upon clapping eyes upon Rocket, knew exactly what was going on, and his paw flew to his muzzle as he tried to stem the explosive tide of snickers that threatened to burst forth.

Kurama, oblivious to Hunter's amusement tilted his head. "Mister Rocket, what's wrong?" Looking down at his stomach, he felt it through his shirt; then, taking a paw, he lifted it up to reveal his still-flat orange-furred tummy. "Our tummies haven't even started growing yet..."

"N-no, kid," Rocket finally managed, his heart starting to get back into rhythm. "I-it's not that; just, uh, got a little dizzy for a second there..." Coughing, he stood back up, his heart finally having resumed its normal pace. "I'm OK."

Kurama, blinking, nonetheless pulled his shirt back down. "Well...if you say so..." Then, without further ado, he turned back to his cookies and milkshakes, licked his chops, and resumed diving back in.

Rocket breathed a sigh of relief. Phew; glad that's over... A snicker suddenly caught his ears, and he fixed his gaze on Hunter, who was doing his damnedest not to burst out laughing. "The hell are you lookin' at, wolfy?" the raccoon demanded, narrowing his eyes.

Quickly getting himself under control, Hunter managed a "Nothing," then quickly turned back to his cookies and muffins. The boys and Akamaru, likewise, got back to their desserts.

Rocket shook his head. Well, that was...somethin' else...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Hnnnnngh....

choices: Their tummies start to get a little bigger
They take a break and try Kurama's soda and milkshake idea
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The five buds continued chowing down on their respective delicacies while Rocket watched their delighted faces, particularly Kurama's, and did his best not to show any semblance of acknowledgement, which; in turn, earned the occasional glance of curiosity from his wooden companion. "Ahhh," exclaimed the young fox kit as he wiped his vanilla shake stained muzzle with a forearm and giggled joyously. "Has there EVER been anything more yummy than these 'milkshakes'?"

At that, Kiba smirked and said, "I dunno, fuzzy, these pies are pretty damn awesome!" To emphasize this point, the young dog-nin leaned back in his chair and slapped his belly happily a few times, earning a scoff from his blond friend. "Oh please, dog-breathe, have you tried these cakes? It's like I'm eatin' 'em for the first damn time over here!"

Despite himself, Rocket chuckled at the sight. Are these kids SERIOUSLY arguin' over which dessert tastes better...? Ain't the answer obvious? They all taste amazin' cause I'm amazin' and so is every-freakin'-thing I cook!

Oblivious to the self-praise from the racoon, Hunter was about to open his mouth when Kurama beat him to the punch and said, "Well, why don't we all share?" At that, everyone glanced at the little creature rubbed his front paws together bit to himself as he glanced back at Rocket with a smile, then back at his friends. "Mister Rocket made everything extra yummy, so no matter what we eat or drink, it'll taste yummy, right? Plus, we have tons of each yummy dessert to go around! So we won't be missing out either."

At that, the others glanced amongst themselves as grins started forming across their faces and muzzles. "Heh, y'know somethin'? That doesn't sound like a bad idea," remarked Kiba as Naruto nodded and added, "Yeah, smart thinkin', Kurama!" Hunter; despite having the same notion, just smiled back at the young creature and remarked, "Follow by example, right, kiddo?" At that, Kurama giggled and rubbed the back of his fuzzy orange head bashfully. "Aww, it's nothin'," the kit remarked, as he proceeded to pass pitchers of shakes down to everyone at the table.

Any shake that's not chocolate'll do...buuuuut are there any strawberry shakes, per chance...? mused Akamaru eagerly, as Kurama giggled back and nodded. "Here ya go, Akamaru!" The pup barked his thanks as Naruto, Kiba and Hunter proceeded to pass along some of their own respective treats down to everyone else at the table, all with plenty more to go around. Kurama then held a paw up, like a toddler in school and said, "Oooh! Oooh! Mister Hunter? Can we have some soda too? Miss Anju said she made some for us, and I'd feel bad if I didn't have some."

At that, Hunter just smirked and ruffled the kits head. "Heh, sure thing, lil guy," he remarked, as he got up, grabbed a couple of cups for himself and the others, and carried the pitchers Anju had left for them and set them on the table. Kurama beamed up at him, then giggled a bit to himself as he turned to the others. "Plus, drinking milkshakes and soda sounds REALLY yummy!" The other youths snickered to themselves as they each took a respective bite of a new treat. Naruto took a nice big bite of blueberry pie. Kiba a fairly sizable chunk of vanilla cake. Kurama bit into a nice warm muffin. Akamaru slurped down some milkshake and Hunter wolfed down a donut in a single go.

And as all five gulped down their new treats; as one, all of their faces lit up.

"H-holy crap!" exclaimed Naruto as he licked his lips of blueberry syrup from the pies innards. "You weren't jokin', dog-breathe! This is the best damn pie I've ever tasted!" Kiba smirked and added, "Well, now that'cha mention it, bonehead...this cake ain't half bad either!" Akamaru, licking his chops, barked happily as he smacked his chops of strawberry shake residue, and Kurama being Kurama....beamed joyously at how positively delicious that delectable first bite of muffin was. "Mmm-mmm! Why haven't I ever heard'uh these things before? It's all so warm and soft and buttery and just...tastes soooooo yummy!"

Rocket couldn't help but chuckle a bit at all the praise, rubbing the back of his head as he looked away, (trying desperately not to make another scene by watching the kit express his joy) and said, "Heh, what can I say...I aim tuh serve, boys..."

Groot glanced down at his fuzzy friend and just smirked. "I am, Grooooot..."

At that, Rocket smirked and raised his shoulders. "Ey, tips're one thing, but, what can I say...? Actually SEEIN' how much people like...how much people appreciate what I make 'em...? Feels...kinda nice, y'know?"

Licking his chops some more, Kurama glanced back at the anthro wolf and tilted his head curiously as he saw the wolf thumping his chest, almost similarly to how Rocket was earlier. "Are you OK, Mister Hunter? You're not feeling dizzy like Mister Rocket was, are you?" Hunter shook his head, and after one final thump against his chest, burped loudly, earning a few chuckles from the gang. "Guess you REALLY liked those donuts, huh," remarked Naruto, still snickering. Chuckling a bit sheepishly, Hunter smirked and said, "Heh, sorry, I probably shouldn't have gulped down an entire donut in one go, but damn, I couldn't help it! These things really DO taste incredible!" Hunter then turned his attention to Rocket and gave him a thumbs up. "My complements to the chef!"

Rocket smiled back, somewhat warmly for a moment, then immediately shook it off with a more casual smirk. "Eh, you know where the tip jar is, Wolfy."

With that, all five proceeded to dig right back into their new treats, with Rocket glancing back periodically, undeniably touched by all the praise. And as more time went on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: The gang mixes their plates up a bit...

choices: Naruto's hoodie starts to feel snug
Kurama's pants start to feel tight, and he's unsure what to do
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The five continued digging into their treats, eagerly gulping down their respective courses. They had each already demolished their second courses, and had moved onto a third, then fourth...

As such, they were each on their fifth courses each; Hunter was tearing into a warm, crispy apple pie, and doing all he could not to moan in sheer delight at the warm, syrupy apples or the flaky crust, Naruto was scarfing down a towering stack of donuts, Kiba was cramming cookie after cookie into his waiting mouth, Akamaru was eating his way to the middle of a large pound cake with vanilla frosting, and Kurama was scarfing muffin after muffin, grinning even as crum began encrusting his muzzle.

All the while, Rocket had watched the five go at it, the thoughts of the impending size of their stomachs gradually slipping from his mind. Damn...fifth paltes, and they're still not lettin' up! the raccoon thought, scratching the back of his head a bit. Guess they really DO like my bakin'...of course they do, I made it....

The sound of a giggle caught his ears, and he looked up to see the Keaton kid-Kurama, he corrected himself (Kurama? The hell kinda name was that?)- grinning widely, rubbing his stomach with one hand even as he bit into a particularly large chocolate-chip muffin, his legs kicking happily.

Rocket sighed, unable to help the smile that came to his face. Still, to see them enjoyin' it so much...I hate to say it, but it kinda gives me the warm 'n fuzzies.. Rocket blinked, surprised he had just thought that, but he never let the smile leave his face. Groot, knowing full well what his small friend was thinking about, simply smiled.

As Kurama rubbed his stomach, though, his eyes widened. Huh? Blinking, he set his muffin down on the table, and examined his stomach more closely. His face split in a grin. "Hey, Naruto, lookit!"

"Mmm?" the blonde mumbled, gulping down the last of a jelly donut. Licking the sugar off his lips, he turned to his nine-tailed buddy. "What is it, Kurama?"

Instead of answering, Kurama beamed and pointed to his stomach. It had taken on a noticeable round shape, bulging out and pushing against his shirt noticeably (and pushing the flame symbol out a bit in the process.) The blonde's eyes widened. "Wow, your gut's started growing..." Something occurred to him, and he looked down at his own stomach. Sure enough, his was bulging as well, pressing against his sleeveless hoodie. He smirked. "Heh, so's mine!"

Rocket's smile promptly fell from his face. Aaaaaand fuzzy feeling's gone...

Oblivious to the raccoon's disgust, Naruto looked across the table at his dog-nin pal. "Oi, Kiba! Check out your stomach!"

Grunting, Kiba scarfed down what was left of his oatmeal cookie. "Stomach? The hell are you..." his hand wandered down to his belly, and his eyes widened as he looked down and noticed that it, too, was rounded and bulging against his shirt. "Heh, well, whaddaya know..."

Noting Kiba's reaction, Hunter looked down and rubbed a paw against his own belly, which was bulging as well. Wow, growing already? Then again, we ARE on our fifth dessert courses...

Taking the hint, Akamaru glanced down at his own belly, noticing that it had taken on a rather concave appearance. However, to his surprise, he found he didn't mind at all. If looking like I'm carrying puppies is the price for scarfing these desserts... the pup licked his chops. Well, I'll let myself become a bowling ball again if it means I get to eat more of these yummy treats! And, to his own surprise, he meant every 'word'.

Kurama giggled, and was about to open his mouth to say something, when he saw something out of the corner of his eye. Turning his head, he titled his head as he saw Rocket tossing off his chef's hat and stained apron, revealing himself to be wearing an open vest over a shirt much like Hunter was, except the shirt was sleeveless as well, in addition to a pair of trousers. "Mister Rocket? Where are you going?"

Rocket looked back at him. "Hey, I said I'd stick around 'till those feed bags of yours started growin'," the raccoon groused. "And lo and behold..." The creature turned a bit green, and Groot rubbed his back.

Hunter couldn't help but smirk. Heh; ya big baby...

Out loud, the anthro said, "So you're hittin' the Milk Bar?"

In spite of himself, Rocket smirked, all while looking everywhere except their midsections. "Yeah; probably gonna down so much milk I'mma forget my own name."

Confused, Kurama turned to Naruto. "How can milk make you forget your name?" he asked the blonde. Equally confused, Naruto just shrugged.

Hunter caught this on the edge of his vision and chuckled. I'll explain to 'em later, he decided. Focusing his attention back on Rocket, he continued, "Well, just don't make yourself sick."

Privately touched by the wolf's concern, Rocket snorted and shrugged, attempting to brush it off. "Eh, thanks for the concern, wolfy, but I've downed three Pan-Galactic Gargle Blasters in a row and still managed ta' stand; I think I'll be fine." He jabbed a thumb at Groot. "'Sides, I'll have Groot; I end up passing out, he can just carry me back."

Groot smiled. "I am Groot."

The raccoon turned back toward the tree man. "Oh, quit pretendin' ya mind."

With that, he headed toward the door, Groot following close behind. Opening the door, he turned back toward the group one more time. "Feel free 'ta stuff yer craws all ya want; plenty to go around." With that, he walked through the door, Groot ducking under to get through.

Once the odd pair had departed, the group all exchanged glances. "I gotta say," Hunter started, rubbing the back of his head, "I'm surprised he stuck around that long."

He was about to continue when Kurama piped up, "Um, Mister Hunter? How come he was sayin' the milk would make him forget his own name?"

"Yeah, and how come he said it'd make him pass out?" Naruto piped up. "I mean, yeah, I've had a ton of milk at once before, and I felt sick, but I didn't feel like fainting..."

Hunter chuckled. "Well, boys, the thing is, the milk they serve at the Milk Bar is...special." At the confused looks from the youths, he continued, "See, even though they don't add alcohol or anything, the milk they serve has something done to it that makes ya a little tipsy."

Kiba blinked. "Wait...so he's gonna get himself drunk?"

Hunter laughed. "That he is, Kiba, that he is." He rubbed the back of his head. "Personally, though, I don't blame him. I mean, it's the cool, refreshing taste of milk coupled with the pleasure of getting drunk without the bitter alcohol taste; kinda hard to walk away from that."

Internally, he blushed. I should know...

Coughing, he regained his composure. "Well, then, boys? Shall we continue to partake of this lovely bounty of tooth-rotting sweets?"

In response, all four of the young ones grinned and dove back into their treats. Smiling, Hunter did the same with his pie.

Right out side the door, Rocket couldn't help but smirk as he heard them continue to dig into his desserts. Heh, it's still disgustin' that they're gonna be swellin' up... He burped a bit queasily at the thought, but composed himself. ...but hearing how much they like my stuff? Gotta say, it feels...nice...

Smacking himself in the face to compose himself before his thoughts went all sappy, he motioned for Groot to follow him, and together, they made their way toward the Milk Bar.

Oblivious, the five continued digging into their desserts, enjoying every minute of it.

As more time went on, and their stomachs slowly but surely continued to grow....
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Their tummies start to get a little bigger

choices: Naruto, Kiba and Hunter's pants all feel snug
Someone else has taken the lead
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The gang continued to tear away into their baked delights for a good while, each one savoring every single bite of their respective treats, but none more apparent than little Kurama, who beamed merrily with practically every bite consumed. Hunter was already trying to maintain a straight face as the young fox kit giggled and squirmed happily at the surge of flavors, but now, even Naruto could catch Kurama kicking his little legs merrily as his little face took one big bite of muffin after another, crumbs still dotted against his orange furred face, all the while, still downing doughnut after doughnut. The five pals continued this continuous chain for a good while. It had gotten to the point where both Naruto's hoodie and Kiba's shirt had been stretched so far that a silver of flesh had now been exposed at the very bottom of both their shirts. Hunter fared about the same as well, with a small sliver of brown fur exposed. And as Akamaru continued chomping away, his own white furred belly continued to balloon up from the size of a grapefruit to the size of a melon, with no signs of slowing down any time soon.

Resting a hand on his belly, Naruto smirked as he felt his stomach's flesh peaking from the bottom of his shirt, before glancing back up. For just then, something else had clicked...

"Whoa," remarked Naruto, as he glanced back at the young tailed beast, "heh, guess you really ARE enjoying yourself, eh, Kurama?"

Without even trying, young Kurama's tummy seemed to have bloated up even more than others, with more of his orange furred belly exposing itself than the others. Not that it mattered even remotely. The kit was so caught up with the sheer burst of warm, buttery flavor emanating from his muffins that he hadn't even caught wind of how much faster he was eating his meal than everyone else.

At least, until Kurama's eyes opened, and the smile dropped from his fuzzy face. Catching this, Naruto frowned and rested an arm on his buddies shoulder. "Hey, everything cool, Kurama?" Glancing back at his blonde friend, Kurama smiled slightly and nodded assuredly as one hand drifted atop his belly.

"H-heh, yeah, I'm OK. But my tummy kinda feels weird...like, something's pushing into it," the young fox kit replied. Almost immediately, Akamaru stopped mid bite and whined to himself.

Heeeeeere we go...

Kurama tilted his head curiously, but Kiba snickered and said, "Hehe, check out your pants, fuzzy." Only more befuddled, the little kyuubi nonetheless complied, then immediately felt what the dog nin boy was referring to.

"Ohhhhhhh...w-what do I do...?"

Grinning, Naruto leaned back for a moment and folded both arms behind his head. "Weeeeeell, you COULD just unbutton it so your gut has more room to breathe..." and naturally, just one moment later, the boy's grin grew ever more impish as he leaned in and said, "Orrrrrrr...you could fight through the tightness and blast that button right off! Y'know, like yesterday, when my shirt buttons started snapping off one at a time? Just like that!"

Kurama's eyes immediately lit up, and grinned a little impishly himself, recalling that moment from last nights 'sundae escapades.'

Watching those buttons just snap off and fly around the room WAS incredibly entertaining to the young kit; despite getting nailed by one. But then, he frowned, feeling how uncomfortable his pants were getting already. Pant buttons are a lot tougher than shirt buttons. For all he knew, popping his button off could take a lot longer, and odds are, the tighter and tighter his pants became, the more his tummy would likely start to hurt...and he and his friends were having so much fun, enjoying Rocket's baking immensely. The absolute last thing Kurama would want to do is spoil everyone's fun by crying like a baby if his tummy started hurting too much, again, like he did yesterday...

"Umm, actually, Naruto...is it okay if I...j-just unbutton my pants...?"

Glancing at his orange furred friend curiously for a moment, Naruto immediately nodded, and replied. "W-well, yeah, heh, not like ya need my permission'er anything, but why wouldn't you wanna-"

"I-it's just...my tummy might start hurtin' like yesterday'n I might start cryin' like a baby again, and-and-"

Laughing, Naruto wrapped his arm around Kurama's shoulder and nudged him both playfully and assuredly. "Hey, hey, don't worry about it, pal. Ya don't gotta explain yourself like that. If you wanna do somethin', go for it, and if not, then ya don't gotta."

"But doesn't that make me a spoiled sport...or a chicken?"

Kiba smirked and said, "Nah, we're in Termina, remember? They're called Cuccoos here."

Despite himself, Kurama snickered a bit, then Naruto smiled warmly and said, "Nah, it doesn't make you either one. And you damn sure ain't spoilin' no ones fun, as we saw with that gallery awesomness?"

Kurama giggled a bit as he rubbed the back of his head sheepishly. "Heehee...yeah, I still can't believe I got that carried away either..." He then glanced back at Naruto and smiled warmly right back. "Thanks, buddy."

Akamaru barked happily at something else.

...My backside would just like to thank you for agreeing not to accidentally shoot a pants button into it!

Kurama snickered then turned to Hunter and added, "'Sides, Mister Hunter was nice enough to let me wear these neat looking clothes. I wouldn't wanna wreck 'em." At that, Hunter just chuckled. "Ohhh, don'tchu worry 'bout that, kiddo...Midna definitely definitely doesn't, hehe."

Despite that, Hunter couldn't help but admire how considerate the young creature was to everyone. To the point where it almost baffled the anthro how ANYONE could ever be so pure and innocent...especially considering where Kurama would eventually end up in his later years...but now wasn't the time for such thoughts.

And so, after some fumbling, Kurama fumbled around for a bit, squirming and wiggling a bit comically for a moment as he reached and reached for his button over his bloated belly, until eventually, the kit grabbed a hold of the button and undid it. No sooner than he did that, did his tummy immediately expand outward, causing more of his shirt to ride up and expose more orange fur, as well as press the zipper teeth downward.

"Ahhhhh, much better!" exclaimed Kurama with immense relief in his voice as he gave his belly a few hearty pats of relief, burping suddenly shortly after, causing him to giggle a bit, before tearing right into his muffins yet again. Kiba glanced at the kits expanded stomach for a moment, then back at his, then Naruto's, then Hunter's, even Akamaru's.

"Holy crap," Kiba muttered, "fuzzball's really takin' us to school here, ain't he..."

Much to everyone's surprise, the kit's tummy was rather notably larger than everyone else's. At that, Naruto playfully punched Kurama's arm, much to his amusement. "Pffft, and you're worried 'bout bein' a spoiled sport...as if!" Kurama simply giggled and said, "Heehee, I can't help it! Mister Rocket's gotta be the bestest cook ever!" Hunter just smirked.

Heh, that big softy would be turning to mush if he heard that...

However, Naruto's grin once again grew mischievous as he turned to the others and said, "Welp...I dunno bout you guys, but I think it's time we upped our game..."

Akamaru scoffed to himself.

Was bound to happen sooner or later...

No sooner than he said that, did Naruto, Kiba and even Hunter proceed to hasten their devouring of Rocket's baked goods. Despite himself, Akamaru snickered and joined in on the fun, rapidly devouring his pound cake, yet savoring every ounce of flavor in the process.

The moments just flew by...along with the occasional crumbs splattering every which way...

And as more and more time had went on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Kurama's pants begin feeling snugger

choices: Eventually, his hoodie bursts open, both sides whipping out to either side ofhim
Right before he busts it open, he gets a tummyache and needs to rest
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Before long, the group had demolished their fifth plates and had moved onto their sixth ones. This time, Hunter was scarfing down doughnut after doughnut, Naruto was cramming all manner of muffins into his mouth, Kiba was tearing into a rather large pile of cookies, Akamaru was eating his way to the center of a sizable blueberry pie, and Kurama was gleefully cramming mouthful after mouthful of chocolate cake into his maw, spattering his face and muzzle with frosting and crumbs. Every now and then, one of them would take a gulp of a milkshake pitcher that Kurama had been thoughtful enough to bring over to the table. Owing to the already-filled state of their bellies, their midsections had continued to grow as they'd finished their previous courses, and only continued to swell as they tore into their six plates. Hunter, Kiba, and Kurama's shirts continued to slide upward, exposing more of their tummies. In particular, the stylized flame spiral on Kurama's shirt was starting to distort and scrunch up.

Surprisingly, though, Naruto's sleeveless hoodie and, by extensions, the short-sleeved blue t-shirt underneath it, had not seemed to rise much higher than it currently was, even as his stomach inflated further and further. Noticing this and frowning, the boy had picked up his pace, savoring the flavors of the muffins even as he kicked into overdrive, eager to get his hoodie and shirt rising once more.
Infuriatingly, it refused to rise any further. However, as Naruto crammed baked good after baked good into his waiting mouth, his stomach continued pushing against his hoodie, sticking out more and more in front of him and putting more and more pressure on the garment.

Naruto winced a bit as he felt his hoodie starting to constrict his tummy, but shook it off and pressed on; he had a lead now, and he sure as hell wasn't gonna lose it if he could help it!

This went on for some time; all parties involved continued stuffing their faces, slowly inflating their stomachs further (and, in Kurama's case, slowly pushing his fly down further and further). Naruto, in particular, ate at near-breakneck speed, causing more and more strain on the front of his hoodie, until...

Pop.

Naruto's eyes widened as he heard the noise, accompanied by a slight release of pressure around his belly. Huh?

Setting the muffin he had in his hand down for the moment, he felt around the area where he had felt the release in pressure, and looked down. Sure enough, a few of the teeth of his hoodie had pried themselves apart, exposing a tiny bit of the blue-shirted tummy underneath. Huh, whaddaya know...

Kurama, gulping down a rather large mouthful of strawberry milkshake, glanced over at his friend, somewhat concerned. "Naruto? Is everything OK?"

Naruto blinked, turning toward the young kit. "E-eh?" At the concerned look on Kurama's face, Naruto laughed, rubbing the back of his head. "Ah, yeah, I'm fine. It's just, well..." he chuckled sheepishly, scratching his cheek. "...your pants ain't the only thing that's giving up the ghost."

Kurama tilted his head. "Huh? What're you..." the kit faltered as Naruto, grinning, gestured to his belly, and the spot where a few of the teeth of his hoodie had pried themselves open. "Ohhhhh...."

Naruto giggled. "Heh heh, now I know why my hoodie has hardly been going up." He smirked. "But if I manage to bust this open..."

Kurama giggled at the mental imagery. "Hee hee, that sounds like it'd be awesome!"

Naruto smirked, placing a hand on Kurama's shoulder and gently rocking him a bit. "Of course it does; I'm the one doing it." Kiba, still stuffing his face, rolled his eyes, but never stopped shoveling the tasty treats into his mouth. Ignoring the dog-nin, Narut turned back to his muffins, though he still looked at Kurama out the side of his vision. "Keep a lookout, Kurama; you're about to see something awesome."

Obligingly, the kit watched with rapt attention, even as he resumed cramming forkfuls of cake into his mouth. Naruto was now practically cramming entire muffins into his mouth, his cheeks bulging until he chewed them enough to gulp them down. Wincing, he nonetheless kept his pace up, swelling his stomach more, and slowly but surely beginning to pry apart the teeth of his hoodie...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Someone else has taken the lead

choices: Fight through the pain and scarf down muffins til his hoodie gave in
Grab some milkshakes or soda and chug away until his hoodie gave
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Naruto was like a machine...

Muffin after muffin, Naruto seemingly wolfed the whole thing down, stuffing them straight into his eager maw as he chomped away relentlessly. Just chewing as quickly as he could, just enough to get them to go down before he'd move onto more. Even as he winced visibly with each and every sharp gulp, he pressed on, trying to get his hoodie to bust open and liberate his stomach of this confounded pressure.

As the others continued wolfing down their own baked goodies, Kurama watched eagerly as he ate his cake. Slowly but surely, the zipper teeth at the bottom of Naruto's hoodie began to pry themselves free from one another. Bit by bit, just a little brief bit of Naruto's blue T-Shirt as well as a sliver of flesh from Naruto's stomach began to expose themselves from beneath the hoodie, as the zipper teeth had broken off one another past the point below Naruto's waist, and were now beginning to work upward towards Naruto's stomach as he continued greedily scarfing down his muffins. Kurama smiled gleefully all the way, so distracted that his forkful of cake would occasionally miss his mouth and instead, accidentally smear a bit of chocolate cake on his muzzle, much to the amusement of the others. But Kurama simply giggled and licked it off as he continued watching his blonde pal eagerly.

Then, after one particularly forceful gulp, Naruto stopped for a moment, and leaned back in his chair, groaning just slightly. Seeing that, Kurama's smile faded as he glanced at Naruto with a bit of a concerned look on his face.

"H-hey, Naruto, you OK?" the young kit asked.

But much to his alarm, the boy groaned a bit more audibly as he rested both hands against his bloated belly and clutched it with a notably discomforted look on his face. "Ohhhh, my stomach..." complained Naruto, "...think I might'uh overdone it with that last bit..." Kiba simply snorted and said, "Well, that's what'chu get for bein' cocky, bonehead."

However, Naruto paid no heed to the dog nin, instead, his groaning grew a bit more audible as he rubbed at his belly tenderly in an effort to coax the pain away to no avail. Seeing this, Hunter frowned slightly and said, "Y'know, it's no competition, Naruto, if ya gotta take a break, there's no harm in it."

Instead, Naruto frowned a bit and glanced back at Kurama.

"Heh, s-sorry, pal...guess the reveal ain't gonna be so awesome afterall..."

To his surprise, Kurama stopped eating and placed an arm atop Naruto's shoulder in a brotherly assuring manner.

"C'mon, don't give up, Naruto! Remember when I got that really bad tummyache trying to push my belly button out? I was being a big baby because I didn't think I could do it. But you said I could. You said I could push through the pain and I did! Since we met, every time I didn't think I could do something, you always knew I could. You believed in me." Then, he smiled warmly at Naruto as he said, "Well, I believe in YOU, Naruto! I know you can fight through the pain, not cause you're awesome, but cause you're strong!" His smile grew a bit more impish as he added, "Heehee...'sides, once you bust your hoodie, think'uh all the room y'er tummy'll have more more goodies..."

Even after wincing a bit in pain, Naruto glanced back at the kit, thought for a moment and said, "Rgh, y-y'know what? You're damn right! I ain't about to let a lil tummyache keep me from all this good stuff!" He then glanced a bit more thoughtfully at Kurama and rested a hand on his shoulder. "And if YOU think I can do it, then I know I can!" He then proceeded to ruffle Kurama's head playfully as the young kyuubi beamed happily and giggled as he rubbed the back of his fuzzy head and added, "Awww, thanks!" But Naruto just smiled back and said, "No, thank YOU, Kurama. You're a great friend." At that, Kurama smiled warmly, as did the others.

Heh, oh man, now he's got the fuzzball rootin' for him to stuff his craw? Kiba thought, unable to suppress a smirk at the genuine warmth the two had for each other. Well, bonehead, better not let your pal down then. He then resumed eating, now glancing back occasionally at the sight as well, as did Hunter and Akamaru.

Naruto just glanced back at the table, still wincing a bit from the discomfort his stomach was causing him. He needed to find a way to bust his hoodie as fast as possible. On one hand, the muffins were definitely getting results, but on the other, his tummy was in agony as a result.

So, after some thinking, (a feat Akamaru still didn't believe possible for Naruto) the boy decided to...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Right before it busts, Naruto gets a tummyache

choices: They decide to mix together the soda and milkshakes for a drink
Someone's pants begin to feel tight
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
With newfound vigor (and an odd warmth in his chest that intensified whenever he glanced at Kurama's gleeful, encouraging expression,) Naruto continued scarfing down his muffins even faster than before. Crumbs flew every which way as he crammed one after the other into his waiting waiting mouth, his cheeks bulging as he chewed just enough to gulp them down. He winced as they plopped into his already-stuffed belly, but he ignored the pain and kept on shoveling the baked goods into his maw. Kurama had faith in him; he couldn't give up now! As he ate, Kiba, Hunter, and Akamaru all watched; they still ate their desserts, of course, but they had slowed down a good bit, their attention focused on Naruto.

Predictably, it wasn't long before his tummy started growing again, bulging outwards ever so slightly with every muffin consumed. And, of course, it wasn't long his hoodie began showing the effects of this continued growth. Starting from right above the sliver of blue shirt that was exposed, the teeth once again began popping apart. Naruto, feeling this slight release in pressure, grinned and redoubled his assault, cramming muffin after muffin into his mouth. And, as he did so, the teeth of his hoodie continued breaking apart, releasing a slight pop every time a few ripped apart.

Kurama watched with rapt attention, his eyes following the hoodie's zipper upward as each set of teeth pried themselves apart. "Woooowww...." the kit muttered, eyes gleaming. "Keep going, Naruto! You're doing great!"

At this, Naruto smiled warmly at the young Tailed Beast, and promptly began going even faster. Slowly, more and more of the teeth of his hoodie pried themselves apart, revealing more and more of the blue-shirted stomach underneath. At this point, every part of the hoodie underneath the middle of his belly was popped apart....but Naruto, never one to rest on his laurels, didn't let up for even a second.

He ate and ate, wincing and fighting through the pain as his tummy continued to bulge. To his annoyance, he hadn't managed to pop any more teeth apart; at least, until he crammed a couple more in, at which point the teeth started popping again...though oddly enough, the teeth holding themselves together right at the center of his belly still held, the teeth above those starting to go instead.

Hunter raised an eyebrow, even as he took a huge bite of a cream doughnut (and marveled inwardly at the wonderful taste). Huh...that's kinda weird...

Nonetheless, he grinned; once those few teeth in the middle went...

Oblivious to Hunter's inner musings, Naruto continued his gorging, the teeth of his hoodie continuing their inexorable march upward as the teeth above the middle of his belly pried themselves apart, revealing more and more of his shirt. This went for for several minutes, the boy continued to stuff his face and the teeth continuing to pop apart, piece by piece. All the while, the teeth that were still holding up the fort in the middle of his belly grew tighter and tighter, constricting his tummy rather uncomfortably...

Finally, as Naruto downed a blueberry muffin, he groaned and leaned back in his chair, clutching his tummy. "Oh man... my gut feels so tight..."
As the others looked at the blonde boy, they could certainly believe it.

All the teeth of his hoodie, save for the ones in the middle of his belly and the ones covering his chest, had popped apart, revealing his swollen, shirt-clad tummy above and below the holdouts. His shirt had started hiking up a bit further, but seeing as it was still being held back by his hoodie, it hadn't gone that far up.

Naruto winced as another bolt of pain shot through his belly. "Owwww....." He clutched his belly tighter, squeezing his eyes shut as he did so.

Kurama's eyes widened. "N-Naruto? A-are you OK...?"

Opening one eye, he looked over at Kurama. "Y-yeah, I'm fine," he assured the kit. "Just, uh, just kinda a tight fit is all..."

Hunter blinked. "Naruto, you sure you don't wanna take a break?" the wolf asked, concerned.

Kiba smirked. "Yeah; last thing I wanna hear is you bitchin' about how much your tummy hurts." In spite of the harsh words, Akamaru could clearly see the concern in his best pal's eyes and hear it in his voice.

Naruto sat up a bit, glaring at the dog-nin. "L-like I'd give you the satisfaction, dog breath..." Suddenly, he groaned, once again leaning back in his chair and massaging his tummy.

Kurama, seeing this, whimpered a bit. "C-c'mon, Naruto," the little Nine-Tails piped, "you can't give up now!" He gestured to NAruto's belly. "I mean, lookit how far you've come already!"

Naruto winced. "I-I know, but..."

"I know it hurts a lot," Kurama cut in, "but it really hurt when I was eating that sundae too! I was ready to give up, but you told me I could do it, told me my tummy hurting would be worth it...and it was! When my belly-button popped out and the pressure went away, it...it was the most amazingest thing I've ever felt!" Grinning now, Kurama placed a paw on Naruto's shoulder. "But I never coulda done it if you hadn't believed in me!" He gave Naruto a little shake. "So now I'M believing in you, and I'm telling ya, once you break your hoodie..." Kurama giggled and winked at the blonde. "...it's gonna be worth it."

Naruto, fighting back the pain, looked over at the young fox, eyes widened. Kurama...do you...do you really have that much faith in me...? His eyes started misting up a bit, but he forced it back; the last thing he wanted to do was start crying...

Kiba's and Akamaru's eyes widened. Wow, Akamaru yipped. That's...that's really sweet... Kiba, unable to repress a goofy smile, only nodded. Man, they really ARE tight, aren't they... thte dog-nin thought.

Hunter stared at the two, his chest hitching a bit. He's...he's such a sweet, genuine little fella... he thought. Scowling a bit, he clenched his paws over his trousers. It's not fair...

Naruto stared at Kurama a few seconds longer...before he broke out in a huge grin. "Well, when ya put it like that..." Thumping Kurama playfully on the shoulder, he went right back to his muffins, ignoring the pain as he ingested more and more baked goods. Bigger and bigger his tummy bulged, and tighter and tighter the few remaining teeth on his belly grew....

Naruto grunted. Just a...little...more... Determination gleaming in his eyes, he grabbed a banana muffin, opened wide, crammed it in his mouth, chewed, swallowed...

...and that was the final straw.

POP!

With an explosive pop, the remaining teeth on his belly finally burst apart. As this happened, the bursting of the teeth had started a chain reaction that went up to the teeth on his chest, causing them to rip apart as well. Subsequently, both sides of his now-broken hoodie flew out to either side of him (and whapped Kurama in the face.) His belly, now freed from the constraint of his hoodie, surged forward, his blue t-shirt sliding up a good deal and exposing a considerable amount of skin, stoppping just below his belly-button. His hoodie, having broken apart down the middle, now framed his tummy like a long vest.

Naruto let out a gasp. "Oh...oh MAN!" He exclaimed, slumping back in his chair and contentedly patting his belly. "That felt amazing..." Grinning, he looked over at Kurama. Puzzling a bit at why Kurama was rubbing his cheek a bit, he nonetheless asked, "Well? What didja think, Kurama?"

Stopping his massage of the spot where the hoodie had whacked him, Kurama stared at Naruto...before breaking out in a massive grin. "That was AWESOME, Naruto!" The young kit exclaimed, beaming. "I knew you could do it!" Then, before Naruto could react, he leaned forward and wrapped his arms around Naruto in a big hug.

A bit taken off guard, Naruto nonetheless smiled and returned the embrace. "Hey, I couldn'ta done it if you hadn't believed in me." Kurama giggled a bit bashfully, but continued the hug.

Hunter blinked dully at the sight, not sure whether he should be gushing at how awesome Naruto busting his hoodie apart was, or melting at the sheer warmth the boy and young Tailed Beast exuded as they hugged each other. Awwwwww......

Kiba, unable to help himself, smiled at the sight. Well, doesn't that just give ya the warm n' fuzzies? Akamaru, of a similar opinion, barked and wagged his tail.

Eventually, Naruto and Kurama disengaged their hugged, though they still grinned at each other. "Well," Naruto spoke up, rubbing his tummy. "I dunno about you, buddy, but I feel like I could eat WAY more."

Kurama squirmed and giggled. "Heh heh, me too!" Then, before Naruto could reply, he promptly dove back into his cake. Naruto, a bit taken off guard, nonetheless grinned and resumed devouring his muffins. Taking the hint, Kiba, Akamaru, and Hunter resumed tearing into their desserts as well.

As time went on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Fight through the pain and scarf down muffins t...

choices: Someone's button begins to give...
A slight tear is heard from Kurama's pants...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
It was as though everyone had been given newfound vigor. For all five tore into their baked delights with extreme speed and glee, purely on account of the sheer amount of flavor emanating from every bite. With Naruto's belly liberated from the confines of his now busted hoodie / vest, his stomach was free to expand outward with each muffin wolfed down. So much so, that between the five, it was now Naruto whose tummy had expanded to the biggest, and it seemed to stay the biggest as he continued to pack away one muffin after another, no longer showing any signs of flagging like before. Much of which; if not all entirely, he owed to his little orange furred friend.

Even as he seamlessly consumed one muffin after another, he couldn't take his attention off of young Kurama, watching him just oh so happily tear into his cake with this undeniable innocence and downright adorable glee on his merry mug. He was such a kind, caring creature, and an absolutely wonderful friend. And the more apparent that became, the harder it was...knowing it wouldn't last. It was maddening, and tore Naruto up inside, much like it did Hunter. But, for Kurama's sake, he wasn't about to let that sadness get the better of him. Rather, he was gonna have the most damn fun he could possibly have with his new pal, making the absolute most of their time together...however painfully brief it would eventually be...

And so, he ate, and ate with a gleeful smile on his face. More and more, each passing muffin caused Naruto's belly to swell up, pressing firmly against the front of his pants, and raising up his shirt enough to show a bit of his belly button. Kurama fared near the same, his own spiral flame symbol shirt rising up and exposing more and more of his orange furred tummy, now free from his pants button.

Kiba grunted for a moment, resting a hand on his own immensely bloated tummy and said, "Oh man, damn pants're gettin' snug like nobodies business..." Hunter winced for a moment as well. "Ngh, h-heh...same here..." he remarked, as the two reached over their massive bellies, trying to undo their pants...unable to reach over their massively swollen guts. Seeing this, Naruto grinned toothily and said, "Pfft, what, you two're tryin' to take the easy way out?"

At that, Kiba rolled his eyes and said, "No, bonehead...we just don't wanna have to run around this place holdin' our guts AND our pants up."

He leaned back and patted his belly proudly as he said, "Hehe, sorry, but I think our guts're a LITTLE too big for us to reach over at this point." He then turned to Kurama and playfully nudged his arm. "Cept for Kurama here, who was smart enough to think ahead." At that, Kurama giggled and rubbed the back of his head bashfully. His grin grew more impish as he turned back to the others and said, "For us? I'm thinkin' we only got one option for gettin' rid'uh the tightness our pants're causin'...if ya catch my drift..."

At that, Kiba and Hunter shared a glance, then, smirked a bit more impishly themselves.

Catching that, Akamaru whined to himself.

...Greaaaaaat...whelp, it was nice not having a welt on my rump when it lasted...

Oblivious to Akamaru's musing, Naruto glanced down at a pitcher of cola and pulled one closely to his side of the table.

"Good thing too, cause all those muffins've got me parched!" Naruto exclaimed. Both Kiba and Hunter raised an eyebrow in unison, and nevertheless, grabbed a pitcher of cola each as well. Before long, the trio held their pitchers up (Naruto and Kiba needing to hold theirs with two hands while Hunter only held his with one), and once Hunter had exclaimed, "Cheers, boys!" the trio; in unison, brought their pitchers to their lips, and proceeded to chug away heartily, causing their guts to continue bloating forward against their pants, much to Kurama's amusement as he stopped eating cake, and decided to join in, grabbing a pitcher himself, about to chug away...when he stopped, and thought for a moment...

...He then proceeded to grin a bit mischievously himself...forming an idea...

Oblivious to this, the trio continued onward, chugging heartily, until they lowered their pitchers to catch their breath, and in unison, let out tremendously loud belches each.

"Ahhh, that hit the spot!" Naruto exclaimed merrily, patting his belly heartily and letting out another loud burp as a result. He giggled and was about to bring the pitcher back up, until...

*BBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPP!!!*

Everyone jumped back in their seats (or table top in Akamaru's case) utterly startled as a truly massive belch rocked the table and everyone sitting at (or on) it. Immediately, all parties turned their attention to the source of said noise, and found Kurama, giggling as he wiped his mouth of what looked like...foam...?

"Damn, GOOD-" Again, Naruto stopped mid sentence as his eyes drifted towards Kurama's beverage, "...one...?"

Confused, Kiba was about to ask Naruto what was wrong, when he saw where Naruto's eyes were directed. Suddenly, he too, was befuddled.

"Errr...Kurama...?" Naruto began as he pointed to his pitcher, "...what is that...?"

Kurama's pitcher was a light, foamy and fizzy brown, with light brown foam rising at the top. Smiling, he held his pitcher up; with both hands, much to Hunter's joy, seeing how damn adorable the little fella looked doing so, then explained, "Oh! Uhh, well, see, Miss Anju's soda tasted so very yummy, right? And I wanted to chug with you guys too, even though my pants aren't holding my tummy back!" His grin grew somewhat more mischievous as he pointed to one of the milkshakes. "But THEN...I remembered how ultra super duper yummy Mister Rocket's milkshakes tasted...and I didn't know which one I wanted to drink more, so I just...mixed 'em!"

The two boys stared deadpanned for a moment.

"Mixed 'em...?" they asked in unison, unsure how to feel about that. Hunter, however, smiled warmly and reached over to ruffle the kits' head, much to his amusement.

"Gee, this kid's on a roll, ain't he!" He turned to the others and said, "You see, boys, what young little Kurama here has done, is improve on the classic 'ice cream float'...and created....a milkshake float!" Much like Kurama had been doing earlier, the two boys just tilted their heads, utterly lost. Rolling his eyes, Hunter instead, smirked and poured some of his soda into a pitcher of milkshake, offering it to the boys. "See for yourself."

A bit cautiously, Naruto reached over and grabbed the pitcher, taking a brief sip as he put the pitcher down and let Kiba take a sip as well. The dog nin put the pitcher down as well, giving him and the blonde some time to process the taste, which clearly didn't take long as smiles began rising over their faces.

"Holy crap..." Kiba remarked, smacking his lips. "That's...that's..."

"That's the best drink I've ever TASTED!!" blurted Naruto, much to Kurama's amusement.

The kit giggled some more and said, "Awww, it's no big deal, I just couldn't decide-"

"-So you made two things that were already awesome even AWESOME...er!" replied Naruto as he wrapped his arm around Kurama's neck brotherly and playfully ruffled his head, making him giggle and squirm equally playfully.

"Well, I dunno bout'chu, boys, but I think I've found a tastier way'uh bustin' our buttons. Agreed?"

And in unison, the trio poured more soda into milkshake pitchers, until they foamed over into milkshake floats as well. "Once again, the trio held their pitchers up, but waited as they all turned to Kurama, who smiled warmly and raised his right along with them merrily, and in unison, all four proceeded to chug away.

Despite himself, Akamaru's tail wagged happily at the sight, seeing all four getting along so well...but shuddered nevertheless as he continued to eat.

Ugh...three outta four...that's still gonna hurt like hell...

Oblivious to this, the four continued chugging away relentlessly as their tummies continued to swell and swell...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: They mix together the soda and milkshakes together

choices: Hunter's button goes first
Naruto or Kiba's button goes first
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Kurama beamed, kicking his legs happily as he chugged away at his milkshake float. Mmmm...the soda and milkshakes were yummy by themselves, but this.... He giggled, tilting the pitcher back further and downing more of the mixture. This...this is...I can't even find the words! He squinted his eyes shut happily. It's just so, so so YUMMY!

He lowered the pitcher to take a breath, only to raise it back up to his muzzle and continue chugging. As he did so, he glanced down at his orange-furred tummy and grinned. Oh, wow! the kit thought excitedly. Not only is this yummy, but it's makin' my tummy grow really, really fast!

Indeed, his midsection had swollen up even further, pushing further out and forcing his flame spiral shirt even further up, the spiral getting noticeably scrunched up and distorted. Throwing glances around at the others, he giggled. Hee hee, and it's makin' everyone else's tummies get really big, too!

Hunter's furry belly had also swollen up noticeably, forcing his shirt up noticeably, starting to reveal his furred-over belly-button. Kiba's shirt had also risen as well, showing a little more of his navel than Hunter's. And Naruto...well, considering he'd gotten further than any of them, his shirt was now well above his belly-button, and was noticeably rounder and larger than any of theirs, pushing out past his opened hoodie.

Kurama grinned. Oh wow, they're all doing so good, even if Naruto's ahead. He sighed happily. Not surprised Naruto's furthest along, though. He's the coolest... Giggling a bit, he lifted the pitcher back up to his muzzle, chugging away.

So engrossed was he in the flavors and creamy texture of the float, he did not realize that his pants zipper, already pushed all the way down by his ever-growing belly, was starting to feel increasingly tight as the appendage continued to grow and push against it. And, as Kurama chugged away, that pressure only grew more and more, the front of his pants creaking...

At last, Kurama lowered his pitcher (still at least a quarter full) and looked down at his swollen tummy. Huh, why do the front of my pants feel so tight? I mean, they're already unbuttoned and unzippered and everything? Shrugging, he lifted his pitcher back up to his muzzle, and continued chugging, chugging, chugging...

Rrrrrriiiiiip.

Kurama's eyes flew wide open at the sound cutting through the air, and at the release of pressure in the front of his pants. Huh? The others, having heard the noise, lowered their own pitchers and glanced over at the young kit. Hunter blinked. Was that...?

Curious, Kurama set his pitcher down, scooted back from the table a bit, felt around where he'd felt the release in pressure....and his fuzzy face promptly turned as red as a tomato. Oh no...

Indeed, though his own engorged tummy prevented him from seeing much, he was sitting in such a position that the rest of his friends could clearly see that, yes, there was a rather sizable tear down his zipper, clearly exposing some of his undergarments, which appeared to be some sort of light blue boxer-briefs dotted with two different patterns: one of regular leaves, and another of what appeared to be a rather styilzed drawing of a leaf.

Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru all squinted at the symbol. Wait, is that...

Oblivious to all of this, Kurama frantically moved his hands over the tear, concealing it as best he could. "U-um," he stammered, his face reddening even more. "S-sorry about that; I-I mean, I felt my pants getting tight, but it twas so YUMMY, a-and I couldn't stop, a-and..."
