His eyes widened as Naruto slugged him lightly in the shoulder, laughing. A bit confused, Kurama looked over at his friend. "N-Naruto, what's so..."

Snickering, Naruto replied, "S-sorry, pal; just seein' ya get so flustered at ripping your pants...." Coughing, he gave the kit what he hoped was a warm smile, even as he continued to chuckle. "A-heh.. but I told ya, ya don't gotta be embarrassed about that stuff around us. Ain't like we haven't ripped our pants before..."

Kurama blinked. "Y-yeah, but..." Flushing a bit, he felt around his exposed undergarments. "...n-now you can see my underwear. A-and I know this is my first time wearin' ANY kinda clothes, but..."

Kiba gave a dismissive snort. "What, like the bonehead and I haven't seen each others' before during these sorta things?" He smirked. "'Sides, they're pretty cool lookng, 'specially, those symbols..."

Akamaru barked, wagging his tail. Yeah; that's the symbol of our village.

Kurama's eyes widened as he looked at the pup. "I-it is...?" Laughing a bit nervously, he scratched the back of his head. "Heh, I-I just thought they looked cool..."

Naruto smiled, patting his pal on the back. "Well, I gotta say, you've got really good taste."

At this, Kurama turned to Naruto, smiling widely. "Ya really think so?" Naruto said nothing, but gave a big, enthusiastic nod in response. "W-well gee, I didn't think you guys would like it THAT much..."

Hunter chuckled. "Eh, don't sell yourself short, kiddo; like Naruto said, ya got good taste in clothes, 'specially considering you've never worn 'em before." Kurama beamed widely at this. Hunter smiled at this. Ah, much better.

To the others, he grinned impishly. "Well, boys, I dunno about you, but I think it'd hardly be fair if we didn't try to push our pants as far as Kurama did."

Kiba looked at the wolf-person. "You mean..."

Hunter nodded. "Yep! After we bust our buttons, I say we do our damnedest to bust our pants, too!" He smiled warmly at the little Nine-Tails. "Let's not leave the little guy alone, eh?" Then, before any of them could reply (he could guess what their answer would be, anyway), he picked his pitcher back up and started chugging. Spluttering at the head start, Naruto and Kiba glared at Hunter and began chugging away themselves. Kurama, watching, giggled. Well, they're giving it their all, too; guess I should too! Kicking his legs a bit in glee, he continued chugging as well.

Akamaru shrugged. Well, so long as they're doing it... Wagging his tail, he continued lapping up his float with relish.

As they continued to chug, the three biped's pants buttons continued to strain until, finally, they started to fray...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: A slight tear is heard from Kurama's pants...

choices: Someone's pants begin to rip...
The middle of someone's tummy starts to feel funny...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
In unison, all five sitting at the table (or sitting ON the table in Akamaru's case) were chugging (and lapping) away at their delightful pitchers of milkshake floats. Both Naruto and Kiba were grinning competitively as they chugged and chugged away as vigorously as the two youths possibly could. Hunter; though a bit competitive in his gaze himself, had a more impish look on his face, even as he powered through his shake.

And little Kurama?

The young fix kit continued chugging merry as can be, with his hind legs kicking happily, his eyes squinted shut and a big, ample smile across his muzzle as more and more of his milkshake float continued to fill his already rounded and orange furred tummy up considerably. And all the while letting out a sweet little giggle of sheer delight as he did so.

For a good while, it seemed as though Hunter had taken the lead, with his brown furred belly pushing against his pants further and further. However, the moment he took his eyes off the shake and paid notice to the young Tailed Beast squiggling and kicking in sheer joy...

Oh, great Odin's raven...!! Being that adorable isn't friggin' fair...!!

He thought to himself, unable to chug away at full vigor, with such a positively adorable sight distracting him and once again causing his heart to skip a beat or two...

Oblivious to this, both Naruto and Kiba soldiered on, chugging away to their hearts content as both their tummies continued to swell up more and more to rather obscene proportions, pressing firmer and firmer against their pants. Eventually, the two found themselves wincing a bit in discomfort as their bellies began to feel constricted by the front of their respective pants, at about an even pace, both with strained expressions as they pressed on and on and on and on...

Until finally, Kiba stopped for but a moment to catch his breath, wiping his mouth with his forearm as he saw the especially strained look on Naruto's face and grinned confidently; if somewhat weakly.

"H-heh, having trouble there, bonehead?" he taunted. Surprisingly, however, Naruto didn't stop to respond with a "witty" comeback. Rather, with a strangely confident grin, he leaned back a bit as some of his milkshake frosty began to spill a bit to the sides of his mouths, and chugged more vigorously than ever. Even Hunter, Akamaru and Kurama especially stopped to take notice of this, watching almost in awe as the blonde boy chugged away ever relentlessly.

Woooooooow, lookit him go...! Kurama thought, giving his friend his undivided attention, wanting to cheer him on with every fiber of his being, but opting against it, in case he inadvertently distracted his buddy like he 'thought he did' last time with their soda chugging contest. Instead, he watched silently but eagerly. Akamaru, on the other hand, watched rather cautiously, whimpering slightly as he did.

Notmybacksidenotmybacksideoh PLEASE not my backside...

Taken back, Kiba was about to grab his pitcher and catch up with him, until...

*POP!*

The button to the front of Naruto's pants snapped clean off, bouncing off a vase in the distance, and followed by another, and another...ricocheting almost without end...

All the while, in that singular instance, Naruto's already ample belly, now liberated by the constraints of his pants button, surged outward exponentially as the zipper teeth of his pants tethered to make more room for his bloated tummy, which caused his shirt and hoodie to hike upward a good few inches above his belly button.

"Ahhhh, there we go!" exclaimed Naruto with a hearty sigh as he practically went limp in his chair, before letting out a tremendously loud belch and chuckling as he gave his belly a few hearty and proud pats before wiping his mouth clean of frosty residue, all the while, the button still shot from place to place, much to everyone else's bewilderment...

...that is...until it bounced off Naruto's pitcher and pegged Kiba square in the forehead.

"GAH!" yelped the young dog-nin as his head snapped back and his hands immediately clutched his forehead, rubbing it tenderly and grumbling angrily shortly after. Akamaru snickered to himself.

Hehe, sorry, buddy...buuuuuuuuut better you than me...

Chuckling, Hunter gave Naruto a thumbs up. "Heh, not bad, kiddo. Not bad at all."

Kurama, on the other hand, was beaming so much, one would think it was HIS button flying off again. "Not bad? That was AWESOME! Just when it looked like it could have been either one'uh you, you just kept goin' and goin' and goin' until your pants button just went WHOOSH! And did'ja see how long it was bouncin' all over the place? And lookit how big your tummy is now! That was...that was just amazing, Naruto! I knew ya could do it!"

Turning his attention to his young fox kit companion, Naruto smiled warmly at Kurama's excitement and joy for him. "Heh, you're somethin' else, Kurama," the boy exclaimed, reaching over and playfully ruffling Kurama's head, earning a giggle from the young creature. Even Kiba; despite a button-like welt on his forehead, was unable to suppress a smirk at the orange fuzzball's happiness for his blonde friend. And Hunter...?

Must...keep...heart...GOING! thought the wolf as he thumped his chest again and again with each passing beat, only to stop and realize the four youths had stopped what they were doing and were now gazing curiously at the anthro, with all their respective heads tilted in confusion. Stopping for a moment, he chuckled, rubbing the back of his head sheepishly.

"Ehh hehe...sorry, thought I...had heartburn for a second there...er something..." he stumbled to come up with a response. But luckily, he shook it off and turned to Kiba. "Err...a-anyway, I dunno bout'chu, but I'd like to give my gut some breathing room here like those two got. So how about we fix that and bust these buttons?" Kiba grinned confidently and proceeded to chug away at his pitcher without a seconds hesitation, earning a chuckle from Hunter as he did the same. Once again, Akamaru recoiled, seeing their buttons tether little by little as both their bellies continued to swell out, getting more and more constricted to their lower attires...

Then...

*POP!*

*POP!*

In unison, both Hunter's and Kiba's buttons snapped clean off and ricocheted mid air against each other before flying back at either side and just barely missing Naruto and Kurama, who ducked just in time...

...only for them to bounce right back and nail them both in the back of their heads, causing the two youths to yelp at the same time, clutching their heads in pain while both Hunter's and Kiba's bellies surged outward in the same vein as Naruto, causing their shirts to hike up and their zippers to give way as their tummies had been released of their confines.

"Ohhh mama Mia, that's so much better...!" exclaimed Hunter merrily, tongue hanging from the side of his muzzle as he slouched in his chair right alongside Kiba who did the same. Kiba burped loudly after and was about to excuse himself when he saw both Naruto and Kurama still rubbing the back of their heads tenderly, then, his grin widened.

"Haha! Guess what goes around, comes around, don't it, bonehead?" teased Kiba, earning a roll of the eyes from Naruto while Hunter glanced a bit more apologetically at the orange fox kit and said, "H-heh, sorry about that, little guy..."

Luckily, Kurama; still rubbing his head, gave Hunter a good natured smile and said, "Awww, it's okay. That was awesome too! Heehee, did'ja see the way your buttons just hit each other mid air before bouncin' around and hittin' us?" Despite himself, even Naruto couldn't help but chuckle.

"Hehe, yeah, that actually was pretty cool," the blonde added, earning some soft chuckles all around while Akamaru sighed tremendously.

I'd like to thank all of your heads for taking the button instead of my rump...seriously...

At that, the anthro, the dog-nin and fox kit all laughed heartily, earning a confused glance from Naruto...who eventually...just shrugged and laughed along with his pals for a good while until they all began to wind down.

"Ahhh, whelp, I dunno bout'chu, boys'n pups, but now, I feel like putting all this freed up space to some good use...and what better use than stuffin' our craws with as much of these bad boys as we possibly can?"

Grins all around, no one needed to be told twice before digging right back in for more baked goodies.

And as this carried on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Naruto's button goes first

choices: They start gushing about how awesome it was
They burst out laughing
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
As one, Naruto, Hunter, Kiba, Kurama, and Akamaru continued ripping into their baked goods, cramming as many into their mouths at a time as they could. Not due to any haste or sense of competition, mind; the treats were simply THAT delicious.

Mmmm...man! Hunter thought gleefully as he popped a doughnut into his mouth, chewing the whole thing (and grinning at the wonderful taste). Who'da thought Rocket was such a kick-ass baker? Then, as he gulped down that mouthful and went for another doughnut, he grinned as another thought occurred to him. Wonder how Quill and the others would react if they found out their resident grumpy, gun-toting raccoon was a master chef? He sniggered a bit, even as he filed that thought away into his brain in the 'possible future blackmail' department. Thankfully, the others didn't notice, as they were too preoccupied with stuffing their faces with Rocket's wonderfully tasty baked goods.

As they continued to dig into the baked goods, their stomachs swelled up more and more. Naruto, Kiba, and Kurama's shirts continued to slide upward as their bellies, no longer constrained by their pants buttons, pushed forward, growing with every baked good inhaled. Akamaru's tummy, in the meantime, rounded out and reached further and further beneath him, getting very close to the table. Huh, gettin' pretty big, Akamaru thought offhandedly as he tore into a peach pie. Probably gonna look like a beach ball by the time I'm done.... To his shock, he found he didn't mind in the slightest; at least, not so long as that was the price for being able to wolf down these heavenly concoctions....

Hunter, however, winced as he continued to eat; though he wasn't slowing down, and in spite of the fact that his button was gone and his pants were unzipped, he could feel something hard and unyielding constricting his furry tummy. The hell? the anthro thought, frowning as he maneuvered one of his paws down to his waistline. Why does my stomach still feel... His eyes widened as his paw contacted the cold meta of his belt buckle, and the hard leather of the belt itself. ...oh. Almost forgot about that...

He scratched the back of his head, even as he grabbed a cookie and began munching on it. But how the heck was my button able to fly off the way it did? He shrugged. Eh, probably loosened it at some point, and that gave it some room...

Regardless, his belt was extremely tight now, and loosening it probably wouldn't do much good. Besides, Hunter thought, absentmindedly patting his bulbous furry tummy, size my gut is now, there's now way in hell I'd be able to reach it... He scowled a bit, cramming a muffin into his mouth so the others wouldn't see. Damn it! I wanna eat as much of this stuff as I can, but if this belt's in the way, there's no way I can...

He suddenly snapped bolt upright, eyes widening. Wait, Hunter thought, a smile slowly coming to his muzzle. Yeah, that might work...

As Hunter was having his little epiphany, Kurama noticed that Hunter wasn't eating. Gulping down a mouthful of pound cake, he looked up at the anthro, tilting his head. "M-Mister Hunter?" the kit asked tentatively. "A-are you OK?"

At the young fox's voice, Hunter shook his head and looked at him, smiling warmly. "Yeah, I'm OK, kid. It's just...." He smiled mischievously at this, intentionally stopping at that point.

Kurama blinked quizzically. "Just what, Mister Hunter?" At this, Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru slowed down a bit, looking at the anthro curiously.

Hunter smirkred. "Weeeelllll...." he began, eyes gleaming. "You enjoyed it when the three of us busted our buttons, didn'tcha?"

At this, Kurama beamed, nodding eagerly. "Yeah! It was so awesome! I mean, the way they just flew off, and were flying all over the place, like ZOOM..."

Hunter chuckled, even as his heart skipped a beat. "W-well, how would you like to see something even cooler?"

Kurama's eyes widened in surprise; what could possibly be cooler than Mister Hunter busting his button?

Seeing he had the kit's attention, Hunter continued.on. "Tell me, kiddo; you ever seen someone bust their belt before?"

Kurama tilted his head. "Th-their belt...?" he questioned softly. At this, Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru exchanged glances; they'd almost forgotten the wolf had been wearing a belt, much less that it was still intact...

Hunter beamed, his tail wagging. "Trust me, kid; you're in for a treat." Then, before Kurama could reply, the wolf dove back into his baked goods, shoveling as many as he could chew at a time into his mouth. The youths all continued eating, albeit at a slower pace than before. Not due to any flagging, mind; they were focusing on Hunter. Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru simply wondered if the wolf could really bust his belt like he'd said. Kurama, though, was watching with a huge grin on his face.

Wow, the kit thought, squirming in his seat from anticipation, This is gonna be so cool...

Smirking as he saw the kit's eager face, Hunter shoveled ever more treats into his muzzle, going faster and faster. Occasionally, he would pause to catch his breath or take a swig of milkshake float, but was otherwise completely relentless...

Time drew on, and Hunter's stomach only continued to swell, pushing more and more against his belt. Grrr... Hunter growled inwardly. Come...on...

Gritting his teeth, he took a particularly large bite of blueberry pie...and was rewarded with the sound of a slight tearing in his belt. Yes! Finally! Grinning, he renewed his assault, shoving ever more treats into his maw, tail wagging as more tears slowly began to ring through the air as the leather continued to finally succumb to the pressure...

All four youths leaned forward (or at least, as much as their engorged tummies would allow them), watching with anticipation. Oh boy, Kurama thought, tails swishing in anticipation, Mister Hunter's really doin' good! He beamed. Oooh...I wonder what its gonna be like when his belt finally gives...?

Grunting in determination, Hunter powered on, not wanting to let Kurama down. More and more his belly grew, and more and more his belt tore, until, finally, he started to hear the metal of his belt cracking. Grinning, he ate faster and faster, shoveling more and more sweets into his mouth. His belt buckle continued to crack, beginning to give under the pressure his fuzzy belly was exerting.

Hunter winced. Just...a little...more... Steeling himself, he leaned back in his seat, shoved a particularly large muffin into his mouth, chewed, gulped the whole thing down....

*SNAP!*

...until, finally, with a splintering of metal and a tearing of leather, his belt buckle SHOT off his waist, flying straight over Naruto and Kurama's heads, and impacting straight into the opposite wall, sending up a shower of splinters and dust...and staying wedged there.

At the exact same instance, his already engorged belly SURGED forward, pushing closer to the table, hiking his shirt up even further...

Rrrrrrrrrriiiiiiiip.

....and, with a loud tearing noise, the front of his khaki pants ripped wide open, exposing his black, crescent-moon emblazoned boxers for all to see.

Naruto, Kiba, and Akamaru gaped at Hunter, unable to believe exactly how much force his belly had exerted upon being freed. Kurama, on the other hand, had a huge, toothy grin on his face. That. Was. Awesome.

Sighing with sweet relief, Hunter slouched back in his chair, resting his paws on his bulging tummy. Then, looking up at the others, he smiled, licked his chops, and said, "So, boys? What didja think?"

All four youths exchanged surprised glances. Then...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Someone's pants begin to rip...

choices: ...until they all need to stop and catch their breath
...until someone's navel begins to feel funny
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
After a moment of silence, Kurama beamed with an ample abundance of excitement and exclaimed, "That. Was. AWESOME!!"

Despite how absolutely packed his overstuffed orange furred tummy was, Kurama was giddy enough to practically hop up and down in his seat; albeit just slightly, much to the amusement of the other youths, while Hunter couldn't help but gush internally at how precious the little fella looked doing that. "Did-didja SEE that?! Your belt buckle was strapped TIGHT on your tummy! B-but then! Your tummy just got bigger and bigger and bigger until KABOOM! It just SHOT right off your tummy and then went FOOM through the air! And then! And then...BAM! RIGHT into the wall!!"

Kurama raved on and on, all the while, physically motioning with his arms to accentuate each point, until he stopped and noticed Hunter biting on his fist and turning away. Confused, the young fox kit tilted his head curiously and asked, "S-somethin' wrong, Mister Hunter?"

"HNNNNNNNNG...n-no...n-nothinwrongkiddo!" was all the wolf could sputter externally.

Internally...?

So...freakin'...cute...! Brain...force quitting...relaunching...relaunching again...! Oh dear sweet beard of Santa...relaunching again!!

The boys simply gaped deadpanned and dumbfounded, until both Naruto and Kiba snickered to each other as something else once again caught their attention...

"Oi, wolfy!" interjected Kiba, snapping Hunter out of his state of delirium as he cleared his throat and turned to the young dog-nin. "What's up, kiddo?" asked the wolf. Rather than respond verbally, however, Kiba pointed downward beneath Hunter's immensely swollen belly. Confused for a moment, Hunter reached down; best as he could over his rounded tummy, until his eyes widened, having felt what Kiba was addressing.

"...Oh..." he muttered, face reddening beneath his fur as the two young ninja boys began to snicker a little bit, much to Hunter's embarrassment. Kurama on the other hand, caught this and after a moment, giggled aloud, but not at Hunter's expense, rather, it was something of a more playful laugh.

"Heehee, you don't hafta be embarrassed because ya tore your pants, Mister Hunter! Remember what'cha told me? It happens all the time! Besides, I actually think that moon pattern looks pretty neat!" Embarrassment dissipating a moment, Hunter couldn't help but smirk a bit at the young fox's remarks.

"Heh, ya think so?" asked the wolf, to which the young Tailed-Beast instantly bobbed his head up and down affirmatively, and with a smile on his fuzzy face, earning a more relaxed smile from Hunter's own muzzle. "Heh, thanks, kiddo."

Despite himself, Naruto couldn't help but smile back at Kurama's kind words as he playfully nudged the young creature in the arm and added, "He's got a point, it WAS pretty damn awesome! I mean, that thing was freakin' METAL...I can't believe you managed to eat so much so fast your gut managed to bust it! Hell, I don't think even I could do that..." Then the boy's smile grew more impish as he rubbed his own bloated tummy eagerly and said, "Buuuuuuuut doesn't mean I can't try sometime..."

Kiba just rolled his eyes at Naruto's remark and added, "Hate to say it, but bonehead DOES have a point..." and to that point, Kiba literally pointed back to where the metal buckle had been lodged in the wall behind them. "Look at how damn deep that thing went in! I mean...even I gotta admit that that's pretty badass, man!"

And as if to add on this, Akamaru yipped happily in agreement.

I don't even WANT to imagine how bad it would'a hurt if that thing had pegged me... he pipped, shuddering at the mental image of getting just SLAMMED by that buckle at top speeds... ...b-but...it DIDN'T! Sooooo...thank you!

Chuckling, Kiba playfully ruffled the top of his pups' fuzzy white head, causing his tail to wag vigorously, earning a laugh from Hunter, Naruto and Kurama. Sighing a bit from relief and a larger bit from satisfaction, Hunter patted his belly happily and said, "Well, now that we've ALL got room to tear into these goodies, whadduya say we-"

He stopped mid-sentence, face reddening immensely again as he stared distantly towards the entrance of the kitchen. Confused, Naruto and the others turned, then; like Hunter, immediately went silent as they saw Anju standing by the entrance, carrying a couple more pitchers of her homemade cola...staring at the buckle lodged into the wall.

"Y-yeaaaaah...about that...aaaaand the mess-"

But to Hunter's surprise as well as the surprise of the others, Anju simply smiled a good natured smile as she approached the table and placed the pitchers down for the others, while taking the empty ones away.

"Oh, don't worry about all that. Mr. Groot can have that fixed in no time at all. He's actually quite handy around here! Besides..." she added, smiling down at the gang and ruffling the heads of little Kurama and Akamaru, earning a giggle from the kit and a happy tail wagging from the pup, "...it's very seldom we get such happy faces here! Usually, people come in tired, cranky, or...constantly counting to ten on a moment to moment basis...or break our vases for one reason or another...but see you all enjoying yourselves here, reminds me why I love working here so much! So please, go nuts, and have fun! And of course, if you need anything else, don't hesitate to let me know!"

And with that, the red headed woman nodded and took her leave.

"Heehee, she's such a nice lady..." Kurama said, smiling fondly as Kiba snickered and added, "Ya SURE ya don't have a thing for her, fuzzy?"

At that, Kurama's face reddened redder than a tomato as he sputtered. "W-what?! N-no! I-I-I just said-"

Laughing, Naruto wrapped his arm around Kurama's shoulder and rocked him playfully. "Hehe, don't worry about it, buddy. He's just playing with'cha. Besides, you're right! She's a swell lady!"

Regaining composure, Kurama smiled tentatively but genuinely eventually. Hunter just laughed and said, "That she is, boys, that she is...SO...without further adieu...let's eat...again!"

All too eager to comply, the four youths grinned and immediately dove right back in for more, shifting between various treats, guzzling down more cola or just savoring the flavor of every delectable treat on the table. All the while, their bellies continued to swell and swell and swell and swell...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: They start gushing about how awesome it was

choices: They resume eating at a slow pace,letting Naruto and Kurama wake up on their own
They rouse Naruto and Kurama
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Groaning lightly as he licked some powdered sugar from his muzzle, Hunter slumped back in his seat, arms hanging at his sides. "Oh man...I don't think I've ever eaten so many sweets at a time in my life..."

Kiba burped queasily, though he nonetheless had a rather content smile on his face. "Yeah, same here..." He rubbed his engorged belly with both hands, licking his lips. "...but everything's so damn good, I don't care...."

Akamaru, lying on his back, nonetheless agged his tail a bit. I feel like I'm gonna burst....but everything's so yummy, I don't wanna stop....

Kurama let out a little burp, giggling groggily. "Me neither...these are summa the yummiest things I've ever eaten!"

Naruto smirked, wrapping an arm about Kurama's shoulders as the other one happily smacked his belly. "Heh, you're tellin' me!"

The five had continued digging into Rocket's delicious baked goods, savoring the tastes and textures even as their bellies had continued to swell up. They had begun to feel the first stirrings of fullness as they'd downed the cakes, pies, cookies, muffins, and assorted other goodies, but they were simply too delicious to let go. And so they had eaten and eaten, and their tummies had gotten bigger and bigger. By the time they'd finally decided to take this current rest, they'd barely polished off half of the baked goods, and once their stomachs had settled, they were fully intent on finishing off the rest.

At this point, their stomachs had grown to even more obscene proportions, forcing their respective shirts even higher above their belly buttons, to the point where they were practically resting on top of their engorged bellies. Hunter and Kurama's pants had ripped even further, exposing more of their undergarments (when Kurama had realized this while they were eating, he had blushed a bit, but had reached through the opening in his pants and felt the fabric of his boxer-briefs, giggling at how much more was showing than before). Naruto and Kiba's pants, on the other hand, were still intact, but their flies were completely open, exposing their undergarments (blue, ramen-patterned boxers for Naruto, and red, fang-marked briefs for Kiba) for all to see. And, though none of them could particularly see it, the seams of the sides of their shirts were starting to look a bit taxed.

Face lighting up, Kurama placed his hand-paws on either side of his belly, giving it a little shake. "Heehee...lookit how big my tummy is!"

Smirking, Naruto reached over and poked the young fox's belly playfully. "Heh, not bad..." Yawning a bit, he leaned back in his seat and patted his own stomach. "But look at mine!"

Kurama grinned as he took a look at Naruto's belly. "Wooooowwww...yours is really big too, Naruto!" Unable to help himself, he poked Naruto's gut, eliciting a giggle from both youths, even as they both leaned further into each other.

Kiba scowled playfully. "What're we, chopped liver?" the dog-nin groused, massaging his own belly with one hand and massaging Akamaru's near-bowling-ball sized tummy with the other (causing the pup to wag his tail and burp.) Hunter merely chuckled at the sight.

Because of the sheer amount of food in their bellies, they soon stopped talking and eventually lapsed into a companionable silence. Hunter, wagging his tail, leaned his head back and shut his eyes. Sleep beckoned, but he willed himself to stay awake; after all, Rocket's goodies were too delicious, and he wanted to down as many of them as he possibly could.

"Ahhh, this is the life, eh, Kiba?" Hunter muttered, licking his chops.

Kiba, leaning back with his eyes shut as well, grinned. "Heh, you're tellin' me; no chores, no missions, playing and eating all day..."

Akamaru kicked his legs a bit. Yep; it's the life, alright...

Ruffling Kiba's hair, Hunter smirked. "Heh, ain't that the truth." Eyes still closed, he spoke up again. "Naruto, Kurama, what about you guys? Is this great or what?"

To his surprise, nothing answered him. A bit confused, he sat up in his chair, blinking his eyes open. "Guys?" Still focusing his eyes, he looked over at where the two were sitting. "Did you guys..." He ground to a halt as he saw the sight that greeted him...and a warm smile spread across his muzzle.

Naruto and Kurama's eyes were shut as well, but rather unlike Hunter, Kiba, and Akamaru, they didn't appear to merely be resting their eyes. Indeed, the two youths were leaning against one another, one of Naruto's arms flung about Kurama's shoulders, and their breaths were slow, deep, and steady. Naruto's muzzle was slightly open, a tiny bit of drool visible at the side of his mouth. Naruto, on the other hand, was placidly sucking his thumb.

Hunter's warm expression intensified, even as he felt his heart beginning to take on the consistency of mashed potatoes. Awww....little guys are all tuckered out...

His gaze lingered on Kurama for a few long seconds, taking in his peaceful expression, the tiny bit of drool that somehow made him even MORE adorable, the way his ears twitched occasionally...It should be a crime to be that cute.

Then, his gaze shifted over to Naruto. The little blonde boy was holding Kurama tight, smiling even as he sucked on his thumb.Privately, Hunter was struck by just how innocent he looked like that. Awww...he's awful cute, too...

Abruptly, his smile became a scowl. I don't care if he had a monster inside of him; how could ANYONE see THAT as anything other than a normal little kid who just wanted friends and family? Now, Hunter was very much a 'people' person...or wolf...who tried to see the best in others, human or otherwise...but the things that people did out of fear and irrational hatred sometimes tended to REALLY piss him off, especially when the recipients of said hatred and fear had done NOTHING to deserve it...

Kiba's eyes popped open, and he looked up at Hunter, eyes widening. "Hunter, are you..."

...are you growling? Akamaru finished, blinking his eyes open and looking at the wolf.

Indeed, Hunter's eyes were narrowed, and his lips were peeled back a bit to expose his sharp teeth. Sure enough, a low, throaty growl was emitting from the anthropomorphic canine's throat.

Worriedly, Kibareached over and Tugged on Hunter's shirt. "Uh...Hunter?"

Finally noticing Kiba, Hunter glanced over at Kiba's concerned, confused face...and his eyes widened as he realized what he'd been doing. Letting his lips fall back over his teeth, Hunter gave Kiba his best apologetic smile. "S-sorry about that, Kiba," he apologized, wincing. "I just, uh, thought of something pretty unpleasant..."

Akamaru yipped lightly. Musta been something pretty damn unpleasant to make you growl... Kiba nodded in agreement; in the admittedly brief time they'd known the wolf, they had never seen him lose his temper, or even get angry in any way, save for his brief stormy mood when they'd been trying to decide what to do about Kurama...

Hunter shrugged. "Eh, no point dwelling on it now." His eyes went back to the dozing Naruto and Kurama, and his smile returned. "'Specially not when we're all having such a good time..."

Kiba and Akamaru followed his eyes, smirking when they saw Naruto and Kurama dozing away. "Heh...idiot looks hilarious like that..." Kiba muttered, snicerking at the sight of Naruto sucking his thumb.

Akamaru, rolling upright, wagged his tail. No denying that. Still, ya hafta admit they look awfully peaceful...

Hunter nodded in agreement. "Yeah; almost seems a shame to wake them..." His eyes roved over all the goodies still left. "...but then they'd miss out on the all these goodies..." His eyes went to the ceiling. "Hmm... what to do...?"
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: ...until they all need to stop and catch their ...

choices: The five power on relentlessly
Someone's tummy starts to feel funny...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Kiba eventually snorted with his arms folded together and said, "Pfft, knowin' the bonehead, he'd probably throw a hissy fit if we started eatin' without him. Then get all competitive and huffy'n annoying and all that crap."

"You really think so?" asked Hunter, a bit disappointed that he had to disturb such a remarkably adorable and peaceful sight. However, Kiba nodded firmly and added, "I KNOW so." And so, with a shrug, Hunter was about to reach over and gently rock the two youths back into consciousness. When suddenly, the young kit being held tight by Naruto yawned a hearty and adorable sounding yawn in his sleep, before smacking his chops subconsciously, and snuggling right alongside Naruto, as he reached over and grabbed a few tails.

...Immediately, Hunter's eyes widened as Kurama's mouth opened nice and wide...

"Oh no, please don't do what I think you're gonna-"

Suuuure enough...

Before the anthro could even finish his plead, the young Tailed Beast inserted the tips of those tails into his mouth and gently clamped his mouth shut, as though sucking on a pacifier...a few fuzzy ones...but pacifiers nonetheless...

Surprisingly, both Akamaru's and even Kiba's eyes widened at the sight...

In this state, Kurama wasn't THAT much younger than Kiba and Naruto, but even still, given the young kit's nature, appearance and current state, Kiba couldn't help but gape at how positively adorable the young creature looked.

"...Holy crap..." muttered the young dog nin. Akamaru simply nodded in agreement.

...And I thought puppies in cups were supposed to be the cutest things in the world...

And Hunter...?

Both Kiba and Akamaru glanced over, seeing the wolf's bottom lip trembling as his eyes widened almost comically at the sight.

"....Errrrr....y-you okay, wolfy?" asked Kiba, cautiously nudging the anthro.

"....S-so...cute..." was all Hunter could mutter, desperately not wanting to spoil the moment. Then, an idea occurred...

"Oiy! Where're you goin'?" asked Kiba as Hunter got up from the table and stepped out of sight for a moment, much to the young dog-nin and nin-dog's confusion as the two glanced at one another, befuddled. This confusion was short lived however, when Hunter returned once again with his strange device...a 'cell-phone' as he called it.

"If ever there were a more picture perfect moment...I think my head would literally 'a splode'..." muttered Hunter to himself as he adjusted the focus on his cell's camera.

...Uhhh...'a splode'? chimed Akamaru, tilting his head in confusion.

Suddenly, Hunter stopped and chuckled, rubbing the back of his head sheepishly. "Oh, sorry, that's from this really old web series, it was called-oh...riiiiight, h-heh, sorry, ummm...it's a joke. Like, my head would explode from how positively freakin' adorable these two look right now."

The two were totally lost. Nonetheless, Hunter just smirked and once the frame turned green, took a picture perfect photo of the two; Naruto sucking on his thumb and tugging a young fox kit close, and the kit, nuzzled against his buddy and sucking on his tails. Hunter stepped back and shared the image with Kiba and Akamaru, and; despite the teasing and confusing terminology, there was no denying how heart warming the sight truly was...

"...Damn..." muttered Kiba, unable to suppress a warm smile, "...they really do look like...like..."

...Like brothers... finished Akamaru, tail wagging as he glanced at the duo.

Hunter said nothing. He merely smiled warmly at the picture, placing the camera in his pocket, and glanced back at the two resting youths. For a moment, however, he lowered his gaze and looked aside, somewhat distantly...

...If only their friendship could stay as long lasting as the photo...

He sighed softly to himself, internally cursed the fact that, sooner or later, this beautiful, heartwarming bond these two youngsters had formed in so short a time, would dissolve...but nonetheless, he shook the thought aside. Afterall, there was nothing that could be done to prevent the inevitable, so rather, Hunter; not wanting to spoil the fun, instead...opted to just hope everyone could make the most out of the present, especially Naruto and Kurama...and as the smirk returned back to his muzzle, he reached over, and gently rocked Naruto and; by proxy, Kurama.

"Heeeeey, little guys..." Hunter spoke softly, as Naruto squinted and eventually began to rub his eyes with his forearm.

"Mph...how long was I out?" muttered Naruto groggily. But before Hunter could answer, Naruto's eyes widened as he added, "Wait, you guys didn't eat without me, did'ja?!"

Laughing, Kiba held his hands out towards Hunter.

"See?" he said, earning a snicker from Hunter while Kiba chuckled and said, "No, bonehead, we didn't eat without'chu guys."

"Well, good! Cause I ain't done by-wait, us guys...?" Then, Naruto noticed he felt something warm snugged against him. Sure enough, he glanced down, and immediately, his face lightened up at the sight of a snoozing Kurama sucking on his tails and nuzzling the young blonde warmly.

"Congratulations, bonehead, y'er his pillow," remarked Kiba teasingly, though it was obviously good natured. Naruto paid no heed. Rather, he reached over and very lightly ruffled the young kit's fuzzy little head.

"Hey, riiiiise'n shine, buddy," said Naruto softly to the young fox, who; like Naruto, squinted and slowly opened his eyes. "H-hmm?" was all the young kit could say, before realizing his mouth was full of tails. Eyes widening, he immediately spat them out and sat up, blushing beneath his fur as he grinned sheepishly. "O-Oh! H-hey, guys! H-heh....I err....t-think I may'uh dozed off for a second there..."

But Naruto just chuckled and playfully ruffled the kits' head, earning a soft giggle from the young creature. "Hehe, you'n me both, so don't sweat it, buddy."

Sighing with a bit of relief that no one was laughing at him, Kurama eventually beamed then glanced back at the others. "Boy, this stuff really IS super yummy, huh, guys!"

Laughing, Hunter nodded and patted his own bloated belly as he said, "And then some, kiddo!" And with a somewhat impish grin, Hunter turned to the four youths sitting around him and said, "So whadduya say we show Rocket just how much we appreciate that stellar baking talent'uh his?"

"Well, the only way I can think'uh doin' that is if we-"

Naruto stopped mid-sentence. Immediately, the four all turned to one another, grins slowly forming over all their mugs...

Then Hunter smirked and nodded. "Yep...if we finished every...last...bite..."

Kurama, astonished, rested both his paws on his bulbous tummy and giggled at its' sloshing about. "...I don't my tummy has ever even BEEN that full before..."

Naruto playfully nudged his new friend and said, "First time for everything, buddy!"

Kiba grinned. "Took the words right outta my mouth, bonehead!"

Akamaru, for his part, whined a bit...

I'm gonna be the biggest bowling ball ever...

...Then, his tail started wagging...

...Ah. Worth it...

And in no time at all, all five were immediately tearing right back into their assorted sweets and beverages with vigor and a yearning to sink their teeth into as many of the goodies as they could possibly fit into their all-too-eager maws...

Sure enough, as time went on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: They rouse Naruto and Kurama awake

choices: ...one of them feels a release in pressure on the sides of their shirt
The strange sensation in Akamaru's gut continues to intensify....
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Despite the ridiculous amount of goodies already packed into their bellies, the five did not let up in the slightest as they attacked their sweets with what seemed like renewed vigor. They shoveled cookies, slices of pie, slabs of cake, muffins, and more into their eager maws. Akamaru, on the other hand, eagerly dug his head into whichever sweets were closest, wagging his tail rapidly at just how tasty everything was. Every now and then, one of them would stop to take a swig of soda (or a milkshake float), pat their belly, belch to free up some room, and then dive right back in.

With how absolutely overstuffed their bellies already were, it didn't take long for them to start swelling again. Naruto, Kiba, Kurama, and Hunter's bellies pushed out further and further in front of them, to the point where they had to start scooting back a little bit so as not to press against the table. In addition, the sheer size of their bellies began forcing their legs apart. Their shirts slowly slid further upwards, eventually coming to rest fully on top of the engorged spheres their bellies had become (something Kurama noted with a grin and a giggle), and the seams of the sides of their shirts became more noticeably taxed.

Slowly but surely, Hunter and Kurama's already ripped pants tore open further, exposing more and more of their undergarments and, eventually, even a tiny bit of their furry legs. Naruto and Kiba's flies were already fully opened, but the fronts of their pants had begun creaking ominously, the intensity of which only increased as they shoveled more food and drink into their mouths.

Akamaru, his belly having already swollen to near-bowling-ball proportions, tilted forward, steadying himself with his paws on whatever was closest even as he gulped down mouthful after mouthful of the delicious sweets. Inwardly, he winced as he felt his belly bulging bigger and bigger, gradually lifting him further up off the table, his legs being forced even further apart...but he pressed on, not caring in the slightest. After all, it wasn't too often he got too eat treats THIS good...

And so, they continued to eat and drink; the ripped clothes ripped more, Naruto and Kiba's opened pants creaked more and more, and the seams of everyone's shirts continued to strain. All the while, the goodies began decreasing noticeably in quantity, though there was still a far more than considerable amount to go.

Midway through a rather large blueberry pie, Akamaru's eyes widened. Huh? Even as he leaned forward further on his belly and wolfed down the dessert, he furrowed his brow. My stomach's feeling kinda funny... Privately, he wondered if he should let Kiba know, but put the thought aside. It was a peculiar sensation, one that slowly grew as he ate, but it wasn't a particularly unpleasant one. Eh, gut's probably just adjusting to how much I'm eating; I don't think I've ever gone THIS far before. Satisfied with this explanation (though there was a nagging thought that he SHOULD know more about the strange feeling), he quickly resumed gulping down the pie, using his front paws to steady himself on the tin (since there was no way in hell any of his paws would even touch the table at this point).

And so, all five of them continued to eat and drink, their bellies grew ever larger, and their already taxed clothing creaked ever more noticeably. All the while, the strange sensation in Akamaru's tummy grew and intensified...

As they dug in and continued to stuff their faces, with no sign of slowing down anytime soon...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: The five power on relentlessly

choices: The sensation in Akamaru's belly intensifies
Kiba's own shirt gives at the seams
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The gang powered on through their massive meal, as more and more goodies began to deplete. In the process, however, they had all begun to notably flag in their feasting endeavors. They would now find themselves eating at a much slower pace, taking more breaks to stop and rub their bellies in an effort to coax the strain away, or take more swigs of their drinks and belch more often in an effort to free up what little room was remaining in their respective tummies. And yet, despite all that, the table was nothing but smiles as they soldiered on and on.

Even as Akamaru felt that incredibly peculiar sensation in his steadily swelling belly; a sensation not yet felt before, he just chomped away at his pies and whatever else was in front of him. The sheer taste of the goodies Rocket had been kind enough to bake for them was simply too good to stop eating, even for a second.

Both Naruto and Kiba fared about the same. The creaking in the front of their pants seemed to intensify more and more, but neither one let up. Rather, the two; like everyone else, ate and ate and ate some more; pants creaking steadily and the seams of their shirts growing ever more and more strained the larger their bellies got.

Eventually, Naruto stopped for a moment, let out a particularly huge belch; which earned a giggle from Kurama, and leaned back in his already scooted chair to rub his stupendously bloated belly for a moment. Seeing this, Kiba smirked and said, "Aww, after we waited so you guys could join in on the fun? Don't tell me y'er givin' up NOW, bonehead!"

Naruto scoffed and said, "Pffft, dream on, dog-breath! Just needed a quick breather for a second or two."

"Uh-huh, whatever you say...hey, ain't no shame in admittin' y'er full. Just means more for us..."

At that, Naruto raised an eyebrow. "Full? Alright, dog-face, I'll show ya just how full I am..."

And with a confident grin, he reached over to his nearest pie, cut out a slice, and almost immediately; rather than grabbing a fork and knife like he'd been doing, began greedily chomping the slice down straight from his hand. Licking the blueberry fruit sauce from his lips, Naruto grinned, grabbed a muffin, and began just stuffing as much of it as he possibly could into his mouth, before taking a HUGE bite, and chomping down voraciously, all the while grinning that same, confident grin.

As Hunter ate, he watched the blonde boy go on and on, and couldn't help but smirk.

Hehe, who else but Kiba knows how to get this kid going this fiercely... Hunter thought, chuckling a bit as he watched Naruto press on. Just hope Naruto doesn't get a stomachache...or accidentally bite his own fingers...or choke... Hunter's smirk faded a bit as he realized just how much and how fast the boy was putting away, then raised a paw hesitantly. "Y'know, m-maybe you've proved your point, kiddo. No harm in slowin' down a bit and savorin' the goodies, right?" But; Naruto being Naruto, just kept going while the others watched in rapt attention...until suddenly, the sound of a slight tear, caught everyone's attention...

Then...

*RRRIIIIIIIIP!*

The seams to Naruto's shirt just tore wide open from side to side, causing the shirt already resting over the boys' globular orb of a belly, to become much less constricting as the sides gave way...allowing Naruto's belly to expand freely a noticeable amount, which caused the creak already in his pants to become a slight tear as well. Almost immediately, Naruto sighed a tremendous sigh of relief and slouched on his chair, both hands rested atop his immensely swollen belly as he smiled a goofy smile and said, "Ohhhhh yeah, MUCH better..."

Patting his belly happily with both hands, he glanced back at Kiba and said, "Soooooo, what was that you were sayin' about being too full?"

Kiba rolled his eyes and resumed his own meal with a scoff. "Point taken, bonehead..."

Internally, Hunter sighed with relief, then, chuckled softly. "Hehe, well...that's new..." he admitted, while Kurama giggled, pointing at Naruto's shirt.

"Heehee, if ya keep that up, your shirt's start lookin' like a bib!" the kit exclaimed with a giggle, before getting a closer look at his pal's rounded stomach. His giggle then turned into a gape of astonishment. "Woooow, lookit how much bigger your tummy got in such a teeny tiny while!" the young fox remarked, playfully poking Naruto's huge gut for emphasis, while Naruto smirked and patted his belly proudly, earning yet another giggle from the young Tailed Beast as he watched Naruto's stomach bounce and slosh visibly with each pat. Then, the smile left Naruto's face as his eyes widened.

Catching that, Kurama glanced at Naruto with moderate concern. "N-Naruto? A-are you okay?"

When Naruto didn't respond, Hunter glanced with worry. Oh crap, I knew he'd get a stomachache if he kept that up...

Akamaru whimpered a bit when a look of strain and discomfort took the boys' face while Kiba was internally kicking himself for goating Naruto on. But before he could open his mouth, Naruto opened his...

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRRRUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPP !!!!*

...And out expelled a lengthy and titanic belch, which rattled the table and echoed throughout the entire kitchen. The gang simply gaped for a moment as the burp went on and on...

...Until finally, the burp wound down, and a look of stupendous bliss overtook Naruto's face, as; once again, he slouched in his chair and let one arm dangle from the side of his chair, while the other rested atop his ample tummy. "Ohhh man, that felt good..." muttered the boy, patting his belly with pride, while others continued to gape...until suddenly, the expressions of awe turned into smirks, and eventually, a fit of laughter all around.

"Man, am I glad Rocket ain't here to see...or hear that..." said Hunter, chuckling as he shook his head.

"Jeez, how 'bout a lil freakin' warning next time, bonehead!' muttered Kiba while Akamaru barked in agreement.

The others chuckled, but Kurama was laughing uproariously. "Heehaha! Naruto...that was like the biggest, bestest burp ever! I mean, I was worried maybe you got a tummy-ache or felt sick, but then, everything's just like KABOOM!"

As Naruto watched the kit go on, he couldn't help but chuckle himself at the young creatures just natural excitement and happy expression. Nonetheless, he managed a smirk and wrapped his arm around the kits' shoulders as he tugged him playfully and said, "What can I say? I aim tuh please!"

Then, the sound of footsteps caught everyone's ears as; in unison, they all turned around to the outside, and saw Anju walking towards the entrance and opening the front door as she looked up at the sky, much to everyone's confusion.

Seeing nothing, she scratched her redhead in confusion and stepped back inside.

"Umm, everything okay, Ms. Anju?" asked Kurama.

"It's the darnedest thing..." Anju replied, still looking befuddled, "...I could've sworn I heard the Four Giants returning to Termina...thought maybe another evil moon came back..." Then, with a surprising shrug, the smile returned to her face, and she went right back upstairs, leaving the gang positively stunned for a moment...

...Before all five burst into a fit of laughter for a good merry while.

"Ahhahahhh man..." remarked Hunter as the laughter eventually died down, safe for a few chuckles. "Well then, I dunno bout'chu boys, boy I still have a sweet tooth to satisfy..." And with grins all around, the gang once again resumed tearing into their meal. Naruto notably picked up the pace just a bit, having freed up a bit of room with his prior antics, while Kiba; not one to be outdone by his blonde buddy, picked up the pace as well. Both Hunter and Kurama continued eating at the same laxed pace they'd been eating at thus far, and Akamaru could still feel that peculiar sensation in his rapidly growing belly...

...Sure enough, as more and more time passed, and as more and more baked goods began to vanish in the bellies of everyone at the table...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Naruto feels a release in pressure from his shirt

choices: Hugely embarrassed, Akamaru tries to roll back upright to his pies
Suddenly, Kurama reaches out, fiddling with Akamaru'snavel
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Akamaru blinked dully, even as he continued chomping into his pies. OK, seriously, the hell's going on? the pup thought, gulping down a mouthful of blueberry pie.

As the pup had continued tearing into his pies, the peculiar sensation in his tummy had only grown and grown, along with the appendage. It still wasn't painful, but it was beginning to make his stomach feel rather tight....and, if he was being honest, it was starting to feel a little uncomfortable...

He winced. Ooh...that's gonna be smarting in a little bit, isn't it... Finally coming to a decision, he looked up at Kiba and opened his muzzle to bark and alert Kiba as to his predicament...but stopped upon catching his expression.

The dog-nin was cramming all sorts of goodies into his mouth-cookies, muffins, you name it-and chewing them rapidly with a bright smile upon his face. As Akamaru looked around, he saw Hunter, Naruto, and Kurama with much the same blissful expressions on their faces, faces all smiles as they crammed as many of Rocket's delicious baked goods as they could squeeze into their mouths at a time...

Wagging his tail a bit, Akamaru lowered his head, continuing to wolf down his pies. Ah, they're all having such a great time; no need to bother them. He felt a surge of pride in his chest. Besides, what kinda ninja dog would I be if I couldn't suck up a little bit of discomfort? He licked his chops, getting some cherry residue off his muzzle. Besides, no way am I leaving these pies out any longer than they need to be! With that, he dove back in with gusto.

Time continued to pass: Naruto, Kiba, Kurama, and Hunter continued shoveling as many sweets into their waiting maws as they could, and Akamaru stuck his head ever deeper into his pies. All the while, their tummies bulged bigger and bigger; Naruto's belly pushed out further and further, thankfully not taxing his ripped shirt any further. Kiba's shirt, on the other hand, seemed to be getting noticeably taxed, as did Kurama's shirt. Hunter, though his belly continued to swell thanks to his busted, ripped trousers, did not seem to be taxing his shirt anywhere near as much.

And Akamaru?

The pup winced, even as he took a bite of apple pie. Oooh, yeah, that's definitely starting to smart. Indeed, his stomach had ballooned up a bit more, lifting him up higher off the table...but even more tellingly, the strange sensation in his tummy intensified even further. At this point, it had gotten extremely tight, and the pup almost felt like he was going to explode.

Ooh... the pup whined. Maybe I ate a little too much...

His gaze went back to the pies on the table, practically tempting him with their delectable aromas. ...on second thought, maybe one last bite won't hurt.

This thought in mind, he maneuvered his way back over to the apple pie, opened his mouth wide (after all, stuffed or not, he still wanted to eat as much of the delectable deserts as he possibly could), took a huge bite of the pie, gulped it down...

POP.

...and yelped in alarm as the pressure in his belly briefly elevated to the point where he thought he WOULD explode before it suddenly whooshed out of him.

Kiba, midway through gulping down a shake, noticed this, and his eyes flew to his canine buddy. "Akamaru? Are you OK?!" At this exclamation, the others glanced up from their treats, staring at the pup in alarm.

To Kiba's relief, the pup let out a little burp, wagging his tail. Y-yeah, I'm fine. In fact... The dog's eyes lit up. I was feeling really full a minute ago, but now I feel like I can eat way more!

Kurama tilted his head curiously. "Really?" The kit asked.

Akamaru nodded eagerly. Yeah! I mean, I kept on eating, and pressure kept on building in my tummy, but as soon as I took that last bite...WHOOSH! All gone! Sticking his tongue out the side of his muzzle and wagging his tail, Akamaru flopped onto his back, almost looking a bit delirious. Heehee, it felt funny, though, lemme tell ya...

When no one responded, Akamaru opened his eyes and lifted his head up to see the others gaping, wide-eyed, at him. What? What're you all staring at? Not like I haven't ended up looking like a bowling ball before, 'specially since I'm probably gonna get a LOT bigger...

None of them said anything...but Kiba, still wide eyed, pointed to the top of Akamaru's bulbous white tummy. Huh? What's wrong, Kiba? Akamaru lifted his head up as far as it would go, attempting to peer at the top of his belly. What are you...pointing...at... The pup trailed off, his muzzle dropping open as he saw what his partner was pointing at.

There, right in the center of his swollen white belly, a small, white-furred nub stuck out for all to see, wobbling with the tiniest movement.

Akamaru continued to gape, shaking his head a few times to verify that yes, the nub was exactly what it thought he was. Once he'd confirmed this, he gave only one, low, deadpan bark:

What.
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Puppy Pop

choices: Someone else's navel begins to feel funny...
The gang get a little competitive with their cola floats...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
The gang gaped in astonishment at the little pup in utter silence for a moment.

"Huh..." muttered Hunter as he scratched his head, a bit dumbfounded. Both Naruto and Kurama nodded in agreement, also gaping...

"Y'know, for all the times we've stuffed our craws, I never once saw you pop out your belly button like that, boy..." remarked Kiba, a mixture of surprise and pride in his voice. The pup, on the other hand, was flushing redder than seven dozen roses. Catching this, Kiba smirked and asked, "Oiy, what's the matter, Akamaru?"

Still whining in embarrassment, Akamaru finally answered...

Y-you're right...I don't think I've ever...EVER eaten this much before...I used to always think that, yeah, I might overdo it, but when push came to shove, I still knew moderation...and hopefully, I'd, well, I'd be able to remind you of that on the occasions you guys REALLY overdo it...

The pup then glanced down at his wobbling stub of a navel and whimpered some more.

But now? Ah, jeez...b-bet I look really silly too, don't I...

Then, to his surprise, Kiba burst into a fit of laughter.

"You bet ya do! And guess what? So do I. So does Wolfy. So does fuzzball...and most of all, so does the ultimate bonehead!"

Naruto and the others glanced at Kiba for a moment, but eventually lightened their expressions and turned their attention back at the still red-in-the-face pup.

"Hate to say it, but dog-breath is right on the money. I mean, think about it, half the times we hang out, we stuff ourselves so packed full'uh food, we look like we're about to give birth to overweight boulders," said Naruto. Kurama bobbed his head in agreement.

"Yuh-huh! And lookit the rest of us!" Kurama said as he grabbed his rounded tummy and sloshed it around with both paws, giggling at the sensation as he did so. "We're all eating our fill, and before ya know it, we'll all pop out our belly buttons too! So there's no shame in popping yours for the first time."

Hunter smirked and nodded back. "Besides, you forget whose cookin' y'er wolfin' down there, lil fella? Hell, I'd be surprised if Rocket's baking DIDN'T make ya pop out your belly button like that. And he'd probably be offended...y'know...if the sight of it wouldn't make him pass out from disgust..."

Akamaru processed that last part.

Y-yeah, that's true...that little ball of anger DOES know his way around the kitchen...a-and yeah, I guess I shouldn't be too embarrassed. I mean, you guys pop your navels all the time...but I always thought; like, no matter how bowling ball-esque I got, I still had SOME self control when it came to food...

But Kiba just chuckled and ruffled the pups' head playfully.

"C'mon, it don't matter if ya overdid it more than usual this time. Trust me, it really doesn't. I ain't gonna think any less of ya, and I damn sure won't respect ya less for 'not having discipline,' ya lil volley ball. And do ya know why?"

Akamaru barked curiously.

Why?

Kiba smirked warmly and hoisted the pup up. "Cause y'er my pal. My goofy, best pal...and when we're hangin' out, you don't gotta EVER worry bout me, or any'uh these guys judgin' ya or anything like that, ya got me?"

At that, Akamaru felt a great warmth in his little puppy chest as he barked happily at Kiba and playfully licked the young dog-nin across the cheek, earning a chuckle from the boy.

"Haha, ahhh alright, don't get all mushy on me, ya lil..."

Then, Kiba stopped as he glanced down at Akamaru's navel. Suddenly, Akamaru's expression became one of confusion as an impish grin grew over the boys' face.

"Saaaaay, Akamaru...since this is the first time ya ever popped y'er belly button like this...I don't suppose you know how THIS feels, do ya..."

And just before Akamaru could inquire what 'THIS' meant, Kiba immediately took a finger and began flickering the inverted stump protruding from the pup's bloated tummy. And immediately, the little pup began snickering and wiggling playfully in Kiba's hands as he resisted to no avail against the onslaught.

HeehehehahahahaHAHAHAHA!!! N-No FAAAAHAHAHHAHAHAHHAAAAAA!!!!!

Naruto, Kurama and Hunter all snickered relentlessly as Kiba continued his onslaught for a good while, until finally, he chuckled and set the pup back down before his set of pies, still panting from the tickling and wagging his tail merrily.

Hehehe, gee that really DOES feel funny...! No wonder you guys are always havin' such a good time whenever ya do that!

He then turned to Kurama and beamed.

And you weren't kidding! The amount of relief you feel after y'er tummy feels so tight feels SOOOO good!!

Kurama simply giggled and nodded in agreement. "Heehee, told'ja!"

Then, an impish grin grew over the pup's face.

And best of all? I feel like I can eat WAAAAAY more...

The pup then licked his chops...

....And, ehehehe....I intend to...

And immediately, the pup dove right into his pies, with the others grinning and promptly joining in...

And as time went on...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: One humiliated puppy

choices: Kiba decides to take advantage of the distraction and dig in
Naruto and Kurama stop playing with each other's navels
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Despite their considerably slower pace, none of them let up as they continued digging into their goodies; Akamaru taking bite after massive bite of his pies, and the others cramming goodies into their waiting mouths. They didn't discriminate between what they shoved in; after all, it was all so tasty they really didn't care what they were eating. And, predictably, their stomachs continued to swell, slowly but ever so surely. Kiba's pants, still un-ripped, were nonetheless being taxed to their breaking point, creaking audibly. Hearing this, the young dog-nin smirked. Heh; won't be long now... Spurred on by the knowledge that Naruto, Kurama, and Hunter had all already ripped theirs to varying extents, he powered on.

Naruto and Kurama,for their part,were having a blast; whether it was cramming cookies and muffins into their waiting maws or taking huge swigs of their milkshake floats, they both appeared to be having the time of their lives. At least, that's what Hunter guessed by the huge grin on Naruto's face and the merry kicking of Kurama's legs....

Suddenly, both their eyes widened, and they immediately stopped mid-bite. Hunter, noticing this, wiped his muzzle with a sleeve and looked towards them. "Um....you two feeling OK?"

At the question, Kurama beamed, swallowing before answering. "Oh yeah, I'm feeling great!" Naruto, in the middle of swallowing a particularly large mouthful, only nodded his agreement. "It's just...." A playful little smirk lit up his muzzle. "The middle of my tummy is feeling... kinda tight..."

Naruto, taking a deep breath, smirked along with him. "Yeah..." he added, patting his tummy and causing it to jostle a bit. "Mine too..."

Kiba, though feeling a brief spike of jealousy (he hadn't begun feeling that familiar tightness just yet), smirked in return. "Heh, figures you two would start feelin' that at the same time."

Yeah, no surprise there, Akamaru added, lifting his head up from his pies (and revealing it to be splattered a variety of colors).

Kurama giggled, rubbing the back of his head. "Heh, it IS kinda funny, isn't it?" Turning to Naruto, he asked, "So, Naruto...how do ya wanna pop 'em? You wanna just keep eatin' more of these yummy goodies, or do ya wanna try the milkshake floats?"

"Hmm..." Naruto folded his arms and closed his eyes, apparently deep in thought. After a few seconds, he opened them and smirked playfully at his young fox friend. "Weelll, I wanna get back to eating as soon as possible without feelin' sick, so..." his eyes fell on their beverages. "...whaddaya say we chug these till we pop?"

Kurama beamed. "Sounds great! 'Sides," he added, rubbing his globular tummy and letting out a happy little belch, "if we do it like that, it'll be easier for us to keep goin' and not hafta take a break and feel the tightness!"

Naruto winked. "That's kinda what I was thinkin'."

With that, both of them picked their floats up in both hands/paws, grinned at each other, and lifted their pitchers to their mouths, opening wide to let the cool treat/beverage in. A noticeable amount spilled down the sides of their faces as they chugged, but they paid it no mind.

Hunter smirked at just how fast they were going. Heh; those two must REALLY wanna pop their navels, huh? He patted his own globular tummy. Not that I blame 'em; it feels AMAZING....

Kiba, surprisingly, found himself transfixed by the sight....and just how quickly their stomachs were swelling up as their milkshake floats entered their gullets. A part of him urged him to chug his own and attempt to beat them to the punch, but the rest of him was too engrossed in what was happening.

Indeed, as Naruto and Kurama chugged away, their bellies continued to swell, pushing out further from them and forcing their legs further apart. The slight rip in Naruto's pants, subsequently, grew wider and wider, exposing more of his undergarments, and the seams of Kurama's shirt began to become visibly taxed, even as the young Nine-Tails' pants ripped even further. All the while, the tightness in the middle of their bellies steadily intensified.

Kurama winced. Ooohh...my tummy's startin' to become tight... He grimaced as he remembered just how unpleasant it had been the other day, when they'd been eating their sundae and he'd felt like he was going to burst. It's really gonna start hurting, isn't it...

As he thought this, he glanced at Naruto, who was still eagerly chugging away. His stomach steadily swelled, a steady ripping noise revealing that, yes, his pants were continuing to rip. Catching Kurama's look, his eyes flitted over to his friend. Though he could not say anything at the moment, he nonetheless flashed Kurama a grin, before returning his attention to his chugging.

Kurama grinned determinedly. B-but it's all gonna be worth it, and besides, Naruto has faith in me! He giggled a bit, tilting his pitcher backf urther. And I'm not gonna let him down!

With that, the two renewed their pace, pouring more of their milkshake floats down their waiting gullets and into their ever-expanding bellies, which pushed further and further outward. Naruto's pants ripped even further, and Kurama could have sworn he felt a slight release of pressure on the sides of his shirt...

Hunter and Kiba gaped, confirming that, yes, Kurama HAD just busted a couple of his shirt seams. It wasn't near as many as Naruto, but it was enough to spur Kurama on.

More and more they chugged, and the bigger and bigger their tummies swelled. All the while, the middle of their bellies grew tighter and tighter. Kurama whimpered a bit as it began to grow painful, but he soldiered on, determined not to let up now.

Hewasn't the only one. Naruto, too, wincedas he felt his stomach growing tighter and tighter. Oh man...it feels like I'm gonna explode! He glanced at Kurama for a moment, then narrowed his eyes. N-no way! I'm not giving up now, not when Kurama's trying his damnedest! With that thought in mind, he returned to his float with full vigor.

As Naruto and Kurama chugged, they felt the middle of their bellies grow tighter and tighter. They both let out little involuntary whimpers at the pain (causing Hunter to wince and raise a paw to urge them to take a break, but thought better of it), but never did they let up. All the while, the middle of their bellies grew tighter, tighter, tighter, and, when it felt as though their stomachs were going to explode, they tilted their floats further up to take one last, giant gulp...

POP!
POP!

With a pair of surprisingly loud, fleshy pops, Naruto and Kurama jolted back as their navels all but surged outwards, becoming large fleshy and furry nubs, respectively, that wobbled from the sheer force of it. As Naruto and Kurama set their greatly-depleted pitchers on the table and slouched back in their seats, Naruto's eyes crossed and Kurama's tongue hanging out the side of his muzzle, only one thought went through Hunter, Kiba, and Akamaru's minds:

Dayum.

Oblivious to the inner musings of their friends, Naruto and Kurama contentedly smacked their chops, the blonde sluggishly patting his belly and causing his navel to wobble slightly. "Oh MAN," he almost moaned, giggling a bit deliriously, "that...that was the best pop ever..."

Kurama burped wetly. "Well...it was only my second time popping my belly button..." He grinned, sitting upright a bit. "But it felt even better than yesterday!" He wiggled his navel, giggling as he did so. "This feels just as funny as yesterday, though!"

Naruto, fiddling with his own navel a bit, glanced toward Kurama, grinning impishly. "Really?" he asked, sitting up as well. "Does it feel funny when I do...this?"

Confused, Kurama stopped playing with his belly button and glanced over at Naruto. "When you do wha--" He scarcely had time to finish when Naruto reached over and began fiddling with the young Nine-Tail's fuzzy navel. At this, Kurama burst into giggles. "N-Naruto! St-stoppit!"

Naruto beamed even wider and continued wiggling the furry protuberance. "Heehee, it's all fuzzy!" He stopped to give it a better look, and whistled. "Wow, is that a belly-button or a fist...?"

Kurama giggled uproariously. "H-heehee, c'mon, it's not tha-ha-ha-ha-t big!" At this, a a rather mischevious smile crossed his muzzle. "Least, not as big as...yours!"

As this last word left his mouth, he reached over and began playing with Naruto's navel. The boy's blue eyes went wide....before bursting into laughter.

"Oh, c'mon, Kurama! No fai-haha!" In retaliation, he wiggled Kurama's navel faster, causing the young creature to giggle even more and begin kicking his legs. In turn, Kurama wiggled Naruto's with greater intensity, causing the boy to laugh and begin kicking his legs.

"Hey, you're doin' it to me," Kurama replied cheekily. "Only fair I do it to you!" As the "you" left his muzzle, he heaved himself and his swollen belly around in the chair so he was facing Naruto. Grinning, he reached both arms out and began playing with his navel in earnest; poking it, wiggling it about, playfully squishing it, and pushing it back in only for it to pop right back out, much to his amusement.

Naruto roared. "H-hahahaha! T-two can play at tha-ha-ha-t game!" He adjusted himself to face Kurama and began fooling around with his Kurama's navel, which only caused the young Kyubi to giggle even harder and renew his own efforts.

Kiba and Akamaru could only gape, wide-eyed, at the sight. Hunter, on the other hand, sat there, eye twitching violently...

Mein GOTT, that's adorable, the anthro thought, absentmindedly pounding his chest.

Eventually...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: POP!

choices: Someone takes the lead and pops first
They pop their belly buttons in unison
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.content:
Kiba, Akamaru and Hunter all watch attentively as both Naruto and Kurama continue fiddling with each others' stubs and giggling up an uproarious storm. Hunter was still trying to 'restart' his chest...and speaking a strange sort of foreign language Kiba never heard before, just assuming it was the language of his people or something. But as the dog-nin watched the two youths go at it, he couldn't help but smile at the merriment.

I swear, it's amazing how tight these two've gotten in so short a time... Kiba thought, chuckling softly as he turned his attention to Kurama, who was giggling merrily and kicking his little legs about. Guess the fuzzball's bubbly personality helps...he's just so damn happy'n gentle all the time...

His smile faded for a moment as another thought eventually crept back into his mind, causing the boy to sigh to himself.

...I'm gonna miss him...but...poor bonehead's gonna hafta let this go, and that's just...that's not fair...

Before Akamaru could catch this, Kiba forced that thought back and chuckled as the two ticklish youths continued to go at it some more before finally, they disentangled from one another and chuckled wearily. "Heehee, that felt so funny!" giggled the kit, much to Naruto's amusement. "Gee, really? I hadn't noticed," he added with a chuckle, playfully ruffling Kurama's head, causing the kit to giggle and squirm some more, before turning his seat back to normal and resting both palms against his tummy and sloshing it about, causing him to giggle even more. "Best of all, my tummy feels like it can take in WAY more now!"

Naruto just grinned, adjusting his own seat and giving his own belly a hearty slap, causing it to jostle and for his nub to wobble. "Good, cause we're gonna need all the room we can get!"

Hunter finally composed himself and chuckled softly at the youths. "W-well, glad you boys had fun, h-heh..."

Kiba just snickered. "Too MUCH fun! Another few seconds'n I was gonna hafta jump in there'n break up that tickle showdown..." The dog-nin said, causing both Naruto and Kurama to turn towards one another and snicker. "Anyway, now that all that's done with...we gonna eat'er what?"

Akamaru needed no second heed before slugging himself towards a cherry pie...STILL somehow steaming with its' delightful aroma wafting into the pup's hypersensitive puppy nose, and immediately dug his head into the top, chowing down merrily. Kiba just laughed and ruffled the pup's back as he said, "NOW y'er talkin'!" Before long, Kiba grabbed a chocolate mousse pie of his own, and began scarfing it down with gusto, savoring the rich chocolate flavor merrily as his lips smeared with chocolate from such fast paced bites.

Naruto grabbed more slices of cake for himself and for Kurama, then stopped as an idea occurred. "Say, Kurama..." the blonde began, causing the kits' ears to twitch curiously. "Hmm? What's up, Naruto?" The young fox asked curiously. To which, the boy grinned and said, "you've tried ice cream floats, and just regular ice cream itself, and enjoyed them, right?" To which, the young kyuubi beamed and bobbed his head eagerly. "Yuh-huh! It was all SUPER yummy!"

The blonde just grinned and grabbed a few slices of apple pie for Kurama, then scooped some Vanilla ice cream and lathered them atop the pies, causing Kurama's head to tilt curiously. "Huh? What'cha doing, Naruto?" To which, Naruto grinned and said, "I tried this once. Basically, when ya got cold, frosty ice cream on top of warm, gooey pie, the two kinda...complement each other. Like the apple sauce and cinnamon absorb into the ice cream'er whatever and...well, taste for yourself and see."

Kurama glanced down curiously, but nonetheless grinned eagerly and took a fairly decent sized bite, chewing and savoring the taste for a moment, until his eyes lit up like firecrackers. "Oh...oh WOW!" the kit exclaimed, causing Naruto to grin. "Good, right?" As if to answer, Kurama immediately began taking more eager bites, face lighting up with each one. "Mmmm! These two by themselves were already super yummy! But this? This is...yummy on TOP of yummy! It's-it's like the two became one super DUPER yummy dessert, that's hot but cold, sweet but frosty and just so good!" The kit merrily began digging in some more, kicking his legs eagerly as he did so, causing Naruto to smirk and add, "Heh, somethin' told me you'd enjoy that," before digging into his cakes merrily.

Hunter just chuckled. "Y'know, you'd be surprised how complementing tastes can really create a new flavorful experience. Hot and cold are one thing, but one a lot of people love is sweet and salty. Like chocolates with caramel and pretzels inside. It's amazing how gooey yet crunchy are such a winning combo. Or even chocolates with caramel and bacon inside. I swear, first time I ate that-"

The anthro wolf stopped midsentence, as he noticed all four youths staring back at him with blank expressions on their faces.

Kiba blinked dully for a moment before asking, "...Did...did you just say...?"

"...chocolate...and BACON...?" finished Naruto, face and blank as they went.

Hunter scratched his head curiously, and with a shrug, said, "...Errr...yes...?"

Kurama's ears twitched as his face screwed upward a bit. "...I...I like chocolates and bacon plenty...b-but TOGETHER...?" The kit clenched his eyes shut and stuck out his tongue at the thought. "...That sounds kinda yucky..." And judging by the nods from the other youths, the young tailed beast wasn't alone on that sentiment.

Hunter, for his part, just laughed. "Look, I get it, I had that EXACT same thought the first time someone offered me a bar, but I'm telling you, you'd be surprised how good it really tastes. Mine was milk chocolate with maple syrup and bacon inside, and the contrasting flavors just made the whole thing taste...well...INCREDIBLE. My point is, don't judge something too harshly til you've at least tried it. Who knows? You might like it even more than I do!"

Akamaru blinked dully. Okay, this wolf truly IS crazy. Watch, next, he's gonna say chocolates taste great with GRASSHOPPERS inside!

Internally, Hunter snickered, but opted to simply shrug. "Food for thought, boys. Speaking of which..."
