Almost comically, Hunter grabbed a few chocolate and some banana muffins and began greedily chomping down on their tops, savoring the flavors of both soft baked goods just melting in his mouth. Before long, all chit chat subsided and everyone was chowing down relentlessly. Naruto, Kurama and even Akamaru were trailblazing with no signs of slowing down due to their popped out navels freeing up whatever tightness remained in their guts. As time went on, however, both Kiba and Hunter had begun to flag just a little bit. The two continued soldiering on, and for a while, they both managed just fine. However, as more time passed, both the anthro wolf and the young dog-nin began to feel a certain tightness in their bellies that kept them from REALLY polishing off their respective treats the right way.

As Naruto reached up to grab more cookies, doughnuts and cake, he caught wind of Kiba and Hunter slogging through their baked goods and smirked slyly. "Hehe, s'wrong, guys? Y'er not quittin' on us NOW, are ya? There's still so much left to eat."

Kiba snorted and said, "Fat chance, bonehead. It's just..."

"...There's still one last thing me'n Kiba here have yet to pop," Hunter finished, before turning to Kiba and grinning. "Wouldn't wanna be left out, now, would we?" At this, Kiba grinned and shook his head. "Hehe, nope. Question is, how're we gonna go about-" Kiba trailed off as he glanced nearby and caught sight of some of the pitchers of homemade cola Anju brought along after Hunter busted his belt...literally.

"Saaaaaay, Hunter..." Kiba began, grinning impishly as he continued. "Since everyone else kinda just popped their belly buttons suddenly...whadduya say we make ours a lil more...interesting?"

Noting the competitive tone brewing beneath Kiba's voice, as well as how he was eying the soda pitchers nearby, it didn't take long for Hunter to put two and two together, smirking as he did so. "Soooo, ya wanna see who can pop their belly button first, do ya...?" Hunter said in a mock tough guy voice. Kiba grinned and nodded back before adding, "Just don't feel too bad when I win." Hunter smirked competitively. "Oh, it's on, kiddo..."

Immediately, Hunter grabbed two pitchers of soda, setting one down for himself and the other before Kiba, who grabbed his with both hands.

"Cheers," Hunter said, raising his pitcher, while Kiba grinned and did the same. And in no time at all, both the dog-nin and wolf pulled the pitchers back to their lips and began chugging relentlessly. Both Naruot and Kurama, after gulping down their current mouthfuls, caught glance at the two, and watched attentively while Akamaru was still too busy practically DIGGING into his pie.

"Oooh, who do ya think is gonna win?" Kurama asked eagerly.

"Eh, tough call. Had chugging contests with both...and SCHOOLED both, but they DID manage to keep up okay, so it could be a pretty even match.

"Well, they're both awesome and can eat a lot. Maybe they'll pop their belly buttons at the same time, so they'd both win!"

Even though that's not at all the way Naruto ever looked at any competition or hoped for any similar outcome, he couldn't help but smile at how thoughtful the kit was about even the most miniscule of things, causing him to wrap his arm around the young creatures' shoulders as the duo watched the boy and wolf chug and chug. All the while, their already ridiculously swollen bellies continued to protrude more and more.

And as time continued to tick by...
1121122211211111112112212121221211212121.title: Back to the baked goodies...

choices: A few large cones, surprising the lady.
The eating challenge. He was going to give everyone a show.
1121122212.content:
Naruto added, "Besides, the ramen isn't Ichiraku's. It's just not the same when it isn't Ichiraku's"

Without further ado, the pair began to walk to the ice cream parlor, with Naruto staunch and silent, almost like he was pouting, still upset that he was captured and that this stuffing wasn't quite on his terms.

Hunter tried to start some idle conversation, saying, "I've been to the ice cream shop before. It's fairly cheap, and they have a whole counter full of flavors. I think they said they had 72 flavors. It's really good!"

Naruto just nodded, saying, "I guess I'll just have to taste it for myself." with a touch of anger.

"Maybe I should have taken a less abrupt approach." Hunter thought "I'll just have to get him to warm up to me then."

After what seemed like an eternity of silence, the two finally arrived at the ice cream shop. It was small and cozy, and it was empty, so the employees were having a casual conversation behind the counter before they noticed the pair.

A jolly middle aged woman then walked up to the counter saying, "Hello sweeties, what would ya like?" Hunter answered for Naruto, saying, "He just needs a little time to read the menu. As for me, I'll just take a medium vanilla cone." The woman then replied with, "It would be my pleasure!" Before she began scooping.

Naruto scanned the menu, intrigued, as it was a massive chalkboard with the flavors written on top. They were numbered, and as Naruto soon discovered, Hunter was right, as there were 72 flavors to choose from. He even saw an eating challenge that the parlor featured on the top right corner.

After about a minute, Naruto ordered...
1121122212.title: To the ice cream shop!

choices: "Sign me up! I'll show you all what I can do!"
"Sure, but make that wolf guy do it too; he's the one who dragged me here!"
11211222122.content:
Naruto stared at the sign advertising the eating contest for a few moments before coming to a decision. Hunter, sensing this even as he took his cone from the woman, smirked out the side of his mouth. "You decide on something yet, Naruto?"

Naruto's eyes narrowed as he continued to stare at the sign. "Yeah..." Spinning around to face the clerk, he smirked. "I'm gonna do the eating challenge!" The woman's eyes widened to saucers, while Hunter simply grinned gleefully even as he began licking his cone.

"A-are you sure?" the woman stammered. "I mean, you're so young; people two times your age have tried, and they dropped out halfway through!" Hunter's tail began wagging rapidly. Naruto's eyes widened a bit, but he nonetheless grinned cockily and jabbed a thumb into his chest.

"Yeah, well, they weren't me," Naruto retorted. "So, how is this gonna go?"

The woman sighed. "Well, if you insist on doing this..."

She then proceeded to explain: Naruto would take a seat at one of the tables in the parlor, where he would be brought three large, separate courses, all of them being the flavors of his choice. First, he would be brought three of their largest milkshakes. Then, after he'd finished those, he'd be brought sixteen large dishes of ice cream, no toppings. Then, if he were to make it through those, he would be presented with his final obstacle: a monstrous sundae, at least three feet tall and loaded with every single topping the place had.

After explaining all of this to Naruto (who looked a bit shocked), she sighed again. "Again, are you really sure you want to do this?"

Please say yes, please say yes, pleasepleasepleaseplease.... Hunter frantically thought to himself, tail wagging at breakneck speed and a huge grin on his muzzle; only the fact that he was still holding an ice cream cone kept him from rubbing his paws gleefully together.

Naruto remained in his position, as though contemplating his choices. Then, taking a deep breath, he declared...
11211222122.title: The eating challenge. He was going to give ever...

choices: We have the perfect cure for brain freeze!"
You don't have to go so fast."
112112221221.content:
Everyone was shocked by his willingness to participate, with half of the employees standing where they were, staring at Naruto with their mouths open in shock. He merely smirked, saying, "What did you guys expect? I'm pretty hungry after all."

Hunter barely held in his excitement as the lady at the counter took Naruto to an empty table in the middle of the restaurant. A few employees, with nothing else to do, began to gather around Naruto, with most of them surprisingly excited. The others were just glad that they were alleviated from their boredom.

Because the place was small, there were only four employees gathered around, but they were all nice people, and they even began chatting with Hunter and Naruto. The hum of the milkshake machine could be heard, and Naruto's stomach growled in response, making Hunter all the more eager.

After a few minutes, Hunter had finished his cone, and Naruto was beginning to get a bit feisty, as he was pumped up for the impending feast. He would soon be satisfied, as another employee, who was about Naruto's age himself, walked in carrying three massive glasses that Naruto could probably fit his entire forearm in. Each glass was filled with a classic milkshake flavor, one with vanilla, one with strawberry, and one with chocolate

The employee then hugged the lady from the counter, implying that he was probably her son. Either way, all six employees who were there at the time were now watching, wondering to see how he attacked his meal. An employee occasionally looked at the door to make sure that there were no customers waiting.

Hunter watched the most intently however, and stared in awe as Naruto took the vanilla, and sucked down the milkshake as fast as he possibly could. Hunter watched as the level of milkshake slowly wend down in the glass.

Though no one saw it yet, Naruto's belly was rapidly filling, and soon enough, his stomach began to expand quickly, almost like a balloon filling with water, his stomach area losing its flatness fast.

Before he could continue, however, he winced in pain as a massive pang of brain freeze took over. Hunter chuckled a bit before receiving a glare from Naruto. Others smirked, while one smiled warmly saying to Naruto, "Don't worry,..."
112112221221.title: "Sign me up! I'll show you all what I c...

choices: "Hey, can I help him?"
"Can I get a large sundae? I'd like something to graze on while I watch him"
1121122212212.content:
Naruto blinked, tilting his head quizzically at the employee. "Huh? Whaddaya mean?"

The employee laughed softly. "The contest isn't timed; it's only over when you give up or win the contest." He gestured to the partially-consumed vanilla shake, as well as the two other untouched ones. "In fact, you can take as long as you like."

Naruto blushed, laughing nervously and scratching the back of his head. "R-really? Heh, I just assumed since it was an eating contest, it'd be timed..."

The woman they'd spoken to earlier-probably the store's owner- chuckled. "A fair assumption. Still," she went on, smiling warmly at Naruto, "We like to give our contestants as much time as they like; it lets them pace themselves, and it lets them relax and takes some of the pressure off them."

Hunter blinked. "Huh...pretty thoughtful of you guys," he spoke out loud. Some of the employees looked at him quizzically-after all, it wasn't every day an anthropomorphic wolf came into your shop-but they nonetheless smiled at the comment.

Naruto grinned. "That's great to hear. Still..." he returned his attention to the partially-finished vanila milkshake. "...if I'm gonna let a little brain freeze stop me, I'm not fit to be the Hokage!" With that, he grabbed the vanilla shake container and resumed violently sucking down its contents. His stomach swiftly lost what little flatness it had left, and his stomach had begun taking on a noticeably concave curve, one that only increased as he continued sucking down the shake. Finally, the last of the shake vanished into his gut. Naruto winced and clutched his head with both hands, gritting his teeth and trying to bear the brain freeze. After a few seconds, it had lapsed enough for Naruto to tackle the next shake; the strawberry one.

Hunter watched, fascinated, as Naruto sucked down the second shake. "Wow, lookit him go," Hunter thought as the level of shake began to go down, and the concave appearance of his stomach continued to increase. "Hope he lasts through the last round..."

Suddenly, his own stomach rumbled; apparently, the medium cone he'd had earlier hadn't quite been enough. Getting an idea, he signaled for one of the employees and said...
1121122212212.title: You don't have to go so fast."

choices: Naruto is brought his next course.
Hunter finished surprisingly fast, shocking Naruto, and giving him determination
11211222122122.content:
The employee asked, "Are you sure?" and Hunter merely replied, "Of course, didn't you hear my stomach?" The employee then smiled, saying, "Whipped cream, nuts, chocolate and strawberry sauces, and a cherry fine?" Hunter than replied with "Yeah, I'll pretty much eat anything you give me."

The employee then nodded before he strolled off to the kitchen. Naruto, in the meantime, was already towards the bottom of his shake. By this point, his stomach was already pressing on his shirt, and by the time he finished the shake, his shirt had begun to lift off his belly. He finished the last drops of the shake, then he belched loudly, causing his stomach to rumble.

Afterwards, he took a breather, and he tried to make idle conversation with Hunter, now more willing to warm up to him. After all, he was given all the free ice cream he wanted by a friendly person. It wasn't so bad after all. The two began to tell each other stories, then the employee that Hunter talked to walked in with a mixing bowl-sized dish filled with ice cream.

"I guess that's what I ordered!" Hunter exclaimed. "At least you can't complain about the portions!" Naruto remarked. He then gulped, as he realized that something like that, or bigger, was going to come his way.

At that thought, instead of being deterred, Naruto gained more determination, and instead of using the straw for his last shake, he took the straw out, put the giant glass to his lips, and took large gulps out of the milkshake, wincing a bit once the brain freeze hit him, but pushing through nevertheless.

All the employees were astounded, and Hunter was very excited. While he watched, enthralled, he mindlessly scooped large spoonfuls of his sundae into his mouth, unaware of how much he was eating.

Soon enough, Naruto finished his last shake, his shirt having risen up nearly to his belly button. He belched, patted his belly proudly, then began to talk to Hunter again.
11211222122122.title: "Can I get a large sundae? I'd like som...

choices: While Naruto's eating, Hunter asks him about his past eating exploits
Hunter remains mostly quiet, but orders more even as he eats his sundae
112112221221221.content:
"So, Hunter," Naruto started, rubbing his belly and looking over at the wolf. "I'm curious; where are you from, exactly?" He figured it would take the employees a bit to prepare all the bowls of ice cream, so he thought he might as well make the most of it

Hunter blinked, spooning up more ice cream for himself. "Where? Well..." He put the spoon into his mouth, moving it around in his mouth for a few seconds before replying. "Well, I'm no good with locations, so I couldn't exactly tell you where..." he laughed nervously as Naruto raised an eyebrow. "...but I can tell you I live far away from here, in the woods." He scratched the back of his head and smiled. "It's pretty nice; quiet, peaceful...except when I'm playing videogames."

Naruto tilted his head. "Video...games?"

The wolf nodded. "Yeah, and I dunno what makes more noise: the games, or me when I'm getting my ass kicked."

Naruto's mouth dropped open. "Uhhh..." he muttered, not sure how to react. Luckily, any awkwardness was quickly curtailed by the arrival of Naruto's second course; specifically, the sixteen bowls of ice cream. Wheeling them in, the employees set four of them on the table, leaving the other twelve on the cart.

Naruto gaped as he took in the size of the bowls; they were easily the size of Hunter's bowl individually, but filled even more to the brim with all sorts of different flavors. Hunter, still picking at his sundae, took the sight in with a massive, canine grin. Oh man, this is gonna be great... Hunter thought to himself, tail wagging.

Gulping, Naruto took the provided spoon and pulled one of the bowls closer. "W-well, here I go..." he muttered, taking a deep breath. Then, with a determined glint entering his eyes, he began attacking the bowl with the same ferocity he had the milkshakes, while Hunter looked on admiringly.

As he crammed spoonful after massive spoonful into his maw, his belly soon began to show the effects of his consumption; with every several mouthfuls, his belly bulged out a little more, forcing his shirt a little higher each time. Hunter watched, enthralled, as he continued chowing down on the ice cream, the shirt slowly moving up, up, up, until, finally, his navel was showing for the whole world to see.

At this point, about half of the bowl was left, but Naruto didn't let up; steeling himself against the brain freeze, he continued shoving spoonful after spoonful into his mouth, causing his belly to bulge out more and more, his shirt slowly rising up as it did so. Hunter grinned hugely and wagged his tail rapidly, even as he tucked into his own sundae.

At last, Naruto dropped the spoon, having picked the first bowl clean. At this point, his shirt was a good inch or two above his belly button; undeterred, he immediately pulled the second bowl close to him and, after a few seconds of fighting off the brain freeze, began digging into it.
112112221221221.title: Naruto is brought his next course.

choices: Naruto finally notices how much he ate when his pants button pops off.
Hunter talks about other people he's observed that stuff themselves silly.
1121122212212211.content:
Naruto saw that Hunter was genuinely interested in his stuffing sessions, and he was glad that he had someone to stuff himself around. Usually, most people would get annoyed by his eating antics, but Hunter enjoyed them, and Naruto was excited to see someone who did appreciate his stuffing abilities.

As he mindlessly shoveled ice cream in his face, he talked about his many experiences stuffing himself in the past, and though he talked between bites, Hunter was able to understand everything he said.

Naruto talked about when he ate watermelon with Jiraiya, his many exploits at Ichiraku's, the crown jewel being when he stuffed himself way too much when he felt sick. He also talked about a mission he went on in his younger days, where he entered an eating contest with Choji in an attempt to win second place. He couldn't handle as much back then, but now he could eat so much more.

All the while, Hunter listened, wagging his tail eagerly as visions of Naruto stuffing himself entered his mind. He was also eating, but at a more casual pace. He was still close to finishing his giant sundae, however, and one of the servers politely provided him with another to work on.

As this was happening, Naruto was warming up to Hunter quite a bit, and now he felt grateful for Hunter for providing him with all the ice cream, and he felt glad to have someone who actually wanted to see him stuff himself.

All the while, Naruto's belly continued to push outwards, as it was being filled to the brim with ice cream. It continued to lift his shirt to the point where it no longer covered any of his belly. From there, it continued to bloat outwards, putting considerable strain on his pants, and approaching the table quickly.

All the employees watched in awe, surprised that Naruto had gotten so far, and even more surprised with how casually he was stuffing himself, and how casually he handled the massive amounts of food.
1121122212212211.title: While Naruto's eating, Hunter asks him abou...

choices: Naruto finishes the second course and starts immediately on the last course
Naruto finishes the second course, but takes a break first
11211222122122112.content:
"So, Hunter," Naruto began through mouthfuls of ice cream, "this your first time watching someone stuff themselves, or have you kidnapped people before?"

Hunter chuckled at this. "Heh, touche. Nah, I I've never kidnapped anyone else..." He smirked, scooping up a spoonful of his first sundae. "Not to say I haven't watched other people stuff their craws..."

Licking his lips and rubbing his distended tummy with one hand, Naruto looked towards Hunter, even as he scooped up more ice cream. "Really? How did you get them to stuff themselves if you didn't kidnap 'em?"

Hunter laughed. "Oh, I didn't actually interact with 'em. I just had some friends of mine monitor them incognito." He leaned in towards Naruto. "You'd be surprised how easy it is to conceal cameras nowadays."

Naruto raised an eyebrow. "O...K," he replied, spooning more ice cream into his maw. "So, anyway, what kinda guys have you seen stuff themselves?"

"Hmm..." Hunter turned away and folded his arms, as though deep in thought. "Let's see...there was this one guy named Ed---Edward Elric, to be precise. About your age, blonde hair, pretty short..."

All the occupants of the restaurant looked around, ears perking up; they could have sworn they'd heard an outraged scream from somewhere in the distance. Hunter's ears twitched, and he smirked. Naruto, on the other hand, merely stared at him. "What..."

Hunter went on as though he hadn't been interrupted. "...pretty short, a mechanical arm and leg...and a hell of an appetite." He grinned. "He doesn't usually have much of an opportunity to really stuff himself, but when he does...hoo boy, he goes all out." Eyes lighting up, he held his paws up in the air, holding them apart from one another. "We're talkin' shirt riding up, belt busting, pants button popping off, fly opening up...." Hunter chuckled again, tail wagging. "His brother had quite a time hauling him back home."

Naruto nodded, surprised to find himself actually interested in what Hunter was talking about. "Huh. Who else have you seen stuffing themselves?"

"Well," Hunter went on, clearly warming to the topic, "there's other guy, Natsu Dragneel with a heck of an appetite..."

"Dragneel?" Naruto interrupted, scooping up more ice cream. "Kinda a weird last name..."

Hunter smiled. "Well, that kinda makes sense, considering he's from another land entirely; a place called Fiore, to be specific." He grinned widely. "Plus, he's a wizard; a Dragon Slayer, to be specific."

"Dragon Slayer?" Naruto repeated. "So he actually fights dragons?"

Hunter shook his head. "Not exactly; see, rumor has it he was actually raised by a dragon, and he was the one who taught him that magic."

"...he was raised by a dragon?" Naruto exclaimed in disbelief. "Then why the hell did he teach him magic that could probably kill him?"

"...You know, I really don't know," Hunter conceded. "One of the universe's great mysteries, I suppose..." His face lit up. "Actually, you'll get a chance to meet him later."

Naruto's eyes widened, even as he continued scooping ice cream into his maw. "Really?"

"Yep!" Hunter replied cheerfully. "Although, I had to use a lot more tranquilizer on him; he's a good guy, but wherever he goes..." he winced. "...copious amounts of property damage tend to occur. It's actually that way with a lot of the members of his guild, actually..."

"...guild?" Naruto repeated, a bit confused.

"I'll explain later," Hunter replied. "Anyhow, this one time, his best friend, Happy..."

"What the hell kind of name is that?" Naruto interjected.

Hunter shrugged. "Eh, Natsu named him; actually pretty fitting, for a talking, flying blue cat..."

Naruto just stared back at Naruto. "...what," he finally spoke.

Hunter waved a paw in the air. "Like I said, you'll meet both of them later; I didn't have the heart to separate them, so I knocked 'em both out and brought them to town; they should be waking up pretty soon; by the time we get back, actually. Anyway, this one time, Natsu and some of his guildmates stopped at a restaurant to grab a bite after a job, and Happy dared him to order everything on the menu."

"Did he?" Naruto asked.

Hunter smirked. "Let's just say that afterwards, Mr. Dragneel needed a new belt, new pants...and the owner of the restaurant sued him for collateral damage caused by his belt buckle."

Naruto actually snorted a bit at this. "Seriously? Man, I can't wait to meet this guy..."

Hunter grinned. "Yeah, you and me both buddy." Something seemed to occur to him, and he looked at the ice cream on the table. "Hey, ice cream's starting to get runny; better not wait much longer...."

"What?!" Naruto exclaimed, turning back to the ice cream. "Damn it!" Narrowing his eyes, he dug his spoon in, rapidly spooning as many mouthfuls into his maw as he could at a time. Soon enough, he'd fallen back into his groove, and his belly once again continued expanding, swelling outwards and pushing against his pants.

Hunter, tail wagging, settled back in his seat, deciding to start on his second sundae. Damn, he's not even on the final course yet, and his gut's gettin' nice and big! Can't wait to see what he'll look like once he's finished everything...
11211222122122112.title: Chat with a wolf

choices: Sure! We can even bring Naruto to watch, too!
Wait for Naruto. You can enter an eating contest for teams of two with him.
112112221221221121.content:
As Naruto came to the end of his last bowl of ice cream, a pair of employees were walking in, each holding one side of an immense dish that was easily the size of an entire sink. They finally plopped it down in front of Naruto, nearly breaking the table with it.

Naruto merely scooped the last bit of his last sundae into his mouth, then immediately dug into the massive pile of ice cream in front of him. In the dish was every singly flavor, sauce, and topping that the shop served, in addition to a copious amount of whipped cream. It really did stack over three feet high, and Hunter and Naruto were amazed that the two employees kept it from falling over.

As Hunter watched, excited, and the employees watched, amazed, Naruto focused on the ice cream, going even faster in a display of gluttony that was even a bit grotesque. Hunter was having difficulty viewing Naruto, due to the massive dish, so he moved next to Naruto, barely dodging a popped pants button as he did so.

Hunter looked down at Naruto's belly to see that it was now pushing on the table quite a bit, now that it was freed from the restraints of the pants button. It pushed down Naruto's zipper all the way to the bottom, and it started to strain the bottom of his shirt. Had there not been a table, or a massive stomach, Naruto's underwear would be showing.

Despite the fact that he was way beyond full, Naruto was determined to finish the massive dish of ice cream. With the mere mention of other big eaters that Hunter mentioned, Naruto wanted to show Hunter that he could eat the most out of all of them.

At about a third of the way through the dish, Naruto's inseam began to tear. At this point, Naruto's belly strained the table so much that he had to scoot back and rotate himself, his belly wobbling ponderously as he did so.

Another third, and Naruto's shirt began to tear at the bottom, and his inseam tore even farther. Now, his stomach stuck out about a foot, and it wobbled with each movement he made. Naruto leaned over to get more ice cream, and he felt a strange sensation in his navel. A curious hand reached down to find that Naruto's navel had indeed inverted, and now it stuck out from his massive belly.

Though he slowed down towards the end, Naruto was able to finish the entire feast of ice cream. The employees were all shocked, and Hunter was smiling giddily, patting Naruto in the back with enthusiasm, saying, "I knew you could do it!"

Naruto, however, was green in the face, but he managed to look up at the employees, saying, "The ice cream was awesome!" Because Naruto had finished the entire challenge, he got the ice cream for free. Moving was going to be a challenge, though.

Naruto tried standing up, but needed help from Hunter. Soon enough, while Naruto had one hand on his belly, and one on his pants to keep them up, Hunter had an arm draped across Naruto's shoulders, helping to keep Naruto in balance.

After what seemed like hours, Naruto and Hunter finally arrived at the hotel, and they walked up to the room next to the one where Naruto woke up. Inside, Natsu was sleeping on the bed, with Happy curled up on his chest. Naruto and Hunter waited as Natsu snored loudly, sprawled messily across the bed. He was clad in his normal attire, vest and all, and he looked surprisingly peaceful in that position.

Naruto sat in a small armchair in the corner, his belly taking up the entire space of the arm chair, and then some. Hunter found a chair, and he sat next to Naruto.

"Is this the Natsu you've been talking about?" Naruto questioned. "Yeah" Hunter replied. "Let me do the talking, though. I don't want him to get too mad."

Soon enough, Natsu began to wake up, and Happy followed suit. He was very confused, and Hunter explained calmly, much in the same way he did with Naruto. He explained to Natsu how he captured Natsu. It wasn't hard, as Natsu was a fairly heavy sleeper, so Hunter essentially picked him up and took him to the hotel, laying him down on the bed that he woke up in. He balanced Natsu to make sure that Happy would stay in the same place on Natsu's chest, meaning that he would stay asleep.

Natsu was surprisingly calm about it. He talked about how he was bored back in Fiore, as he couldn't find any fun quests to do, so once he found out that Hunter was friendly, he was glad to finally have something to do.

Hunter then introduced Natsu to Naruto, who had fallen asleep himself before Natsu woke up.

"He's out now, but he's also a big eater, as you can clearly see!" Hunter exclaimed. Natsu replied with, "Holy crap! How much did he eat?!" Natsu exclaimed, as Happy flew over and playfully prodded Naruto's massive belly. "3 giant milkshakes, 16 bowls of ice cream, and an immense sundae!" Natsu was at a loss for words as he walked up, poking Naruto's belly curiously.

Soon afterwards, Natsu's belly growled this time, and he scratched the back of his head, saying, "I think I could show you how much of a big eater I am right now. Can we get something to eat?" with Happy adding in his trademark "Aye!"

Hunter then said, "..."
112112221221221121.title: The final course

choices: An All-You-Can-Eat Buffet
Ichiraku's Ramen (a first for Natsu)
1121122212212211211.content:
"Sure! Sounds like fun! In fact, we can even bring Naruto along to watch, too!" Hunter said happily, before being reminded by Naruto's snoring that he was still out like a light. Hunter chuckled sheepishly and said, "....Aaaaaaas soon as he wakes up..."

And so, Hunter and Natsu continued chatting amongst themselves for a little while, until Naruto slowly but eventually awoke from his deep slumber. Rubbing his eyes groggily, he turned to see Hunter standing in front of him eagerly. "Rise'n shine, Naruto! There's someone I'd like you to meet!" Hunter stepped back, revealing Natsu and Happy standing behind him. "Natsu Dragneel? Meet Naruto Uzumaki! And of course, the little fella over there is Happy!" Natsu grinned a wide mouthed grin while Naruto, still tired and full, smirked as best he could. "Hey, man! Heard a lot about'cha!" Natsu said as he offered a handshake, which Naruto accepted with a smirk. "Heard a lot about you, too. Nice to finally meet ya." responded Naruto, still rather dazed. "So, Hunter here tells me you've got quite the appetite!"

Naruto grinned then nodded, as he patted his still relatively bloated belly proudly for emphasis. "As you can see, heh. I hear you ain't half bad yourself," responded Naruto, to which Natsu grinned toothily and said, "...Let's just say, I can close a restaurant or two if I'm hungry enough." The two youths laughed, when suddenly a loud rumbling once again emanated from Natsu's bare stomach. Chuckling sheepishly, the young Fire Mage rubbed the back of his spiky pink head and said, "Was actually thinkin' of showing Hunter here just how much I could put away. Feel like taggin' along? Could give us a chance to get to know each other a lil better!"

Though Naruto wasn't feeling too hungry, he decided to tag along anyway. So, he said, "Eh, sure, why not? You seem like a cool enough guy. And plus..." Naruto smirked a bit and continued with, "...I'm kinda curious to see just how much you can really put away." Natsu grinned as he rubbed his stomach eagerly and said, "Hehe, that won't be a problem..."

And so, the four headed out in search of a restaurant still open for business. Finally, the four of them settled on...
1121122212212211211.title: "Sure! We can even bring Naruto to watch, too!"

choices: Sure!
The what?
112112222.content: A few months after the events of the Termina trip, Naruto is competing in an eating contest in some distant village?
112112222.title: How about this...

choices: They keep up with each other for a bit
One of them takes a lead early on
1121122221.content:
Naruto grinned, leaning back in his chair and rubbing his belly eagerly. Ah, man! he thought excitedly, licking his lips. This is gonna be the best round yet!

A few days ago, Naruto had caught wind of a ramen-eating competition going down in some village a long ways away from Konoha, with a sizable cash prize for the winner. Never one to turn down free ramen (and being a little strapped for cash at the current moment), Naruto had eagerly asked Tsunade if he could leave the village for a few weeks. Reluctantly, Tsunade had agreed; after all, Naruto had been cooped up in the village for a little while with no missions, with little else to do than train, stroll through the village, or hang out at his apartment, and some travel might do him well.

As soon as Tsunade had given him the OK, Naruto had rushed back to his apartment, packed his things, and headed out, eagerly anticipating the ramen to come. He'd considered asking Kiba and Akamaru to tag along-after all, for some reason, he and them had seem to had gotten really tight lately (though, for some weird reason, he couldn't remember exactly HOW)-but they were out on a mission with their team. Naruto had gotten momentarily disgruntled at this realization, but had shrugged it off; maybe once he won the cash prize, he'd treat them to something once they got back. A new steak place had just opened up...

Upon reaching the village where the contest where the contest was being held, Naruto had found, to his surprise, that it was being held in a rather unique manner. Rather than competing at once with all the other contestants, each contestant would be paired up against another for a round of ramen-eating, and whoever won would compete the next day against someone else.

Naruto smirked; unsurprisingly, he had totally demolished all the competition he had come up against. While the other contestant would, invariably, end up groaning and rubbing their aching stomachs, several bowls of ramen left uneaten, Naruto would be laughing, leaning back in his chair and smacking his stuffed belly, every single bowl he'd been given stacked up high.

What had been even better, Naruto thought gleefully, was that with each successive round, the amount of ramen bowls served had increased. During the first round, he had eaten enough to make his belly bulge noticeably against his jacket. The next day, the amount he had consumed had allowed his stomach to push further out. And, after the previous day's round, his jacket (and the black short-sleeved t-shirt with the red flame spiral on the chest underneath it) had been pushed far up enough to expose his belly button but not much else, and for him to have to unbutton his pants.

Wonder how much we're gonna hafta eat today? Naruto wondered, rubbing his palms together eagerly. Seeing as how this was the final round, and the one that would determine the winner, doubtless there would be many more bowls than before; after all, if he and the other finalist had gotten this far, they'd have to be able to handle that much, right?

Naruto looked at space beside him, scowling a bit. Speaking of which, where is he? the blonde thought irritably as he took in the empty folding chair that sat to his side. The final round's about to start! What the hell's taking him so long? He folded his arms, slouching irritably. Seriously, when that jerk gets here, I'm gonna give him a piece of my...

"Hi! This where the final round is?"

At the high voice, Naruto turned, mouth opening in an angry retort...but stopped short as he saw the individual-no, the contestant, he realized-that had made it.

To his surprise, the contestant was a young boy, no older than 12 or 13 years old. He was about the same height as most other kids his age, with short, messy reddish hair, a few freckles across his face, and bright green eyes. He was clad in brown khaki shorts, sandals, and a long-sleeved red t-shirt. This was all ordinary enough, save for one thing: the fact that he wore a burnished, golden locket about his neck, dangling at the end of a long chain.

Naruto blinked. Huh...that's a pretty nice lookin' necklace. Wonder where he got it? At the back of his mind, he wondered how this kid had managed to make it this far; he was quite slim, and rather fit for his age...

"Uh, Naruto? You OK?"

Naruto shook his head, focusing on the boy. "Y-yeah, I'm fine, I was just..."

His eyes widened. "Wait, how did you know my name?"

The boy recoiled a bit. "U-uh," he stammered, wincing. "I, um...heard one of the other contestants say your name! Naruto Uzumaki, right?"

Naruto raised an eyebrow. "Um, yeah, that's my name. So you heard one of the other contestants say it?"

The boy nodded vigorously. "Y-yeah! Sorry to just blurt it out like that." Calming down a bit, he scratched the back of his head. "Didn't mean to freak you out."

In spite of himself, Naruto smiled. "Ah, that's OK," he assured the youth. "Just got a little surprised is all." He leaned over and patted the empty chair. "Why don't ya take a seat?"

As though a switch were being flipped, the boy's expression switched from sheepish and apologetic to one of absolute delight, a wide grin spreading across his face. "Really? Thanks!" Still grinning, he walked over and plopped right down, folding his hands on his lap and smiling at Naruto.

Naruto was taken aback, to say the least. The kid had gotten that happy just from his invitation to sit down?

Shaking it off, he turned to face the boy, giving him his best smile. "So, uh, what's your name?"

The youth grinned. "Kotetsu. Just Kotetsu."

Raising an eyebrow at that last part, Naruto nonetheless smiled. "Kotetsu, huh? That's a cool name."

Laughing a bit sheepishly, Kotetsu rubbed the back of his head. "Aww, thanks! 'Course, 'Naruto's' a pretty cool name, too..."

Naruto blinked. "Ya really think so?"

Kotetsu nodded eagerly. "Yeah! I mean, I try not to say stuff I don't mean..."

Naruto chuckled. "Sounds like a pretty good way to do things."

Kotetsu grinned. "Yeah, my friends all appreciate it..." he winced. "...even if doesn't always work out so good."

Naruto frowned. "Huh? Whaddaya mean?"

Kotetsu gulped, looking at Naruto. He said nothing at first. Then...

"Has a girl ever asked you how she looks in an outfit?"

Naruto gaped at the boy, unsure of what to say. Then, he and Kotetsu locked eyes, blinked....

...and burst out laughing. "N-no way!" Naruto gasped through his hysteria. "Y-you actually told a girl sh-she..." whatever else he had to say was lost in a fit of giggles. Kotetsu said nothing, only clutching his middle and nodding.

As they laughed, Naruto privately wondered how he was laughing so earnestly with this kid he'd only just met, nice as he was. And yet, as they succumbed to further laughter, he was struck by just how...right it felt. A part of him was even wondering if he'd ever met this kid before...

Suddenly, the sound of loud coughing cut through the air. Opening their eyes, they saw the contest officiant standing and looking at them, looking rather befuddled.

"O-oh!" Kotetsu gasped, taking deep breaths to get his laughter under control. "I-is the contest ready to begin?"

The man nodded numbly. "I-if you're ready..."

Coughing a bit, Naruto sat upright in his seat. "Y-yeah, we're ready." At this, a determined grin suddenly split across his face. "So what are ya waiting for? Bring it on!"

Next to him, Kotetsu smirked and planted his hands on the table, rising out of his seat a bit. "Yeah! Don't keep us waiting!"

A bit taken aback, the man nonetheless nodded and walked toward the kitchen, where the bowls were being prepared. He wasn't the only one; Naruto turned to look at Kotetsu with a confused look. "Ya like ramen that much?"

Kotetsu winked. "Yep! It's one of my favorite foods!"

Naruto laughed, slugging the boy playfully in the shoulder. "Ya know what? I think I like you better already."

If at all possible, Kotetsu's smile grew even wider at this, and Naruto couldn't help but smile in return. The kid was so cheery; it was almost impossible not to admire that...

The two continued to chat idly for a bit, and Naruto was surprised at how easily the conversation came. This kid was really something...

Soon, the man returned, bearing two huge, steaming bowls of ramen. Bringing them toward the table, he set one in front of each of them. "As usual, the rules are the same," the man began. "After the initial two bowls, our volunteers will keep on bringing more out in a steady stream. There is no time limit; the first person to finish all their bowls is the winner." The man bowed. "Good luck to you both." With that, he turned and headed back into the kitchen.

The boys each took a deep whiff of their ramen, practically drooling. Kotetsu was the first to break the silence. "Well, better get started!" he chirped, splitting a pair of chopsticks. He beamed at the older boy. "Good luck, Naruto!"

Surprised at the boy's sportsmanship, Naruto nonetheless smiled. "Good luck to you too, Kotetsu."

With that, they grinned, nodded, and dove into their bowls...
1121122221.title: A Contest and a Meeting

choices: Naruto had taken the lead
Kotetsu had taken the lead
11211222211.content:
It was truly a remarkable sight to behold...

This was the final round for the village's eating contest, and both finalists looked as they were having the time of their lives. Now, at no point had it ever been a secret of how vastly Naruto adored scarfing down ramen as much as he did. Even as he powered through one round after another, his competition may have been relentless, but Naruto would always come out on top. One could argue the young man was far more determined than his vigorous competitors, though the reality was quite simple; he loved eating ramen far too much to give up. It had seemed to an edge he'd retained against each rival in this competition. But not this time...

Rather, this boy; Kotetsu, he was not only packing away the same amount of ramen at the same rapid pace as Naruto, but he did so with an equally determined glint in his eyes, and yet, a big hearty smile on his youthful face.

This kid's really havin' fun, huh... Naruto thought to himself, unable to suppress a smirk as he continued scarfing down a seemingly endless stream of noodles from his bowl. He was scarfing down as much as he could possibly fit into his mouth, taking big hearty gulps after chewing and slurping vigorously, watching as Kotetsu; without missing a beat, did just the same.

And as he and Kotetsu wolfed down their ramen, one thing kept creeping into the back of Naruto's head...

How familiar this all felt...

But...what's familiar about this...? he thought, slurping down more and more noodles as he did so. Having a ramen eating contest with some random kid I just met...?

Regardless of this nagging feeling, however, he tried his best to push the thought back.

Afterall, this WAS the final round. And Naruto most certainly couldn't afford to be distracted when he had to bring his A-game...doubly so when against such a worthy adversary...one Naruto was all but certain he'd had to have met before...for some reason or another...

And so, he and Kotetsu ate and ate, their first massive bowls depleting amply as; already, both their bellies began to expand with the sheer volume of ramen being ingested in so short a duration of time. It had appeared as though there was a notable bump beneath both Naruto's T-Shirt and Kotetsu's long sleeved shirt. And yet, despite that, not a one showed any signs o flagging any time soon, as they messily devoured their bowls at the same pace; something very few could admit to doing against Naruto...ESPECIALLY when it came to ramen...

Within no time at all, both the elder blonde and younger reddish headed boy had drained their first bowls clean, and were both now sitting back in their chairs, eager for more.

"Ahhh, ain't nothin' more satisfying than a big, steaming bowl'uh ramen, is there, Kotetsu!" exclaimed Naruto as he smacked his belly proudly, awaiting as the volunteers took both bowls and proceeded to get the next ones ready.

Kotetsu simply smiled, rubbing his own tummy in satisfaction as he nodded and said, "You said it! Ramen's just plain awesome!" His smile then turned to one a bit more impish as he added, "Althoooough...as good as this stuff is...when it comes to ramen, NOTHING beats Ichiraku's!"

At that, Naruto was about cheer in agreement, but immediately stopped in his tracks.

"Wait, y-you've had Ichiraku's...?" Naruto asked, with an air of suspicion in his voice. To his surprise, however, Kotetsu didn't reciprocate his suspicion, but instead, bopped his head happily. "Yep! Sure have! Not at their actual restaurant though, a really good friend of mine shared it with me some time back." He shut his eyes and tilted his head skyward, licking his lips and smiling warmly as he added, "But the second I tasted it...? Ohhhh man, it was just...magic!"

Despite himself, Naruto couldn't help but smirk as he watched Kotetsu practically salivating at the mere mention of Ichiraku's. No doubt it had to be more than coincidence, but how; Naruto simply couldn't say. No, rather, his smirk once again became a smile as he nudged the younger boy playfully in the arm and said, "Heh, y'know what, Kotetsu? You're alright in my book."

Kotetsu turned right back at Naruto and beamed happily, about to thank him just as the volunteers returned with another set of massive, steamy bowls; the aroma just wafting through their nostrils and practically begging to be eaten.

And both Naruto and Kotetsu were more than happy to oblige.

Just like the first bowl, neither Naruto nor Kotetsu wasted an ounce of time messily and rapidly scarfing down as much ramen as their maws could possibly hold as they heartily gulped and dove right back for more and more...all at the same pace...neck and neck...

As with the first bowls, again, their stomachs continued to bloat up just a little more and more, making the bulges beneath both their shirts a bit more noticeable as the two pressed on and on. With a steady mixture of determination and sheer joy, their second bowls were both demolished in practically no time at all. And it was clear once the chopsticks went down, neither one was getting full anytime soon.

Burping loudly, Naruto smacked his lips then turned to Kotetsu as the volunteers once again took the bowls off the table. "Heh, y'know something...I really gotta hand it to ya, kid. Ain't too often I come across ANYONE who can put away as much ramen as fast as I can, the way you can!"

At that, Kotetsu just chuckled and rubbed the back of his head. "Hehe, thanks! But then again, how often do you eat alongside someone who loves ramen as much as you do?"

"Heh, fair point."

Again, Naruto found it strange how easy it was for him to chat with this boy so easily and freely, but his pondering was soon stilted when the volunteers returned with their third bowls.

With that, both Naruto and Kotetsu shared a competitive, but notably good natured glance and smirk, then proceeded to tear right into their third massive bowls of ramen mercilessly.

And as more time went on...
11211222211.title: They keep up with each other for a bit

choices: Kotetsu maintains his lead for a good while
Naruto manages to catch up
112112222112.content:
Within practically no time at all, Naruto and Kotetsu had demolished their third massive bowls, and both raised the bowls to their mouth and gulped the broth down. "Ahhhhh!" Kotetsu sighed, licking his lips and contentedly patting his belly, now a bit more rounded than before. "Ain't nothing like drinkin' a bowl of hot, steaming broth after a round of tasty, zesty noodles, eh, Naruto?"

Naruto grinned at his young competitor, rubbing his own belly; as with Kotetsu's it had bulged a bit more noticeably under his jacket. "Took the words right outta my mouth, Kotetsu!" The youth beamed at the blonde, wiping his mouth with a sleeve even as the volunteers took the empty bowls away.

"Really?" Kotetsu chuckled, scratching his cheek sheepishly. "Guess we're kinda on the same wavelength, huh?"

Naruto laughed, patting Kotetsu on the back. "Yep! Seems that way..."

The blonde tilted his head. "Speaking of which...have we met before?"

At this, the reddish-haired boy started, eyes widening. "Wh-what makes ya say that?"

Puzzling a bit at the boy's reaction, Naruto shrugged. "I-I dunno; you just seem really familiar for some reason..."

Kotetsu blinked. "Well, uh..." he chuckled nervously, rubbing the back of his head. "Guess I just have one of those kinds of faces, huh?"

Naruto, a bit confused, blinked in return. "N-no, it's more than that. I mean..."

"Oh hey, ramen's here!" Kotetsu blurted suddenly. Starting a bit, Naruto looked up and noticed that, yes, the volunteers had brought out the fourth round of bowls. As the delectable aroma wafted into his nostrils, he grinned a bit, and allowed his confusion to be pushed to the back of his mind, at least for the moment. Well, I guess I could always ask him afterwards...

The bowls were set in front of the two competitors, and, of course, once they hit the table, both youths grabbed their chopsticks and immediately began slurping them up.

Mmmm, Kotetsu thought gleefully as he slurped a veritable stream of noodles and toppings into his waiting mouth. This was a great idea. I mean, I get to eat a ton of ramen for free! How cool is that? Beaming, he continued slurping the noodles down, going faster and faster...

Naruto, even as he continued slurping his own noodles down, marveled at the sheer speed with which Kotetsu was devouring his bowl. Wow, the kid really likes ramen, doesn't he? Unconsciously, he slowd down a bit, watching the boy closer.

The happy grin upon his face...the sheer eagerness with which he tackled the ramen...the bright spark in his eyes that spoke of someone having the time of their life...

Naruto's eyes narrowed. Alright, I KNOW I've met this kid somewhere before. But...this is my first time meeting him, right? He screwed up his brow. Agh, this is so frustraEEEEEHHHHH?!

Naruto's eyes bulged as, with a smile on his face, Kotetsu lifted the bowl up to his mouth and gulped down the hearty broth. After a few seconds, he slammed the bowl down with a satisfied "Ahhhhh....."

He's done already?! Naruto thought, incredulously. Looking down, he noted that he still had a little over half of his own bowl left to go. Grunting, he lowered his head and began gulping them down as fast as he could. After all, friendly competition or not, it was still a competition, and there was no way he wasn't going to do his damnedest to come out on top!

Even as Naruto continued guzzling his noodles, a volunteer came by, grabbed Kotetsu's empty bowl, and set another, full bowl down. Kotetsu's face lit up. Oh wow, they're bringing new bowls at the same tiee they take the empty ones now? He licked his lips. Great!

Giving the volunteer a nod of thanks, the boy immediately dove into his fifth bowl, slurping up the noodles happily. As he did so, though, he glanced over at Naruto. He winced as he saw the blonde examining him, even as he devoured what was left of his fifth bowl. Ah, man; I'm sorry, Naruto...

Returning his attention to his own bowl, he continued slurping up his noodles. I want to show him so bad... He shook his head slightly, even as he gulped down a mouthful and went back in for more. N-no; doin' it out in public would be a really bad idea. I'll show him after the contest...

Even as the boys continued musing to themselves, they did not let up in the slightest. Soon, Naruto finished his fourth bowl; however, even as the attendant brought him his fifth bowl, Kotetsu had already finished drinking the broth of his own bowl. Both boys stomachs had gotten a bit more rounded, and they would doubtless only continue to do so as the contest drew on....
112112222112.title: Kotetsu had taken the lead

choices: Someone takes the lead
The two are still evenly matched
1121122221122.content:
Flustered, Naruto nonetheless wasted no time at all tearing straight into his fifth bowl, hoping to close the gap between him and Kotetsu as soon as possible; else this competition's victory might slip between his fingers. Even as Naruto soldiered on, ravenously stuffing as many noodles into his mouth as his cheeks could possibly permit, the younger boy continued to get his attention. Naruto ate and ate relentlessly and quickly, yet also watched as Kotetsu was tearing into his sixth bowl.

As he did so, despite still being behind in this competition, Naruto couldn't help but smirk a bit as he watched the young red haired boy chow down. Everything about his demeanor was just so positively uplifting. Even in the final round of a ramen eating competition, this young man; in every single sense of the word, just looked so damn...happy...

That...that's what's so familiar...! Naruto thought, still slurping away as he did so. But...why...?

Nonetheless, he shook those thoughts off; if at least only temporarily, and wolfed down his ramen voraciously, chewing and gulping again and again as fast as he possibly could without choking (seeing as that almost happened a few times in this competition already...) Before long, Naruto found himself draining the zesty broth of his fifth bowl, and; like clockwork, the volunteer took it away and handed him his sixth bowl promptly afterwards. And; much to Naruto's relief, Kotetsu was also still on his sixth bowl, though not much left to go.

Okay, time to get serious... Naruto thought, before taking massive scoops of noodles and shoving them straight into his eager maw. He winced a bit as he found himself gulping down hearty strains of noodles at once, but he pressed on, more than determined to pick up the pace by any means necessary.

The commotion was even enough to draw young Kotetsu's attention as he turned his head and; with a surprising sense of amusement, grinned at the sight of Naruto plowing through his sixth bowl. Woooooow! I've NEVER seen him eat so much at once! That's awesome! the boy thought gleefully, still working on his bowl.

Shockingly, however, by the time Kotetsu had finally finished his sixth bowl and slammed it happily on the table, the sound was amplified by a second bowl hitting the table right alongside him. With a hearty gasp for air, Naruto smacked his lips and rubbed his much fuller belly in eager anticipation for more. At this, Kotetsu beamed happily at the elder boy and said, "Holy moly! You were a full bowl behind a little while ago, yet ya managed to catch up? That's so cool!"

At that, Naruto grinned. "Heh, what can I say, kid? I gotta give ya a run for y'er money, don't I?" Suddenly, Naruto burped loudly, but much to his surprise, Kotetsu just giggled with amusement, earning a chuckle from him in return, until the volunteers returned with both Naruto's and Kotetsu's seventh bowls, taking their previous bowls away in the process.

"Heh, guess it's all tied up, huh?" Naruto noted, earning a nod and a smile from the younger boy. "Yep! Buuuut it's still anyone's game, right?" Kotetsu replied, earning an almost impish grin from Naruto as he playfully nudged the boys arm. "Sure is, so don't let up now, got it?" Kotetsu grinned an equally impish grin and said, "Wouldn't think of it!"

And with that, both boys once again wished each other good luck, and dove straight into their seventh bowls, notably at a slightly slower pace, but every bit as relentless as they powered through a seemingly infinite amount of ramen noodles. All the while, their bellies continued to swell out to increasingly larger and larger proportions. Kotetsu's stomach had swollen to the point where a sliver of his stomach was now showing beneath his shirt. Naruto's jacket had pressed against his belly so greatly that both the bottom of that as well as the T-Shirt beneath it hiked up and started showing a sliver of flesh in the process.

Yet, despite that, not a single one let up, once again draining their bowls completely empty to the last drop and slamming them down at the same time with a hearty sigh of relief and eager anticipation for more.

Upon receiving their eighth bowls and having their seventh bowls taken off, the two young men wasted little to no time at all getting to ample work.

And so, the two boys ate and ate...and ate some more, and as time began to press on...
1121122221122.title: Naruto manages to catch up

choices: Naruto or Kotetsu unbuttons their pants, not wanting to risk falling behind
Naruto or Kotetsu decides to show off, and keeps their pants buttoned
11211222211222.content:
Though their pace had slowed a bit, neither of the two contestants let up in the slightest as they plowed through bowl after bowl of delicious, zesty noodles. Within a matter of minutes, they had demolished their eight bowls, just as the volunteers brought them their ninth bowls. Thanking them, they quickly dove into those as well, continuing to devour them with gusto and enthusiasm as the zesty flavors assailed their mouths.

Soon, those bowls were demolished as well, and they got started on their tenth bowls. And, after they'd devoured those, they got stated on their eleventh bowls. Then their twelfth, thirteenth, fourteenth, fifteenth....

Throughout all of this, the two managed to keep pace with which other as they plowed through their bowls. Naruto, in addition to simply loving ramen that much, did not wish to fall behind again, especially considering the speed the kid was going. Kotetsu...well, Kotetsu just seemed to be enjoying his ramen that damn much.

As they packed away one oversized bowl after another, their stomachs slowly continued to bulge more and more as heaping helpings of broth and noodles entered them. Kotetsu's stomach continued to grow, slowly hiking up his long-sleeved shirt further and further, exposing more and more skin. In fact, even as he shoveled noodles into his mouth with one hand, his other wandered down to his growing tummy, rubbing it and grinning as he felt the bare skin. Whoa, my gut's really growing, isn't it? His eyes lit up. Wonder how bit its gonna be done by the time we're done? Spurred on by this thought, he returned his attention fully to his current bowl.

In the meantime, Naruto's stomach also bulged bit by bit, slowly hiking his jacket and the shirt underneath up further, albeit a bit more slowly than Kotetsu's shirt. Naruto, even as he devoured his ramen, frowned. Man, kinda startin' to be a tight fit here... he mused. It wasn't particularly uncomfortable, at least not yet, but as he glanced over at Kotetsu, still devouring his ramen with gusto, he screwed up his brow. Considering how well Kotetsu seems to be doing, my jacket bein' a tight fit might be a problem somewhere down the line...

And so, as soon as Naruto slammed his sixteenth bowl down on the table, he leaned back in his chair, grabbed the zipper of his jacket, and pulled it down, completely unzipping and opening the garment, completely revealing his short-sleeved black t-shirt with a stylized red flame spiral on the front. Obviously, it now rode slightly up, exposing a surprising bit of skin. Sighing in relief, he leaned back in his seat, patting his belly contentedly.

Kotetsu, even as he slammed his own empty bowl upon the table, glanced over at Naruto, rubbing his belly through his opened jacket. He grinned widely as he caught sight of the garment underneath it. "Wow, Naruto, that's a really cool shirt!" he exclaimed, licking his lips.

Naruto, surprised, looked up from his ministrations at Kotetsu. "Ya really think so?"

Te younger boy nodded eagerly. "Sure do!" He gestured to the symbol on the shirt. "Especially that flery spiral thingy; it's really awesome-looking!"

Naruto's eyes widened, surprised. "You...you really think so?"

Kotetsu beamed. "Don't ya remember? I try not to say things I don't mean." He chuckled a bit scratching the back of his head. "'Sides, I used to have a shirt that sorta looked like that when I was little; I kinda have fond memories of it, ya know?"

Naruto smiled. "Really?" Kotetsu nodded eagerly in return, even as the volunteers brought the new bowls along and took the empty ones. "Well, I gotta say, kid, you really have great taste in clothes."

Kotetsu beamed, chuckling sheepishly. "Awww, you're too nice, Naruto..."

Naruto smirked, picking his chopsticks back up. "Eh, don't sweat it kid; I try not to say stuff I don't mean, too..."

Kotetsu grinned, grabbing his chopsticks as well. "I can appreciate that!"

Naruto couldn't help but smile; Kotetsu was so friendly, enthusiastic, and genuine....

Feels so...so damn familiar.... Naruto mused, dipping his chopsticks into his bowl and starting to slurp up more ramen. But why...? Shaking this thought off, he started tearing into his bowl with gusto.

Kotetsu, even as he began slurping up his ramen, glanced out the side of his eyes at the older blonde. I'm sorry, Naruto, the other boy thought. I know you're confused right now. He smiled, turning his attention fully to his ramen so Naruto couldn't see. Don't worry, pal; after the contest is over and everything's digested, I'll show who you I really am... His stomach churned with a mixture of anticipation and dread. And then...and then everything's gonna make sense.... Fighting aside the anxiety, he threw himself fully into his bowl. Within record time, both boys had drained their bowls entirely, just as the attendants brought out more bowls. They tore through these as well....as they did the bowls after those, and the bowls following those....

All the while, their stomachs continued to bulge, their respective shirts slowly hiking up further and further and exposing more and more skin. In addition, their respective pants began feeling a bit snug, but they ignored this, powering on, neither one wanting to fall behind the other. As such, they plowed through their eighteenth, nineteenth, and twentieth bowls, hiking their shirts up even further and starting to expose a bit of their belly buttons. All the while, the slight snugness in their waistlines increased...

As they gulped down the broth to their twenty-first bowls...
11211222211222.title: The two are still evenly matched

choices: One of them emerges victorious
Somehow, the two finish at the same time
112112222112222.content:
After some doing, both boys had drained their twenty-first bowls bone dry, and; in unison once again, slammed their bowls down on the table. The score remained all tied up still and both youths looked to be flagging a bit at this point, now rubbing their engorged midsections tenderly as the volunteers promptly took their previous bowls and handed off their twenty second bowls to each one.

"Ohhh man," griped Naruto, rubbing his bloated belly soothingly, feeling it constrain against his pants considerably. Kotetsu, groaning a bit himself, fared no better, with his own rounded belly pressing firmly into his pants button as well. "L-lotta ramen, huh?" remarked Kotetsu, earning a nod from the elder boy. "Not that it's a bad thing, h-heh...but our pants might be disagreeing..."

At that, Naruto couldn't help but chuckle. "Oof...took the words right outta my mouth, kiddo...luckily...there's a solution to that..."

With those words, Naruto reached over his immensely swollen stomach over to the button of his pants, fumbling tremendously as he tried to reach over his currently massive midsection. Kotetsu watched and couldn't help but giggle a bit at the silly sight.

Until finally...

"Ahhhhh..." gasped Naruto with sweet relief as; after all his fumbling, he finally managed to unbutton his pants. The results of which, caused his already swollen belly to push outward through the front of his pants, pulling his zipper down all the way as his stomach expanded with the additional free room. At the same time, his shirt hiked up, causing it to rise well above his exposed belly button. Naruto, meanwhile, just slouched in his chair with a goofy but blissful look on his face while he patted his belly happily.

"Hoooooly crap...did I need that..." Naruto remarked. He then glanced at Kotetsu curiously and said, "Hey, kid, aren'tcha gonna unbutton your pants too? It's gonna make keeping up kinda hard if your gut's caught in your pants like that." To emphasize this point, he gestured towards Kotetsu's tummy and that it was still firmly constricted by the front of his pants. Wincing a bit at this, Kotetsu nonetheless smiled and said, "Heh, I appreciate the concern, Naruto, really!"

Then, his warm smile grew to be a bit more impish.

"Buuuuuuut there's a lil trick someone taught me a while back that I've come to rely on in situations like this," Kotetsu remarked, patting his belly for emphasis, earning a curious glance from Naruto, who nonetheless shrugged and turned his attention to his next bowl. "Well, so long as you're absolutely certain, kiddo..."

Giving the elder boy a wink, Kotetsu also turned his attention to his bowl, and at the same time, both boys tore right into their noodles. Naruto was working at a much easier and free pace, now that he'd unbuttoned his pants and given his belly some breathing room. Whereas Kotetsu was notably struggling a bit due to his pants constricting his stomach even further. On occasion, Naruto would glance over at the boy with a mixture of sympathy for the undeniable discomfort he must have been feeling right about now, and yet, a hint of suspicion.

Just what is this kid planning to do...? Why take a chance when you're on the final round...? mused Naruto, who nonetheless, shook those thoughts off and dove right back into his ramen noodles.

Meanwhile, Kotetsu found himself soldiering on, wincing in pain and discomfort as his belly pressed further and further into the increasingly tighter front of his pants.

Rgh...oh man, it hurts so bad... the poor youth thought as he nonetheless shoveled as much ramen into his mouth as he could possibly fit. Then, after gulping it down and feeling his pants getting tighter and tighter, a strained but notable grin grew over his face. C'mon, just keep on pushin'...it's gonna be sooooooo worth it when ya do... Then, he glanced over at Naruto for a moment and smiled even as he struggled to stuff more ramen into his slightly less than eager maw. Heehee, I'll bet Naruto's gonna be surprised by this, BIG time...hope he still appreciates how awesome it is as much as he used to...

There was now a slight but notable lead Naruto had obtained over his younger competition. Though, due to the sheer volume of ramen the teen had ingested already, his pace had slowed down considerably. Kotetsu, on the other hand, struggled and struggled, until finally, Naruto; seeing the strained look on the boys' face, frowned and had to speak up.

"Say, Kotetsu, ya sure you don't wanna unbutton your pants? I get you're trying to do something else, but I don't want'cha to lose this thing over something as silly as a-"

But before Naruto could finish that statement...

*POP!*

With a massively audible SNAP, the button of Kotetsu's pants popped clean off and fired right above the crowd; a proverbial grand slam...but for a pants button.

Along with that forceful release, came yet another great release. Like Naruto, Kotetsu's bloated belly soon expanded freely and outward from the front of his pants, pushing most of his zipper down, and hiking his shirt up an ample amount to expose more flesh above his belly button. Naruto simply sat there, stunned.

But Kotetsu?

"Ahhhh, MUCH better!" the boy exclaimed, sighing with great relief and smiling an oh so blissful smile as he slapped his belly happily and merrily, causing it to bounce freely just a bit, much to his amusement.

"Whoa..." Naruto exclaimed. "T-that...that was...freakin' AWESOME!"

At that Kotetsu just chuckled and rubbed the back of his head sheepishly. "Heh, yeah, well, it's just kinda something I picked up when I was younger. Feels WAY more satisfying to have all that pressure just blast off your gut at once, y'know?" At that, Kotetsu's smile became a bit more on the goofy side of bliss as he slouched back happily patting his stomach as he did so. Naruto couldn't help but snicker a bit, grinning mischievously as he too; recalled all the times he'd ever blasted his button off his pants to free his own stomach in times of heavy feasting. Enough so that he felt compelled to say, "Y'know, normally, I do too, but I kinda figured I'd play it safe since we're so far into the last round...heh, gotta hand it to ya, kid. Doing that now? Pretty gutsy..."

As if on reflex, he reached over and playfully ruffled Kotetsu's head, earning a laugh from the pre-teen, who smiled warmly; internally thinking, Heehee...just like old times...

Naruto, however, was a bit more perplexed. W-why'd I do that...? He thought to himself, calmly taking his hand aside, but nonetheless, perplexed. Catching this, Kotetsu decided to help the elder boy out by playfully jabbing his arm. "Well, I dunno bout'chu, Naruto, but now that we both got room, whadduya say we get back to tearing up some ramen?"

Naruto, shaking off his internal musings, turned to the boy and smiled confidently. "Sounds like a plan, kiddo!"

And, just like before, the two young men were right back into their bowls, both with a bit more vigor and pep in each bite, scarfing down more and more ramen while their bellies continued to peak forward little by little with each passing gulp, remaining neck in neck for a good while, until their twenty second bowls were drained clean.

Both boys smacked their lips and leaned back in their chairs with their hands rested atop their bellies and in unison, burped loudly, turning to each other and laughing uproariously amongst each other until their twenty third bowls had been delivered.

The two powered on, chugging through their noodles as their gullets continued to swell and swell until, after some doing, they had finished their twenty third bowls. Then their twenty fourth...fifth...sixth...seventh...eighth...ninth...until at last, both boys, packed to the absolute brim, had reached their thirtieth bowls...
112112222112222.title: Kotetsu decides to show off, keeping buttoned up

choices: He hears a knock at the door
1121122221122221.content:
"W-well," Naruto moaned, rubbing his stomach with both hands and looking down at his thirtieth and final bowl, "Th-this is it..."

"Y-yeah," Kotetsu agreed, burping a bit queasily. "J-just one more bowl, a-and then we're done..." He winced as he looked down at his steaming bowl. He loved ramen, and he was gonna do everything in his power to eat this one last bowl...but he was just so full...

This, of course, was a fact that the audience did not need to be reminded of. After downing 29 huge bowls of ramen each, both boys' stomachs were ridiculously swollen, each looking as though they were pregnant with quadruplets. Their shirts had long since come to rest completely on top of their engorged midsections, fully exposing the appendages for all to see. In addition, they had both had to scoot back a bit so their bellies didn't press into the table. And, though none of the audience could see it from where they were (thankfully), both of their flies were completely opened, allowing their undergarments to see the light of day.

The two boys spent a minute or so rubbing their bellies, trying to coax some of the discomfort out, and looking down at their final bowls. They just had to finish this last one, and then they'd be finished...

Finally, the boys slowly looked at one another. "W-well," Naruto began, only for him to start as Kotetsu smiled weakly at him.

"...may the best man win," the younger boy finished. In spite of his obvious discomfort, there was an odd sort of eager glint in his eyes. Naruto blinked, a bit taken aback. Wow...he has this much enthusiasm even when he's about to burst? the blonde thought, perplexed. As if to prove this, Kotetsu picked up his chopsticks, took some noodles and toppings into them, and began slurping them up. He was going at a much slower pace than before, obviously, owing to his overpacked tummy, but that pace was nonetheless steady.

Naruto gaped at the youth for a moment. Wow, he really wasn't kidding... Then, in spite of himself, he smiled. Well, if he's giving it his all... Smirking, he picked his chopsticks up. ...then I guess I better, too! With that, he dug his chopsticks in, and soon he was slurping at the same slow but steady pace as the young red-haired boy.

The minutes ticked by as the two continued slurping away at their bowls. Their pace was slow, but they never let themselves slow down; after all, this was the final round, and stuffed to the brim or not, ramen was still ramen. They would occasionally stop to burp or rub their bellies to coax some relief into them, but they would always go right back to their bowls.

As the minutes ticked by, and the level of ramen steadily continued to deplete, the crowd watched with rapt attention; the two contestants, slow as they were, were nonetheless neck and neck. At this point, it was anyone's game.

Kotetsu, even as he slurped away, frowned. Aw, man; gut's feelin' tight, but my belly-button's not feeling funny. He shrugged, continuing to slurp away. Ah, well; guess I can't always pop it out...

Time continued to go by, and as the boys got closer and closer to the end of their bowls, their faces began turning a slight shade of green, as their overpacked tummies pleaded with them to stop before they exploded. They paid their traitorous midsections no mind, however, and soldiered on, until, at last, they had depleted their bowls of all noodles, leaving only the broth.

Belching queasily, Naruto glanced over at Kotetsu. "W-well, all that's left is the broth..."

Kotetsu, belching a bit as well, nonetheless smirked good-naturedly. "Guess it's anyone's game now..."

They couldn't help it; the boys grinned at one another, grabbed their bowls lifted them to their lips, and, before their stomachs could give another ache of protest, tilted them back, gulping down the hearty broth as fast as they dared.

The crowd watched, utterly silent. Who would finish first?

Soon, both contestants reached a point where there was only a tiny bit of broth left in their bowls each. Just...a little...more... Naruto and Kotetsu thought in unison. To this end, they tilted the bowls back even further, letting what was left of it flow toward their throats....

...only for Naruto's eyes to widen, his cheeks to bulge, and a truly explosive belch to escape from his maw:

BUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!

Unfortunately, he happened to be holding the bowl up to his face at this time, which, of course, resulted in the bowl clattering to the table and what was left of the broth to splatter on his face. Kotetsu stared at Naruto out the side of his face, unsure whether to ask whether he was alright or gush about how awesome of a burp that was. However, he quickly remembered that he only had a little broth left, and, as Naruto was frantically wiping his face, the younger boy grinned cheekily and gulped down the rest of his bowl. "Aaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhh!" Kotetsu exclaimed as he slammed the bowl on the table. "That was soooooo good..." Sighing and licking his lips, he slumped back in his seat, patting his overstuffed belly.

"Eh?" Naruto muttered, shaking what was left of the broth off his face. He turned to face Kotetsu...and his jaw dropped as he saw Kotetsu contentedly smacking his belly, his bowl bone-dry. A single thought ran through Naruto's mind:

What.

The crowd stared, equally flabbergasted. No one said anything for a moment.

Then, everyone erupted into cheers.

"We have a winner!" the contest officiant declared, striding over Kotetsu and hoisting his arm in the air. The boy said nothing, but simply grinned sheepishly and waved at the crowd with his other arm. Heh; almost thought I wasn't gonna make it...

He turned toward Naruto to compliment him on the effort he'd given...but his smile faded as he saw the absolutely shocked look on Naruto's face. Oh man....is he...is he mad I beat him...? I mean, he was always so nice, but he's crazy competitive, and he doesn't know who I am yet...

Naruto stared at Kotetsu for a few moments more...before he burst out laughing. Kotetsu started, the man letting go of his arm. "N-Naruto?"

Still laughing uproariously, Naruto patted Kotetsu on the back heartily. "Heh, way to go, kid!"

Kotetsu's eyes widened. "You're...you're not mad I beat you?" he asked before he could stop himself.

Naruto chuckled. "Well, normally, I probably would be, a little bit, but..." he grinned, slugging the boy playfully in the shoulder. "...it's not often I get a competitor who can pack as much ramen away as I can...or who loves it as much as I do. Far as I can tell, you EARNED this win." Not to mention, there's something about him that just makes it impossible to be mad at him...but what the hell is it?

Oblivious to Naruto's internal musings, Kotetsu grinned. "Aww, thanks, Naruto. But ya know," the boy continued, rubbing the back of his head. "...if it weren't for that huge belch ya did...which was AWESOME, by the way..." Naruto beamed at this. '...you probably woulda won."

Naruto's eyes widened: the kid could easily have just been trying to be gracious about his win, but something told him he genuinely believed he'd only won by a hair. "Yeah, well, that was my fault..."

"That's why I want you to have the prize money."

Naruto laughed. "Well, that's real nice of yoWHA...?!"

Kotetsu laughed a bit at Naruto's utterly shocked expression. "Yeah, I never really entered for the prize money; I only entered 'cause I love ramen." That, and I hoped I'd run into you...

"Besides," he continued out loud, "I'm from a really far-away land; this nation's money wouldn't really do me any good back home."

Naruto stared at the kid, trying to determine if he was working an angle, but no: he was 100% sincere. This kid's something else, ain't he...

Nonetheless, Naruto managed to grin and playfully elbow Kotetsu in the side. "Well, kiddo, if you insist..."
