Kurama grinned toothily and said, "Yep! Ya should'a heard this one I let out at this one buffet me'n Natsu always eat at...our glasses were actually shaking!

"Oh...you mean like this...?" chimed Naruto before thumping his chest firmly with his fist just once...

*BBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPP!!!*

Naruto let out an exponentially louder and longer belch, which; yes, had indeed caused the tableware to tremble from its' sheer force and volume. Even Kurama looked rather impressed, marveling at the shaking silverware and plates until it eventually died down.

Grunting with relief, Naruto grinned and patted his belly proudly. "Phew, h-heh, now THAT'S how you do it!" bragged the blonde. Kurama, on the other hand, giggled and held his paw up for a high five, which Naruto promptly returned.

"Okay, I gotta admit, that was a good one, Naruto!" giggled Kurama, though there was an imminent 'buuuuuut' clearly hidden beneath his remark. "...buuuuuuuut we still got a buncha soda left, and if ya think I can't beat that, you're gonna be sorely mistaken..."

Naruto grinned toothily and nudged the young fox in the arm playfully. "Oh, I'm sure you can...but if you think that's the best I got to offer? You're in for an unpleasant surprise, kiddo..."

"H-heh, weeeeeell, I wouldn't say 'master', I mean, ya gotta hear Natsu! When he lets out a GOOD one, I swear, it sounds like a dragon's invading the village! Although...that's probably cause when he DOES let out a huge burp, it's usually accompanied by fire..."

"Heh, yeah well, no matter how good this pink haired guy might think he is, he ain't ever met-come again...?" Naruto blinked dully as his mind caught up and processed what Kurama had just said.

"Yeah, remember? Natsu eats fire AND he can breathe it!"

At that, Kurama chuckled and rubbed the back of his head sheepishly, "I mean, it can KINDA get awkward if there's property damage, b-but everyone's REALLY understanding, since he always uses his powers to keep everyone safe!" Kurama smiled warmly as he glanced back at Naruto and added, "Like I said, he's a lot like you! Always puttin' others before himself and doing whatever he can to keep his friends or even complete strangers safe!"

Despite himself, Naruto couldn't help but smile at the notion. "Heh, sounds like someone I definitely wouldn't mind hangin' out with sometime..."

Kurama beamed at this, but simply said, "You two would get along really well."

"I believe it," started Naruto, before wrapping his arm around his little buddy and tugging him close in a brotherly fashion. "Still, cool as he sounds, you're still always gonna be the coolest person I'll ever know, kiddo..."

Kurama smiled warmly and gratefully, nuzzling against Naruto gently with his eyes squinted shut. As they peaked open however, Kurama's smile immediately faded as he noticed Naruto a bit misty eyed.

"N-Naruto...? W-what's wrong...?" Asked the young fox with feint but evident concern in his voice.

To his relief, Naruto was still smiling and simply chuckled as he blinked the tears away, tugging Kurama closer as he looked down at his friend and said, "...Nothing, it's just...just us, hangin' out, having this lil contest, doin' all this together is just...really great..."

Naruto's smile softened a bit as he added, "...I may've always been alone as a kid...and I got by, but, deep down, I always wanted...just...SOME semblance of family...and, for as long as I've known ya, little buddy...you've been the closest thing to a lil brother that I've ever had, and I just...I want you to know how grateful I am for that...how grateful I am to see how much you've grown, how good you're doing...and how...how even after all that, you still care enough to come back here just to see me..."

Kurama didn't say anything. He simply sat, feeling himself get far more misty eyed as he smiled ever warmly at his friend and; like clockwork, hugged him tightly. "That's cause you're than just my best friend, Naruto...you're...you're my big brother...in every sense of the word..." He hugged tighter and tighter, nuzzling against Naruto with immense gratitude while Naruto pulled him close right back.

"H-heh, sorry, I know that kinda sounds silly, but-"

"-Don't be...lil bro..."

At that, Kurama's tears quickly streamed down his cheeks as his heart filled with an immense amount of warmth and gratitude for his dear friend. Finally, Kurama opened his eyes and smiled warmly at Naruto who smiled back. "...T-thank you...thank you so much, Narut-OOOOOOOOOORRRP!"

...Aaaaaand instantaneously, Kurama's expression of gratitude quickly turned to one of immense embarrassment as he promptly covered his mouth with both paws after accidentally letting out a massive belch at the end of his sentence.

"H-heh, s-sorry..."

But Naruto was too busy laughing to respond. "Haha! Ahhh, don't be, lil bro! We're having a burping contest, remember?" As if to emphasize this point, Naruto thumped his chest and let out a belch that easily rivaled Kurama's, earning a fit of laughter from the young fox as the two eventually disengaged and grabbed their sodas once again.

"Well then, that's enough sappy stuff, time for me to show you how a MAN burps!" taunted Naruto.

Kurama grinned impishly and said, "Bring it on, big bro!" And, after a competitive but playful glance and grin, the two were once again chugging away...
11211222211222211122222111212.title: They only drink some soda before belching

choices: The two polish off their second towers, then another, then another...
As they eat, Kurama's belt starts to feel snug...
112112222112222111222221112121.content:
As before, the two chugged and chugged away at their bottles of soda, neither one willing to fall behind...though unable to resist smiling as they glanced at one another. After all, even if this WAS a competition, it was purely in good fun. Kurama, in particular, seemed to be enjoying himself, as he leaned back in his chair, continuing to kick his legs a little bit.

Naruto smiled warmly at this sight; he'd always been able to find joy in the littlest things as a kit, and he was exceedingly happy to see that that hadn't changed in the slightest. Smiling even wider, he returned his attention to his bottle of cola and resumed chugging.

As they gulped away and the level of fluid in the liters slowly but surely depleted, their bellies swelled as they ingested the carbonated fluid. It wasn't anywhere near enough to start forcing their shirts up, at least not yet, but the bumps under their shirts noticeably bulged larger and larger, gradually pushing out in front of them. This was not lost on either the boy nor the fox, who merely grinned and chugged even faster. After all, if their bellies were filling up with that much carbonation, no doubt they'd be able to let loose with some pretty damn explosive belches once they finished....

With this thought spurring them on, they tilted their bottles, now containing only about a fourth of liquid each, back further, causing the liquid to flow faster and faster down their throats, and their bellies to push out and swell up quicker and quicker.

Finally, with a great sigh, Naruto and Kurama slammed their liters, now bone-dry, to the table and leaned back in their seats, their hands resting contentedly on their bellies. "Ahhhhh," Kurama sighed, smacking his belly (and giggling as it ever-so-slightly sloshed with all the cola packed into it), "now THAT'S refreshment!"

Naruto grinned at his young buddy, even as he massaged his belly through his shirt. "No argument here, lil' bro." Kurama grinned right back, eyes absolutely lighting up at the usage of 'lil' bro.' Suddenly, the blonde felt his gut churning and he smirked. "'Course, that's only half of it..."

Kurama, feeling his own tummy gurgling with the sheer amount of cola packed into it, smirked in return. "Heh, yeah..." Eyes gleaming, he began eagerly kneading his belly, taking in great gulps of air as he did so. Naruto, grinning eagerly, began doing the same.

As they kneaded their bellies and gulped down air, they felt the pressure in their bellies steadily increasing, the carbonation within whipping up an absolute frenzy. Undeterred, they continued on, kneading ever faster and gulping in ever-larger quantities of air.

Almost...there... both thought as the pressure rose. The pressure built, and built, and built....

...until Naruto, smirking, opened his mouth wide....

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!

...and let loose with what had to be one of the loudest, longest belches on record. The table, silverware, and even the floor vibrated from the sheer intensity of the burp. Kurama, even as he continued kneading his own belly, stared in a mix of awe and admiration at the huge burp. Woooooooowwwww, the young fox marveled. That's one of the best burps I've ever heard!

The young fox grinned impishly. Still, if he thinks I'm gonna just let that go....he's got another thing coming....

Finally, the burp wound down, and Naruto sighed happily, slumping back in his chair. "Ohhh man, did I need that," the boy muttered, happily patting his stomach. He turned toward Kurama, and his expression turned playfully smug. "Well? What didja think?"

Kurama shrugged. "Eh, it was OK," he replied, trying to appear unimpressed...and failing entirely, due to the huge grin on his face. Luckily, he was able to replace that with a confident smirk. "Still...that doesn't have ANYTHING on this..." As Naruto stared at the young fox in anticipation, the young Tailed Beast closed his eyes, kneaded his belly, winced a bit as he felt the pressure reach near-bursting point....

...then, grinning, he opened his muzzle, wide as he possibly could....

*BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBB BBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!!!!

.....and let loose with the most monstrous, most lengthy, most loud belch that NAruto had ever heard. As Naruto stared, flabbergasted, the silverware, table, floor, and yes, even the inn room's furniture vibrated rapidly, and he could have sworn he felt his chair shaking too. As he watched (and felt) the burp drag on, he could only think one word:

What.

Finally, the burp wound down, and Kurama went limp in his seat. "Oh...oh man," he muttered, letting one arm hang at his side as the other leisurely massaged his belly. "That...that has to be a new record..."

Then, looking up at Naruto, he managed a smirk. "Well, Naruto? Whaddaya think?"

The young ninja said nothing at first, only staring at Kurama in slack-jawed amazement. Then...

"That. Was. AWESOME!" Naruto exclaimed, giving Kurama a hearty pat on the back (and forcing a small belch out of him). "I've...I've never HEARD anyone belch that loud....OR that long!"

Kurama's eyes lit up. "You mean it?"

Naruto held up a fist. "Of course I do!" Kurama, getting his meaning, beamed and bumped fists with his friend. "I said I'd alwyas be straight with you after we got your situation sorted out in Termina, didn't I?"

Kurama winced a bit at the reminder, but he quickly pushed it away; that was in the past, and he had a bright future ahead of him. "That you did, Naruto, that you did. And," he added, smirking, "I'm gonna be straight with you about this, too..."

Naruto blinked, curious. "Straight about what?"

Kurama winked. "That I'm gonna finish my second food tower before you finish yours!" Then, before Naruto could react, Kurama began digging into his tower eagerly.

Naruto, in spite of himself, smiled. "Heh, thanks for waiting up," Naruto groused playfully, before digging into his own food tower...
112112222112222111222221112121.title: Battle of the Belch

choices: Kurama plays it safe and unbuckles
Kurama decides to try and bust his buckle
1121122221122221112222211121212.content:
The two were ever relentless in their massive onslaught of food consumption. Despite filling their stomachs to the brim with soda not mere moments ago, they were each ripping into their meals at rapid paces. Occasionally, glancing back at each other with competitive but all in all, good natured grins across their mugs, the two youths took ample bite after bite of various delights. From drumsticks, to tempura, to even some fried shrimp, both Naruto and Kurama would wolf it down, sometimes even letting their cheeks bulge comically, before chomping up the delights and gulping down the comically huge mouthfuls of food. And, after a sigh of relief, a slight belch, or a rub of the tummy to coax some relaxation in their gullets, they'd head right back for more. Naturally; of course, as this continued, both Naruto and Kurama's bellies gradually began to swell up as they took on more and more food.

So much so, in fact, that a sliver of flesh had now been exposed beneath Naruto's shirt. Meanwhile, Kurama's own bloated belly had not only caused a sliver of orange fur to appear beneath his shirt and open vest, but his stomach had also began to push forward considerably against the front of his pants.

What Kurama had yet to take into account, however, was his belt buckle still fastened nice and tight against his strained waist. And with competitive edge getting the better of him, the young fox didn't seem likely to catch on any time soon…

Finally, after a good while, the two stopped for a moment and sighed with immense satisfaction, having their plates picked completely clean…in perfect unison. Giggling merrily, Kurama playfully jabbed Naruto in the arm and said, "It's a tie! Just like how you'n Kiba always used to compete!"

Burping softly, Naruto chuckled then shook his head. "Nah, not even dog-breath can wolf down THAT much food and finish at the same time as me. H-heh, gotta say, kiddo, you've really come a long way." Kurama beamed with pride at that remark, then reached for another liter to wash down his second tower of food.

Naruto, simply leaned back in his chair, marveling for a moment.

"Ohh man, I ain't inhaled that much food that fast in ages!" exclaimed Naruto as he patted his belly with both hands, grinning as he did so. Kurama, on the other hand, unscrewed a bottle of what appeared to be a ginger ale, and took a hearty few gulps straight from the liter itself, before placing it on the table and smacking his lips. "Hehe, believe it or not, but for me, it's actually become more and more of a regular thing!" remarked Kurama before letting out another loud belch and patting his belly proudly.

Naruto simply smirked.

"You'n Natsu get competitive with food too, eh?"

At that, Kurama beamed and nodded eagerly. "Ohhh yes indeedy! We go on a buncha jobs together, and usually after we get 'em done, we like to celebrate by stuffin' our faces with whatever's available!" He then chuckles and rubs the back of his head a bit sheepishly as he adds, "…My other friend, Lucy…she, errr, kinda gets annoyed when we overdo it though…says it's kinda…embarrassing, b-but she's still a really nice and caring person."

Naruto couldn't help but laugh uproariously at that, recalling the many times his own pals had said the very same thing about him. "Haha, ohhh yeah, been there and then some, kiddo…" He said, lightly patting Kurama's shoulder. "I wouldn't take it too personally…most people ya meet ain't gonna enjoy stuffin' their faces even half as much as WE do."

Giggling, Kurama nodded eagerly and said, "That's what makes it so much fun! It's OUR special…thing!" Oddly enough, this earned a warm smile from Naruto as he nodded and ruffled the youngsters head playfully. "H-heh…never thought of it that way before…"

Then, Naruto's grin grew a bit impish as he leaned down and added, "…and my thing is finishing this next tower's food before you do, lil bro!"

"In your dreams, big bro!" responded Kurama eagerly, still internally touched by the 'lil bro' remark from his 'big bro'. And in no time at all, the two had piled on their plates with even more food than before and wasted no time savagely tearing into it like no tomorrow. Naruto was chomping into two drumsticks at a time while Kurama grabbed yet another hearty burger and took a nice, ample chomp, chewing vigorously as he did so.

However, as the young Tailed Beast ate and ate, his ever expanding belly continued to protrude against his pants, pressing against it more and more until the belt buckle had begun to constrict the young creatures tummy.

Stopping the moment it hit him, Kurama winced a bit and set his burger down for a moment. Catching this, Naruto also stopped and glanced at his friend.

"Everything cool, kiddo?"

"Oh, y-yeah, heh," responded Kurama as one hand began idly rubbing his belly in attempt to sooth the discomfort. "Think my gut just got snagged by my belt. H-heh, kinda forgot I was wearin' it…"

Chuckling, Naruto shook his head, more to himself than Kurama. "Ahhh yes, been there too, h-heh, as you've seen, like, tons'uh times…" With a shrug, he turned again to the fox and added, "Probably gonna wanna unbuckle that before it starts hurtin', right?"

Tilting his head up, Kurama thought on that for a moment...
1121122221122221112222211121212.title: As they eat, Kurama's belt starts to feel s...

choices: They get so caught up in the flavors, they don't notice their pants tightening..
They notice their pants buttons starting to get tight
11211222211222211122222111212121.content:
Lowering his head, Kurama turned to Naruto and gave a lopsided grin. "Eh, yeah, probably." He gave his belly a few hearty pats. "Much fun as it would be to bust my belt, I don't think this thing's anywhere near big enough yet, and I wanna eat without having to focus on how damn tight it's getting." He gave Naruto a bit more of a sincere smile. "Besides, I wanna be able to enjoy eating with my best buddy as much as possible." Naruto said nothing, but merely grinned widely in response, squinting his eyes shut.

Grinning back in return, Kurama returned his attention to his constricted waistline. Sticking his tongue out the side of his muzzle in concentration, he reached his hands down below his belly, smirking in satisfaction as his hands found his belt. Alright. Now for the hard part. Squinting his eyes in concentration, he began fumbling around, trying to work around his somewhat-stuffed belly to get a good grip on his buckle. There were a few instances where he appeared to have it, only for it to slip out of his grasp, and for him to grunt in frustration before going back in.

Naruto glanced over at Kurama. "Uh...you need some help there, little buddy?" The question was asked lightly, but with a tinge of concern.

Kurama did not move his head, but he turned his eyes toward Naruto, smiling. "Th-thanks, Naruto," the young fox replied, a tone of gratitude in his voice, "but trust me, this isn't the first time I've had to unbuckle." He winked at the human. "I'll be fine."

Naruto smirked back. "Well, if you're sure..." Kurama chuckled, nodded, and returned his attention to his belt. He continued fumbling with it, trying to get a good enough grasp on it to undo it.

"Rrggh...come...on..." Kurama grunted, once again sticking his tongue out the side of his mouth. Naruto watched, frowning, and was just about to volunteer his help again when Kurama finally let out a triumphant "Ha!"

"Gotcha, ya little sucker," Kurama muttered, smirking as his hands finally closed around his buckle. Carefully moving his hand-paws, he grabbed the leather strap, pulled it away from the piece of metal that had been threaded through, and pulled the loosened strap out of the buckle. As soon as it was pulled completely free, he let out a sigh of relief, slumping back in his seat even as his tummy bulged out slightly, and both sides of the now-undone belt stuck out to either side of him, framing his belly. "Ohhh man, did I need that..." Kurama muttered, idly patting his tummy with one hand and letting his tongue loll out the side of his muzzle.

Naruto smiled warmly at his friend. "Heh; feelin' better, lil' bro?" he asked, even as he noted how simultaneously goofy and adorable Kurama looked with an undone belt, patting his tummy and sticking his tongue out.

At this, Kurama turned toward Naruto and beamed widely. "Oh yeah, a LOT better!" the young fox exclaimed, his eyes lighting up. "Feels like I could eat way more, now!"

Naruto laughed. "Good to know," he replied, before getting a mischievous smile on his face. "After all," he added, poking Kurama's stuffed belly, which now showed just a little bit more of his furry belly than before, "I KNOW that's nowhere near the biggest your gut can get!"

Kurama laughed, rubbing the back of his head. "Heh, trust me, I know!" Smirking mischievously in return, he poked Naruto's own belly, which still only showed a sliver of flesh through his shirt. "Still, if I'm remembering right-and I KNOW I am-this isn't anywhere near the biggest yours can get, either!"

Naruto chuckled in return, lightly punching the young fox in the shoulder. "And trust me, lil' bro, I ain't stoppin' till it's BIGGER than that!"

Kurama gave Naruto a punch in the arm in return. "Heh; took the words right outta my mouth, big bro!" He appeared thoughtful for a moment. "Buuuuut, considering we're eating 'till we can't feel our feet anymore, something tells me that won't be a problem..."

Naruto laughed heartily. "Heh, I hear ya!" the blonde exclaimed, patting his own belly for emphasis. However, his smile soon faded, replaced by a thoughtful look.

"Naruto?" Kurama asked, tilting his head. "Are you OK?"

"H-huh?" Looking up, Naruto blinked at Kurama. "O-oh yeah! I'm great! I was just thinkin'..." seeing he had Kurama's attention, he continued. "...we're probably not gonna be in much shape to be walking around too much after we're done..."

Kurama stared at Naruto. "Yeah...?" he muttered, trying desperately to conceal the hope on his face. I-is he...

Naruto winked at the young Nine-Tails. "...whaddaya say ya spend the night here?"

Kurama's eyes widened. "R-really?"

Naruto chuckled, wrapping an arm around Kurama's shoulders and tugging the fox close. "Yep!" He indicated the bed. "You can even have the bed; besides, I think this room might have a spare futon or tw--"

Whatever else he had to say was cut off as Kurama leaned over into Naruto's side and hugged him tightly. "...thanks, Naruto," Kurama muttered, closing his eyes even as he smiled.

Composing himself, Naruto patted the young Tailed Beast on the back, smiling warmly in return. "Hey, you think I'm just gonna let my little buddy waddle back to wherever he's staying in the dark?" Kurama, even as he hugged Naruto, giggled at the mental imagery. "Just, uh, I hope you don't mind sleepin' in what you're wearing; I don't think any of my stuff's gonna fit ya..."

To his surprise, Kurama lifted his head and smiled at Naruto. "Eh, don't worry about that," he replied. "I'm not gonna hafta sleep in what I'm wearing." He winked at Naruto. "I picked up a few tricks at the guild...no telling!"

A bit confused, Naruto nonetheless smiled. "Well, so long as ya got everything sorted out..." His eyes fell upon the vast bounty of goodies on the table. "...why don't we get back to stuffing our faces?"

Kurama followed his eyes. "Thought ya'd never ask!" The young Tailed Beast exclaimed merrily, disentangling himself from Naruto and once again facing the table. The two shared a grin. "Ya ready?"

Naruto nudged Kurama playfully. "As I'll ever be."

With that last note, they gave each one final grin, then dug right back into their goodies, shoveling chicken and tempura into their mouths, and interspersing that with bites of pizza and hearty swigs of cola.

As they continued to eat and drink...
11211222211222211122222111212121.title: Kurama plays it safe and unbuckles

choices: "Guess we gotta bust our pants..."
"Whadduya say we see who can be the first to bust their pants?"
112112222112222111222221112121211.content:
The young man and younger fox resume tearing into their respective feast, both chowing down relentlessly and successfully stuffing their gullets with as much as they could possibly fit into their all-too-eager maws. Naruto held two slices of pizza; one in each hand, and in rapid succession, he chomped down one slice within a few ample bites, and with gusto, proceeded to do the exact same thing with the other slice. With both completely demolished, he licked his lips, and promptly reached for two more to repeat the cycle.

As he did so, Kurama grabbed yet another burger. This one...a triple decker...

At this, Kurama couldn't help but gape for a moment..

"Woooooooow..." the young fox exclaimed, eyes glimmering with astonishment at the sheer mass of meat, sauces, and grilled veggies that awaited him. Gulping down one of his slices, Naruto smacked his lips and smirked at the sight of his young buddy gaping at the massive burger he was holding up like a long lost piece of art.

"Heh, ain't she a beaut?" chimed Naruto. But Kurama was still too flabbergasted to respond.

"I've...I've never seen a burger with so much beef before...t-t-THREE patties...?! And look the size of these things! They're HUGE!"

Naruto grinned as he set his remaining slice aside and grabbed one for himself, admiring the sheer size. "Can't argue with'cha there, lil bro...I ain't EVER seen burgers this monstrous back home..."

He then turned to his friend and playfully nudged him with his elbow. "Whelp, no sense gawkin' at 'em, right? We still got tons more to go!" At that, Kurama; snapped out of his trance, turned to his dear friend and grinned eagerly. "You're right! And if this behemoth tastes anywhere near as awesome as it smells..."

The two had lost themselves for a moment...practically salivating at the sight of their titanic burgers...until, with one last grin, the two opened their mouths wider than ever...and CHOMPED into their burgers. The sheer size caused some sauce and burger residue to stain the sides of their mouths, but the two youths were utterly beseeched by the raw, juicy flavors now coating the insides of their mouths, before they both took a hearty gulp in perfect unison...now taking a silent moment to gaze upon the beauty of this massive, and infinitely tasty burger...

...Aaaaaand promptly, the two dug their faces right in for more, tearing chunk after chunk of burger out, chewing rapidly and gulping it down before digging right in for more...

So utterly transfixed were these two youngsters, that they hadn't realized just how much they'd eaten already. And as they ate and ate, their tummies continued to expand more and more, with no signs of slowing down in remote sight.

...That is, until the two youths had reached about the half way point of their monstrous burgers

Having reached the half way point, the two stopped for a moment to catch their breaths; both leaning back in their chairs and rubbing their bellies tenderly. Naruto's belly had swollen to the point where the bottom of his shirt now rested just below his belly button, while Kurama fared about the same.

"Ohhhh man..." groaned Naruto as he continued to rub his belly soothingly. "...I ain't stoppin' anytime soon, but damn, these burgers are somethin' else, ain't they, kiddo?"

Kurama opened his mouth to respond, but all that came out was a massive belch, followed by a sheepish chuckle. Massaging his own immensely swollen belly, Kurama merely smacked his chops and grinned. "You said it, big bro...jeez, I've never even SEEN a burger this huge...let alone tried to eat one..."

Naruto chuckled and playfully slugged his younger friend in the arm. "Hehe, 'tried to?' Don'tchu worry, lil bro, you'll not only try, but you'll DEMOLISH this sucker. I guarantee!"

Despite an undeniable fullness, Kurama beamed happily and gratefully at his pal. It was one thing that always gave Kurama hope...that no matter how much he may have ever doubted himself, Naruto always believed in him...and no matter the hardship, so long as Kurama had that kind of assurance...so long as his best friend had faith, that was almost always all he ever needed to soldier on...

Instead, Kurama grinned and said, "We'll both demolish 'em!" His grin turned impish shortly after as he added, "...Afterall...I can still feel my feet..."

Grinning none-too-innocently himself, Naruto ruffled the young Tailed Beasts' head and said, "Then let's fix that, kiddo!"

The two then reached over and took that first ample bite...then stopped shortly after gulping it down...

"Whoa..." muttered Naruto as he placed his burger down and rubbed his belly in discomfort. He turned and saw Kurama doing the same, and was about to ask if he was okay, when suddenly...in perfect unison...the two stopped, and glanced down past their bellies, and both reached down, to the front of their pants.

Sure enough, their stomachs had swollen so greatly that they were now being constricted by the front of their pants.

"Ah crap," muttered Naruto, "forgot to unzip my pants...again..."

Kurama, trying to reach for his own pants, chuckled sheepishly and added, "H-heh, I was so busy fumbling with my buckle, I kinda just forgot I even had a zipper for a sec..."

The two chuckled a bit at their shared lapse, then promptly attempted to unzip their pants to no avail. Naruto debated seeing if they should unzip each others pants...aaaaand promptly shuddered at how weird that sentence would sound coming out of his mouth. So, instead, he turned to young Kurama and, with a surprisingly mischievous grin on his face, said...
112112222112222111222221112121211.title: They don't notice their pants beginning to tighten

choices: They finish all the food and go right for dessert
They finish all the food, but have to take a break before dessert
1121122221122221112222211121212111.content:
Kurama blinked, even as a grin slowly formed on his muzzle. "Ya mean, like I did today at the contest?"

Naruto smirked in return, playfully poking Kurama's belly. "EXACTLY like you did today at the contest."

Kurama's eyes lit up. "Ooh, count me in!" He looked at the spread before them, rubbing his belly eagerly as he did so. "Whaddaya think would be the quickest way to do it?" His eyes flitted over to the bottles of soda. "I mean, we COULD just drink a ton of soda, fill up our guts enough to pop our buttons..."

Naruto folded his arms, appearing to be in thought. "Hmmm...well, we COULD do that..." His eyes roved over the various food items on the table. "...but me, personally? I feel more like stuffing my craw with food till my pants can't take it anymore."

Kurama smirked, folding his arms behind his head and looking at Naruto. "Heh, I know what ya mean: stuffing treat after treat into your mouth, feeling your gut get bigger and bigger, till that bad boy pops off...ain't no feeling quite like it."

Naruto laughed, giving Kurama a friendly smack on the back. "I hear ya, buddy; stuffing our faces it is!" His eyes scanned the goodies on the table. "Whaddaya think we should eat to fill 'em up? I mean, I kinda wanna bust my button as soon as I can so I can enjoy eating with ya."

Kurama laughed, a burst of warmth blooming in his chest. "Took the words right outta my mouth!" He, too, looked at the table, until his eyes settled on something. "Let's do tempura; I mean, it's easy to pick up, easy to cram into your mouth, ya can fit a ton in..."

Naruto grinned, loading his plate up with tempura. "Tempura it is!" Beaming at his 'big bro', Kurama promptly started doing the same with his plate, until each had a veritable tower of fried seafood on their plates.

Naruto glanced at Kurama, smiling. "Ready?"

The young fox nodded happily. "Ready!"

Then, without another moment's hesitation, the two immediately dove in, cramming handful after handful of tempura into their mouths, chewing rapidly, and gulping down the massive mouthfuls before immediately going back in for more. Ocassionally, they would find themselves getting a bit parched and took a quick swig of soda before diving back in, but otherwise, they were completely relentless in the gorging.

As they ate, they felt their waistlines getting tighter and tighter as their bellies, constricted as they were, slowly but surely swelled. Up, up, up their respective shirts slid, until they each rested an inch or two above their navels. They winced as they felt the tightness in their waists increase, but they soldiered on, not wanting to give up...and not wanting to spend a single moment more of discomfort in each other's company than was absolutely necessary.

Bigger and bigger their bellies bulged, and tighter and tighter their waistlines became, until, finally, their pants buttons began to fray. Grinning as they realized this, they ate ever faster, cramming ever-larger mouthfuls into their waiting maws, gulping them down with only the barest minimum of chewing necessary to force them down. They winced every now and then at a particularly difficult mouthful, but they quickly shook it off and continued gorging.

All the while, their pants buttons continued to fray, the threads snapping one by one and the small disks loosening, until they were each holding on by the thinnest of threads. Sensing that their buttons were on the verge of snapping, they each gave one another devil-may-care grins, scooped up the biggest handful yet (with TWO hands each), and crammed the whole entire thing into their waiting mouths. Their cheeks bulged comically, and they barely managed to close their mouths as they chewed slowly. Then, when each of their mouthfuls had been chewed to their satisfaction, they took a great breath through their nostrils and took a single, great, mighty gulp. Miraculously, the masses of food were successfully swallowed, the bulges traveling visibly down their throats.

And, as they plopped into their already swollen bellies, their buttons finally decided that that was the final straw.

POP!

With an audible snapping noise, their buttons burst off their waists in perfect unison, shooting high above the table and thudding into the wall opposite. As though the floodgates had opened, their stomachs violently bulged outward, seeming to grow considerably in the span of a few short seconds. Their shirts hiked further above their belly buttons, and their zippers pulled themselves down several teeth, exposing a glimpse of their respective undergarments.

As all this happened, Naruto and Kurama let loose with a huge sigh of relief, slumping back in utter contentment as their arms flopped to their sides. "Ohhh man," Kurama moaned, sluggishly bringing a hand up to massage his belly, "that feels SO much better!"

Naruto smacked his belly heartily, grinning as it bounced and sloshed a bit. "Heh, you were right, lil' buddy; nothin' quite like eating so much your button comes blasting off!"

Kurama grinned at the older boy. "Heh, yeah; nothin' quite like feeling all that pressure go blasting away at once!" He brought his other hand up to his belly, massaging the exposed, furry appendage with both hands now.

Naruto burped, licking his lips as he did so. "Yeah, it's something else, ain't it? In fact..." His eyes roved over the goodies on the table. "I feel like I could eat more...WAY more!" He smirked at his "little bro". "After all, I dunno about you, but I'm pretty sure I can still feel my feet...."

Kurama wiggled his own feet, grinning. "Yep, same here." He licked his chops at the sight of all the food still left on the table, rubbing his hands together eagerly. "Well, then..." He looked toward Naruto, smirking good-naturedly. "Shall we?"

In response, Naruto grabbed the remainder of his massive burger and began taking huge bites out of it. Giggling a bit at the sight, Kurama did the same with his. Their bellies bulged bigger with every few bites they took of their mammoth burgers, slowly forcing their shirts up higher and their zippers down further. In fact, they were so enthralled by both the flavor AND the newfound space in their bellies that they polished the burgers off in record time. Letting out a couple of satisfied belches, they grinned at each other, and immediately began laying into the remaining food on the table...
1121122221122221112222211121212111.title: "Guess we gotta bust our pants..."

choices: Sundae time!
Kurama wants a few more moments to rest up
11211222211222211122222111212121112.content:
The two youths had successfully demolished their massive burgers each, and with their pants no longer causing any discomfort, both Naruto and Kurama were free to stuff their faces to their hearts content. Which they did. Considerably...

Naruto was stuffing various egg rolls into his mouth, chomping away and grinning merrily at the burst of flavors, from pork, chives, chicken and even shrimp. It was damn near impossible for the blonde teen to keep away, as he crammed more and more into his all-too-eager maw, chomping away voraciously as his cheeks bulged rather comically, until he took a remarkably hearty gulp, sighed with relief...only to stuff for egg rolls right back into his maw, and repeat the cycle again and again and again...

Kurama, on the other hand, was mercilessly tearing into dozens of various chicken wings; boneless, BBQ, Buffalo, the works! He'd tear the meat clean off the bones in mere moments, and shortly after, stuff his craw full of boneless pieces of chicken and chomp away, beaming happily at the absolutely irresistible flavor each one offered. And with no buttons holding his ample belly back, both he and Naruto were eating at a rapid pace. Both youths more than eager to fill their gullets with absolutely every single goodie their feast had to offer.

Within no time at all, Naruto had downed every single egg roll set before him, and Kurama was now licking his fingers of BBQ sauce as his pile of wings was little more than a pile of bones. Licking their lips eagerly, the two glanced at one another, smirking impishly as they did so...

"So...can ya still feel y'er feet, kiddo?" asked Naruto, earning an eager nod from the young fox.

"Guess that can only mean one thing..." Kurama replied, grinning toothily at his 'big bro,' who grinned none-too-innocently right back.

"...We gotta pack away every last ounce of food on the table..."

And without so much as uttering a word, the two just grabbed whatever they could reach at this point; pizza slices, dumplings, chicken, and everything in between, and just went to town. The two were like eating machines with no stops in sight. Slowly but surely, that once seemingly infinite plethora of food was dwindling, as more and more was filling their bellies, which continued to expand and protrude outward more and more with each passing moment.

But neither one was letting up...

Entire pizza slices downed in two massive bites at a time, dumplings and beef chunks stuffed into their mouths like mints, egg rolls scarfed down like nothing. On and on and on this went, as both youths would occasionally stop to catch their breath briefly, rub their bellies soothingly, belch to make as much room as possible in their guts, or just smile at one another as their progress continued. The two soldiered on like no tomorrow for a good, rampant, ample while; bellies swelling up with each passing moment...

Until finally, with a tremendous and perfectly unison sigh...

Both Naruto and Kurama leaned back in their chairs, rested their hands atop their immensely rounded bellies, and smiled goofy, blissful smiles, as finally, every single ounce of food had been completely wolfed down, and boy howdy did it show...

Naruto's belly had rounded to the point where it was nearly touching the table, while his t-shirt was rested now several inches above his belly button. Kurama's orange furred belly fared roughly the same, with his vest hiked upward at the sides and his shirt now only covering his chest.

The two rested in their chairs, caressing their swollen tummies with both hands soothingly as a look of pure bliss and satisfaction took their faces. Letting out a long and loud belch, Naruto smacked his lips, turned to his 'lil bro,' and; with a slightly mischievous grin, said, "Ahhh, whelp, I dunno bout'chu, kiddo...buuuuuut I can still feel my feet..."

Kurama turned to his 'big bro' and smiled right back. "Ohhh, somethin' tells me that's gonna change fairly soon," the young fox replied, eying the massive tubs of ice cream and all the goodies that came along with them for emphasis. Then, a brief look of discomfort grew over the young Kyuubi's face, but before Naruto could inquire if his friend was okay, Kurama slammed his fist against his chest and let out a HUGE belch, once again, easily topping Naruto's.

"Phew, h-heh, that was a good one!" Kurama said as he proudly patted his belly. Naruto simply smirked and playfully slugged Kurama in the arm.

"Oh sure, ya ALWAYS gotta show me up, don'tcha," Naruto said playfully, earning a giggle from the young fox. Then, Naruto's grin turned impish. "Well, we still got plenty of soda and ice cream left to down, and I PROMISE you, before tonight's feasting is over, I WILL out-burp you!"

Kurama simply returned with an impish and confident grin of his own and added, "Weeeell, you can TRY..."

The two chuckled softly before leaning back in their seats, massaging their tummies soothingly. "H-heh, but yeah, now that'cha 'mention' it, that WAS a lotta food. Guess a lil break wouldn't kill us, right?" Added Naruto, as Kurama nodded in agreement.

And so, both youths simply sat in their chairs for a moment, smiling in bliss, basking in the fullness of their bellies in silence and satisfaction for a good while. Then, Kurama's eyes lit up as he turned to his 'big bro.'

"...S-say, Naruto..."

"Hmm? What's up, kiddo?"

"Y'know, before, I spent so much time talkin' 'bout what I've been up to in Fiore and with my Guild...b-but we never really talked about how you've been these past few yea-errr, I mean, months, h-heh..."

Turning to his young friend, Naruto smiled and said, "Weeeeell, honestly, there ain't much to say. I've been on missions left and right, still train a bunch, spar with dog-breath, and, really, the only difference since Termina was how much tighter me'n him got..."

Then, Naruto stopped for a moment, and looked, somewhat distantly for a moment...

"...Actually...n-now that I think about...there was something else..."

Kurama glanced at his pal curiously.

"...After a long mission or a long day of sparring, I was always too exhausted to do much else besides pass out at my place, but...whenever I had a day off, and was just lazing about, I always...kinda felt...weird..."

"...Whadduya mean...?" asked Kurama.

"...Like, I never knew why, but every once in a while, I felt...lonely, like I was missing someone..." Said Naruto, before turning his attention to his young friend. "...But, with my memories back...I remember now..."

Naruto wrapped his arm around Kurama's shoulders and gently tugged him close as he smiled warmly at the young Tailed Beast, and said; plain as day, "...It was because I missed my lil bro..."

Kurama felt his chest burst with warmth, as he smiled with eternal gratitude for his dear friend, doing his best not to tear up. "...I'm sorry...trust me, I...I really wished it didn't have to be that way..."

But Naruto simply laughed and patted the young fox's back lightly. "Don't be. No matter how much I hated the idea of losing the memory of you, it was more than worth it..." Naruto then pulled Kurama back a bit and smiled down at him. "I mean, look about how awesome you turned out, kiddo! Your pals at Fiore...they may be eccentric, but seeing you now, I know that...they know what the hell they're doin', and I'm always gonna be grateful to them for giving you the great and exciting life you deserve."

It was simply too much, Kurama turned away, tearing up as he chuckled and shook his head, despite himself. "Ah jeez...again with the cry baby routine, h-heh...s-some things never change, huh..." Kurama muttered, laughing some more and wiping his face with his forearm. But Naruto simply smiled and lightly ruffled the young fox's fuzzy head.

Then, naturally, Kurama smiled and hugged Naruto's side, while Naruto smiled and returned the hug right back.

"Well...I'm here now, big brother..." Kurama said, nuzzling the teens chest softly as Naruto now found himself feeling that same, bright warmth inside his chest...and technically outside courtesy of the young fox. Then, surprisingly, Naruto chuckled lightly.

"H-heh...kinda reminds me of when you were a kit. Remember back in Termina, back when I first returned to my normal age? After all the days' events, I'd passed out on my bed, but then I woke up and found you, just snuggled on my chest, sleeping as peacefully as I'd ever seen any living creature sleep."

Kurama; despite himself, giggled lightly and said, "That's cause you were the best bed I'd ever had!"

Naruto laughed, nodding as more memories of that night kicked in. "And you should'a seen Rocket's face when he saw you like that...I SWEAR his heart froze mid-beat."

Kurama's face immediately lit up at the mention of their wise crackin' ill-tempered pal from Termina. "Hehe, guess it really was hard for Rocket to admit he had a heart, huh," Kurama remarked, earning another chuckle and nod from Naruto.

"Yeah, but his actions did all the talkin' for him. He and Groot really came through for us back then..." Naruto replied, as Kurama nodded, equally grateful for all Rocket had done. "...I just hope Rocket and Groot're stayin' outta trouble."

Kurama grinned mischievous and added, "Knowin' them? You can guarantee they ARE the trouble!" At that, the two laughed softly for a moment, then, Kurama turned to Naruto and said, "...Time really flies, doesn't it, Naruto..."

Naruto nodded, and; with a devilish grin, turned to his dear buddy and said, "...Not as soon as all Sundae's gonna fly...whadduya say, kiddo? Ready to polish this night off with one HELLUVA sundae...?"

Kurama thought for a moment...
11211222211222211122222111212121112.title: They finish all the food, but have to take a break

choices: The two disentangle, and stagger up to prepare dessert
They disentangle, but they still decide to take a few more moments rest
112112222112222111222221112121211122.content:
"Actually," Kurama began, turning back toward the table and rubbing his belly, "could we maybe wait a few more minutes? Gotta let all that food settle." To emphasize this, he patted his belly heartily, freeing a rather loud burp from his muzzle. Blushing, Kurama rubbed the back of his head. "Ehehehe....sorry about that."

In response, Naruto let rip with a belch of his own. "Don't worry about it, buddy." As Kurama giggled, the blonde smiled at him. "And sure, we can take a break; 'sides, I wanna be at my best when I'm digging into a monster sundae with my little bro." As he said this, he threw a friendly arm about Kurama's shoulders, and the young fox couldn't help but beam.

It wasn't a few seconds, though, before a thought occurred to Naruto; something he'd idly wondered about earlier in the day. "Say, Kurama..." he began, turning his head toward his friend.

Perking up, Kurama looked toward Naruto. "Yeah, Naruto?"

Seeing he had the fox's attention, Naruto continued. "Earlier today, when you showed up in your Kotetsu disguise...what was with that locket you had around your neck?"

At this, Kurama's expression seemed to sober up considerably. "Th-the locket?" he repeated, actually looking a little nervous.

Somewhat confused at this reaction, Naruto nonetheless continued. "Yeah. I mean, no offense, but it didn't really go with the rest of your look, so I'm thinkin' it wasn't part of your transformation."

Kurama chuckled nervously, rubbing the back of his head. "Yeah, well...I kinda like to keep it on me whenever I can..."

Naruto blinked. "Really?"

Kurama nodded slowly. "Y-yeah," the fox replied, almost looking a little embarrassed. "It's...it's kinda special."

Special? Naruto thought, a bit confused. Shaking that thought off-Kurama seemed sort of reluctant to talk about it, and he didn't want to force him-he instead asked, "And...where are ya keeping it now?"

At this, Kurama smiled a bit and held his hand up. To Naruto's shock, a light appeared in his hand, eventually resolving into a distinct shape. By the time it fell into Kurama's hand, it had taken the recognizable form of the locket, chain and all.

Naruto gaped. "Kurama...what..."

"Requip magic," Kurama explained. "It's a sorta magic that allows you to store stuff in a pocket dimension and summon 'em whenever ya need them." He smiled lopsidedly. "I'm nowhere near as good as Erza-she's one of my friends at Fairy Tail, and she has tons of weapons, clothes, and armor, and she can summon 'em like they're nothing!-but I can still do enough to store a few outfits, a few personal knick-knacks...ya know, that sorta thing."

Naruto nodded, only somewhat understanding. "And...ya keep that locket there a lot of the time?"

Kurama nodded, looking toward the locket in his hand. "Yeah..." he replied, a fond smiile forming on his face. "I like to keep it safe, 'cause..."

He hesitated a bit, prompting Naruto to lean in close, visibly concerned. However, before he could inquire as to what was wrong, Kurama looked toward him...and Naruto was surprised to see an almost embarrassed look on the young creature's face.

"...'cause it's one of my most prized possessions."

That took Naruto by surprise. "R-really?" Naruto asked curiously. "What's inside it?"

To his surprise, Kurama flinched a bit. "Well..."

Smiling warmly, Naruto put a hand on Kurama's shoulder. "Ya don't have to tell me if you don't want, but ya also don't have to be embarrassed about anything." The blonde winked. "Heck, if it's one of your most prizied possessions, that's good enough for me."

Kurama smiled in return, though the nervous look remained. They looked at each other for a few more moments, until Kurama gulped and asked:

"You promise you won't laugh?"

A bit surprised at the question, Naruto simply grinned and emphatically shook his head. "I promise."

Giving Naruto a grateful nod, Kurama turned back to the locket. Slowly, he turned it around so that the opening side faced in front of them, reached a finger toward it, edged it open...

...and suddenly, there was a flash of light.

Naruto winced and covered his eyes. "Wh-whoa, what the..."

"Just...just give it a sec," Kurama replied, sounding oddly subdued.

Sure enough, in the span of a few seconds, the light had died down, and Naruto cautiously lowered his arm...and gaped at the sight before him.

Kurama fidgeted a bit in his seat. "Erm...remember that one picture we all took together? Ya know, the one I took with me to Fiore?" Naruto said nothing, only nodding numbly in response. "Yeah, well...some of the guys at Fairy Tail knew people who could enhance stuff like that. So, they worked their magic, put it in a locket, and, well..." he reddened a bit. "...here ya are."

Naruto only gave a quick nod, staring at the sight that was projected from the locket toward the opposite wall.

There, standing against the wall, was a life-sized image of several individuals, all grouped together. A spiky-haired, brunette teenager, about Naruto's age, with red triangles on his cheeks and animalistic eyes, stood to the right, arms folded as he gave the camera a cocky smirk. Beside him, a gigantic white canine sat comfortably, giving the camera his best doggie smile. To his far left, what appeared to be a brown-furred, bipedal wolf with human proportions and wearing clothes winked at the camera, giving it a toothy smile and a peace sign. To the far back, what appeared to be a massive, humanoid tree stood calmly, a warm smile on its face and its arms hanging comfortably at his sides. On its shoulder, what appeared to be a bipedal raccoon with some sort of massive metal object on its back looked at the camera, arms folded in a cocky manner and the side of its muzzle turned up in an equally confident smirk. And, in the foreground, Naruto stood, beaming at the camera. On his shoulders, Kurama, there a young kit, was held comfortably on his shoulders, wearing an outfit that included a shirt with adorably oversized sleeves. Both were held up in the are, his paws barely poking out of them as he waved them about, a wide, merry grin on his muzzle.

Naruto gaped, his jaw dropping. He...he actually had that picture made into something like this...?

Seeing Naruto's dumbfounded expression, Kurama laughed nervously. "H-heh, something, isn't it? I mean, it's not perfect-it flickers every now and then-but whenever I'm feeling down, it's sorta a reminder of some of the best days of my life." Naruto turned toward him at this, his mouth still gaping. "The days when I met some of the best friends I could ever ask for...the days I was finally allowed to live my own life..." he paused, looking at Naruto. "...the days I met my big brother."

Naruto stared at Kurama, completely lost for words...though his eyes started to get rather misty-looking. Slightly worried, Kurama tilted his head. "N-Naruto? Are you OK---"

He gasped as, without warning, Naruto lunged toward him, wrapping his arms around Kurama and pulling him in tight for a hug. "N-Naruto?" Kurama stammered. The blonde's only reply was to hug the fox even harder.

At this, Kurama's shock faded...and his own eyes began misting up. His muzzle trembling slightly, he threw his arms about Naruto's upper body, hugging him back. Neither said anything for a moment. Then...

"....I love you, little brother..." Naruto muttered in an unusually hushed voice.

Closing his eyes shut even as tears squeezed out of them, Kurama sniffed. "....I love you too, big brother..."

With that, the two of them lapsed into silence once again, neither letting up in their close embrace for a good, long while.

Then...
112112222112222111222221112121211122.title: Locket Memories

choices: The duo trailblaze through the frozen delight
Someone gets a gnarly case of brain freeze
1121122221122221112222211121212111221.content:
Time didn't matter. The ample abundance of sweet cold treats didn't matter. Not even the immensely bloated midsections of the young man and younger fox mattered. For these two youths; in this very moment, all that mattered to either one, was the other, and the true and genuine brotherly bond and love these two shared for one another. Granted, both had an abundance of friends from their respective worlds, some very very close friends that they would fight to the ends of the world for. Yet, none that had truly become the only semblance of family either creature truly had...

And so, their embrace continued. Both Naruto and Kurama hugged each other tight, eyes shut as tears streamed down their cheeks, and the softest of smiles formed over both Naruto's face and Kurama's muzzle. No words were spoken, as none were needed. The two youths simply embraced one another, until finally, they opened their eyes and lightly disengaged.

"H-heh...sorry," Kurama muttered, wiping his eyes with his forearm, "...me'n the waterworks, right?"

Naruto simply chuckled, softly wiping his own face then playfully jabbing his young friend in the arm. "Nothin' to be ashamed of, lil bro...just means y'er honest with yourself, and comfortable enough to be honest with me."

Kurama smiled warmly, still wiping his face as he turned to his dear friend, then back down at his locket. Both gazed upon it fondly.

"Y'know..." Naruto began as he examined the image a bit more, "...I remember back when Hunter first told me'n dog breath we were all stayin' in Termina for the week."

At that, Kurama chuckled and rubbed the back of his head. "You guys were pretty freaked out, huh..."

"Haha, sure were. I mean, we still had missions and everything in Konoha going on. To disappear from the face of our world to hang out in a completely new world was...well...kinda nerve wrecking at first. I mean, we thought we were gonna get into HUGE trouble for being gone so long and suddenly without even warning anybody!"

Naruto's focus shifted to all the faces in the picture, and the lovely backdrop of the lush and vibrant Termina behind them.

"...But then, we came to see why Hunter brought us to this place...it was truly magical..."

Kurama smiled, nodding in agreement as he too; gazed upon all his friends, recollecting the truly magical times they all shared in Cloctown and all the sights Termina had to offer.

"I know what'chu mean...it was such a pretty and really fun place with so much to do...and almost everyone we met was super friendly!" remarked Kurama, omitting a few choice encounters that...weren't as pleasant. Nonetheless, the young fox pushed that thought back, and giggled some more as he rubbed his bulbous tummy fondly. "And who could forget that amazing Zora cuisine?"

At that, Naruto laughed, patting his own rounded belly in agreement. "Definitely neither of us...and of course, let's not forget Rocket's totally kickass cooking'n baking goodies."

Then, Naruto's smirk became a bit more good natured as he added, "...But it wasn't just how fun and really colorful Termina was...it was about being able to share that with my closest friends..." He smiles down at Kurama and lovingly ruffles his head lightly, "...and my best friend."

Like earlier, Kurama's eyes begin to glisten, but he works up a thankful smile at his dear 'big brother' and quickly blinks his tears away.

Unlike before, a moment later, Kurama grins impishly then playfully pokes Naruto's bloated belly and says, "Yuh'know what else'll be great to share?"

Stopping, Naruto's eyes lit up as his attention immediately turns back to the ice cream.

"Oh yeaaaaah!" Naruto exclaimed, almost as if to remind himself. "H-heh, sorry, guess all the mushy stuff's got me all distracted."

Kurama simply giggled and said, "Heehee, don't worry, big bro, you ain't alone there. Buuuuuuut now that we remember..."

Not even needing an additional prompt, Naruto stumbled up to his feet, and promptly, helped his 'lil bro' do the same before the two headed over to the vast...VAST amounts of ice cream and all the treats along with them.

Gallon after gallon, treat after treat, and topping after topping; all of it, after some comical doing, found its way into a steadily increasing mountain of a sundae, until eventually, every single bit of it had been strategically dumped into the massive bowl for the two to consume.

"There it is, lil buddy...it may not be as big as the one we ate when we were young, but it's pret-ty damn close..." exclaims Naruto. Then, an impish grin grows over his face as he playfully nudges the young fox and adds, "...and besides...THIS time...it's aaaaaaall for you'n me..."

This earned another giggle from the young creature as he nodded and added, "Heehee, and of course, don't forget about all the soda we still have left."

"Hehe...ohhhh don'tchu worry, kiddo...I didn't forget..." replied Naruto with a devilish smirk across his face, before his expression lightened up and he handed the young fox a large spoon. "So," began Naruto, "...ready to chow down on this bad boy of a sundae, lil bro?"

"As if ya need tuh ask..." replied Kurama, earning a nod of approval from a pleased Naruto, before he took his own spoon, and after once last glance between the two, both youths grinned, and dug right in...
1121122221122221112222211121212111221.title: The two stagger up to prepare the ultimate dessert

choices: A loud tearing is heard
A loud, fleshy popping noise is heard
11211222211222211122222111212121112211.content:
As soon as the first spoonfuls of the frozen delight hit their tongues, Naruto and Kurama's eyes gleamed at the myriad of tastes and textures that assaulted them. Their eyes moving to look at each other, they grinned, lifted their spoons high, and proceeded to dig in with gusto.

Soon, bits of ice cream, sauce, candy, brownie, and assorted other toppings began flying every which way as both boy and fox shoveled mouthful after mouthful of the frozen behemoth before them into their eager maws. As such, it wasn't long before their efforts began making a noticeable dent in it.

Naruto powered on, grinning as he spooned mouthful after mouthful into his waiting maw, only pausing occassionally to wipe his face with his sleeve. Oh man, he thought, licking his lips and diving back in, this sundae's pretty damn good! 'Course, it has practically every flavor and topping the village had to offer... He smirked, even as he gulped down a particularly large mouthful; no one could ever say he went half-way with anything.

Kurama, in the meantime, was having the absolute time of his life as he spooned great, heaping helpings into his mouth. Mmmm...it's so yummy! Kurama thought gleefully, unable to suppress a tiny giggle...or a merry kicking of his legs. There's so many different flavors, and it's so creamy, and...

His smile became a bit more wistful, but he didn't allow himself to slow down; Naruto looked like he was enjoying himself too much to be distracted with more mushy stuff. ...and it sorta reminds me of the first meal I ever had with him...all those years ago...

A warmth bloomed in his chest as he remembered a small, grinning blonde boy, who had, practically from the minute they'd "met", never been anything but supportive, friendly, and utterly welcoming to him...even when, by all accounts, he should have hated his guts....

Kurama winced, and hoped Naruto didn't notice. No. That's not me anymore. I have my own life to live, now; my own home, my own friends...

A mix of sadness and gratefulness came over him; that fateful night in Termina, when he'd woken up from awful, awful dreams of destruction, fire, and hatred, Naruto, Hunter, Kiba, and Akamaru had told him the truth of his situation. He'd been devastated and horrified; he could never have imagined growing up into something like that...

In the end, though, all of them-Hunter, Naruto, Kiba, Akamaru, even Rocket and Groot-had come through for him, and devised a solution that would allow the adult him-the malevolent, hateful him-to reform inside of Naruto, but allow him to continue living as a separate being.

The weeks that had followed had been, hands down, the absolute happiest days of his life: playing around Clock Town, exploring all that Termina had to offer with Naruto (now at his proper age), eating so much they couldn't move afterwards...

Even when he'd been forced to say goodbye to Naruto and the others (he felt a lump in his throat at this, even as he gulped down more ice cream) and Hunter had brought him to Fiore, he had found that he had been able to settle into life there fairly easily, once the initial adjusting period had passed: he had an abundance of great friends, got to study and learn magic...and of course, things were never, ever boring at Fairy Tail, whether it was the frequent bar fights, new arrivals to the guild (he still remembered when he'd gotten back from that one job and had met Lucy; it hadn't taken long for her to become a friend), or just plain goofing off in general.

Still, he thought as he spooned more ice cream into his waiting mouth, nothin' compares to being with my big bro again... He looked fondly at Naruto, who was still engrossed in the sundae...before the young fox continued digging in with gusto. What am I doin' thinkin' all this deep stuff right now? There's ice cream to be eaten! Licking his chops, he eagerly threw himself back into the delicious dessert.

Time ticked by, and as more and more ice cream entered their bellies and the dent in the monstrosity grew, it began to show. Their bellies, having long since forced both their zippers fully open, expanded more and more; Naruto's shirt slowly slid ever higher above his navel, all while growing closer and closer to the table. Kurama's furry belly didn't fare much better; though his shirt was relatively unaffected, since it was already hiked up to his chest, the sides of his vest continued to bunch up and hike upwards further. And, as both of them pressed on, neither noticed that their fully-undone pants were nonetheless beginning to feel rather tight. What flew even lower under the radar, however, was a rather peculiar sensation in the middle of their growing tummies.

Suddenly...
11211222211222211122222111212121112211.title: The duo trailblaze through the frozen delight

choices: Naruto manages to tear his pants in no time at all...
Someone's belly starts to feel a bit tight...
112112222112222111222221112121211122111.content:
*RRRRRRIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIPPP!!!*

Naruto jumps back, a bit startled as he looks around the room alert yet notably taken back.

"The hell was that?" remarked the blond curiously as he looked around, "That almost sounded like..." Before he could finish, however, his eyes wandered towards his friends face...and sure enough, Kurama's face was redder than a cherry, even with all that orange fur concealing it. The young fox looked away evasively as he sat perfectly still, appearing jolted. Naruto turned his attention to the young fox; already catching on as he smiled playfully and tapped on the young Tailed Beasts' shoulder.

"Feelin' okay there, buddy?"

Kurama; ears perking upward, immediately turned to Naruto, eyes looking upward, and to the left, and...ANYWHERE else but Naruto's direction as he answered.

"H-huh? Oh! Y-yep! Yepyep! Just fine! H-heh! Nothin' rippin' er anything like that! Nope! Not at all! W-what pants ripping? H-heh..."

Naruto was admittedly amused by how utterly flustered Kurama was at what had happened. To the young fox's alarm, Naruto started laughing, but it was most certainly a playful laugh as he wrapped his arm around Kurama's shoulder and tugged him playfully.

"Hahaha, ahhh c'mon, lil buddy, it's ME...ya don't gotta be embarrassed or anything like that," Naruto assured, still chuckling softly. Kurama chuckled a bit sheepishly as he nodded hesitantly.

"H-heh...y-yeah, I-I know, but..."

"Besides, in case ya forgot..." Naruto leaned back as best he could and slapped his immensely bloated belly, causing it to jostle as he reached over and playfully patted Kurama's own orange-furred medicine ball of a belly in turn, causing it to jostle and bounce a bit as well, making Kurama giggle a bit, despite himself as Naruto smirked and added, "...we ARE eatin' to the point where we can't feel our feet, right? Well, ya don't think what we're wearin's gonna be able to hold all that without some wear'n tear, do ya?"

"H-heh...well, now that'cha mention it, I guess not..."

"Nope! Which means I'll be rippin' my pants in no time too!" Kurama snickered at this realization. Then, Naruto raised an eyebrow as he glanced at how bloated the young fox's tummy had become, and; upon resting a palm against it and playfully rubbing Kurama's belly, added, "In faaaaaact...y'er puttin' this bad boy away at some pretty awesome paces, buddy...if I didn't know any better, I'd say the reason ya tore your pants before me is cause you're actually managing to put away more than I am..."

At this, Kurama's eyes lit up as he turned to Naruto, almost a bit surprised.

"Me...? Eating more than YOU...? Ya really think so, big bro...?"

At that, Naruto laughed and held his arms out. "Hey, didja hear MY pants rippin' yet?" Naruto's grin turned impish as he added, "S'pose I shouldn't be TOO surprised...I mean ya DID beat me at that ramen eatin' contest, right?" In turn, Naruto playfully slugged Kurama in the arm, causing the young fox to snicker and smile himself.

"Hehe, well, it WAS a close one...buuuuuuuuut I guess ya got a good point there..."

"Course I do! You're Kurama! A lean, anything-but-mean, eating machine!"

Kurama laughed merrily at Naruto's unofficial 'title' for him...it was certainly one he definitely wouldn't mind having announced next time he ever took part in an eating competition. Even Naruto couldn't help but laugh right along side him. But still, Kurama couldn't help but smile gratefully at his dear 'big bro'. No matter the situation; be it embarrassing, disheartening, or seemingly impossible...regardless of whatever it was, Naruto always had a natural knack for making Kurama just feel good. Good about himself, good about his accomplishments...or in this case...good about eating so much that he tore the front of his pants and exposed his 'Fairy Tail' Guild Patterned Boxers. Big or small, Naruto just knew how to turn an otherwise embarrassing situation into one where everyone could be laughing. He never gave Kurama a reason to even feel embarrassed. Even just a few moments ago when Kurama had accidentally mistook Naruto's 'getting replaced by Natsu' joke for something serious, Naruto was able to help the young fox know it was okay and that he had nothing to be ashamed of.

To the outside observer, it would seem a strange notion that something so simplistic could mean so much to the young fox, but truly, it was because Kurama knew that was just how caring his best friend was. He was a genuinely kind hearted person through and true, one Kurama had often hoped to aspire to be when he grew up. So much so that, out of sheer respect and honor for Naruto, he had even come to go by the surname of Uzumaki back in Fiore. Simply put, he was just grateful to be able to call Naruto a friend, let alone his best friend and 'big bro.'

And so, smiling at his big bro, Kurama playfully jabbed Naruto's arm right back and, with a gradually more impish grin, he added, "Well, then let's see if you can catch up, big bro!"

Grinning right back, Naruto nodded eagerly. "NOW y'er speakin' my language, kiddo!" And in no time at all, the two dove right back into the sundae...
112112222112222111222221112121211122111.title: A loud tearing is heard

choices: One of their navels pops  first
They pop their navels at the same time
1121122221122221112222211121212111221111.content:
As he continued tearing into the sundae alongside Kurama, Naruto felt the front of his pants, fully unbuttoned and unzipped, grow tighter and tighter. Grinning, he began eating even faster, spooning mouthful after mouthful of ice cream into his mouth, heedless of the bits of ice cream and topping that flew about. With each mouthful, the front of his orange pants became tighter, tighter, tighter, until....

RRRRRRIIIIIIIIIPPPPP!!!

...with a mighty tearing sound, the front of Naruto's pants tore wide open, exposing his heart-patterned boxers. At the loud noise, Kurama stopped, spoon halfway to his mouth, and glanced over at Naruto, who had begun grinning and smacking his oversized stomach. "Haha, now THAT'S what I'm talking about!"

Kurama beamed. "Wow! You ripped your pants already, Naruto?'

The blonde beamed in return. "Yep, sure did! I'd show ya, but..." he gestured to his overstuffed belly. "...this thing's kinda in the way."

Kurama giggled. "Don't worry, Naruto; I heard the ripping loud and clear."

Naruto smiled, playfully tweaking Kurama's ears. "Kinda hard not to, with these things..."

Playfully swatting Naruto's hand away, Kurama beamed so wide his eyes squinted shut. "Heh heh, yeah, not a whole lot gets past these things..." He opened his eyes, but the grin remained. "Anyway, now that we've busted our buttons and ripped our pants, there's only one thing left to do..."

Naruto smirked playfully. "What, you mean finishing this monster?"

Kurama snickered, his eyes sparkling with a mischievous gleam. "Well, yeah, obviously that, and make sure we can't feel our feet afterwards, but besides that..."

Frowning, Naruto thought for a moment...before his eyes lit up with realization. "Oh! You mean..." then, instead of continuing, he reached a finger toward Kurama's rounded orange tummy and poked and prodded, much to the young fox's amusement, until he felt a small pit.

Giggling, Kurama nodded, patting his belly heartily and causing it to jostle a bit. "Yep." As he did this, he reached a digit of his own out and poked Naruto's innie navel.

Naruto smirked. "Well, of COURSE we hafta pop our belly buttons! It's one of the best parts of stuffing our faces!"

Kurama laughed. "Heh, no kidding; the way all that pressure goes POOF, how silly it looks, and of course the way it feels when ya play with it..."

Naruto playfully nudged his friend. "Heh, yeah, I remember what you were like the first time you ever popped your belly button, when we were all eating that huge sundae. You looked so damn fascinated with it...and you looked like you were having the time of your life when you started wiggling it!"

Kurama giggled, fondly remembering the moment. "That's 'cause I'd never felt anything like it! It was ticklish, and tingly at the same time...even when I did it again and again in Termina,and when I've done it in Fiore, it never gets old!"

Naruto ruffled Kurama's head fondly. "Can't argue with that, little buddy; never felt anything like it."

Kurama smirked. "Well, we did, and we can...just as soon as we get back to eating this monster!" With that, he turned back to the sundae and started spooning ice cream into his mouth, faster than ever.

Naruto grinned, turning back to the sundae as well. "Took the words right outta my mouth, little brother!" And, with that, he resumed tackling the sundae with gusto.

Time ticked by as the two devoured the sundae. Gradually, their stomachs swelled even bigger, and that familiar tightness began to form in their bellies. Galvanized by this realization, they went even faster. Bigger and bigger their stomachs grew, and tighter and tighter their midsections felt, until...
1121122221122221112222211121212111221111.title: Naruto manages to tear his pants in no time at ...

choices: They continue to demolish what's left of their sundae
They stop to polish off the rest of their drinks
1121122221122221112222211121212111221111.content:
Both youths continued stuffing as much ice cream into their all-too-eager maws as possible. Occasionally, they'd wince in discomfort as that tightness in the middle of their bellies grew tighter and tighter. Squinting his eyes shut slightly, Kurama; shortly after gulping down a particularly large spoonful of ice cream, rested one palm against his belly and rubbed it as soothingly as he could. "Ooh man..." the young fox groaned in discomfort, "...ugh, I almost forgot how much this part hurts..."

Naruto, nodding slightly in agreement as he rubbed his own bulbous belly, smirked weakly.

"Y-yeah, I know what'cha mean," Naruto said, before kneading his belly slightly and burping a few times then, with a smirk, adding, "...but that only means we're gettin' closer. H-heh, remember, that horrible tightness ya feel getting worse'n worse? That's gonna make that sweet pop all the sweeter..."

Chuckling weakly, Kurama grinned and said, "Then I'm guessin' we're right around the finish line, huh..." The young tailed beast promptly grabbed his spoon and held it up before grinning with a bit more determination at Naruto. "Ready?"

Grinning right back, Naruto grabbed his spoon.

"Ready..."

And with vigor, the two drove their spoons right into the massive sundae, and resumed shoveling more and more ice cream into their mouths, taking big heaping mouthfuls and gulping them down, sending large bulges of the frozen treat down their throats and into their steadily expanding bellies. All the while, that tightness grew ever more agonizingly tight. But despite that, the pair soldiered on, eating more and more as their midsections began to bulge little by little. Sure enough, a strange sort of vibrating could be seen from the middle of their bellies; specifically right around their belly buttons. And still, they ate and ate and ate, until...at long last...

*POP!*

*POP!*

In perfect unison, both Naruto and Kurama's eyes widened as their bellies jolted slightly, and from their former innies, out popped fleshy stubs that were now their inverted navels. The two youths immediately shared a look of complete and utter bliss as they practically melted into their seats.

"Ohhhhh yowza," remarked Naruto with a goofy grin on his face as he slumped backwards into his chair, "...that feels SOOOOO much better..."

Kurama simply went cross eyed for a moment and grinned a doubly goofy grin as his tongue lolled out of the side of his muzzle. "Holy crap, did I need that," the young fox remarked before grinning at Naruto and nudging him in the arm. "Was it worth it or what?"

Grinning back at his younger companion, Naruto glanced down at Kurama's fuzzy, still wobbling stub and; grinning more impishly, said, "You tell me," before reaching over and playfully wiggling it around.
