Kurama yelped and jerked back a bit, staring as his friend took wide, toothy mouthfuls of the flapjacks and gulped them down.

It was all Naruto could do not to moan in pleasure; as it was, his tail wagged rapidly. Oh man...I thought these were good before, but now... Everything tasted more...everything. Sweeter, fluffier...more.

Deciding that eating it face-first wasn't quick enough, Naruto wrapped his paws around his pancakes, leaned forward, and shoved the mass of flapjacks toward his muzzle, simultaneously chomping and pushing the fluffy, heavenly discs into his waiting maw. Heedless of the syrup that got on his fur and the bits that landed on his shirt, he gorged himself on the delicious treat, not stopping until his paws were holding nothing but air. Even so, he eagerly licked his paws, getting as much syrup and pancake bits off of them as possible. Kurama blinked slowly at this. "So...you like?"

In response, Naruto grabbed a handful of bacon and crammed it into his muzzle, his tail wagging eagerly at the savory tastes that assailed his fox-i-fied taste buds. Not content with that pawful, he dragged another plate of bacon toward him and shoved pawful after pawful of the meat into his muzzle, his face lighting up as he did so. Soon, the plate was depleted, his muzzle bulging with half-eaten bacon. Eagerly looking around, he spied a large pitcher of milk, grabbed it, and began chugging it, washing the bacon down and assailing his mouth with the same creamy, refreshing taste that had preceded his transformation. He guzzled it eagerly, thin streams of milk trailing down the sides of his mouth. Kurama watched, open-mouthed, as the level of milk in the pitcher steadily dropped, until Naruto slammed it down, bone-dry. "Uh....."

Naruto had barely taken a breath before he grabbed a plate of sticky buns, lifted the whole thing to his muzzle, tilted his head back, and let them slide, one after the other, into his waiting muzzle, chewing and swallowing them as they came. When the plate was empty, he eagerly licked it, let it clatter to the table, and quickly got to work on a plate of French toast.

Kurama watched, his muzzle dropping even further open as Naruto went to town on more and more plates of food, shoveling them into his mouth with little decorum Wow...guess turning into a fox-person really DID improve his taste buds, huh...

Finally, several plates later, Naruto settled back in his chair, patted his stomach, and let out a belch. "Ooh man, that was the best thing I've ever tasted...." he muttered happily, his tongue lolling out the side of his mouth. Indeed, his stomach had grown from a slight curve into a noticeably round shape, though it still remained beneath his shirt, and the fur around his muzzle was stained with syrup, crumbs, and other miniscule remains of his feeding frenzy.

In spite of himself, Kurama managed to close his muzzle. "H-heh, you're not done yet, are you?" He asked playfully.

Naruto sat up a bit straighter. "What, are you kidding?" He gestured to the table; in spite of all he had eaten, he'd barely put a dent in Kurama's breakfast. "Nah, I'm just resting for a second." He grinned at Kurama. "Seriously, though, buddy, as awesome as your stuff tastes normally? When I'm a fox person, it's like...it's like I'm eating ROCKET'S cooking!"

Kurama jolted upright at that. "R-really...?" He almost whispered.

The surly little raccoon had been one of....no, THE single best cook Kurama had ever met. He'd met plenty of excellent cooks in Fiore, of course (the number of times he'd had to waddle home or have Gajeel pry him out of a booth were testament to that), but there was something about Rocket's cooking that made it, quite simply, incomparable. To hear someone, especially his best friend, give his food such high praise....

Naruto grinned wide, squinting his eyes shut. "Damn straight! Hell, I think you turning me into a fox was the best thing that coulda happened!"

Kurama's eyes widened. "Y-you do?" He replied hesitantly, even as he felt a great deal of the residual guilt dissolving.

Naruto burped and licked his chops, still grinning. "For food this tasty? Hell yeah! In fact..." At this, his grin grew mischievous. "...why the hell should we even bother with forks and knives?"

At this, Kurama's expression eased, and he grinned in return. "You mean...eat like nature intended? Nothin' but our mouths 'n paws?"

Naruto winked. "Nothin' but our mouths and paws," he affirmed. "In fact..." he sat upright, rubbed his paws together, and let his eyes run over the goodies still on the table. "I think I'm about all rested up." He grinned widely at his friend. "Ready to go hog-wild?"

Kurama looked up at the ceiling folding his arms. "Well, let me think about it for a second..." he muttered in a mock-contemplating tone. Then, like like a whip, he was attacking a heaping plate of eggs with nothing but his muzzle and paws.

Naruto smirked. "That's what I thought," he laughed, doing the same to a plate that had sausages literally piled on.

They made quick work of those first plates, before they each moved on to another, then another, and then another still, using nothing but their paws to eat. Each of them blitzed on, emboldened by the wonderful flavors assailing their taste buds and paying little heed to the bits that landed on the table or their clothing. As each plate or bowl was picked clean, it was set aside, and before long, they began piling up....and up...and up...

Predictably, their stomachs quickly began showing the effects of their eager eating; Naruto's already rounded stomach slowly swelled bigger, both pushing his shirt out and distorting the flame spiral on the front. Kurama's trim stomach, on the other hand, swiftly turned concave, then rounded, which bulged bigger and bigger beneath his pajama shirt. Eventually, Naruto's stomach, having already been quite rounded from his previous feeding frenzy, began to push his shirt up, slowly revealing the white fur underneath. Taking note of this, Kurama ate even faster, consequently causing his own stomach to grow at a quicker rate.

On and on the two ate, and higher and higher the plate towers became, and the bigger and bigger their stomachs grew. Naruto's shirt continued its slow advance upwards, revealing more and more of his now-furry stomach, while Kurama's pajama shirt finally began pulling upwards. Every now and again, one of them would grab a pitcher of milk and take several huge gulps to wash their food down, then slam the pitchers down and keep right on eating.

Eventually, the two friends finally stopped for a break, having demolished roughly half of what was on the table...and as they leaned back in their chairs and exhaled, it definitely showed.

Naruto's stomach had swollen greatly, to the point where it was rather close to the table. His shirt had hiked up quite high, several inches above his somewhat-concealed navel and exposing much of his white-furred belly for all to see. His pants were feeling rather tight, but he wasn't paying that much mind at the moment.

Kurama's stomach wasn't quite as big, but it was definitely getting there, only being a few inches further away from the table than Naruto's, and his shirt resting directly above his belly button. "Mmmmm...." he muttered, happily rubbing his stomach with both paws. "This is sooooo good...."

Naruto leaned back in his chair, doing the same. "Ya really outdid yourself, Kurama..." He opened his eyes and looked down at his stomach; rubbing a big, furry orb was an...odd sensation, but not at all unpleasant. Curiously, he planted both paws on his bare, furry belly and massaged it some more. Immediately, his expression turned dopey. Scratch that...not not unpleasant....AMAZING.... Giggling groggily, he massaged his belly with both paws, causing his tail to wag and one of his feet to thump a bit.

Kurama, giggling, was tempted to do the same, but as he looked down at his own stomach, a thought occurred to him.

Hmmm...we still have a lotta this stuff left to go, and our tummies are pretty big already, but its so much fun going fast.... Kurama looked up at the ceiling. Hmmm....what to do... Suddenly, his eyes widened. That's it!

Hearing a sudden shuffling of fabric, Naruto stopped rubbing and opened his eyes. "Oi, Kurama, what's..."

He spluttered as he saw the young fox peeling his shirt off and tossing it to the side. "Kurama, what the hell...?!" He gaped as Kurama wriggled out of his pajama shorts, kicking them off once the were at his feet. "K-Kurama, you're..."

"...stripping?" Kurama supplied helpfully, now in nothing but his boxers. "Don't worry, I did it on purpose this time."

"But...why...?" Naruto mumbled, still trying to wrap his head around it.

Kurama giggled. "Well, we had so much fun eating super-fast, but our clothes are gonna start getting in the way, so..." he gestured to his discarded pajamas. "Don't worry, we'd still be wearing our skivvies."

Naruto spluttered again. "W-wait...WE?!"

Kurama nodded, giggling again...
1121122221122221112222211121212111221111.title: Naruto. Chows. DOWN...

choices: Naruto Challenges Kurama to a Foxxy Burping Contest Rematch
Naruto shows Kurama who the true Champ is then and there...
1121122221122221112222211121212111221111.content:
“Err…maybe my new Fox ears ain’t as good as hearing as I thought,” Naruto remarked, ringing out his enlarged fuzzy ear, earning a snicker from Kurama who shook his head and said, “C’mon, Naruto. It’s no biggie! Remember when we first met? I didn’t even wear clothes at the time!”

“…Kiiiinda different, kiddo…” Naruto muttered uncertainly.

“It’s not like you hafta worry about anyone seein’ us. We’re pals and we’re both covered in fur. Technically speaking, that acts like a big onesy,” Kurama insisted before grinning impishly and adding, “’Sides, I dunno about’chu, but eatin’ in the skivvies is kinda liberating. Feels all nice’n breezy. And our tummies can grow as big as want ‘em to without having to worry about constraint of any kind!”

Glancing down at his already rounded belly, Naruto drummed his clawed fingers atop his taut middle in contemplation. Then, a moment later, sighed to himself, and the said, “…Ah, what the hell. Ain’t like Dog breath’s here to talk smack anyway, right?

So saying, Naruto gulped to himself, then wrapped his fingers around the bottom of his shirt and pulled it off, tossing it aside like how Kurama had done. A moment later, he was working around his bloated belly to pull his pants down, but eventually managed. After a few moments, Naruto took a breath and examined himself in the near buff. He wasn’t used to seeing blond fur over his normally tan skin. Nor was Naruto particularly use to the prospect of sitting around in the open without any clothes on.

Still grinning, Kurama leaned in a bit and asked, “So? How do ya feel, Naruto?”

Naruto’s expression seemed to signify uncertainty. But the instant a soft breeze wafted into the Hotel from an open window, Naruto’s expression changed.

“Oh, wow…” Naruto muttered in mild awe. “H-heh, that, that actually does feel nice. Kinda loosey goosy.”

Snickering, Kurama just nodded as Naruto held his arms out to his sides and stretched his back, causing his rounded belly to stick out a bit more as he seemed to be feeling things out as it were.

“Heh, it’s kinda different when your body is covered in fur. Different from what I’m used to,” said Naruto, dropping his arms down and sitting back up normally in his seat. “…Different, but not unpleasant…”

“Toldja,” Kurama said innocently, before grinning more toothily and adding, “so, now that’cha see it’s not ALL bad…whadduya say we plow through this heap?”

Licking his chops, Naruto turned his attention back down to his breakfast, and the remaining pile set before him and his young fox companion. And without another word, Naruto grabbed a plate of bacon and started greedily scarfing it down, crunching and munching heartily with each crispy strip of bacon consumed.

Kurama couldn’t help but snicker at the sight for a moment. But nonetheless, the young Tailed Beast soon turned his attention to a stack of waffles, then, after lathering the entire stack with syrup, began digging in heartily. Rather than go one at a time, Kurama was practically cutting into several waffles at once, and scarfing a fork impaling at least three or four waffles at once into his eager and gaping maw.

“Mmm-MM! I gotta remember this waffle recipe for next time the Guild has a breakfast buffet going on!” Kurama remarked gleefully to himself after gulping down his hearty mouthful. A mere moment later, he was chomping into even more waffles.

And yet, even as he was occupied with his own meal, Kurama couldn’t help but smile at the sight of Naruto’s single tail, as it wagged happily with each passing moment of his prolonged breakfast feasting.

Heh, wonder if it’s my cooking that’s got him so stoked, or how much better everything tastes with enhanced senses, Kurama thought idly to himself as he chewed on a hefty mouthful of waffles, before tilting his head back and gulping heartily.

But Naruto, ever oblivious to Kurama’s musing, just continued gobbling bacon like there was no tomorrow. He was quite literally stuffing one handful of strips into his gaping maw after the other, using his newly formed canines to tear through his bacon like nothing, and gulp it down just as quickly. And yet, due to his new form, no bite went unsavored. No detail went unnoticed. Naruto’s senses were picking up on every little nuance to Kurama’s cooking, and the teenaged Fox loved every second of it.

“Mmm, hehe, damn, kiddo, I don’t think I can friggin’ stop inhaling this stuff!” Naruto exclaimed almost gleefully, before continuing to stuff his craw with more and more bacon, occasionally grabbing half of a toasted English Muffin and cramming that into his maw on top of everything else. After taking a big gulp, Naruto wiped his maw with his forearm and snickered before adding, “Hehe, and you weren’t kidding. This actually…kinda feels…nice! Like, liberating. I’m stuffin’ my belly with as much as I can fit into my mouth at any given moment, and I’ve got no shirt feeling tighter around my belly or my chest. And no pants to have to worry about busting either!”

Kurama snickered with amusement before impishly adding, “Well, there’s nothing stopping you from eating like this whenever you want, Naruto. Just ‘cause ya won’t have fur afterwards doesn’t mean you can’t just go loosey goosy. Just saying…”

Then, in a more deadpanned manner, Naruto glanced back and said, “…That’s…actually exactly what that means, kiddo…”

Kurama just laughed with amusement as Naruto rolled his eyes yet again, but nonetheless, continued cramming the remaining bacon into his eager maw.

As a result, within no time at all, Naruto had completely devoured his stack of bacon within no time at all, which had caused his already rounded stomach to press outward just a little bit more. Licking each of his clawed digits clean, Naruto smacked his chops and turned his attention to another pitcher of Milk. Grinning, Naruto grabbed the pitcher with one hand, brought it to his muzzle, dipped his head back far, and wasted no time guzzling away.

Stopping for a moment, Kurama couldn’t help but snicker with amusement as he watched Naruto’s blond furred throat bob in and out vigorously with each hearty gulp of milk chugged down. More amusingly enough, Naruto was chugging so hard that Kurama could actually HEAR every single gulp rippling down Naruto’s throat. As Naruto continued chugging away, his free hand rested idly against his bloated stomach. Kurama could see it steadily expanding bit by bit with each hearty gulp of milk surging down Naruto’s gullet.

“Hehe, a lil thirsty there, big bro?” Kurama said teasingly. But Naruto held out a finger and kept on chugging without any respite. All the while, Naruto’s bloated stomach only expanded outwards even more, audibly sloshing with milk as it just now started to rest a little bit on Naruto’s lap ever so slightly.

Finally, after just under two minutes time, Naruto slammed his now completely empty pitcher onto the table, and almost immediately after, let out a positively TITANIC burp, which blasted with enough force to make Kurama wince. When it rumbled to an end, Naruto moaned with relief and slouched back against his chair.

“Phew!” Naruto muttered, patting his rounded, sloshing belly, both from relief and immense satisfaction, “…URP! Man, did you HEAR that?”

Ringing out his own long, rabbit-like ears, Kurama snickered and said, “Naruto, I’m pretty sure you’d hafta be DEAF not to hear that…”

“Hehe, guess bein’ a fox gives me stronger pipes then too, huh. That why you always sounded like a foghorn whenever we used to eat out together…and last night?” Naruto inquired.

Kurama just laughed some more and scratched his fuzzy cheek before shrugging his shoulders and adding, “Eh, maybe. That COULD explain why I always school you though…”

Now THAT got Naruto’s attention…

“Oh HO, is THAT a fact…” Naruto muttered, folding his arms with a brow cocked…

Kurama once again shrugs as he smiles innocently and replies with, “Whaaat? I’m not bragging. I just have inherently better pipes than you do, Naruto. I AM a Tailed Beast after all. I was kinda…well, MADE to have pipes that impress. H-heh, mind you, it’s usually for blasting Tailed Beast Beams, but there’s no rule sayin’ I can’t use ‘em for other, slightly less destructive purposes, right? Y’know, like the purpose of schooling my best friend…”

“Them’s fighting words, kiddo…” Naruto said, in a mock warning tone.

Kurama just grinned impishly back at Naruto and replied with, “Huh, I guess they are…”

With those last teasing, but totally challenging words, Naruto realized that there was just one thing and one thing only, that could be done about this situation, and that was...

112131221.content:
Naruto loved Ichiraku's ramen; Kiba had known that for as long as he'd known the Uzumaki, even before he'd come to respect and (begrudgingly) like him. He ate it practically every day, for all three meals: breakfast (well, except when he just ate some instant ramen at home), lunch, and dinner.

Oh, he loved it: at each meal, he'd get a few bowls, at least, not stopping until he was sated. In some cases, two bowls became four, four became eight, eight became ten, ten became dozens...

In the last case, Naruto would become visibly affected by the massive amount of noodles he'd ingested, and his gut would take on a noticeably distended appearance. It would vary, of course; sometimes, passing him on the street, Kiba would see Naruto happily rubbing his stomach, the appendage rounded and stretching his jacket a bit. Other times, he'd see him lurching through the streets, his stuffed belly sticking out a couple of inches in front of him, shaking a bit with every step he took. In these instances, Kiba could even have sworn that a few of the teeth of his jacket had come apart, exposing the black-shirted stomach underneath...

In a few, more extreme instances, though, Kiba could tell that Naruto gorged himself--I mean, REALLY gorged himself--and it was even more apparent than when he just had a very good meal. At times like this, Kiba would see Naruto actually <i>waddling</i> about. His stomach would be extremely rounded and distended, his black-and-orange jacket seemingly pried open to reveal the black shirt underneath. The shirt, in turn, would have ridden up considerably, unable to fully contain the jam-packed mass that was the other boy's abodmen. It would be hiked up a few inches above his belly button, showing his bare belly for the whole world to see. And, in one instance, his button had been undone and his fly had been completely open, unable to handle the strain the spherical mass had created.

Sometimes, Naruto would seem a bit sick from all this; he might be a bit green, for instance, or he might simply look extremely dazed. More often that not, though, he'd look incredibly happy with himself: rubbing his belly, shaking it as he walked/lurched/waddled about.

Oh, Kiba tried to deny it for a while; forcing himself not to stare, stopping his hands as they went to his own stomach-but eventually, he admitted to himself:

"Damn it, I wanna see what that's like."

So, to that end, he'd gone around town with a full wallet, purchasing any food he could think of to bring back to his place; meat, sweets, everything in-between...he only skimped on soft foods, because, well, they were too...mushy, for his liking.

So now he sat, alone at home (his mother and sister were out on different missions, but it was his day off), staring at a table laden with all sorts of food imaginable, Akamaru looking at him with a mix of worry and confusion.

Because he was sure his clothes were going to take a bit of a beating, he'd dressed appropriately for the occasion: he was wearing a pair of grayish pants, and a teen-sized version of a shirt he'd loved to wear back in his academy days (he'd gotten it from a specialty store): it was a dark green, v-necked shirt, with lining around the neck area and a picture of a goofy cartoon dog face on the chest.

Taking a deep whiff, it was all he could do to keep himself from salivating as the scents of various delicacies assaulted his nostrils: candy, dango, all kinds of meat, a veritable scattering of fruit...with any luck, it'd all be in his gut before the day was out.

A sudden whimpering caught his attention, and he immediately whipped his head toward his canine companion. The massive white dog was staring at him, whining and tilting his head.

Kiba just laughed good-naturedly, reaching out to pat Akamaru on the head. "Ah, c'mon, Akamaru; Naruto does this all the time. How bad can it be?"

The dog rolled his eyes, laid down, and rested his head on his paws; he wouldn't be able to dissuade Kiba now, but he supposed he could watch in the meantime, make sure the dog-nin didn't hurt himself...

Giving Akamaru one last affectionate ruffle, Kiba turned back to the massive spread, grinning. Reaching out, he grabbed an apple in one hand and a roll in the other, brought them both to his mouth, and bit off massive pieces of both of them. Chewing loudly, he gulped, then resumed the process.

What happens next?
112131221.title: Sounds good to me!

choices: Kiba manages to finish the whole pile, and wants more food.
Kiba gets full before he can finish.
1121312211.content:
Kiba sat at his dining table, shoveling as much food as he could in his mouth. Luckily, he had thought ahead before he began his binge, as he had cleaned off the table, then unwrapped everything he had purchased, leaving it in a pile that took up most of the table. With everything uneatable removed, Kiba was free to eat without thinking, which is precisely what he did.

After a few more apples, (they were Kiba's favorite fruit), a few more rolls, and a lot of jerky disappeared in Kiba's belly, it became noticeably distended, and even with his shirt on, a fairly small mound could be found where his abdomen used to be. Akamaru was amazed that he got this far.

Akamaru continued to stare in amazement as Kiba ate even more jerky, taking care of a stash he had made of the meat strips. He then began working on a pocket of assorted gummy candies. He loved those because they were so chewy. Either way, he dug in, oblivious to his expanding stomach, which had begun stretching his shirt, becoming quite noticeable through it.

At that point, Akamaru noticed Kiba switch back to his favorite food group, protein, as he dug into more jerky and a few smoked sausages. He continued to tear through them, his shirt beginning to rise, as his stomach was too much for it to contain.

Akamaru continued to watch, amazed, as bite after bite continued to enter his ravenous gullet, accumulating in the ever-expanding orb of flesh that continued to lift up Kiba's shirt with its growth.

Soon, Kiba had made quite a large dent in his massive pile of food, and his shirt had ridden up to the point where it barely managed to contain his navel. At that point he laid back, somewhat satiated.

Akamaru was amazed that Kiba had managed to complete this feat, and he relaxed now, knowing that his buddy appeared to be finished.

Kiba took this time to examine himself, his eyes widened as he looked at his stomach, which was poking out enough to become clearly visible. Kiba then rubbed his overfilled belly, smiling with a satisfied look on his face. "This is awesome! Now I see why Naruto does it all the time." Kiba blurted out. Akamaru then barked, "Aren't you worried about your health?"

Kiba merely responded, "You don't have to worry so much. Naruto does this all the time and he's fine. Besides, I can just work it off when I train with you!" Akamaru was relieved by that thought, and laid back down next to Kiba.

Kiba then looked at the pile of food, which was still quite sizable, and he gained new motivation, hoping just to prove to himself that he can complete this impressive feat. He proudly gave his protruding abdomen a confident pat before digging back into the new pile.

"Oh no! He isn't finished yet!" Akamaru thought, and he was about to try stopping Kiba, however he knew he wouldn't be able to. He also enjoyed seeing Kiba this happy with himself. He didn't want to admit it, but he was also curious to see just how far Kiba would be able to go.
1121312211.title: Kiba continues eating, but has to take a break ...

choices: Hinata standing at his door
Naruto standing at his door
11213122112.content:
Faster than Akamaru could blink, Kiba was back in the fray, grabbing bunches of beef jerky in his hands and ripping off entire chunks off at a time, only chewing them a bit before gulping them down and repeating the process until everything he'd grabbed in his hands was gone. All the while, his stomach had slowly swelled, forcing his shirt further up until the bottom half of his navel could be seen poking out.

Then, after stopping to breathe, Kiba grabbed an extra large packet of gummy candies and ripped it open with his teeth, reaching his hand in and shoving entire handfuls of the candies into his mouth. This time, he spent some more time chewing them, as he enjoyed both the sweet taste and their chewiness. After the bag was empty, he tossed it aside and grabbed a mound of smoked sausages in his hands, bringing it up to his face and taking huge bites out of it, heedless of the grease that got on his face and on his shirt. Speaking of the article of clothing, it had, by now, ridden up further, exposing his belly button in its entirety. As he tore his way through the rest of the sausages, his shirt slowly rode up further and further.

Akamaru watched all this with a mix of horror and fascination. Oh man, he's really getting into it, isn't he? Akamaru mused to himself, watching with some amusement as Kiba, grabbing a large bottle of soda, started downing it, causing his stomach to swell further outwards and force his shirt up even higher and well above his navel.

However, after plunking down the empty bottle, Kiba seemed to slow down considerably. Indeed, even as he continued ripping jerky apart, he did so far less enthusiastically, spending a longer time chewing before swallowing. He seemed to notice this, and took much larger bites; as a result, his belly bulged a tiny bit with every swallow. Once he'd finished the jerky, he grabbed a handful of rolls, shoving as many as he could in his mouth, chewing them and swallowing them. His belly bulged out further, and was now beginning to touch the table. Then he did the same with more of the gummy candy, the sausages, more jerky...

Finally, groaning, he turned to grab a couple of apples...and stopped. "I-I can't," he moaned, leaning back in his chair. "I'm stuffed."

Looking at the state his partner was in, Akamaru could easily believe that. Kiba's belly was ridiculously swollen, sticking out well in front of him and starting to push against the table. His shirt rode well above his belly button, resting comfortably near the top of his stomach. His waistline also looked extremely tight, as his pants struggled to hold back the engorged mass. Um, Kiba, your pants...

"Eh?" Feeling around his waistline, Kiba blushed. "O-oh...thanks, Akamaru." Reaching under his belly, he fiddled with his pants button for a few seconds, finally getting a good grip on it and pulling it out, undoing his pants.

His stomach, at this point desperately seeking more room, surged forward, bumping into the table causing it, and the food items still left on it, to shake. Simultaneously, his fly opened partway, but was quickly seized and pulled down the rest of the way by Kiba.

The dog-nin sighed blissfully, a goofy grin spreading across his face. "Oh man, that feels so much better..." He leaned back in his chair a bit, showing the front of his undone pants and giving Akamaru a clear look at his paw-print patterned boxers. Sighing again, Kiba massaged his belly with both hands. "Oh man, I could get used to this..."

At that moment, a knocking sounded at the door. Snapped out of his happy daze, Kiba snapped to attention.
C-coming!" he called. He pushed back in his chair and away from the table and slowly got to his feet, his massive belly causing him to sway a little bit. However, he was able to plant a hand on the table and stabilize himself as he stood upright. Sighing in relief, he lifted his hand off and, slowly turning towards the door, began lurching and waddling his way towards the door, his belly shaking and wobbling with every step.

After what seemed like a tortuously long time, he finally reached the door. Grabbing the handle, he opened it to see...
11213122112.title: Kiba gets full before he can finish.

choices: Kiba has another stash waiting for a future pig-out, and he brings it out.
The three go out to eat.
112131221122.content:
Naruto waited at the door, hearing the trudging footsteps of Kiba as he approached the door. Naruto was surprised to see a large belly attached to Kiba, which wobbled as he stopped to introduce Naruto. Akamaru, of course was standing at his side, wagging his tail, eager to see a visitor.

Soon, Naruto got past his confusion, and his usual, cheery expression returned. He said, "Looks like someone ate well!" before prodding Kiba's belly playfully, giggling all the while.

"You're one to talk! I see you get like this all the time!" Kiba retorted defensively.

"It does feel good, though!" Naruto added simply. "You said it!" Kiba replied, patting his belly proudly.

"What are you doing here anyway?" Kiba inquired. Naruto answered, saying, "I'm bored. I haven't had any missions lately, and I was looking for something fun to do. You're always running around the forest by Konoha with Akamaru."

"Yeah, well it feels good to relax once in a while." Kiba then retreated back into his house, gesturing for Naruto to come in. Naruto removed his sandals, leaving them by the door, then followed Kiba.

In the kitchen, Naruto saw the table with a small pile of food on it, in addition to a few scraps scattered across the table. "Feel free to dig in! I've already had my fill" Kiba said, in response to a growl from Naruto's stomach, as he patted his bloated belly, showing it off.

Naruto didn't need to hear it twice. He just said, "Thanks Kiba!" before working on finishing the pile. "Oh no, now Naruto is here. He's bound to encourage Kiba." Akamaru thought as he laid down by the table.

In no time, Naruto had finished the little food that Kiba had, leaving him with a small bulge that made the slightest impression on his jacket. "That was some good food!" Naruto said, but then he added, "The tank's still pretty empty, though!"

"Then let's fill it! You might even be able to eat as much as me!" Kiba responded.

"That'll be easy!" Naruto replied cockily starting an argument between the two teens.

"Looks like their at it again." Akamaru thought as he listened to the banter between the two. He got a little nervous when he heard the two mention measuring tape.

Soon enough, Kiba wanted to see if Naruto could beat him, so he said, "So are you going to get something to eat, or are you going to keep talking?"

Naruto then replied, "Just give me food, and it will be gone!"
112131221122.title: Naruto standing at his door

choices: "Alright, fine! I'll show you ramen isn't the only thing I can eat!"
"Alright, but let's do ramen instead!"
1121312211222.content:
Kiba smirked. "That right?" he mused thoughtfully, rubbing his own stuffed belly. "How about we have a little bet, then?"

Eyes widening, Naruto quirked his head. "A bet?"

Kiba's smirk widened. "Yep; a new steak place just opened, and I wanna try it out."

Yelping, Akamaru turned his head to look at Kiba's already-distended belly. Kiba, you can't be serious! Going out in public like that?!

Laughing, Kiba patted the massive dog's head. "Hey, the knucklehead here does it all the time; if he ain't embarrassed by it, why should I be?" Akamaru merely whined in response, ignoring Naruto's suddenly reddening face. Giving the dog an apologetic look, Kiba then turned his attention to Naruto. "Here's how the bet's gonna go; once we get there, we'll each get the single biggest course they've got,and whoever finishes first gets the loser to pay for all of his meals for a whole week." Grinning, Kiba extended a hand towards Naruto. We got a deal?"

Naruto looked at Kiba's proferred hand for a few seconds, contemplating. Finally, he said...
1121312211222.title: The three go out to eat.

choices: Each platter was nearly overflowing with a singular immense steak.
The platters each had a large steak and a large variety of side dishes.
11213122112221.content:
Naruto did prefer ramen, but given the current state of Kiba's belly, Naruto was confident, as he had the advantage, and soon he burst out the door, with Kiba close behind.

They were jumping from building to building, as both of them were confident that they would win a week of free food. Akamaru made sure that he kept close to Kiba, who was not quite as well-balanced as normal. "Man, this is hard with as stuffed belly," Kiba thought as he held it with one hand, stumbling slightly on occasion.

Luckily, the restaurant was close, and because it was new, there was a banner on top of the door, advertising their specials in addition to an opening sale.

Naruto burst into the restaurant, attracting more attention to Kiba than he wanted, and soon the three had found themselves a table near the center of the restaurant. Luckily, the chairs had wheels on them for mobility, like a desk chair, so the two could move back easily as necessary.

A waiter soon arrived, and soon both Kiba and Naruto declared that they wanted the biggest meal that they served for each of them. Kiba even added, "Get a little something for Amamaru, too," as he gestured to the massive white canine next to him. The waiter, though initially surprised and recoiling from their loud voices, was very polite, and soon he retreated to the kitchen so that the chef could make the meal.

Soon enough, the waiter was on his way back, struggling with two massive platters of food and a small plate with a steak on it. He made it to the table, gave the small plate to Akamaru, and the contents of the huge platters were revealed to the two teens.
11213122112221.title: "Alright, fine! I'll show you ramen isn...

choices: Go for it!
Nah...
112131222.content: Alright, then; how about Kiba has a friendly eating competition with Akamaru?
112131222.title: Eh, not my cup of tea...

choices: After an even period, Kiba pulls ahead
After an even period, Akamaru takes the lead
1121312221.content:
Kiba, sitting at the table in his home, grinned and licked his lips at the sight of the multiple massive steaks piled in front of him. "Ya ready for this, Akamaru?"

The dog, sitting on the floor beside him with a comparable amount of steaks set before him, wagged his tail and woofed. I was born ready.

Kiba laughed and ruffled the fur on top of the dog's head. "Gotta say, you seem a lot more enthusiastic about this than I thought; aren't ya worried I'm gonna get a huge gut and make myself sick?"

Akamaru shrugged. Well, admittedly I'm still not too thrilled with that idea... he took a deep whiff through his nostrils and promptly began drooling. ...but man, these steaks just look too good to pass up! Kiba smirked and patted him on the head. "Heh; my thoughts exactly, buddy."

It was a rare day off for Kiba, and he and Akamaru had been looking forward to it for weeks now. They'd eagerly awaited it, envisioning taking 'walks' (actually energetic runs through the trees), training, and maybe hanging out with/bugging Naruto. Sadly, a freak storm had hit Konoha, rendering all those plans moot.

Kiba, clad in a gray short-sleeved shirt and black shorts-attire specifically set aside for days off like this-had been rather unhappy about this. There was no way they could walk in this weather, and he didn't feel like making the trek to Naruto's apartment in the downpour. What was worse, his mother and sister were both off on missions, meaning the only person he could share his misery with was Akamaru. That wasn't too big a problem, though-after all, the dog had been his best buddy since the Academy, and he'd been just as disappointed-but it still sucked, no two ways about it. As a result, the two of them had stewed in their disappointment for a good part of the morning, chatting and complaining about the circumstances. When lunchtime had rolled around, though, the grumbling of their stomachs had given them an idea. They both loved meat, and they had an excess supply of steaks, so why not put them to good use?

It was Kiba who had initially posited the idea of a competition. Akamaru, though reluctant at first-after all, he always tried to stop Naruto and Kiba during their competitions-had eventually agreed; after all, it wasn't like they had anything else to do...

As a result, they were now staring down two veritable mountains of steaks, Akamaru licking his chops and Kiba picking up a fork and knife as they eyed them hungrily. The dog-nin looked at his partner, grinning. "Ready whenever you are, buddy."

Akamaru nodded, wagging his tail. Get ready....on your mark.... he tensed his legs, get set... his stomach growled, as though to punctuate it.

GO!

With that, boy and dog fell upon their steaks with reckless abandon, Kiba cutting off huge pieces of steak and shoving them in his mouth, with Akamaru taking a steak into his mouth and gnashing it up as best he could.
1121312221.title: Boy vs. Dog

choices: Akamaru is able to keep his lead, not slowing down like Kiba.
Akamaru began slowing down, but Kiba didn't and is able to gain on Akamaru.
11213122212.content:
Akamaru was in the zone, and even though it was his first time truly stuffing himself, he was really good at it, nearly finishing his fourth steak. Through the course of the eating competition, his stomach had slowly advanced outward to its current moderately distended state. Akamaru merely ignored it as he took the last bite. "I never knew this would be so much fun!" he thought.

Kiba, on the other hand, got off to a fairly slow start, as he was a bit distracted watching Akamaru. Either way, he was just starting on his fourth steak, steadily chewing through. Throughout the competition, he ate the steaks in an unorthodox manner, grabbing them with his bare hands and tearing out large chunks. His stomach had also began to push outwards, threatening to peek out from under his grey shirt.

The two continued to power through the massive amounts of meat, having a great time, the best in a while for sure. It certainly was great to let loose for once.
11213122212.title: After an even period, Akamaru takes the lead

choices: Both maintain good momentum, not slowing down
Neither of them slow down, but one of them establishes a lead
112131222122.content:
The two got through a few more steaks before Akamaru began to slow down a bit; after all, even if he was enjoying himself, this was still really his first time stuffing himself. Not to mention, his stomach was starting to feel a bit heavy, the appendage slowly swelling as steak after steak entered it. It was to the point that the furry appendage was now a great deal rounded, and began to appear as a very distinct orb that only continued to grow, even at this slower pace.

Kiba, noticing that his buddy was flagging, put on a burst of speed. At this juncture, he had eaten enough steaks that his stomach has pushed out even further, and his shirt had finally begun to give up, rising up and exposing a tiny strip of flesh. Disregarding this, Kiba ripped off chunks of the steak he was holding in his hands as fast as he could, rapidly chewing and swallowing until the whole thing was gone. Practically tossing the bone aside, he grabbed another steak and powered through it the same way. Soon, he had established about a two-to-three steak lead over Akamaru.

As Kiba ate his steaks, his stomach bulged, growing a bit with each steak. Consequently, his shirt rose a little higher, slowly exposing more and more flesh. And, as steak after steak entered his gullet, rounder and bigger his stomach bulged, and the more of his flesh slowly began to see the light of day as his shirt gradually hiked up more.

Devouring his twelfth steak, he tossed the bone aside, belched, and leaned back, patting his belly contentedly. "Ah man, these steaks are really awesome..." he thought happily, looking down at his stomach as he did so. Akamaru had slowed a bit, so he figured he could afford a break.

His stomach had rounded out and pushed out considerably, and his gray shirt had hiked up far enough to expose his belly button, but not much more above hit. His waistline was beginning to feel a bit snug, but not quite enough to be uncomfortable. Kiba smirked, licking his lips. "Heh; not doin' too bad so far..."

Akamaru, seeing Kiba examining his belly, whined at the sight of his stomach beginning to swell, but quickly turned back to his steaks; while Kiba was distracted, he was determined to try to get a lead.

Eyes flicking to the side, Kiba grinned as he saw Akamaru pick up his pace. "Heh; that's more like it, Akamaru!" Seizing another steak in his hands, he ripped a huge chunk out of it, and within a short time, demolished the rest of it and moved onto the next.
112131222122.title: Akamaru began slowing down, but Kiba didn't...

choices: One of the two concedes, and the other wins!
They finish all of the steaks. Should they continue?
1121312221221.content:
Akamaru was amazed at himself, as he was still able to tear through the steaks with gusto, matching his best friend almost perfectly. In the process, his stomach crept closer and closer to the ground, wobbling slightly with every movement. He winced slightly, but fought through the dull pain.

Kiba's stomach was in much the same state, and his shirt rode higher and higher on his belly, his waistband feeling tighter and tighter as his belly wobbled much like his canine friends. He was more used to the stretching than Akamaru, but he was still feeling the effects, especially with his waistband.

As the waistband on Kiba's shorts began to quiver...
1121312221221.title: Both maintain good momentum, not slowing down

choices: The two go at it for a while, but eventually decide to sleep it off
The two continue attacking the ice cream and show no signs of stopping
11213122212211.content:
Akamaru winced, swallowed his current mouthful of steak...and whined, sinking down to the ground. I-I can't, Akamaru whimpered, wincing as his belly finally touched the ground. I can't eat any more. Taking a breath, he flipped over onto his back, his stuffed belly sticking up and wobbling about in the air.

Ripping off the last of the meat off the steak he'd been eating, Kiba burped again, patting his gut and looking over at Akamaru, laughing at the sight of the white-furred, beach-ball sized globe that was his friend's engorged belly. "Ah, ya did real good Akamaru, especially for your first time." He grinned, even as a bolt of pain shot through his midsection; as it was now, his shirt was now resting towards the top of his stomach, well above his navel. The appendage was pushing out even more, and had started to contact the table; what was more, his waistline was feeling incredibly tight, dangerously beginning to strain the button on his shorts.

Eyes still on his friend, his hands went down to his waistline. "Heh, if ya keep this up, you could go head to head with me and Naruto!" Hands finding his pants button, he undid it, sighing in relief as the pressure abated and his gut flopping out a bit, pushing harder against the table. In the meantime, his fly went down a few teeth, though the majority of it remained zipped up. "Oh man, that felt so good..." Rubbing his stomach, he licked his lips happily.

Akamaru burped. Gotta admit, that was...that was pretty damn fun. He let his tongue loll out the side of his mouth. I can see why you and Naruto like doing it so much.

Kiba scooted his chair closer to Akamaru, scratching his distended belly fondly. "Heh, yeah, it's pretty cool, isn't it?" Akamaru yipped happily in reply, tail wagging lazily. Kiba smiled happily at his friend's contentment, but a sudden crack of thunder promptly soured that expression. Looking towardsa window, he scowled as he saw the rain still pouring down. "Ah, damn it, it's still raining."

Akamaru's eyes opened and flitted towards Kiba's midsection. Probably for the better, considering what we look like right now.

Kiba shrugged. "Eh, I guess. Still, I hate being shut up inside..." Sighing, he planted a hand on the table. Grunting, he hoisted himself up, exposed belly wobbling as he did so. Turning himself around, he lurched his way towards the fridge, bouncing and wobbling as he did so. Reaching the fridge, he opened the freezer portion of it, arms reaching in.

Akamaru kept his eyes on him, tilting his head curiously. Um...Kiba? What're you doing?

Instead of answering, Kiba pulled out of the freezer, bearing several containers of ice cream of varying flavorsin his arm. Shutting the freezer door with his back, he lurched back towards the table, plopping them all on the table, sitting back in his seat and prying the top off a container of strawberry ice cream.

Akamaru's eyes bugged out. Oh, you can't be serious...

Kiba, grabbing a nearby spoon, dug it into the container. Leaving the spoon in, he turned and smirked at Akamaru. "Hey, there's nothin' else to do, and I'm kinda in the mood for something sweet." Turning back to the container, he scooped a large spoonful of ice cream out and spooned it into his mouth, swallowing it. "Mmm, that's good..." Taking a couple more containers (none of them chocolate), he pried the tops off them and took them in his arms, bringing them as gently as he could to the floor and setting them in front of Akamaru.

The dog looked up at his partner, whining. Kiba, what are you...

Kiba only ruffled the dog's head. "There ya go, buddy; lemme know if ya want any more." That taken care of, he returned to his strawberry ice cream.

Akamaru looked from Kiba, then to his ice cream, then back to Kiba, then back to his ice cream. He was stuffed, but the ice cream looked so good...

The dog whined. Oh, what the hell; it's not like we have anything else to do. Nosing his way around the containers, he found a container of vanilla and began biting/slurping it up. Against his better judgement, he found himself getting into the flavors, and he went at it with gusto, even as Kiba maintained full steam on his.
11213122212211.title: One of the two concedes, and the other wins!

choices: Began rummaging for more food.
Played with his belly, giggling.
112131222122112.content:
Kiba was glad that Akamaru finally decided to have a good time, and Akamaru was amazed that Kiba had so much endurance. Both of their bellies pushed farther and farther outwards as they continued their dairy feast.

Akamaru's belly now hit the ground, and it began expanding outwards, slowly but surely spreading his legs apart.

Kiba's was in no better condition. With his pants button off, it filled in all the room it could, forcing his fly down piece by piece. Now that it filled the entire area, it began stretching on both the opened waistband and his inseam.

Not too long after the ice cream was brought out, it was meticulously crammed into the bellies of the two. Kiba belched loudly, proudly patting the massive appendage while Akamaru looked almost dazed, amazed that he had eaten all of that.

He merely watched as Kiba...
112131222122112.title: The two continue attacking the ice cream and sh...

choices: On the way, they smell something good
On the way, they run into somebody
1121312221221122.content:
Kiba, sighing contentedly, placed both hands on either side of his belly. The appendage was now resting squarely in his lap, his shirt riding completely above it. It was well near beach-ball size, putting pressure even against his completely-opened fly and inseams, and had even started to force his legs apart a bit. "Oh man, that was good.." He burped again, causing his belly to wobble a bit. Kiba giggled slightly at the sensation, his face flushing as he did so. "Ah, damn it," he cursed, massaging his gut with one of his hands, "I've been spending way too much time around Naruto..." Still, he thought as he rubbed his stomach, that had felt good...

He looked down at Akamaru, lying on his side and his swollen, past-pregnant-looking belly sticking out from under him, panting even as he looked up at this partner. "Akamaru," he began, blushing a bit, "I'm gonna do something kinda stupid, so just keep it between us, OK?"

You mean more stupid than stuffing ourselves so much we look like we're carrying puppies? Akamaru almost retorted, but stopped; after all, he HAD had fun... Don't worry, Kiba; my muzzle's sealed. Kiba grinned, returning his attention to his belly. I have to ask, though; what is it you're... He was brought up short as Kiba placed both hands squarely on either side of his stomach and began shaking it, the appendage bouncing up and down. Kiba had a goofy smile on his face, giggles escaping his mouth. ...oh.

When Kiba got tired of that, he smacked his gut hard with both hands, his distended midsection jiggling and shimmying from the impact. As it started to settle down, he leaned back and smacked it hard a few times in the middle, causing it to contort and bounce around more. Giggling harder, he reached underneath, lifted his stomach up (and exposing some of his tan undergarments in the process), and dropped it back down, bouncing and jiggling even as it smacked against the chair. "Hee hee...I can see why Naruto likes this part so much." To Akamaru's shock, he dipped a finger into his exposed belly button, wiggling it around and giggling even harder. "This feels kinda cool!" He let loose with another unexpected burp, and he giggled even harder.

Akamaru watched him with more than a little bit of incredulity...but he couldn't help but wag his tail. As ridiculous as he looked at the moment, there was no denying Kiba was having a great time just fooling around with his distended belly. And if Kiba was that happy, well...Akamaru had no real reason to complain. Besides, it wasn't like they could really do much else at the moment...

After a while, Akamaru yawned, closed his eyes, and nodded off. Kiba, likewise, tired of playing with his gut, and slid off the chair and directly onto the floor. Pulling himself up to Akamaru, he laid his head on the dog's bloated midsection, closed his eyes, and draped an arm across his own exposed belly, the other one splayed out to the side. In short order, he, too, had fallen asleep, mouth opening and a tiny bit of drool collecting at the corner of it.

A few hours later, Kiba yawned widely and blinked his eyes open, opening them fully when he saw calm night peeking in from outside; apparently, the storm had stopped. Kiba beamed, planting his hands on the floor and sitting upright. "Oi, Akamaru! Wake up, buddy!" He turned to the dog, still sleeping; though his stomach was still considerably distended, it had digested a great deal while they had slept, and he would likely have no trouble moving about.

Kiba's stomach was in much the same state; though it was still quite rounded and pushed out quite a bit, it was not quite as big as it had been several hours previously; in fact, Kiba found that if he pulled his shirt down, it would cover his stomach, albeit barely.

Yawning, Akamaru opened his muzzle, smacked his lips, and rolled onto his front. Buh...wha? he whined blearily.

Chuckling, Kiba ruffled the top of his head. "Take a look, buddy! It's stopped raining!"

Akamaru's eyes opened wide. It has?! Tail wagging, he looked towards the window; sure enough, it was a calm, temperate night out. Well, whaddaya know?

Grinning, Kiba stumbled back to his feet, gripping onto the opened ends of his shorts as he did so. "About damn time, too; piggin' out was fun, but I was starting to go stir-crazy!" Sucking in his still prominent gut as much as he could, he forced both ends of his shorts together, buttoning them back up with some difficulty. Still holding the breath in, Kiba zipped his shorts up, then, slowly, let his breath out. His stomach pressed considerably and a tad bit uncomfortably against his waistline, and his shorts felt quite tight, but Kiba shrugged it off; he'd felt worse pain before. Giving a satisfied nod, Kiba turned to Akamaru, who was struggling to his own feet. Walking over, he helped the dog up the rest of the way. "There ya go, Akamaru." Smiling as the dog gave an appreciative bark, he scratched him behind his ears. "So whaddaya say, Akamaru?" he spoke up at last. "You up for a late-night walk, maybe start to work these guts off?"

Akamaru perked up. Like you really have to ask?

Grinning, Kiba sauntered over to the front door, opened it, and waited until Akamaru had passed through it. Then, closing the door behind him, he took off after his friend through the darkened, still-damp streets of Konoha.
1121312221221122.title: Played with his belly, giggling.

choices: Naruto, of course!
One of Kiba's other friends.
11213122212211222.title: On the way, they run into somebody

choices: The two go through numerous bowls, eating their fill
One of them eventually passes out
112131222122112221.content:
As Kiba and Akamaru walked through the well-lit streets of Konoha, they passed by a group civilians, who blinked in confusion at their somewhat distended bellies and began murmuring amongst themselves. This continued as they walked, passerby slowing down to look at them, thankfully not stopping completely but simply going on their way. Kiba, feeling a little embarrassed, nonetheless smirked and patted his stomach; even Akamaru couldn't help but feel a little proud...

"Oi, Kiba!"

Eyes widening, Kiba turned around towards the direction of the familiar voice. "Eh? Naruto?" Indeed, the Inuzuka and his partner saw a hint of orange in the distance, which became clearer as it ran down the street to greet them.

Eventually, Naruto came to a stop in front of them, grinning. "Hey guys! What's up?" He waved to them.

Kiba raised his eyebrows; apparently, it had been Naruto's day off too, if his attire- camo-colored pants and sleeveless orange tank top with Konoha's symbol on the front- were any indication. "Uh, hey, Naruto; what's going on?"

Naruto folded his arms behind his head. "Eh, nothin' much; just spent the day training, is all."

Kiba and Akamaru's eyes widened. "Training?!" Kiba exclaimed, his disbelief evident. "It was pouring out earlier! How the hell did you not get wet?!"

Laughing a bit nervously, Naruto lowered one of his arms, using the other to rub the back of his head. "Nah, I got wet; that's actually why I'm wearing these right now." He gestured to his garb. "Stopped home, dried off, changed..." His stomach growled. "...and I was actually on my way to Ichiraku's to grab a bite!" His eyes fell on Kiba's bulging midsection, pushing visibly against his shirt, and he giggled, poking it. "Looks like you and Akamaru already took care of that, though."

Blushing madly, Kiba swatted Naruto's arm away. "H-hey! It's not like there was much else to do anyway, and besides, we're not crazy enough to train out in the pouring rain!"

Akamaru whined. Yeah; my fur gets all damp and smelly.

Still giggling, Naruto fished around his pocket. "I'm not crazy, I'm just an awesome ninja; the weather doesn't bother me." Oblivious to Kiba's rolling his eyes, Naruto's hand stopped rummaging and came out with two coupons. "Anyway, ya wanna come with? I got a couple of all-you-can-eat coupons for Ichiraku, but it's only good if there are two people together."

Kiba scowled. "You're conscripting me just so you can stuff your face?"

Laughing nervously, Naruto replied. "Um...maybe?" He gave Kiba his best puppy-dog eyes. "C'mon, Kiba, pleeeeeeease?"

Kiba continued to scowl, but was taken aback by a growl from his stomach. Slightly stuffed or no, it had been a while since that contest with Akamaru...

"Alright, fine!" Kiba huffed, snatching one of the coupons from Naruto. "But you owe me big time for this, Uzumaki!"

Naruto laughed. "Ah, c'mon, Kiba, it'll be fun!" With that, he turned and began running towards where he knew Ichiraku's to be.

Watching him go, Kiba sighed, turning towards Akamaru. "Sorry, boy," he muttered, ruffling Akamaru's head. "We'll go for a walk tomorrow, I promise!" With that, he took off after Naruto. Akamaru, whining and knowing where this would go, followed after him.

Within a few minutes, the two had reached Ichiraku's. Plopping down in his seat. Naruto showed Teuchi and Ayame his coupon, with Kiba following suit. Smiling and shaking his head, Teuchi brought out a large bowl of ramen for each of them, Naruto's being miso and Kiba's being barbecue. Thanking the man, Naruto dove into his bowl, clearly savoring it. Kiba tackled his at a similar pace, surprised at how hungry he was. Knowing the two, Teuchi and Ayame began preparing more bowls for them, as Akamaru sank to the ground, whining and covering his eyes with his ears. Agh; it never ends...

Soon, the two had finished with their first bowls, and had only begun to drink the broth when Teuchi and Ayame slid two more towards them. Slamming their now-empty bowls down, Kiba and Naruto attacked their second bowls with just as much gusto.
112131222122112221.title: Naruto, of course!

choices: "Do you wanna hang out?"
"I'm gonna go back to my place and take a nap."
1121312221221122211.content:
Kiba and Naruto continued to dive into their bowls, savoring the amazing flavors that they had come to expect from Ichiraku's. Akamaru was in shock, as the two weren't making this feast into some sort of competition. Instead, as they slurped their noodles down, they engaged in idle conversation.

It was an amazing spectacle. The two would take massive bites of their ramen, and while chewing, they would say garbled words to each other, and they understood each other. They talked about past missions, training mishaps, and even mild gossip escaped their lips.

While this was happening, their bellies began to push out. Kiba's which was already slightly distended, lifted up his shirt once more, revealing itself to the world. At this point, Naruto's belly was still barely noticeable under his tank top.

By the fifth bowl, Kiba's shirt was just about back up to his navel, while Naruto's was making a noticeable imprint on his tank top, threatening to lift it up.

By the tenth bowl, Kiba's shirt no longer covering any of his belly, and his belly stuck out completely. Kiba had already removed his pants button a while back in anticipation, so his belly freely took up as much space as it needed, beginning to force open Kiba's zipper. Naruto's pants button was open for the same reason, but he wouldn't need the relief quite yet, because at this point, his tank top was still barely over his belly button. He had also pulled one bowl ahead of Kiba.

At this point, Kiba slowed down, only eating three more bowls before deciding to stop, topping off at thirteen bowls, his belly having forced open his zipped the rest of the way, resting comfortably on his lap without putting very much strain on his clothes. As Naruto continued his binge, Kiba played with his belly, and the two giggled at how it wobbled and swayed as Kiba batted it around childishly.

By this time, Naruto had finished six more bowls, and didn't look like he was going to slow down soon. His stomach had since lifted up his tank top the rest of the way, filling up every inch of space in front of him. The bloated appendage had pushed his zipper down nearly all the way.

Naruto continued his binge as Kiba began to talk to Akamaru, showing him his belly. Now without distraction, Naruto sped up a bit, plowing through a whopping seven more bowls before he finally decided to stop. He went a bit overboard, and his stomach showed, sticking out quite a bit in front of him, and considerably wider than the rest of his body, Naruto's belly was dressed with the wrinkled up bottom of his tank top. It stretched a few seams in his cargo pants, especially his inseam, quite considerably, threatening to tear them at any moment.

In any case, Kiba had watched as Naruto finished his last two bowls, and when Naruto finished, he began to play with his belly like Kiba had earlier. When Naruto played with his belly, however, it had much less give, as his stomach was just about stretched to its limits. Either way, now that they were done, Naruto thanked Kiba for eating with him, then said...
1121312221221122211.title: The two go through numerous bowls, eating their...

choices: It was the owner of the buffet they'd sponsored a few years back
It was one of their Jounin instructors
11213122212211222111.content:
Kiba shrugged. "Eh, why not? I don't really have anything big planned." He massaged his belly, letting out a burp as he did so. "I mean, all I was gonna do was take a walk with Akamaru to try to work off what was left from our pig-out earlier."

Naruto grinned. "That actually sounds like a pretty good idea." Placing his hands on the counter, he pushed off, his stomach coming free with an audible "plop." Using the counter as leverage, he stood up and turned around, distended belly wobbling. Letting out a satisfied belch, Naruto leaned against the counter, elbows resting on top of it. He could have sworn he felt his inseam rip a little bit, but he ignored it. "I could use a walk, too."

Smirking, Kiba scooted out with a bit less difficulty and made his way to his feet. Akamaru, ever diligent, stood up, allowing Kiba to lean on him and caught him as he stumbled from his new center of gravity. "Still, that thing's even bigger than my gut; you think you can manage it?" He massaged his belly with one hand.

"What, this thing?" Naruto smacked his stomach a few times, releasing a titanic belch as a result. At about the same time, the tiny rip in his inseam grew a little more. "It'll be no problem." Turning his head, he waved at Teuchi and Ayame. "Thanks for the food!" The two nodded and thanked him in turn, still marveling at how big Naruto and Kiba's stomachs had gotten.

With a "hup!", Naruto pushed himself up off the counter, massive belly wobbling. He stumbled forward a bit, pinwheeling his arms, but he managed to bend his knees just enough to steady him. He frowned as he heard a ripping noise-yep, that was definitely his inseam ripping-but he wasn't about to give Kiba the satisfaction. Slowly, he stood back up, his stomach sticking out in front of him. Giggling, he reached his arms out and held his belly from its underside. He glanced to his friend. "Ready to get going, Kiba?"

The dog-nin rolled his eyes. "Pfft; I was ready five minutes ago."

Naruto scowled and gave him an annoyed, yet somehow friendly punch in the shoulder. "Ah, shut it, dog breath." He took a lurching step forward, his belly wobbling even as he held it.

Kiba smirked toothily, taking uncertain steps as he leaned on Akamaru. "Only if you do it first, Uzumaki.

Soon, the two were waddling through the streets, bellies bouncing and wobbling all the while. Naruto giggled at the sensations, and even Kiba couldn't resist a goofy grin. Naruto's inseams were currently holding, but it would only be a matter of time before they ripped again. This didn't particularly bother him, of course; after all, they were walking through the village looking beyond pregnant with their bare bellies sticking out from under their shirts, and they'd already attracted several incredulous stares.

As they walked, Kiba and Naruto alternately chatted and argued, though their moods remained quite high. Walking beside Kiba, Akamaru occasionally chimed in with his two bits, though of course only Kiba could understand him.

Ah, that never gets old, Akamaru though wryly as Naruto began venting his displeasure at being left out of the conversation, while Kiba merely laughed at his annoyance.

As they chatted, argued, and laughed, none of them expected to run into the person who greeted them...
11213122212211222111.title: "Do you wanna hang out?"

choices: Tsunade wants to see you two. She said something about your eating skills.
I found a flyer for an eating competition that would be right up your alley!
112131222122112221112.content:
The masked, silver-haired jonin who served as the leader of Naruto's squad greeted the two teens, his smile and currently pleasant disposition made obvious by his tone. "Looks like you guys were hungry!" Kakashi observed, chuckling a bit, as it was typical to see the two in this state.

Naruto smiled back jovially, and said "Yeah! I guess the two of us can really pack away some Ichiraku's!", patting his protruding midsection proudly for emphasis.

Kiba then asked, "Hey Kakashi sensei, what are ya up to?"

Kakashi merely replied, "Today's my day off, so I think I'm gonna relax and read a book in the shade!" Naruto was about to respond, but Kakashi interrupted, saying, "Oh, I almost forgot..."
112131222122112221112.title: It was one of their Jounin instructors

choices: Drink only half and become 12 again
Drink it all and become 8 again
1121312221221122211121.content:
Naruto blinked. "Eh? Really? What'd she say?"

Kakashi shrugged. "She just said she wants you two to see her as soon as possible." He gave Naruto's belly a teasing pat, causing the blonde to flush and Kiba to burst out laughing; even Akamaru wagged his tail. "Of course, I'm sure she'd understand if you wanted to digest a bit first..."

"N-no, that's alright," Naruto stammered, regaining his composure.

Kiba smirked. "Yeah, we're good."

Kakashi shrugged again. "Suit yourselves." With that, he turned and strolled off, absorbed in his book.

Kiba and Naruto looked at each other. "So," Kiba began, beginning to walk with Akamaru's support, "whaddaya think the Hokage wants?"

Naruto shrugged, taking hold of his stomach and lurching after them. "Dunno, but Kakashi-sensei said it had to do with our eating skills..." his face lit up. "Ooh! Maybe it's a ramen eating contest?"

Kiba rolled his eyes. "But it could be, I dunno, just a regular eating contest? Seriously, Naruto, you have such a one-track mind...." Akamaru barked something to him, and he grinned. "Scratch that, it's a two-track mind: ramen and being Hokage." Naruto turned red and spluttered something, but Kiba had managed to put on a burst of speed, so he didn't hear what he said specifically. Cursing, the blonde ninja waddled as fast as he could after them.
---

Tsunade sighed as Naruto squeezed through her door, almost getting his belly caught in the process. Panting, he stood beside Kiba, who had had similar difficulties but had at least had Akamaru to help him. "Alright, granny, what's this about our eating skills?"

Eyes narrowing a bit at Naruto's blunt rudeness, Tsunade nonetheless answered. "There's a small village not too far from here that holds an eating contest every year to bleed off its surplus food; I want you two to enter and win."

Naruto and Kiba glanced at one another. "They have an eating contest just to get rid of their extra food?" Kiba asked, curious.

Tsunade nodded. "Yes; in recent years, the village experienced a recent boom in crop and cattle production, but as it was fairly recent, their population hasn't quite caught up yet."

"Not that I'm complaining, Granny," Naruto butted in, annoying both the Hokage and the Inuzuka, "But why not send Choji? He'd be great for this sort of thing."

Tsunade closed her eyes and folded her hands over her desk. "He was my first choice, but he's currently on a mission with his team; he won't be back for a few days. One more thing...I know you may not like it, but I'd appreciate if a decent portion of your winnings was given to the village."

Naruto and Kiba's eyes widened, and their mouths contorted into scowls. "Huh?! Why?!" Kiba demanded, Akamaru growling to help him get his point across.

Tsunade sighed. "I was hoping not to tell you, but the village has made some...unwise investments, and I'd like to repair at least some of the damage."

Smirking, Naruto leaned over to Kiba and whispered, "Basically, she blew a ton of the village's money on gambling." Kiba smirked in return, until he saw the piercing look Tsunade was giving them. Shushing Naruto (much to the blonde's annoyance), he quickly stood back to attention. "Al-alright, we'll save some of the money."

Tsunade nodded. "Very good...but there's one last detail I need to share with the two of you." Seeing she had the two's attention, she pressed on slowly. "The way the contest works, the younger the contestant, the higher the cash prizes are."

Naruto tilted his head, confused. "Huh? What're you..."

Kiba, however, had caught onto what she was saying immediately. "Oh, you've gotta be kidding..." Akamaru whimpered, though in truth he was feeling oddly...glad about this.

Naruto wasn't too far behind Kiba. "Wait a sec! Are you..."

Tsunade nodded, pulling two bottles of liquid out from under her desk. "For this mission, you'll be required to regress your bodies in order to maximize the cash prize. The minimum age for the contest, but if you simply wish to return to the age at which you two first became Genin, that will be acceptable as well."

Kiba stared at the bottles of liquid. "And...that's the bark extract we ran into problems with a couple years back?"

The Hokage shook her head. "Good guess, but no. This is a specially-designed compound normally used for stealth missions, but it's useful for missions such as these as well. Don't worry, all you have to do is make this hand sign," she made the Tiger sign, "and you'll immediately return to your proper age."

Naruto looked at the bottles apprehensively. "Granny, do we really have to?"

"Yes," Tsunade replied in a tone that brooked no argument. Grabbing the bottles, she got up and placed them in Naruto and Kiba's hands. "Now, if you only want to go back a few years, drink half. If you want to go all the way and become 8-year-old children, drink it all."

"O-OK..." Kiba mumbled, looking at the vial in his hand.

Nodding, Tsunade returned to her desk. "You leave tomorrow morning; pack appropriately. Drink those tonight if possible. Don't worry, you won't be stuck sleeping with massive stomachs on smaller bodies; they'll shrink in proportion to how much you shrink."
---
Several hours later, Kiba sat up in his bed, scowling at the vial in his hand. Akamaru was curled up on Kiba's bed, looking at Kiba with worry, but also a strange sense of excitement that he couldn't quite explain.

Thanks to his fast metabolism, Kiba's gut had partially digested, and thus only a bit of skin stuck out from under his shirt, though his stomach still protruded somewhat noticeably. And besides, it probably wouldn't matter, considering what he was about to do...

Kiba sighed, looking closer at the vial and trying to make a decision.

If he only drank half and become the age he was when he graduated the academy, he'd still be able to defend himself if things went south. On the other hand, if he drank it all, he'd still have Akamaru to protect him and Naruto, and besides, it could be sorta fun...

After several minutes of deliberation, Kiba uncorked the vial, having decided to...
1121312221221122211121.title: A Mission and a Decision

choices: 12, so Tsunade let the three go alone, as Naruto and Akamaru could still fight.
8, so Tsunade called in someone to escort the three and keep them under control.
11213122212211222111212.content:
Kiba knew that he would probably not be able do this again, so he downed the whole thing in one sitting, instantly being overcome by a strange tingling sensation that tickled quite a bit.

Kiba burst into a fit of laughter, causing Akamaru to worry a bit. Akamaru watched, amazed, as Kiba began shrinking at a noticeable pace, laughing the entire time. His skin became softer and smoother, as his entire body shrank in proportion.

His hands, which were getting smaller and smaller, disappearing into his long-sleeved night shirt. His feet did the same into his pajama bottoms, which looked like cotton sweatpants.

His face lost quite a bit of its roughness, becoming more childish in appearance as his shoulders narrowed and he disappeared into a pile of his clothing, laughing the entire time.

Akamaru then got some of Kiba's clothes that he used the last time they de-aged at the resort, and Kiba finally stopped laughing, smiling jovially as he looked at his hands and felt the energy he used to have as a kid.

He changed into a set of smaller pajamas. They were blue and they had patterns of dog bones and dog food bowls. He wanted to play with Akamaru, but it was getting late, and Akamaru wanted Kiba to get some sleep for the trip.

Now that Kiba was so small, Akamaru was practically a bed to him, and he nestled in by the chest his large doggie friend.

The next morning, Kiba got up and got dressed, wearing a pair of cargo shorts and a dark green t-shirt. The shirt had a white collar and white around the edges of the sleeves.

Either way, Kiba put on his sandals and, as he had already packed the night before, all he needed to do was pick up his stuff and go. He did so, then burst outside, waiting for Akamaru, who he climbed onto.

Kiba rode Akamaru, who was practically a small horse to him, and the two soon arrived at the Hokage's office. Naruto was already there, and he was...
11213122212211222111212.title: Drink it all and become 8 again

choices: They reach the village with no difficulty
Naruto and Kiba grow bored on the way there
112131222122112221112122.content:
Kiba beamed as Akamaru squeezed in through the office's door. "Hey, guys!"

"Hi, Kiba!" A high-pitched, but rather familiar, voice piped up. Starting, Kiba looked down from his perch towards the source of the voice, grinning at what his eyes found. "Hey, Naruto! You go all the way, too?" He hopped off Akamaru, coming face-to-face with the little blonde boy, about the same age he was right now, in the room.

Giggling, Naruto-wearing orange cargo shorts and a short-sleeved blue shirt with spiral drawn all over it-raised his fist in the air. "Heh, you bet!" Smirking in return, Kiba returned the fist bump. "After how much fun we had last time, there was no way I was gonna pass this up!"

Stepping back, Kiba rubbed the back of his head, smiling. "Yeah, that's what I was thinkin' too..."

Naruto continued to giggle, folding his arms behind his head. "Ooh, this is gonna be so much fun..."

As the two chatted excitedly, Akamaru watched them, wagging his tail. They both seemed so happy, so carefree...

"Ahem."

Yelping in shock, both boys stopped and spun around to face Tsunade. "H-heh; sorry, Granny," Naruto replied, smiling sheepishly and rubbing the back of his head.

In spite of herself, Tsunade smiled. "It's alright, Naruto; we just need to get moving is all." She cleared her throat again, all business. "Now, seeing as how you both ingested all of the compound, I've had to make some special arrangements."

Kiba tilted his head. "Eh? What kind of arrangements?"

Tsunade pinched the bridge of her nose; they weren't going to like this...

"Seeing as how you've both fully regressed into 8-year-old children, I thought it would be a good idea to send someone with you..."

"WHAT?!" Naruto and Kiba exclaimed, eyes widening.

Naruto was the first one to step up and voice his complaints. "Granny, we're still ninjas! We can take care of ourselves; we don't need anyone to babysit us!"

Tsunade looked away, looking slightly pained. "Maybe, but I doon't want to take that chance; the fact is, you're weaker when you're like this, and more mentally fragile, even if you don't realize it right now."

Indignant, Kiba spoke up. "Y-yeah? Well, we'll get through it just fine! Besides," he turned to the side, grinning at Akamaru. "We'll have Akamaru around to protect us!" Laughing, he hugged the dog's neck, and Akamaru felt an intense surge of joy; he couldn't resist licking the side of Kiba's face.

Tsunade watched the two, not feeling like arguing but needing to get her point across, and contemplating how to do so. Finally, it came to her; it was underhanded, and she wasn't looking forward to doing it, but she had to show what sorts of things could happen.

"Oh?" Tsunade spoke up. "What if Akamaru gets infected with a virus that makes him feral?" Gasping, Kiba looked up at Tsunade, though his arms were still wrapped around his neck. Akamaru yelped and looked up.

Naruto, surprised at her choice of words, blinked. "Eh? You mean like that time a few years ago, when you had me tailing him?"

Tsunade nodded. "Exactly like that. He grew ill, attacked his comrades, and had we not been able to administer a cure..."

A loud sniff suddenly sounded across the room. Recognizing it's source, Naruto turned towards it. "Kiba? Is something..." his eyes widened as he got a look at Kiba.

The little dog-nin was shaking, his arms growing tighter around Akamaru's neck. His bottom lip was trembling, and tears were starting to collect in his eyes. "K-Kiba?"

Kiba didn't reply, having just realized the reaction he was having. True, that incident a few years ago was something he'd rather forget: watching Akamaru suffer, trying to find a cure, almost losing him... but he'd long since filed that unpleasant memory away. Brought out into the open, though, and in a state like this...

Unable to take it anymore, Akamaru nuzzled Kiba, wrapping one of his forelegs around him. Easy, Kiba, easy; we got out of it OK, and I got vaccinated against it; I'm not going anywhere. His reassuring words seemed to ease Kiba's nerves a bit; his stopped shaking, but the accumulated tears had begun to trace their way down his face, and he pulled in closer to Akamaru. Growling, Akamaru looked up at Tsunade. Hey, lady, ya mind telling us what that was about?

Naruto, though he didn't speak dog, had a good idea of what the ninken was saying. "Yeah, what didja do that for?"

Tsunade sighed. "I'm sorry, I really am," she replied in a genuinely apologetic tone. "I just didn't know how else to hammer it through that you were vulnerable like this."

"B-but Akamaru's not going to get infected again?" Kiba piped up, looking up from Akamaru's fur.

The Hokage smiled and shook her head. "Incredibly unlikely; he's been vaccinated against those sorts of viruses, so he should be safe." Kiba's face lit up at this, and he nuzzled against Akamaru's head. The dog barked happily and nuzzled him back. Told ya.
