Happy to see that that particular hurdle was taken care of, Tsunade spoke again. "That is not the only reason I'm sending someone to accompany you, though; considering how energetic you two are at your proper ages, there's every chance you might get distracted by someone and wander off."

Wiping his eyes, Kiba frowned. "Hey, we'll be able to concentrate just fine! We---" His nostrils expanded, and a wide smile suddenly came across his face. "Ooh, do ya smell that, Akamaru?" Walking towards the window, he continued sniffing. "Mmm, it smells like someone's making barbecue!"

Again, Tsunade could not resist smiling. Naruto, however, looked disgruntled. Pouting, he folded his arms. "Oh, way to prove her point, dog-breath. You..." His eyes widened as something zipped by the window. "Hey, did ya see the size of that bird that flew by!" He ran up to the window, opening it and standing on his tip-toes. "It was huge! I..." He ground to a halt as he realized what he'd been doing. His face flushed, and he looked down at the ground. Kiba seemed to come to a similar realization, having stopped sniffing and flushing in a similar way, rubbing the back of his head.

Unable to resist, Tsunade chuckled briefly, but quickly composed herself. "Seeing as how that's the case..." She called out the door. "You can come in now."

The door opened, and...

Naruto and Kiba's eyes widened; even Akamaru whined in surprise.

"Hinata?!" Both children exclaimed. The meek Hyuuga simply smiled and nodded. Soon, though, their new childish minds quickly overrode their shock, and their faces split into huge grins. Quicker than Hinata could blink, they rushed towards her and hugged her tightly. Seeing a little Naruto hug-well, more like squeeze-her, Hinata flushed a deep pink. Akamaru, not to be left out, trotted over to Hinata and nuzzled her side, rewarding him with a dainty pat on the head.

Smiling at the sight, Tsunade nonetheless pressed on. "Hinata has her things set; you'll set out immediately."

In a short time, the four had departed the village gates, heading for their mission.
112131222122112221112122.title: 8, so Tsunade called in someone to escort the t...

choices: After a normal dinner, they go to bed.
The restaurant is a buffet, and Kiba and Naruto get a little too carried away.
1121312221221122211121221.content:
Luckily for Hinata, the village was less than a day away from the leaf village. In addition, under Akamaru's watch, Kiba and Naruto stayed fairly well behaved, though they did chase each other around occasionally, giggling in delight the entire time.

They reached the village, and they found it riddled with banners advertising for the eating contest. Because of this, it wasn't hard to find the registration table, where Hinata registered the two children. The receptionist was surprised by how young Kiba and Naruto were, but she nonetheless smiled warmly, giving both boys, and Akamaru, or course, pats on the head, thanking them for helping the village with their food problem. Unfortunately, Akamaru wasn't allowed compete in the actual competition and win, but he was still welcome to his own food from the competition if he wanted any. He just wouldn't be a part of the competition.

Either way, Tsunade had already sent a letter to the hotel the night before, reserving the room for the three. Tsunade knew the hotel owner well, and he owed her a favor, so he gave the four a room for free. Hinata got her own bed, while Kiba and Naruto had to share the other bed. Once Hinata said this to the two, they immediately began bickering, as usual.

"Why do I gotta sleep in the same bed as dog breath?" Naruto complained, causing Kiba to yell, "I don't like it either! I don't wanna share my bed with anyone, especially not that idiot!"

Before it got too out of hand, Hinata timidly spoke up, "Why do you two butt heads all the time? We're all friends, right?" Kiba and Naruto then stopped bickering, and thought about it, then Naruto said, "I guess it won't be so bad." Then Kiba replied, "I guess not. Besides, Akamaru will be with us! You can see how comfy his fur is!" Naruto smiled as he heard this, and he began petting Akamaru, saying "Wow, that is comfy!"

Soon enough, the four had already arrived at the room, opening it to reveal two large beds, a closet, and the door to a clean bathroom with fancy marble counter tops and a marble bathtub and shower. The beds were also soft and comfortable. Either way, the four dropped off their luggage before going downstairs to the hotel restaurant for dinner.
1121312221221122211121221.title: They reach the village with no difficulty

choices: Still asleep, in humorous (and embarrassing) positions
Wide awake, already scrambling for some clothes
11213122212211222111212211.content:
The four entered the hotel's dining room, finding it a surprisingly nice affair; it was simple, but what little furnishings there were lent a surprisingly homey feel to it, which worked well with the walls, which were painted a soothing brown.

Walking up to the front desk, Hinata requested a table for three; luckily, there were a few still open, and the attendant gladly led them to one. Once all three had been seated (with Akamaru beside Kiba on the floor, of course), he handed out three menus.

The three ordered their drinks-Hinata a simple glass of water, Naruto some juice, and Kiba some soda-and thanked the man, and as he walked away, they began poring over the menus.

"Just be careful not to eat too much," Hinata softly advised, looking through the menu. "The eating contest's tomorrow, and I don't want either of you getting sick beforehand."

Kiba lowered his menu, beaming. "Heh, thanks, Hinata! Don't worry; we won't go overboard." His eyes returned to the menu, his gaze falling upon the meat section.

Naruto giggled, poring through the menu and finding a large bowl of ramen with a lot of toppings. "Still, we're hungry, so whatever we get, it's gonna be big!" Flipping the menu around, he displayed the picture of the ramen. "This is what I'm getting!"

Smirking, Kiba turned his own menu around, revealing a rather large steak. "Not bad, Naruto, but that's nothing compared to this!" Akamaru whined, and Kiba flashed his canine friend a grin. "Don't worry, Akamaru, I'll get one for you too!" The dog barked happily, wagging his tail.

Soon, the waiter had returned with their drinks, and they'd each placed their order: Hinata ordered a simple salad with a few strips of meat, Kiba ordered a rather sizable steak, and Naruto ordered the bowl of ramen.

Within a matter of minutes, the waiter returned, bearing their meals. Hinata politely thanked him as he set hers down in front of her, but Naruto and Kiba merely grinned widely as the steaming bowl of ramen and big, juicy steak were set in front of them. Akamaru, at least, barked his thanks as his own steak was set before him.

The man smiled. "Let me know if there's anything else I can get for you." With that, he turned and walked away.

Naruto and Kiba didn't waste any time: clasping their hands together and uttering a happy cry of "Itadakimasu!", they grabbed their chopsticks and fork and knife, respectively, and began digging in. Akamaru wasn't too far behind them, already chomping down on his steak. Hinata, watching with a little bit of shock, absentmindedly began picking at her own meal.

Naruto and Kiba attacked their meals with gusto, the grins never leaving their faces. "Mmm!" Naruto exclaimed after slurping up a particularly large helping of noodles and toppings. "This is really yummy!"

Kiba nodded, tearing off a piece of his steak and sticking it in his mouth. "And this steak is really tender and juicy too!" He chewed it and swallowed it, quickly cutting off another piece. Akamaru, having taken a huge bite out of his steak, licked his chops and dove back in, backing up Kiba.

Hinata watched the two eat, a smile on her face; as surprising as their eagerness was, there was something undeniably...cute about the whole thing. Whether it was Kiba, her dear friend a teammate, completely and utterly enjoying himself as he forked bite after bite of succulent steak into his mouth, or Naruto, the boy she had loved and admired for so long, in complete bliss as he slurped up his favorite dish, the surprise over seeing the two like this was quickly replaced by a warm sensation in her chest.

Sensing this, Akamaru looked up from his steak and wagged his tail upon seeing Hinata's expression. Welcome to the club, Hinata.

Soon, the boys let their utensils clatter to the table, and they leaned back in their seats, patting their stomachs. Hinata, having already finished hers, continued to watch the two.

"Mmm, that was good!" Naruto exclaimed, closing his eyes and letting his tongue stick out the side of his mouth.

"You said it," Kiba responded, letting out a little burp and giggling, flushing a bit when he realized what he was doing. "We should probably stop now, though."

Akamaru, licking his chops after having finished his steak, looked at the two. Heh; that's probably a good idea. Though they had only had one dish each, the sheer size of each had ensured it would have some effect on their stomachs: specifically, they had rounded out considerably, making a noticeable imprint on their shirts. However, they still remained hidden from the world.

Hinata, politely dabbing at her mouth with a napkin, addressed the two. "Did you two have a good meal?"

Naruto massaged his belly. "Uh-huh!" Without warning, he suddenly let loose with a loud yawn. "Kinda sleepy, though..."

Kiba, having just finished his own yawn, smacked his lips. "Yeah; I could probably go for a nap, too." Hinata smiled warmly at this.

The waiter came back, depositing their check. Leaving the money on the table, Hinata stood up from her chair; sluggishly, the two boys leaped out of their chairs, staggering a bit but quickly righting themselves. Akamaru got up to walk beside Kiba; the two weren't ridiculously bloated, so he probably wouldn't need to act as a crutch, but it never hurt to be sure.

They made their way back to their room, Naruto and Kiba rubbing their bellies with both hands on the while, giving content sighs and occasionally burping, which only made the two giggle and Hinata's face heat up a bit more.

Eventually, they reached their room, and Naruto and Kiba scattered towards their own personal luggage, rummaging through until they came back out with their favored pajamas: in Naruto's case, it was simply cotton sweatpants with a short-sleeved black pajama shirt. Kiba, on the other hand, wore a two-piece pajama outfit, colored red with a large bone on the front and back of the shirt. In addition, his pajama pants bore numerous little bones on it.

They squabbled a bit over who would use the bathroom first to change, but Hinata had eventually stepped in with a polite suggestion: the bathtub had a curtain, so they could both go in and change without feeling uncomfortable. The two had been quick to take this suggestion, grabbing their pajamas and darting into the bathroom. Once they were both out of sight, Hinata took the opportunity to change into her own night clothes: specifically, an set of white silk pajamas.

Soon, Naruto and Kiba emerged, both clad in their respective pajamas, both yawning. Wagging his tail, Akamaru hopped up on their bed, curling his body so both of them could rest against him. Unable to keep from giggling, Naruto and Kiba ran towards the bed, climbing up and nestling deep against Akamaru's fur: Kiba elected to sleep against his chest, while Naruto elected to take his stomach. Sitting up, he waved at Hinata. "G'night, Hinata!"

Flushing a bit, Hinata waved back. "G-good night, Naruto; good night, Kiba."

Kiba stuck his arm up in the air and waved. "'Night!" He rolled over to face Naruto. "G'night, Naruto; g'night, Akamaru."

Smiling, Naruto yawned again. "'Night, Kiba; 'night, Akamaru."

With the good nights taken care of, they rolled back over so they were facing away from each other. Within minutes, they were snoring gently, fast asleep. Akamaru looked down at them fondly before he, too, laid his head down and closed his eyes.

Smiling warmly at the sight, Hinata climbed into her own bed and closed her eyes. They had a big day tomorrow, after all...

When next she opened her eyes, there was sunlight streaming in through the windows. Sitting up, she rubbed her eyes and looked over towards Naruto and Kiba's bed. They were...
11213122212211222111212211.title: After a normal dinner, they go to bed.

choices: Was divided into rounds like many of its type.
Was set up like a buffet, with a scale for competitors to weigh their food.
112131222122112221112122112.content:
Hinata couldn't help but giggle as she saw Kiba and Naruto digging through their clothing in order to find something to wear. Naruto found a pair of black shorts, and was about to change and wear them, but he heard, "Hey!" and turned around to see an angry eight year old Kiba.

Kiba yelled at Naruto, saying, "That's mine, you idiot? How did you even get that?" Naruto then began yelling back, saying, "What are you talkin' about, dog breath? I've always had these shorts!" Kiba then yelled back, "No, that's mine! Yours is over there!", pointing to a similar pair of shorts behind Naruto.

Upon inspecting the pair of shorts, Naruto's face turned bright red, and he said, "I guess you're right, Kiba" Kiba couldn't help but giggle, and soon everyone in the hotel room was laughing. Either way, when everything was said and done, Naruto wore that pair of black shorts and with it, an orange shirt with a black Konoha symbol on it. Kiba wore a pair of blue shorts with a red shirt that also had a black Konoha symbol. They both had decided to represent their village, hence the shirts. Hinata merely wore the same outfit she typically wore.

Either way, the group finally arrived at the competition, and they waited eagerly as the judge read the rules. It turns out that the competition...
112131222122112221112122112.title: Wide awake, already scrambling for some clothes

choices: Before finishing their first plates, Naruto and Kiba stop to take a breather
Naruto and Kiba finish their first plates, and quickly go back for more
1121312221221122211121221122.content:
Kiba and Naruto's eyes widened as the judge laid out the rules; as opposed to a typical competition, where each contestant would be brought a certain kind of food, the competitors would all be given access to a huge buffet, where they would load up their plate and then have it weighed, repeating the process once the plate was empty. Whoever could eat the most food in the time given would, of course, be the winner.

Once the judge gave everyone the OK to start, Naruto and Kiba rushed to the buffet, grabbed plates, and began loading them up with everything they laid eyes on. In the meantime, Hinata and Akamaru chose one of the provided table to settle down in, making sure there were two spare seats for the boys.

In a matter of minutes, all the contestants had gotten their first plates filled and weighed, and they began staggering back to their seats under the weight of their plates. Likewise, Kiba and Naruto struggled towards the table, their plates similarly laden. Hinata gasped, and Akamaru whined; the food on the plates reached at least a couple feet into the air, and it was loaded with everything from noodles, dango, and bean buns to cookies, cake, pie, and everything else in-between.

Finally reaching the table, they set their platters down, making an impact Hinata noticed. Licking their lips, they seated themselves, grabbed their utensils, and with a cry of "Itadakimasu!", they dug in, Naruto forking huge mouthfuls of noodles into his mouth and interspersing it with gulps of juice that had been provided, with Kiba alternately taking bites of chicken legs and dango.

Hinata stared, "eep"-ing a little bit at the speed and energy with which the boys tackled their first plates. Akamaru, on the other hand, stared a bit longingly at Kiba; he knew Kiba had had his hands full with his huge plate, but he could at least have waited a bit and gotten him a little something...

As though on cue, a waiter came by their table and laid large plate laden with huge steaks in front of Akamaru. Gaping, Akamaru looked at Kiba; even as he went to town, he caught Akamaru's gaze and winked.

Akamaru barked in return, wagging his tail; to think he'd doubted Kiba for a second. Licking his chops, he returned his attention to his platter, took a deep whiff, opened his jaws, and began taking huge bites out of it; however, he took his time, since he wasn't exactly on a schedule...

As the minutes ticked boy, the massive piles of food on Naruto and Kiba's plates slowly dwindled in height. Owing to the ridiculous amount piled on, however, Naruto and Kiba's stomachs had already begun to change, becoming noticeably round and making a distinct imprint against their shirts, which, very gradually, grew more apparent as the plates dwindled.

Hinata, nibbling on a cinnamon roll that had been brought to the table (also at Kiba's request), stared on, not sure whether she should be worried about the two making themselves sick or amazed at how they put the food away. Akamaru, leisurely eating his steaks, glanced at the two, equally conflicted; on the one hand, he worried about them, but on the other hand, the way in which the grinned and giggled as they ate, and generally seemed to be having fun{/}, he couldn't help but wag his tail.
1121312221221122211121221122.title: Was set up like a buffet, with a scale for comp...

choices: Maybe one more steak.
Many more steaks. He was going all the way today.
11213122212211222111212211222.content:
The two were having so much fun that they didn't even realize that they had already finished a copious amount of food. They were talking and giggling, and completely oblivious to the fact that their shirts had already lifted up almost to their bellybuttons. They also didn't realize that they were in the lead as they searched for food, their bellies wobbling as they did so.

Hinata merely watched, giggling as the two began bickering over who should take the last of the fried dumplings. This ended as the chef brought out more, satisfying both. By this time, Akamaru was already almost done with his steaks, having gotten carried away as he savored the meaty flavors. His stomach now stuck out quite noticeably, and because of this he felt satisfyingly full. He could eat more if he wanted to. After all, it would help the village with their food problem.

Either way, after weighing their plates, and getting a nod from the judge, the two, who were now children, stumbled to their table, and both Hinata and Akamaru's eyes widened as they plopped the plates down, ran back to the buffet, and each brought back another plate. All the good looking food was making Akamaru a little hungry, so before the two started, he asked Kiba for...
11213122212211222111212211222.title: Naruto and Kiba finish their first plates, and ...

choices: "Sure, I like these shorts anyway"
"Nah, let's just pop 'em"
112131222122112221112122112222.content:
Kiba beamed. "Sure thing, buddy!" Hopping off his chair (and causing his belly to shake in the process,) he lumbered back up to the buffet. Grabbing a plate, he staggered over to the meat section and loaded his plate up with the biggest, juiciest steaks he could find. Once they were loaded up to his satisfaction, he made his way back to the table, where Naruto had already started on one of his two plates. Glaring at the Uzumaki, he shook it off for the moment and made his way over to the dog, who was finishing the last of his steaks. Looking up and licking his chops, he wagged his tail at the sight of the steaks piled on the plate.

Kiba grinned. "Here ya go, Akamaru!" Slowly bending at the knees (owing to his growing stomach), he gently set the plate in front of the dog, giggling as Akamaru licked his cheek in thanks. "Ya need anything else, just lemme know!" At Akamaru's affirmative bark, he ruffled the dog's head and returned to his seat, picking up a fork. Glaring at Naruto, who was continuing to dig into the first of his two plates, he attacked his own first plate with a startling burst of speed, shoveling noodles, meat, and assorted stir-fried veggies into his maw. With the other hand, he grabbed various hand food-chicken wings, fried dumplings, cookies, and the like-shoving them inside his mouth simultaneously. Soon, he had caught up to Naruto.

They glared at each other out the corner of their eyes...only to burst into giggles, almost spraying their food everywhere. Composing themselves, they leaped back into the fray, cramming their mouths full of everything they could get their hands and utensils on.

Hinata watched, awestruck, as their bellies continued to grow the more they crammed into them. Up, up, up their shirts went, until their navels finally exposed themselves for the whole world to see. Sensing this, the boys swallowed their current mouthfuls and looked down at their bellies, seeing the pits in the middle of their midsections. Getting an idea, they continued to shovel food into their mouths with one hand, playing around with their navels with the other. Naruto wriggled his finger around in his, giggling through his mouthfuls, while Kiba merely let his mouth stretch into a dopey grin.

Soon, they tired of this and returned their full attention to their first plates, and their bellies resumed their slow but steady growth, their shirts slowly rising further above their navels and their bellies pressing harder and harder against the buttons of their shorts.

About halfway through their current plates (they had packed a ton on them, so they were still on the first of the two they had brought to the table,) they both stopped to take a breather, patting their bellies proudly as they licked their lips. "Oh man, this stuff is awesome!" Naruto exclaimed, burping and giggling a little bit.

Kiba massaged his belly happily. "Yeah!" He winced as he felt a tightness in his waist. "Gut's startin' to make my shorts tight, though..."

Naruto frowned as he felt the same pressure. "Huh, mine too. Ya think we should unbutton 'em?"

Kiba thought for a few seconds, before replying...
112131222122112221112122112222.title: Many more steaks. He was going all the way today.

choices: They maintained their speed, determined to win.
They slowed down after their first plate, and needed encouragement.
1121312221221122211121221122222.content:
Kiba added, "Besides, we'll probably rip the shorts more anyway."

Feeling reassured by this, Naruto dove back in with gusto, eager to pop the button off of his shorts. Kiba fumed before diving in himself, determined not to be outdone. Within ten minutes, two pops, one right after the other, were heard, and buttons were sent whizzing across the room, one hitting a competitor on the leg, and one hitting the wall.

Hinata nearly burst out laughing seeing the competitor look under his chair to find the button that ricocheted off of his leg. She then looked back at the boys to find them rubbing their bellies with silly grins. Kiba's tongue even stuck out of the side of his mouth like a dog's, and Hinata giggled, feeling that warm sensation again.

Akamaru was focused on his steaks, having gotten into his own stuffing, and his stomach stuck out considerably, reaching closer and closer to the floor. Hinata watched the other boys, and...
1121312221221122211121221122222.title: "Nah, let's just pop 'em"

choices: The boys finish their plates and go back for new ones
They finish, and are willing to keep going, but Hinata has to get more plates
11213122212211222111212211222222.content:
Soon, Naruto and Kiba had stopped rubbing their bellies and dove right back into their meals. As the piles of food on their plates continued to shrink, their stomachs grew, forcing their shirts further up and slowly opening their flies, bringing blushes to their faces even as they giggled at the sensations.

Eventually, their plates had been utterly cleaned, and both young boys leaned back, rubbing their stomachs. "Phew," Naruto burped, licking his lips, "this village really knows how to make some yummy stuff!"

Kiba massaged his own belly, sighing contentedly. "Yeah, and there's so much of it! I can't believe we're getting paid for this!"

Hinata simply stared at the state the boys were in now. Their bellies now stuck out even further in front of them, and their shirts now rested directly on top of the globes their tummies had become. Their flies, Hinata noticed with a furious blush, were at least halfway down, the cloth of whatever undergarments they were wearing peeking out from the openings.

Unable to simply let this go, Hinata spoke up. "Um...Naruto, Kiba? Your, er, zippers..."

Naruto blinked. "Eh?" He felt around the opening, a goofy grin forming on his face as he did so. "Heh, thought I felt something funny."

"It's OK, Hinata," Kiba added, wiggling his finger in his belly button (he looked like an idiot, but he figured this was as good an opportunity as any.) "Naruto and I do this all the time when we eat a ton." He grinned, his eyes closing. "It feels funny, but in a good way." Lifting his hands off his stomach, he pulled his second plate towards him, picked up his utensils, and began going to town on it. Naruto scowled. "Oh, real funny, Kiba," he grumbled, picking up his own utensils and digging in.

Unfortunately, the time they'd spent rubbing their bellies and chatting with Hinata had allowed them to realize exactly how full they were. Therefore, it was at a much slower pace that they ate, taking longer to chew before swallowing, taking smaller bites of their food, and waiting a bit between dishes, costing precious seconds.

Hinata watched, worried. "Are you two feeling OK?"

Gulping down a mouthful of noodles, Naruto gave a weak grin. "Y-yeah; the food's just more filling than I thought." Kiba simply belched loudly, starting to look a bit queasy.

Sensing this, Akamaru looked up from his steaks, ignoring the fact that his belly was growing ever closer to the floor. C'mon, guys, don't give up now! You're doin' great!

Taking a drink of soda, Kiba looked down at Akamaru. "I know, boy, but I'm starting to feel full; I don't know if I can..."

Does it hurt? Akamaru suddenly barked, fixing Kiba with a determined stare.

Kiba blinked, surprised by the question. "N-no; my stomach's feeling tight, but it doesn't really hurt. It might start soon, though..."

As much as it did when you had to stab yourself in the gut to get that freak outta you?

Kiba's eyes widened; though Akamaru had been unconscious, he'd heard from Kiba of that Sound Ninja's freaky molecular fusion jutsu, and how he'd risked mortally wounding himself to hurt his enemy. It had hurt like hell--kunais through flesh tended to have that effect--but Akamaru had been in danger, and he'd had no intention of going down like that.

He then thought of the times when he'd truly stuffed himself to bursting. It had hurt, and he'd felt sick...but it was nothing compared to that incident. He took a moment to examine himself; though his gut was feeling uncomfortable, it wasn't even close to bursting yet!

Kiba looked back down at Akamaru, grinning. "Thanks, boy." With that, he turned back to his plate and dove back in with renewed vigor. Naruto, gaping a bit at his newfound energy, nonetheless forced himself to catch up; there was no way he was falling behind!

In a matter of minutes, both boys had re-established their momentum, shoveling food in their mouths even as their stomachs continued to grow, their flies continued to open, and the seams on the sides of their shirts began to strain.

Akamaru smirked a canine smirk. There we go; knew ya had it in ya. With that, Akamaru returned his attention to his steaks.
11213122212211222111212211222222.title: They slowed down after their first plate, and n...

choices: Akamaru had asked Kiba to order even more steaks for him.
Akamaru was finally done, and focused on the boys.
112131222122112221112122112222222.content:
Near the end of the two boys' plates, their stomachs had grown large enough to split the sides of their shirts a little. In addition, both boys' inseams were no longer intact, having ripped a little from the immense pressure. Now their bellies were large enough to not only touch the table, but also put considerable pressure on the table.

Because of this, both boys were well-wedged in, and even if they could walk, their balance was severely hampered, and they probably wouldn't be able to balance plates in addition to their massive bellies. Hinata therefore left for the buffet to grab more plates.

Soon enough, she returned, this time with only one plate for each boy, but the plates were still overly filled with food, which heaped greatly. Akamaru at this point had finished his pile of steaks, and his stomach was huge enough to touch the ground as he stood up.
112131222122112221112122112222222.title: Plate delivery

choices: Their navels give in first
The table gives in first
1121312221221122211121221122222222.content:
Akamaru winced at the sight of his belly, roughly the size of a large beach ball, brushing the floor. Eh...maybe I better lay off the steaks for now. Flushing a bit under his fur, he looked up at the table. Naruto and Kiba had polished off what was left of their second plates, and had now started on the new plates that Hinata had brought them. The dog's eyes widened at how big their stomachs had gotten.

Oh, wow, Akamaru marveled to himself, looking at the states the two were in. Guts are touchin' the table, and they're still going strong. His gaze went towards the sides of their shirts, which had ripped a bit. Shirt seams are busting, too; they ain't even slowing down! He wagged his tail; normally, he'd be worried about the two, but since this was an official mission, he found himself genuinely enjoying watching the boys stuff themselves.

He watched, intrigued, as the boys' guts gradually expanded, pushing harder against the table and causing it to creak a bit. In addition, more of their shirt seams began straining (luckily, their guts were only putting pressure on the seams under the armpit; that way, their shirts would at least stay on), and, as more and more food entered their gullets, those seams began popping one by one. And, though he couldn't quite see it just yet, there was a ripping sound every now and then that he was sure denoted their inseams continuing to rip.

Sure enough, before long, he could see cloth peeking out from inside Naruto and Kiba's ripping shorts; yellow cloth from Kiba's, white from Naruto's. He barked, wagging his tail; seeing as how he didn't have to worry about them going overboard, he found it actually sorta funny when their undies started showing...

Soon, both boys started to notice how tight their bellies were becoming against the table. Grunting, they struggled in their seats, trying to scoot backward. Sure enough, they managed to scoot a few inches away from the table; their stomachs were still pressing considerably against it, but the pressure was a good deal less than it was. Nodding in satisfaction, the boys continued to dig in, their stomachs continuing to expand.

Akamaru watched, awestruck, as they pressed on. Man, they're really serious about this, aren't they? On an odd whim, he took a look at their belly buttons; in spite of the size of their midsections, their navels remained small pits in their stomachs. With the rate they were packing it away, though, they probably wouldn't stay that way for long...

As they continued to reduce the food left on their plates, their bellies continued to press against the table, and Akamaru was sure he heard creaking. At the same time, their navels appeared to be thinning. Eeyup; those are gonna pop any second now. As soon as he thought this, the table let out another creak, and this time it was continuous. Akamaru winced. Either that, or the table's gonna give first...
1121312221221122211121221122222222.title: Akamaru was finally done, and focused on the boys.

choices: The other contestants had given up, and Naruto and Kiba had already won.
There was one team persistently hanging on, and they were catching up.
11213122212211222111212211222222221.content:
Soon enough, an audible, fleshy popping sound was heard, and Kiba began giggling, as he reached around his belly and was barely able to fiddle with the nub that his navel had become.

Soon afterwards, Naruto was giggling at a similar sensation after another fleshy pop was heard. They were completely unaware of the ominous creaking of the table. Hinata was, however, and she was barely able to save the table, which was cracked and nearly split.

Seeing this, a couple of assistants brought in small side tables for the boys' food, and the two were able to continue. Sighing a sigh of relief, Hinata looked at the scores to see that...
11213122212211222111212211222222221.title: Their navels give in first

choices: "Sure; any more and I think I'm gonna bust"
"No way! We've still got some time left, so let's use it!"
112131222122112221112122112222222211.content:
Hinata's eyes widened as she looked over the scores; Naruto and Kiba had a huge lead, the other contestants having dropped off at varying points in the competition. As a result, the two boys had the whole thing pretty much in the bag.

Hinata coughed. "U-um, Naruto, Kiba?" Both boys looked up from their plates at Hinata, food still in their mouths. "Everyone else has stopped; you've already won."

Swallowing, Naruto's eyes lit up. "Really?" He looked at Kiba, who was wearing a similar expression. "Alright!" Grinning, he bumped fists with the other boy. "Knew we'd win!"

Laughing, Kiba licked his lips. "Yeah, it's not like anyone could really keep up with us." Burping, he leaned back, rubbing his bloated tummy. "I'm startin' to get stuffed again, though; you wanna stop here?"

Thinking, Naruto folded his arms and closed his eyes. After a few minutes, he opened his eyes and replied...
112131222122112221112122112222222211.title: The other contestants had given up, and Naruto ...

choices: The head of the village congratulates the two before asking them to help him.
The group heads home the next morning, as Tsunade sent a message requesting it.
1121312221221122211121221122222222112.content:
Not wanting to be outdone, Kiba decided to keep eating with Naruto. Surprisingly, the two were back in the fray yet again. Hinata got a little worried, but she was too shy to object much. She just prepared herself for the worst.

The stomachs of Naruto and Kiba continued to push further and further outwards, ripping their inseams and shirts even more as they continued. As the timer got closer and closer to zero, Naruto and Kiba were closer and closer to finishing. Finally, just as the timer went off, Naruto and Kiba finished their last plates, and their bellies even began touching, they were so huge.

Both boys looked green in the face though, and Naruto said, "I think we went a little too far this time." as he scratched his head, grinning nervously. "Ya think?" Kiba burst out. "You know sometimes you are the biggest idiot!" he yelled before smirking, "And that's why it's so fun to hang out with ya!"

Naruto's face went from shameful to grinning as the two began talking about their latest achievement, giggling at their own antics.
1121312221221122211121221122222222112.title: "No way! We've still got some time left...

choices: They wake up, and immediately go to see the village head
They wake up, but want to work off what little's left of their bellies first
11213122212211222111212211222222221121.content:
A little bit later, Kiba and Naruto stood in front of the village head, grinning and holding their ruined pants up with both hands to keep them from falling down and leaning back against Akamaru, himself lying on his side(owing to his own belly) in order to keep their own bloated midsections from causing them to lose balance.

Shortly after the contest had ended, the village head had approached them, congratulating them and giving them a rather sizable check as a reward. However, to their surprise, he had also asked to speak to the two of them. Confused but intrigued, the boys had eagerly agreed. Now, they stood in the man's office, Hinata waiting outside just in case things got ugly.

The man chuckled. "Well, I must say I'm impressed, boys; never met anyone your age who had your appetites."

Kiba beamed, showing his teeth in a wide smile. "Eh, what can I say? We've had lotsa practice."

"Yeah!" Naruto added, sticking his tongue out to the side to get at some morsel of food on his cheek. "We compete against each other all the time! Really builds up our appetites!"

The man's eyes fell on their swollen bellies, ripped shirts, and mangled shorts. "I can certainly believe that," he replied playfully. "With that in mind, I wanted to ask if you two wanted to help me with something."

The boys shared a look. "What kinda thing do ya need help with?" Naruto piped up, burping slightly and giggling.

"Well," the village head replied, "As you know, the whole reason we hold this contest is because the village has an excess of food, more than it needs to sustain itself or even trade. That's why..." He smiled at this. "...I would like your help in further lessening our excess."

"Further help?" Kiba repeated, while Akamaru just whined. "You mean..."

"Yes," the man nodded. "For the next several days, I want the two of you to eat as much as you can; I'll even pay you more."

Naruto and Kiba's eyes lit up. "Really?!" they both exclaimed at once. At the man's affirmative nod, they beamed. "Count us in!" Naruto exclaimed, licking his lips.

"Yeah!" Kiba added. He winced as a sharp bolt of pain went through his gut. "Uh, but can we rest up first? Our guts kinda hurt..."

The village head chuckled. "Certainly; I don't need you two to begin until tomorrow, anyway."

Letting out a cheer, Kiba and Naruto high-fived each other...and promptly yelped in embarrassment when those sides of their shorts fell down, exposing Kiba's white briefs and Naruto's green boxers. Laughing nervously, they pulled them back up, thanked the man, and waited for Akamaru to struggle back to his feet. Once he had, the three of them slowly made their way out of the office to explain everything to Hinata.

Not much later, they made their way back to their hotel room, Naruto and Kiba changing into (currently rather ill-fitting) pajamas, the same they'd worn the previous night. Bidding Hinata good night, they immediately fell asleep curled against Akamaru, the gentle rise and fall of his white-furred belly lulling them to sleep.

The next day...
11213122212211222111212211222222221121.title: The head of the village congratulates the two b...

choices: Before they start, the boys reverse their de-aging so they could eat more.
The boys decide to stay young to avoid any possible confusion.
112131222122112221112122112222222211211.content:
Soon enough, the two boys were back up, scrambling for their clothes as always. At this point, there were only small remnants of their massive bellies remaining on their midsections, but they still created a somewhat noticeable bulge.

Neither boy really cared, however, as they would have plenty of time to work their food off once they get home. Soon enough, Naruto was clad in a pair of orange sweatpants and a white t-shirt with an orange Konoha symbol on it. Packing sweatpants was one of his smarter moves, as it gave his belly much more room, but he still had a feeling that even the sweatpants would not be enough to contain his soon-to-be stuffed belly.

Kiba had also packed sweatpants, and he chose to wear his black pair, ensuring that he wouldn't be quite so uncomfortable when he stuffed himself silly. With the sweatpants, he wore a plain grey t-shirt. It wasn't too presentable, but Kiba was aiming for comfort more than presentation today.

Either way, the two raced each other to the village head's office with Akamaru and Hinata trailing behind. Soon enough, they met the village head, who was waiting outside, and he greeted them pleasantly, chuckling at their goofy antics.

"Alright you two," he began. "First I'd like to thank you for taking the time to help my village. As long as you two are ready, we have a place set up for you two, and the same team of chefs we had yesterday. You'll also get a waiter so you don't have to make the little lady work so hard." Hinata politely thanked him for that as the group made its way to the location.
112131222122112221112122112222222211211.title: They wake up, and immediately go to see the vil...

choices: Follow them up until an hour later
Follow them up until two hours later
1121312221221122211121221122222222112112.content:
Eventually, the group reached a decently-sized restaurant. Opening the door, the village head indicated for Naruto and Kiba to follow him, which they did eagerly, Hinata and Akamaru following close behind.

"This restaurant's usually closed on this day of the week," the man explained as he led them through. "However, I've made a special allowance for you two." He stopped at a nicely-sized table. "If you wouldn't mind?"

The boys didn't need any second bidding; grinning, they clambered up into the seats, sitting across from one another. Hinata, as she wasn't eating ,simply elected to pull up a chair and sit near the table so she could keep an eye on them. Akamaru, obviously, laid down near Kiba's seat.

The man smiled. "The chefs should be out with your first courses in a few minutes; each serving will have some of everything, but if there's something in specific you want, just let us know." Both young boys nodded eagerly, smiling widely. Chuckling, the village head traveled to the back, presumably to get their orders started up.

Soon, several chefs brought several plates to the table, each overflowing with all kinds of treats: dumplings, noodles, meat, desserts, and the like. Naruto and Kiba's eyes lit up as their eyes fell upon the plates. Loudly thanking them, the boys picked up their utensils, and as soon as their plates were set on the table, they each pulled one in front of them and began digging in with gusto. Akamaru watched the two, more than a little worried, but a waiter thoughtfully deposited a plate of steaks in front of him. Sniffing, his mouth began watering, and it wasn't long before he, too, was digging in.

Hinata, who had eaten before they'd gotten there, simply watched the three going at it with a mixture of shock and amazement. Even after the events of the day before, the speed and eagerness with which they ate still surprised her. And, as the minutes ticked by, they showed no signs of stopping or slowing down.
1121312221221122211121221122222222112112.title: The boys decide to stay young to avoid any poss...

1121312221221122211121221122222222112112.content:
The two plowed through their plates with gusto, clearing off all the food that they could. As a result, their bellies proceeded outwards, quickly beginning to lift their shirts up.

With each passing bite, the bellies of the two pushed outwards, lifting their shirts up more an more. Soon enough, their navels were open to the world, and they still had about an inch of exposed belly above. At this point, they were finished with their plates, and a waiter went to refill them, asking for requests.

Naruto asked for anything with noodles, hopefully ramen, and Kiba asked for everything meat related.

Soon enough, the server brought back a bowl of ramen that was the size of a large cooking pot for Naruto, and for Kiba, a huge platter of meat topped with steaks, sausages, ham, bacon, and even a whole chicken at the center. The two gratefully thanked their server before they proceeded with their feast.

Naruto shoveled noodles into his mouth, and as he did so, his shirt continued to be driven further upward. Kiba's shirt did the same as he tore through a steak, not even bothering with utensils.

Akamaru was doing the same, and the damage was already showing itself, as his belly pushed outwards, distending considerably, giving him the appearance of being pregnant.

Soon enough, the bellies of the two had pushed their shirts all the way up, and because of the elasticity of their sweatpants, they were still comfortable, and there was still much more room to go.

Kiba was soon finished with his steaks, and he moved on to the ham as the bellies of the two got closer and closer to the table.

Once Kiba was done with the ham, Naruto was finished with all his noodles as the bellies of the two were only an inch from the table. Akamaru had also eaten quite a bit in terms of steaks, and his belly was getting closer and closer to the floor.

Soon enough, with the noodles finished, Naruto grinned as he sealed his lips around the cooking pot. He proceeded to tip the cooking pot over, a massive amount of broth rolling down his throat.

He suddenly dropped the pot, almost causing it to spill, but Hinata was able to catch it in time. Either way, he screamed, "HOT! HOT!!!" as he reached for a glass of ice water to sooth his discomfort. It wasn't really that hot, but, as he was younger, Naruto's pain tolerance was much less. Kiba couldn't help but giggle a bit as Naruto's face reddened.

Hinata then began comforting Naruto, saying "It's alright, Naruto. It'll cool down in a while. Are you ok?" All the while, she was blushing a vibrant red, but the others ignored it, as that was typical for Hinata whenever she talked to Naruto.

Naruto nodded, saying "Thanks Hinata." inadvertently causing her to blush even more. He waited surprisingly patiently for the broth to cool down. Being Naruto, he thought of a way to hasten the process and had a couple of shadow clones blow on the broth to cool it down.

By this time, Kiba was well into his sausages, stuffing them down his greedy maw as he grinned contentedly, his legs swinging joyously as he consumed his favorite form of meat.

Both Hinata and Akamaru smiled, and couldn't help but feel that warm feeling somewhere in their chests as they watched the antics of the two boys. Hinata looked at Akamaru, who merely nodded, as if to say, "I know that feeling all to well."

This time, Naruto was ready, and he tipped the pot of broth into his gaping maw. Hinata held the bottom just to make sure Naruto wouldn't drop it. At the same time, Kiba was about finished with his sausages, and he moved onto his bacon. His belly was now barely brushing against the table.

Soon enough, Naruto gained some momentum, and his belly began to inflate slowly like a water balloon. Kiba even stopped for a moment to watch the spectacle, and was amazed as Naruto's belly reached the table in record time.

Naruto continued to guzzle down the broth, his stomach now bisected by the table as it put more and more pressure on the poor table, causing it to put more pressure on Kiba's belly. It was even getting big enough to stretch the waistband of Naruto's sweatpants. Finally, Naruto stopped, letting out a titanic belch that shook the table. It even shook Kiba, who's belly was now somewhat wedged into the table that Naruto's belly pushed into it.

Naruto was a bit dazed, and took a break to let Kiba catch up. Kiba did, motivated to match Naruto's belly with his own. He stuffed stacks of bacon into his maw, enjoying the salty, smokey flavors. Once he was done, all that was left was the whole chicken.

Kiba, being an Inuzuka, had teeth like knives, and he didn't need to carve the turkey as he could do it himself with his hands and teeth. He began by ripping out the legs, and with one in each hand, he cleaned all the meat off expertly. He then did the same with the wings, and all that was left was the bird itself.

Kiba easily tore into each breast of the chicken, and he quickly made his way to the bone on each side. He then cleaned up any remaining meat, and left nothing but pure bone as he had completely cleaned the carcass with expert technique.

Naruto was certainly impressed, and he said, "You can sure get every last bit of meat!" Kiba smiled at the complement, saying, "Yeah, it's something that I picked up from my mom."

All the while, Akamaru had continued to eat steak after steak, and at this point, his belly touched the ground, and was threatening to spread his legs, as it had already filled in all the space in between.

Due to the sudden expansion of the bellies of the two, the table was starting to strain. The waiter came to the table to check up on the two, and...

One fine day at the Yamamoto's residence, Julie returns home with Ben opening the door for her. It was after a date which was interrupted by a gang of thieves attacking a nearby gas station. But they did stop them together when turned himself into Big Chill with the latest Omnitrix that he was given after his last fight with Vilgax. With that, Big Chill froze the three of them knee high so they wouldn't escape, while Julie with the help of Ship fired a blaster at their car and kept the last remaining guy standing.

After that, Ben and Julie kissed, then said goodbye as he left her at home. Just then, Julie felt Ship in normal form snuggling on her leg. "I bet you're feeling tired, huh?," said Julie as she lifted the cute little alien up with her hands.

Just then, she noticed a miniature sumo statue on a shelf over the TV. "What's this?" she wondered. She gently put Ship down and walked over to observe the statue. Julie took a closer look and she recognized it's characteristics of a fictional hero named Ishiyama from a video game franchise called Sumo Slammers. But it looked so old and her parents must have spent a lot of money to buy it. But just out of curiosity, she picked up the statue and then it's eyes suddenly shot some form of magic at her! It startled Julie so much, that she nearly dropped the figure, but gently put it back, not knowing what that thing was capable of. Ship was a little worried about Julie so he rushed over to see if she was okay.

Then she felt some weird rumbling in her stomach....

1331.title: Ed

13311.content:
"Finally, a break!" Ed exclaimed in relief, though to no one in particular, as he was currently wandering through his hometown of Resembool, alone as Al had opted to stay in the house with Winry while Ed went out on his walk.

He was enjoying the pleasant autumn breeze as he wandered through the outskirts of the village in a red t-shirt and a pair of tan pants instead of his usual cloak. His stomach soon reminded him that it was about lunch time, and he hadn't eaten much for breakfast.

"Maybe I should get somethin' to eat." He thought, as his stomach growled even louder, showing Ed that he was downright starving. Soon enough, he was making his way to the center of the village. This was because there was a fall festival in the village today, which was one of the reasons that the Elric brothers were relaxing here in the first place.

"This is great!" Ed thought, "The festival will have plenty of cheap food, and I've saved up a ton of money. It's been a while since I really ate a good meal." He soon arrived at the festival site, ready to feast on some of his favorite foods as a child.

Soon, he was at the first food stand, which sold smoked turkey legs. Soon, Ed had two gargantuan legs, one in each hand, and he tore through them gleefully, enjoying the nostalgic flavors. Those two were enough to fill up Ed's stomach, but he was nowhere near done.

He bought two more turkey legs, munching on them as he made his way to the next food stand. His stomach was now protruding outwards ever so slightly as he finished the second turkey leg, getting out money to pay for his next snack.

He then discarded the bone, which was completely clean, before grabbing the next portion of carnival cuisine, which happened to be a plate with five funnel cakes stacked on top of each other.

As he was hungry, and excited to taste the next flavors, Ed picked up all five funnel cakes at the same time, opening his mouth as much as possible to take a massive bite that caused his cheeks to bulge. He chewed through the funnel cake gleefully, as a young child would, and soon the bite disappeared down his gullet.

He was walking over to another food stand, with the final bites of funnel cake disappearing in his mouth, resting his his stomach, which bulged quite noticeably now, barely starting to push on his t-shirt.
13311.title: He is resting in Resembool, and has money to spare

choices: He gets a whole apple pie
He gets a big ice cream dish
133111.content:
As Ed strolled along, a hot dog stand caught his eye. Grinning, he darted over and ordered half a dozen extra-large hot dogs. Setting them all on an extra-strong paper plate, he grinned again, thanked the befuddled attendant, and continued on. As he walked, he held the plate with one hand (specifically, his automail hand)and grabbed hot dogs with the other one, shoving them, one by one, into his mouth. He chewed each one for a few minutes before swallowing, grinning happily at the taste. As each hot dog went down his gullet, his stomach bulged a little more, pressing a little harder against his shirt with each hot dog that plopped into his belly.

By the time he swallowed the last hot dog, his stomach was a very distinct round shape under his shirt and pressing harder against it. Sighing, Ed smacked his belly, grinning widely.

"Ah man, that was great!" Ed exclaimed, licking his lips. Of course, he was nowhere near done; there were a whole bunch of other foods to try, and he intended to try them all!

To this end, Ed sought out a stand that made homemade doughnuts and bought an entire bag of them. Walking away, he licked his lips and shoved them, one by one, into his mouth, much like he did with the hot dogs.

As doughnut after doughnut went down his throat, his stomach bulged a little more, stretching his shirt further. By the time he'd reached the end of the bag, his shirt had reached its limit and had started to rise up, exposing a tiny bit of skin. In addition, his waist was starting to feel a bit snug.

Oblivious, Ed rubbed his stomach, the grin still on his face. "Wow, the food's really good this year!" he thought to himself, looking around at the stands he had yet to hit up. "Let's see, what should I get next?"
133111.title: He continues to stuff his face uninhibited.

choices: "That was amazing! I think I'll buy more pies!"
"That was delicious! I can't wait to see what other awesome foods there are!"
1331111.content:
Ed's eyes wandered to a pie stand that was new this year. They were advertising for their shop, which just recently opened up in the next town. Ed thought about it, images of pie popping up in his head, giving him the motivation to go to the pie stand next.

Soon, he was looking at the selection of pies that the stand offering, with nearly every pie flavor imaginable. On their menu, they even advertised a "Party Pie", which was a gigantic pie meant to be served at large gatherings.

Ed immediately decided on apple, as it was his favorite. He considered ordering a single slice, but his stomach soon told him otherwise, so he was soon ordering an entire apple pie. The cashier was very polite, assuming that Ed was going to bring it home to his family, and soon he handed one of the pies to a hungry Ed.

The pie, which had a fancy design on the crust, was already sliced, as Ed found out. This was perfect, as he held the pie tin with his automail hand, grabbing out a slice with his other hand. The slice was actually surprisingly stable, and it didn't fall apart as soon as Ed tried to grab it.

He took a bite of the slice, as if he were eating an extra tall pizza slice, and his taste buds were assaulted with a cascade of amazing flavors. It was so amazingly delicious that Ed had actually paused for about 20 seconds, amazed at the wonderful tastes that the pie contained.

Suddenly, he began digging in rapidly, greedily stuffing the rest of the slice into his hungry maw, finishing it in less than a minute, leaving a collage of filling around his mouth. He didn't care, however as he swiftly moved onto the next piece.

As he gorged himself on the delicious pastry, his stomach bulged out slightly farther with each slice, lifting up his shirt slightly farther with each bite. Soon he had eaten half of the pie, receiving strange looks from everyone around him, but he was too enthralled by the taste of the fruity treat.

He took out the last slice, downing it just as quickly as the first seven, and he wasn't done yet, as he licked the last remnants of filling and crust in the tin, cleaning it completely. He also licked his hands, then licked his lips, ensuring that he tasted every bit of the pie.

His stomach was now even more noticeable, and it lifted his shirt halfway up to his bellybutton. It even began to create considerable stress on his pants button. Either way, he belched, rubbing his belly with a goofy, satisfied grin on his face.

Soon, he couldn't help but say out loud...

13312.content:
Al sighed. "Brother, I really don't think this is a good idea."

Tying a napkin around his neck, Ed turned in his seat to look up at the animated suit of armor that was his younger brother and grinned. "Ah, c'mon, Al, lighten up! We're a little tight on cash, so what could it hurt? Besides, we're gonna be stuck in Central for a few days, so what could it hurt?"

Al blinked. "Are you sure you just don't want an excuse to stuff your face?"

Ed laughed nervously, rubbing the back of his head. "Eh...I'll admit that might be a factor." The younger Elric groaned, bringing a palm to his metallic face.

It had all started earlier that day, when Ed had had to report in to Colonel Mustang after exhausting another lead on the Philosopher's Stone. There had been much grumbling on the diminutive alchemist's part, and much smirking on the colonel's part, but miraculously, they had gotten through it without Ed losing his temper.

Unfortunately, when they had gone to the train station to hitch a ride back to Resembool (both to recuperate and to relax a bit,) they had discovered that, due to an unforeseen malfunction in the train's systems, they would have to wait a few days before it was repaired, essentially stranding the two in Central for the time being.

Swearing, Ed had stormed off, grumbling, with a resigned Al close behind. It wasn't long, though, before Ed's stomach had started growling, and he remembered he hadn't eaten anything since breakfast. With this in mind, he'd set off in search of someplace to eat... and had immediately discovered the exact thing to take his mind off his troubles; specifically, a restaurant that was hosting a contest, in which any takers could come and take on their biggest courses. If they succeeded, they'd be rewarded with a sizable cash prize.

Upon finding this out, Ed had immediately darted inside and signed himself up. Now, he sat at a table, eagerly awaiting his first course.

Soon enough, it arrived, and it was...
13312.title: He enters an eating contest

choices: A platter of pork chops, mashed potatoes and vegetables.
A large, whole chicken.
133122.content:
Al practically screamed when he saw the massive pile of fettuccine alfredo in a large bowl, while Ed's stomach grumbled in anticipation. Al was afraid that the server would spill some of it due to the massive amount that was piled on.

"Are you sure this isn't too much for you, brother?" Al asked timidly, though he pretty much knew Ed's answer. Ed's stomach growled louder, almost as if to answer Al, and Ed said, "Don't worry, I won't go too far this time." At that, Al just sat back, resigned, and proceeded to watch the show.

Ed, on the other hand, grabbed a fork, and began shoveling pasta into his mouth as quickly as he possibly could, immediately creating a mess of alfredo sauce on his face. He ate for quite a while, undeterred, and after about ten minutes, his stomach was filled, but he was nowhere near finished.

Another ten minutes later, his stomach began protruding outwards, though it was still hiding underneath his shirt. Al had to look carefully to notice that his brother's belly was indeed quite distended.

It took less than five minutes for Ed's stomach to become clearly noticeable under his shirt. By this time, he was actually not too far from finishing the dish, and there was only a slightly more than a normal serving.

"He might be able to do this." Al thought as Ed was still digging in with quite a bit of gusto. Just under ten minutes later, and Ed was finished with the massive bowl, his stomach barely being held in by his shirt, which stretched taut over the appendage. He belched loudly, then raised his arms, yelling, "Yeah, that was a piece of cake!" Then he felt a pang in his stomach. "Maybe I shouldn't be talking about cake." he said to himself, causing Al and some spectators to chuckle a bit.

Ed then turned to Al, and he said, "See, it was no problem!" but Al still looked worried. "What's the problem?" Ed questioned, before Al said, "That was just the one of the dishes."

At that, Ed's heart sank, but then he quickly recovered, saying, "OK, so there's more than one dish, how hard could it be?" Soon enough, Ed saw just how bad it could be, as the poor waiter was coming back, struggling to carry in the next course, which was...
133122.title: A huge plate of pasta

choices: Several Jumbo Burgers
A pile of Ribs, Steak, and fried Chicken Wings
1331221.content:
Ed's jaw almost dropped when he saw the sheer quantity of food stacked atop the platter dumped onto his table with a deafening THUD! Al almost couldn't bare to look. "...Tha-that's...quite a lot of food..." Ed stuttered, still in shock.

"Brother, maybe you should reconsider. Afterall, there'd be no shame in it!" Al pleaded from afar. However, Ed was determined to win that prize money, and if the FullMetal Alchemist can overcome raging Ice Alchemists, Homunculus, and Mustang's condescending attitude for more than six minutes at a time, then surely, a little extra food here and there was nothing! However, his currently swollen stomach gurgled angrily in disagreement, causing him to wince in pain briefly. But he regained composure, and immediately began to tear into the Pork Chops. Al turned away, fearful that his older brother was going to make himself sick.

After a little while, Ed slowly began to gain a little momentum, biting off huge chunks of meat from the chops, and gulping down hearty mouthfuls. One by one, the chops were stripped of their meat and reduced to a pile of bones on the side of the platter, and the larger the pile got, the larger Ed's stomach got. It had bloated so much that it had risen up and began to expose Ed's bare stomach slightly. Al eventually turned back to his brother, and much to his surprise, the stubborn elder Elric just kept chomping away. "C"mon, brother. You can do this..." said Al quietly and cautiously optimistic.

Finally, Ed finished the last pork chop and leaned back, with both hands clutching his bloated belly. Al looked back at him with concern. "Brother! Are you alright?"
"Ugh, yeah, just need to make a little room before I can finish the rest of this stuff..."
"What do you mean?"

Al's question was answered in the form of a huge, lengthy belch which erupted forcefully out of Ed's mouth. By the time Ed's burp came to an end, he smacked his lips, and patted his belly happily. Al's palm slammed into his metallic helmet of a face from embarrassment, while the other spectators reactions ranged from disgusted, to embarrassed uneasy laughter, to on the floor, laughing the sides off.

"Well, now that there's a bit of extra room, let's rock!" said Ed with a bit more life in his voice as he started scarfing down the mashed potatoes at quick pace. A good amount ended up on the sides of his lips and on the table as he just kept shoveling more and more into his mouth, despite his fullness. One hand rested atop his gut, which continued to expand ever so slightly with each mouthful of potatoes gulped down. Consolidating, Ed started to mix his veggies with his massive pile of potatoes to knock them both out at once, which naturally made Al uneasy.

"Ummm, Brother? Are you sure you're not trying to eat a little too much at once?" asked Al nervous for his brother's sake. Upon gulping down another mouthful, Ed sighed and said, "Sure it is! I'll knock them both out and get them done with sooner! Besides, veggies by themselves?! Noooo thank you..." responded Ed, causing his metallic brother to sweat drop with embarrassment about his brothers childish hatred for vegetables. And so, he continued to mix green beans, carrots, corn, and peas in with his massive pile of spuds, and then proceeded to take his spoon and wolf down as much as his mouth could fit, occasionally causing his cheeks to bulge out comically as he would gulp down hearty mouthfuls at once.

A few more minutes passed, and Ed's stomach had bloated up, with his shirt now exposing a good amount of flesh, only covering his belly button and up, exposing just how much food the young Alchemist had ingested. Finally, he had successfully finished every last drop of mashed potatoes and vegetables. Stuffed beyond comprehension, Ed burped wetly and groaned in pain as he began to massage his aching stomach, fully aware that he wasn't out of the woods just yet. The sound of another waiter approaching with yet another hearty platter of food caught the ears of all spectators.

Nervously, Al looked and said, "Umm, Brother? I don't think it's over y-"
"I KNOW, ALPHONSE! THANK YOU!" shouted an angry Ed in response. He slowly turned to see what he was up against, and couldn't help but whimper...
1331221.title: Platter of pork chops, mashed potatoes and veggies

choices: Ed soldiers through his burgers unimpeded...
Ed begins to slow down again...
13312211.content:
Ed's mouth gaped as the waiter dropped a large platter before Ed. On that platter, ten massive steaming fresh burgers, complete with grilled, caramelized onions, pickles, lettuce, ketchup, mustard, and some kind of steak sauce, and a large pitcher of cola to wash it all down. Ed's eyes were practically bulging out of his head when he saw the sheer size of each burger set before him, and looked down at his own bloated stomach uncertainly. Even the crowd around him was muttering amongst themselves.

A little more than bewildered himself, Al nonetheless stepped forward and said, "Ed! Remember all the times Granny Pinako would make burgers for us? You used to eat at least a dozen each and every time!" Al sweat dropped and added, "And whenever Winry and I couldn't finish, you'd jump right in and finish ours too…" Ed thought for a moment, and started snickering, remembering how he'd even go as far as snatch burgers from them when they weren't looking. Then a spectator amidst the crowd said, "You kidding me?! There's no WAY that little shrimp can eat all those burgers!"

Almost immediately, Ed perched up from his seat, waving his arms up angrily as he shouted "WHO ARE YOU CALLING A LITTLE SHRIMP?!!!" Gritting his teeth, he grabbed a burger and said, "Ya think a shrimp can do THIS?!" He then opened his mouth as wide as he could and took a big, honking bite of his first burger. He chewed vigorously angrily for a moment, then stopped as his eyes widened. Suddenly, the angry expression on his face became one of bewilderment. "Wow…these things taste INCREDIBLE!" Ed said with newfound excitement as he turned to his burger and took another bite, and another, and another. Before he knew it, the first burger had been completely inhaled in a matter of moments. Licking his nonmetallic fingers clean, Ed licked his lips, and grabbed his second burger, wasting no time, getting to work on his next burger.

Al and the others watched in amazement as the young alchemist proceeded to wolf down the burgers like he'd not eaten in days. Which was especially surprising considering how large his belly had already grown, and continued to grow with each few passing bites gulped down. It had gotten to the point where his shirt just barely stood right on his belly button. Finally, after successfully finishing his next burger, Ed sighed with relief and then took a swig of his drink and burped loudly, patting his belly proudly, before moving onto the next burger. Al continued to watch and cheer his brother on. "Come on, I know you can do this!" Others cheered on and watched as Ed continued to put away the burgers one by one.

As time rolls on...
13312211.title: Several Jumbo Burgers

choices: Grab his seventh burger and slowly eat until his pants button popped.
Grab his soda and chug until his belly grew enough to pop his pants button off.
133122112.content:
As momentum had built up, Ed had successfully polished off five burgers straight, enjoying each and every single bite. And of course, which each burger downed, his swollen stomach continued to expand further and further, to the point where his belly button had long been exposed, and the shirt had now risen a good inch above it now. However, by the time Ed had reached his sixth burger, it began to catch up with him. Before taking that first, whopping bite, he stopped and winced, lowering the burger as he clutched his bloated belly firmly with his free hand, as he began to groan in discomfort, much to Al's dismay.

"Brother? Are you feeling alright?" Al asked from afar. Ed opened his mouth to respond, but instead, accidentally let out a long, queasy belch. "*UUUUURRP!* Ugh...that's how I'm feeling right now..." replied Ed groggily as he began to rub his belly, hoping to coax away the sudden fullness ailing him. "My stomach feels kinda tight now...man, what I wouldn't give to be able to transmute one of these burgers into an alka seltzer," Ed said to himself, whilst massaging his midsection.

As he rubbed his gut, he felt an uncomfortable tightness around the front of his waistline. His stomach had grown so much that it began to press firmly into the front of his pants, causing his abdomen's current distress. Wasting no time, the young alchemist reached as best he could for the front of his pants, trying to unbutton it and free his belly from its' current restraints, but it was so swollen that it was practically impossible for Ed to reach by himself. Groaning in fullness and annoyance, he turned to Al and said, "Hey, Al! Can you help me with this?"

"Oh, ummm, s-sure!" Al responded, stepping from the crowd. But before he could approach Ed, one of the attendants to the contest stopped him and said, "I'm sorry, young man, but the rules stipulate that no contestant may receive any outside help of any kind." Al glanced at Ed still reaching for his button and replied, "But sir, his tummy is stuck and I need to-" but before he continue, the man held his hand forward and said, "Rules are rules. I'm sorry." Al glanced back at Ed who looked back at him and smirked assuredly. "Don't worry, Al. I'll figure something out," Ed replied, giving Al a thumbs up before turning back to his burgers. Al glanced at him with concern, but nonetheless, returned with the crowd.

"Okay...what to do...what to do..." Ed said to himself. "I'm never gonna finish these things if my gut's still caught by my button. And it's so big that I can't even reach the damn thing. Rgh, if only Winry could ever figure out how to get the extendable wrist thing working..." Ed continued to muse and ponder, until suddenly, it hit him. "Heeeey, yeah, that outta work! I'll just keep eating until my stomach gets big enough to break through the button itself!" He grabbed the burger, but grimaced, as his stomach was still too uncomfortably tight to eat. But he mustered enough strength to take as big a bite as he possibly could, much to everyone's surprise.

He was chewing a lot slower before gulping down a big, heaping mouthful of his burger, causing him to wince as the pain in his belly worsened. Nonetheless, he soldiered on. Taking one bite after another, each one causing his gut more discomfort than the last. He could feel his gut pressing more and more into the button of his pants, causing it to tether slightly, but maintain itself, even after Ed had finished his sixth burger. "Stubborn bastard, aren'tcha..." cursed Ed to his button, "...but so am I!"

At this point on, Ed proceeded to...
133122112.title: Ed begins to slow down again...

choices: Ed polishes off the burger, and immediately sets to work on the remaining ones
Ed finishes the burger, but spends some time belching and resting to make room
1331221122.content:
Ed thought about immediately grabbing his seventh burger and ripping into it, but he thought better of it; considering how much pain he'd experienced finishing the sixth burger, there rwas no way he'd be able to eat any more...at least, not until he busted his button.

And my belt, he thought, wincing as he felt the cold metal of the buckle pressing into his growing tummy. Ah well, once that goes, it probably won't take long to take care of my button. But if I can't eat until I do, then how... His thoughts trailed off as his eyes fell upon the rather large pitcher of cola. He grinned mischievously. Bingo. Licking his lips, Ed seized the pitcher, brought it to his mouth, and tilted it up, letting the sweet, fizzy liquid flow into his mouth. Al's fiery eyes widened, before he sighed and facepalmed for the umpteenth time that day. Ooooof course he'd do that... he thought to himself, shaking his head. Which one of them was supposed to be the older brother, again?

Oblivious to Al's thoughts, Ed chugged away, ignoring the tiny rivulets of cola that flowed down his cheeks. His stomach gurgled as it slowly expanded, to the varied awe and disgust of the spectators. One in particular was especially interested in the spectacle...

This individual, oddly enough, was the very same one that had heckled Ed earlier and called him a "shrimp", though not out of any spite; indeed, those who knew him would attest that he hardly had a mean bone in his body. No, that had been more of a motivator, so to speak; after all, the young alchemist's temper was almost legendary, and what better way to motivate him than by riling him up? And, as a result, both he and the crowd were being treated to quite a spectacle...

He shifted uncomfortably where he stood. Actually makes all this discomfort worth it... he thought, wincing. Although it was a pleasantly warm Spring day, the individual was clad in a heavy hooded sweatshirt, the hood drawn far over his head and his face tilting downward, all but concealing it from sight. In addition, he wore a pair of mittens over his hands, though these were hidden from sight inside his jean pockets. He wore heavy boots over his feet, a rare occurrence for him (and rather uncomfortable, he might add), as well as an odd bulge in the back of his pants...

He sighed. Just take it easy; this is all gonna be worth it. Then you can change into something WAY more comfortable... Shaking his head, he refocused his attention on the determined young alchemist.

Ed continued chugging away, slowly but surely inflating his already-engorged belly and slowly forcing his shirt higher. More importantly, though, it continued its push against his waistline, putting more and more strain on both his pants button and his belt buckle, the latter of which had begun quivering. Sensing this, Ed grinned savagely and began chugging even faster than before, swelling his stomach out even more and further increasing the strain on his pants. Behind his buckle, the button to his pants was slowly beginning to loosen, the threads holding it on unraveling one by one. The belt buckle itself began quivering rather violently, the belt's leather beginning to rip.

Grrr.... Ed thought to himself, chugging and chugging even as the pain in his waistline became almost unbearable. Come...on... More rips appeared, more button threads loosened, and the buckle continued quivering even more violently, until...

RRRRRRIP!

Ed gasped as the metallic buckle burst off his pants, shooting straight over the table and impacting the opposite wall, very narrowly missing the heads of one of the patrons. A shocked murmur went up through the audience, while Al simply groaned quietly. "Really, brother?" He muttered to himself. "You couldn't have undone your belt before you got to this point?"

Ed's pants, however, weren't done just yet; the release of the belt had allowed his stomach to surge forward a bit more, and because of all the pressure, all the remaining threads of his pants button came loose rather violently, causing the plastic disc to burst off his waistline with an audible "POP!" and follow the same trajectory as his belt buckle and sailing in an arc over the table, once again impacting the wall and narrowly missing a patron.

The young alchemist released a massive sigh, slumping back in his chair and letting his one arm hang limply to the side while the other massaged his even more swollen belly, now a good several inches above his navel. In addition, the loss of his belt buckle (the straps of which remained on his waist but now curved horizontally over his swollen belly) and his button had caused his fly to go down a few teeth. "Oh man, that felt so GOOD,,," He let out a loud burp, sighing happily and licking his lips.

Al shook his head reprovingly. "Brother, I swear, sometimes you're so crude..." Ed's only response was to turn to Al and grin widely, before straightening up, grabbing his seventh burger, and getting to work on it.

The hooded watcher observed all of this, a massive grin on his concealed face and the bulge in the back of his jeans struggling to move. Excellent work, Mr. Elric, he thought approvingly as Ed began savaging his burger. Now, go get 'em!
1331221122.title: Grab his soda and chug until his belly grew eno...

choices: His belly button pops out. (Just as the hooded spectator predicted)
He begins to feel immensely sick...
13312211222.content:
Though his bites were a little slower, the young alchemist managed to take down his seventh burger, one heaping bite at a time, leaving nothing but crumbs as Ed chewed on the last mouthful of his burger in peace while Al and the other spectators watched and cheered him on. "Way to go, brother! Just three more burgers to go!" cheered young Alphonse as Ed finally gulped down the last heaping mouthful of the seventh burger into his already immensely bloated gut. After gulping it down, Ed sighed with relief and rested his hand atop his gut, rubbing it gingerly from an overwhelming fullness.

"Oh man, my stomach feels like it's about to burst..." Ed said to himself, trying to massage the pain away to little avail, despite having just busted a belt buckle and a button just to free it from its' restraints. The hooded spectator watched in amusement as Ed's belly swelled out further as a result of polishing off seven burgers straight. Of course; all that soda and strained eating HAD to have been trying for the young man as well.

And indeed it had been. As shortly after finishing his seventh burger, Ed's ridiculously swollen stomach began to quiver and gurgle rather audibly once more, causing the young alchemist to wince and clutch around the middle of his belly firmly with one hand, whilst the other hand; once hanging limp from his chair, was now covering his mouth. Al stepped forward, glancing with concern and cautiousness. "Ed? A-are you alright?!" His younger brother asked, concerned that the contents in which his older brother had just consumed was going to reappear again, as were some other weary spectators. The spectator in the hooded sweatshirt, on the other hand, merely smirked to himself and shook his head.
