As if to punctuate this thought, Ed belched queasily, having just downed a particularly big chunk of cake. Groaning, he leaned back in his chair and massaged his belly. "Oh man, so many sweets...I gotta take a breather..."

Seeing that Ed was resting up, Hunter gulped down what was left of a bowlful of pudding, licked his chops, and dropped his spoon. Like Ed, he leaned back in his chair, resting one arm on the back of the chair while the other massaged his tummy. "Phew, can't remember the last time I ate so many sweets at once..."

Al watched the two as they rested and rubbed their bellies, unable to repress a mental smile as Ed's queasy expression slowly became one of content. His gaze then went to Hunter; the anthro-wolf's eyes were closed and his tongue stuck out the side of his muzzle as he rubbed his gut. Heh, he actually looks sorta cute like that... the younger Elric thought, surprised that he was thinking like that. Still, his tummy's gotta be feeling uncomfortable right now...

Not fully believing what he was about to do, Al 'cleared' his 'throat'. "Uh, Hunter?"

His eyes snapping open, the wolf looked toward the animated suit of armor. "Something up, Al?"

Al took a deep breath. "Um...I was just...wonderingifyou'dletmerubyourtummy."

Hunter's eyes widened, his ears perking up; even Ed looked at his brother strangely. "Um, sorry; would you mind repeating that?"

"S-sorry," Al apologized. Taking another deep breath, he asked, "I know this is gonna sound really weird, but...can I rub your tummy?"

Ed's eyes went wide at this. "Uh, Al, what're you..."

Hunter, however, beat him to the punch. "Sure!" he exclaimed, his tail wagging.

"Really?" Ed and Al both exclaimed.

Hunter nodded happily. "It's been a while since I've gotten one, since I'm kinda weirded out at the idea of asking people for one, even if they'd be more than willing." He patted his belly prouudly. "Not to mention, even with a just a mildly stuffed belly, a tummy rub would feel amazing." Grinning, he grabbed the bottom of his tank top, pulling it up over his somewhat stuffed, brown-furred tummy. "You can start whenever ya want, Al."

Al blinked, a bit taken aback at Hunter's eagerness. "Al-alright." Making his way over to Hunter, he reached out an armored hand and began gently rubbing Hunter's tummy. The wolf's eyes lit up. "Oh yeah...that feels great..." Seeing that Hunter was enjoying it, Al began rubbing a bit more vigorously. Hunter's grin turned dopey, and his tongue started sticking out the side of his mouth. "Ohhhh yeah...that's the stuff..." Before long, he began panting, and one of his legs began kicking.

Ed watched the sight, completely flabbergasted. Damn; we've seen some weird things over the years, but that's just... Shaking his head, he leaned back in his chair, returning to his own ministrations; not much else he could do until they got their second wind, anyway.

After a few minutes...
133122112221222212112211.title: The two take a break to catch their breath.

choices: Accepted the milk as the two continued to eat and drink away.
Promptly requested a less villainous beverage to wash down his food.
1331221122212222121122112.content:
This scene continued for a little while longer, with Al continuing to rub Hunter's bloated tummy while Hunter continued panting happily with his leg kicking and his tail wagging. Al smiled internally, as the display almost reminded him of Den as a pup back when they were all younger, minus the fact that Den couldn't speak and wasn't humanoid, but that was neither here nor there. After a while, even Ed was unable to repress a smile, watching the anthro-wolf guy carry about happily like a puppy.

Finally, Hunter slumped back in his chair, tongue still hanging at the side of his mouth. "Ohhh man, I can't even describe how amazing that felt!" Hunter said as he turned to Al and said, "Thanks a bunch, Al! Really appreciate it!"

Al chuckled to himself and said, "My pleasure. Just happy to help." Dropping his shirt back over his still swollen tummy, Hunter hopped up to his feet and said, "Y'know what'd really help wash down all these goodies? A nice ol' pitcher of milk!" Ed's face immediately grimaced at the mere word milk. Seeing this, Al rolled his fiery eyes and shook his head. Honestly, Brother... Oblivious to this, Hunter nonetheless smiled and exclaimed, "I'll be back in a jiff, fellas!" He then headed back to get himself a pitcher while Ed turned his attention to Al.

"So, Al. What was the deal with that?" Ed asked. Al bashfully rubbed the back of his helmet and said, "I dunno, I figured since he's a wolf, he'd appreciate a nice tummy rub. What canine doesn't? ESPECIALLY after eating that much. Plus, it was kind of cute, seeing him carry on like that." Ed laughed softly and shrugged, "Heh, guess it was kinda funny seeing him all loosey-goosey like a big dog or something."

Ed's laughter immediately stopped when he saw Hunter return with two fairly sizable pitchers of milk. "Those....better both be for you...." Ed seethed, his eye twitching as he said that. Ohhh boy... Al thought, sensing Ed nearing the red zone, as he took a few more cautious steps away from the table.

Meanwhile, Hunter chuckled and placed both pitchers down on the table and said, "Hehe, okay look, I know you're not the biggest milk fan-" Hunter stopped and glanced curiously at Ed. If he didn't know better, he could swear his head was literally steaming with anger. Chuckling a bit more nervously, he nonetheless regained composure and said, "J-just hear me out, okay? If that contest proved anything, it's that despite how much you hate...HATE milk, you can still drink it, right? Well, I think after drinking as much milk as you did in one single sitting, maybe you've started to build a tolerance for it."

"Tolerance? For MILK?!" Ed shouted.

Al almost interjected to try and calm Ed down, but knew better and immediately opted to say nothing. "Look at it this way. If you start to drink it more, maybe you'll hate it less. I mean, you already had a great deal at that contest, right? What's a pitcher compared to something like that?"

Ed, still sickened by the audacity of milks' very existence, nevertheless thought for a moment, then...
1331221122212222121122112.title: Al finishes, and Hunter gets some milk.

choices: One of them begins to lag, allowing the other to gain the advantage
One of them has to stop to unbutton his pants
13312211222122221211221122.content:
"I'll drink anything but milk," Ed bluntly spoke up, glaring at Hunter.

Hunter, to his surprise, simply shrugged and smiled. "Eh, I figured you'd say that." He looked thoughtful for a moment. "Tell me, Ed; how do you feel about milkshakes?"

Ed's eyes widened. "Milkshakes?" He smirked. "They're actually pretty good; nice, thick, cold, creamy..."

Al shook his head. "And you still won't drink milk by itself..."

Ed turned his head towards Al. "Al, regular milk doesn't have ice cream with it!" He grinned. "Besides, stew has milk in it too, and that's delicious!"

Al held a finger up to protest, but lowered it, deciding to not even bother. Honestly, Brother, you're such a kid sometimes...

Hunter, chuckling at the whole ordeal, promptly hoisted himself out of his seat. "Alright, milkshakes for Mr. Elric it is!" He looked down at Ed in his seat. "Any particular flavor you feel like?"

Ed shrugged. "Eh, it doesn't really matter to me, to be honest."

Hunter's eyes gleamed. "Awesome! Wait right here!" Rubbing his own swollen tummy, he sauntered off.

With nothing else to do, Ed and Al chatted a bit, talking about their current situation, their thoughts on the matter, and the like. Before long, Hunter returned, pushing a cart laden with several large pitchers, each roughly the size of Hunter's pitchers of milk, each filled to the brim with a different flavor of milkshake. Panting from the exertion, Hunter wheeled it next to Ed's side of the table, allowing the young Alchemist easy access to the thick, sweet beverages. "Here...pant...here ya are, Ed!"

Ed's eyes widened. "Wow...that's a lotta milkshake..."

Grinning, Hunter sat back down. "Yep, sure is." Grabbing a slice of cake, he crammed the whole thing in his mouth, and only chewed a bit before grabbing one of his pitchers of milk, leaning back in his chair, lifting the pitcher up to his still-filled muzzle, and began guzzling it down, washing down the cake. Once he'd gotten it down his throat, he set the milk down, licked his chops, and immediately grabbed a spoon, spooning vanilla ice cream into his maw with one paw while he crammed pawfuls of pie into his mouth with the other.

Ed, smirking, decided to try a different tactic; grabbing one of his many pitchers of milkshakes (vanilla), he lifted it to his mouth and tilted it, letting it pour down his throat. Marvelling at how creamy and sweet it was, he kept it up, and he actually got about a quarter of the way through before he had to come up for air. Panting, he took a few deep breaths, licked his lips, then brought it back up to his mouth, intent on finishing as much of the creamy beverage as possible. Grinning at the sight, Hunter set his spoon down and crammed some more pie into his mouth before he too picked up his pitcher of milk and started guzzling it down.

The two continued doing this for some time, until...
13312211222122221211221122.title: Promptly requested a less villainous beverage t...

choices: He chugs the second half in one go then moves onto another milkshake.
He finishes and resumes eating, now washing his food down with milkshakes.
133122112221222212112211222.content:
Al watched, nearly dumbstruck as both his older brother and the wolf-person continued chugging relentless amounts of their respectively sizable beverages. All the while, Al glanced down and noticed that both their tummies were inflating outward amply due to the rush of liquid filling their bellies. The heavy, creamy milkshakes acted as a combination of both ice cream treat and beverage, and as Ed chugged away at the thick liquid, his belly would grow and grow as he pressed on. Though Ed's stomach was still just a tad larger from his previous escapades, Hunter did a pretty good job keeping up, chugging good portions of milk from his pitcher to wash down various treats, jumping right in for more food, chewing away, and washing it down yet again. Thus, his own tummy was catching up in a hurry.

Eventually, Ed's stomach had distended so much that it pushed Ed's red t-shirt to the point where it had begun to rise up and just ever so slightly reveal a sliver of flesh at the bottom. Hunter fared no better, as his black tanktop had also risen up to reveal a sliver of brown fur. Continuing to shift his focus between the two, Al shook his head and mentally sighed. It really does figure that the ONLY other person I've ever seen eat as much as Brother is a wolf...

After a good while continuing this pattern, Hunter had just finished chomping away at a large slice of pie with a slab of ice cream atop it, and with an ample mouthful, he brought the pitcher of milk up and proceeded to take large gulps from the milk, causing his cheeks to bulge comically for a moment before that bulge traveled from his mouth down his throat. After a few moments, he'd successfully washed down a rather large mouthful, and lowered his pitcher back down, letting out a long burp shortly after before sighing with relief. "Hehe, I tell ya, I dunno how anyone can dislike such a nutritious beverage," Hunter said, patting his slightly more exposed belly happily, before glancing at the still full second pitcher and licking his lips as he added, "but far be it for me to complain."

Ed didn't respond, he had simply continued chugging more and more of milkshake, hoping to drain every last drop. "Umm? Brother? You might want to catch your breath before you make yourself sick." Getting past the second quarter of his shake, Ed continued, until he winced and promptly placed the pitcher down. Catching his breath and burping wetly, a look of discomfort took Ed's face. "How ya holding up there, Ed?" asked Hunter. Ed massaged his tummy and said, "My stomach's kinda feeling constricted actually." Immediately, Al interjected with, "You might wanna look down, Brother."

"Huh? Whadduya-" Ed stopped mid sentence, and despite his belly bloating out considerably, he was able to catch his khaki shorts getting snag by the button and zipper, restraining his distended stomach and making it harder to eat anything else. Ed rolled his eyes and said, "Figures. Well, I already busted one pair of pants for one day, don't wanna make the same mistake twice, especially when someone JUST gave 'em to me." Hunter chuckled as Ed proceeded to struggle with his button, fumbling to get a hold of it due to a limitation of mobility. But after some trial and error, at last, the snag button had been undone, and with it, came any restrictions against Ed's belly as it proceeded to distend further just slightly.

Sighing with sweet relief, Ed smiled and slumped back against his chair with a goofy smile on his face. "Ahhhhh, MUCH better!" Ed said as he patted his liberated belly proudly. Hunter giggled at the sight whereas Al simply shook his head, rubbing the area of his helmet that would be his forehead. "...Remind me to never let you go to a buffet ever again..." Al said. The others simply laughed as Ed then glanced back down at his milkshake with new found vigor.

"This time, you're going down..." Ed said, glaring at the remaining contents of his milkshake, before grabbing his pitcher and chugging at a slightly quicker pace than before...
133122112221222212112211222.title: One of them has to stop to unbutton his pants

choices: They get competitive to see who can drink the most milkshakes.
They gulp down a few more milkshakes and resume eating.
1331221122212222121122112221.content:
Taking the remainder of his pitcher, Ed proceeded to tilt his head back, to quickly and vigorously gulp down the remaining contents within. Watching, Hunter grinned and noted, "Careful, Mr. Elric. Wouldn't wanna get brain freeze, right?" Shaking his head, Al sighed at the sight and muttered, "Brother might be really smart, but honestly, sometimes, I forget he even has a brain to freeze." Hunter snickered at the remark while Ed simply rolled his eyes, still chugging away the second half, until every last drop had been sent right down Ed's cooled throat.

Belching loudly, Ed smacked his lips and patted his belly happily, as he exclaimed, "Wow, I dunno where you got 'em, but these gotta be some of the best damn milkshakes I've ever tasted!" Smiling, Hunter simply shrugged and noted, "Yep, they're pretty good, aren't they? There's actually a place not too far from here famous for 'em. I'm kinda surprised you haven't heard of them before." Al chuckled and said, "Well, we have been rather busy, lately..."

"Err, right, hehe, sorry 'bout that," responded Hunter, rubbing the back of his head as he chuckled a bit more sheepishly. But Ed simply waved his hand dismissively as he licked his lips and grabbed another. "Hey, you could'a gotten these from the Fifth Laboratory for all I care! All I know is, this is how a milkshake is supposed to taste!" Responded the young Alchemist, before grabbing a grabbing a strawberry shake, and immediately brought the pitcher to his lips and proceeded to gulp down the pink contents relentlessly. As he chugged and chugged, his already fairly bloated tummy continued to expand and bloat outward, causing his red t-shirt to ride up more and expose more and more flesh below his belly button.

Watching Ed gulp down the frosty dessert beverage, Hunter recalled having tried a few himself. They are pretty tasty... he thought, debating if he wanted to take one or just leave them all for the FullMetal Alchemist, but Ed, however occupied by his beverage, nonetheless caught the anthro wolf examining the cart of milkshakes and smirked, before pulling his pitcher down and sighing with relief. "Hey, help yourself, Hunter! You're the one who got 'em, besides! There's plenty to go around!" he exclaimed with a smile.

To his surprise however, he got no response...until both Hunter and Al started snickering to themselves, earning a curious glance from Ed. "Eh? What's so funny?" asked Ed curiously. Still snickering, Hunter pointed his paw at Ed's face, as he tried to say, "Errr, hehehe...Mi-mister Elreeehehe...?"

"What?"

Finally, Al grabbed a pitcher and held it near Ed's face, still laughing. "You might want to take a look, Brother..." Ed glanced, and immediately his shoulders slouched as he saw his reflection...and a pink ice cream mustache formed over his upper lip.

"...Ah."

Immediately, both Al and Hunter burst into a fit of full blown laughter. Wiping his face, Ed scowled and grumbled under his breath. "This is what I get for trying to be nice," he grumbled under his breath. Wiping tears of laughter from his eyes, Hunter caught his breath and said, "Aww, c'mon, don't be like that." Al nudged his older brother playfully and added, "It was pretty funny, Brother..."

Stopping for a moment, Ed also started to chuckle to himself. "Heh, guess it was. Now if only we had whipped cream...then we could'a made it a full beard!" Immediately, all three started laughing aloud for a good little while, before Ed grabbed his pitcher once more, ready to take it to town so to speak. "Well, Hunter? You gonna help yourself, or am I gonna have to drink all these milkshakes by myself?" He grinned a bit more mischievously and added, "Cause I'm completely fine with that..."

Nodding, Hunter smiled and grabbed a chocolate milkshake pitcher and noted, "Well, if you insist..." The two then clanked their pitchers together, and proceeded to start gulping them down at the same time.

As they did...

155321.content:
(IDK what their current status is in the show but in this story Izzy and Owen are a couple. IZZYxOWEN MY OTP 4EVA!! )

"The grossest sandwich I ever ate?" Owen said, squinting thoughtfully into distant. "That would have to be the one I made when I was nine and I was home on my own. Hot-pepper-and-pickle-brine-with-peanut-butter-and-seven-kinds-of-meat on homemade chocolate bread. It took my all day to make and most of the night to eat, and I was horking for a week."

"Cool!" Izzy said, lazily dragging her toes through the frigid slate-grey water. She could dimly see the waves crashing against the darkened pillars of the dock through the slats beneath her, and imagined being pulled down into those murky depths, and maybe fighting a shark. The fancy fluttered out of her head before she could act on it (she could never understand why everyone thought she was so impulsive when she didn't do half the things she thought about doing) and she returned to her boyfriend. "So, what was the best sandwich you ever ate?"

Owen stared out over the ocean, and with zen-like calm, he answered, "The same sandwich."

There was silence for a moment, except for the splashing of Izzy's feet. She was drawing Georges Seurat's "A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of La Grande Jatte" with her toe, although since her medium was water it was impossible to really tell. Another impulse struck her, this one with all the force of a javelin, and she knew there was no getting around this one.

"I want to eat it."

"What?"

"I want to eat that sandwich."

"But, but it doesn't exist anymore," Owen said, "and anyway, if a girl ate it, she'd probably die. It's pretty hardcore."

"Then we'll recreate it," Izzy said firmly. "We'll break into the kitchen tonight. And what kind of a lightweight do you think I am, anyway? I spent six weeks at cheerleading camp living under the dorm of the registered campers and subsisting on a diet of tarantulas and dirt! I think I can handle a little sandwich." She leaned forward and nuzzled Owen's nose. "Besides, it'll be romantic. We'll have stomach cramps as a couple."

"But that heist is impossible!" Owen lamented. "Don't you think I've tried? That place is like... Fort Knockwurst!"

Izzy smirked. "Last time, you didn't have me."
155321.title: Izzy, oh my Izzy...

info.brief_description: Your favorite animated characters eating tons of food and getting the guts to show for it!
info.description:
Alright, so I've seen a ton of WG stories on this site. That's all well and good, but I thought I'd do something a little different: specifically, the characters stuff themselves and get big bellies, but they don't gain any real permanent weight. However, they DO end up having to struggle with their guts, and having to deal with them until everything digests.

Here are the basic rules:

No killing.

No nudity.

Mild swearing is allowed.

No overt sexual overtones.

No gaining of permanent weight (however, a bit of extra belly skin following a particularly huge meal is permitted XD )

Aside from that, go crazy and have fun!
